1b1(rgyud): /'byor chen po dang /rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang /shin tu mos pa chen mo dang /mos pa
1b2(rgyud): dang bcas pa srung ba byed pa rab tu rnam par srung bar byed pa/nye ba mo dang bcas pa nye bar zhi ba chen po dang
1b3(rgyud): zhi bar mdzad pa chen po mdzes pa dang mdog tu ldan pa/shes pa dang skyabasu ldan pa ni 'di lta ste/gtso bo rnal
1b4(rgyud): 'byor 'khor lo zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje nyid du 'dus po zhes bya ba dang /rnal 'byor chen po
2b1(rgyud): rgya gram gyi tshul 'dzin pa dang bcus pa ni cir yang ston pa'i gzugs kyis khwa dog bzhi dang ldan te 'dug pa'i cha lugs kyis cod pan lnga
2b2(rgyud): dang ldan+da te/ma bsgribs mi sgrib sgribs pa mi 'gogasra bsgrib tu med pa'i dbyings nas ying dag pa'i gzhal yas chen po na mnyam pa
2b3(rgyud): chen po'i tshul rdo rjes sku ma bkag pas mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas bzhugaso//de yang 'di ltar so sor gasngal bar mnyam pa chen
2b4(rgyud): po dang 'khor dang breces pa mnyam pa chen pos yo byad chen po ni kun gyi gdung 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa ni brten pas phyin ci
2b5(rgyud): ma log pa dang gnyis dang du ma med pa ni gzungs rnal 'byor ma che ne mo ste/byang chub chen mo nu mkha' zhes bya ba dang /byang chub chen mo
2b6(rgyud): na mkha' 'dzin ma zhes bya ba dang /byang chub che ni mo so srungs ma zhes bya ba dang /byang chub chen mo brlan par byed pa tshon me dang /
3a1(rgyud): byang chub chen mo rnam par 'khengs pa spang ba zhes bya ba dang /byang chub cher mo las grub par mdzad ma zhes
3a2(rgyud): bya ba dang /byang chub chen mo rdo rje rab tu chags pa chen mo 'dzin zhes bya ba dang //rab tu ma tshogs pa gsod ces bya ba dang /byang chub
3a3(rgyud): tshon mo rab tu rmongs sel zhes bya ba dang /byang chub chen mo gsung gi 'khor lo ma zhes bya ba ste/de dag kyang 'di lta ste/shin tu ut+pal
3a4(rgyud): lta bu'i mdog dang /shag kra dang /bai DUr+ya dang /pad+ma rA ga dang /as ma gar ba la sogs pa rdzas kyi bsngags pas 'phags par
3a5(rgyud): 'tshor ba ma smin pa med par bzhugs pa ni rnal 'byor mi kun tu bzung po 'khor dang bcas pa'o//de yang gus pa chen po gsang ba dang
3a6(rgyud): gus pa chen po sna tshogs pa'i dri dang /gus pa chen po dbang sgyur ba ni gsang ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba dang //gsal ba 'dzin byed ma dang /
3b1(rgyud): rnam par dri'i gnas gyur pa dang /rnam par smra byed pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'o//de nyid mthong bar byed pa'i dbang po dang /nyan par byed pa'i dbang po dang /gsung
3b2(rgyud): byed chen po'i dbang po dang /gtar ba chen po'i dbang po dang /shin tu gtong bar mdzad pa dang /shin tu rtog par mdzad pa dang /shin tu 'dzin dbang chen
3b3(rgyud): dong /shin tu grub par mdzad pa dang /cha lugs mi gtong ba'i btsun mo dang bcas pa'o//yod pa rnam par rtog par mdzad pa dang /med pa sel bar mdzad
3b4(rgyud): pa dang /rnam par 'du shes rgyal bya yin par mdzad pa dang shin tu 'gog pa rnam par 'joms pa chen mo dang /mngon spyod kyi lus kyis gnyi su med par 'khril
3b5(rgyud): nas chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa chen po'i gzhal yas na bzhug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma'i gzhal yasu dgyes nas ma
3b6(rgyud): skyes pa'i dbyings shes rab kyi tshogs chen ma mu khyud kun dang ldan pa zla rgyas lta bu'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dbus med par khyab pa/rin po che kun dang ldan pa
3b7(rgyud): glo dang ngos dang kha dog dang dbyibs rgyu khyon dpag tu med per gyur pa/ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i cha lugs kyis rnam par mdzes pa/yid bzhin chen
4a1(rgyud): /po'i rgyun gyis rnam par smras pa/sna tshogs pa'i bye brag gis rgyal ba rnams kyi gdung 'dzin pa/sgyu 'phrul chen po'i sgo bzhi dang ldan pa
4a2(rgyud): theg pa phyi'i rnal 'byor rnams kyi theg pa chen po 'beb ga li dge sdig chen po'i mchog shin tu gsang ba tshon mo dang bcas pa/pad+ma chen po'i dbus na lci kha
4a3(rgyud): dog bzhi'i bye brag gros mdzes par gyur pa phyogs bzhi bre ba rim pa gsum gyi cha lugs kyis gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'o//de bzhin gshegs
4a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor sgrib pa mchog tu sel ba ste le'u dang po'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das long spyod chen po gdung ba mchog tu sel
4a5(rgyud): bar mdzad pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/'dzum pa chen pos rab tu chags pa chen po la dbang sgyur bar dgyes te/gsang ba chen mo'i mkha' la pud+ma
4a6(rgyud): dbang gi mdog gis rgyas par mdzad/oM suM ra tA su khe zhes brjod pas rdo rje rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa btsun mo dang bcas par gyur to//de nas rab tu 'di
4a7(rgyud): brjod par mdzad//bzhi pa kha dog dkar la 'char//btang snyoms kun gyi spro bsdu yis//gsum pa rdzogs par gsal ba dang //phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog de
4b1(rgyud): dgu las//rgyal madrug dang mnyam du dgyes//phyag rgyu rdo rdul bu 'dzin//bcu gsum pA yi na lugs kyus//tshe chung mod par gsal bar bsgom//dbul gnyis pa'i yi gor/
4b2(rgyud): ldan//gsol ba nyid kyi dus dag tu//cod pan lnga yi rin chen las//rgyan gyi rigs ni gsal ba yin//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba
4b3(rgyud): rgyan dam pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//gsum pa mthing 'bar yi ge che//rigs kyi rin chen spro bsdu las//phyag rgyar gsal bas skur gasngal ba//rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du dgyes//
4b4(rgyud): sgrib pa kun spangs sdig med sdoms//gnyis pa yi ni yi ge las//cod pan lnga ldan yi ger gsal//thams cad blo sbyangs yid bzhin gter//mnyam pa 'khril ba'i tshul
4b5(rgyud): 'dzin pa/rin+da chen rigs kyi phyag rgyar gsal//las thams cad kyi mchog rgyal mo rnam par rol pa'i phyag rgya'o//pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba'i mdog/chos sku zla rjes rab ldan
4b6(rgyud): pa/gsal bA'i kha dog mdzes pa ni//thams cad ma lus dbang du mdzad//sbyor dang bskyed dang bsdu ba yis//phyag rgyar gi sel bas dbang gi sku//btsun mo dag dang mnyam
4b7(rgyud): du dbyas//gnyi su med par 'khril ba yis//dbu ru yi ge gnyis pa ldan//rin cheno rigs kyi spro bsdu las//cod pan rigs lnga kha dog ste//ji bzhin pa ya ting
5a1(rgyud): 'dzin gyis//phyag rgya bzhugs tshul pad+ma'i tshul//mnyam par bsam pas dkyil 'khor yin//mi 'byed pa yi ting 'dzin gyis//rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor kun 'dus
5a2(rgyud): mchog/pad+ma rigs kyi phyag rgya ro gsal//mun pa sel ba'i mar me bzhin//gsal dag yid gnyis med par bsgo mo//chu skyes 'dzum pa'i 'od du ldan//steg dang sprod pa'i rol mo yis
5a3(rgyud): dgyes shing mnyam pa'i mchod par bsham//'di ltar gsal bas dbang yang rdzogs//thams cad sdu pa zhesu bya//de bzhin dbang ste las thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so//
5a4(rgyud): dus gsum pa yi mdzad pa che//rigs kun 'dus pa bde gshegs las//mnyam pa ji bzhin ting 'dzin te//yi ge 'bru gcig kun gyi mchog/bshad pos khyad par las kun rdzo
5a5(rgyud): chu skyes gsal ba'i 'dab ma steng //gnyisu med par gsal ba ni//rnam pa gnyis kyi bye brag gis//'dus pa gsal bas skur gyur pa//'dod cing chags pa ma yin zhing //blo la
5a6(rgyud): yod gnyis med pa dang //phyag rgyar gsal bas rgyal ba'i sku//rgyal mo dang ni mnyam du dgyes//dbu gnyis pa yi yi ger ldan//sbyin pa rgya chen khengs pa na//rang gi 'dod pa'i
5a7(rgyud): gnasu bsdu//bong tshod lo grangs khyad par med//gnyi su med par 'khril bar gsal//dus kun du ni mnyam ldan pas//gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu rdzogs//zla rgyas lta bu'i ga
5b1(rgyud): babasgom//chags pa med par 'dod sdud pa'i//yum dang lhan cig bskum pa ni//A li kA li byed pa'i don//phyag rgya la sa kyi bye brag gis//bde ba chen pa'i tshul gnas pa//rgyal ba kun//
5b2(rgyud): kyang de bzhin 'thun//phyag las snol mar gnas pa yi//kun kyang sems pa'i dkyil 'khor ro//phyag rgya thol mo rdo rje ni//kun kyang yum gyi rgyub du stsol//zhal gnyis mdzes pa
5b3(rgyud): rab rgyas nas//zla gam pa'i ljags gnyis mdzes//dung gi phur bus 'khur chos la//gdabs shing stebs pa'i tshul du bzhugs//bsten po nye bsnyen dbang rdzogs pa//rgyal
5b4(rgyud): ba kun gyi sku yi mchog/gzhad dang 'dzum pa'i gtso gzungs bsgom//rnal 'byor dka' thub chen po'i don//gsang ba spyod la shin du dgyes//gsang ba nyid du sems can 'dren//
5b5(rgyud): thams cad kun gyi rmongs pa sel//yum gyi las kyi khyad par ni//sa yi rim pa kun sbyong zhing //zas la bgo la dbang med pa//nyan thos 'gog pa la sogs pa//byang chub
5b6(rgyud): sems kyi tsher chen gyis//dam por bcings po cher gcod mdzad//dam tshig chen po sdom pa ste//rgyal ba kun gyi dkyil 'khor yin//phyag rgya chen po'i tshe gas mchog
5b7(rgyud): ni/ dag pa don gyi rigs mchog yin//myur bar rtag tu ma yengs na//gdon mi za bar 'grub pa ni//'dod khams lha yi nyin phyed kyis//gsong ba kun dang mnyam par 'gyur
6a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//kun tu bzang po rnal 'byor mchog/gsang ba nyid kyi mkha' dbyings nas//yi ge a ldan cheg drag
6a2(rgyud): bcas//rnal 'byor bde chen thugs kyi sras//gzugs khams la sogs byon rlabs nas//phyag mtshan 'khor lor gsal ba dang //bde ba rnal 'byor de bzhin gshegs//
6a3(rgyud): gtso ma gser gyi kha dog la//nyi ma zer gyi 'od bzhin du//gsal ba 'tsher ba bcom ldan 'das//dbu ru yi ge gnyis pa las//rin chen myu gu khang pa 'bar//sangs rgyas lnga
6a4(rgyud): yi dbu rgyan gyis//legs par brgyan pa mtshan rnams rdzogs//rdzogs pa chen po'i bzhugs tshul dang //ting 'dzin 'thun pas 'gro la dmigs//pad+ma ge sar dbus gnas
6a5(rgyud): pa'i//thig bzhi gsang ba bzhi dang ldan//mdun du lha mo chags pa mo//lo grangs nyi shu mdzes dang ldan//ma hA pu ka'i gnos la dgyes//mdzes pa'i lag pa gar dang ches//
6a6(rgyud): gnyisu med pa'i bzhugs tshul ni//gtso la brtan pa'i tshul du bzhugs//rgyab du lha mo dgyes chen mo//sangs rgyas brten par mdzad tshul gyis//thal mos 'dzin pa sku brtan
6a7(rgyud): pa/sku tshe bcu drug rtsa dmar sku//sangs rgyas gdung 'dzin chags pas sbyong //'dod chags can la 'thun par mdzad//g.yasu zhe sdang gdul ba mo//rdo rje pad+mo sbyor la dgyes//
6b1(rgyud): ma dad pa rnams dbang med par//drag por sbyor mdzad zhe sdang sel//chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das//gnyisu med par sbyor ba yis//gtong ba med par bstan pa'i tshul//snga
6b2(rgyud): bsangs mdangs ldan khyad par tshe//khru tsha bcwa lnga chags pa can//dus mtha' med par sbyor la de gyes//stag dang sgeg pa'i tshe lugs kyis//sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal 'khri//
6b3(rgyud): rab tu skams pa 'gog pa rnams//brlang nas rgyal ba'i srasu 'gyur//ad tA ma la'i phrin los kyis//thams cad byang chub chen por 'dzad//mig gnyis 'dzums dang sbom po yis
6b4(rgyud): dbang mar ldan par byas pa na//gnyi su med par sbyor 'dod yin//snyi'i rtse mor mthe'u chung 'dzin//ma btang bzhugs la brtson byos pa'o//so rnams bsnams nas kha phye ba//dus la
6b5(rgyud): bab ces bya ba ste//tinge 'dzin gsal bar rgyu bo na//dus la bab ces bya ba yin//ji ltar brda ldan ting 'dzin la//dam can bud med mi 'dud pa//dngos grub mi 'gyur dam tshig
6b6(rgyud): nyapras//tshe rabs kun du brlag par 'gyuraro//'di ltar brtson par byed pa na//g.yan pa bslang ba rnam bzhi yis//skyes du na chung tshul bzhin du//rdo rje pad+ma'i 'tshams nyid du//
6b7(rgyud): dbyings phyag lnga yi sbyor ldan pas//dal bus dal bus gzhug pa dang //dal bus dal bus rab tu bskul//drag po'i yi ge spros pa na//byang chub sems kyi pad+ma dgang //rjen
7a1(rgyud): bdang ngam lha rnams kyis//yum gyis drungs te/col mchod//nye bya'i'o bskyon pa la sogs pas//bAm+b+han bla tshe chung rdzogs par bskum//byang chub sems
7a2(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor la//mchod pa brgyad kyis bstad par mchod//de ltar longs spyod rtogs pa dang //gnyi su med par lung bzhin du//mnyam par 'khril po'i tshul du bstan//
7a3(rgyud): dus gsum kun du gdung 'dzin pa//g.yon phyogs brten pa'i skal dang ldan//bong tshod lo na bcu dgu pa'i//sdong po dul ba dag la dgyes//g.yas par bzar ba'i sprin gyis
7a4(rgyud): gzigs//dril bu sgra snyen khrol la bstsol//rdo rje rab tu sgrogs byed ma//sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyun can//mngon du sbyor la rab brtson pa//brda dang bcas pa'i gar gyis ni//
7a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun la slang mdzad ma//byang chub sems kyi smon chen gyis//mchod pa chen pos rab mchod mnyes//sprul pa ba sa ma yas mtha' klas pa//dus gsum 'khor mi
7a6(rgyud): bskor bar bskul//ngo sor chagaso pa'i mdangs kyis ni//mnyes dang bcas pa'i gur gyis mchod//gru tshad bzhi yi rim pa la//thos byed gsal byed gsu ba che//dri
7a7(rgyud): dang ldan pa la sogs pas//btsun mo dag dang thabs gcig tu//gnyi su med pa'i tshul du bzhugs/'bar la khyams bzhi la gnas pa ni//thos byang dbang dang nyan byed
7b1(rgyud): byung //dmachog dbang du lta byed dbang //dus ni bzhi rnams lha mo bzhi//btsun ma'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas//zhe sdang 'dzums byed la sogs pas//sgo rnams kun du gnas pa na/
7b2(rgyud): snying rje'i yum dang bcas par gnas//nyi ma zla ba pad+ma mchog/rin chen dung dang bcas pa ste//tshangs pa brgya byin gnyis gnyis kyis//bteg pa'i khri la rab tu bzhugs//rdzogs pa
7b3(rgyud): chen por kun kyang gnas//sems dpa' chen po'i bzhugs tshul du//kun kyang rab tu gnas par bstan//zhal ni kun du sa le bA//thugs ni kun tu lhan ne ba//sku ni kun la khyab par
7b4(rgyud): gsal//oM ma me skye mi 'gag mchog/e ma mi s+ye li maM len mchog/oM mtsham ngam drag shul spyod//e ma ga shigs pa'i stabs dang bcas//e ma mtshon mo sel bar
7b5(rgyud): ston//e ma gsung rab rgya mtsho sgrogs//e ma byol song spro ba bskyed//e ma sprul pa bsam yis mchog/e ma mya ngan 'das par mdzad//e ma gsang ba nges don mdzad//
7b6(rgyud): ma gzungs dang mnyam par sbyor//e ma n+ti yod mi mdzod mchog/ngo mtshar sbyin las 'di dag gis//sa yi rim pa 'byongs par 'gyur//zhes sangs rgyas pa nyid mdzod
7b7(rgyud): par sangs rgyas pa la glang sde mnyos par gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba rnal 'byor bde bo chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i le'u
8a1(rgyud): gnyis pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang mo rnal 'byor ma la 'jug par dgyes te rab tu 'dris pa chen po dgongs pa dang /kun du/
8a2(rgyud): bzang mo rnal 'byor mas/zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas pa/e ma sems dpa' thig le che//bag chags kun gyi basbyin por gsungs//'di las 'jug pa'i chos 'ga' med zhes
8a3(rgyud): brjod do//de nas gsang ba chen mo dang gnyi su med par 'khyil bar gyur te/g.yon pa bskyed pa rnam pa ma pos mnyes pa dang pad+ma sbas pa la sogs pa 'byung ba spel bar mdzad nas
8a4(rgyud): rab tu dgyes te glu 'di blang so//e ma bde ba mchog las skyes pa phyag na rdo rje can//chos kun dngos po med pa gsal ba la//'byung nas chen pos ye mtshan 'byung bar mkhyen
8a5(rgyud): bu oM mngo mtsha re che//rgyu nyid stong pas 'bras bu btsal med pa'o//rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid kyang rgyal bas yod mi rnyed//stong pa nyid la dga' ba'i chags pa'i cho 'phrul pa//de phyir
8a6(rgyud): skye 'gag med ces rgyal ba rnams kyis 'di la brjod//chos kun dbyer med me rnyings pa nyid las//kun gyi dga' ba 'byung ba rgyal ba kun pas shin tu 'phags shes brjod
8a7(rgyud): gis gsang ba'i mkha' la kun tu bzang po rnal 'byor 'jug par mdzad de shin du rngam pa'i glu 'di blang so//sgyu ma kun las 'phags pas dbyer myed rnam par 'phrul byed
8b1(rgyud): bya//kun du bzung po rnal 'byor de ni bder gshegs yum tshan kun gyis gsos//sdug bsngal kun sbyong bder gshegs yum la 'jug pa thugs dam yin zhes rgyal bas gsungs
8b2(rgyud): oM hUM mi 'gog ji yang mdzad pa nyid ni mi mdzad mnyam pa yin zhes rgyal bas gsungs//'di ni glu ru blangs pa yis//mya ngan 'das kun 'gro ba'i mgon//stong pa chos kyi dkyil la
8b3(rgyud): la//dka' thub chen po thob par 'gyur zhes gnyi su mang bar glengaso//de nas snying po mchog gi yi ge ni//dang po'i gan su bsgom par bya//de snying yi ge bzhi pa ste//rdo rje chen po gsal
8b4(rgyud): mchog/yi ge a ldan thig lce che//chos kun 'dus phyir rnam par bsgom//dang por me long lta bu ste//mnyes pa'i kha dog shin tu 'bar//phyag lag 'khyud pa spyod pa yis//thams
8b5(rgyud): cad de dang 'dra bar gsal//oM hUM su ra ta su ki dz+nyA ne da oM I t+ma/bder gshegs rgyal mo mkha' dbying su//gsal dag las rnams 'grub por bsgrom//chu sgros pad+ma 'dab ma stong /
8b6(rgyud): bshad pa'i sgras ni rnam par brgya ni//de rnyed chos kyi sku ru gsil//zla rgyus lta bu'i mkha' dbyings nos//thams cad bsdu ba gsum gyis bsdus//oM su ra d+he su~M She d+harma d+hA d+ha swa b+hA
8b7(rgyud): A hUM/gnyisu med pa'i yi ge mchog/mo skye ba ni a dang ldan//byon rlabs rgyal ba kun gyi gonas//mchod pa brgyad dang gsal bar ldan//so sor gsal ba'i mkha' dbyings
9a1(rgyud): la/smrig par gyis reg par mdzad//oM s+'u rat+na su khen pA dz+nyAHk+ShAn s+yAda?d+d+hA ya yUt+tha/byung chub snyoms kyi char chen no//yi ba~M gnyis bcu du mar sku//gnyis ma /
9a2(rgyud): par ldan pa na//bdud kun rnam par brtul ba dang //dbyings kyi bde la gsal ba ni//sgo dbye ba yi tshul gyis ni//pad+ma dbye ba sna tshogs bya//spro ba dang ni bsdu ba yis//bye ba nan tan ye/
9a3(rgyud): shes bskyed//'di ltar rgyal ba kun mdzad pa//sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab las//mchod pa mang po lha mor lda ni//oM su ra t+na su khe na~M duSh+pa dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hi bA oM A hUM/rnal 'byor
9a4(rgyud): skal ldan chen po ni ska la ngan kun gyi gso su gsungs//gnyisu med pa'i byang chub sems//mangs bshang gci rdzas rnams ni/dogs pa med pa'i dngos grub ste//rgyal ba nyid la rgyal/
9a5(rgyud): bas mchod//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po las bag chags gtan la 'bebs pa gnyi su med par gleng ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o////de nas bcom ldan
9a6(rgyud): 'das gsang ba'i snying po rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang gnyi su med pa'i phyag rgya'i mchog ni 'di lta ste/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i phyag rgya las//mdzes par gsol ba yab yum bcu//sor mo phan
9a7(rgyud): tshun spel legs pa//rdo rje thal mo byang chub rgya//gsang ba rnalo 'byor thugs kyi mchog/dam tshig sdom po 'da' bar dka'//rnal 'byor pa la a lI gas la//kun tu bzang
9b1(rgyud): lakAr byed//lnga char nur du ldan pa ni//gcig tu gyur pas gar gyi bzhi//oM hU~M tro AHtrUM/mU Ak+ShA d+h+r-i rA/thal mo btang snyoms tshul gyis ni//mdzes pa'i mthang na gar gyis bya//stang kar
9b2(rgyud): bcings pas rnal 'byor dri ni//gar gyi phyag rgya dang nyid pas//gar du byas pas thal mo snol//'jug tu dbul ba'i tshul gyis bstod//rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las//g.yon po rtse gsum
9b3(rgyud): g.yas pas gzung //de nyid gzhan du khribs par bya//rdo rje gar gyi phyog rgya las//dga' ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa yis//g.ya su bdud pa'i tshul gyis ni//g.yas pa yi ni thugs kAr
9b4(rgyud): sgreng //g.yon pa gsung nyan 'khril ba'i tshul//rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las//mdzes pa'i mthong nas gar byas shing //gzhan nas bsdus nas g.yas g.yon 'jog/rdo rje ga raM ni de dag
9b5(rgyud): las//lag pa g.yas pa 'di gse pa dang //dbul ba'i tshul du rnam par brtag/rdo rje gar ni de dag las//skyon dang dbu ni g.yon du 'dud//cang te'u thogs pa'i tshul gyis ni//mchod pa byed
9b6(rgyud): par rnam par bsngags//rdo rje grwar gyi phyag rgya las//lus ni g.yas g.yon bsgyur ba dang //gang las log pa phral ba kyed pa'o//rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las//g.yon pas g.yas pa'i
9b7(rgyud): gru mo gzung //g.yes banyug pa'i tshul du bya'o//de nyid rdo rje gar dag las//dmo tshig phyag rgya 'thor bar bstan//rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las//dam tshig phyag rgya steng du bsgyur//de
10a1(rgyud): nyid g.yon pa'i nang dag las//g.yas pa'i dam tshig phyag rgyas gtor//de nyid g.yas pas drangs par ldan//de nyid gnyis pas gzung ba yin//de nyid gnyis ka thul//
10a2(rgyud): mo bsdam//de nyid dril bu 'dzin par bsgom//oM sarba ta thA ga ta mu ka ka ra su khe na oM/oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa me rA ga staM su ga na hUM/oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+wa la yA nAn ma ma hA su kA nA tAM/oM
10a3(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma b+ha shra su khe nat+tA hA tA/de nyid gtso bo'i phyag rgyar bcas//oM sarba ta thA ga tA sarba bud d+ha lo tsi na AMd ma naM/su rat+na su khe ne maN+Dal pA dza ye pU dza ya/oM au oM/
10a4(rgyud): oM sarba te thA ga ta ma hA d+hu dzA dzA/oM su rA tA su khe na b+han d+ha b+hon d+ha/pU dzA ya pU dza ya/hUM hUM hUM I/oM su rat+na su khI na/man sha mo ha/pU dza ya pU dza ya/hri hr-i hI/oM su rat+na su khe na sarba/
10a5(rgyud): ta thA ga ta d+harma dan tra/sA d+hi kA ne de ho ho/oM sarba tA thA ga ta shrI badz+ra la s+yai/badz+ra gar+b+he su kha~M ni pU dza ya pU dza ya/oM hUM hUM hUM a/sarba ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra gar+b+he su khe na pU dza ya pU dza ya traM tra
10a6(rgyud): lnga a/oM sarba ta thA ga ta shwe badz+ra gan d+he badz+ra gar+b+he suM khe na/d+hi pa d+hA pa/pU dza ya pU dz+nyA ya/hri hr-i tr-i a/oM sarba ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra nir te badz+re gar+b+he me ts+tshiti l-i ka su ke na pU dza ya pU dzA ya/A/
10a7(rgyud): a a yoM hUM/oM sarba ta thA gi ta shwa badz+ra du be badz+ra gar+b+he su len pU dza ya pU dza ya/oM tang tang ta hUM/oM sarba ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra puSh+pe badz+re gar+b+he su khi na pU dza ya pU dzi ya/hU~M hrI tI ai/oM/
10b1(rgyud): satan+ta gA ta shr-I badz+ra a lo/dz+nyA maN+Dal te bka bud d+ha su khen pU dza ya pUdzA ya/oM oM At+ma/oM sArba tathA ga ta shrI badz+ra gar+b+ha badz+ra gar+b+he ma hA mAN Da la ti la//su ken b+hu dza ya pUdz+nyA ya/a
10b2(rgyud): a aM/oM AHhUM/de bzhin gi shegs pa thams cad mnyes pa'i mchog pas gar gyi le ru ste bzhi pa'o///de ni sa becom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen mo dang bcas pa dam tshig blan
10b3(rgyud): med pa'i rgyun bkade ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//thams cad sdom pa la gnas par mkhyen no//dam tshig chen po 'di dag gsungs//so so'i theg pa bsam
10b4(rgyud): yas pa//so sor nyes pa med na pa de//'jig rten pal chud mad brtson//'dul ba 'dzin la sbyangs na bde//gcod sbyar spyod la gtsang sbyar spyad//mi dge bzlog na dge ba bcu//spyad pas
10b5(rgyud): lhag pa'i 'jig rten 'dzin//rang gi don gyi ting 'dzin gyis//byang chub su le gnas pa'i rnams//nyams pa med dam po col na//nyams pa med de las kyang 'grub//rnal 'byor spyad pa
10b6(rgyud): spyod pas 'grub//tshig cis goms pas theg pa 'joms//gtso mchog bshes gnyen mi snang zhing //bkur sti rim 'gro mchog kyang bskyed//ting 'dzin goms pA cha lugs
10b7(rgyud): bo sgom//cho ga gi bzlas pa par mi bcad//dam tshig mched la gdung ba bskyed//sku yi dam tshig bsam mo khyib//gsung gi dam tshig sngogs pa yin//thugs kyi dam tshig lha
11a1(rgyud): par gsung //rigs lnga bsrungs pa'i dmachog rnams//nyams na shin du rgongs par dka'//spyad pa'i dam tshig rdzas rnams ni//nyams na myur bar bslang ba
11a2(rgyud): yin//nyams pa ma bsgrangs le lo yis//sangs rgyus kun dang btsugs chen te//'khyim pa rnam pa bcu por ni//myor bar skye bar nges pa ste//de bas rigs kyi bu mchog ni//
11a3(rgyud): mchog dang tha ma 'bring gi rnams//rab kyi bar chad med par spyad//'bring gis lo zla dus drug ste//thams lo 'tsha mis mi bzlo zhes//rgyal ba rnams kyis shin tu gsungs//rdo
11a4(rgyud): rje dri dang byang chub sems//rag ta dri chen che chen po//dag pa'i snod dang rab ldan pas//byin gyis brlabs te 'thung byed pa//dam tshig sdom la gnas pa ste//'das na rlag pa
11a5(rgyud): chen por 'gyur//mnyam par gzhag pa'i chos thams cad//mnyam par shes pas spyad pa dang //mnyam po nyid tu gsal ba na//rnal 'byor sems dpa' yin zhes gsung
11a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor snod du bya ba gang //rdzas kyi sngags pa yod pa rnams//rab tu bkru zhing byi dor bya//ka la bing ka'i mdog bzhin du//gzhong bu phor bu snod kyi rnams//dri ma bkru zhing
11a7(rgyud): mdzes por bya//dus gsum du ni sman sbyar ba//dang por dngul gyi gzhong bar sbyar//de nas rog na gzhong pa ste//zangs kyi gzhing bar sbyar ba ni//srang re sbyar ba'i sman rnams las//
11b1(rgyud): zangs dang dngul dang rA ga na nam//gser dang lcagasu rab bsrel//rnam tog na dA la sman sbyar ba//man dA ra ba'i mdog bzhin sbyar/ma na dA ra bar ma gyur tshe//nam yang sbyar bar ma gsungs
11b2(rgyud): te/nyi zla dus gcig shar ba na//de nas rdzas kyi bsngags pa las//sman gyi sbyor ba rab tu brtsam//shin tu sman rnams 'byor pa na//'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsam ya su//ka la bang
11b3(rgyud): ka'i mdog tu brtag/'di la gang zhig mi brtson pa//dam tshig mi btsun sdom pa mod//rdo rje spun las dben par gdon//lha dong rdo rje slob dpon la//bag med par ni brnyas pa dang //
11b4(rgyud): rmongs pas mi mthong g.yel ba dang //dam chos srog la mi lta ba//sangs rgyas rgyal ba bdun la brnyes//dkyil 'khor ba yi las byas pa//sems can dmyal ba chen po ste/
11b5(rgyud): thung nad kyis btab pa dang //'jig rten 'di ru gnod pa mang //shi nas dmyal pa ngan srong skye//de bas sdom pa 'di dag las//'da' ba ro mdzad pa gang yang med//'di las 'das par mi
11b6(rgyud): byed pas//tshe 'di nyid la rgyal ba'i sku//lhun gyis grub pa'i sa la gnas zhes de bzhin go shegs pa thams cad nyid la nyid dam tshig chen po'i sdom pa 'dis shin tu bsnyengs par mdzad
11b7(rgyud): do//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bde ba sdom pa thams cad kyi mchog gi le'u zhes bya ste lnga pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po rnal
12a1(rgyud): 'byur ma dang bcas pa dgongs pa gcig tu gnas par mdzad do//rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po spyad pa mchog dang ldan pa'i spyod pa ma lus pa nyid dang zabam
12a2(rgyud): don yin par mabyin to//mkhyen nas sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i thabs 'di gsungs//u mtshos dbyings rnam dag spyod yul las//sangs rgyas sems can gnyis stan ya mtshan
12a3(rgyud): 'phrul chen yin//de yang ye shes tshogs las sna tshogs snang mod kyi//bud med kun gyi sgro ma las ni rab tu sprul te 'char//bden gnyis so sor snang ba nyid kyang yum gyi
12a4(rgyud): mAShi zhes rgyal bas gsungs//man ral mche ni sgroman kun tu bzung mo bsgoms pas khyim du zhugs pa yin//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ku ni shes rab bud las
12a5(rgyud): ni mchod cing bsnyen pas ye shes chen por 'grub bo//dkyil 'khor gdon pa'i las kyi dngos grub mchog go la/rdo rje gru'i don de nyid kyis gnyi su med pa'i dgongs
12a6(rgyud): pal gsal bar gyur te/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid/dpal kun tu bzang pos thabs dang shes rab kyi longs spyod 'di gsung so//mngon su
12a7(rgyud): las kyis 'jug pa ni//phan tshun du ni dga' spyod pa//rnal 'byor sdom la gnas pa yon//de la mchod pa dam pa ni//sbyor ba rab tu sbyor ba ste//kun tu khyab pa kun tu/
12b1(rgyud): sbyor//su chags pa dam tshig mchog/de phyir kar sham mdog dang ldan//bcu drug pang tshad ring ba la//lug su blugs pa lta bu ste//lus legs mdzes dang ldan pa dang //dpral pa/
12b2(rgyud): dbyes che ko sa ko phra//nu ma chung zhing sor mo ring //yid tsam bzur la mig kyus ring //dkar zhing rtswa dmar mdang su tshigs//so dkar thags bzangs 'tshams thung zhing //skad sbom
12b3(rgyud): godangs dang ldan pa ni//rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas mchog ste//'di la rtse bar byed pa ni//rigs kyi rdo rje gdon mi za//tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur//gnas rab dben par rab brtag/
12b4(rgyud): ste/sha dkar mdangs ldan mdog dang ldan//lus 'bring zlum pa cha byad can//so dkar thags dam mig dkyus zlum//skad phra mdog dkar spro ring ba//dpral dbyes la sogs
12b5(rgyud): bzang gnas pa//rma dag gnas pa la sogs ni//rtag par chos lo 'dud pa yin//tshangs pa dbyangs kyi rigs can te//'di la brtson byas bsgrub pa yis//de bzhin rigs kyi
12b6(rgyud): ting 'dzin la//phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na//tshangs pa'i snga dro gcig tsam+bi gyis//gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur//rnal 'byor sbyor ba dga' ba ni//sbyor ba bskyon pas 'grub par
12b7(rgyud): gsungs//bud med tshi lugs legs pa ni//bong tshod mi ring lus phra zhing //rkang lag chung zhing skad gsal po//mig legs ngo zlum rtsa dmar tshe//lhun du chags la mi shes
13a1(rgyud): med//lus la mtshan gyis rma 'dras ba rgyan//tshig gasngal rmi lam nyung ba dang //so dkar ma chu logs dad par ldan//chos soms pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/
13a2(rgyud): gsang ba'i mkha' la nyi zla'i 'od//rdo rje pad mar ldan byas te//phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na//'dod khams lha yi skad cig gis//'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za//lus zlum
13a3(rgyud): btsun drang nga rgyal bcas//khong na tshi gra rnon sems la'adzin//bya ba ri dran la mi gtong ldan//bslab pa blo rtul sha rus che//mdangs bkrag brtags na phyi phyir che//sbyin li
13a4(rgyud): dgo' zhing chos la dang //rin chen rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis//bag chags yi gos rtsed gcod cing //ting 'dzin blo la gsal ba na//bsgrub pa dus la bab pa ste//de tshe rab tu
13a5(rgyud): brtson pa yis//yum gyi pad ma kha bye ste//bde ba thugs kyi 'du 'bru yis//phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na//rigs kyi rin chen 'grub pa ni//tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur//
13a6(rgyud): thugs rje mdzad spyod bye brag gis//'jig rten dag na dman pa'i rigs//rab tu bkug ste dga' spyod na//snying rje mchog dang thabs ldan pa//rnal 'byor spyod pa chen por
13a7(rgyud): gsungs//shan po rigs ngan smad 'tshong ba//ngan pa'i rigs dang longs spyod rnams//'joms pa po yis ting 'dzin gyis//myur du spyad na 'grub par gsungs//yi
13b1(rgyud): dgas gnod sbyin byol song dang //kyi dang ru sbal spre'u la sogs//mi dang lha yi gnas mchog kun//sngo sor 'tshams par dga' spyad na//dregs pa can la zhi ba che//brtson la dga'
13b2(rgyud): ba brtson par mdzod//thabs kyi mdzad sprod kun bye mchog/sems can 'di dag don gyi phyir//phyin ci log tu gang spyod rnamaso//'dul ba'i mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis//mi mdzad pa
13b3(rgyud): ni ci yang med//shin tu gtum pa'i cha lugs kyis//gtum po thams cad dbang du mdzod//shin tu zhi ba'i cha lugs kyis//dregs pa can rnams dbang du mdzad//shin tu mdangs
13b4(rgyud): ldan cha lugs kyis//chags pa'i yid rnams dbang du mdzad//e ma shin tu ngo mtshar che//ci yang yin pas cir mi dgongs zhes gsungs pas thams cad rab tu brtson pa chen po dang
13b5(rgyud): ldan par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa na mkha' dang mnyam pa rdul phra mo'i rdul snyed rab tu 'dun pa'i thugs kyis mnyan pa brtson par
13b6(rgyud): mdzad do//rdo rje chos kyi mchog la sogs pa rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu mnyan pa dang gus pa mchog dang ldan pas yongasu gzung ba'i le'u mdzad/de nas bcom ldan
13b7(rgyud): 'das rnal 'byor chen mos rab tu brtson pa mdzad/rab tu brtson pa'i yid kyis sprod pa dang 'khyud pa dang gyad kyi dgyes pa dang mgu ba bla na med pas phan tshun du dga' ba spyad do//de
14a1(rgyud): nas de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'od gsungaso//oM hUM ye shos rnal 'byor mchog ldan pas//skal bzangs mchog gi dngos
14a2(rgyud): grub stsol//rab tu rmongs pa gsal phyir 'gog pa kun slong ba//rnal 'byor bde mchog gnyi su med pa 'di dag shin tu ngo mtshar che//rin chen yid bzhin bzungs ni kun
14a3(rgyud): gyi dbang ldan pa//tshangs ma'i mdangs ldan gzungs ma drangs te de brtson pas//grub par 'gyur ba 'di la dga' spyod a la la//shin tu srid pa 'di dag bzhin du spyang
14a4(rgyud): pas 'grub par gsungs pas sa la gnas pas 'phags//rgyal ba kun gyi nang na kun du bzang po rgyal ba kun pas 'phags//de yang kun tu bzang me yin zhes sngon
14a5(rgyud): gyi rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs//mtshan ma kun bral rab tu dga' sbyor mi gtong bas//sems dpa' rdo rje nyid kyang de yin rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs//tshangs pa mchog gi
14a6(rgyud): glu 'di dag/brtson par byed cing len pa ni//dka' thub rnal 'byor ting 'dzin te//tshangs pa mchog gi dro gcig gis//gdon mi za bar 'grub par gsungs zhes
14a7(rgyud): brjod do//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu brtson pa tshon pos gcig gi rang bzhin du gyur par mdzad do//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang bar
14b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o////de nas dus gsum gyi ston pa tham cad bde bar bshegs pa'i rang bzhin te rab tu mchod pa chen pos maHsa shing ma rig pa brgyad khri ban stong 'dul bar
14b2(rgyud): mkhyen to//mkhyen nas mdog po grol byar mdzad pa dang zhe sdang rnam par grol bar dgyes te/de dag mnyam pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyis 'dul ba'i thab su sgrol ba dang /dbang gi rigs kyi sbyor
14b3(rgyud): bas rab tu bsrungs shing bsrung ba mdzad do//bdag gi rnal 'bor kun tu bzang //mtshan nyid kun brtags gnyis su med/rgyal ba kun dang mnyam spyar na//mnyam pa'i sa la gnas
14b4(rgyud): pa yin//rang sems zla rgyas dbus gnas pa//rdo rje sems dpe'i tidang 'dzin te//don rtogs gsal bar gyur ba yis//rab tu bsgral ba chen po ste//mchog gisal gnas
14b5(rgyud): rgyu min//swA yi tshwa 'phrul rigs kun rdzogs//gsungs kyi skyon pa bla na med//thugs kyi mdzad brtags dang ldan//ting dzin 'di ltar gsal ba yis//blo rmongs sdug bsngal
14b6(rgyud): //gnyi su med pa dgasa'i bgyis// hUMb tos ba mang //mngon spyong las kyi la pa med//gnyis su me cing 'grub par 'gyur//rtags shes pa
14b7(rgyud): dumachogs//byams pa med pa rnal 'byor thugs//bgrus kyisamed pa mnyam ldan pas//rgyal ba mnyes par sbyar shes na//mnyam pa chen pas bdag nyid
15a1(rgyud): mchod//bden pa'i tshul du dbyer med pa'o//sems nyid rtogs pa rnam spyad phyir//ting 'dzin shugs kyis kun bsgral te//mngon spyod las kyis sgrol bar mdzad//
15a2(rgyud): gsang ba'i mkha' la kun du sbyor//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzad spyod bsom gyis mi khyab pa las mchod pa de kho na nyid de le'u bdun po'o////de nas bcom ldan
15a3(rgyud): 'das 'khor rab tu skyong pa la dgyes te/slob ma mchog dang 'bring dang tha mas yon gyi dbul ba mang po byas te dkyil 'khor du gzung ba mdzad do//dgegs tshar gcad pa'i phyir rdo rje
15a4(rgyud): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis gdong par bstan rin po ches lag sor bkang ste snying po 'dri zlo su gzhug go/oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dzI ta d+hi d+ha tathA hUM//oM ma hA maN DA la de ba kaur b+hu rdza
15a5(rgyud): ya pU dza ya hUM a//zhes brjod de me tog 'thor du gzhug go/gang la bab pa'i bshes gnyen bstu ni//sngags dang phyag rgya dam tshig bstan//de nas dam tshig chu blud cing //tshig
15a6(rgyud): 'di rab tu go bar bsgo//sems can gyi ni gzugs chen po//las la sogs te dbang bskur ba'o rgyal po'i srasu dbang bskur yin//di ring phan chad bu khyod kyis//dam tshig
15a7(rgyud): gnyen po 'di dag ni//srog gi phyir yang mi gtang zhing //slob dpon ma btod grogs la mchod//bka' la gus par menyan par byas//gal te bka' las 'das 'gyur na
15b1(rgyud): gzhom dang gzhog dang dam rtsal dang //spro dang spar dang dmyal bar skye//sems la chu 'dri gnas pa ni//phrin las rnam bzhi 'tsham par bya zhes brjod nas//rdo rje slob dpon dkyil 'khor
15b2(rgyud): dang //kun du bzang dang mched la sogs//zhabs la gtugs dang gos par bya//rgyud kyi mnyan pa thams cad bya//bsgrub pa'i gzugaso la brten pas 'grub//de nas rigs kyi bu
15b3(rgyud): mchog la//gsang ba'i ming gi dbang yang bskur//gus par ldan pa'i bu mchog des//rgyal po dbang yod rgyal po srid//rang lus gnas dang 'khor yul dang //bu dang chung ma cha rgyud dang /
15b4(rgyud): rin po che dang shel dang dngul//sna bdun rin tshan nor gyi dbyig/rta dang glang po shing rta dang //ma he ne'u le ci yod rnams//gter dang dbyig dang yid 'thad pa//sems la the tsom med pa
15b5(rgyud): yis//bkur sti rim gro mchog bskyed la//phul na rgya lo ba mnyes par 'gyur//de nas dbang mnad theg pa'i tshad//rim pa bzhin du mnod par bya//mnyan pa grub pa la sogs
15b6(rgyud): dang //las dang ging dang rgyal 'theb dang //spyan dang rdo rje tshad 'dzin pa//bye brag mngag pa la srogs rnams//gsang ba'i dbang rnams gang nod po//nyi shu 'am bcu gnyis lon
15b7(rgyud): la//gos dang dbu rgyan bza' bdung dang //phyag rgya dral bu la sogs po//dkyil 'khor 'di ltar gsal bsgoms te//rgyal ba kun gyis byin gyis brlabs//mngon du bstan
16a1(rgyud): bting dga' spyod cing //stong nas rgyal pos dbang bskur na//gdon mi za ba rwa dngos grub thob//tshi ga gi lags pa dra stod ra bya//de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des//zhabs
16a2(rgyud): la gtugs do gta' rug gtang //rdo rje spun dang gzungs ma yis//rgyal ba'i rgyal ba yin zhes brjod//dus gsum kun gyi sras tshon po//dus gsum kun gyi spyad pa spyod//
16a3(rgyud): khams gsum kun gyi sgrol ba po//sgrol ba mchog gi spyad pa spyod//shin tu rnal 'byor skal ldan pa//dam tshig sdom la gnas pa dang //mtshan ma med pa'i chu 'thung zhing //je
16a4(rgyud): ltar bsgo ba'i las byed pa//kun la phyed par rab gagaso yin//phyir bas 'dren pa'i gdung 'dzin pa//sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i sa la gnas//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang
16a5(rgyud): thugs kyi gsang ba de kho na nyid las mching yon dam pa dang snying rje'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba rdo rje dkod pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
16a6(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs twe gnas par mdzad do//mdzad nas snrel zhi dang bya byed yan man mang po mi 'gog pa la snyoms par zhug so//de nas yang las la lteng po rang thad kyi sdug bsngal
16a7(rgyud): narnams mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'jog par mdzad do//de nas yaung mu stegs rtag par lta ba ther zug pa/bu ba theng zugs ru kyi 'dul bar mdzad do//chad pa phyi sa mi 'dong ces
16b1(rgyud): r+ya ba la cha lugs des mnyam pa la 'dzud par mdzad do//mdzad nas rab tu 'gog pa'i dka' thub kyis myur ba bde ba la gnas par po stor ba rnams la dka' thub 'gyur ba chen po'i tshul
16b2(rgyud): byibyas 'dul dbang chen po mdzad do//dgra shul gyi brtsan thabs la dga' ba de thags zangs ris kyi cha lugs kyis 'dul bar mdzad do//gzhan la snying rjer ma gyur pa'i phyogs gcig pa'i
16b3(rgyud): sa rgyal rnams la yid bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis 'dul bar mdzad do//gling bzhi'i dge sdig cha mi shes pa la 'khor los sgyur ba chen por mdzad nas 'dul bar mdzad do//sgrib
16b4(rgyud): pa chen po dang gtum pa chen po dang btso ba dang rab tu se tha ma tha ma che chung rnams gnyen po dang zangs kha dang /gshed po chen po'i tshul gyis 'dul bar mdzad do//de dag kyang tshes
16b5(rgyud): mnyam pa chen po byang chub kyi tshul rdo rje theg pa kun gyi mchog rang bzhin gyi tshul gyis gnas pa gnas dang shes rab dbyer med de rol pa bsam byis mi khyab pa gnas par
16b6(rgyud): mdzad do//thabs kyi mdzad pa dra bo rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rnam paro 'phrul pa'i ting nge
16b7(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa mdzad do//de nas bdud zhe sdang chen po zhes bya ba de bskal pa stong gi dus na sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa blangs pas byang chub tu sems
17a1(rgyud): pa bskyod pa/rang du gdag pa skyo byungag da d+hAr sang chog/mtshan ma dang khrag gi gdug pas sems can sdu gno dang /mtshan mche ba dang nas pa shan
17a2(rgyud): chad nas do tshar te rab tu gsod gtsang ba'i drung da cing me dpung gi dkyil na gdug pa'i 'da' 'dzin cing ba mo bi chen posna bsngo ba drag pa dang kyi mang mA badres par gyur te//de nas
17a3(rgyud): 'das cang mi gsung bas kun tu bzang mo la 'dzum du mdzadado//yag+sa su kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi sbyin las//sid+hA d+hA d+b+ha d+hA ha~M/d+hAHr+m+ma/yi /rnaMs brjid na
17a4(rgyud): mangs pa'i chung ma dang dbang po'i chung ma dang /khyab 'jug chung ma dang /bi m+b+hi'i chung ma nga /tsakra'i chung me dang /de ba'i chung sa dang /ru rje'i chung ma dang /ka ru na'i chung pa dang yul
17a5(rgyud): 'khor spang 'i chung ma dang /rnam rjes kyi chung ma dang /'phags skyes kyi chung ma dang /mig mi bzang gi chung ma rnams rab tu chags pa'i 'du shes rang dbang med par skyes te/'dra
17a6(rgyud): bar mdzad do//de yang byang chub sems kyi sprin las/satwa badz+re he ru kA/ma hA sa ma ya sarba sid d+hi nAM hU~M hU~M/ho h+Na ho zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mang pos
17a7(rgyud): mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur te bzhugs pa'i tshangs pa'i chung ma la sogs pa 'dus pa thams cad kyis sa so ring shin tu chags pa chen po'i yid skyes te 'brel bar gyur/
17b1(rgyud): 'khril nas kyang rol pa'i byang chub kyi sems las chu'i dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'jig rten 'khru zhing 'jig par mdzad do//me'i dkyil 'khor mang pos 'jig rten rab tu
17b2(rgyud): bsregs par mdzad do//rlung gi dkyil 'khor mang pos 'jig rten sems can gtor bar mdzad do//de nas byang chub sems kyi sprin gyis rigs nges par dbang bskur bar mdzad do//
17b3(rgyud): de nas gnyisu med pa las bzhengs te/oM oM sarba bi si du sha shwa dz+ya dzA dza zhes brjod pas tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug gi chung ma la sogs pa gzungs las bran mor dam mnos te slar gar+b+ha
17b4(rgyud): su phyin par gyur to//de nas sku'i cha lugs de las mnyam pa chen po las gnas par mdzad//oM b+ha rI mu tA ma hA tsaN Da tsa dur yo gi ni maN+Da la klo d+ha ha le ha la hUM hU~M hUM phaT ces brjod
17b5(rgyud): ba so so so'i chung ma dang bu srid rdo rje gsod byed ma chen mor gyur te/bdud gdug pa chen po zhe sdang can la sogs pa la jo bo dam gnos bzhings zhes smras te/bdud gdug pa'i lus
17b6(rgyud): la khrag bzhibs nas gnaso//'on kyang do ma nyan par ma btub ste g.yo bag med par shin tu sngo bar gnas par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das sprul pa thams cad gcig
17b7(rgyud): tu bsdu ba mdzad de dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi tho ba dang /rdo rje dang rde'u chung dang mda' gzhu dang /zhags pa dang sngags pa'i 'dzum mo dang /banang 'khrug pa'i rol pas kun
18a1(rgyud): /tu bzang myo dang 'khril nas dbug sum gsogs te/sarba b+hA thA sarba b+harba hUM hUM phaT phaT ces brjod pas zhabs kyi 'og tu bdud bzhi dang tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs
18a2(rgyud): brgyal chen phyogs skyong bsdus te//d+hU hi khA hi phaT phaT ru lu ru lu ru 'u hU~M hU~M zhes pas bsgril te ban dar bkang nas gsol te mi ga nas par mdzad do//yang zhabs g.yas pa
18a3(rgyud): 'phen cid 'grong sbyo ro kye tshul gyis/oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA dz+nyA na gA ra b+ha hau d+h+ye ho d+hA ho d+hu/tsan Da la b+ha la ma hA shrI he ru ka hUM hUM hUM/dr-I trAM trAM/hri hri hri/phaT phaT phaT ces brjod pas so so'i
18a4(rgyud): chung ma bu mes rang dbang med par bteb ste phyin te//de nas bdud zhe sdang chen po de yang dregs po'i chung mos btig ste phyin to//phyin nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka sku
18a5(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi yon tan chen pos/oM sarba ta thA ga ha ma hA sa me ya shrI he ru ka duSh+Ti d+ha ke ha na/da ha da ha da ha/pa tsa paM tsi pa tsa hU~M hra hA hA tA zhes brjod pas rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi
18a6(rgyud): dbang phyug chen mo rnal 'byor ma skul byed ma dang rnal 'byor mi gsod byed mo dang /ze byed ma dang rnal 'byor ma gtu mo dang /las la grub po chen mo dang /rdo rje sreg byed ma dang
18a7(rgyud): dbang sdud chen mo rnams yum gyi gsang ba'i mkha' los byang chub kyi sems kyi sprin las 'thon nas gdug po'i tshogs bdud mgo nas bzung ste mtshon che dang phral nas
18b1(rgyud): ba la d+hA m+b+ha sug pral nas bas shod bsgrubs//doras bcom ldan 'das dkyus partson po dang la rdo rje khrag 'thung chen pos 'gro bcun sbyin dadud kyi rigs kyi 'khang
18b2(rgyud): dgos kyi sri sa t+ta'i lus kyi sride mtshan po dang 'ug pa po rten po dang /dUr bya chen po dang stag dang seng ge ba lung b+h+rUM dang khyi dang pa lgang dang /sne dang /byu ga dang /bya nad dang /
18b3(rgyud): dang phrag la sogs pa mdzad du t+yA dang chas te gnas pa la mtshan byer ma chags dra'i sbyor ba mdzad nas/he he he N+De/hrI hrI hrI nr-id+h+waM/phan phani sbyin ces brjod pas byang chub kyi sems
18b4(rgyud): kyi sprin las sang ge stabs chen po dang /stag gi cha lugs chen mo dang /myos byed rta mgo chen mo dang /'ug pa'i mag ce ni dang /bya rog dang byi rgong dang mchu rings la sogs pa srin
18b5(rgyud): ma chi lcags dang ma dril ba'i mdog gis 'thon nas/phaT phaT pAr+tha/can Dom hA maN+Da la hUM pheM Ta zhes brjod pas gdug pa'i cho gso bsgral por mdzad de bya dang mche ba canA dang
18b6(rgyud): chags kyi za stengs kyis 'phog cing mnabs pa mdzad do//de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sgyu 'phrul chen mos yang phyis bstan pa la mi sgribs par bya ba'i ched du las kye ba zlas
18b7(rgyud): pa 'di bka' stsal to//'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu ru//'khor yug dur khrod chen po ste//'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal 'gyur nas//drag po 'dul ba'i don ci dang
19a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'bar ba de dbus su//khrag 'thung ye shes chen po ste//dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad//ser nag 'jigs pa chen po'i sku//sangs rgyus
19a2(rgyud): pa'i rgyal mo dang //ma hA su kha'i tshul du 'khrel//rnam par thar pa'i zhal gsum gyis//khams gsum ma lus rngub cing gsol//thugs dam snying rje chen po yis//sku yi dkyil la
19a3(rgyud): chen par bsdus//rdo rje ban dar ldan pa yis//khrag chen po dag 'khrug cing gsol//'jigs pa'i ral pa gyen du 'khyil//skal pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbus//gshog sgra drag pos
19a4(rgyud): stong gsum ga yo//rkan sgra drag pos srog chags brgyal//spyugs pas bsod nams lus 'jigs shing //yum chen mo dang mnyam par sbyor//sdigs pa rde'u chung tri shu zhing //
19a5(rgyud): phyag na bsnabs shing ril mig mdzad//stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis//bzhi bcu gsod cing tshul bzhin du//ha ha ha sa ni dgyes par mdzad//he he he sa ni yum dang rol/
19a6(rgyud): hU~Md+h+r-i gas char chen 'bebs//phaT baT pa~MT kyis zo byed che//zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi rtu la zhing gnon//gzhal yis mthing nug chen pos ni//'jig rten khams gsum gyur
19a7(rgyud): klu tshon rgyal po mang po rnams//khyad par chen pa'i sku lo brgyan//srog chags chen po'i lpags chen yang //tsham ngam chen po'i na bzar gsol//ci yang sbyar yang gzugs
19b1(rgyud): te/'jigs byed sku ste cho 'phral ba//drag shul gsung gi nga ro yis//gsod cing 'thung ba'i tshogs chen po//snying rje mngan sems khrag chen 'thung //gsod cing sbyor ba'i mchod pa la//shin
19b2(rgyud): tu dgyes pa chen por ston//hU~M hUM hUM/ha ha ha ha haM//khA hI khA hi khA hi/ha ha ha sa/ru ru rab ta/ka ka ka ra ma yo gI na/ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM/rdo rje rigs chenA mi bskyod thugs//rdo rje khrag 'thung chun//
19b3(rgyud): po ste//dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad//zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na//zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi rab tu gnan//smug nag 'jigs pa chen po'i sku//rdo rje khros pa'i
19b4(rgyud): rgyal mo dang //ma hA su~M ka'i tshul du 'khril//rnam par thar pa'i zhal gsum gyis//khams gsum ma lus rngub cing gsol//thugs dmi snying rje chen po yis//thugs kyi dkyil 'khor
19b5(rgyud): chen por bsdus//snying rje ba na dar ldan pa yis//khrag chen po dag 'khrug cing gsol//'jigs pa'i ral pa gyen du 'khril//bskal pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbus//gshog sgra drag
19b6(rgyud): pos stong gsum g.yo//skan sgras rigs kun brgyal zhing 'bub//spyugs pas bsod nams lus 'jigs cing //yum chen mo dang mnyam par sbyor//sdigs pa'i ri rab tri shu zhing /
19b7(rgyud): phyag na bsnabs shing khrag 'thung ba//sangs rgyas kun tu bzang mo dang //rol pa'i tshul gyis mnyam sbyor zhing //stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis//zheng chen gsod cing pung mdzad
20a1(rgyud): pa//ha ha ha sa ni dgyes par mdzad//he he he sa ni yum dang rol//hAM hU~M hU~M gis char chen 'bebs//paT phaT paT kyis za byed che//gzhal yas smag nag chen po ste//
20a2(rgyud): 'jig rten stong gsum gyur pa ste//klu chen rgyal po mang po rnams//khyad par chen po'i skul brgyan//srog chags chen po'i lpags chen yang //tsham chem chen po ni bzar gsol
20a3(rgyud): ci yang skye ba'i gzugs chen po//tshe'i tshe'o dpal chen po//sangs rgyas sku yang che mchem gsol//srog chags gzhan lta smon ci dgos//'jig rten sku ste cho 'phrul pa//drag shul
20a4(rgyud): gsung gi nga ro yis//gsod cing 'thung ba'i tshogs chen po//snying rje mngan sems khrag chen 'thung //gsod cing sbyor ba mchod pa la//shin tu dgyes pa chen po ri ston//khrig 'thung //
20a5(rgyud): 'bar ma ma rtogs par//gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de//de bzhin thugs dam nyid bas nas//gsad pa'i rgyu la shin tu dgyes//hUM hUM hUM/ha ha ha ha ha/khA he khA hi khA hi/ha ha ha
20a6(rgyud): sa/ru ru ra ga tA/ka ka ka ra ma/yo gi ni/ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM/rin chen rigs chen yon tan sku//rin chen khrag 'thung chen po stau//dbu ga sum phyag drag zhabs bzhir
20a7(rgyud): bgrad//ster che chung gdan la bzhugs//bdud bzhi steng du brkyang bskum pa//nyon mongs lnga dag tshar gcod cing //mthe'u chung srin lag rtse gnyis kyis//a mr-i ta la sogs pa yi/
20b1(rgyud): bdud rtsi ze mang ra chen po dag/dang ba'i sku la rab brgyun cing //sngo gnag 'jigs pa chen po'i sku//rin chen khros pa'i rgyan mo dang //ma hA su khA tshul du 'khril//rnam par thar pa'i zhal
20b2(rgyud): gsum gyis//khams gsum ma lus rngub cing gsol//thugs dam snying rje chen po yis//yon tan dkyil 'khor chen por bsdus//rdo rje ban dar ldan pa yis//khrag chen po dag
20b3(rgyud): 'khrug cing gsol//'jigs pa'i ral pa gyen du 'khyil//bskal pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbus//gshog sgra drag pos stong gsum g.yo//rkan sgras yon tan rigs kun brlag
20b4(rgyud): spyugs pas bsod nams lus 'jig cing //yum tshon mo dang mnyam par sbyor//sti ra'i glo snying 'byin cing gsol//dgra sta tri shul rgyu 'dren zhags//phyag na bsnams shing khrag
20b5(rgyud): 'thung ba//rin chen kun tu bzang mo dang //rol pa'i tshul du mnyam sbyor zhing //stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis//thams cad thams cad gcod paro mdzad//rol pa chen po'i
20b6(rgyud): tshul bzhin du//khrag chen po yang zhal gyis 'jibs//ha ha ha sa ni dgyes par mdzad//he he he sa ni yum dang rol//hUM hUM hUM gi sa char chen 'bebs//phaT phaT phaT kyis za byed che//
20b7(rgyud): gzhal yas sngon ga chen por ni//'jig rten stong gsum gyur pa ste//klu chen rgyal po mang po rnams//khyad par chen po'i sku la brgyan//srog chags chen po'i lpags pa yang //
21a1(rgyud): dam chen po'i na bzar gsol//ci yang sgyur ba'i gzugs can to//che'o che'i dpal chenA po//sangs rgyas sku yang che mtsho mu gsol//gzugs khams lha tshogs
21a2(rgyud): mang po yang //mgo yi phreng bas rgyan du byas//'jigs byed sku ste cho 'phrul pa//drag shul gsung gi nga ro yis//gsad cing 'thung ba'i tshogs chen po//snying rje mang na sems khrag
21a3(rgyud): chen 'thung //gsod cing sbyor ba'i mchod pa la//shin tu dgyes pa chen por ston//khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs par//gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de//de bzhin thugs//
21a4(rgyud): dam nyid pa sa nas//gsod pa'i las la shin tu dgyes//hUM hUM hUM/ha ha ha ha ha/khA hi khA hi khA hi/ha ha ha se/ru ru ra ga ta/ka ka ka ra ma//yo gi ni/ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM/
21a5(rgyud): drag po gdul ba'i don ched du//dkyil 'khor 'bar ba'i phyog dag du//khrag 'thung pad+ma chen po ste//mtshungs pa med pa'i khyad par mnga'//dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi
21a6(rgyud): be grad//de mar nag 'jigs pa chen po'i sku//pad+ma khros pa'i rgyal mo dang //ma hA su khaM'i tshul du 'khril//rnam par thar po'i zhal gsum gyis//kha mos gsum ma lus rngub
21a7(rgyud): cing gsol//thugs dam snying rje chen po yis//gi sung gi dkyil 'khor chen por bsdus//rdo rje ban dar ldan pa yis//khrag chen po yang 'khrug cing gsol//'jigs
21b1(rgyud): pa'i ral pa gyen du 'khyil//bskal pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbus//gshog sgra drag pos stong gsum g.yo//dkan sgra drag pos srog chags brgya la//spyugs pas bsod nams
21b2(rgyud): lus 'jig cing //yum che ma mo dang mnyam par sbyor//tri shul rde'u rdung rgyu 'dre na zhags//phyag na bsnams te sha khrag gsol//gzugs khams lha tshigs mang po dag/dgra
21b3(rgyud): bcom byang chub sems dpa'i sa//mgo yi phreng ba rgyan du byas//dgongs nges brtsan thabs chen po myos//'dod chags bsnyengs pa'i dgongs pa yis//gzugs can bud med
21b4(rgyud): lus kun sdud//nga rgyal bsnyengs pa'i mthu yis ni//bsod nams can rnams thams cad gnon//phra dog bsnyengs pa'i dgongs pa yis//gzugs kun kun sdud 'phrag cing spyod//
21b5(rgyud): gti mug bsnyings pa'i dgongs pa yis//dbye bsal mi mdzad nges pa'i thugs//mchod do mchod stobs chen po//bdag la bdag mchod mnyes pa che//khro mo pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du//
21b6(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i stabs dang gar mdzad pas//mi bzad mkha' gro'i klong chen 'byung //stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis//zhing bcu bsod cing tshul bzhin du//dngos la longs spyod
21b7(rgyud): chen por mdzad//ha ha ha sa ni dgyes par mdzad//he he he sa ni yum dang rol//hUM hU~M hUM gis cher che ni 'bebs//phaT phaT phaT kyis za byed che//zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi sgrol
22a1(rgyud): zhing gnon//gzhal yas dmar nag chen byor ni//'jig rten khams gsum gyur pa ste//klu rkyen rgyal po mang po rnams//khyad par chen po'i sku la brgyan//
22a2(rgyud): srog chags chen po'i lpags chen yang //tsham ngam chen po'i na bzar gsol//cir yang sgru ba'i gzugs chen te//'jigs byed sku ste cho 'phrul pa//drag shul gsung gau nga ro yis
22a3(rgyud): gsod cing 'thung ba'i tshogs chen po//snying rje mngan sems khrag chen 'jung //gsod cing sbyor ba'i mchod pa lo//shin tu dgyes po chen por ston/hU~M hUM hrI/ha ha ha he ha/khA hi ShA
22a4(rgyud): hi khA hi/ha ha ha sa/ru ru rag ta/ka ka kar ma/yo gi ni/ru lu ru lA ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM//drag po'i dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa//dkyil 'khor 'bar ba'i phyogs dag tu//khrag
22a5(rgyud): 'thung las kyi sku gsung thugs//dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad//ljang nag 'jigs pa chen po'i sku//las kyi rgyal cing khros ma dang //ma hA su kha'i tshul du 'bre ba//
22a6(rgyud): rnam par thar pa'i zhun gsum gyis//'ams gsum ma lus rngub cing gsol//thugs dam snying rje chen po yis//stong khams rnam pa mang po rnams//sku yi dkyil 'khor
22a7(rgyud): chen por bsdus//rdo rje ban dang ldan pa yis//khrag chen po yang 'khrug cing gsol//'jigs pa'i ral pa gyen du 'khyil//bskal pa'i tshe dpung chen po'i dbus//gshog
22b1(rgyud): sgra drug pas stong gsupa gso//rkan sgra drag pas srog chags brgya pa//skyugs pas bsod nams lus 'jog cing //sumatshan ma dang mnyam par sbyor//rgyug ma b+hab parjes da dang /
22b2(rgyud): rdo shul zhing chen rgyu zhags 'dren//tshoms rnon ster za byed che//stabs zla phyag rgya sngags tshig gis//ning bcugs cing tshul bzhin du//phrin las dkyil 'khor nyid pa mchod//
22b3(rgyud): haha haMs ni dgyes par mdzad// nyes ni yum dang ngo'o//hU~M gis tshor chen 'bebs//phaT baT parba gyi saza byed che//zhabs bzhi bdud pade sgrol zhing gnan//gzhal yas
22b4(rgyud): ltung nag chen par ni//'jig rten khams gsum gyur pa ste//klu chen rgyal po mang po rnams//khyed par chen po'i sgrol brgyan//srog chags chen po'i lpags chen yang //tsham dpa
22b5(rgyud): chen po'i na bzar gsol//cir yang sbyar ba'i gzugs chen po//che'i che'o dpal chen po//sangs rgyas sku yang che mtshom gsol//srog chags gzhan lta smos ci dgos/
22b6(rgyud): 'jigs byed su ste tshe 'phrul ba//drag shul gsung byeng ro yis//gsod cing 'thung bya'i tshogs chen po//spyi rje ma ngan sems khrag chen dang //gsod cing sbyor ba'i mchod pa la/
22b7(rgyud): shin tu dkyis rje chen par ston//khrig 'thung ba mi gtogs par//gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de//de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas ni//gsad pa'i las la shin tu dgyes/
23a1(rgyud): nA r+m+mad+hAt+mar+m+mata/ \u0f85/hAhahas/ruru dgAt+tha/kakakaR+Sham//rAm+b+ha r+ra su uts+tshad+h+r-ib+h+ya/sbyangs rgyas khros pa'i rgyal po ste//sa sa d+has
23a2(rgyud): kun gyi yun che ni rmo//kr-i d+hi shA ri de bzhin rigs//dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad//khro gnyer spyan gsum mcho gtsigs shing //dbu skra mun dzA rgyu bcings te//drong rlon
23a3(rgyud): me pas rkyen du byas//sprin gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig con//ser nag rgyud kyi 'dor tshul du//ban de rag tar ldan pa yis//'khril ba'i tshul gyis gtsu la stobs//du
23a4(rgyud): khyod 'bar ba'i mo chen dbus//zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum gnan tshul du//zhing chen gshebs pa'i gdun la bzhugs//rdo rje gshibs pa'i gshog rkyong zhing //srin lag man
23a5(rgyud): bide rtse gnyis kyis//oM mi ta la sogs pa lnga//blangs te thugs dem skul bar mdzad//dgyes pas rdo rje pang mar 'jog/rol phyir lhan mchog kyang mdzad//ka le gyi la
23a6(rgyud): dgyes pas rol//rdo dbyug tra shul stir za//e A he haM gad mos 'bengs//thugs dam sku yi dkyil 'khor du//'jig rten ji srid thams cad sdung //khams gsum kun gyi
23a7(rgyud): dbang bsgyur mdzad//sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo//dpags chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol//dpal chen 'bar ba ma gtogs par//kun kyang thal ba bzhin du rlig
23b1(rgyud): khros pa'i snying rje g.yos pa na//thabs chen po yang chem tshe ma gsol//zhe sdang chen po'i dgyes chen yang //rol pas dbang du bsdud nas ni//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs//
23b2(rgyud): zasu srog chags kun gsol pa//ma hA mangs sku brgyan cing //zla bra ma mchod pa chen po yis//khrag 'thung chen pa 'dzum par mdzad//yid du ngeng ba'i gzugs ston cing //nyams
23b3(rgyud): nA rab tu brlag par mdzad//rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo ste//dam tshig can la dngos grub sbyin//khams gsum khrag tu bsgyur nas ni//hu ba hu ba hub kyis zhal du gsol//rdul
23b4(rgyud): gyi gang bu mang po rnams//cham che ma chem gyis zhal du gsol//sod cig sod cig dpal gyi yum//chom shig chom shig dpal gyi yum//gtogs shig gtogs shig
23b5(rgyud): dpal gyi yum//sregs shig sregs shig dpal gyi yum//chings shig chings shig dpal gyi yum//gnod par byed pa'i bdud rnams kun//rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin
23b6(rgyud): du//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs//khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs par//gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad do//de bzhin thugs dme nyed pas ni//gsad pa'i las
23b7(rgyud): la shin tu dgyes//ha ha ha/khA hi khA hi khA hi/A ho sarba ta thA ga ta pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA/si dad ru paM dza/lo hi ni la sha ta tsa ra na a khi ya mai hu D+ho ga yo ka sa ma yo d+ha baM/ta ru la sarba yo
24a1(rgyud): gi mahA n+ta rar+ya ni//rag tA dz+nyA ya/sau khyum nu bi la si/kAb sam lo ma ku d+hA/tri shU la rAk+Sha b+h+r-i ga yo kan/mahAs tu maN+Dal ti la ka/b+hAn d+ha ni/a la la ho//rdo rje yum
24a2(rgyud): chen rgyal gcig ma//kro d+hi shwa ri dpal gyi yum//sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can//nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi ldan ma//king rus 'bum gyi gdan la bzhugs//sgyu nag khyod kyi 'dor chu
24a3(rgyud): du/ba na da rag ta gtso la stobs//gdug po'i tshigs chen mang po rnams//mnyes byed phyir na sku la 'khril//dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad//khri gnyer spyan bgrad
24a4(rgyud): mche gtsigs shing /dbu skra mun dz+nyA rgya bcings te//thod rlon mang pos rgyan du byas//sprin gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mgo can//rtsid ta glo snying mang po rnams//zhal du gsol//
24a5(rgyud): nas 'khril zhing bzhugs//chags pa'i gar thabs chen po yis//gdug po chen po'i sprin 'phro zhing //la su gsod la shin tu dgyes//du khrod 'bar ba'i me chen dbus//
24a6(rgyud): zhabs ni brkyang bskum chen por bzhugs//rdo rje gshibs pa'i gshog rkyong zhing //srin lag mthe bong rtse gnyis kyis//a mr-i ta la sogs pa lnga//dang ba'i sku la rab brgya
24a7(rgyud): cing //dgyes pas rdo rje pad+mar 'jog/rol phyir stan mchog kyang mdzad//ka la ki las rol pas dgyes//rdo rje rnge'u chung rdung ba dang //tre shul 'phel cing ster za//
24b1(rgyud): a hi ti gad mos 'gongs//thugs dam sku yi dkyil 'khor du//'jig rten ji srid thams cad sdud//khams gsum kun gyi dbang sgyur mdzad//sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo//lpags
24b2(rgyud): chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gsal//dpal chen 'bar ba ma gtogs par//kun kyang thal ba bzhin du rnyog/khros pa'i snying rje g.yos pa na//thabs chen po yang tshe mtsham gsol//zhe sdang //
24b3(rgyud): chen po'i bgegs chen yang //rol pas dbang du bsdus nas ni//khrag 'thung chen po zhal du stobs//sa ral kha yi tshul dag tu//kha T+wAM ga la rgyab brten byas//rol la rngam pa'i cha lugs
24b4(rgyud): kyis//bka' las 'das pa 'phrog cing gsol//zasu srog chags kun gsol ba//ma hA mangs sa sku brgyan cing //zla gam mchod pa chen po sa ni//khrag 'thung ba yi mdog skyed cing //
24b5(rgyud): yid du'ang ba'i gzugs ston cing //nyams na rab tu brlag par mdzad//rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo ste//dam tshig can la dngos grub sbyin//khams gsum khrag du bsgyur nas ni//
24b6(rgyud): hub hu chub kyis zhal du gsol//keng rus rdul gyi gong du rnams//che mchem gyis ni zhal du gsol//sod cig sod cig rdo rje yum//tshem shig chom shig rdo rje yu me//gtogs
24b7(rgyud): shig gtogs shig rdo rje yum//sregs shig sregs shig rdo rje yum//chings shig tshangs shig rdo rje yum//gnod par byed pa'i bdud rnams kyang //rab tu drongs la tshul
25a1(rgyud): bzhin du//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du skyabs//khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs pa//gaN+DIg kyang gson par mi mdzad do//de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na//gsad
25a2(rgyud): las la shin tu dgyes//oM hUM sa tra ka ra rU pa/rag te dzA la se pa nA tsa ta thA ga ta sid d+ha ka ya rU pa/ban tsa tsid ta ta thA ga ta rU po//ta tha ga ta b+ha ga sid d+hi/yaM ga yo gi dza la d+ha/ha na b+han d+ha na
25a3(rgyud): A la la la ho//rin chen khros pa'i rgyal gcig ma//tshad med bzhi yi yon tan can//bskyes skom phongs la gter sbyin mdzod//rang bzhin rnal 'byor yid bzhin gter//mi zad
25a4(rgyud): mdzad du gyur pas na//rnal 'byor ma zhes mtshan du gsol//ye shes khro mo khro rgyal gtso//dag pas mtshan rto gos rgyal ba'i yum//'thing nog gyad kyi 'dor tshul gyis//@
25a5(rgyud): da rag te gtso la stobs//nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi ldan ma//gdug pa'i tshegs chen mang po rnams//mnyes pa'i phyir ni sku la 'khril//nu 'bur stong slad dbye zhing 'bying //dbu
25a6(rgyud): gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang //g.yon du 'bying stabs sbyor ba yis//thal sgra drag pos gdug pa gsod//khri gnyer spyan bgrang ma che gtsigs shing //dbu skra mun
25a7(rgyud): dza rgya btsongs shing //zod rlon mang pos rgyan du byas//spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can//yin lag pacad gtubs bral nas kyang //zhel du gsol nas chags pa
25b1(rgyud): 'khrol//chags pa'i grar thabs chen pos ni//gdug pa chen po'i sprin 'phro zhing //lasu gsod la shin tu dgyes//du khrod 'bar ba'i me chen dbus//zhabs ni brkyang bsku ma
25b2(rgyud): pos ni//zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs//rin chen gshibs pa'i gshog rkyong zhing //srin lag spar gyis khrag chen 'thung //dgyes pas rdo rje pad+mar 'jog/rol phyir
25b3(rgyud): stan mchog kyang mdzad//kA la ki las dgyes pas rol//dbyug pa rnge'u chung khaT+wAM 'dzin//glo sbyong yan lag kun gsol zhing //a a hi hi bzhad mos 'gengs//rol pa'i rkan sgras thog thog/
25b4(rgyud): dayo//rdo rje skyugs pas dgyes mdzad pa'i//thugs ngam sku yi dkyil 'khor du//gsad pa'i du khrod kun gsol mdzad//khams gsum kun gyi dbang mdzad ma//sangs rgyas kun gyi
25b5(rgyud): yum chen mo//lpags chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol//dpal chen 'bar ba ma gtogs par//kun kyang thal ba bzhin du rlogs//khros pa'i snying rje g.yos pa na//thabs chen po yang
25b6(rgyud): tshim chem gsol//zhe sdang chen po'i bgegs chen yang //rol pas dbang du bsdus nas ni//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs//ro la brkam po'i yum chen mo//bka' las 'das pa
25b7(rgyud): 'breg cing gsal//zasu srog chags kun gsol ba//ma hA mangs sku rgyan cing //zla gam mchod pa chen pos ni/khre ga 'thung ba yang 'dzum par mdzad//yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs
26a1(rgyud): ston pas//nyams na rab tu brlag par mdzad//rnal 'byor yum chen chen mo ste//dmachog can la dngos grub sbyin//khams gsum khrag tu bsgyur nas na//tu
26a2(rgyud): tu btub kyis zhal du gsol//ste ra che chung mang po rnams//che mtsham gyis ni zhal du gsol//sod cig sod cig rin chen yum//choms shig choms shig rin chen yum//
26a3(rgyud): gtogs shig gtogs shig rin chen yum//skegs shig sregs shig rin chen yum//chings shig chings shig rin chen yum//gnod par byed pa'i bdud rnams kyang /
26a4(rgyud): rab tu rol la tshul bzhin du//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs/khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs par//gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de//de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na
26a5(rgyud): gsang pa'i las la shin tu dgyes//oM hUM sangs rgyas kun gyi mi zad rgyun dang ldan pa rang bzhin te ru dpal//dur khrod bdag po za byed yum chen mo//rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan gter
26a6(rgyud): ldan ma//byang chub snying po'i dgongs pa nges ldan bsnams shing gsol//rmongs pa log pa lnga dang ldan rnams dngos la tshul bzhin stobs//kun gyi dbang mi dbang dang ldan pa'i
26a7(rgyud): yum chen kun ral cig/sems dpa' khrag 'thung nyid kyang sku la thim par rol//khrag chen gsol zhing glo snying thal bskam pas rnal 'byor kun gyi las mdzod cig/bdag dang
26b1(rgyud): ldan pas dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad rdzogs pa yin//A la la to//sku gsung thugs ldan rnal 'byor ma//pad+ma'i gsung gi sangs rgyas yum//chags pa'i pad+ma rgya cig ma//yum
26b2(rgyud): kr-id+hai shwa ri ste//sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can//dmar nag sgra yin lugs mi//dbugasum phyag drug zhabs bzhir ba glad//rdo rje bran dang ldan pa yis//khrag chen po yang 'khrug cing ga
26b3(rgyud): chags pa'i thul mong brkyang nas kyang //khrag 'thung pad+ma'i sku la'i khril//glog sbyong 'gyur ba'i 'od mnga'i bas//mun pa nag po thabs po sel//snang yig mche gtsigs tshems rnon gsod//rdzu
26b4(rgyud): chung rdung zhing stir chen za//sha khrag 'dzag cing ro la brkam//bya byed mang po'i nus mthu yis//lha chen po yi mgo yang 'gems//tshangs pa chen po'i lpags chan yang //yum chen mo yin//
26b5(rgyud): bza re gsol//mun dzA cod pan ral pa can//gdug pa tshogs tshon yang pos bskor//thod rlon rgyan gyi phreng bas brgyan//brkyang bskum sti ra'i gang na stengs na/gyad kyi dgyes pa'i 'dor
26b6(rgyud): tshul gyis//stan byang cing ro la brkam//sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo//bgegs chen kun la tshul bzhin du//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs//bskal pa'i me dpung chen po'i
26b7(rgyud): dbus//tshogs la rol la tshul bzhin du//dang ba'i sku la rgyan du byas//tsham ngam drag shul sder tshogs dang //dur khrod las la shin tu dgyes//'di dag dgongs pa'i dar tshig
27a1(rgyud): ste//de bzhin ma byas nyid sgrol zhes//dbang phyug rgyal pos rab tu gsungaso//oM pan tsa rU pe b+hi ti rU la pad+ma kro d+hI sh+tsa ri sa ma ya yod b+ha bad//sarba b+h+r-i sha rU pe sa ma yo gin hUM/
27a2(rgyud): b+hi yu li ga tha pad+ma kro d+hi shwa ri sa maM yo gI ne/a ha ha ma na sa ma ya yo ki ni/pa nya tsa rU paM si hUM/ta thA ga te dz+nyA na khA hi hi//las kyi rigs kyi yum chen mo//sku mdog ljang nag 'jigs pa'i//
27a3(rgyud): skye//phyag gnyis gyad kyi 'dor thabs kyis//ban dar rag tas gtso la stobs//snum chen ldan zhing ro la brkam//kro d+hi shwa ri yum chen mo//dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi baglang//
27a4(rgyud): khro gtor sdang mig mtsho gtsigs shing //nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi ldan zhing //gdug pa'i tshigs chen mang po rnams//mnyes byeng phyir ni sku la 'khril//nu 'bur stod smad dbye zhing 'gyid//
27a5(rgyud): g.yon du 'gying stabs sbyor ba yis//thal sgra drag pos gdug pa gsod//dbu skra mun dzA rgya bcings shing //thong rlon mang pos rgyan du byas//spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig
27a6(rgyud): can//yin lag nang grol drangs nas kyang //zhal du gsol nis chags phra'i khrel//chags pa'i gar thabs chen po yis//gdug pa chen po'i sprin 'phro zhing //lasu gsod la
27a7(rgyud): shin tu dgyes//dur khrod 'bar ba'i mtshan dbus//zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum snol mar yang //keng rus tshogs chen gdan la bzhugs//pad+ma gshibs pa'i gshog tung
27b1(rgyud): zhing //snyom pa sbar gyis khrog tshon 'thung //dgyes pas rdo rje pad+mar 'joms//rol phyir stan mchog kyang mdzad//ka la kI las dgyes pas rol//ral gri dgra sta rde'u chung zhing //'jigs/
27b2(rgyud): pa'i gzugs kyis phyag na bsnams//sta ri'i zhags pa 'dren cing gsol//aM oM hi haM bzhad mos dgyes//rol pa'i rkan sgras stong gsum g.yo//rdo rje spyugs pas dgyes mdzad
27b3(rgyud): pa'i//thugs dum sgo yi dkyil 'khor du//khams gsum ma lus kun 'dus pa//khams gsum kun gyi dbang mdzad ma//sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo//lpags chen brjid
27b4(rgyud): pa'i g.yeng bzhi gsal//dpal chen 'bar ba ma gtogs pa//kun kyang thal ba bzhin du rlogs//khros pa'i snying rje g.yos pa na//thabs chen po yang che mtshe ma gsol//zhe sde
27b5(rgyud): chen po'i bgegs chen yang //rol pas dbang du bsres nas ni//khrag 'thung las kyi zhal du stobs//ro la brkam pa'i yum chen mo//bka' las 'das pa 'phrog cing gsol//
27b6(rgyud): zasu sog chags kun gsol ba//ma hA mAng sa sa skye brgyan cing //zla gam mchod pa chen po stobs//yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs ston pas//nyams na rab tu brlag par mdzad//
27b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor yum cig tshan mo dang //dam tshig can yi dngos grub sbyin//khams gsum khrag tu bsgyur nas ni//hub tub kyis ni zhal du gsol//stir cha chung mang po rnams//
28a1(rgyud): che mtsham gyis ni zhal du gsol//sad cig sod cig las kyi yum//tshoms shig tshoms shog las kyi yum//gtogs shig gtogs shig las kyi yum/
28a2(rgyud): goms shig sdoms shig las kyi yu me//srogs shig bsnoms shig las kyi yum//gnod par byed pa'i bdud rnams kyang //rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du//khrag 'thung can/
28a3(rgyud): bu'i zhal du stobs//khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs pa//gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de//de bzhin thugs de ma nyid pas na//gsod pa'i las la shin tu bgyis// te Sha
28a4(rgyud): tiSh+Tha hi//oM hU~M las su gsong la dga' ba'i rnal 'byor ma//bde gshegs las kyi rigs kun sku la rdzogs par rab snang yum chen mo//tshang ngam brlang ba'i mi stangs gar dang
28a5(rgyud): bcas te gtso la stobs//kun gyi dbang dang ldan pa bsod nams lus la dbang sgyur ma//sngar chags mang po'i tshogs dang bcas te rol cing dgyes par mdzod//sha khAg dmar
28a6(rgyud): chen mchog la dga' bas dang du kun long la//rnal 'byor dam tshig can la byin gyis rlabs//a la la ho//dpal chen 'bar ba'i thugs ka nas//rnam par sbyar ba'i gzugs
28a7(rgyud): byung ba//cir yang 'gyur ba'i hUM mengang pa//rnal 'byor sngon ga ke'u rim//khro gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing //ral pa 'khyil ba'i mun dz+wa la//zod rlon tshogs
28b1(rgyud): kyis rnam par bar+d+ha nA//dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir ba glad/mi lcags rlon pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol//spyir chung ngu mang po'i tshogs//brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas//'jig
28b2(rgyud): rten sreg pa'i ma dkyil nas//tshe mong ma gzugs sku chen po yis//zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na//bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs//rdo rje ban dAr ljon pa yis//khrag
28b3(rgyud): chen po yang 'khrug cing gsol//sder chen glo snying 'dren tshul du//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs//dbyug pa rnge'u chung phyag na bsnams//'jig su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang //dgyes/
28b4(rgyud): pa chen po'i skyugs pa yis//se gol stsol mar gtogasra nas ni//zhing bcu drangs nas tshul bzhin du//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs//sangs rgyas
28b5(rgyud): kun gyi yum chen mo//stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis//ldog par lta ba'i bdud rnams kun//tshim ngam skus ni tshul bzhin du//dbang du bsdu ba mdzad nas ni//ro la brkam
28b6(rgyud): pa'i stangs kyis//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs//rol cig sprul cig rnal 'byor ma//sod cig longs shig rnal 'byor mo//stor cig sbyongs shig rnal 'byor ma//
28b7(rgyud): tshems shig choms shig rnal 'byor ma//de bzhin thugs ngam nyid pas na//gsod pa'i las la shin tu dgyes//drongs shig drangs shig dza dza//chings shig chings
29a1(rgyud): shagar+b+han+tu//snrums shog sngams shig+sa ha ha//rol cog rol cig phaT phaT//de bzhin ma byas de bzhin brlab/sku yi dkyil 'khor mdzod snang pa//sangs
29a2(rgyud): rgyus kun gyi yum che ni mi/rnal 'byor sa re na gtse'u ri ma//'jig su rung ba'i gzugs 'ching ba//khro gnyer spyan bgrang mche gtsigs shing //ral pa 'khyil pa'i mun dzaH/
29a3(rgyud): thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan//dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad//mi lpags rlon pa'i g.yong gzhi gsol//stir chung ngu mang po'i tshogs//brgyas nas
29a4(rgyud): sku yi rgyan du byas//'jig rten sreg pa'i me dkyil nos//tshem dam brkyang bskum chen pos ni//zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na//bdud bzhi gnon po'i tshul du
29a5(rgyud): bzhugs//rdo rje ban dang ldan pa yis//khrag chen po yang 'khrug cing gsol//stir chen klo steng 'dren tshul du//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs//drag shul mda'
29a6(rgyud): 'phen 'gengs pa yis//dpal chen 'bar ba'i thugs kar gzo/rde'u chung tI shul phyag na rnams//'jig su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang //dgyes pa chen po'i sprugs pa yis//
29a7(rgyud): dpal chen 'bar ba'i thugs kar gzo//se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni//zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du//khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i sku la stobs//sangs rgyas kun
29b1(rgyud): su tsun no//snrubs k+Sha phyagar+b+ha sngags zlog gis//log par smra ba'i bdud rnams sun//sa grol stsol par gto gas nas no//zhing bcu dngas te tshul ban du//khrag
29b2(rgyud): 'bar ba'i sku la stabs//sangs rgyas kun gyi du mtshan pa//stabs g+ha phyag rgya sdigs tshig giste//sdig par lta ba'i bdud rnams kun//chom dam smras ni tshul bzhin du//dbang du
29b3(rgyud): bsdu ba mdzad nas ni//ro la brkam pa'i za stangs kyis//khrag 'thung 'bor ma'i zhal du stobs//rom bgre sprul cig rnal 'byer ma//sid cig langs shig rnal 'byor mi//me tog
29b4(rgyud): shige sbyongs shig rnal 'byor ma/tshams shig choms shig rnal 'byor pa//de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na//gsad pa'i las la shin tu dgyes//drongs shig drongs shig
29b5(rgyud): dza//chings shid chings shig hUM d+h+waM//sdoms shig sdoms shig ha ho//sgro cig sbrul cig phaT phaT//de bzhin ma byas de bzhin brlag/khro mo rnal 'byor dmar nag sku/
29b6(rgyud): gnyar sbran ba gang mche gtsigs shig/'jig su rung ba'i sdang mig can//rol pa run dzA rgyu bcings shing /thod rlon mang po'i cod bran can//spyi ri'i phreng bas rgyun du byasarlon
29b7(rgyud): mang po dzin bzur dusal//mi lpags g.yang gzhi sham thebs can//dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrengad //gsung gi dkyil 'khor mdzod gtong gi//sangs rgyas kun
30a1(rgyud): // sus sbyin no//nas 'byor chen po pr-I b+h+yoH//du spyod mang pa'i tshogs nga ni//gsung chen sogs pa'i mi dzin dbus//rga mya ngam ban+d+hang ba sgram tshan bAs ni/
30a2(rgyud): zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stangs no//bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs//rdo rje ban d+ha ra ldan pa yis//khrag chen po dag 'khrug cing gsol//stir chen glo snying 'dren
30a3(rgyud): tshul du//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs//chu srin rgyal mtshan rde'u chung brdung //'jig su rung ba'i dkan sgra dang //dgyes pa chen po'i skyugs pa yisaM//se gal snol mer
30a4(rgyud): gtogs nas ni//zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du//khrig 'thung 'bar ba'i zhal du stobs//khams gsum za byed zhal du stobs//dr-ing+ga gsung gi yum chen mo//gzhal
30a5(rgyud): yas dmar nag chen po nas//stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis//bar chad byed pa'i bshegs chen kun//tshe ma ngam skus ni tshul bzhin du//dbang du bsdu ba mdzad nas ni//
30a6(rgyud): par mkhan chen mo'i sbubs tshul gyis//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs//khro mo rnal 'byor khyod kyis rol//khro mo rnal 'byor khyod rjes song//khro m+b+hi rnal 'byor khyod
30a7(rgyud): kyis ni//longs shig tshangs mi tshul bzhin du//ge togs shig sbyong sa la bsnam su gsol//de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas no//de bzhin ma byas de bzhin brlog//hoha~M/
31a1(rgyud): shrIg rnal 'byor ma//tshoms shig tshoms shig rnal 'byor mya//de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na//gsang ba'i las la shin tu dgyes//drangs shig bros shi
31a2(rgyud): dzadzaH//chings shig tshangs shig hUM d+hU hU~M//sdoms shig snyems shrIg ha ha ho//sgrol cig sgrol cig paT phaT phaT//de bzhin ma byas de nyid 'drug/rnal 'byor khro mo ljang nagasu/
31a3(rgyud): stir chen za ba'i ka sa ma ri//khro gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing //'jig su rung ba'i sdang mig can//ral pa 'khyil ba'i mun dz+wa la//thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan//
31a4(rgyud): dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrod//me lpags rlon pa'i g.yang bzhi gsol//sti ra chung ngu mang po'i tshigs//brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas//du khyod chen po'i me chen
31a5(rgyud): dbus//tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni//zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na//bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs//rdo rje ban der ldan pa yis//khrag chen po
31a6(rgyud): yang bkrug cing gsol//sti ri chen glo snying 'dren tshul du//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs//tri shul 'phen tshul rnge'u chung zhags//'jig su rung ba'i dkun sgra dang //dgyes
31a7(rgyud): pa chen po'i spyugs pa dang //se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni//zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs//sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo//
31b1(rgyud): stabs glu phyag rgya sngags chog gis//lag par lta ba'i bdud rnams kun//rab tu drongs la tshulnga bzhin du//ro la brkam pa'i za stongs kyis//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs//ro
31b2(rgyud): cag sprul cig rnal 'byor ma//sod cig yong shig rnal 'byor ma//gtogs shig sbyong shig rnal 'byor ma//choms shig tshams shig rnal 'byor ma//de bzhi ni thugs dam
31b3(rgyud): nyid pas na//gsad pa'i las la shin tu dgyes//drongs shr-ig drongs shig dza dza dza//tsho nges shig chings shig hU hUM hUM//sdoms shig sdoms shig hau ha ha//sgrol cig sgrol cig phaT
31b4(rgyud): phaT phaT//de bzhin ma bya s+ya de nyid brlag/d+hUd+hAhUM hU~M hU~M/khA ti khA hi khA hi khA hi ShA hi//rnal 'byor khro mo ser nag sku/kauster chenani za ba'i tsaN Da li//gtum mo chen mo zhe sdang 'joms//khro
31b5(rgyud): gnyer spyan bgrad mche gautsigs shing //'jig su rung ba'i sdang mig can//stir chen nang grol 'byin cing gsol//ral pa 'khyil ba'i mun dzA la//thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan/
31b6(rgyud): dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir baglad//zhing lpags ser pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol//sti ro chung ngu mang po'i tshogs//brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas//du khrod chen po'i me chen
31b7(rgyud): dbus//tsha mau dam brkyang bskum chen pos ni//rin chen gshings pa'i gdan stengs na//bdud bzhi mnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs//rdo rje ban dar ljon pa yi se//khrag chen po dag

32a3(rgyud): na// nga du da na zhen na su tshogs sum
32b1(rgyud): byas//dur khrod chen po'o mo dkyil dbus//tsham ngam du r+m+mang ba shu mu chen po yis//zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na//bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs//rdo rje ban dang ldan
32b2(rgyud): pau yis//khrag chen po yang dkrug cing gsol//spu gri 'debs shing rde 'u chung rdung //'jig su rung ba'i dkan sgra dang //dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis//saM ga la snol mar gtogs nas

32b7(rgyud): khromo dmar ser sku//gsod byed stir chen za ba mo//rol po'i rnal 'byor puk+ka si//khro gnyer spyan bgrad ma che gtsigs shing //sbyin gsum 'jigs pi'i sdang mig can//rol pas
33a1(rgyud): stor chen 'dren tshul du//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs//ralnga pa'i'akhyil ba'i mun dz+wa la//thod rnon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan//mahA rag tas sku
33a2(rgyud): brgyan cing //dbu gsum phyag drug zhab sa bzhir bgrad//ye shes sku yi cha lugs kyis//mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol//stir chung ngu mang po'i tshogs//bskyes
33a3(rgyud): nas sku yi rgyan du byas//srin lag mthe 'ong rtse sprad de//a mr-i ta la sogs pa lnga//ljags lam dbang por sku brgyan cing //a ho sra kas dgyes shing 'khril//dur khrod chen
33a4(rgyud): po'i mo dkyil dbus//tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen po sa ni//zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na//bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs//bka' las ma mda'
33a5(rgyud): thugs dam skong //'das na lha yang brlag pa'i phyir//lha chen mang po'i glad 'gems shing //bsod nams sku yang chem chem gsol//rdo rje ban dang ldan pa yis//khrag
33a6(rgyud): chen po yang dkrug cing gsol//zangs bri rnon pos yan lag gcod//rde'u chung rdung zhing kha T+wA~M 'ben//sha khrag za ba'i rnal 'byor ma//'jig su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang //dgyes
33a7(rgyud): pa chen po'i skyeg pa yis//se gol sgrol mar gtogs nas ni//zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin de//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs//gzhal yas dmar nag chen po nas//
33b1(rgyud): sa rgya sa r+b+ba bur tshun no//snrubs su phyag rgya sngags chags sa//chog par lta cwo bdu rnams san//la brnam par na b+h+yosaHs+ho//ra rgyas la tshu ts+tsha bzhin du//
33b2(rgyud): 'bru tshon po'i na 'du ma//sa c-ig lang shig rna la byur mo//togs b+h+yo sgyu shi bran la 'byung ma/skyes shr-I/rgyams shegan
33b3(rgyud): khrug 'thung 'ab nga ma go togs par//gcig kyang gson par ni mdzad de//de bzhin rdzogs dam nyid byas na//go song pa'i hrI kin+do dgyes//drongs shig blongs shig dru //tshing
33b4(rgyud): shig d+hIhrI/rnams shig/snyoms shig tAH//sgrol cig smol ga//de bzhin ma byas de nyid ban+d+haH/oM hU~M ti thAg tA su~M pa u go ga/k+Sho d+hi k+ki gi samA pa yo ga/
33b5(rgyud): /m-i sl-i na/A //len snga ma~M yA yo ga d+hI l+yA A sam+b+ha/ga pa de med rna ma la \u0f7f//m+b+ha la gsad byed seng gi'i mgo//bIr ni da skyabs kyis/
33b6(rgyud): theb mo bsnol nas ni//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs//khro gnyer spyan dgrad mche gtsigs shing //spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sang mig ce na//mtsho tshags ma
34a1(rgyud): 'khor du byas//zhe sdang 'jams ma'i za byad ma//ma hA rag tas sku brgyan cing //dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir dgad//zing nag song na la pabya//na
34a2(rgyud): rman tshogs kyis rnam por brgyan//ye shes sku yi cha lugs na//mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yung gzhi gsol//stir chung ngu mang po'i tshogs//rgyas nas sku yi rgyan du byas//
34a3(rgyud): khring chen po'i mi dkyil nas//tsham dam brkyang bskum chen pos ni//zhing chen go shibs pa'i gdan stengs bzhugs//bka' las mi 'ad thugs dam skongs//sro
34a4(rgyud): mang po'i snying 'dren cing //bsod nams lus kyang tshem che ma gsol//ban da rab tas zhal du stobs//rdo rjes glad 'gems rde'u chung rdung //zhing chen za bA'i mu ka ste//'jigs
34a5(rgyud): su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang //dgyes pa chen po'i skyugs pa yis//se gol snol mar gtogs nA sa ni//bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du storma//

34a7(rgyud): bzhin du//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs//de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/mu ka ga sod byed stag gi mgo/dmar nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs can//phyag gnyis bdud
34b1(rgyud): ci thal sbyar zhing //shin tu dga' ba'i mdangs kyis 'khril//khro gnyer spyan bgrang mche gtsigs shing //spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can//mche tshogs mang po'i 'khor du byung /
