34b3(rgyud): 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yong gzhi gsol//so rale kha yi tshul dag du//thod rlon phreng bas lus brgyan cing //dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus//tsham ngam brkyang skum chen po sa ni//
34b4(rgyud): zhing chen ga shibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs//bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam spong //srog tshogs mang po'i snying 'dren cing //bsod nams lus kyang chem che mo gsol//ban da
34b5(rgyud): rag ta zhal du stobs//dgra stas glang 'gems lcags kyus 'dren//rnge'u chung rdung zhing ster chen za//'jig su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang //dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis//se gol
34b6(rgyud): sgrol mar gto bres nas ni//bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs//khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma//stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis
34b7(rgyud): bar du cod pa'i bgegs chen rnams//ro la rkam pa'i za stangs kyis//rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs//de bzhin ma byos de nyid brlag/mu ka
35a1(rgyud): /bsod byed dur kun mgo/spro gnag gyad kyi 'gying stabs kyis//stir chung za zhing gtso la stobs//khro gnyer spyan bgrad mtsho gtsigs shing //spyan gsum 'dzi
35a2(rgyud): pa'i sdang mig can//mchi tshogs mang po 'khor du byas//'dod chags 'joms mo'i za byed ma//thal chen rag tas sku brgyan cing //dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang
35a3(rgyud): thod rlon tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan//ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni//mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol//se ral kha yi tshul dag tu//thod rlan mang po'i phreng bas brgya ni//
35a4(rgyud): du khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus//tsham ngam brkyang bskumo chen pos ni//zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs//bka' las mi mda' thugs dam skong //srog chags
35a5(rgyud): tshon po'i snying 'dren cing //bsod nams lus kyang che mtsham gsol//spu gris mgo gcod rnge'u rdung zhing //khaM nAM 'phen cing ban da 'thung //gsod la dga' ba'i mu ga ste//
35a6(rgyud): zhags pas 'ching ba'i mkha'agro ma//'jig su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang //dgyes pa chen mo'i spyugs pa yis//se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni//stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig

35b4(rgyud): chen po'i me dkyil dbus//tsham ngam brkyang bsku mtshon pos ni//zhing chen gshi byas pa'i gdan la bzhugs//bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skang //srog tshogs mngo bo'i
35b5(rgyud): snying 'dren cing //bsod nams lus kyang chomachi ma gsol//ban ta ragra tas zhal du stobs//kha T+wAM 'phen cing rnge'u chung rdung //zhing chen za ba'i mu ka ste//'jig su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang //

36b2(rgyud): khro ba nyer spyan bgrang zhal gdangs shing //spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can//gau shog tshogs mang ngos ngargyan du byas//dka' las 'das pa bya byed ra//ma hA ragA ta sa rba
36b3(rgyud): brgyan cing //dngu ge sum phyag drug zhabs bzhir dbrad//zong rlon tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan//ye shes sku yi cha lugs no//mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol//stir chung ngu rung /
36b4(rgyud): po'i tshogs//brgyas nas sgra yi'i rgyan du byas//dur khrod chen po'i myi dkyil dbus//tsham ngam brkyang du zlum chen ngos ni//zhing chen gshing sa pa'i gdan la bzhugs//bka' las mi
36b5(rgyud): 'dar thubs da mi spyong//smig chags na dzo nga ts+tsho na sa 'dren//dasod nams lus kyang che mchem ga sol//ngan d+ha rA ga tas zhal du stobs//dbyug pas glang 'goms rje'u chung rdung //
36b6(rgyud): zhing chen za ba'i mu ka ste//'jig su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang //dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis//se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni//bgegs chen drangs te rgyal bzhin du//khrig
36b7(rgyud): chen po'i zhal du stobs//khrag 'jung chen po'i mkha 'gro na//sta ras glu byad rgya sngags tshig gis//bar chad byed pa'i 'gags chen rnams//ro la brkam pa'i rnga stangs kyis//rab tu dring
37a1(rgyud): /la tshul bzhin du//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs//de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/muka sod byed bya rog mgo/'thing nag gyad kyi 'gyeng stabs can//rdo rje glang 'brem/
37a2(rgyud): spu bris gcod//ban dar khrag chen gtso la stobs//khro gnyer sbyin bgrad zhal gdangs shing //'jig su rung ba'i sdang mig can//gshog tshogs mang po'i rkyen du byas//zhing bcu gsod
37a3(rgyud): cing za byed ma//ma hA ra gA tas sku brgyan cing //dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad//thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan//ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni//mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i
37a4(rgyud): g.yang gzhi gsol//stir chung ngu mang po'i tshogs//bskyes nas sku yi brgyan du byas//dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus//tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni//zhing tshon gshigs
37a5(rgyud): pa'i gdan la bzhugs//bka' las mi 'da' thugs de mo skong //srog tshogs mang po'i snying 'dren cing //bsod nams sku yang chem chem gsol//kha T+wA~M 'phen cing rde'u chung rdung //
37a6(rgyud): 'jig su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang //dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis//sa gol snol mar gtogs nas ni//bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du//khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du sto//
37a7(rgyud): khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha 'gro ma//stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis//bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams//ro la rkam pa'i za stangs kyis//rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du//
37b1(rgyud): du nan nas //do zhon ma n+d+ha/ma/sod spyo ga pa ga/nas sa sa//ga gnyis pan sa twAg can sa
37b2(rgyud): skyeng 'drin tshul du//khro ga nyer spyan ba grad mchog cigs shing //ga su rung ba'i snang mig can//ga sh+log tshogs meng po'i rgyun b+hUstu//shAkhrug zla bA mkha 'grom/hUM gA sa
37b3(rgyud): sku brgyan cings//dbu gsum phyog druge zhabs bzhir bgrang //thod rlon tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan//ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni//mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol//stir chung
37b4(rgyud): dri med po'i tshogs//brgyus naso sku yi brgyan du byas//du khyod chen po'i mi chen dbus//tsham ngam brkyad bsku ma chen pos ni//zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs//dwaka
37b5(rgyud): las mi 'da' thugs dam skyong //srog tshogs chen po'i snying 'dren cing //bsod nams lus kyang chemache me gsol//lcags kyus 'dren cing rde'u drung rol//'jig su rung ba'i rkan
37b6(rgyud): sgra dang //dgyes pa chen mo'i skyugs pa yis//se grol stsol mer gtogs nas nI//bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du//khrag 'thung sbyin pa'o zhal du stobs//khrag 'brul
37b7(rgyud): chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma//sta bo sa glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis//bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams//rol brkam pa'i za stangs kyis//rab tu drings la tshul bzhin du//
38a1(rgyud): khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs//de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/khA hi khA hi/rdo rje bka'i pho nya rnams//rdo rje bran mo gtam brag can//'jigs pa'i gzugs

44b1(rgyud): mo rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang /gdug pa'i mtshon dang chas nas gnas par mdzad do//de bzhin gshogs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba las rnam par bsgyur ba'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo skye la
44b2(rgyud): ran pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das gtum pa chen mo dang /rnam par sbyar ba'i tshogs rmongs pa sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dgyes par mdzad de 'di dang phyung bas kun tu g.yo ba chen po mdzad/
44b3(rgyud): do//oM sarba mA hA kA ru Ni kI ya ma hA shrI he ru ka sarba kha tha ma/d+hU pa tsa mo hA tsaN Da hUM hUM hUM/phaT phaT phaT/oM ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ma hA dad na he ru ka sarba kha ta ma d+h+ya/paM tsa ma hA tsan Da traM traM traM/
44b4(rgyud): phaT phaT phaT/oM sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA yau/ma hA shrI pUh+ma hi ru ka sarba khat+ta mab+h+ya/dzigr-i phaT phaT+Ta phaT/oM sarba mahAk+Sha ru Ni kA ya/ma hA shrI kar+m+ma he ru ka sarba khe ta ma d+hu/pa tsA mA hAtsa
44b5(rgyud): ha ha/hUM hU hU~M/phaT phaT phaT/hA li ha la ha la hUM/oM sarba ma hA kA ru Ni ka yai/dud d+ha lo tsa ne DA ki ni/ha na ha na ha na/hUM hUM hUM phaT/oM sarba ki ru Ni kA ya/badz+ra lo tsa na ma hA DA ki mi d+ha ka d+ha kats+tsha
44b6(rgyud): hUM hUM phaT/oM sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ra da na laM tsa na D+ha ki ni/pa tsa pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/oM sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/mahA pad+me lo tsaN+Da DA ki ni d+ha ha d+ha ha d+ha hU~M/hUM hUM hUM phaT/aM sarba ma hA k+Sha du ni kAM/
44b7(rgyud): karme lo tsa na ma hA ny+dzi ki na tshan d+ha tshin d+ha/hUMhUMd+h+waM/hr-ihr-ihriM/ha hohaM/phaT phaT Ta/a ru lu ka ra//oM du tsi ri/oM ru lu dr-i ma haM/oM ru wu be ti li/oM ru lu tsan Da li/
45a1(rgyud): !/ru lu g+hA sa ma raM/oMR+YA la? smA sha ra/bin d+ho bin d+ha/g+hur b+hA pa g+hu ma/hA na han ta na/tsAt+sASh+Ta/phaT phaT/oM tsi rA kA rA sa da ha to/oM gaur ka ra byA gr-ihI te/oM tsi rukaka8/
45a2(rgyud): smika te/oM ts+tshi nI kai ke t+ta hUM/i ki kakar/ka phaT paH/oM gr-It+ta kair ben tsa ma he he phaT/haMstai kaM ra u lu ka/'dzi/35Ta/ma hA tsa dung lo nan d+haha ta/
45a3(rgyud): hU~M/phaT phaT/b+h+yo b+hU b+h+r-i b+h+yo b+h+yo b+hU/b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/b+huM b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yAM b+hU b+h+yo/b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yAM/ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu/khA hi Sha hi khA hi khA hi ShA ti tsA
45a4(rgyud): baiTu phaT phaT/sa mA yaM saM maM ya/yau gaM yaM gaM ni phaT phaT phaT/hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod pas thams cad rab tu brgyal/rab tu sngangs/rab tu m+b+hos/rab tu bsgral bar gyur to//bsnams
45a5(rgyud): shing gsol nas mi gnas par mdzad do//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mnyes pa las sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das sku
45a6(rgyud): gsung zags rngam pa'i sbubs kyis dza dza dza dz+ha hU~M hoHzhes par mdzad do//mngon spyod kyi las kyi sbyor ba sbyor ba chen po mdzad do/gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mdzad nas gsang ba'i yum
45a7(rgyud): gyi pad+ma yengasu sangs pa'i nang du sems can gyi tshogs byang chub semasu mdzad nas mkha' pheb ste sra su bskyed par mdzad de mdzad nas dran pa rnyed do//sangs rgyas kyi sku bsam
45b1(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa/me dpung bsam gyis me khyab pa/mtshon cha dang dbu dang zhal mang zhing spyi bu zhes byed pa sngangs shing gsod par mthong ste smras pa/rab tu 'jigs pa'i khro bo rnams/shin tu/
45b2(rgyud): bde ba'i ga nas shig ni//bton pa skal po rab tu chung //da ni ci mdzad la gor mdzod//lha cig rje cig 'on zhes smras pa'i tshig gis sems can gyi mtshan ma 'byongs par gyur par mkhyen
45b3(rgyud): to//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos rab tu smos la gnod long shig/rjel gus par dam nos lI/'di la gnas par skal med pas//phyi yi dkyil 'khor sa la 'dug
45b4(rgyud): ces bka' stsal pas gadrangs brtas par gyur te/rdo rje breni mo'i mna' bor nas smras pa/skye mchog lha rje su zhig lags//'bangs dang bka' stsal bdag cag nyan//phyi yi
45b5(rgyud): gnasu gnasu bgyi//ma srid bran g.yog 'khor yug rnams//'jigs pa'i skus ni bzhe suM gastsol//ci mdzad khyod mkhyen gzhesu gsol//yun du skal ldan gzhus su gsol//
45b6(rgyud): bdag cag 'jig rten skyong ba rnams//de rang ngam mo nas blan chad tu//'khor rnams skyongs par mi bgyid dam//bka' bzhin las kun mi sgrub bam//theg pa 'dzin la mi stong tam//
45b7(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor ma zin na//de lta bzhin du 'jigs pa dang //shi nas dmyal bar sheg ces smras te mna' bor ro//de nas khrag 'thung chen po cang mi gsung bar/
46a1(rgyud): bzhubyas pa las rab tu bstong byed ma dang //tshangs pa mo dang /bzhon nu mo dang /dngang ma dang brub myo dang /baspyod chen mo dang rdo rjer dadod chen mo dang /mam rlag
46a2(rgyud): par byed ba chen mo dang /phrag mo gsod byed mo dang brtun par mdzad ma dang /brlan par mdzud ma dang /phyag chen mo dang nag mo ral po chen mo dang /rdo rje 'dzin ma tshan mo dang
46a3(rgyud): rngan go ma chen mo dang //rdo rje nan byeng rkyen ma dang //rdo rje yid 'brog par byed ma dang rab tu gcing tu zab mo dang /rdo rje srin mo'i cha byed chenA ma dang /sngo gnag chen ma dang /
46a4(rgyud): nag chen mo dang the con chen mo dang /zhi ba bum sna chen ma dang /las l-i grub pa chen mi dang /bka' nyan par byed ma dang /tsha mo dem gyi gzugs dang drag shul ma dang nya
46a5(rgyud): mor tshul ston ma de dag la sogs pa ma dang /srin mo bu mo rnams rab tu gus par dka' nyan te/rdo rje dran mo bka nyan te/rdo rje dran mor drim blangs nas/ci 'dod las
46a6(rgyud): rnams pa dag cig sa gyid nas man 'byor te'adzisas pa'i bye zu gas dang /mtshon cha dang gnas pa'i gno bcas te lce'-i'i rna ma rdul gnas pa'i las byed par ban mi// /
46a7(rgyud): gdakyil la khor bsgrubs pa bshad de/dkyil la khyer 'i grub nar bcas//dbus su rmug ma rin tar bcig//ba suM ti re m-i la// slong gi
46b1(rgyud): dz+dzaHlas dbus su bco brgyad gzugs yang nang du gsum phyag drug pa//zad pa ban dadamar chen bkang //brgyad dam nyi shu dgu byanan//yang na lnga dung ldan pa la//lnga pa'i migs rgyun
46b2(rgyud): gyis brlab//zad 'phro phud dang ldan pa la//u tsus sta yi sngogs kyis bzlas//thod pa dmar lags btung bya zhing //ming nga mi b+h+yo'ime ru lu yis//mngon sum phyin par bos nas ni/
46b3(rgyud): khe nas rag tas rab gtor te//he ru ka yi las rnams kun//gong nas 'byung ba'i las bzhin bya//sgeg mo na chung de dag la//dbang gi chags pas 'dod spyad de//ta ma la yi du
46b4(rgyud): bus gdab//ci 'dod las rnams grub par sbyin//chags dang bsod dang rgyags pa che//mnyam pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin gyis//tsau ra ka'i 'khor rnams kyang //bzhi yi las la 'jug
46b5(rgyud): par ni//ming tsam 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pa so//bskul na rtse gcig las rnams 'grub//de nas kun tu bzang motshan mos ming tsam du chos thams cad gnas par mkhyen to//
46b6(rgyud): gsang ba sgyu 'phrul chen po 'di bsdu bo chen po mdzad do//de nas sems dpa' rnal 'byor mchog/kun kyang sems dpa' rnal 'byor mchog/chos kun ming tsam rnal 'gyu
46b7(rgyud): yin//ma tsa me rnal 'byor ma yin par//sems dpa' rnal 'byor 'ga' yang mod//de nyid dus gsum rang bzhin te//de nyid kun du bzang mo mchog/sgyu 'phrul dro
47a1(rgyud): rgyud dag las//sems mardo rje dag las//gsang ba'i nges don gang yang med//ces chos thams cad 'dus pa chen mor mkhyen to//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
47a2(rgyud): kyi he ru ka 'dus po chen mo'i dkyil 'khor te le'u bcu gnyis pa'o////a nI/rgyu nyid stong pas 'bros bu mngon sum po//byin gyis ba rlab tu med pas byin gyis brlab pas 'grub//
47a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas mdzad pa nyid kyang sems can yin zhes rgyal ba sa gsungs//de nyid mi mdzad med par shes pa kun gyi nang ni rab tu bsngags//chags pa mi gtong chags pa med pa
47a4(rgyud): mngon sum dgongs pa yin pas dkyil 'khor gong ma kun gyi dang //sgrub la dga' bas bsgrub du med phyir sgrubs pas 'grub ces rgyal bas rab tu gsungs//pho mo med phyir pha ma
47a5(rgyud): snang la dga' ba spyod brtson rgyal bas 'grub ces bsgrub pa kun gyis grisungs//stong par rtogs la spyod la g.yel ba rnal 'byor min zhes rgyal bas gsungs/med la gtod cing
47a6(rgyud): dge sdig 'tshal ba sdig can yin par rab tu gsungs//med la gtod cing dge sdig yod phyir brtson par 'grub ces theg pa kun las 'byung //bag dang mi ldan rang bzhin medad par/
47a7(rgyud): gnas pa la//gtso mchog mi bkur/dungs phyin tshes la mi brtson sems can yin par mngon sum gsal bar snang //de bas sgyu 'phrul gsang ba mchog 'di bu rnams gang
47b1(rgyud): na na pas//rnas par brnams pa pag dang stan pa pos pa ba nasar+b+ba//shA tsunan rdun sa smra par bus ldanags na yon//
47b2(rgyud): chog sa dadapas sangs rgyas ma sus kun la mchod pa rgyan pa man//la ma mI mongs pa sad rnaM slo dben pa 'o// kyis /phrul ba da/rnal de
47b3(rgyud): rnams rab tu 'dun pa chen po skyes te/ma dang chen po kA ba stis mchod//dkyilal ba dang btsun du ma chags//gnyis pa gas pa'i mchod pa'o//gsang de
47b4(rgyud): hU~M ga/sa pa'i sbyin las bdu rnams ga // 'du g+h+ra/tshigs kyi min smra//dus pasum d+hA tum rdzu ga/'al la mangs pa
47b5(rgyud): san dang ldan pas /A kya na tu yin/ ldan sa rgyas pa sal byanas
47b6(rgyud): /da de/ na nyid nges pa'i rnamachen pa / rgyam na dis kun tu chen po la rgyun /
47b7(rgyud): /sangs kyis kun kyi rnam kyi/rnas byo na gyigs ma chog 'di//gnas gas can zhugs na du/
48a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i spangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba bla ma'i longs spyod chen po phyogs bcu dus bzhini de bzhin ga shegs pa rnams
48a2(rgyud): cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yin d+han phrin las rdo rje'i bdag nyid can/ma lus mI lus lus pa med pa thams cad kyangs so mo yin tha mo ded dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te/shin tu
48a3(rgyud): gsang ba bla ma chen po'i dbyings 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na/gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo gsal ba la ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas
48a4(rgyud): khang na mkha'i dbyings ltar rgya phyogs bcur yongasu ma chud pa/yon tAn bla mchen po dpag tu med pas rgyas pa'i phyir gru gzhir gyur pa/lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che bla ma'i glo
48a5(rgyud): 'bur bzhis mdzes pa/rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad so so ma yin tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes bla mas kun du
48a6(rgyud): 'khrul pa ye shes bla ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyibs dang /kha dog la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad par du gyur pa/lags pa/tshad dpag tu med pa/ye shes
48a7(rgyud): rin po che bla ma'i phreng ba dang /chun 'phyang dang /shar bu'i rgyan dang gzugs dang /sgra dang drir reg bya la sogs pa mo sgrib pa ro gsal bar rang byung la/gsal ba'i rgyan khyad
48b1(rgyud): bar tan bla mas klubs pa/tshad mod pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can/rnam par thur pa brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa/phyi dang nang med pa kun tu yang bla ma chen po nang du gyur pa/shin
48b2(rgyud): du gsang ba bas khyab bdal ba'i bla ma chen po'i gzhal yas khang ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i khri/mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i khri dang /stobs glang po che'i khri dang /rdzu 'phrul rta'i khri dang /dbang
48b3(rgyud): rma bya'i khri dang /thogs pa med pa na mkha' lding gi khri dang /rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang /gos pa med pa pad ma rin po me'i gdan brtsegs pa ni/ye nas
48b4(rgyud): gsang ba bla ma'i phyir//yum gyi gzhal yas phyogs bcur 'bar//ye nas pha rol phyin pa'i phyir//thogs pa med pa'i khyi rkang brtan//rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal phyir//nyi zla
48b5(rgyud): brtsegs pa'i gdan 'bar zhing //gdod nas dri ma med pa'i phyir//rnam par dag pa pa mo gdan//re ba yid bzhin skong ba'i phyir//yid bzhin rin chen gter gyi gang no//ma bsags
48b6(rgyud): lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i phyir//sna tshogs dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyan//yon tan chen po'i gdan stangs na//sku mdun dang rgyab mod par thams cad du zhal bla ma tha le bar gsal zhing mtshan
48b7(rgyud): dang dpe byad du ldan pas thams cad du bsam gyis mi khab pa'i sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las sna tshogs par snang ba/thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul
49a1(rgyud): zhugs kyi skyil mau krung du bzhugs pa/ye shes drug gi phyag ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i phyag rgya nAn/sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum
49a2(rgyud): dang ldan pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gi shegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po bla ma dang /btsun mo dam pa sra ba'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang /de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi
49a3(rgyud): rgyal po bla ma dang /btsun mo dam pa snang ba'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang /de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po bla ma dang /btsun mo dam pa mnyen pa'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang /de bzhin
49a4(rgyud): gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po bla ma dang /btsun mo dam pa dro ba'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang /de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po bla ma dang /btsun mo dam pa bskyed pa'i dbyings
49a5(rgyud): kyi bla ma la sogs pa ye shes rgyal po stangs dbyal kun kyang mthing ka dang /dkar po dang /ser po dang /leb rgan dang /ljang khu'i mdog bla mar 'tsher ba ste gnyisu med par
49a6(rgyud): 'khril bas chos kyi dbyings kun du mtha' yas par bla ma chen po'i spyod pas khyab pa ni 'di lta ste dper na til gyi gang bu 'am mngar gyi snam bu bzhin kun tu bde ba chen pos khyab
49a7(rgyud): par bzhug so//de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong dbang bla ma dang /btsun mo gzigs par bya bo'i bla ma dang /byang chub chen po rdo rje thos dbang bla ma dang /btsun mo gsan par bya
49b1(rgyud): bo'i bla ma dang /byang chub chen po rdo rje sdom dbang bla ma dang /btsun mo bsnam par bya ba'i bla ma dang /byang chub chen po rdo rje myong dbang bla ma dang /btsun mo myang bar bya ba'i bla ma dang /byang chub chen po//
49b2(rgyud): rdo rje sogs shos bla ma dang /btsun mo sgrol ma'i bla ma dang /byang chub chen po rdo rje gcod shes bla ma dang /btsun mo gdug pa'i bla ma dang /byang chub chen po rdo rje 'jug shes bla ma dang /btsun
49b3(rgyud): mo char 'bebs bla ma dang /byang chub chen po rdo rje 'dus pa'i bla ma dang /btsun mo rgyas pa'i bla ma dang /'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg g.yas bla ma dang /btsun mo rtag par ma yin pa'i bla mad
49b4(rgyud): 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg g.yon bla ma dang /btsun mo chad par ma yin pa'i bla ma dang /'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg gsang bla ma dang /btsun mo bdag tu ma yin pa'i bla ma dang /'joms pa
49b5(rgyud): chen po rdo rje reg 'dus bla ma dang /btsun mo mtshan mar ma yin pa'i bla ma dang /de lta bu'i tsho gas brjod kyis mi leng ba dang gnyi su med par gsang ba dgyes pa'i dbyings bla man bzhug so//
49b6(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i cho gas dang gnyis med pa'i dkyil 'khor bla ma de nyid kyi gsang ba bla ma 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo //
49b7(rgyud): e ma'o de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid dbang sgyur dkyil 'khor bla ma'i dang /ngang nyid rnam dag bde mchog gsang ba'i dbyings//dbyings nyid mnyam sbyor ba de mchog rin chen gter//mi
50a1(rgyud): /zad gtor lan bdud rtsi gsang ba'i bla//bla med byang chub theg lo ya mtshan dkyil 'khor snang //rlung snang ba nyid ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan rnam dag snang ba ni//sku gsung thug
50a2(rgyud): yon tan phrin las sel med pa'i yod bzhin rin chen mi zad par ldan brgyan gyi 'khor lo bla ma rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid do//rdo rje gsang ba bla ma'i dris don du'o//gsang ba'i stong
50a3(rgyud): de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla mA las dbyings dang ye shes gsang ba'i bde ba'i rgyu ma nges pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das yid byed pa blo mdze rje kun tu bzang
50a4(rgyud): thams can ma lus pa'i tshul rdo rjes btsun mo bye ba mo kun tu bzang po'i bla ma la 'jug par gyur to//gasrung ba'i bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do//oM chos kyi chos nyid bya ba
50a5(rgyud): dbyings//kun tu bzang mo bde ba'i yum//ma gau yos rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni//bdag yin bdag gi spyod yul bas//phyag rgya sna tshogs so sor gsal//nub phyogs 'og
50a6(rgyud): mon gnas mchog du//ma tshugs pad+ma'i gdan gting ba//dus gsum rgyal ba gzhugs pa'i gnas//rnam par thar pa'i sgo gzhi la//phyag rgya bzhi dang yang dag ldan//dbang
50a7(rgyud): med skal ngan gsal ba'i phyir//nang gtan phyi rim lcags dang ldan//rgyal ba yongs kyis gsang ba'i chos//sus kyang gting dpag dka' bo ste//kun tu bzang po nyid kyis
50b1(rgyud): gzigs//hU~M nas btsun mo bya ba ma kun du bzang mas gsang ba bla ma'i tshogs 'di ched du brjod do//oM sems kyi sems nyid byed pa'i gca//kun tu bzang po rdo rje yid//ye shes brgya
50b2(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin te//shar phyogs mngon dga' bsam yas nas//ni la lta bu'i gter byin pa//gsang 'dus 'phrul gyi lde mgo gis//rnam par thar pa'i sgo phye ste//byang chub mchog gi/
50b3(rgyud): nang bstan bkrol//ma tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs//'gro don byang chub sems po skyed de//'gro lnga skye zhing dbang du bsdus//sku gsung thugs nas dbang bsku rau zhes gleng ngo //de
50b4(rgyud): nas bya ba mo kun du bzang mo sa gsang ba bla ma'i mchod pa 'di ched du phu lo//oM rin chen pod+ma'i dkyil 'jamo 'di//'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'bul lcags kyis//blo med 'phrul gyi lnga
50b5(rgyud): mig ste//dgyes mchog rdo rje gsor nas ni//bdud rtsi char che ni dbab tu gsol zhes tshod du blang ngo //de nas yang yid byed pa po rdo rje kun du bzang pos bdud rtsi bla ma'i char pas snod
50b6(rgyud): bcud kyi 'dzam bu'i gling tshim par bya ba'i phyir gsang ba bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do//oM rdo rje bla ma'i dgyes rab 'di//gsor nas bdud rtsi'i char dbab phyir//'dzum zhing 'khyi
50b7(rgyud): ba'i gan su gsar//mi dmigs bod dang spro ba 'dis//kun du bzang mo dbyingasu bskyil zhes ched du gleng ste//gnyi su med pa las nyid kyi spyod yul thams cad gsang ba'i dkyil
51a1(rgyud): 'khor bla ma khyad par du spags pa rdul phra mo snyed 'thon nas sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par mdzad pa ni//la la ni gsang ba bla ma'i dkyil 'khor
51a2(rgyud): du zhugs te yan lag thams cad rdo rjer byin gyis rlob/la la ni 'gro ba dru ga gdul ba'i dron du thub pa chen po drug tu bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/lha'i gnas na brgya byin mgon//
51a3(rgyud): lha ma yin la thag zangs ris//mi la bdud 'dul shAkya mgon//yi dag gnas na kha 'bar bde//byil song seng gi nyid du smre//dmyal ba la ni gshin rje mgon//sku dang cha lugs
51a4(rgyud): tshul ston cing //la la ldum zhugs sku la bltam//la la tshul srung rab tu byung //la la bsnyen rdzogs dka' thub byed//la la dam nod 'gro pa sgrol//la la bcu drug chos
51a5(rgyud): la btsud//la la me 'bar chur yang 'brug/la la na mkha'i sgra ru 'bar//la la rdo rje brag tu sra//la la gso gsod 'phram rgyal byed//le lo bcing sgrol 'gug sgrol byed//
51a6(rgyud): la la bdud 'dul ngan song sbyong //la la dkyil 'khor mchod sprin 'khril//kun kyang chos kyis 'khor lo skor//de ltar rtag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'di lta ste//thag
51a7(rgyud): pa dang po bcu drug mgon//gnyis pa bzhi yi lta spyod bsrung //gsum pa bcu gnyis nges par bstan//bzhi pa gnyis kyi lta spyod sbyangs//bzhi pa'i theg pa mdor bsdus
51b1(rgyud): na/bla mad thog pa'i dpyos bcud//theg pa pa ni ngas 'byung la//theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur glanas//kun 'byung dkyil 'khor sgyu 'phrul che//mang la 'brel pas dra ba da//
51b2(rgyud): thun mong men pas gsang ba'i don//theg pa'i bcud de snying po'i dbyings zhes ched du gleng ste//snod bcud kyi 'jig rten rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang bar gnas bsgyur ba dang /phyogs
51b3(rgyud): bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba bla mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gzigs mos gnyis par gyur to//de nas snod bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang /sgrogs
51b4(rgyud): ma med par gsang ba bla ma'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par sangs rgyas nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do//e ma'o rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags//
51b5(rgyud): skye mched khams rnams mang po kun//byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid//sa chu spyan dang mA ma ki//me long gos dkar sgrol ma ste//nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma//
51b6(rgyud): srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas zhing //thams cad ma lus chos so cog/sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin//sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos//sangs rgyas
51b7(rgyud): kyis mi rnyed do//zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad kyis ched du brjod
52a1(rgyud): pa 'di gsung sa//e ma'i phyogs bcu'i stong khams yonas dpon//spyod pa gsum nyod dag pa nong //stogasam lnga nyid bdo ldan gnas//phung po lta nyid mngon sangs/
52a2(rgyud): rgyas//thams cad mtshig gi snying po ba so//gzhan du rtul bas chos mi btsal//nying las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos//btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed do//zhes brjod pas chos ba
52a3(rgyud): ye nas sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to//de nas dbyings dang ye shes gnyi su med pa las ched du brjod pa 'dri brjod do//e ma'o yanas gsang ba'i chos
52a4(rgyud): sna tshogs snang ba rang bzhin gsang //gzhan du min la shin tu gas pa//gsang mo chog snying po bla na med//thams cad gsang po'i dbyingasu nges//bla ma mchog gi snying po las//sangs
52a5(rgyud): rgyas sems can gnyi su med ces brjod pas thams cad dbyingasu nges par mkhyen te//de ltar yin na yang 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pas 'gro ba'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab par
52a6(rgyud): smin pa la thugs rje chen po sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir rdo rje bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do//e ma'o bde gshegs snying po las//rang gi rnam rtog las
52a7(rgyud): kyis sprul//sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang //gnas dong sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i//bdag deng bdag gir so sor 'dzin//sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de//
52b1(rgyud): / na nas nga stsan//rnam khyong du tu rgyun nusas//rgyun nam lum du du dbyar//khyod sa mod rnam par grol med par// nas pan drugasusas smranas//stsa
52b2(rgyud): nga srid pa/ su so// m+b+hir smi ni de rmugs pa rnams snang ma mas sa la
52b3(rgyud): bya hUM / dwags du da// ni btsun pa'i sems sbyi ni//dgas dag pa dag sa myed de/ du ma dus
52b4(rgyud): /d+d+ha sa rgyas 'byung// Sh+ku di sa rten / mi sa sa drug na
52b5(rgyud): sbyin byed//rten dang byug ts+tsha tshul rnams can//TI la 'bru ning du ro ba skyed//sangs rgyas stong gi tshul 'a khor dang //snang dbul gnyis kyi phyag d+hA slong / ba la 'a
52b6(rgyud): tshum bzhin du/ na gyim brgyan skyes pa'o//ngas pa'i bzhi rdzob ma//bying sa mi shes/sa dkyus kyi nyis shi kyis la na kyi byeng zag/
53a1(rgyud): ni rnam par snang mdzad do//yul la kun du bzang mo'o//batshor bA rin tshon 'thung ldan to//yul la khams gsum byams ma'o//ha 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas te//
53a2(rgyud): yul lan bza' dkar mo'o//ho 'du byed don yod grub pa ste//yul la dam tshig sgrol ma'o//hi rnams shes rdo rje sems dpa'i sti//yul la yangs pa'i sgra ni can ma//ho dmigs/
53a3(rgyud): la sa'i snying po ste//yul la dkar mo skrag chen no//to sna la nam mkha' snying po ste//yul la me tog dpal phreng rtsi'o//hol+le la spyan ras dbang phyug ste//yul la chos kyi dbyangs
53a4(rgyud): can no//ho rna bar phyag na rdo rje ste//yul la las kyi gar mkhan ma'o//ho kun 'dus sgrib pa rnams sel te//yul la me tog char 'bebs so//kun shes kun du bzang po ste//
53a5(rgyud): yul la gsal ba'i sgrol ma'o//ho gcod shes byams pa'i bdag nyid do//yul la gdug pa'i sprin 'phro ho//'jug shes 'jam dpal gzhan nu ste//yu laM la tsan dan chad
53a6(rgyud): 'babs so//g.yas gnyis stobs chen khro bo sto//yul la gdong ma 'jigs tshul ho//g.yon gnyis gshin rje gshed po ste//yul la sder 'phro 'jigs tshul to//
53a7(rgyud): gsang ba rta mgrin dpa' bo ste//yul la dar khrod bdag mo'o//lte bar bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste//yul la gtum mo 'jigs tshul ho//rgyud drug 'khor ba'i gnas drag tu/
53b1(rgyud): /bu drug phyag rgya chen po'o//kun du sku dang kun du gsung //kun du thugs kyi phyag rgyu yang //lus ngag yad la de bzhin to//sems nyid rdzu 'phrul dra ba ste//rgya ma'i cho 'phrul tshon pa las//
53b2(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu lnga//gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nges pa las//snying po'i dkyil 'khor bla ma yin//zhes brjod pas sems ce na thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs
53b3(rgyud): rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang dbyer med par dgyes te//mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings na bzhugasaso//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma las dbyings dang ye
53b4(rgyud): shes gnyisu med pa'i ngang du sems kyi rang bzhin tsor yang 'grub pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang bzhin gcig dang du mar dbyer med pa'i
53b5(rgyud): rang bzhin thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la nyid kyi tsha ba'i dkyil 'khor bla ma 'di dbyung bar bzhes nas ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs//oM ye shes bla
53b6(rgyud): ma rol pa yis//phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar brtags ni//dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub//rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas//kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen po
53b7(rgyud): spyod//'khor lo rtsobs bzhi mu khyud bcas//glu chad bzhis rgyan rdo rje'i khyams//kun du gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan//rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin//dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis
54a1(rgyud): kyis brgyan//sang+ga glang chen rta dang khyung //na mkhar lding gi khri chen la//nyo zla pad+ma rin po che//gdan la rdzogs dang sems da'i rdul//'khar la rgyal ba rgyal
54a2(rgyud): mo dang //g.yas nas mthong thes snum pa dang //myong dang btsun ma'i cho ga su bcas//gru chad la ni gcod byed dang //snang byed sogs byed 'jug byed rnams//btsun mo'i tshogs
54a3(rgyud): dang bcas par gnas//bar khyams la ni thub drug dag/rgyud drug sbyang ba'i phyag rgyar gnas//de bzhin thog le chen po dog/mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dag/bya ba dag ni gnas par/
54a4(rgyud): bstan//sgo khyad bzhi la 'joms pa dag/btsun mo'i tshigs dang ldan par gonas//rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che//pad+ma'i ral gri nor bu 'bar//ud dpal klu shing la sogs mtshan/
54a5(rgyud): mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin//mthing ka dkar po ser le brgan//ljang ku la sogs sna tshogs mdog/minyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhin tshul can//gsal 'char lhan/
54a6(rgyud): sdug gzo byin 'bar/'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po//'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa ste//mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yin//dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub
54a7(rgyud): he zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad tu dkyil 'khor bla ma chen po brjed kyis me lang bzheng gi rdul rnyed tu gsal bar gyur te/
54b1(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa banan mad tshogs dang gnyisu med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba bla ma 'di sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin pas 'di dag phyung nga //a ho//da mchog
54b2(rgyud): ngo mtshar byang chub sems chen po//thig le mnyam sbyor sgyu 'phrul bla ma'i dbyings//rnam dag thig le byang chub sems kyi snga rol//ngo mtshar rmad byung bla ma chen po'i dbyings//haM dmigs bya
54b3(rgyud): dmigs byed mi dmigs gsang ba'i dbyings//yaM shes rad rigs dkyil 'khor bla ma bsam mi khyag/mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab gsong ba'i dbyings//ye shes kun gas le dkyil
54b4(rgyud): 'khor spros med bla ma'i ngang //ho/rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//gsang ba'i snying po nges pa'i bla ma chen po las dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u gsum pa'o///de nas ye shes rgyal po de
54b5(rgyud): btsun mo bla ma'i dbyings dang gnyisu med par gyur nas//bde ba chen po byang chub kyi sems rim par gsal ba zhes bya ba'i dgongs brtser che ba nas ting 'dzin gyi rnam pa phyogs bcu dus
54b6(rgyud): bzhir dgade par bzhed nas sku gsung thugs bla ma'i dbyings nas 'di dag phyung //dang po bla ma'i lung bstan pa//mtshon du med pa'i byang chub sems//ye shes snying po gsol ba dang kha sgom//
54b7(rgyud): pa rnam gsum dus gcig rdzogs//byang chub sems kyi thig le la//ma bkag lhun gyis rdzogs pas na//de ni thog lo chen po'i don//de ni de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings//de na kun
55a1(rgyud): du snang ba'i ngang //de ni rgyu yi rim par ldan to//gsang ba bla ma'i tshig tu'o//gsang ba bla ma'i d+he s+ya donu las//gsang ba gsung gi dkyil 'khor grags//bruM bi shwa/
55a2(rgyud): ki pyaM ra go raM ti/ha pradz+dzi d+hi ka/ti badz+ra ra ti/k+Shi hi rA dza ya hUM la se sa ma ya staM/traM a gdai b+ha ya/tr-i ma le sa ma ya ho/hri ha ho pad me ban d+ha ma/hI gi ra to rA ga ya haM/d+hI ku ru pa na hriH
55a3(rgyud): /a ni ra ti rA ga yaM mo//ma d+he ri ni swA hA/dza du pa pre bi sha/tha ling ni swa ra ma be yA swA hA/hUM puSh+pa a b+he sha/hUM swa rA dzA ya swA hA/baM d+hu pi suk+Sha ni/muM shri AM ri bag ya swA hAM/hAM ga na d+he tsita/
55a4(rgyud): ta/aM mu ne kr-ing swA hA/oM mu ne hUM druM swA hA//oM mu ne br-i swA hA//e mu ne suM swA hA/oM mu ne k+ShaM swA hA//oM mu ne ya swA hA/hUM ye mAn ta kr-ita phaT/oM ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM
55a5(rgyud): phaT/hUM pradz+nyA nA ta krita phaT/a ma hA ra da na d+ha ra ma hA kA d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la naM hU~M phaT/hUM pad mA ni ta kri ta hUM phaT/oM mi hA pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/oM big+h+nAn ta krite hUM phaT/
55a6(rgyud): oM ma hA karma d+ha ra ma hA ko d+ha shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/oM ye h+ye hi b+ha ga bA ni/ma hA ka ru ni ka tI sha ho//sa ma s+t+waM/dzA hUM ba ha~M/oM e hUM swA hA/badz+ra sa ma ya/badz+ra sa ma~M ya/badz+ra sa ma ya/
55b1(rgyud): 'dus pa la//da sa /mAnAd+d+hA rgyu u sa rgyal pa/ku zhugs//yanatan sbyin+d+ha smras chu pam//rgyun nus byung chu sum sa na ga/ ny+tsam sbyar byas/
55b2(rgyud): bdag steng gA/oM badz+rI sa ya /oM bad+hAsam y-i / sa pa ya hU~M// ta nas gsungs du su gsungan dkrol 'khor dumatshan pas med garten dugs
55b3(rgyud): rnams cid du grags/rab tu glegs kun tu grag sa//grags kyis snod bcu gi rten rnams cid kyi dkyi ba'i khyer tham chen pos sgrub par gyur te//de na la ma
55b4(rgyud): rgyal bltangs daspyil dag gnyi su med par ram po mdzad pa bla ma la thim par gyur te/de nas ye shes rgyal ba de nyid dang byin pa sdu ba zhes bya ba 'di gsu thugs de rdu las byung ngo //
55b5(rgyud): oM chos dbyings mnyam pa che na po las//ye shes gsal bya rnam par dag/chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis//sgyu med che snre la dbang sgyur shog/oM ma~M hU~M kud+ha mA sh+tsan+da na d+hi man
55b6(rgyud): swab+hA ba spyod mako haM/hUM dag cing gsal ba'i rang bzhin te//skyon med sems nyid rin pa tshe//mi yod lta bu'i ye shes kyis//srid pa gsum la dang drim+b+ha shig/ mo gu
55b7(rgyud): U daM shA twe na badz+ra swa b+hA bi ad ma ko ha/swa khams gsumar skang rgyal ba ste//yid bzhin rin chen gtor gyi mchag/mnyam po nyid kyi ye shes kyis//'gro bar skyong rgyal po
56a1(rgyud): oM ma hA bud+d+ha ma hA sa mun ta a byai shadz+nyA nA badz+ra sa b+hA ba Ad makau hA~M/oMnyes pa'i skyon bral dri ma med//skye 'gag meng pa'i dngos grub ste//so sor rtog pa'i ye shAs/
56a2(rgyud): kyis//srid gsum nyes dmigs sel bar sh+log/oM ma hA bud+d+he ma hA pras+t+ra pra baM sha dz+nyA na badz+ra s+pho b+hA ba Ad ma ko ha/haM dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor mthar phyin cing //grub pa las kyi
56a3(rgyud): bye brag les//bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis//skye 'gro 'byingasu sgrol ba re shog/oM ma hA gu h+ya ma hI krA ta e nu sta na dz+nyA na badz+ro swa b+hA ba Ad mako haM/a ni stong dang mi stong gnyis//dbu
56a4(rgyud): maumi le yang mi gnos shing //stong pa chen po'i ye shes kyis//mo 'gyur dbyings la dbang sgyur shog/oM many+dzu gu h+ya ma hA A be sha shrI n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko he/oM bder ga
56a5(rgyud): hUMsku yi ngo bo las//mi shIgs rdo rje rgyal ba'i gtso//sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis//rdo rje sku yi gtso bo ri shog/oM ma hU~M hU~M N+ya sa~Mrba ta thA gI ta kI ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko
56a6(rgyud): baide gshegs gsung gi ngo bo las//mi shigs rdo rje chos kyi dbyings//stegs dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis//rdo rje gsung gi ngo bor shog/oM ma hUM gu h+ya sarba ti thA ga tA rA ku badz+ras
56a7(rgyud): b+hA pra ad ma ko ha/hU~M bde gshags thugs kyi gtso bo las//mo shigs rdo rje rdo rje'i thogs//sdigs dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis//rdo rje thugs kyis byin rlobs shog/oM ma n+de
56b1(rgyud): gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta tsi ta ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ke hau/sr-i mi 'gyur ba'i zhir khams nas//ma bskyed pa yi 'bras bu lags//ma bsags pa yi longs spyod 'byung //tsaur yang 'grub pa'i ye
56b2(rgyud): shes kyis//rang dbang thabs kyis sbyar bar shog/saM ma hA gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bu dza badz+ro swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM zhes gsungs pas gsal la 'o ba rarA bras thim par gyur to//e ma ngo
56b3(rgyud): mtshar rab 'byam gyi//ngo mtshar ye mtshan gsang ba'i chos//sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das//sna tshogs sgra rnams dbyingasu gsal//gsung gcig yan lag dkyil 'khor ni//
56b4(rgyud): bsam gyis mau khyab khyab mchog dbyings//thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya mchog/ho gsang ba'i snying po nges pa'i bla ma chen po las dkyil 'khor bsdu ba dang gsang sngags kyi le'u ste/
56b5(rgyud): bzhi pa'o////de nas ye shes rgyal po de nyid de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi yan lag thams cad dkyil 'khor bla mar lhun gyis grub pa'i dgongs pa rtser chi ba nas rdo rje bla
56b6(rgyud): ma'i tshig 'di ched du gsungaso//sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i//thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya//gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi//snying po phyag rgya mda' ka'o//mi bskyod nyi
56b7(rgyud): ma'i dkyil yi ge/rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/lnga gnyis zung du spros pa las//sbyar ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu//hUM dang mu gnyis rtse sbyar te//'bru brgyad bsnol nas thugs kar
57a1(rgyud): @m+b+ha//rgyal btsun dang mnyam sbyor ba//dad pa chen bstun pa'i/'bru nams nas thugs kaR+Sha bAkun//TIbang+h+weng rtse mo rdo rje 'ab //zla baN+Dal 'drung
57a2(rgyud): gsal cing //'khril pa'i tshul gyis tshes la brtano//'bru bzhi sgras na thugs kar bkan/mu bsgreng rtse modo dri la gsil 'bar//nyim 'bru lngas la su 'khril//btud de'i rdum
57a3(rgyud): mdangs kyis lte//'khor lho 'bar ba'i lce dbus na//ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' drag/yum mchog yangs ma'i spyan dang na//gnyis med dbyings kyi drung du lakhrol//'bru bzhi spras
57a4(rgyud): nas thugs kur bzhan//oM bsgreng rtsemor 'khor lo 'bar//bla ba rgyal 'bru sbas dril gi sel cing //'khril pa'i tshul gyisaNAM stsal brtan//'bru bzhi skyes nas thugs kar bkan/
57a5(rgyud): laM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar//nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khrol//bi tung nge 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta//shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng ni//bde gshegs rnam par sna
57a6(rgyud): mdzad dag/yum mchog kun du bzang mu dang //gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril//'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs ka rA ba kan/sa rtse 'ab ba rin po che//zla btul 'bru sras dril
57a7(rgyud): gsil zhing //'brel pa'i tshul gyis chos la brtan//'bru spos bzhi nas thugs kar ba kan//maM baspring rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/nyi ma 'dru lngas la su 'khrol//bdud de
57b1(rgyud): 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta//lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs sbrengs nas//bdor gshegs rin chen 'byung ldan dag /yum mchog khams gsum byams ma dang //gnyis mang byang
57b2(rgyud): kyi ngang du bakhril//'bru sbas bzhi ni sa thugs kar bka na//oM bsgreng rtse mor pad+ma 'bar//zla btul 'bru sbas dras gsol zhing //'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la brtan//'bru bzhi sbas/
57b3(rgyud): nas thugs kar bkan//paM bsgrang rtse mor dril gsil 'bar//nyi ma 'bru lngas la su 'khrel//btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta//nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsi bas stangs na//bad
57b4(rgyud): gshegs snang ba mtha' yas drag/yum mechog na bza' dkar mo dang //gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril//'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan//ha bsgreng rtse mor ral gri 'bar/
57b5(rgyud): zla btul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing //'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la brtan//'bru bzhi spos nas thugs ker bka nau//dz+r-IM bsgreng rtsi mir dril gsol 'ab ru/nyi ma 'bru lnga'i las sa
57b6(rgyud): 'brel//btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi lta//byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng sa na//bde gshegs don yod grub pa dang //yum mchog dam tshig sgrol ma dang //gnyis med/
57b7(rgyud): dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril//rin chen myu bu ga yas phyogs na//sgeg cing 'gying ba g.yon phyogs na//sa snying dkar po rdo rje'i rigs//yum mchog dkar mo sgeg chen dang //da
58a1(rgyud): 'khor bar byams shar phyog stan//gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril//ral gyi 'byin pa g.yas phyogs na//phreng ba bgrang ba g.yon phyogs na//dkyir 'khor bar/
58a2(rgyud): khyams lho phyogs na//nam snying ser po rin chen rigs//yum mochog dpal gyi phreng ba dang //gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril//pad+ma dkar po g.yos phyogs na//pi bang 'gyed
58a3(rgyud): po g.yon phyogs na//dkyil 'khor bar khyams nub phyogs na//spyan ras le brgan pad+ma rags//yum mchog chos kyi dbyings mkhan dang //gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril//
58a4(rgyud): rdorje rje lnga go yas phyogs na//grwar gyi cod pan g.yon phyogs na//dkyil 'khor bar khyams byang phyog sen//phyag na mthing kau las kyi rigs//yum mchog gar gyi cod pan dang /
58a5(rgyud): gnyis med dbyings kyi dang du 'khril//mdzes pa'i klu shing g.yas phyogs na//bdug spros 'dron po g.yon phyogs ni//dkyil 'khor bar khyams shar ston/byams pa dkar ser
58a6(rgyud): bde gshegs rigs//yum mchog bdug pa'i sprin 'gro dang //gau nyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril gsor gyi 'khor lo g.yas phyogs ni//me tog 'thor ba g.yon phyogs na/
58a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bar khyams lho nub na/sgrib sel dmar ser rin chen rigs//yum mchog me tog char 'bebs dang //gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril//rin chen snyem
58b1(rgyud): g.yos hU~M gas na//snron ma 'dags pa g.yon phyags na//dkyil 'khar bar khyams nub byung na//kun bzung dmar ljang las kyi rigs//yum mchog gsal ba'i sgrol ma dang //gnyis ma/
58b2(rgyud): dbyings kyi nga du 'khril//ud dpal sngon po g.yos phyogs na//tsan dan 'thor ba g.yeni phyogs na//dkyil 'khor ba rare khyams byang shar ni//'jam dpal dkar ldeng rdo rje'i rags//yus
58b3(rgyud): mchog can dani char 'bebs dang //gnyis med dbyings kyi nang du 'khrul//thub drug phyag rgya chen po ni//rgyud drug gnas nas 'dron pa ste//gseg par phyag rgya tshul 'dzin pas//sku mi ka/
58b4(rgyud): ser ro sna mi rnams 'dren//pi bang phyag rgya tshul 'dzin pas//sku mdog dkar bri lha rnams 'dren//go tshe mdung thung phyag rgya yis//sku mdog mthing nag lha min/'dren//rin chen 'ber ba'i
58b5(rgyud): phyag rgya mis//sku mdog sngon po yi dgaso'i don//po ting rtsegs pa'i phyag rgya yis//sku mdog ser nag byol song 'dren//me 'bur chu 'bebs phyag rgya yis//sku mdog sngon po dmyal da
58b6(rgyud): 'dron//sgo bzhi phyag rgya tshul gnas pa//rdo rje gnod pa g.yas phyog son//lcags kyu 'phen pa g.yon phyogs na//stobs chen khro bo chen po yang //yum michog rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
58b7(rgyud): gnyis mad dbyings kyi deng du 'khril//nil mgo gdengs pa g.yos phyogs na//zhags pa 'phan pa g.yon phyogs na//khro chen gshin rje gshed po yang //yum mchog rdo
59a1(rgyud): pa dang //gnyis med dbyangs kyi ngang du 'khril//sbrul mgo gdengs pa kayas phyogs na//lcags d+d+hi gra s+t+wa ma dgu yon phyogs na//khra chen rta mgrin dpa' bo yang //
59a2(rgyud): yum mchog rdo rje lcags sgrog dang //gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril//rgya gram gnan po g.yas phyogs na//dril bu 'khrol ba g.yon phyogs ni//khro tshan bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yang
59a3(rgyud): yum mchog rdo rje dril 'khyil dang //byang gi sgo nas dbyingasu 'khril//kun bzangs mnyam ga zhag ye shos 'phro//yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+mo'i dkyil//gnyis med dbyings kyi
59a4(rgyud): gsang chen spro//bde mchog ngo mtshar thugs kyi dkyil//spro ba sku rdo rje thal mo dag/bsgyur bas rang sems ye shes gsal//de nyid shes rab thabasu rdzogs//rgyu 'phrul dra ba
59a5(rgyud): nges pa'i bram chen po las phyag rgya spros po'i le'u ste lnga pa'o////de nas ye shes rgyale po de rdo rje bkod pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig rgyan rnam par spros pa'i dgongs pa la gcig/
59a6(rgyud): char bzhugs te/rdo rje gsong ba'i tshig 'di brjed do//shin tu phra ba'i ting 'dzin mchog/dpe dang tshad du mi gzung zhing //gzha la yas phyag rgya la sogs te//mtshon du med la snang
59a7(rgyud): bar bsgom//shin tu phra bas rnams sbyangs te//reg pas rgya khyon tshad med pa//gzhal yas phyag rgya la sogs pa'i//mtshon du maud la snang bar bsgom//phyi nang gsang
59b1(rgyud): ba'o mchod pa dang //rdzogs tshan gnyis las 'grub pa yi//'dod pa lnga yo yon tan rnams//na mkha' mtha' dang mnyam rdzogs te//rags dang phra dang 'bring la sogs//ji ltar 'dod pa
59b2(rgyud): rang gar bya//tsakra li dang tshon ci dag/bya dang mi bye med pas na//de la dgeg par ma gsungs so//'gro don 'tsham pa de bzhin te//sna tshogs mchod pas rgyas par mchod//bdag nyid chen
59b3(rgyud): pos mchod pa yis//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes//srid gsum 'gro ba ma lus kun//dga' ba chen pos tshim pa yin//sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dgongs pa yis//rgyal ba'i
59b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ma lus dang //rigs drag 'gro ba mngon du 'gyur//lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad//gang na'ang yod pa ma yin te//rnam dag ye shes sbyor ba yis//dbyings la
59b5(rgyud): dbyings nyid sgom pa yis//kun byas dbang phyug rig pos 'jug/de nas dad ldan gus 'jug pa//de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des//rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus//bu dang chung ma nor gyi
59b6(rgyud): dbyed//rab tu gces dang yid 'thud dbul//snying yang yon gyi mchog yin te//bla ma mnyes phyir gus ldan dbul//dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na//dkyil 'khor thams cad
59b7(rgyud): mnyes pa yin//gsol ba'i dkyil 'khor smras ci dges//skyon rnams ma lus nges par 'byang //dad ldan brtson 'grus bskyed byas na//phan pa'i dbang dod theg tshad sbyin//des na
60a1(rgyud): dbang phyug rgyal po yis//dbang gi rim pa rnams bstan to//'gro la phan phyir las rnams sbyin//grub pas 'dzin rgyal po sbyin//mi 'gyur rab 'khyam bde chen no//
60a2(rgyud): gang 'dod rims gyis sbyin par bya//blo dang ldan pas theg tshad mod//yang na sras kyi dam po ste//chung ma zos par rdzogs dbang sbyin//sems kyi rnam po nyid khu blud//sgro 'byed pade//
60a3(rgyud): bas gyen du bskyil//de nas dbang phyug chen po des//mi 'gyur sgrol mar sru bskyod cing //sems kyi thig la sgo phye ste//tshangs pa chen po'i dbyangs bzhed nas//gro'i byed rdo rje'i lhag
60a4(rgyud): brkyang ste//dad ldan skyes bu dbang bskur ba//rdzogs pa chen po'i bde dbang ni//cha mchog gong na med pa na//gosang po'i dbu rgyan gyi dbang dang //thabs mkhas byin rlobs che bas na//
60a5(rgyud): las rnams kun gyi dbang dang ni//khams gsum dbang du bsdus pas ni//slob dpon zhal chab kyi dbang ngo //hUM thabs mkhas thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis//rigs kyi bu mchog
60a6(rgyud): dbang bskur phyir//gsang ba'i dbu rgyan 'di bcings pas//rigs kyi bu mchog deng phan chad//'jig rten che ba kun gyi bla//tsha ba'i che bo zil gyis gnon//sangs rgyas che
60a7(rgyud): ba'i mchod gonas ni//rnal 'byor chen po khyod nyid yin//oM sarba ta thA ga to gu h+ya badz+ra rad na ma ku tA dI trAM//badz+ra gu h+ya sid d+hi hU~M//hUM thabs mkhas byin rlabs chen po ni//sangs
60b1(rgyud): sa kun gyi thugs yon to/byon mapas rgyan rnam can pa//dang bsur gnang byor bta pas na// kyi du mchog dang pan chad//sems can kun la sgrung gyur//mu sngags
60b2(rgyud): ni rnyed nas/sa m+bu ma sa med// na sems pa'i rgyung mas//sems can kun gyi sa//snyam
60b3(rgyud): ma smras/ blo//mis sasaso ni skye dang yid na duSh+Tha nIn+d+ha m+bed+d+ha ni shrI Sh+Ta/ga byu rgyu'i sems rten ga/ ldan lakun kyi/
60b4(rgyud): ye shes ril pa'i 'byung gnas g+ha / dpal bla ni med//spyan bral thabs kyi rtso ma pa yi ni//sems kyi de hU~Ml nas dngas pa rgyu//khyod kyi skyil phab pa 'd-i// god
60b5(rgyud): drugazlang bar byas//rigs na su da //rdo rje sams thugs pa chag zung //sangs rgyas kun gyi nopa yin//byung chubs mos dang mnyam pa'i phyir//snyoms
60b6(rgyud): na bye ba rgyad gnas yin//rdzogs kyi bu dang na ched//b+h+ring zhing dang ga sang mAm+mA/s+yAR+tha byin ba ma nA//sems da kyil du bsdus nas kyang //rdo kyi yin kyi /
60b7(rgyud): da rtsi sman mchog dam pa 'dis//dad ldan skyes bu dmos par byas//sems kyi thig la dkyil khar du//ni khwa 'byam pa'i gtir skems la//srid pa gsum la da
61a1(rgyud): cig/dbang can thams cad bkol bar byos//skye 'gro kun la snying brtse'i phyir//gdul ba'i phyag rgya 'di yang spyod//dus gsum rtsub gcad par byos//byin pa/
61a2(rgyud): snod bcud rnam par dag/rnam dag chen po nyid kyi lAm//byed spyod thabs tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa//'bri don byang chub sems kyi dbyings//sems kyi chu 'di btung bar byos//rnal
61a3(rgyud): 'byor chen pos dam du gzung //hU~M de nus rigs kyi bu mtshi gro des//mnyam pa'i don la gzhol ba'i phyir//ye shrI sa rgyal pos 'di skad gsungs//snying gi dkyil du rnam sbyangs
61a4(rgyud): pa//hUM nyid ring pos mtshams sbyar te//thams cad bde ba chen po'i dbyings//dge sdig las kyis mi bcos shing //sgrom dang sgrub pas mi 'byangs pa'i//rnam dge snyoms
61a5(rgyud): nyid rin tshen+da gter//rdo rje snying po ye shes kyis//khro rgyal kun gyi gtsor gyur cig/shri mi hA su kha badz+ra bo d+hi hUM ho//oM aM/mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes gnas//ma brtsal phyin
61a6(rgyud): pas bde ba'i mchog/ma bltas gsal bas ye shes spyan//gong na med pas kun gyi rje//ye shes rang byung bdal ba la//mi 'gyur g.yung drung sa thog shog/oM ma hU~M gu
61a7(rgyud): h+ya bruM dz+nyA na maN Da la dz+nyA na gu h+ya sid d+hi swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM//gzungs dang ting 'dzin stobs dang mi 'jigs pa//'gyur ba med pa'i sman mchog thig le lnga//mtshan mchog
61b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa chen pos lus brgyan cing //A sarba ta thA ga to gu h+ya Ad ma a b+hA shwany+tsa ho ha//kyang gi gshog pa g.yas g.yon gdengs pa yis//klu rnams zil gyis gnon par byed pa ltar//
61b2(rgyud): srid gsum yon tan mchog tu rdzogs pa yi//sangs rgyas kun la mdzes pa'i cod pan mchog/mchog tu che bas bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon//oM sarba ta thA ga tom hUM gu t+ya badz+ra a b+hi
61b3(rgyud): ho//hU~M bde ba chen po rang gnas la//ye shes rgyal po stangs dbyal du//'gyur ba med par longs spyod cing //thabs dang shes rab 'pho 'du yis//sgyu 'gros su 'dzin par shog
61b4(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga to gu h+Na a nu rA ga ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM//dbyings nas nyi shar mkha' la rdzogs sras 'gyur//rgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig da
61b5(rgyud): dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po des thugs rje chen po gdung ba'i dam tshig lu gu rgyud la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig stan chen
61b6(rgyud): phrin los mdzad de//i ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang //zhing baicur ldan pa'i longs sbyong la//gsung gi 'phro 'dun ma sbyangs te//lnga yi chom
61b7(rgyud): bu yang dag gsal//sgo lnga byin rlabs 'dren pa'i mchog/ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i lam//gtsug du snang mdzad sems dpa' tshe//skar skyid byin rlabs rmad po che//pho nya mang po'i
62a1(rgyud): 'ab 'dra yis//zhing bcu gnas nas blangs nas su//nyi zla steng du de bzhag ste//shes pa gsum po dbyingasu bstim//rang rgyud 'khor ba'i sa bon las//lhung kun du
62a2(rgyud): 'phang bstod de//ni ljang hUM du gan sa bsgyur nas//yas 'dus mes 'dus hUM la 'dus//hUM ni bde gshegs ye shes lnga/dkar la gsal bar bskur bskyed de//bde chen 'od zer
62a3(rgyud): 'bro bas brjed//rdo rje sngoni po rtsa lnga pa//yab yum bcu yi byi ni rlabs nyid//le brga nA hI ni dbyingasu sbyor//kun tu bzang po bde ba'i mkha'//sangs rgyas sems can gnyi ga
62a4(rgyud): yum//rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas gtso//sras su gyur pas bde ba'i mchog/zhing gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams//gnas 'di kun bzang yum gyi mkha'//sa 'di rdo
62a5(rgyud): rje sems dpa'i sa//me ldog nyi zla'i gdan stengasu//mkhas pas sku yi phyag rgyas bskyod//mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag ldan//rtag tu sku mchog g.yung drang sbyin//ho rdo rje gsing
62a6(rgyud): ba'i tshig tu'o//de nas ye shes rgyal po des//gsang mchog bde ba'i mchod sbyin gyis//phyogs bcu'o zhing khams rdul snyed na//rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul phran snyed//
62a7(rgyud): de kun gsang mchog mnyes bya'i phyir//nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo de//'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi dbyingasu thim//'khril nas gsang ba'i dgongs pa mdzad//bcwo brgyad
62b1(rgyud): datas r+b+basmras pas//smad tu rgyan bcog tu 'khyil//kha dob rnam pan yang dag ldan//rigs ba'i lha mo rnam spros te//d+ho khams bkang nas mchod pa byed//lA lags mchog
62b2(rgyud): dbyingasu 'khri la//la la 'dod lde'i mchod pa byed//rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang //d+hA re rgyal mtshan 'dren gdushes dang //rin chen do shal se myo do//dbyibs legs rin+de chen du
62b3(rgyud): po mdzes//bsam rdzogs rin chen sdong po yis//rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus mched//la la 'gro bar bsnying //la la bdud 'dul ngan song skyong //kun kyang gsang ba'i mchod
62b4(rgyud): 'bul byed//nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang //gnyis med par 'khril nas//'khril nas 'gra' na'i mchod par byed//stong khrims nyungs 'brur gzhug tshul du//gan
62b5(rgyud): mchod pa chen po yis//thams cad mnyes pa chen por gyur to//de nas ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo drang gnyisu med par 'khril nas ched du brjed do//e ma'o/
62b6(rgyud): bde gshegs spyod pa'i mchog/sna tshogs spyod la rang bzhin gsang //ma chags pa yi ngo bo las//chags pa chen po'i spyod pa 'byung //spyod pa chen po rnams gnyis la/
62b7(rgyud): rtogs nas chags bsu spyod pa//yang dag chags pa chen po ste//'di ni tshangs mchog rgyal po yin//sems kyi spyod pa rnam pa gnyis//bzhi bcu mnyes pa'i las bya'o//
63a1(rgyud): zhes tshad du gsungs//de lta bus phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing khams kyis bsdus pa thams cad mnyes pa chen pos thim par gyur to//
63a2(rgyud): sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las thugs rje gdung ba'i le'u skye bdun pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po de mchod pa bla ma'i rgyan bkod pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
63a3(rgyud): bar zhugs nA sa 'di skad gsungs//sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i//dkyil 'khor bla ma dgongs pa'i mchog/blo grar 'du 'phro'i phyag rgya yis//'dzul lam na mkhar 'gro
63a4(rgyud): bar nges//glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis//chos kyi sems dpa'i dngos grub len//bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya yis//yid bzhin se mos dpa'i dngos grub len//rgyan dang 'ad
63a5(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya yis//'odra 'bar bla ma'i dngos grub len//A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis//thams cad grub cing rdo rje ngas//rgyu 'bras dbyingasu sbyar shes shing //bla ma'i dgongs pa
63a6(rgyud): gang sbyor ba//rigs 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du nges//skye ba rnam bzhi rgyud sbyangs nas//mtshan rdzogs la gdon mi za//zhe sa gsungs pas tshigs chen po rnam pa gnyis rdzogs
63a7(rgyud): par gyur to//de nas nyid kyi bla ma'i mdzad spyod la dgyes pa chen pos glu 'di blang so//oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi//ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che//bsod nams
63b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sku yi tshogs//snang stong thAg le kun du rdzogs//ho/oM rdo rje bsod nams thig le che//rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan//rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas pa//rdo rje rgyal po zag
63b2(rgyud): ho/oM mi dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings//mtha' yas kun nas sna tshogs 'phro//mtha' yas kun nAs lhun gyis shrIm//sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po//ho/oM sku gsung
63b3(rgyud): thugs kyi rdugs pa che//yon tan phrin los kun tu rdzogs//ye nas lhuni rdzogs kun tu bzang //'dus pa'i rdzogs chan thig le che//ho/i phyogs bcu 'jig rten rdul snyed de//rgyu
63b4(rgyud): ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed//sprul pa rdul phran pa sam yas kyi//skad cig yud la lhun gyis grub//ho/oM thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs//sku gsung thugs kyi dang ga nyid tshe//
63b5(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi kun tu khyab//sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che//ho/oM thams cad thig le bla ma'i den//sgyu 'phrul bla ma thig le'i dbyings//dbyings nyid byang chub sems chen po//snying/
63b6(rgyud): pi bla ma nges pa'i don//thig le nyid las g.yos pa med//ho/sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po la sa tshogs chen po rnam pa gnyis mnyes pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o////de nas de bzhin ga
63b7(rgyud): pa ye shes rgyal po de sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po'i 'jigs pa tsha bo'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'du mdzad de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/bdag tu lta ba dang rmongs pa'i dbang gis gang
64a1(rgyud): pa'i gsung ba chen po ma rtags/sbas d+ma'i gsang ba la mngon par zhes pas chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don ni phyal bar bor/bram ze'i'adun sngags mang po ni blo'i gdang
64a2(rgyud): du blangs nas snying rje chen po'i las dang ni bral/gnasu ming btags nas zhe sdang sgrol ba'i las ni rgyun tu byed/thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med pa'i don ni ma rtogs/'dod chags
64a3(rgyud): spyod pa'i las dang skad cig tsam yang ma bral/rang rig pa'i ye shes ni blo la nub/don dam pa la kun tu gti mug pas rgyun tu khebs/sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan ni ma rtogs/dra/
64a4(rgyud): rgyal khengs pa'i dregs pa'i las ni rgyun du byed/tshad med pa bzhi'i las dang ni bra la/phrag dog gi chub mas ni rgyan du khrid de/bdag tu rmongs pa dang rtog pa la zhen te/yang dag pa'i
64a5(rgyud): mtha' dang bral bas rgyu dang 'bras bu rmongs te//sred pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por bsgral pa chen po stong phrag drug cur skyeso//
64a6(rgyud): dI las zur nas nyi tshe de'i sems can dmyal ba chen por bskal pa chen po drug tu skyes so//las kyi sgrib pa rtsub mo de las thar te sngon gyi srid pas mtshams skyer ni sa yaM dgas
64a7(rgyud): srin po chen po lus gcig mgo bo brgya pa mgo bo sna tshogs pa/lus brgya pa mgo bo gcig pa lus dang yan lag mang po 'dug pa mtshon cha sna tshogs pa thogs shing gdug pa'i rdzu
64b1(rgyud): 'phrul mang po ston pas klu'i ris nas 'bras bu che ba man chad dbang du bsdus nas sa bon nub mos mang po 'deb so//de nas sngon legs par spyad pa'i 'bras bus bsod nams dang ye shes bya
64b2(rgyud): kyis sku'i dbyibs legs par brgyan pa ye shes phyin ci ma log pa'i sprin gyis gzigs te/las ngan pa'i srin po de nyon mongs pa'i bag chags sbyang ba deng //khams gsum gyi sems can red
64b3(rgyud): pal ba nag pa'i phyir thugs rje chen po'i ye shes skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po dgyes pa chen po ye shes kyi rgyal po de nyid 'jigs
64b4(rgyud): byed chen po rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor bla ma chen po sprin rnam par spro ba sgyu 'phrul bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/de bzhin nyid kyi bla ma chen po'i dbyings nas nyid kyi gsang ba'i
64b5(rgyud): bdag mo khro mo'i rgyal po chen mo mngon du phyung ste/haM hi zhes dgyes pa'i gzim drangs kyis pad+ma rgyas par mdzad de gnyi su med pa'i dgyes pa chen pos thim nos gsang ba bla ma'i sprin las
64b6(rgyud): hUM hUM hUM badz+rA dzA bi Sha kro d+ha badz+ra dz+wa la man Da la phaT phaT ha la ha la hUM zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad dur khrod 'dal ba chen po'i rang bzhin khrag gi rgya mtsho dba'i rlabs
64b7(rgyud): drug pa'i dkyil na/kong rus chen po ri rab kyi steng na rdo rje mo dpung du 'khyil ba'i dbus na rig rdo rje rgya gram mig mngasu bris pa/phyogs bzhi ngos bzhi 'bar bar khyams gsum rdo rje
65a1(rgyud): rin po che'i glo 'bur du mdzes pa/sgo bzhi rta 'bas mu khyud du bcad pa/rdo rje rin pa che rgya gram mthing ka 'brar ba'i rtsig pa dra ba ri su brtsigs pa//stad yid bzhin gyi rin po che
65a2(rgyud): 'bar ba/rdo rje rgya gram 'bar ba'i bla re mig mngasu bres pa/rtse mo dbyibs bla mas 'og min gyi gnas nas srid pa'i rtse mo man chad brel po'i tshul du dbyibs rdo rje rgya gram mig mangs gcig
65a3(rgyud): tu 'khyil ba/ye shes rdo rje rgya kram gyi cho 'phrul bla ma'i 'od 'bar bso phyogs bzhir 'phros shing 'khrugs pas khams gsum thams cad bdel ba/rgyal mtshan bla ma chen po dang /ru
65a4(rgyud): mtshan bla ma chen pos phyogs bzhi grwa bzhi nas bsgreng ba/gsang ba bla ma'i rtsig pas phyi rim bskor ba/rdo rje rin po che'i phyi rol gyi shing ljon pa bla mas phyogs mtshams gtibs pa/
65a5(rgyud): phyi dang nang led pa kun du yang bla ma chen po'i nang du gyur pa/khams gsum thams cad rdo rje ra ba'i rtsig pa 'chor ba med pa'i gzhol yas khang ni khro bo dang khro mo'i rol pa'i phyag rgya stong gi
65a6(rgyud): 'jig rdul phra mo snying 'thon par gyur to//de nas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'ur 'ur dang /chem che ma dang /shig shig dang /thor thor dang /gtogs shig dang /
65a7(rgyud): tshem shig dang /sod cig dang /drol zhig dang /skyongs shig la sogs pas 'jig rten dbang che zhing dpa' brtul che zhing brtul zhugs can rnams brgyal rab tu brgyal bar gyur
65b1(rgyud): /don sa rgyas tshan thos so shos rgyal ba de nyid dur byud zla mtshan par dgyes nas khrag gi rgya mchu'i dkyil gled dus rkun pa'i rirab kyi ste na rje me dbyung 'bar ba'i klong dkyi
65b2(rgyud): d+hU ye shes kyi 'khar mi rtsibs bzhi pa lho nyid kyi gas de ba'i rgyu lde ma dang /mchod pa zla mtshon pa mdzad de gnyis med pa'i dbyings nas 'di phyung ngo //hUM badz+ra du dz+nyAn na smas nAn dra bad+mam
65b3(rgyud): la de ba tits+tsha ni zhes brjod pas ye shes rin po che'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa 'od 'bar ba'i steng du dur khrod gdugs pa'i tshogs seng ge la sogs pa blo mo chen po'i khri btsugs te/
65b4(rgyud): gdan bla ma nyizla dang pad ma spel bar gting ba'o//de nas cho 'phrul bla ma chen pos btul ba/bas ma~M gau ta nA bla mtshon po spags pa tshad med pa/dmigs pa thams cad dang dang bral
65b5(rgyud): ba'i ye shes zlu mchen pos dregs pa thams cad dus gcig tu 'dul ba'i snam rten bla ma chen po la mtshan pa dang dmigs pa'i yul las 'das pa'i phyag rgya bla ma 'od 'bar de
65b6(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po chen blo su ma b+hi na gci rI yang 'gyur ba/rdo rje ljags kyi gsung 'brug stang gi smre skyugs pas stong khams thams cad dus
65b7(rgyud): gcig tu 'jig pa/ye shes me'i thugs kyis snang srid kyi bud shing dus gcig tu bsregs pa/snying 'og med par kun du spyi bung zhes byed pa dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad pa zhas
66a1(rgyud): rnam pa brgyad du gtams pa//phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/spyan 'bar ba nyi shu rtsa bdun mnga' zhing rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan
66a2(rgyud): gyis brgyan pa/rdo rje mthing kA khyung gi gshogs pas 'jig rten gyi khrims yob par bkab pa/khros pa'i rgyal mo mthing nag 'bor ba dang gnyi su med pa re bzhug so//gnyisu med pa
66a3(rgyud): dbyings nas shar phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i steng du ma hA de ba dang /'dod pa'i lha glan kyal du brtul ba'i steng du nyid kyi gzugs kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das
66a4(rgyud): bud d+ha he ru ka sku mdog ser nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o//phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa'o//bde gshegs khros
66a5(rgyud): bya'i rgyal mo dang 'khril pa chen po'i tshul du bzhugaso//lho phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri drang nyi zla'i gdan stengasu gshin rje gan+d+ha rgyal du bsgyel ba'i gdun la nyid kyi
66a6(rgyud): tshor ba'i phung po las bcom ldan 'das rang ne hUM du ka sku mdog sngo nag dbu gsum phyag drag zhabs bzhir gyur pa/mtshon che sna tshogs 'dzin pa/dur khrod kyi rgyun gyis brgyan pa//
66a7(rgyud): rin po che khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril pa chen mo'i tshul gyis bzhug so//nub phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i steng du chu bdag gi rgyal po dang 'khor nag po
66b1(rgyud): 'bring gi ra ti gon rgyal du bskyol ba'i gdan la nyid kyi 'du shes kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das pad+ma te ru ka su mdo ba dmar nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa/mtshon cha tshogs
66b2(rgyud): 'dzin pa/dur khrod kyi sa borgyan pa'o//pad+ma khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o//byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i gdan steng su gnod sbyin
66b3(rgyud): stobs bzangs gan rgyal du bsgyel ba'i gdin la nyid kyi 'du byed kyi phung po de becom ldan 'das kArma he ru ka sku mdog ljang nug dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa/mtshon cha
66b4(rgyud): sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste/dur khrod kyi rgyun gyis brgyan pa/las mchog khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba chen mo'i tshul gyis bzhugs//de nas dwags pa chen po la sogs pas
66b5(rgyud): gdugs pa'i sems kyis gtum pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan pas mgrin gcig tu gdug pa'i nga ros gtum pa'i brlang tshig tu smras pa/thong thong snying rje'i bdag po ci ltar byed
66b6(rgyud): dmi zhes zer zhing shin du gtum pasnga rngam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po snga ye shes rgyal po de nyid sku gzi brjid chen po'i me dang su gyur te/thugs rje chen pos
66b7(rgyud): 'dul ba'i thabs kyis sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i gsang sngags bla ma'i rngam pa'i gdangs skad chen po 'di dag phyung ngo //hUM hUM hUM/ha he ha/khA hi khA hi khA hi zhes brjed pas dbang phyug chen po la
67a1(rgyud): sogs pa'o gdug pa'i rnyog spyod dag da dang bauk+Shan byung nas nang dulak+ShAn pyA sa yan lag ldan bcad gtubs te sha zos/khrag 'thungs dram pa kun 'chos
67a2(rgyud): so//de nas 'jig byed chen po de nyid kyis d+hu nI nI oM a ra li~M dz+nyA dz+nyA nis brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mkhri' dang bcas pa yung sI 'bru gcig tu me du chung ba
67a3(rgyud): bsdu so//de nas 'byung po ma rungs bya thams cad rje bo'i yang rje'o//dregs pa chen po lo sogs pa'i chung ma 'byung mo thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo//sbyin mo chen mo mi sruni mo dang /
67a4(rgyud): tshas ma dang //khro moM dang /dbang mo dang /'jug sbed mo dang /gzhon nu mo dang /dmar mo dang bdud rtsi mo dang /zhi ba mad she chen mo dang /srin mo dang za bya mi dang dga' ba mo dang /
67a5(rgyud): khrag thung mo dang gaN+DIg su spyod ma dang /yid 'brug ma dang grub mo dang /rlung mo dang gsod byed mo dang /me mo dang phag mo dang/rgyan byed mo dang /sna chen mo dang /chu lha mo dang nag mo/chen
67a6(rgyud): zhi pa sa me yo sbyin na chen mong gagasus 'dzin sngonag chen mo la sogs bye blan dang /yang bran dang g.yog dang yang g.yog la sogs pa'i'akhor zhing gi rdul kyang bsdus//de na
67a7(rgyud): yang dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid dgyes pa bla ma'i gsang ba chen po sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mngon par 'du mdzad de sku gsung thugs bla ma las 'di
67b1(rgyud): byung ngo //oM A hA/badz+ra pad+ma pA bo sha pad+ma hU~M A la la ho zhes brjod pas 'byung po mya rungs pa thams cad shin du chags pa'i yid g.yos nas gangs pa rgyas par byas nas khab lon gyi de
67b2(rgyud): la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po'i sku la mi srin la sogs pa brgyad 'khril lo//bcom ldan 'das ser nag chen po'i sku la tshangs ma la sogs pa lnga yang/
67b3(rgyud): 'khril lo//bcom ldan 'das sngon ga chen po'i skul bdud rtsi mo la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo//bcom ldan 'das dmar nag chen po'i skul khrag gis myos ma la segs pa lnga 'dri
67b4(rgyud): lo//bcom ldan 'das ljang nig chen po'i sku lde me mo la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo//de nas dgyes pa chen po de dag gis dr-I zhes brjed pas pad+ma'i tshogs bsdus te shin du bcum
67b5(rgyud): par gyur to//de nas dgyes ti ta ta zhes brjod pasre nyid kyi shes pa'i tshogs rnam par shes pa brgyad la sA dkar po la sogs pi brgyad dang gi lag rmyi dang ngo mtshar du tshwas te 'then par
67b6(rgyud): gyur te//'thon nas kyang 'khor lo 'bar po'i phyi rol shur phyogs nas 'khor bar khro bo'i gzugs kyis snying rje 'jigs tshul gyis stan la gan so//de nas dgyes te he zhes brjod
67b7(rgyud): bos nyid kyi shes pa'i yul brgyad las seng gdong chen mo lo sogs pa brgyad rang gi leg cha dang ngo mtshar du ches te 'thong nas 'khor lo 'bar ba'i bar khyam su snying rje
68a1(rgyud): nga'i tshul gyis stan la shin du rngam pa'i stabs kyis gan so//de nas dgyes t+ye baT ces phyogs bcu'i zhing ma lus par bsgrags pad+ma phyogs bcu'o zhing ma lus par
68a2(rgyud): 'gro ba rnams kyi don ma lus par mdzad pa thub pa chen po drug bcom ldan 'das drug 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad cing 'gro ba drug 'dul ba dang /yid chos dbyings nas rol te spyor
68a3(rgyud): byed nyi zer zhags pa can la sogs pa brgyad du gyur te/'bar ba'i bar khyams gsum pA la zhing skam gsher sbrel ba'i gden snying su rang gi lag cha dang shin tu rngam pa'i stobs
68a4(rgyud): kyis shar phyogs nas 'khor bar gnaso//de nas dgyes te phaT ces brjod pas nyid kyi phyin ci log bzhi las rdo rje srings 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du
68a5(rgyud): chas nas dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen po'i sgo bzhir snying rje 'jigs tshul gyi stan la shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du gnaso//de nas dgyes pa
68a6(rgyud): chen po'i sprin las bud d+ha rol pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis dus gcig tu phaT ces brjod pas thams cad khros nas 'byung mo thams cad kyang rang gi gnasu yud tsam
68a7(rgyud): gyis byin par dgye'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po de nyid thugs rje chen pos bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa cig char zhugs te sku gsung thugs
68b1(rgyud): rdordolas 'do dag byung //a badz+ra ma mr-i ta ma hU~Mkr-Ib+h+rU~M oM o zhes brjod pas dab phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das khrag 'jung chen po'i snum logs nas 'dzin
68b2(rgyud): /'dam khe tha~Md de dran pa rnyed de//de nas khrig 'thung chen po de dge spyan ya mtshon chen por gyur te cho 'phrul chen po mdzad pa mthong ngo //de dag gi dus su 'jig rten drug na blan
68b3(rgyud): ba'i dregs pa chen po rnams dus gcig tu brtul bar mthong ste/shin tu zhum zhing bred nas mgrin gcig tu smras pa/'bang su mchi 'bangs mchi//'brangs nan tan mo bgyis na//
68b4(rgyud): ni dang la snyun ba rgyu ga ste shing /nga yang gas shing gAd+hA sa gyur cig/rna rgyags tshig nas drug pa drung //dmyal bar ltung nas 'bod pa shog/ces 'drung
68b5(rgyud): bar rang rang gis spyod btsug so//de nas de dag kun dkyil 'khor gyi gdun du bzhago//de nas yang de thams cad kyis mgrin gaN+DIg N+DI smras pa/rang rang gi chung mya dang bu mo dang //rang
68b6(rgyud): rang gi ma dang sring mi rnams dkyil 'khor du phul te/bdag cag rnams kyi mchis byung dang /ma dang skying mo bla mo rnams//dkyil lo bIr chen por bzhes gsol//dpa' bo
68b7(rgyud): rjes bzhi su gsol//bdag cag 'khor tshogs thams cad kyis//'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di//ming tsam 'dzin por su bgyid pa//nor bu rin chen 'bar ba ltar//dem
69a1(rgyud): dgos ba rdzogs par bgyid ces smos btsugaso//de nas de'im dang sring mo dang chung ma dang /bu mo rnams yud tsam gyis byin par 'ongs nas las kyi dngos grub
69a2(rgyud): stsol ba las/de nas khrag 'thung ye shes chen pos ming btags/lag tu rdo rje byin nas rdo rje bran dang po nyar dbang bskur ro//de nas dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen po'i don phyogs
69a3(rgyud): bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gsal zhing 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang gnyi su med par gyur nas sku gsung thugs
69a4(rgyud): rdo rje bla mya las 'di dag phyung ngo //e mra'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos//mkha'i dbyings gnyi su med pa las//mkha' la bla ma'i dkyil 'khor shar//khri btsugs nyi dkyil gdan stang sa
69a5(rgyud): de ba lha tshogs gdan du bting //hUM 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte dbusu//khri bsha mos nyi dkyil ya bdud gdon//de yi steng du bsam bya ba//byang chub sems las sku bskyed pa//dpal/
69a6(rgyud): chen bla med he ru ka/dbu dgu phyug kyang bco brgyad de//spyan yang 'bar ba nyi shu bdun//dbu la rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan gosal//zhobs kyang rnam pa brgyad du gtams//rdo rje mthing ka
69a7(rgyud): khyung gi gshog/'jig rten khams kyang yog par bkab//sbrul nag 'jig su rung ba dang /dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o//dbu gsum dang la byung ba ni//g.yas dkar g.yon
69b1(rgyud): dmar dbus mthing zhal//rnan par thar pa'i dbu gsum gyis//khams gsum mya ngan zla ba'i zhal//dbu gsum pA ra nas rngam pa ni//g.yas sngo g.yon ljang dbus mthing zhal//thabs dang
69b2(rgyud): shes rab sems kyi dbu//srid gsum dbyingasu rdzogs pa'i zhal//dbu gsum mtha' nas rngam pa ni//g.yas mthing g.yon mthing dbus mthing zhal//khams gsum re bskong ba yi//
69b3(rgyud): lung dang man ngag sems kyi dbu//'gyur ba med pa'i mthid nag zhal//skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshems//dbu dgu rol pa'i byin rlabs las//g.yas gsum glog stong lce 'byin cing //
69b4(rgyud): g.yon gsum 'brug sbyong sgra sgrogs pa//dbu gsum rdo rje ser chen 'bebos//spyan dgu dpal gzigs pa ni/chos dbyings kun du bzang po dang /kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings la//
69b5(rgyud): 'gyur ba med pa'i tshul gyis gzigs//spyan dgu bar nas gzigs pa ni//rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyis//srid pa'i sems can thams cad la/byams mgon snyoms pa'i spyan//
69b6(rgyud): gyis gzigs//spyan dgu mtha' nas gzigs pa ni//g.yos gsum zhe sdang khros pa'i spyan//gzigs pas bdud dang mu stegs sgrol//g.yon gsum byams mgon snyoms pa'i
69b7(rgyud): spyan//gzigs pas mtha' yas bde la 'jog/dbu gsum ye shes rol pa'i spyan//gozigs pas skye 'gro gan su stabs//bcu dgu rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan dgu//lnga dgu bzhi
70a1(rgyud): bcu rtsa lnga yang //bud d+ha bzhi bcu rtsa lngas brgyan//stong pa chen po'i ye shes kyis//khyab padol chen po'i rtogasu bsnams//bcwo brgyad phyag na rol pa yis//stong pa
70a2(rgyud): bcwo brgyad dbyingasu sbyor//zhabs brgyad nga rgyal dregase pa 'dzoms//thangs dang shes rab ldan pa yis//rdo rje mthing ka gshig pi brkyang //bco brgyad phyag na bsnams pa yis//
70a3(rgyud): rdo rje glo snying zhong chung g.yas//ban da zhing chen stir chen g.yon//nang zhags nyi ma khyud chen g.yas//zhing chen zla ba 'ug pa g.yon//me dang rgya mtsho ga'u g.yas//rlung dang rin chen
70a4(rgyud): ri rab gra yan+da//yon tan bco brgyad dbyingasu rdzogs//dang po rdo rje dung chen ni//khams gsum dbang du bsdus nas kyang //bdud dang mu stegs kun 'joms pa'o//gnyis pre sting chen
70a5(rgyud): glo snying ni//srid pa'i sems can thams cad kun//dam tshig sta ni dbyingasu sgrol//gsum pa stir chu ri la med ni//dus gsum rnam par sgrol ba'i rtags//bzhi pa stir chen
70a6(rgyud): nang zhags ni//rgyud lnga'i sems can dbyingasu 'drin//lnga pa nyi zla zud tu 'dzin//byang chub sems las g.yos pa med//drug pa khyung dang 'ug pa ni//mkha 'gro thams cad 'khol ba
70a7(rgyud): rtags//bdun po me dpung rlung gis 'thor//srid pa'i bag chags thal bar glog/brgyad pa ri rab rgya mtsho rnams//thams cad ma lus g.yeng gnas shing //'byung ba lnga la
70b1(rgyud): mnga' bskos pa'o//dgu pa rin chen gau ru ni//dngos grub sprul ba 'byung ba'i rtags//dgu gnyis zung du ldan pa las//stong pa bco brgyad dbyingasu rdzogs//dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni/
70b2(rgyud): thod skam 'bar ba phreng ba yis//zhi pa phyogs gcig bya ngan zlo//mngon par rdzogs pa'i sku bsnyes pa'o//thod rlon 'bar ba'i phreng ba ni//kha~Mms gsum dbang du bsdus na su//sprul pa'i
70b3(rgyud): sku la mnga' brnyes pa'i//thod pa phyed tshol phreng bas ni//dug lnga bdud rtsi rwa sbyor ba ste//longs spyod sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o//zhing chen rlon pa'i na bza' ni//chos dbyings mnyam po chen
70b4(rgyud): po ste//chos kyi sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o//stag lpags g.yeng gzhi'i shom thabs ni/phyi na las rnam bzhi'i rang bzhin te//rdo rje'i sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o//sgrol nag chun 'phyang
70b5(rgyud): mang po ni//ye shes thams cad 'byung ba'i rtags//rtags chen sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o//zhabs brgyad lha brgyad brdzes pa ni//de rgyal can rnams tshar gcod pa'o//sangs rgyas/
70b6(rgyud): khros pa'i rgyal mo ni//kro d+hi shwa ri yum gyi gtso//mthing nag 'bar ba'i rel pa can//rgyan dang tshwa lugs gtso dang 'thun//'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyi su//ban da rak+ta gtso la stob//
70b7(rgyud): 'khris pa chen po'i tshul du bsam//shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs nas/khri dang nyid kyi le nyi zla'i gang na//de yi steng du bsam bya ba//gzugs kyi phung po gnas gyur pa/
71a1(rgyud): khrag 'thung bud d+h+ya to ruka/dbug sam+b+ha phyug drug zhabs bzhir bskud//g.yas ljang g.yon sngo dbus sor zhal//phyag drug mngon par rol pa las//'khor lho
71a2(rgyud): dgra sta zhags pa g.yas//dran de rde'u chung khadz+nyA g.yon//sde nag dur khrod rgyun gyis brgyan//bde gshegs khros pa'i rgyal mo dang //'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam//lho
71a3(rgyud): phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs na//khri dang nyi dkyil gshin rje'i gad na//de yi steng du bsam bya ba//tshor ba'i phung po gnas gyur pa//khrag 'thung rang na he ru ka/dbu gsum phyag
71a4(rgyud): drug zhabs bzhir dgrad//g.yas ser g.yon dmar dbus sngo zhal//phyag drug mngon par rol po las//rin chen gshol dang gtun shing g.yas//banA da dgra sta rde'u chung g.yon/
71a5(rgyud): sngon+da ga dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan//rin chen khros pa'i rgyal mo dang /'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam//nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengasu//khri dang nyi dkyil klu yi gdan//
71a6(rgyud): de yi steng du bsam bya ba//'du shes phung po gnas gyur pa//khrag 'thung pad+ma he ru ka/dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir dgrad//g.yas sngo g.yon dmar dbus ldang zhal//phyag
71a7(rgyud): drug mngon par rol pa las//pad+ma rde'u chung spu gri g.yas//ban da kha T+wAM si phreng g.yon//dmar nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan//pad+ma khros pa'i rgyal mo dang //'khril ba tshon
71b1(rgyud): po'i tshul du bsam//byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs na//khyi dang nyi dkyil gnod sbyin gdan//de yi steng du bsamya bya ba//'du byed phung po gnas gyur pa//khrag 'thung kar ma he ru ka/
71b2(rgyud): dbu gsum phyag drug zha bos bzhir dgrad//g.yas dmar g.yon ser dbus ljang zhol//phyag drug mngon par ro lo pa las//ral gri zhags pa rde'u chung g.yas//ban da thod dbyu/
71b3(rgyud): kha T+wAM g.yon//ljang nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan//las mchog khros pa'i rgyal mo dang //'khril pa chen po'i tshul du bzhugs//'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyi rim na//mi dpung 'bar ba'i
71b4(rgyud): gzhi la yas na//mkha' dbyings gnyi su med pa las//mkha' las skyes pa'i 'phra men ma//shar phyogasu ni bsam bya ba//s+ya bdag bsgyel ba'i gdan stongasu//kun zhi gnas gyur
71b5(rgyud): phra men ma//rnal 'byor sngo nog ke'u ri ma//ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil//mtsho gtsigs rkan brdebs g.yang gozhi gsol//dpyugs par glu blangs ha he sa bzhad//stir dbyugs
71b6(rgyud): pa g.yas pa na//ban da rag ta g.yon pa na//kye shi ma la brkyang bskum bzhugs//lho phyogs ngosu bsam bya ba//gsod sbyin bsgyel ba'i gdan stengasu//rnam shes gnas gyur
71b7(rgyud): phra men ma//rnal 'byor ser nag rtse'u re ma//ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil//mche gtsigs rkan brdabs gau yang gzhi gagom//dpyugs pas glu blangs ha tas bzhad//thabs kyis
72a1(rgyud): mda' drangs g.yas pa na//shes rab bzhu brdungs g.yon pa na//ya ma ye la brkyang bsku ma bzhugs//nub kyi phyogasu bsam bya ba//nyi ma bsgyel ba'i gdan
72a2(rgyud): stang su//nyon mongs gnas gyur phra men ma//rnal 'byor dmer nag pra mo ha//ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil//ma che gtsigs rka na brngubs g.yang gzhi gyon//ngo phyogs pas glu
72a3(rgyud): blangs h+ye ha sa bzhud//chu srin rgyal mtshan g.yas pa ni//ban dA rag ta g.yon pa na//sUr+ya yi la brkyang bskum bzhugs//byang gi phyogasu bsam bya ba//zla ba bsgyel ba'i
72a4(rgyud): gdan stengasu//reg bya ga nas gyur phra men ma//rnal 'byor mthing nag be ta yi//ral pa khams nag gyen du 'khyil//mche go tsigs rkan brda ba so g.yang gzhi gyono//dpyuH/
72a5(rgyud): pAs glu blangs hA hwa sau bzhad//rdo rje rtse lnga g.yas pa ni//stir chung mgo gtod g.yon pa na//tsAn tra ye la brkyang bsku ma bzhugs//shar lho mtshamasu bsam bya bA/
72a6(rgyud): me lha bi sgyel pa'i gdan steng su//lta byed phra men gnas gyur pa//rnal 'byor dmar nag pu ka si//skra 'bar mche gtsigs rku na brdabs shing //dur khrod g.yang gzhi
72a7(rgyud): slag po gyon//dpyugs bri glu blangs hau ha si bzhad//sti ngo chen po g.yas pa na//tshebs par sgyu 'dren g.yen pa na//a ga ne yai la brkyang bskum bzhugs//lho nub
72b1(rgyud): mtsham su bsam bya ba//bden bral bsgyel pa'i gdan stengasu//nyan byed gnas gyur phra men ma//rnal 'byor mthing nag sla sha ni//skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shing //srog
