72b2(rgyud): chags chen po g.yong gzhi gyo ni//dbyugs pas glu blangs ha ha sa bzhed//sti re chung ngu g.yon pa na//tsid ta phyung ba g.yas pa na//ni ri til brkyang bskum bzhugs//nub byang 'chims
72b3(rgyud): su bsam bya ba//rlung lha bsgyel ba'i gdan stengasu//snom byed gnas gyur phra me na me//rnal 'byor se ra nag tse na Da li//skra 'bar mche gtsigs rka na brdabs shing //'jig su rung
72b4(rgyud): ba'i sgeg po gsol//dpyu gros pas glu blangs ha ha sa bzhod//sti ra chu du g.yas pa na//ba no da bcad pa g.yon pa nA//be ya be la brkyang bsku ma bzhugs//byang sharA 'tsham su
72b5(rgyud): bas me bya ba//dbang ldan pasgyel ba'i gdan steng su//myong byed gnas gyur phra men ma//rnal 'byor ljang nag g+has ma ri//skra 'bar mcho gtsigs rkan brdabs shing //sti ra chen
72b6(rgyud): po'i shun pa gsol//depyugaso pas glu blangs ha ha sa bzhod//ban drA rag ta g.yas pa na//rtse gsum 'khrug pa g.yon pa ni//i shwa ra la brkyang bskum bzhugs//dkyil 'khor
72b7(rgyud): de yi phyi rim du//smug nag 'bar ba'i bar khyams na//gsang ba'i mkha' las skur bskyed pa//shar gyi phyogasu bsam bya ba//dri za ba skyel ba'i gdan steng su//kun gzhi yul
73a1(rgyud): lngas gnas gyur bya//bu men thogs medu song ge'i gdag//rnal 'byor sor nag spyo gu m+b+ha//mcho gtsigs rkun brlabs g.yang ga N+DI min//phyag gnyis bsdu
73a2(rgyud): skab shin du 'gying //stir chen po sdug cing gas lnga//in dri yal brkyang ba skum bzhugs//lho yi phyogasu bsam bya ba//sbrul bum bsgyel ba'i gdan stongs//rnam she
73a3(rgyud): yul la gnas gyur pa//'phra men dpa' bo stug gi gdong //rnal 'byor dmar nag bye grem//mche gtsigs rgan ba bas g.yang gzhi gyon//phyag gnyisaM gyad kyi 'dor tshul
73a4(rgyud): gyis//stir chung bsgyur nas 'bru tshugs lta//rA tri'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs//nub kyi phyogasu bsam bya ba//yi dwags bsgyel ba'i gdan steng su//nyon mongs yul
73a5(rgyud): la gnas gyur pa//'phra men rtag 'dul wa yi ge dong //rnal 'byor de mar nag srig mi//mtsho gtsigs rkun brdabs ga yang ga ni gyon//phyag gnyis stir chen na
73a6(rgyud): grol 'dru//hrI 'di gdan le brkyang bsku mi bzhugs//byang gi phyogs bsam bya ba//gnod sbyin bsgyel ba'i gdon snyingasu//reg bya yul lnga gnos gyur pa//'phra men pa
73a7(rgyud): snyoms spying mo'i gdong //rnal 'byor mething nag sho na mo//mtsho gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yong gzhi gyen//phyag gnyis rol pa chen po yis//stir phyed mar gtsal nas
73b1(rgyud): gsol//yak+Sha'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs//shar lho mtshamasu bsam bya ba//srin po bskyal ba'i gdan stengasu//lha byed yul las gnas gyur pa//'phra men gzi brjid bya
73b2(rgyud): rgod gdong //rnal 'byor dmar nag kri ta ma//mchu bdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon//zangs gri rnon po g.yas pa na//rgyu zhags drang pa g.yon bA na//rAk+ShA sa la brkyang bsku mo
73b3(rgyud): bzhugs//lho nub mtsham su bsame bya ba//srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan stengasu//nyan byed yul le gnas gyur pa//'phra min gsal byed dur bya'i gdong //rnal 'byor rnal me 'ang
73b4(rgyud): kame//mchu bdar rkan brdabs ga yang gzhi gsol//stor chung stod smad g.yas g.yon na//rngam pa'i tshul gyis phrag la bkal//rAk+Shi sa laM bairkyang bskum bzhugs//nub byang
73b5(rgyud): mtsham su bsam bya ba//srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan stengasu//snom byed yul la gnas gyur pa//'phra men sa le bye rog gdong //rnal 'byor dmar na ge kha kha ma//mchu bdar rgan//
73b6(rgyud): brdabs grwa yang gzhi gyon//zangs gro dmar po g.yas pa na//ban du rig te g.yon pa na//rAk+Sha sa le brkyang bskum bzhugs//byang shar mtshamasu bsam bya ba//srin po
73b7(rgyud): bskyil ba'i gdan stengasu//myong byed yul la gnas gyur pa//'phro men rdzogs byed 'ug pa'i gdong //rnal 'byor ljang nig hu lu mo//mchu bdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol/
74a1(rgyud): rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas pa na//stir chung spyi 'joms g.yon pa na//rAk+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs//'bar ba'i bar khyams tha mal//thod skam 'bar ba'i gzhal
74a2(rgyud): yas na//zhing chen bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su//shar gyi phyogasu bsam bya ba//nyul byed yul las gnas gyur pa//spor byed chen mo mi bzad ma//sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog ma/
74a3(rgyud): zhing chen rol pa'i skrag pa gsol//ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar//dpyugs pas glu blangs srid gsum 'bar//ha ha god mos ye shes rol//nyi zer zhags pa g.yes pa na//
74a4(rgyud): bAban da rag ta g.yon pa na//ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs//lho yi phyogasu bsami bya ba//mi mgo na thub pa gnas gyur pa//spor byed chen mo mdung thung 'phen//rnal 'byor
74a5(rgyud): ser nag nyul chen ma//ral pa kha ma nag gyen du'i khyil//maM yi g.yang gzhi go su gyon//dpyugs pas glu blangs srid gsum sbyangs//ha ha gong mos mi rnams spor//rdo rje mdung thung
74a6(rgyud): g.yas pa ni/bya na de dag tagayon pa na//ro rlo ni steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs//nub kyi phyogasu bsam bye ba//chos kyi dbyings las gnas gyur pa//spor byed rdo rje dril 'khor ma//
74a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor mtshon du med pa'i sku//ral pa kham na ga gyen du 'bar//chos nyid dbyings kyi ni bza' gsol//dpyugs pas glu blangs stong khams spor//ha hi'i gad mos dbyingasu sbyor//
74b1(rgyud): gsung bsgrags dril bu g.yas pa na//ban da rag ta g.yon pa na//ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs//byang gi phyogasu bsam bya ba//lha min thub pa gnas gyur pa//spor byed thod phreng skar mda'i
74b2(rgyud): gdong //rnal 'byor sngon ga nyul chen ma//srogs chags chen po'i g.yang gizhi gyen//ral pa khem nag gyen du 'bor//dpyugs pas glu blangs khams gsum sbyangs//ha ha gad mo sa lha min s+phar/
74b3(rgyud): rdo rje skar mda' g.yas pa ni//band rAg ta g.yon pa na//ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs//shar lho mtsham su bsam bya ba//lho 'dul thub pa gnas gyur pa//spor byed khyud thogs gnod
74b4(rgyud): sbyin ma//rnal 'byor mthing naganyul cheran ma//'jigs byed g.yang gzhi go su gyon//ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar//dpyugs pas glu blangs stongs khams grags//ha ha ga da mos lha rnams
74b5(rgyud): s+phar//rdo rje khyud chen g.yas pa na//ban da rag ta g.yon pa na//ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs//lho nub mtshamasu bsam bya ba//yi dgas thub pa gnas gyur pa//spor byed me khyer
74b6(rgyud): glog phreng 'dzin//rnal 'byor dmar nag nyung chen ma//yi dgas 'grin rings g.yang gzhi gyon//ral pi kham nag gyen du 'baro//dpyugs pas glu blangs snang srid sbyangs//ha ha'i gad mo
74b7(rgyud): yi dgas spar//rdo rje glog 'phreng g.yas pa na//ban da rag ta g.yon pa na//ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs//nub byang mtshamasu bas ma bya ba//byol song thub po gnas gyur pa//srar
75a1(rgyud): khyod 'jogs tshon skrag sha rdobs//rnal 'byor smug nag nyul tshon ma//ral pa kham nag gyon du 'brar//smag chen brjod pa'i g.yang gni gyon//duthugs pas glu blangs
75a2(rgyud): stong khams grags//ha ha'i gad mos byol song sbyor//rdo rje skrag shi g.yas pa na//ban da rag ta g.yon pa na//ri rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs//byang shar mtshamasu bsam bye ba//dmyal
75a3(rgyud): mgon thub pa gnas gyur pa//spror byed gshin rje ral gri sgra//rnal 'byor sngon gnyul chen mo//ral pa khyam nag gyen du 'bar//go shin rje g.yang gzhi gosu gyon//dpyugs pos glu
75a4(rgyud): blangs srid gsum sbyangs//ha ha'i gdams dmyal ba ste re//rdo rje ral gri g.yas pa na//bAn da ragra ta g.yon pa na//rdo rlon steng du brkyang bskam bzhugs//'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor sgo
75a5(rgyud): bzhi la//byin tse log bzhi gnas gyur pa//shar gyi sgor ni bsam bya ba//phag chen po yi gdan stangasu//rta gdong srin me'i g.yang bzhi ga sol//rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas pa na//ban
75a6(rgyud): da rag ta g.yon pa na//phag chen po yi gdan stingasu//stobs chen khro bo chen pa dang //'khril pa chen po'i tshul du bzhugs//rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyir lhas pa'o//lho yi sgor ni bsam bya
75a7(rgyud): ba/dar gangang chen mo'i gdan stengasu//phag gdong chen mo'i g.yang gzhi gyon//lcags kyi dril zhags g.yas pa na//ban da rlon pa g.yon pa na//ra gdong chen mo'i gdan stengasu//
75b1(rgyud): blo chen gshin rje gshed do dang /'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis su//rngam pa'i tshul gyis bltas pa'o//nub kyi sgor nI bsam bya ba//bum rna chen mo'i gdan sbyangs//dred gradong chen mo'i grwayang //
75b2(rgyud): gzhi gyon//lcags sgrog me 'bar g.yas pa na//ban do rlon pa g.yon pa na//srin po bum rna'i bdan stengs su//khro chen rta mgrin chen po dang //'khril pa chen po'i tshul gyi su//rnga ma la'i tshul
75b3(rgyud): gyis phyir bltas pa'i//byang gi sgor ni bsam bya ba//gsus po che yi gdan stengs su/sbyang gdong chen mo g.yang gzhi gyon//dril bu thal byed g.yas pa na//ban do rlon pa gro yon pa na//gsus
75b4(rgyud): po che yi gdan stengasu//khro chen bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang //'khril pa chen po'i tshul gyi su//rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyir bltas pa'o//ho badz+ra gu h+ya tshig tu'o//gsang ba'i snying po'i de kho na nyid
75b5(rgyud): nges pa sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po las bdud btul ba dang nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyu che ba'i yon tan phyogs bcur gsol ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o////de nas dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal/
75b6(rgyud): bo de nyid gsung gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di yang dag par grags shing dam tshig rjesu 'dzin pa'i dgongs pa rtser chi ba nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo //bruM bI shwa kro d+hA
75b7(rgyud): badz+ra dz+wa la ma Na TA la tsakra hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ha la ha la du tri tsakra nAn//sUr+ya tsan dra pad+ma daM ba tiSh+Tha nA na//hUM hUM ha ha hUM hUM badz+ra ma hA shrI hi ru ka ma hA tsaN Da sarba duSh+TAn da ka hi na da ha pa tsi hUM phaT/hUM
76a1(rgyud): brdzun duman /dza n-i d+d+ha 5//ma sa t+ya thA gar+b+ha d+hA d+hIs+'u lud+d+haH//AR+tha duSh+TAnd/rgyun da n+tu d+hA paT/oMs twa drug tu d+has d+d+ha shA nan
76a2(rgyud): /yo ra nam d+hA te ka mA~Mt+ta rten nyis smye nA t+ta katAn b+h+yan mi dz+wa lan \u0f7f/a m+b+hi d+hamaHhrI / dun tegatan
76a3(rgyud): b+h+yAM shwa/d+hI shrI pad+ma baM mu ka mai d+hAkAd+d+he shA ra~M dz+wa la ni d+hI b+h+yaH/karma mad+hA shrI ho ru/ma hA na marba dudz+nyA nad/ta na daHni d+huphaT/rmi mahA k+Shar+t+ti shrI dz+wA la ne hU~M Ta/badz+re ka'u h+Na/
76a4(rgyud): 'dzing+ge m-ihA hU~M/badz+ra ba tol te/badz+raM du sa te/bad+d+hadz+ras shan te/ li to/badz+ramaHd+d+hi mu/badz+ra sbrul mu/te/dz+ri na mAk+ShaH/bidz+rI kr-i ta
76a5(rgyud): kahaM/badz+ra ka ki mu kA hA/badz+re kha khA mu kha te/badz+rA hu lu ka mu ka ta/badz+ra Ar+yA teHtang tsa/badz+ra a ma g+hA hU~M/badz+ra e oMk+Sha ba/badz+ra basmai pA la ya ba~Mti/oM ts+yai ti br-i ta Ad+ha niHtu
76a6(rgyud): ba ya paT/badz+rA Ti yai grI pra ti Ar+ya ni tsi tur thA ya hU~M phaT/badz+ra mA a ni a pretwe Ar+yAn+de pa shi kar phaT/bidz+ra mun a pA ti Ar+yA b+hA ni shaM ka ra baT/badz+ra mune a su mu~M pa sini pa nA~M/
76a7(rgyud): ra phaT/badz+ra mu ni a pra ti Ir+ya ni traM su ba shi ka ra phaTe/badz+ra mu tri na e pra ti Ar+ya ni pi shi ka ra phaT/badz+ra mu ni e du pri ti a ni be shi ka ra phaT/oM h+ye hi a na ya ho/oM ru lu ru lu hUMH
76b1(rgyud): dzad+hu ba ha/badz+ra krod+ha sa ma la hUM phaTaces gsung ga dkyil 'khor gyis stong gsum gyi dkyil 'khor khyab par dus gcig khyab par grags pa dang /dmanod pa bka' nyan gyi chags ma'i smin ma pa
76b2(rgyud): sogs pa rnams kyis kyang so so'i srog gi snying po phul lo//badz+rA ma nu dak+Sha sa~M/badz+ra pra ma ni badz+ra ro to/badz+ra be swA baM/badz+ra pa~Mng gA la ma badz+ra ke ma ri/badz+ra oMn dA na/badz+ra su ra ya tra/badz+ra saM hu mya/
76b3(rgyud): badz+ra a mri ta/badz+ra da na ta/badz+ra rak+Sha si/badz+ra bak+Sha sa/badz+ra ra ti haM/badz+ra ru te haM/badz+ra e ka tsa raM/badz+ra me no ha raM/badz+ra sa ni d+ha haM/badz+rI ba ya bya/badz+ra ma hA ma ra ma ne/badz+ra ig ne yai/badz+ro tsa
76b4(rgyud): mun tri/badz+ra pu tra na/badz+ra paR+sha na~M/badz+ra mA hA ka la/badz+ra tak+ShA pa~M/badz+re lam po d+hA re/ye shes rgyal po dgongasu gsol// la khris paso zhi mdzad pa//thugs rje khyo dpal rngam pa'i tshen//
76b5(rgyud): 'bar ba'i byin rlabs rmad po/de nyid du ni bdug la stsal//oM badz+ra sI ma ya s+t+wa~M//oM badz+ra sa ma ya ho//badz+ra sa mA ya phaT/a li u lI ta li ta pa li nga sti kho na ts+yai wer yo ga ni kha n+d+ra
76b6(rgyud): ha he phaT ces brjod pas/'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu kun//tshig cing 'bar bas thams cad khyab/gsung gi khro tshogs chen po yis//kun du khyab cing gang gyur to//de nas bcom+bi
76b7(rgyud): ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi de dag gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir/nges par brjod pa 'di brjod do//'bar ba'i 'kho rol rtsibs bzhi pa//bru chad bzhi
77a1(rgyud): brgyan par khyams dang //gru bani sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan//'bar ba'i bar khyams gsum gyis mdzes//thod sbal sna tshogs nyi mas brjid//'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po 'brun
77a2(rgyud): khyumachog ma he gzig dang stag/gtum pa dam gyi spor bas ni//dbang phyug lha chen la sogs pa//dregs pa chen po gtum tshogs mnan//gdan du byas te sku bzhugs pa//slu'i
77a3(rgyud): nog sngo nag ser nag dang //dmar nag ljang nAg 'jigs pa'i gzugs//dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad dang //dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir dgra do//rngam po'i sgra chen 'jig sde bar
77a4(rgyud): sgrogs//stag lug sbrul dang nyi mar chas//sti ra che chung nang zhags dang //khyud dang yid bzhin nor bu dang //stong gi 'jig rten khor yug bcas//rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang //ral gri
77a5(rgyud): dgra sta bshol las sogs//rlung gi lag tshwa sna tshogs dang //btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshegs dang bcas//gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang //sbyor byed chen mo brgyad rnams dang //
77a6(rgyud): dbyug pa mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin//ske bzhi'i phyag rgyur mdzes pa dang //lcags kyu la sogs thod pas mdzes//slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogaso//bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad
77a7(rgyud): kyis mdzes//rang gi stan dang lag char chas//ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas zhes gsungs pa dang //'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du//sku gsung thugs bsam
77b1(rgyud): kyis mi khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis gang zhing khyab par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po de nyid don yod pa'i 'bras bu chen po dam tshig chen pos gzung ba'i phyir 'das
77b2(rgyud): bar dAk+Sha ba'i dam tshig rdo rje 'di gsungs so//bla med mi spang bla mad kyang//sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad//yang dag lamA du zhugs la byams//gsang ba'i don phyir smre mi byo//rtsa ba'i
77b3(rgyud): dam tshig chen po ni//rdeng chen bcu yi don rtogs kyang //rta ba gsum po mi 'da'o//yon lag dam tshig lnga gnyis ni//gti mug 'dod tshogs zhe sdang dang //nga rgyal phra dog mo spang ngo //
77b4(rgyud): dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chu//dag pa'i snod bcud mi dor ro//spyi dpal bcu yi mnga' brnyes kyang //yan lag bcu po mi dor ro//gzhan yang yan lag dam tshig rnams//'da' bar mi
77b5(rgyud): mdzad rdo rje dam//se ma ya ni rdo rje che//mi 'da' rgyal ba nyid kyi dam//bsam rdzogs lhun grub tshe mthar phyin//srid gsum dag pa dbang chen sbyar//me 'jigs kun tu bzang por spyod//
77b6(rgyud): theg pa mtha' yas 'dul ba'i thabs//ji snyed sdom pa mtha' yas pa//ma lus rnam dge lhun gyis rdzogaso//nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi ling //tshe thung bsam pa log pa dang /
77b7(rgyud): ngan sdug bsngal chen po dang //dmyal ba nyid ni rdo rje byed//dgu rdzogs bcu ldan gsum gyis sbyangs//bskad pa la sogs mtha' yas mchog/ces gsungs pas/de bzhin gshegs pa
78a1(rgyud): tid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis 'dul bar 'gyur to//sgyu 'phrul drab bla ma chen po las 'jigs byed chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig rdo rje'i le'u skye bcu
78a2(rgyud): pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid chos thams cad man ngag bla ma chen po'i snying po byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i drung du snyigs ni med par
78a3(rgyud): byungs btab pa'i phyir sku gsung thugs bla ma chen po'i thig le chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas man ngag bla ma chen po'i snying po 'di phyung ngo //byang chub sems kyi bde chen la//rgyu rkyen rten dang
78a4(rgyud): len bcas pa'i//skyo na med thog le chen po las//ma rtogs pa dang ldog par rtogs//phyogs rtags yang dag nyid ma rtogs//'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang //rang bzhin gsang
78a5(rgyud): ba'i don rnams ni//yi ge tshig la rab rten te//khong nas gob sras don 'byin pa//ston pa rdo rje thugs la gnas//dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis//dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil
78a6(rgyud): 'khor bsgom//dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba//thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i thig le dbyis//'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi
78a7(rgyud): yum//byed pa rigs kyi gtso bo ste/byang chub sems kyi rdo rje'i tshogs//dbang po yul dus rig pa rnams//bdag nyid chen po lhag par rdzogs//thugs kyi ye shes lngas blta zhing //snying
78b1(rgyud): po thig lo mnyam sbyor bas//bad+mo ba'i ye shes chen por rol//ye shes dgyes pa mchog tu 'dul//pad med zag pa med pa yis//bsod nams ye shes sgyu mar rol//rol mo'i dkyil 'khor
78b2(rgyud): mtha' yas mchog/gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings//phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa'i dbyings//sku gsung yon tAn phrin las thugs//gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun//ma lus
78b3(rgyud): bdag gis dbang sgyuro//dbang sgyur ye shes rol pa yis//dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor rdzogs//rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub//rdzogs chen rtogs pa chen po yis//rgyan du
78b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs//rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bas//thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus 'byung //phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon//sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor
78b5(rgyud): ma lus sgrol//bya ba med pa'i dkyil 'khor spyod//ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la//thos bsam bsgom pa'i mnyam sbyor bas//rang 'byung kun nas lhun gyis grub//'di ni sangs rgyas
78b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi//rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yin//rgyu rkyen rten dang ldan pa yi//thams cad byang chub sems kyi dbyings//byang chub sems kyi bde chen gyis//dkyil 'khor thams
78b7(rgyud): cad dbyingasu thim//thig le chen po bla ma las//sgyu ma byang chub lam du bstan//skyon dang yon tan thams cad kyang //byang chub thig le nyid kyi ngang //spyod pa rnam pa gnyis kyi yang //thig le
79a1(rgyud): chen po'i lam du nges//sgyu ma rol pa'i dkyil 'khor yang //thig le chen pa'i dbyingasu sbyor//sdom pa rnam pa bcu gsum dang //spyi yi dam tshig mtha' yas pa//theg
79a2(rgyud): chen po'i ngang du gsal//snod bcu de 'jig rten ma lus pa//thig le nyid kyi rol pa'i dbyings//cho gas tshon rnam pa gnyis po yang //byang chub sems kyi dbyingasu nges//gzhal yas khang dang
79a3(rgyud): rgyan rnams dang //cho 'phrul byang chub sems thim//khro tshegs bdud 'dul rol pa yang //byang chub semasu nges pa yin//'gro drug sems can gsum po yang //ye shes drug dang sku gsum
79a4(rgyud): du//nges pa'i thig le chen po yin//lnga yi rten dang rgan bzhi yang //dbyings kyi ma dang dus kyi sring //thig le chen po'i ngang du 'dusate/snga phyi gsum dang yod med khams//sku gsung thugasu
79a5(rgyud): nges bstan pa'i//theg le byang chub sems su nges//phung po khams dang skye mched kyang //phyag rgya bzhi bcu gnyis po yang //theg le nyid las gzhan na med//bzhi yi las dang gcig po
79a6(rgyud): yang //thig le sems kyi dong du gsal//'gro ba'i don du 'byung ba yi/dgo dang stong phrag brgya bcu bzhi//byang chub sems las gzhan na med//bde skyed sdug bsngal mang po yang //rtogs
79a7(rgyud): babade chen dbyings kyi don//ye shes ye shes rol pa yang //rdo rje snying po'i dbyingasu nges//kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' dang //dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams//nya gcig yab tu ngas
79b1(rgyud): par rdzogs//thar pa'i lam mchog dbyings kyi yum//kun tu bzang mo la sogs kyang //thig ye ma yi bang du gsal//gzhal yas khang dang dkyil 'khor dang //bzhugs gnas khyad par mang po yang //
79b2(rgyud): ye shes chen po'i gnasu bsdu//mchod pa'i rkyen dang longs spyod kun//rigs pa'i byang chub sems chen po//cho 'phrul chen po'i ngang du 'dus//rgyu 'bras gnyis kyi ngo bo dang //chos so cog gir
79b3(rgyud): bzhin rnams//byang chub semasu nges pas na//dkar nag los kyis ma gsungaso//byang chub sems kyi bde chen ni//ci yang med las cir yod snang //cis kyang ma bcos g.yung drung sku//cir mi
79b4(rgyud): mdzad la thams cad sgrol//dmigs pa med par kun la khyab//ma bsgos rgyal po yang dag pa//ma sbyangs ye shes snying po che//ma bsgoms gcig car don gnyis rdzogs//ma bsgrubs rgyal
79b5(rgyud): ba kun gyi gtso//ma sbyangs skyon dang yon tan med//che la dang yi ges mi mtshon te//sangs rgyas nyid kyis rnyed par dka'//kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' yis//rnyed nas rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
79b6(rgyud): spyod//spyod pas 'gro ba sgrol ba ste//de la nyes pa'i skyon mi mnga'//zhes gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes nas stug pos brgyan pa'i
79b7(rgyud): rkyen nyid tu bzhug so//sgyu 'phrul dab bla ma chen po las man ngag snying po byang chub sems bde ba chen po'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o////de nas yang ye shes rgyal po de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa
80a1(rgyud): rnams kyi dgongs pa yang dag pa'i phrin las chen po 'dir byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ched du sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo //e yi tshogs
80a2(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/'bar ba gtum chen rngam pa la//khros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya//sangs rgyas bsod na mos sku yang 'jig/bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la//mtshan ma ming du bcas
80a3(rgyud): par bya//bkug nas rdo rje'i phur pas gdab//rdul du byas nas tshogs la 'bul//e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du//lu gu rgyud du spel bsdams nas//bcings gyur bskyod nas phyogs
80a4(rgyud): bcur g.yos//mos 'gyur gas te tshig par 'gyur ro//baM g+hi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/'bar ba'i gzi brjid lhun tshon lo//chags pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya//rdo rje gsum
80a5(rgyud): yang dbang du 'gyur//bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la//mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya//rdo rje chags pa'i phur pas gdab//chags pa'i tshogs la thim par dbul//baM g+hi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor
80a6(rgyud): du/lu gu rgyud du spel bsdams nas//ci 'dod de bzhin byed par 'gyur//ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/'bar ba'i 'du 'phro'i gzi chen la//dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya//
80a7(rgyud): yon tan na mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam//bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la//yan tan yid bzhin gter du brtag/nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phu rapas gdab//rdo rje gzi brjid 'phel bar brtag/mi yi
80b1(rgyud): /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du//lu gu rgyud du sgrol bsdams nas//gzi brjod 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen spro//yid bzhin na mkha' mkha' dang mnyam//ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/gsal
80b2(rgyud): ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la//dang po'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya//gtume chen rngam po 'di lha ner 'gyur//bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la//gtum chen 'khrug pa'i ngo bor brtag/lhan ne ragasal
80b3(rgyud): pa'i phur pas gdab//'bar ba lha ne'i tshogs la dbul//ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du//lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas//'bar ba lha ni'i byin gyis khyab//thams cad g.yo ba med par
80b4(rgyud): 'gyur//a/thams cad rdzogs pa chen po ste//las su ma gyur gcig kyang med//las kyi khyad par rdzogs pa yi//srid pa gsum du bsdus pa rnams//byin gyis ma brlabs gcig kyang med//
80b5(rgyud): rdzogs pa chen po'i 'phrin las kyis//sbyangs pas bsam rdzogs lhun gyis grub bo//slas dang byin mo bran mo'i tshogs//lhag ma kha chu 'dod pa sbyin//rang gi dam tshig rab bsgrubs te//gang
80b6(rgyud): 'dod las de byed par bsgo//khrag 'thung chen po la sogs te//bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni//ji ltar 'dod pa thams cad kun//thams cad ma lus byed pA yin//mdzod ldan chen mo la
80b7(rgyud): sogs te//br-i gar glu tshig chen mos ni//'du bar 'dod na 'du bar byed//'phel bar 'dod na 'phel bar byed//sbos mo chen mo la sogs te//br-i gar glu tshig chen mos ni//rmongs par 'drod
81a1(rgyud): /na rmongs par byed//mos par 'dod na myos par byed//seng gdong chen mo la sogs te//bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni//thams cad kun la za bar byed//rdul cha tsam yang med par
81a2(rgyud): byed//bzhad sdong chen mo la sogs te//pro gar glu tshig chen mos ni//thams cad kun la 'byin par byed//kun la rab tu nyams par byed//a/spor byed cheni mo la sogs te//nyul byed
81a3(rgyud): tshon ma brgyad rnams la//bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni//thams cad kun la nyul bar byed//ma lus gnas nas slor bar byed//slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs//bro gar glu tshig tshon
81a4(rgyud): mos ni//spad cing gtang bar bya ba ste//thams cad ma lus byed pa yin//ljon shing dang ni lcug phran tshal//sdong gcig dang ni ma reg tu//dang ba dga' ba chags pa dang //bris pas ka/
81a5(rgyud): li rab tu bya//zhes gsungs pas phrin las rnam pa bzhi ste ro'i rnga dang bcas par phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams 'dul bar gyur te/de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po 'dzi/
81a6(rgyud): byed chen po de nyid dam tshig sti ra'i rnga bla ma rdung zhing sti ra rngam pa'i mdang sa 'di phyung ngo //e yi tshogs chen 'byam pa ru//sti ra'o je chen sgra bsgrags pas//hUM ha he phaT sgra 'byin cing //
81a7(rgyud): yig 'bru brgyad kyi byin rlabs kyis//ru khu hUM b+h+yo'i gsung sgrogs pa//khro bo rngam pa'i sgra skad kyis//srid pa gsum char bshig nas kyang //stong gsum bsgral ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o//
81b1(rgyud): ster rkyen 'di 'ardungs pas//gnod sbyin srin po kun bsgral te//mu stegs kun gyi snying yang 'byin//spyir la chen 'di bsgrags pas//stong gsum khro ba'i chags kyus bkang //kun kyang
81b2(rgyud): brdung di re ri//rnga sdesgo chen pos stong gsum shig/dza sgra chen pos bdud dpung bsgral//rnga sgra chen pos srid gsum sbyangs//rnga sgra chen pos smra bgegs 'dul//rnga sgra chen pos ngan song sbyangs//
81b3(rgyud): dasgyu 'brug gi sgra bsgrugs pas//na rig dmyal khams stongs par byed//rngab+h+rUM stug chen ri rib rnyi la//ster rnga tshan sgra phyung bas//phyin ci log rnams snying yang 'byin//rnga chen 'brug go sgra
81b4(rgyud): bsgrags shing //rnga thebs glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin//de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dam bsrung /ma mo mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig bskangs//rnal 'byor rnam lnga'i dam tshig bskul//sti ra rje chen
81b5(rgyud): 'di brdungs pas//nyan thos mdo sde gnas nas sbar//rang rgyal lta ba dbying su sgrol//sti ri rnga chen 'di bsgrags pas//lha dang mi'i theg pa yang //bla med theg pa'i dbyingasu btsud//
81b6(rgyud): stir rnga sgra 'di sgrags pas//stong khams sti ra'i rnga sgras bkang //kun kyang rnga brdung dir ri//rnga thabs glog stong lce 'byin cing //rnga skad 'brug stong sgra sgrogs pas//byin rlabs lcags kyis
81b7(rgyud): tshon 'bebs//stong gsum 'khrug cing srid gsum 'thor//rnga thabs g.yab mor bor ba dang //kha dang ka yai ru mtshan gyis//thams cad gan me lcags chen pos btab//ka la
82a1(rgyud): /chen po la sogs te//rdo rje chags 'og ldegs pa'i rnams//dus gcig tu ni tsi ta ta 'byin//stir chen po'i rnga sgra yis//srid pa khrag gi rgya mtshor bskyil//dus da
82a2(rgyud): tu ni dbang chen rdzogs//rnga sgra rin chen khang pa brtsegs//bsam rdzogs tshe la dbang thang thob//rnga sgras gA yi ba med par byed//chos la 'jud pa'i sgra yang 'byin//rnga sgras ni 'dod dgongs pa
82a3(rgyud): rdzogs//byang chub sems ltar de ma thag/ces gsungs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs po nyid kyi sbyor bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen
82a4(rgyud): po ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bla ma chen po man ngag gi snying po dang bcas pa de la shin tu rngam pa'i gdangs kyis dgyes pa chen po'i glu 'di blangs so//hUM gtum chen dus
82a5(rgyud): mtha'i me ltar 'bar//'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi//khro gnyer glog stong 'byu ba bzhin//mche bzang yug za byed che//ho/hUM rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir//tu ge tshe nu rI rab 'bum
82a6(rgyud): rnyil skad//a la la yi gdu rgyangs che//dbyugs pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng ba tshe//ha hUM khro bo'i shes rab 'od pa tsho//ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gas le//'bar ba'i ye shes kun
82a7(rgyud): tu 'joms//sna tshogs ye shes thig le tshe//ho d+hU khro bo'i rgyal po sprin chen po//khros pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen 'bebs//dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter//
82b1(rgyud): tshogs khros pa'i thig la che//ho h+nA bdud rnams kun gyis bdud chen po//bdud kyi bdud ste bdud rnams 'joms//'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa//'jigs byed chen po gdal ba
82b2(rgyud): tshe//hU~Mrje drag chen sra ba po//rdo rje chu bo sdud chen po//rdo rje mi ste kun 'bar che//rdo rje rlung ste 'ther rlung che//hod+ha skyong gsum khro bo'i dkyil 'khor tshogs//'jigs byed mtshan du med pa'i
82b3(rgyud): sku//sna tshogs gsung dang sna tshogs thugs//'jigs byed rngam pA'i ye shes gtor//ho zhes blangs pos stong gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jigs byed chen po rnams dbyer
82b4(rgyud): med pas mnyes par gyur to//sgyu 'phrul dA pa bla ma chen po los lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las dang yongasu mnyes pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o////rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'i don//
82b5(rgyud): gsang ba kun gyi bla ma ste//rgyu 'phrul dri ba'i rgyal po yin//nges don chos kyi snying po las//'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang //dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang //sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud
82b6(rgyud): sgyu 'phrul dri ba las 'phros te//sde snod kun dang rgyud kun yang //'byung nas gtan las nges par 'bebs//'gro drug sems can gsum pa yang //sbyin chen po'i dbyingasu bstan//ling
82b7(rgyud): pad+mar bcas pa yang //'ga' na chen po'i dbyingasu sbyor//snang sred kha dog mang po yang //'ga' na chen po'i lam du bstan//rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di//rtogs nas smra bar dang
83a1(rgyud): /byed pa//de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs//rtag tu byung na pa som+b+hasna la gnas//tshe 'di nyid kyis mngon sangs rgyas//nor bu rin chen 'bar bltar//bsam pa rnams cad
83a2(rgyud): yid bzhin bgrub//ces gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes te/mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings na lun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid
83a3(rgyud): du bzhug so//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po la sA gardeng chen po'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o///rtogs pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i le'u stong phrag brgya pa
83a4(rgyud): las lung gi spyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsang ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma chen po'i le'u las thams cad ma lus par 'phros pa de dag gi 'bras bu'i mchog
83a5(rgyud): rdzog so////rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya many+dzu shrI karma tsAd ta ri tsakra gu h+ya ta na tra/bod skad du/'phags pa 'jam dpal las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud/'phags pa 'jam dpal ye
83a6(rgyud): shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen por gyur te/yum chen mo dang gnyisu med pa'i mkha' la gzhugs pa
83a7(rgyud): la 'di lta ste/'khor khro bo dang khro mo dang /ma mo dang mngag gzhug dang /'bangs la sogs pa rnams kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa chen po la 'dud pa'i tshul du bzhugaso//de nas
83b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das btsun mo dang gnyi su med par gyur//skye 'gag dang bral ba'i don 'di ston to//de nas ma skyes gshin rje chen po'i tshogs//rnam dag dbyings kyi rang nyid rnam par dag pa la//
83b2(rgyud): gnyis med 'dus pa'i sras mchog gshin rje gshed//thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag pu yi//kun gyi ye shes thams cad 'dus pa ste//thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa//sems
83b3(rgyud): can ma lus mya ngan 'das pa'i lam//ye shes thams cad de yi ngang la rdzogs//'khor ba'i nyes skyon thams cad tshar gcad phyir//'dod chags 'dus pa'i dpal ldan gar gyi bdag/bye ba
83b4(rgyud): phrag brgya dpag tu med par yang //'dul ba'i dbang gis de lta bu yi gzugasu bstan zhes gsungs pos 'khor gyi khro bo dang khro mo la sogs pa thams cad mgu bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan
83b5(rgyud): 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed chen po la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po//sems can 'khor bas gdungs pa la//mya ngan 'das pa'i lam mchog bstan//bstan pa dam pa 'di
83b6(rgyud): gsungs pas//thams cad sgrol ba ngo mtshar che zhes gsol to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yum dang gcig tu 'dus te 'di skad ces gsungaso//sprul pa'i sku dag tshad med
83b7(rgyud): dpag tu med//thun mong mi yin 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed//sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las rmad du byung //mi dge bcu dang mtshams med tshar gcad pa//zug rngu mi mnga' chos
85a1(rgyud): nyid rmad po che//chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku//sprul pa'i sku dang gsum ni don dam kun tu sbyor//phyogs bcu bde bar gshegs pa thugs kyi dpal/yang
85a2(rgyud): dag ye shes dpal yin 'dzum dpal yin zhes pastod de gnyi su med par gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa de la 'khor gyis de bzhin du gsol ba la dgyes te/'di skad ces
85a3(rgyud): gsung so//zhi ba gnyis med chos kyi ngang nyid las//snying po gnyis med byang chub sems dpa'i don//thams cad 'dus po'i bla med dam pa ste//de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di bsha
85a4(rgyud): su sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugaso//snyems par zhugs pas phyogs la phyogasu bltas te/rang bzhin gyis sgrol ba'i nus pa can du gyur
85a5(rgyud): te/thams cad kyang sgrol bar gyur to//de nas yum gyi tshogs thams cad kyis dgyes pa chen po'i brda'o 'dis bcom ldan 'das la bskul lo//e me'o phyogs bcu dus gosu
85a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa yi//ye shes 'dus pa'i phrin las mchog/bla med theg pa des pa la//sbyor ba mchog gis bshad du gsol zhes bskul bas/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs
85b1(rgyud): khrims cad dgyes par gyur to//de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang phyug gi 'khor mya ngan las 'das pa thams cad dang bcas nas sgra'i brgyan gyis brgyan to//
85b2(rgyud): so so'i btsun mo'i dgyes pas sku'i nyam su btar bar gyur to//de ltar gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsku langs ste/'di skad ces ched du brjod do//sku gsung thugs rnams
85b3(rgyud): 'gro ba so sor 'dul//ngang gis zhi ba'i dbyings las ma guyos kyang //drin las rnam pazhis 'gro ba so sor 'dul//de phyir mchog gi rgyal po 'di bshad do/zhes gsungs pas 'khor
85b4(rgyud): rnams rab tu dga'i mgu rangs par gyur te 'di skad ces gsol to//sku gsung thugs kyis 'gro ba rang rang 'du'o//dbyings las 'dren po rdo rje gasngor byas te/'di ltar 'dul bar mdzad
85b5(rgyud): dematshar che zhes brjod do//sku la zhugs nas mi snang bar gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khro bos 'dul bar mkhyen nas 'di skad ces gsungaso//khre dang spyad ki srin
85b6(rgyud): mo mu stegs rnams//bdud deng log 'dren thams cad cher gcad phyir//chos nyid sgyu ma lta bu sprul nas drin las mjed ces gsungs pas/'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/'odi
85b7(rgyud): skad du/e ma tsha ba'i yon tan kun la khyab pa la//rang gis khro bor bstan pa 'di lta ro//ngo mtshor rmad byung sprul pa 'di lta bu//rab tu mi srin 'dul ba ngo mtshar che//zhes gsol to//
86a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul byar 'di skad ces gsungaso khyad par rim par bstan pa'i khro gnyer ni//ye shes dbyings kyis kun la khyab par ston//khro bo ban
86a2(rgyud): dang brgyad dang bcu la sogs//ston pa mchod phyir khro bo mang po bstan//ngang khaM kun khyab shugs khro rang rang 'dul ba yi//bye brag so sor rab tu shes bya la//mtshon ma drag po zhi ba dbang
86a3(rgyud): dang rgyas//go rims bzlog ste rab tu bshad par bya//lte bar bcas pa'i rtsibs tson la//'khor ba btso de byed rtse mo tsani//gru gsum e yi pho brang la//zla gam rnam gsum dbang gi/
86a4(rgyud): tshul//mu khyad dang can rgyas pa phyi//rnam bzhir ldan pa'i 'khor lo lnga//rab tu mdzes pa'i thig gdab bo//dbus su ma he'i zhing gdan la//rtse dbus zhing brkyang re re'o//rus pa cho
86a5(rgyud): kyi rba rlabs breg tu spungs//rag to khrag gi rba glong mtsho lta bu//gnam lcags ngur mo rab tu ta la la//dur khrod rab tu brgyan pa de bsham mo//dbus su khro rgyal gshin rje gshed//sku
86a6(rgyud): ni nag po dge 'dra la//dbu gsum dkar dmar mthing ba ste//ral pa kha ma nag srid rtser 'bar//rtse la me 'bar rked nas zhag kyang 'dzag/rtsa ba chu ste sdang mig rab tu bskrad//phyag drug
86a7(rgyud): phyag mtshan bsnyems pa'i thor tshugs ni//sdibs 'dzub rgyu zhags lcags kyi g.yas//dung chen mdang thung gsal shing g.yon//zhabs bzhi thur du bstan pa ni//brkyang bskum
86b1(rgyud): tshul gyis 'gro ba du da//suM steng klu rdzun gapa na byag la//su s+yAd rtag s+ho sham+b+ha \u0f7fbus nam ma can//oM yos pa blang sa su'o//sum yang ya ba dang su 'thun te//pi brang dbus
86b2(rgyud): su g.yon du'o//zhal gcig phye de gnyis mche ba can//khram bam bi ni d+h+we ba~M rnams pa'o//rtse la khro bo yab yum bcu//rab tu khros pa'i steng mig can//go rims bzhin du bgod phyir bya//zla
86b3(rgyud): gom dur khrid la mo ste//sgro lo de bzhin bsrung ba'o//de la rim pas mgu bar bya//zhes brjod de 'di sku gsung thugs las byung ngo //oM a kro many+dzu shrI mu/hUM badz+rI k+Sho d+had+hI na nu/oM badz+re
86b4(rgyud): sh+tsan//oM du dun sa shA/zhes 'arjod kyis byags sems gas//dmas sa
86b5(rgyud): to/ldeg go/cham mo//'ur te g.yo 'gul du gyur te 'khrugs par gyur to//de nas yum gyis tinge 'dzin la bzhugs par gsol ba gdab ste/gsol bar zhus pa/e ma'o rab tu rmo
86b6(rgyud): ldan khyod//'jig rten 'khrugs par mdzad pa'o//dbang med las kyis mnar ba la//bder gshegs gsung du gsungs pa ste//rab tu bde bar mdzad du gsol zhes glengs pas/bcom
86b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis ting 'dzin mchog gi rgyal po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te 'di gsungaso//oM badz+ra na la ka la hUM badz+ra ga ta pra be sha ho/zhes gsungs pas/'jig rten gyi khams
87a1(rgyud): 'di dag rab tu 'jam par gyur to//gyur pas sems can thams cad slar sngon khyon bzhin du gyur te/bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed chen po la skya su dong ngo //de
87a2(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi phyag rgyas mnyes par bya ba 'di gsungaso//rtse gcig mnyam par gzhag bya ste//sgeg mo g.yon du gnas par bya//bskul
87a3(rgyud): pa'i ting 'dzin brlan pa la//bskyod pa byang chub lam du drangs//gnas nyid bder gshegs skyes pa'i rkyen//rtse mo oM la phaT du bstan zhes gsungs pas/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin
87a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad rol mos mnyes par gyur te//'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las//gleng gzhi rtsa ba'i le'u ste dang po'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das
87a5(rgyud): kyis phrin las zhi bar bya ba 'di ched du brjod do//rab tu dkar ba'i yul dag la//mgu ba'i sems dang ldan byas te//dang bas mgu bo'i las byas zhes//bla med rgyal bas rab tu
87a6(rgyud): bshad//sa gzhi dkor ba rab mnyam la//gru bzhir ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor la//lte bar bcas shing rtsib sa brgyad pa//mkhas pas bsgoms te bri bar bya//dkar dang ldan
87a7(rgyud): pa'i zla ba la//gcig nas gsum nas mgo btsugs la//khams gsum rab tu mgu bya'i phyir//nyam su lon par byas la bsgrub//dbus su ye shes bdag po la//shar
87b1(rgyud): du nug 'joms chen po ste//lho ru ya ba ti zhes bya//nub du khro bo dmigs pa la//byang du bdud 'joms dgod par bya//shar lho lho nub nub byang dang //byang shar 'tsham su dgod pa ni//glang mgo
87b2(rgyud): khro tshe gcod sbyong rje//las grub brgyad de go ri mo bzhi na//steng 'og dmar po brag dgon bsgoms te dgod//zlo gam lam mo gsum rnamaso//sgo sgor sgo srungs ma rnams bri//de yi yum
87b3(rgyud): dang bcas pa rnams//khro bo nyid dang sku 'thun pa'o//sems dpa'i 'dug stangs gnas byas la//sgeg mo g.yon du bsten byas la//sngags g.yog mdzes par tshogs byas la//mgu
87b4(rgyud): pa'i phrin las brtsam par bya//ske ci thal ba rus pa la//dza ma pa la yi gzugs lta bur//byas la snying khar bre bI ni//oM ma pa la si ti 'am//gang 'dod pa yi ge de//pheMT dang sA hA sa
87b5(rgyud): dam lter bya//ming byang gong ltar bri byas la//gang ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du gzhag/de la 'di yang rab tu brjod//oM a kro badz+ra shan ting na ga badz+ra swA hA//oM a kro ti ka shan ting bi laM bum
87b6(rgyud): zhes brjod la snying khor brgya ba na/thams cad mgu nas dang ba'i sems kyis zhi bar 'gyur ro//de nas zhi ba'i las byas zin nase/phyogs bcu'i gdug pa zhi bar bya ste/bdag la mi
87b7(rgyud): dga' ba med na las 'grub pa yin no//'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/thams cad zhi po'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams
88a1(rgyud): cad rgyas pas bya ba 'di ched du brjod do//gser las grub pa'i yul dag la'ang //dpal rgyas sems dang ldan byas te//rgyas par bya ba'i sems kyis su//dkyil
88a2(rgyud): 'khor dam pa bshad par bya//dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin byas la//ba yi chag tshig btab byas te//rnal 'byor dam pa blo ldan pas//thig ni gdab po rab tu brtsam//gser las grub
88a3(rgyud): pa'i thig skud la//dpal ldan 'phel ba'i sems dang bcas//slob ma dam pa las grub par//bsams la thig ni gdab par bya//pho brang gsar la rtse mo g.yu//rdo rje rtsig pa gser
88a4(rgyud): las grub//gru chad sgo rnams lcags las grub//rnal 'byor sngags pa blo ldan pas//thig bzhi re'u cha brgyad du 'gyur//mtha' nas thig gdab man ngag can//de la sogs pa
88a5(rgyud): bsam par bya//rin chen skyil klung 'dug byas la//dbus su gsang sngags bdag pos te//phyogs phyogs sgo ba dam pa rnams//snga ma bzhin du bsgoms nas kyang //rang
88a6(rgyud): sngags skyes bu de bskyed do//oM a kro tAM ka puSh+pa pa la na hUM/oM a kro puSh+Ta ti ba ta na stau zhes brjod pa sau bdag po ya ba yum la//'khor rnams 'bru re ba las sam//rang rang bskyed
88a7(rgyud): padam po ste//sngags dang ldan par ting 'dzin gsal//bzhugs dang brtan dang mchod pa dang //phyag byed pa la sogs pa yi//las kyi bya ba ma lus par thams cad ma lus /
88b1(rgyud): tshong par bya//spyod dang grub pa'i 'bras bu ni//rgyal ba bsten te thag mi ring //rang grub 'bras bu de la sogs//phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi//dngos grub dam pa rab tu ster zhes//
88b2(rgyud): 'dren pa dpa' pos yang dag bshad//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa//dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin byas nas//sa zhag gser las grub pa la//gzugs ni dam pa rab tu bya//phyi kun gla
88b3(rgyud): rgyal mnan byas la//nang hUM puSh+Ti a pu tse swA hA//snying khar bris nas brjod byas pa//snying po sngags kyi dam pa ste//bla med dam pas rab tu bshadra//oM badz+ra puSh+Ti A yu paM shang shrI duSh+Ta

88b5(rgyud): 'das dri bdag nyid dbang gis 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ched du brjod do//zangs las 'brel pa'i yul dag la//rang dbang med de dbang bsdus nas//
88b6(rgyud): 'du ba'i sems dang ldan byas te//dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad par bya//zangs sam dmar po'i sa dag la//dkyil 'khor sde ma dag dang 'dra//legs par khong snyoms zin pa dang
88b7(rgyud): thig ni rab tu gdab par bya//lto ba can la rtsibs brgyad pa//kun tu zlum pas rgyas pa mtha'/lte dbus gzhu rdungs bris byas la//de steng bdag po dam pa gzhag/thams cad ma
89a1(rgyud): lus mchog tu 'gugs//sa pa la yang thogs pa med//zhes ni yang dag bla med nges//bshad pade bya ste rab tu bskyon//gzhan yang rab tu bshad bya ba//sems kyi
89a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dam pa ste//bla med yang dag nges pa'i lam//sangs rgyas byang chub la sogs rnams//gzhung las 'byung ba'i tshig don rnams//ma nor gsungs par bka' bzhin du//

89a4(rgyud): dkar rkang rjes sa 'am gzhan//khrag gsum thal chen sras byas la//ga pu'i nang du blugs byas la//gzi gnyis ni kha sbyor te//skud pa dmar bzangs la sogs//bcing
89a5(rgyud): bsdums te dkris byas la//dkyil 'khor gri gri thog du gzhag/yungs dkar zangs gnyis bi sreg byas te//dud pas gau bu de la bdug/de la bdugs par gyur pa dang //bzlas
89a6(rgyud): bu'i snying po brjod byed ding //lan grangs khri chang dum du//brjod na sangs rgyas la sogs rnams//'gugs pas gyur na phal ba gzhan//sma gci dgos te nges par 'gugs//
89a7(rgyud): oM badz+ra o kro mam+mu shrI pa shang mahA sa rba ti la bruM//lan grangs mang du brjod byas na//ci ltar bsams pa thams cad 'gugs//rgya shug bkus pa'i khu ba dang //ma yi lag pa
89b1(rgyud): sa//snga bzhon du kun gyus na//jugs par 'gyur shos dpang thos bshad//yang na da dgol ga tu rlu zhes gsungs pas//rnams cad ma lus par 'dus to//dpor na
89b2(rgyud): phyogs thams cade nas maHlaM s+t+rai mA~M 'du ba bzhin du 'dus te/bdag ni dang du bya ba ded / du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'ji me pa lhag shrIn rjes gsung po//shA phyogs pa ka su bAn
89b3(rgyud): 'khor logs pa'i rgyud las dbang gi le ng+ge steban po'o//de nas bcom ldan 'ad /khro bo chen pheM kau shin rje'i tshogs 'du mdzad de//dang bzhin gyi mthu can 'di gsu so//'byung byed pa
89b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ni//dkyil 'khor sngam bzhin byas la//bdag nyid khro bo chen po ste//yum yang de bzhin de yi'o//yab yum gnyis med byin brlabs khas//thabs dang sho sa rab 'phro 'dra

90a1(rgyud): kun tu rab tu g.yos so//'gul 'gul/rab tu 'gul/kun tu rab tu 'gu'o//ldog ldeg/rab tu ldeg/kun du rab tu ldeg go/che mchem/rab tu cham/kun tu rab tu
90a2(rgyud): che mtsham mo//'ur 'ur/rab tu 'ur 'ur/kun du rab tu 'ur 'u ro//dbus mthon mtha' dma'/mtha' mtho na dbus dma'i ste/'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag rab tu g.yos par gyur to//

90a4(rgyud): mthu can la bdag zhu lagaso//bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis khro bar mdzad pa de la bdag mngon du sems can thams cad rab tu yang zhu bar 'tshal lagaso//bcom ldan 'das
90a5(rgyud): khro bo chen por 'du mdzad pa des 'di skad ces gsungaso//oM shrI pa ra yag shu gu ya sarba ti kri badz+ra ka le ru pa ma ra na phaT ces gsungs pas/'jig rten na dbang che ba dang /mthu cheb
90a6(rgyud): la songs pa thams cad btul nas 'di skad ces gsung so//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang //gsung du med pa'i chos nyid la//rang sems 'phro 'dur gyur pa las//phyogs
90a7(rgyud): bcur gsungs pa de dag yin//de bas nan tan bskyed byas ste//drag po'i tshe ma ngam bshad par bya//'jig rten bcud kyi gdug pa kun//tsham ngam glog ltar 'gyur ba las//ngo
90b1(rgyud): tsha ma mnan bzlog par bya//mo ma yab sum gnyis med rol pa'i sna 'dakyil nas//phyogs bcur 'dra ba byang chub sems//rigs kyi ya ba dang de bzhin banAn ma nI//rtab par brnam
90b2(rgyud): tide bzhin gshegs par bya//rdzas dang phyag rgya sdigs dang bcas rnams ni//gzugs dang 'dod pa'i 'dum bu gang 'dod thub par ro//mi dge bcu dang ldan pa'i rnam par 'dren pa der byas te/
90b3(rgyud): sdigs dang phyug d+hA rdzas rnams dang //ga'u d+mo ma pa dang //'am po rje yi 'di ba yi/khrug sna gsum s+ye la dang //de dag byin las mchog yin te//zub par 'byung ba gdon rdzog/

90b5(rgyud): d+hi lnga ba'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dum de lnga ga shin dag shing / oM m+b+ha spun gyis grub pa'i dang la longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir chung du brjod pa 'di //rang bzhin 'a
90b6(rgyud): kun du shes rab ste//de bzhin rnam par mi rtags yin pastan//'di gnyis chos kyi sku zhes rab tu bshad//chos kyi longs spyod 'dul ba'i dri na la rgyas//'gro ba'i 'dun rdzogs ma
90b7(rgyud): klu seM s+thir 'byung dang //bdud dang mu stegs srin po gdul ba'i phyir//mtshan dang da'i byad gzug su sprul nas ni//ma lus chang ga cod den du 'di gsungs//'khor lo rtsibs brgyad
91a1(rgyud): mu khyud zlum por bcus//sbrul gyi rgya glum dag gi mtha' bskor la//lte bar rdo rje rtswa glam bri bar bya//de yi steng dka pal gnyis la//gcig la gshin rje dbu drug pa
91a2(rgyud): gzugs//gci bo la yum chen khro gnyer gzugs bris la//nang du dag po rkang rjes sa dang ni//dri dang de bzhin khrag sna gsum//thal chen rgya shug bkrus pa'i khu ba dang //de rdzis la
91a3(rgyud): /dag po'i gzugs byas la//bcug la skud pa dkar pos bcing //dkyil 'khor thog tu gzhag par bya//oM ya man ta ke hUM ShI badz+ra kro ta ya man ta ka badz+ra kro ta phaT phaT a zhes
91a4(rgyud): badz+rod pa tsam gyis ni/yab yume sku mdoge mthing nag la//dbu skra kham nag ral pa gyen du brdzas//dbu la thod brlon pas brgyan//sku la sbrul nag chun po dang //zhabs bzhi brkyang
91a5(rgyud): bskum tshul du zhugs//phyag drug phyag mtshan bsnams pa ni//g.yas kyi dang rdo sdigs 'dzub la/rgyu zhags lcags kyu bar tha ma//dung chen tri shul gsal shing g.yon//de ltar
91a6(rgyud): cha lugs gsol ba dang //dbyings 'di blang bar nani tan bya//hUM rngam pa'i rgyal po khrag 'thung ga/shin rje gshed//khams gsum dbang sdud rtag su zhal gsum po//dbyings nasaM
91a7(rgyud): sprul pa'i yab yum lhun gyis grub//las ngan 'khrul pa'i sems can gdul dka' ba//gdug pa de dag 'dul phyir gshegasu gsol//dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas la/dzaHhUM/
91b1(rgyud): hoHsa ma ya s+t+wa~M/zhes pa lan grangs mang du brjod//des ni brtan par bzhugs par 'gyur//khrag chen rgod khrag shra dang tshol//chen po la sogs gtor ma bsham//de ni dkyil 'khor thog
91b2(rgyud): /dag tu//bdag nyid ting 'dzin gsal ba las//sngags 'di 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas//oM badz+ra hasta ba ba he ta dA na hISh+TaM che ge mo ma ra ya hu~M hUM phaT phaT/che ge mo hasta ba pri ti ni ri te sa hUM hUM phaT phaT/
91b3(rgyud): nyin zhag gcig la 'bum bzlas//nyin zhag gsum gyi bar du bzlas//de dag bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang //gtor ma'i las dag brtsam bya ste//bskyed dang bskul dang rdzogs pa dang //phyogs
91b4(rgyud): bcu'i khro bo spyan drangs te//bzhugs dang brtan dang mi g.yo sogs//ma lus rdzogs pa'i phrin las bya//de ltar phrin las rdzogs pa dang //yang nas yang du bstab pa bya//de ltar bstab pa byas pa/
91b5(rgyud): na/dag bgags dbang 'byar smos ci dgos//de nas yang 'di ched du brjod de gsung so//oM nga ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi//bder gshegs thugs kyi se so yin par//bdud dong sin
91b6(rgyud): po log 'don rnams//ma lus tshar gcod byin brlabs ste//mgon po gshin rje nyid kyi sras//don rnams thams cad ma lus pa//de nyid du ni bsgrub par bya//ngag rnams thams cad
91b7(rgyud): gdul ba'i phyir//phrin las rdo rje can gyi mdzod//zhes brjod cing sngags kyis brdeg pa ni//'phrin las mchog gi rgyal po zhes gsungaso//dus dang dus dang zhag grangs ni//nyi ma gcig
92a1(rgyud): lnga stong rtsagacig/nam gyi gung la brgya rtsa gcig/tho rang thun gcig brgya rtswa gcig/srod kyi gung la brgya rtsa gcig/de ltar nyin zhag gsum par du//bzlas
92a2(rgyud): zhag grangs tshang bya zhing //phyug rgyu btsa' zhing gzugs la brdeg/nyal byas na ga don mi nu//oM ma na kha da sarba sIdz+dzi la ma ya/dz+ra ts+tshi tre kha dpe ngan pa la hu~M hU~M phaT phaT swAd+ha//rdo rje TIgaN+DI
92a3(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya bcas la dag ba'i gzugs la brdeg go//oM badz+ra hU~M khaM s+pha r-i na phaT//tuM a be sha a/hrI hU~M phaT phaT a~M/yang phyag rgya gong ma bcas la/oM badz+ra kro ta ni la tAn tA ts+tshi hU~M d+hISh+Ti bi kr-i
92a4(rgyud): ta nan na nA zhes brjod la bdag gi lag pas dbang bkur ro//yang phyag rgya bcas la//sngags 'di la lan grangs mang du bya'o//oM badz+ra tsaN Dad+hiSh+Ti badz+ra sti re baM/kha hi hu~M hu~M tshig mo dbang
92a5(rgyud): du smras shig/zil dril zhes lan grangs mang du brjod do//rdo rje rgyu grom gyi phyag rgyas bajig go//yang phyag rgya ba cus la sngogs 'dis brdeg go//oM badz+ra kra kAm+b+ha ka la yan hUM phaT pha
92a6(rgyud): ai/zhes 'bumaHsA la rdo rje rje lbu ba'i phyag rgyas brdeg go//yang phyag rgyob ces la sngags 'dis brdeg go//oM badz+ra ya~M gu sha tre thastaM ra bai hU~M hU~M phaT paTe che ge mo ma ra ya dzA hU~M zhes
92a7(rgyud): dbang du dus shing /hU~M hU~M pha Te phaHzhes lon grangs mang du brjod do//rdo rje gdangs pa'i phyag rgya bcas me dbang du bsdud do//yang phyag rgyab cos la sngags 'dis brdeg go
92b1(rgyud): T+Ta phaT 'dus 'dus pa rang yo yai ra r-i hriM ting du ba b+h+ye swA pha che ge ma dunats+tsho zhes bzlas la/khaT+wA~M gi phyag rgyas bdag go//de ltar las de dag slong su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par byas
92b2(rgyud): zlas pa byas na las ci byas pa thams cad dbang du 'du bar de sre zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so//'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ngan sdigs dab
92b3(rgyud): sdud kyi le'u ste drug pa'o////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed/bcom ldan 'das kun la khyab pa'i phrin las bsgrub pa 'di/sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las
92b4(rgyud): phyeng ngo //lde phung yan lag gzhom pa dang //dug gsum rtsad nas gcad pa dang //'bras bu rgyal bar bsgrub bya'i phyir//nen tur phrin los bshad par bya//dang po'i las ni rgyas phya gsad
92b5(rgyud): dgug dang gtang dang bcid dgrol dang //sbyor ba'i gdug pa ma lus kun//phrin las 'di yos byed par 'gyur//dang por btsal ba'i btsal thabs ni//rnam pa drug dang ldan pas btsal//
92b6(rgyud): steg mo gang la mchod stabaste dang //sid+d+hi gangs la 'agling tshul dang //khA spyang gzan la rgyug tshul dang //bya rgod gzan la 'babs tshul dang //don chen rmi lam rmi tshul dang //khyu rke pa
92b7(rgyud): shing stag tshul gyis//ro yi phung po btsal bar bya//ri la 'dug na 'gying bas btsal//slebs la 'dug la mchod pas btsal//gdags la 'dug na 'dug pas btsal//'od na 'dug
93a1(rgyud): na 'babs pas btsal//brag la 'dugan rna bas btsalnga//nags la 'dug na snyeg pas btsal//rgyal rigs yin na sing+ge btang //bram ze yin na stag mo gtang //rje'u
93a2(rgyud): rigs yin na bya rgod gtang //rmang rigs yin na dam gyis bya//ma ning yin na spre'u gyis bya//dog la yin na wa spyang gtang //de ltar ro yi tshol stangs ni//rnam pa drug dang ldan pas
93a3(rgyud): btsal//brtags nas 'ongs pa gyur pa dang //gshin rje rgyal po'i tsham ngam bya//khro bo bcu yi stangs stabs kyis//ro la kun du bskor byas la//dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbusu
93a4(rgyud): gzhag/de ltar gzhag pa'i las byas nas//mgo ni lho nab 'tsham su bstan//rkang pa byang shar mtshamasu bstan//lag pa g.yas pa lho yi phyogs//lag pa g.yon pa nub kyi phyobs//
93a5(rgyud): rkang pa g.yas pa shar gyi phogs//rkang pa g.yon pa byang gi phyogs//de ltar gan rkyal bzhag byas la//da na phur ba dgod bya ste//mig dang rna ba sna dang lce//lag gnyis rkang gnyis pho
93a6(rgyud): mtshan dang //lkog ma de bzhini snying kha dang //lte ba bu so mo dpung pa gnyis//gru mo de bzhin long bu gnyis//mtshogs ma de bzhin spyi bo dang //sku dang de bzhin mtshan khung gnyis//
93a7(rgyud): dpral ba rnamasu gdab byas la//phur pa de dag lha'i skur//rab tu brtags ti goms pa dang //rang bzhin gnas nas gshegs pa dang //ting 'dzin du bsgoms pa dang //gzugs
93b1(rgyud): brnyan nang du bkod pa gsum//chad pas gdungs pa'i bye ma la//mar zhu bzhin thim pa bzhin//gnyisu med par shes bya la//gong du bstan pa'i lha rnams ni//rnam shes bzhi dang dbang
93b2(rgyud): bzhi//de las gyur pa'i yul rnams ni//brgyad po dang du shes par bya//sgom lus la grags pa'o//thabs dang shes rabo 'brel ba'i phyir//steng 'og khro bo de las gyur//de dag kun gyi sku
93b3(rgyud): gsung thugs//ma mo gsum gyi nyid de//yab ni kun la khyab pa la//yum ni kun lo sdud pa ste//bya ba byed pa bdag nyid do//phung po kun la khyab pa la//mnyes pas yul phyin lha yi na/
93b4(rgyud): 'gro drug kun la ma lus snang //de ltar las nams zin pa dang //zhag grangs du bya dam yang bca'//dngos grub thob par 'dod pa yi//rnal 'byor chen po'i ting 'dzin gsal/de ltar byas
93b5(rgyud): nas mi la sogs//thams cad dbang du 'du bar gsungs//dag dgegs la lto smos ci dgos//drag po'i phrin las grub 'dod pas//dgra bo'i ming byang bris byas la//bi gyi kha yi nang
93b6(rgyud): du bzhug/rdo rje rgya gram d+ha yi gang ba//he ru ka yi phyag rgyas mnane//yung kar rgyal pos drag tu brdeg/rgya shug bkus pas drag du blug/nyi ma bzhi lo drug tu brdeg/sngags dang phyag
93b7(rgyud): t+yai rgyu ni mi bcad//de ma rdzas mchod pa shin tu bgro mo//rnal 'byor ting 'dzin drag tu bya//yongs na bar ched 'byung bar 'gyur//g.yong bar mi mdzad khro bos gsungs//des ni las
94a1(rgyud): kyi 'bras bu yang //shin tu zad pa med pa ste/mkhra' la 'phur dngas la 'dzul/mul bying med mngon shos ldan zhes gsung so//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen las bzhi 'khar
94a2(rgyud): le gsang ba'i rgyud las ro la dab kyi bsgrubs pa la ngan sngags kyi phur bus gdab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzem dpal gshin rje nyid rang bzhin lhun gyis
94a3(rgyud): grub pa 'ang ched du brjod do//ye shes 'a byel ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed steng na//ye shes nyi ma gsal ba'i thig phran gdab//myu khyad zlum po sbrul gyi zhags pa bri//stegs bu phyogs
94a4(rgyud): mtshams phur bus bskor bar bya//de ltar bris pa'i dkyil du dgod pa na//oM ni dbus kyi lte ba la//shar du snre la lho ru sti//nub phyogs tshul byeng du ha//byang shar 'tsham su dza zhes pa//
94a5(rgyud): shar lho trai le lho nub me//nub byang a la rab tu rten//rten pa'i yi ge de bkod nas//dbus su bstan par bsgom pa ni//gshin rje ste sku dmar na gi la//dbu gsum po la phyag kyang drag
94a6(rgyud): dngul thod pa tshil gyis brgya ni//zhal g.yos smag nag g.yon ldang ba//dbus ni sku dang rab 'thun pa//sku la thod pa brgyan gyi tshalo//zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa//ya/
94a7(rgyud): kyi skye lar ba 'jug pa//g.yon phyogs gnas yi ga ma banin /ma~M a mr-i ta ta ki sarba amr-i hU~M 2Ta/oM a mr-i ta kroHhU~M phaT/de ltar yob yu mi gsil bar bskyed/
94b1(rgyud): pAd+ma'i gdan la rab bzhugs bya'o//'khor la sogs pa'i rim pa ni//bskyod pa gong ma'i rim pa'o//rtag tu bzlas pa ston pa'i sngags//mi drug mi bul mi zhan pAR+Sha//ting 'dzin gsal bang
94b2(rgyud): bskams byas te//zhi la 'tsher ba'i ting 'dzin la//ri rab dbus kyi ste dbus la//rab brten 'og gi go gr-i na ste//rdo rje tshe yi dbang stsal te//phyogs bcu gdug pa'i tshe 'dren te//gdug pa ma
94b3(rgyud): lus 'gugos par 'gyur//tshe'i snying po 'di rtag tu bzlas//oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI mu tra a ko A yu pa la si ti ni bruM a//des ni tshe'i dbang thob nos//sangs rgyas sku dang mnyem pa dang //bskal
94b4(rgyud): bam zhig bar du ni//le l-I lon po bzhin du gnas//de nas bskul ba'i gnas 'dri gsungs//e ma'o phyogs btsu kun+da nAs 'dus pa ste//ye shes rgyal po'i thig lce 'di//gsang chen rmad
94b5(rgyud): du byung ba ste//rgyu drug 'khor ba'i sems can rnams//ye nus lhun gyis grub pa'i bcud//thams cad ma lus chos so chog/mos kyi sku'am chos kyi dbyings//don dam tshig dang mngon
94b6(rgyud): sum pa//dngos po mtshan ma thams cad las//khyab pa'i mya nga ni thugs rje tshwa//phra mo sems kyi rang bzhin te//gti mug mun pa sel ba ste//nyon mong ste dri me kun dang bral//shin du gang
94b7(rgyud): ba mya ngan 'das//thugs rje'i rang bzhin gshin rje ste//rdo rje tshe'i rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba'o zhes gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad rngam pa
95a1(rgyud): zhal nus 'di skad ces gsungs//oM mA phyogs bcu 'jig rten yonas dben//bder gshugs thams cad ye nasA ldan gyis grub//mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i ya
95a2(rgyud): shes lhun rdzogs pa'i//phyogs bcu'i steng khams 'jig rten rgyan du bcas//thabs dang shes rab kyis ni dbang skur na//bdud dang srin po log 'dren tshe bsdus te//dbang bskur gnang
95a3(rgyud): ba dres kyang byin bskyed de//shar phyogs dri za'i granas nas tshe drongs shig/oM badz+ra ku la oM swa shwa ra na ha ha ho ho hUM hUM zhes ni dbyangs dang bcas pa yis//rdo rje rigs la grub pa yi//bde bar
95a4(rgyud): gshegs po thams cad kyis//maugon po gshin rje tshe dbang bskur//de nas rin po che'i tshe'i dbang bskur ba'i phyir 'di gsungaso//e ma'o rin chen 'chang ba kun gyi bdag/'jig rten
95a5(rgyud): dbang phyug dbang byed pa//gtso mchog khyab par byin brlabs te//mi 'gyur rigs kyi tshe thob nas//lho phyogs gshin rje'i gnas nas tshe drongs shig/oM rad na ku la A yu he haM
95a6(rgyud): \u0f85haM/rin tshon dgyes pa'i dbang bskur bas//khyad par byin brlabs tho ba gyur cig/de nas pad+ma rigs kyo cha'i dbang 'di yang gsungs//e me'o khro gtum rngam pa'i tshogs//beng+ga ri
95a7(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug ste//snang ba med las lhun gyis grub//rdo rje 'chang gis dbang skur bas//klu 'dul tshe yi dbang thob shog/pad+ma ku la A yu he te ho ho haM//lhun gyis grub pa tshe yi dbang //
95b1(rgyud): thogs ma dam pa thob par shog/de nan las kyi rigs kyi tshe'i dbang bskur ba 'di brdadado//snyoma'i rung du zhin mtshan ma med pa yi//ye shos lnga ldan drin las gtso//gnyisu medapa
95b2(rgyud): las kyi rigs//las rnams thams cad dbang bskur bas//glanod sbyin gdon la tshe drongs te//gnod sbyin bgegs 'dul dbang thob shog/e kI ra me ku la A mu he he ho ha haM zhes
95b3(rgyud): brjod pas thams cad cha'i dbang nyid du gyur te/ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do//tshad med bzhi yi thugs rjes kyang //nyon mongs dag rnams zhi gyur cig/ces phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde
95b4(rgyud): bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis tshe'i dbang bskur ro//'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las 'jam dpal tshe grub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das
95b5(rgyud): gshin rje'i bdag nyid des mtha' byed 'byung ba de nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs las byung ngo //gshi ni rje las kyi byin las 'di//myos drang mgo 'khor byed pa dang //yid 'khrug khrag tu
95b6(rgyud): skyug par byed//lag 'dren rnam pa drug tu bstan//srog 'dren mthar byed dkyil 'khor ni//bcu gnyis 'khor lo rtsibs can+da de//yi dgas kyi ni gos la bri//sum rtse gi ldan pa
95b7(rgyud): mu~M ran la//dbyangs kyi yi ges kun du bskor//shrI'i sngags kyis mnon byas la//tha la thod pa gtang bar bya//de nas sngags kyis dgang bar bya//ya ma na ste ra tsa'i tshogs//sa ste/
96a1(rgyud): 'byung byed to yi rton//mo b+h+yo thams cad srog pa'o//bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed sbyar bstod la//yum yang do du bsgom byas la//phyogs bcu gdug pa thams cad kun//
96a2(rgyud): ma lus tsham ngam drag par bya//bzlas pa'i snying po ma nor bar//sgra dang 'du byed rab spangs te//bde zhing yod 'ong gnas dag las//rab tu sdang mig sdang sems bcas//sgra dang bcas/
96a3(rgyud): pa'i sems spangs te//nyi ma shar nas nub kyi bar//rgyunA dang dus su bstan pa'o//bar bar bskul ba'i las bya zhing //bcol ba'i las dag rab tu brjod//de nas bcom ldan 'das khro
96a4(rgyud): bo ga shin rje tshogs tham stand yum+b+hi btsun mo dang gnyi su med par byas te//bzlas pa'i stegs 'di sku dang sung dang thugs las phyung ngo //oMd+hits+tsha bi krItAnan hU~M hUM phan e nu b+hA ga/
96a5(rgyud): sarba d+harmA tsaM tsAr+ya a ti ba haM/oM l-i ya~M aM/badz+ra bo d+hi ti thA ga ta kr-i ti shwa ri//a byi ta badz+ra kro ti shwa ri/he he hi/sngags 'dri rab tu brjod byas pas//kha dog che zhing lus bang che ba da/
96a6(rgyud): rgya dag yongasu ma tshad thams cad nam mkha' ste//gsalnga ba'i shes rab thams cad na mkha' 'dra//mthar phyin sngags kyi lung la mkhas par bya//de yi sbyor ba thams cad dgyes skangs
96a7(rgyud): shig/dbang sdud sngags te drag po'i las dang sbyar//mi dmigs gtso bo'i sngags dang phyag rgyar gnas//sgrol dang mthar phyin phrin las gan su bstan//ting 'dzin rim pa 'di dag ldan
96b1(rgyud): par bya//khro bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang //sgyu ma la dbang sgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang //gro 'phang chen po la sbyar ba'i thabs kyi ting 'dzin dang //rjesu bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang ba'i
96b2(rgyud): 'dzin dang /thugs rjes zhe sdang sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab kyi sa 'dod chags sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ye shes kyis gti mug sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /yon tan gyis nga rgyal
96b3(rgyud): 'joms pa'i ting 'dzin dang /'bad pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis phrag dog 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin to//de dag 'joms pa'i sngags ni 'di dag go/pradz+nyA ku la/dz+nyA na ku la/d+ha ku la gu na ku la
96b4(rgyud): biR+Ya ku la/b+hU ta ku la/badz+ra gu la/pad+ma ku lA/ka ra ma ku la/rad na ku la/sarba ta thA ga to ho zhes brjod nas 'di skad ces gsungaso//dpe ra na me dang 'od bzhin du//'od la sbrang mi 'du na yang //
96b5(rgyud): me lce'i drod ni 'od la yod//bod kyis spring tshig ci bzhin du//skyon gyi dri ma thams cad dang //bdud dang mu stegs log 'dren dang //mi 'thun pa yi dgra dang bgags//shes rab thabs
96b6(rgyud): kyis gzir gnan pa'i//me lce dang ni sbrang ma 'dra'o//tha dad pa yi mau ma thun pa'ang //'phags pa 'dzem dpal gshin rje nyid//'khrigs pa med cing sgrol bar byed//mi skye ye shes ral gri
96b7(rgyud): yin//nyon mongs sdug bsngal dral byas nas//gnas dang gnas ma yin pa yi/brgya dang rgyu ma yin pa yi//nyon mongs sems can mtho ris gnas//bsgral ba'i zhing du smos pa de//de la de
97a1(rgyud): bzhin dran du bya//rigs dang lo grangs 'thun pa la//de bzhin byas na smyon pa ste//de dag yongasu shes par bya//las dang bya ba rtsol ba rnams//nyams kyi phyag rgyas rang
97a2(rgyud): don sad+ma//de rtags bka' bo mi 'gyur te//mai lA ye yi 'og glos la//'gri l+r-ing dag gos bri'i byas te//'og nas 'byung po'i gsang sngags dang //gang bya spel la bris byos lo//rag
97a3(rgyud): ta dag gi kha tshus bran//thub pa drug gi snying po bri//gsang ba'i sngags 'di drag tu brjod//oM hISh+Ti kro ti pi ka ta/hriSh+Ti kro ti ma rA ta/pre sang he te pa mu ka/ho hang he hang /kau la ru pa huM huM phaT/
97a4(rgyud): phaT a//de skad gsung gi sgra bsgrags pas//dgra dang bgegs dang mu stegs dang //bdud dang srin po ma lus rnams//gzir cing gnon pa drag tu bya//mi 'thun phyogs kyi 'byung po de//
97a5(rgyud): gdul bar bya ba'i don ched du//khro bo'i sku ru bsgom byas te//thams cad bsgral bar bya ba yi//rang bzhin grub pa 'di gsungaso//oM pra marta na/na mo badz+ra badz+ra kau mo na ta//oM hang pra khu
97a6(rgyud): ma khu ma mo mr-i ti swA hA//de skad ces ni gsungs pa yiso//rang bzhin gyis ni dbang du 'gyur//bdud rnams dag ni khro zhim gtum//srin po dag ni 'jigs shing rngam//mu stegs log
97a7(rgyud): 'dren rgol bar byed//de dag gdul bar bya ba'i phyir//phrin las dam pa 'di brtsamaso//dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la//dbus kyi pho brang lte ba la//bdud rnams 'dul ba'i
97b1(rgyud): snying po bri//shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengasu//dri za dbang bsdu'i snying po bri//lho yi phyogs kyi 'khor lo la//mu stegs sgrol bu'i snying po bri//nub kyi phyogs kyi 'khor lo la//klu rnams char
97b2(rgyud): gcod snying po bri//byang gi phyogs kyi 'khor lo la//gnod sbyin tshegs rnams dbang sdud bri//hUM bi g+han na//hi raMg sha na na//oM tir ti ka nan/oM mo ra na nan/'tshams kyi dkyil 'khor lte dbus
97b3(rgyud): su//'tshams kyi ba gegs gnon snying po bri//hu~M d+hu huM pA/tuM lA/hu~M swA/gru chad rnam pa bzhi po la//thod pa rlon pa bri bar bya//mu khyud thod pa'i phreng ba gtang //phyi rol sbrul gyis yongasu dgang //de
97b4(rgyud): ltar dkyil 'khor zin pa dang //rnam par 'tshe ba'i gzugs rnams kun//kham pa rdza yi ga bu la//gzugasu yongasu bri byas te//dbus su yongasu gzhag par bya//kha dog dmar pos
97b5(rgyud): bcings nas ni//rtse gcig phyag rgya bcas byas la//gsang sngags 'di yang 'bum khri brjod//oM pra marta nA mo ha sra badz+ra dzaM ki mo ne d+ha a hang pra khu ma mo tha tha swA hA//na mo do gi kha d+ha mu
97b6(rgyud): drabrabra tha byi tha uste ni nan sarba ta~M tA na phaT//phyag rgya de dang bcas pas brdeg/zhag gsum bzlas pa byas na ni//bgegs dang log 'dren dbang du 'dus//gzhan yang de bzhin bzhugs
97b7(rgyud): pa'i khro//dkar dang dmar dang sir ba dang /smag nag ljang nag kham pa dang //so so'i tshe lugs rnga mo pa'i gzugs//mgon po gshin rje nag pa yis//bgeg dang log 'dren gzir
98a1(rgyud): na//cing garnon//rngam zhal du 'di bsgrub so//oM che ge mau khA ra mA kha kA a r+than+d+ha che gu mo khar mkha'o//oM ka la rub che ge mo khar ma kha'o//hU~M hU~M phan+da phaT a/nyon zhag sasu/
98a2(rgyud): gyi bar du bzlas//de nas phyag rgya gsum bcas te//yang nas yang du gzer cing gnan//phyag rgya de dang gsang sngags 'dis//ldan grangs stong rtsa gcig tu brdeg/oM tISh+Ti badz+ra ya yan pa rna
98a3(rgyud): su pud da hu~M hu~M phaT phaT a//las dang rdzas dang sngags dang ni//phyag rgya brtson 'grus ma yongs par//'bum mem grangs ni ci mang de/yang nas yang du nan tan bya//zhes bcom ldan
98a4(rgyud): 'das 'jam dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos rab tu gsungaso//'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las log 'dren mthar byed kyis gnod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//
98a5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i bdag nyid dris mthur byed 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan drin las las phyung ngo //gnod sbyin mthar byed phrin las 'di//
98a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sde ma bzhin bris la//bzlas pa'i snying po bre bor bye//ya ste skyed pa me ste sreg/tos le snying rje rdul chags//nA ni 'byung byed yab kyi gsang //yo la kun 'byung
98a7(rgyud): la bsdu//bdag nyid las kyi mthar byed sku//yab yum gnyis med rol po la//byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phro//'dzum dang bcas pas yul la 'bul//byang chub bla med
98b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas la//mchod cing ci ltar mdzad pa lta r+Ya//byadag kyang rab tu bsgral skud du//tong 'dzin 'du ba nam mkha' 'dra//zhosna gsungs pas phyogs bcu'i gdug can thams cad spa gong ste rmad//
98b2(rgyud): nas smos mar 'gyur te/dper na mi ra ro ba bzhin no//de nas nan tan g+hi phrin las 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yon ta ni phrin lasau las phyung ngo //gdug pa mA lus 'dul mdzad pa
98b3(rgyud): khro bo chen ba hU~M smra can//las rnams thar byed phrin las sku//gnod sbyin sdang sems ldan pa kun//bair chad bye bar sems pa ste//de dag zil gyis gnan pa'i phyir//sku mdog nag
98b4(rgyud): blo chen po ste//dbu skra kham nag gyen du 'khyil//thod pa tsher gsum dbu rgyan can//phyag g.yas zhing chen g.yon pan d+ha//spyan gsum mche gtsigs zhabs bkyeng skum ste//
98b5(rgyud): mi mthun bgegs dang sdang ba'i sgra//ma lus dbang sdud phrin las mchog gi sku//mi ldog tshul 'chang dregs pa'i khyo shug ldan//zhing chen g.yung gzhi rgyan du byas//zhe sdang dbang
98b6(rgyud): sdud steg gi sham thabasde can//nyon mongs dbang sde da gleng chen ko rlon can//'dren pa'i khre rgyal gdug 'dul dom po 'di//dus ngan tha ma'i sems can 'dul dka' ba//nyon
98b7(rgyud): mings dbang sdud dpal gyi zhal du stobs//'gro ba mi lus thugs rjes dbyings la dgod//zhe sdang shugs 'chang khro bo'i gtso//gdug par gyur pa'i dag bgegs 'dul mdzad
99a1(rgyud): pa//nga rgyal la sogs rtag tu drug gsum sgra//ye shes dang las thams cad rdzogs par mdzod//oM badz+nyAdz+ralA~M bi kritA nAn/ta thA ga tA mar tsahU~M wAT/a/shes pa/
99a2(rgyud): sngags dang bcas la bdag nyid las thar byed kyi skur bsgoms la phrin las bcol zhing gnan pa drag du bzlas pa'i snying po bzla so//de'i dus su sbyin sreg byed ni phrin las btsam
99a3(rgyud): bar bya ste/me thabs e yi dbyings 'dra la//ba rim sum brtsegs kha khyer can//ngos lnga mo'i byeng ba ga ting //kha khyer rdo rje rab la//mu rin thaMd pa'i phreng ste//mi ste bsreg byas/
99a4(rgyud): 'chang zhes pa//kha dog nag po shin dri dang //phyag na zhugs gling baglang phreng dang //bai con ril ba thogs pa ste//tshul bzhin spyan drangs gdan bzhugs bskyod//dbang dang phyag tshong
99a5(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams//gang ltar 'tshem pa bzhin du bya//gnyis 'og rang bzhin ya ma'i sku//gnyis med spyan drangs bzhugs le bcol//sbyin sreg phrin las zin pa dang //
99a6(rgyud): bcol bskul dag kyang ra tu bye//rdzas ni dug dang len che dang //spyi tshe sbrang ci yungs nag dang //gu gul nag po la sogs pa'i//ljags 'dri rjes la rab tu bsngags//bdug
99a7(rgyud): nyid g+ha yi skur bsgoms la//dkyil 'khor byin gyis baprang pa yi//sngags 'di rab tu rtse gcig bai n+des//oM hUM ma khang le tra ha mu khi traiSh+Ti ya ma re tse phaT hUM//phyag rgya zil gnon//
99b1(rgyud): rgyun rgya //dkrol 'khor ba sbyor shing gas sngags bzlas//bdag nyid dub kyi phyogs 'dug ste//las myo bar byed myu ba sgoms la//gas sngags ma bul myo dag pa//ban /
99b2(rgyud): myur du 'grub pa ni//ming 'khrugs myos nas dbang med 'gyel ba dang //rab tu brgyal nus bral bar 'jig pa dag/de rnams mi 'grub pa du ngas ma bshad//ces bcom ldan 'das don yod
99b3(rgyud): bo khyabs gsungs//'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las gnod sbyin mthar byed kyis glanan pa'i le'u ste bcu po la///de nas yang jam dbul ge shin rje gshed
99b4(rgyud): chen pos 'dra byed khrun ba rtsi sgra dang gsung rang thugs las phyung ngo //srin po mthar byengad byin las 'di//dkyil 'khor bsgom dbye bar bstan//ya ste rgyal rtse ste gyen//yi ni kun du
99b5(rgyud): bskul ba la//rnoni rdung pa'i don yin te//re zhes bye bsnun stug pa//ya le 'dus te hU~M l-i thim//bdag nyid chings zhes bya ba'i sku//dbu gsum po la phyag drug ste//g.yas dka ni dzin
99b6(rgyud): dper dbus ser na ko//phyag drug phyag mtshan bsnams pa ni//g.yas pa su ti mi zhabs//g.yas par gsal sh+leng zom lcags kyi'o//g.yon mo dang bi chu srin par ma kra ta ri/
99b7(rgyud): rdo tu gripa bsnams pa'o//hUM ste grang chen gi rlon pa//su smad stag gi sham thabs te//zhing chen g.yang gzhi skul rkyen//gzhan yang dung khrod rgyan mchog rnams//ma rus
100a1(rgyud): lha rdzogs pa la//bskul ba'i dbyangs 'di blang bar bya//mi shigs rdo rje gar gyi bdag/rdo rje gsang ba'i gshin rje ste//phrin las rgyan po grub pa'i las//oM dang a
100a2(rgyud): dang hUM zhes pa//oM ni dpral ba'i steng du dmigs//aM ni lce'i steng du l-i//hUM ni thugs kha nyid du'o//de las 'od zer rab spros te//bdag lus na mkho' lta bur gyur//phaT ces bya ba
100a3(rgyud): rab brjod pas//'jig rten khams rnams 'od kyis khebs//de nyid sreg pa ma yin te//yid kyi ye shes me 'bar ba//gcig gi stong nyid gang yin pa//kun gyi stong pa de yin no//
100a4(rgyud): ji ltar mkha' la mtshon snang ba//nam mkha' nyid las byung ba ltar//sngags kyi 'phro 'du btang ba yang //sems las byung ba nam mkha' la//rnam shes stong pa'i ngang la 'du//bdag
100a5(rgyud): nyid chos kyi skur bsgoms la//zhe sdang 'phro 'du mang byas la//bskyed pa'i sngags 'di dag tu bzlas//oM ma hA dang stod ka be ra a ra tsa na ka ta kho che ge mo la dus zhes pa dang /sngags
100a6(rgyud): gong nas 'byung ba dang /spel te las byas ni gdon mi za ba'o zhes go shin rje khro bo'i rgyal pos gsungaso//'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las klu mthar byed kyis
100a7(rgyud): gnan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o////de nas yang khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed kyis/mthar byed 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las las phyung ngo //
100b1(rgyud): yam mthar byed phrin las ni//dkyil 'khor snga ma 'dra bar dmigs//bzlas pa snying po 'di yang bri//ya ste 'byung phyed klu yis sreg/yan+ti yang dag ca ni rnams//ni zhes pa ni dug shig
100b2(rgyud): pa'o//ra zhes bya ba bsgral ba la//ma las skyed byed slar sdud pa'o//bdag nyid ya ma mthar byed sku//sku mdog ldeng nagazhal cig phyag gnyis pa//sku la thod pa phyed tshal brgyan//dbu
100b3(rgyud): yi skra ni kham nag la//ral pa gyen du 'khyil ba ste/phyag g.yas chu srin dbyug tho 'phyar//g.yon pa phyag na zhing chen za ba'o//sku stong glang tshan ko rlon la//sku smod stag gI sham thabs
100b4(rgyud): can//dur khrod me dbus bzhugs pa la//yum yang de dang 'dra bar bsgom//bzlas pa'i ting 'dzin mau 'dra la//bzlas brjod rlung 'dra g.yo zhing bsod//lce la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la//
100b5(rgyud): steng du bzlas pa'i snying po dgod//tha ma dbyangs dang bcas pa le//hriSh+Ti'i sngags kyi phreng ba gdags//bar 'phros rnam shes 'gugs par bsam//tshul bsdus gshin rje nyid la
100b6(rgyud): thi ma//'phro 'du bzlas pa de dag kun//gong du bshad pa dag la yang //de dag rab tu sbyar zhes bshad//de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i khro bos bskul ba 'di gsungaso//oM
100b7(rgyud): yam las kun 'jigs par byed don//thams cad dbang sdud la mthar byed ste//zhil gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog lding //zhen gnyis der thabs klu rgyal gnan//suM la hUM
101a1(rgyud): nag stong gis brgyan pa ni//bgogs rnams 'dul zhing rtag tu 'chi bar mdzad//sku la thod pa'i phyed tshal brgyan pa ni//'gro ba thugs rje phyogs gcig dgongs pa'i
101a2(rgyud): rtags//dbu skra ral pa gyen du 'khyil ba ni//srid gsum ma lus dbang du sdud pa'i rtags//phyag giyas chu srin dbyug to bsnams pa ni//dgra bagleg so 'jigs pa che las sgrol
101a3(rgyud): bi'i rtags//g.yon pa ning dbyug phyag ni bsnams pa ni//thugs rje sa sems can mya ngan la ma la 'jog/kau rlon g.yung gzhis sku la brgyan pa ni//dug lnga ma spangs glan sudag
101a4(rgyud): pa'i rtags//stag gi g.yang gzhis skul brgyan pa ni//dug gsum gan su bsgral nas chos kyi sku//skye med dang la g.yo bskyod mi mnga' yang //zhe sdang byin las bya ba'i dus la
101a5(rgyud): bab//oM hriSh+Ti ya mA ra ya nan dza sa ma yaM zhes brjod cing zhe sdang dang ldan par tong nge 'dzin gyis bzla sa po dang sbyar te las byas na gdon mi za'o//de dag ni 'os pa tsamau gyis ma
101a6(rgyud): yin te yang dang yang du 'dris par byas la nan tan gyis ma byas la nan tan gyis ma byas na 'phral du phra mo tsamo kyis 'grub pa ma yino//'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang
101a7(rgyud): par gyud las ya ma mthar byed kyis gnan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o////de nas yang las phran tshegs bsgrub pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las las
101b1(rgyud): byung ngo //zla ba 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la//pad+ma 'amya 'khor lo gang yang rung //yang na rin chen dra ba la//da mig rnam/ni 'dug par gnas//rin chen phung bu nang du bltas//do ru bri'am/
101b2(rgyud): gzugs par bya//thA ma sbrul gyi zhugs pas bskor//dkyil 'khor dri yi dbus su ni//khru gang thar deb zlos byas la//ge'u khwa sbyar nang du ni//yung kar blugs la bzlas pa bya//rtags
101b3(rgyud): la mi yangs 'phro 'du yis//rgyun mi 'chad par bsgrub par bya//oM badz+ra ka la di du Sha le/prA ma r+d+han d+h+ya Te/sme kho sl-i kha phaT phaT ceso bzlas la/bdag nyid ya man+ta ta kar bsgoms la//
101b4(rgyud): sngags 'di nus tshad du bzlas ni 'grub nges so//yungs kar rgyal po bsgrub pa'o//de nas 'khor khro bo la sogs pas/bcom ldan 'das gshin rjeg shrId la 'di skad ces gsol to//
101b5(rgyud): e ma'o dbyings las byung ba dang /mkha' la rgyu dang sa la dbang ba gsum gyis bskul ba'i dbyangs 'di bdag cag len lagaso//ye shes mkha' ldan ma mo'i dpal//gzi brjid 'bar
101b6(rgyud): ba'i phrin los can//dpal gyi phyag brnyan rag to dro snom ma//ma mo khyud ni kun gyi gtso mo dpag tshad brgyad khrir rgyug/bud med lus la 'jigs byed tshul 'tshang ba//kha nas me 'bar rgya
101b7(rgyud): mtsho'i ting nas skams//mi gonas zhag 'dzag ro rib thal bar brlig/skad cig tsam la steng khams dbang du sdud//'jig rten lnga chen po rgyad kyang 'dar yid yod//che ga mo na
102a1(rgyud): dbang du sdud par byed//bud med gzugs NAn+ya dus la bab//che go ma a drag rag shaSh+maSh+NI ya ma mnan zhes bskul ba ni dbyings kyi ma mo'o//nA mkha'i gtong dpag
102a2(rgyud): yangs la gnas bcu ste shing //bar smang khams mi rgyu ba'i tsho gas//khams gsum thams cad dbyeng du spyad//lcags kyi bya khwa lta bu ni//ma mo rnams kyi mchog kyang yin//
102a3(rgyud): kha'abar stong gi gtso mo ste//'jigs byed rnams kyi dbang byed ma//srid gsum dbang du sdud pa mo//gzigs pa'i go 'phang na mkha' 'dra//gshegs shing bzhugs pa glog pa
102a4(rgyud): mgyogs//g.yas kyi gshog pa brdobasuM pa yis//bdud dang srin po rdul du klog/gi sngon gyi gshog pa brdabs pa yis//dag bgegs 'byung po dbang du sdud//
102a5(rgyud): can gyi dus la bag//oM ma ra t+na ga rAg sha tI yo ya ma ra tsa ka ka ru pra hriSh+Ti dzi zhus bskul ba ni//mkha' lding gi tshigaso//ya ma na ste grub pa mo//la laM lag na rgyu zhi gis 'chang //la
102a6(rgyud): la lag ni thod phreng 'dzin//la le zhing chung 'i su 'dren//la la me khyer rgya mtsho skams//lcel 'gugs byed nyams pa 'dzin/trai la la sbrul na gzhugs pa 'dzin//la la
102a7(rgyud): 'gugs shing 'dren//sngags pas bos shing gdungs pa'i tshe//dam tshig dus la bab po sa ma yaM//sdong bar sems pa'i snying nas drangs//brtse ba'i tshogs kyis dus la
102b1(rgyud): khag/oM ka ha tra ga rag sha rad na ka la hU~MSh+Ti swA hA/zhes spyan drangs zhing bskul ba ni gter bdag gi tshogaso//de nas bcom ldan 'dras gshin rje gshed gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so
102b2(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po las bzhi 'khor lo 'di dus phyi ma la rnal 'byor pa gang zhig bsgrub pa'i las byed na/nga yang thugs dam zhes mi g.yel la/'khor khro bo dang /dro mo la sogs
102b3(rgyud): pas kyang /nga'i thugs dam rje su bsgrub par mdzad pas/dus tha ma la dam pa'i chos 'di rnal 'byor pa'i sku le bsngo ba la sogs pa la dam tshig 'gyur bar zhal gyis bzheso//
102b4(rgyud): de nas 'khor rnams bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po gshini rjes/dus tha ma la 'byung bar zhal gyis bzhis pa la dga' nas yid rangs te mngon par bstod do///'phags
102b5(rgyud): pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/'jug bskul ba dang gnang po'i le'u ste/bcu gsum pa'o////'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba chen po rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogaso//
102b6(rgyud): de nas 'khor khro bo dang kho mo la sogs pa rnams kyis/ngag 'thun pas bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to//e ma'o bcom ldan khro rgyal gtso//las
102b7(rgyud): bzhi 'khor lo'i rgyud 'di la//ngo mtshar rmad byung bstan pa la//bdag cag the tsom 'tshal ba rnams//bder gshegs gsung gi ngo bo yis//zhu ba'i dmigs rnams bshad du
103a1(rgyud): gsol//'phags pa zhes bgyi ji ltar lags//lngas bzhi zhes bgyi ji ltar lags//'khor lo zhes pa gyi ji ltar lags//gsang ba zhes bgyi ji ltar lags
103a2(rgyud): rgyud ces bgyi ba ji ltar lags//rnam dag dbyings las bzhengs nas ni//zhu ba'i dmigs rnams bshad par mdzod//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo gzhan la 'dug par mdzad
103a3(rgyud): po yis//tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis gsung phyung ste//'di skad 'khor la bka' stsal to//rigs kyi 'khor rnams zhu ba yi//dmigs rnams zhu ba rab tu legs//'phags pa zhesu
103a4(rgyud): bstan pa ni//gdug pa mo lus kun las 'phags//ye shes sems dpa' 'byung ba'i gzhi//dpe yis de la bskrun du med//las bzhi zhe su grags pa yang //de la las ni rnam
103a5(rgyud): pa gnyis//thabs dang shes rab 'dul dbang dang //sku gsum phrin las 'dul ba ste//thabs dang thabasu 'brel ba la/shes rab 'brel ba yum zhes bya//chos dang longs spyod pa
103a6(rgyud): yi sku//'dul dbang las zhes bya bar grags//de la bzhi zhes bya ba yang //zhi ba rgyas pa dbang mngon no//zhi ba bya ba nges tshig kyang //ting 'dzin rim pa byams pa la//'phro
103a7(rgyud): 'du dgar la 'tsher ba ste//thams cad mgu bar byed pa dang //mi 'thun pa rnams zhi bya'i phyir//de phyir zhi ba zhes bya'o//rgyas pa gser ltar ser po la//ting 'dzin sprul
103b1(rgyud): po mang por khyab/phyogs bcur 'gro ba'i don byas te//bskul ba'o sa la gzhes pa yi//sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs to//bdag gi ba spu'i bu gnas//kun du zhugs te rgyas pa'o//
103b2(rgyud): tshe dang dbang thong dpa lnga la sogs//thams cad rgyas pas rgyas zhes bya//de la dbang gi nges tshig kyang //phyogs bcu'o 'dzeg rten thams cad nas//bdag gi yid la baM sems po kun//
103b3(rgyud): yab yum sprul pa'i khyad par las//ci 'dod thams cad dbang du sdud//las dang bya ba ma lus dang //bdag nyid lta yi skur bsgoms pas//'du bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za//de la drag
103b4(rgyud): po'i phrin las kyang //gshin rje gshed dang gshed bdag mo//yab yum khyad pa ro sprin lta bu//nAm mkha' khebs pa byed pa ltar//gnyis med byang chub khyad par las//'phro 'du
