103b5(rgyud): 'od zer sprin lta bu//nam mkha' gang bar khyab pa la//khro bo'i sprul pa so khebs gyur te//'jig rten rdul du bshi gau nas ni//gdug pa ma lus kun btul te//slar bsdus yab/
103b6(rgyud): yum sku la bsdu//de ltar nas dang yungs 'bru tsam//ma lus kun du 'gengs byed cing //dmigs pa gang na gnas pa dag/btsal te slar yang 'gugs la sogs//'di dang 'di
103b7(rgyud): zhes bye med par//'khor ba tshang nas spags bsams te//drag po'i phrin las gab par bsam//'khor lo zhe su bstan pa yang //mi 'khor 'khor phyir rtse mo 'phro//lte
104a1(rgyud): ba la 'khor rtse mos gcod//de phyir 'khor lo zhesu grags//gsang ba zhi su grags pa yang //kun la mo stan rtsa ba ste//thun mong kun gyi ma yin pas//de phyir
104a2(rgyud): gsang ba zhes bya'o//de la rgyud ces bya ba yang //tshong zhing 'brel pas btegs pa dang //brang tshogs dgas pa sgrub pa yi//de phyir rgyud ces bya bar bshad//de nas yang bcom ldan
104a3(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//nyi ma bzhi la las bzhi zhig/gsungs shing nges par bstan pa ste//dngos po ci la bskam pari bgyi//zhi ba la ni ji ltar bgyi//sngags rnams/
104a4(rgyud): ji ltar bzlas par bgyi//phrin las nges par bstan pa ste//rgyas pa dag la ji ltar bstan//sngags rnams brjod pa ji lta bu//dbang la ji ltar bsgom par bgyi//sngags rnams
104a5(rgyud): brjod pa ci lta bu//drag po'i la su bsten pa la//lha ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi//bzlas pa'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags//phrin las rnam bzhir bstan pa des//las ni ji lta
104a6(rgyud): shu zhig 'grub//gzhi 'am gnas ni ji lta bu//de dag ji lta bu yis bri//nges par bstan pa'i man ngag la/bdag cig rnams la bstan du gsol/de nas bcom ldan khro 'dul
104a7(rgyud): des//gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to//gang bsgom lha rnams sku mdog dkar//yum yang de dang 'dra ba la//phyogs bcu'i 'khi ra rnams rigs dang sbyar//bdag nyid la
104b1(rgyud): man t+ta ka ru//su mdog gsal bar bsgoms nas na//bzlas pa'i sngags 'di mgu bas bzlas//ya ma ran+da sa ta ma ya/chug mo ba lu ka shwan ting ku ru swA hA//ya m+be to ru na yo ta ya/
104b2(rgyud): gre mak+Sha ra tsi shan ti ku ru swAhA//ya tA ya~M nI ri yak+ShA ya/che ga mo ba la mu sti shan ti ku ru swA hU~M/yak+Sha ya tsa nir ma ya/che ga mo ma ra ya shan ted ku ru sa~Mt+ta//me dag mi bul mi gzhan pa/
104b3(rgyud): ting 'dzin sbyor ba ldan byas te//nyi ma re la rim bzhin sbyar//grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za'i//phrin las nges par grub pa ste//bsgom par bya ba sku mdag ser//yum yang de dang 'dra ba la//
104b4(rgyud): phyi ma rim bzhin sbyar bor bya//gser lta bu yi ting 'dzin la//'phro 'du byang chub sems lta bu//phyogs bcu ma lus don byas te/bdag gi phung po ma lus dang /tshe dang longs spyod 'phel
104b5(rgyud): bau ra ba sam//de tshe sngagaso 'di bzlas pa ra bA//ya ma ra tsa sa to ma ya/che ge mo pra ma ya/pus ting ku ru swA hAM/ya mau to ru naM yo ta ya/che ge mo kak+Sha pus ting ku ru swA hA/ya ta yo ni ra yak+She/
104b6(rgyud): ya/che ge mo zhig sa sti pus ting ku ru swA hA/yak+Sha ya tsa ni ra ma ya che ge mo zhig ma ra ya pus ting ku ru swA hA//de tshe rang rig ting 'dzin gyis//mthu dang ldan par byas taM ni//sngags de bzlas/
104b7(rgyud): pa byas na ni//'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med//thams cad dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir//lha yang sku mdog zangs lta bu//yum yang de dang 'dra bar bsgom//lha rnams gzhung bzhin bskyedapa
105a1(rgyud): ni/mthar byed 'byung ba'i bzlas pa'o//ya ma ra tsa s+yAtwA ma ya/ma gam du tsu pa shwang ku ru swAhA/ya ma ta rA na yo ta ya/che go ma hu hU~M phaT phaT swA hA//ya ta yo ni ra yak+Sha
105a2(rgyud): ya/che ga sa hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/kA yo ru bi swA hA/yaSh+NI ya tsa ni ra ma ya che ga ma hUM hUM phaT phaT/ka l-i rub hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nas ni//bla med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/
105a3(rgyud): 'du shes gsungs te gdon mi za'o//lha ni sku mdog lcags lta bu//mthing ka rab tu khros pa la//gcer bu ral pa gcig ste 'jigs//ma rungs 'dul ba bsgoms nas ni//bzlas pa
105a4(rgyud): 'di ni drag tu bzlas//yA ma ra tsa sa to me ya che ge mo a mu khaM pra ma ya ni hu~M phaT/ya me to ru na yo ta ya/che ge mo a mu khaM mur tsa ya hu~M phaT/ya ta yo ni re yak+She ye che ge mo a mu khaM reg ta
105a5(rgyud): tsar hU~M phaT/yak+Sha ya tsa ni rA ma ya che ge mo a mu khaM ma ra ya hU~M phaT/bdag nyid 'jigs byed skur bsgoms la//sngags kyi phreng bas phog gyur na//mngon shes ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyang //
105a6(rgyud): 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za//zhi ba'i dus su bzlas pa yis/dang po sems ni g.yos par 'gyur//gnyis pas yid la 'byung bar 'gyur//gsum pas dkar po'i ngo bo dang //
105a7(rgyud): bzhi pas thams cad zhi bar 'gyur//rgyas pa'i dus su bzlas pa yin//dang po sa dpal yang 'phel bar byed//gnyis pas dbang thang skyed par byed//gsum pas gzi byin rnyed
105b1(rgyud): //na bsna tshad dam lus rgyas par 'gyur//dang grongs su bzlas pa las//dadapas sems kyang g.yas par byed//banyos pas 'jug par nus pa s+ho/gsum pas na/
105b2(rgyud): bdamang du 'dra//bzhi bas thams cad dbang du 'dre'o//dge za'i ba d+hIs pa byis pa yis//dad pas mgo ni 'khor bar byed//gnyis pas yid 'khrugs gsum pas khrab tu sbyin/
105b3(rgyud): bsagadeni mi za'o//gzhi 'am gan su bstun po ni//bcu gnyis 'khor lo rtsibs can de//yi dgas kyi ni gos la blo//zhi ba pad+ma zla ba la//rgyas pa glang ba'i rgyud du bya//dpo ni bud med
105b4(rgyud): snying khar te//dgug pa seng ga dre'u dang gnyis//dbye ba rtag dang ma he gnyis//skyo 'bog sha ba'i rgyang du bya//lkug pa lug gi khong du gzhug/bskrad pa rnga mo'i rgyang du bya//gsad pa skyes
105b5(rgyud): snying kha ste//gnan pa ri rab 'og tu bye//snag che'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yang //khrug sna gsum dang byi la'i gtson//bai rog dag gi sgro rtsa la//shi ba'i sga la bir byas la//gang brtsams
105b6(rgyud): 'grub par nges par bshad//de nas bcom ldan 'das brtsam pa'i rgyal po'i ting dzin mchog de la 'di skad ces gsol to//nges par bstan pa'i rgyud 'di la//khro bo'i bzlas pa ji ltar
105b7(rgyud): lags//yum gyi bzlas paci ltar lags//ma mo'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags//khra ba'i tshogs rnams ji ltar lags//zhe sdang 'joms mdzad khro bdas//gsung na 'di ska
106a1(rgyud): bka' stsal to//b+hA ba yab yum la bzhag/mam sngags kyim+ba rbA dz+nyAn no//khrab mang ba 'du pra b+ha k+ka/dAs bzlas pa 'di dgan/ sarba t+tak+Sha yaman taka/la /
106a2(rgyud): b+hA pa tsa ta nid+d+haT+Ta/oM a hUM bat+ta li rag shA mAn/I rag mdun b+h+yo//tse mun ta kyi k+She bo d+hi/nam grum pa ya ti b+h+yo seM sa oM/kro ta badz+ra drAsl-i/badz+ra kr-i ta tiH/bedr-i kro ta ka /dz+rak+Sha
106a3(rgyud): smig sha/badr-i krota rag khang /bad+ma krotad+hA k+kinI/badz+rAk+Shat+ta rAg shi/Sh+ThadzA kA te rAk+Sha badz+rAk+Sha ta~M kuN+DAd+hA la~M/badz+rak+Sho kr-it+ta/badz+ra lo ka/badz+ra bam+me/badz+ra shu le/badz+ra ku la ni/badz+ra mu la/
106a4(rgyud): ta/badz+ra ba ma?/dz+ra shu la/bad+ma s+phA ra/hU~M hU~M haM hU~M/hU~M tu hU~M/ hU~M ti/dz+ha d+hA d+d+ho b+h+rU~M//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'dzem dpal yi shes sems dpa'
106a5(rgyud): rgyal po de de la 'di skad rjes gsol t+to//nges por bstan pa'i rgyud 'di skad ces bsol te//nges par bstan pa'i rgyud 'di la//che zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags//yungs ker bsgrub
106a6(rgyud): baji ltar lags//de yis lus ni ci zhig 'grug//bur buM zhes byagyi ji ltar lags//dang podam bcwa 'ji ltar logs/bcom ldan khra bo'i rgyal ba la//de skad ces ni zhus pa dang /
106a7(rgyud): gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to//tshe zhes bya ba'i don 'di yod //chos nyid spros pa med pa la//kun tu mi 'gyur na mkha' 'dra//bskyed med dus kyis gshig du med//'greb sadru'i/
106b1(rgyud): ba'i ngo gang la//bag chags ngan pas bslus pa yis//tshol bar chod 'ong bar gsungs/de phyir tshe yi bsgrub pa gsungs//yungs dkar bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyang //bag chags 'khrul pas
106b2(rgyud): gnod 'gyur ba//mi mthun pa dang gnyen po ste//de dag 'dul ba'i don du bstan//de ni lus kyi 'bras bu yang //sngon nas las ngan mthu rtags te//mi mthun pa de 'bugs par byed//de nas yungs
106b3(rgyud): dkar rgyal pos bya'o//phur bu zhe su bstan pa yang //bdag nyid khro bo chen po ste//gnyis med mkha' la gnas bsams te//phur bu zhes ni de la bya'o//phyogs bcu'i thugs las skyes pa ste/
106b4(rgyud): de phyir phu gu ni su bstan//dang por dam bcas 'di ltar ro//lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la//mtshams med lnga ni kun spyad cing //gos ngan re ba gon pa dang //zos ngan gi tse ba za ba'i tshe//ngo chang mi
106b5(rgyud): bston pa 'byung //dus ngan tha ma byung ba'i tshe//lha mo'i nang na 'od zer ca ni//'phags pa'i nang na 'jam dpal gnyis//'di gnyis ma gtogs dngos grub gzhan//rigs 'dzin kun la ma yin/
106b6(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po 'di yos ni//nges par dbang du ma gyur pa'i//dang po 'das dang da ltar gyi//phyis 'byung ba ni gang yang med//dgra bgegs 'bum mo stong yang rung //de ma thag tu brlag par
106b7(rgyud): byed//khrag gi char yang 'bebs par byed//ces gsungs pas/'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad tshar bcad de/drag po'i phrin las grub par gyur to//de nas 'khor
107a1(rgyud): rnams kyis 'jam dpal khro ba gshin rjeg shong po la 'di skad ces bstad do//'phags pa khro ba 'jam dpal gshin rjeg shod//chos su byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin
107a2(rgyud): las//tshad mod bzhi yi nga nyid rnam dag pas//bdag nyid khro bo 'bar ba'i sku ston cing //tshangs pa brgya byin lha chen drag pa rnams//gnyis med byang chub sems kyi sgrol par mdzad//
107a3(rgyud): many+dzu'i steng na zhabs ni brkyang bskum gnas//las kyi dbyug pa dag gis rdul du glog/klu yi rgyal pos sku la brgyan pa ni//spyan cha mgur dang dbu dang phyag zhabs rnams//yan
107a4(rgyud): lag lnga la nges par dkris te gnas//dbu skra khaM nAg ral pa gyen du 'bra //spyan gsum gnyis med rnam thar don la gzigs//mgo bcad phreng po sa dbu yi rgyun du byas//
107a5(rgyud): ljags dang mche ba glog lhur 'dril zhing 'ab pa/'jigs byed drag pa'i zhal spyan rab tu bsgyud//mi lpags rlon pa dag gis stod g.yogs shing //stag lpags rlon pos sku
107a6(rgyud): yi rgyun du byas//de 'dra'i sku mdog 'bar ba'i cha lugs 'ching //ngo mtshar rmad byung che la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bstod nas gnyi su med par gyur to//'phags pa las
107a7(rgyud): bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/le'u bcu bzhi pa'o///'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/rgyud kyi phyi ma rim par bkod pa rdzog so//
107b1(rgyud): rgya bur skad du/sUrbatathA ga ta bud rdo pu na gu h+ya ngan shi a shad dam bi na sa ma ta tAn+ya tA nA ma/d+hod skad du/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa/bla na med pa gsang ba rta mchog ral/
107b2(rgyud): ba'i rgyud chen ba zhes byug dpa la rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal mo//'di skad de dag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rnga rjes bu chen po phyogs bcu dang dus gsum
107b3(rgyud): gyi sangs rgyu rdza ma lus pa'i 'byung gnas/sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje gsang ba gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pas smras pa/bkang
107b4(rgyud): pabargyan gyi dkyil 'khor ldan pa brtsegs shing yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas sna tshogs rnam par snang ba'i ga//zab pa dang rgya che ba'i yan lag thams cad gsal bar byed cing me
107b5(rgyud): shes kyi tshogs kyis chos ma lus pa mthar phyin pa/kun du phrin las rgya cher 'phrul pa'i bdag nyid dpal bde byed pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug chags pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin brnyes pa
107b6(rgyud): med pa'i chos nyid kyis thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba de nyid lha thams cad 'du ba'i gnas gzhal yas khang bar du sbyor pa/tog min rdo rje ldan pa'i gnas ye shes kyi snang ba rin po
107b7(rgyud): tshogs ni 'od 'bar ba'i khang bzangs 'dod pa'i yon tan gzugs sdug pa sna tshogs dang /dri zhim pa sna tshogs dang ngo bro ba sna tshogs dang chos kyi bde ba bskyed pa sna tshogs phyag sa
108a1(rgyud): bcur 'phro zhing 'phrag pa rtse mo mtho zhing khyams kyi rnam par phye bar sgo zhing sgro khang dang bcas par bzhug so//de'i tshe bde bar gshegs pa'i rol pa chen po kun du snang ba
108a2(rgyud): dang /'od kyi dpal dang dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang cho 'phrul bkod pa dang rnam paro gzigs dang mi skyong rdo rje dang /mngon par snang ba dang /brtan pa'i dbang phyug dang 'brug sgra dang do mi med
108a3(rgyud): pa dang /rin chen phung po dang na mkha'i mdzod dang rin chen dra ba dang /dkon mchog mtshan dang rin chen tog dang /'od zer snang ba dang tshe mtha' yas dang chos kyi dbang phyug dang /chags
108a4(rgyud): pa med pa'i 'od dang dga' ba'i spyan dang don thams cad yod pa dang brtson 'grus shugs can dang /las chen 'phrul las dang /gnod sbyin 'dul ba dang sna tshogs dbang phyug go//gzhan//
108a5(rgyud): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde ba'i blo gros dang /rgya mtsho'i sgra dbyangs dang gzi brjid bkod pa dang 'khor lo rnon po dang /shes snang ba dang rdo rje rgyal mtshan
108a6(rgyud): dang /'od zer 'phro ba dang /drag shul can dang /dri ma sems dpa' dang sgyu ma'i sprul po dang rin chen rgyal po dang /dri ba can dang lag bzangs dang gi ser 'od 'phro ba dang /rin
108a7(rgyud): chen snye ma dang chos kyi mtho ba dang /dri ma med pa dang mun pa sel ba dang dgo' ba'i dbyangs dang /gzhon nu rin chen dang rdo rje rnam par gnon pa dang gar mkhan dang bro'i rgya mtsho
108b1(rgyud): dang thogs med bkod pa dang pad+mo dga' ba dang sa la dbang phyug dang /rin chen sbyangs pa dang sprin gyi rnyed pa dang /yid 'ong me tog dang ye shes sgrol ma dang spobs pa brtsegs pa dang /kha la sbyar
108b2(rgyud): dang dran pa'i dbang phyug dang /pad+ma'i blo gros dang las byed pa'i stobs dang /snying po blo gros rnamaso//de dag kun kyang rang rang gi btsun mo'i tshogs dang 'khril pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs//gzhan
108b3(rgyud): yang pad+mo 'phro ba dang pad+ma 'dzin pa dang /pad+ma sgrogs po dang pad+ma spyod pa dang pad+ma tshim byed dang pad+ma 'thor ba dang pad+ma snang ba dang pad+ma dbang byed rnams kyang rang rang gi phrin las kyis bkod de//gzhan yang /
108b4(rgyud): 'jigs byid chen po byams pa'i dbang phyug btso pa'i dbang phyug dang pad grol dbang phyug dang /grol ba'i dbang phyug dang /sbyin pa'i dbang phyug dang /spyod pa'i dbang phyug dang smra ba'i dbang phyug dang /
108b5(rgyud): 'thun pa'i dbang phyug kyang rang rang gi rig pa bcas pas 'khod do//de dag la sogs pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnam par 'byed pa dang /'byed pa med par snang ba'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
108b6(rgyud): dpe'i tshogs 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang thabs cig tu bzhugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po pad+ma cha gos pa'i spyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs
108b7(rgyud): te/thugs kha'i dpal be'u la sogs pa'i gnas rnams nas/'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed pa bkye bsi/des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gsal
109a1(rgyud): bar byas pa dang /ya mtshan gyi ltas chen po bco brgyad 'byung bar gyur to//de nas gnad dang bcud du bcas pa'i gsal zhing 'bar bar gyur nas/phyogs bcu'i sangs
109a2(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs dam bskul te/de dag gis kyang cho 'phrul rnam par 'khod pa zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen pos rang gis 'khor lo'i khyams dge tu spro bar
109a3(rgyud): byed mdzad do//des yang zhing khams rnam par sbyong zhing slar 'khor gyi 'khor dang bcas pa'i'od zer 'phro ba'i gan su 'dus so//de ltar 'chad pa'i rgya chen po'i rnam par rol 'phrul pas
109a4(rgyud): rol zhing zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas par gyur nas bzhugs pa las 'khor thams cad kyis the tshom skyes par gyur to//de'i dus na 'thun par gleng ba ni kye ma ho//ya mtshan sna tshogs
109a5(rgyud): chos//rgyal ba'i mdzad pa ya mtshan che//cho 'phrul dpag med gyur pa yi//dgos pa'i don nyid ji lta bu/rgyu rkyen med par sangs rgyas ni//gsang gsum dam tshig spro mi mdzad//
109a6(rgyud): de yi mtshan nyid yang snang ba//gsang ba'i dbang po bskul bar mdzod//khyod ni rgyal ba kun gyi sras//dgongs don rgya mtsho don mnga' ba//bka' yi bdag pa dgongs mdzod dag/legs//
109a7(rgyud): par zhu zhing gsol gdab mdzod//de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes lnga brgya dang bcas pas gzhan dag gi the tshom rnam par gcod pa dang rang nyid kyi sgo gsal bar bya
109b1(rgyud): ba'i phyir mdun rol nas langs twe/phyogs bcu nas 'khod nas mchod pa'i tshogs rgya chen po bkod cing rgyal ba kun la mchud de/lanu ban+d+han+d+ra brgyad du bskor ba byas shing tse gcog du gus pa/
109b2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal nas/dga' ba'i bzhin gyis gsol ba btab pa//e ma rgyal ba nyid kyi sku//rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor dag/ting 'dzin ye shes gnas los byung //dga' mdzad dkyil
109b3(rgyud): 'khor 'dus pa dang //byang chub sems sprin char chen gyis//nyon mongs la sogs sbyong mdzad cing //thugs rje chen po ye shes kyis//tshogs pa'i 'bras bu legs smin mdzad//
109b4(rgyud): sku mdangs dga' ba'i bzhin bcas pas//gsang ba'i theg pa bstan du gsol//khyod kyi dgongs don gting dpag dka'//zab cing phral rgya che bas//'khor rnams the tshom ribs nan/
109b5(rgyud): thugs rje che mnga' gsal bar mdzod//'di dag thams cad bsten po'i snod//mgon po btang snyoms lhun mnga' mdzodzad//dus 'dir rtsom pa don che ste//smon lam 'bras bu mthar phyin
109b6(rgyud): mdzod//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i brtan g.yo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad thugs mnyam pa nyid rtse gcig gi sgo
109b7(rgyud): nas gzegaso//rnam par gzigs kun du gzigs//de ltar dgongs nas dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad smra bsam las 'das par sna tshogs rnam par smros shig/de nyid dngos po
110a1(rgyud): mamama.a a pa kham sas mnyam sama.a mtshan thas mams ma# ma yams# yas sa ma ya as
110a2(rgyud): dang bar gzigs nas/gzigs pa'i mtha' dang dgongs pa'i mtha' dang /mdzad pa'i mtha' kun la snyoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te/bkod pa dang rnam
110a3(rgyud): par bkod pa dang rnam par bshad pa dang dgongs pa dang rnam par dgongs pa dang /rol pa dang rol pa chen po dang /mdzad pa dang sna tshogs mdzad pas kun tu spro bar mi byed de/'jig rten drug gi
110a4(rgyud): rnam pas bsdus pa'i stong gsum gyi dngos po 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'di las gzhan du snang bar mi dgong so//de'i dus deng sa'i khyad par dang /dkyil 'khor bkod pa dag kyang
110a5(rgyud): rnam par mi gzigs//kun tu mi gzigs shing dgongs pa yang mi 'gog go/de dag ni mthar yang mi gnas shing na mkha' lta bur bzhug so//de nas ti nge 'dzin de la bzhugs ma thag
110a6(rgyud): tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin na mkha' lta bur rtogs par 'gyur//de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi sgo
110a7(rgyud): nas bskul zhing gzhan dag gi don thugs g.yo bar mdzad pa'i glus g.yo slong bar mdzad de/tshul ba na don gyi rgyal po che//'dren pa kun gyi rgyud nyid pas//nam mkha' lta bu'i rgyud
110a8(rgyud): nyid pas//nam mkha' lta bu'i dkyil 'khor nas//thugs rje chen po'i ya mtshan ston//kye ma'i mgon po don kun nas//zhi ba'i las dam 'jug byed pa//byang sems thugs rje
110b1(rgyud): rlan bral lum//rdos can chos dang 'grang 'gyur cing //zhes gsol ba btab pa las kyang ci yang mi gsung bar bzhug so//de nas yang yum gzi ldan pad+mo zhes bya bas rnam par mi rtog
110b2(rgyud): pa'i ting 'dzin las slong ba'i glus skul bar mdzad de/mi dmigs ting 'dzin bsam 'das brjod dang bral//bde ba chen po ye shes byang chub sems//mi dmigos thugs rje mi 'da'
110b3(rgyud): dam tshig gis//rol pa'i cho 'phrul rgya chen bstan du gsol//de skad ces yang bskul ba'i rjes//mgon po'i gnas rnams la dgongs nas//'od zer rnams bkod 'dzum mdzad de/
110b4(rgyud): 'khor ba legs sbyin skabs dbye mdzad//legs legs rdo rje can//pad mo 'dzin pa'i grogs bcas pas//yang yang bskul bar mdzad pas na//gnang zhing bstan par mdzad pa la//
110b5(rgyud): dga' ba'i spyan rjes dang bar gyis//gang 'dod rtogs pa zhi bar mdzod//ma 'ongs rtogs pa mtha' dag rnams//thugs rje shugs kyis bzung mdzad de//don kun khyab pa'i snang ba yis///
110b6(rgyud): gzung bar bya ba'i skabs dbye mdzad zhes gsungaso//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgengs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba'i rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las rnam par sprul pa'i
110b7(rgyud): le'u ste dang po'o///de nas dga' zhing 'khor 'dus pas//dga' ba'i bzhin bzangs rgyas mdzad de//gtso bos ci ltar bka' stsal bzhin//thugs rjes 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor
111a1(rgyud): gzungs//de nas gzi ldan pad ro can//'dzum mdang rgyas pas bskul mdzad de//'byed 'khyud pa la sogs pa//dga' bzhin chags par rnam par 'gyur//
111a2(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po khyod/thugs rje chen po nye 'od bzhin//thugs rje 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gzungs//phyogs rig med pas go 'byed pas//yul du gyur pa kun rgyud dgongs//mi dmigs
111a3(rgyud): cho 'phrul nam mkha' las//bkod pa rgya mtsho sprin phung bzhin/thugs rje sprul pa'i char chen pos//sna tshogs las brgyad dag par mdzod//de ni sa gtso bo rdo rje 'chang //ting 'dzin
111a4(rgyud): /las bzhengs mdzad de//rang gis mtshan mos rab mdzes pas//rgyal po zil gnon gzi brjid can/phyag gi 'khor lo rab bskor cing //phyogs rnams kun du gzigs mdzad de//
111a5(rgyud): mi dmigs na mkha'i dbyings dag na//rdo rje sbrul sku mngon phyung nas//gzi ldan pad mo chen mo dang //rol po'i tshul du bzhugs mdzad de//'dzum mig chags pa'i bzhin dag gis/
111a6(rgyud): 'khor rnams slong ba'i sngags brjod do//i A hU~M ma hA b+hasmi sha ku ru bi na hI da ya oM b+ha bi hi a la lA ho//gnyi su med pa'i byang sems kyis//dkyil 'khor sbyor zhing bsdu bar mdzad//
111a7(rgyud): bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs sku//rdo rje gar gyis rol mdzad cing //dga' mchog rdo rje byang chub sems//'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i pad mo'i gnas//dekang mtsher
111b1(rgyud): dag pa'i rang bzhin to//dmar po dbang dang gnyis med par//gsal khyab kun tu spros pa las//dkyil 'khor sprul pa mtha' yas 'thon//zhi 'gog mya ngan 'das pa dang //byang chub mgon/
111b2(rgyud): gnas lam zhes dag/gnyis med gnyisu sbyor mdzad cing //rang bri dkyil 'khor gnas la bkod//ngo mtshar spyil pa rnam par rol/brjid dang bcas pas gar mdzad cing //'dzum pa
111b3(rgyud): mdzad dang rol pa dang //kun du 'gying dang spyan mdzes bltam//smin ring bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang //rdo rje phur pas g.yA' bas slong //'dor zhing skum dang 'dzeg ldeg dang //rnam par ro
111b4(rgyud): pa'i gar gyis kyang //rigs kyi phrin las sna tshogs sprul//nam mkha' kun du khyab phyir mdzad//rnam par rol pa'i bde 'byung bar//byang chub sems sogs zhi zhing gsal//ral
111b5(rgyud): pa'i char nyid mngon 'bab paskye//'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na//brtan dang g.yo ba ma las pa'i//sangs rgyas zhing khams dag bos nas//byang chub sems tshogs rol pa
111b6(rgyud): las//brdeg dang 'khyud dang sdom pa las//spyir dang bsti ma dang mnyes pa dang //kun tu rab dgyes ye shes thog/sna tshogs snang ba nyi ma 'od//yang dag bde la rab gnas mdzod//
111b7(rgyud): de 'dus po'i tshe tshogaso ba'o//phyogs bcu kun nas bzhengs mdzad de//thabs dang shes rab byin rlabs pa'i//byang sems rnam dag rgyun gyis mchod//rnga dang sil snyan sgra sgrogs
112a1(rgyud): /shing //dbang po tshim par ro dang //gar dbyangs gru drug sna tshogs kun+da//stong gsum gang byar srung byas te//bcom ldan pad+mo blade 'dra bde//gzi ldan yum dang
112a2(rgyud): bcas par mchod//e ma 'dus pa'i tshogs dbus na//thugs rje che minga' nyid dkyil bzhin//'khor lo kun+da sbyor sgrol mdzad pas//nga gi dkyil 'khor rgyus par mdzad/
112a3(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang ba'i gsol 'debs kyis//dkyil 'khor dag la lhun grub rdzogs//pad ma'i dpal ldan sems pa tshe//phrin las ye shes gnas kun spyod//khyod zhabs bskyed pa
112a4(rgyud): thugs rje'i stobs//khams gsum ma lus dag pa yi//de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mchog/mgon po bka' drin mdzad pas legs//de skad gsol btab dgyes par 'gyur//
112a5(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i gnas la bzhugs//de nas dga' ba'i byang chub sems//sngon gyi rgyud dang lam bzhi las//sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang //sngon gyi rgyud dang lam gro/
112a6(rgyud): rnams//dgongs shing thugs rje'i ye shes thugs//rang bzhin gnas nas kun dgongs te//phyogs bzhi nas ni bskul po re mdzad//kye kye mchog gsum bde ba'i sku//khyams
112a7(rgyud): ba'i thugs mnga' sku gsal mdzad//rdo rje rgyal po byang chub sems//bdag dgongs 'gro ba'i don chen mdzad//kye kye yon tan rin chen tshogs//thugs rje mnyam nyid ye shos che//
112b1(rgyud): rgyal po 'khor lo byang chub nyid//dkyil 'khor sna tshogs sprul pa'i mdzod//kye kye rnam par dag pa'i sku//dga' ba'i rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i gnas//so so'i ye shes sna tshogs 'byed//chos
112b2(rgyud): rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid//kye kye 'gro ba'i don chen bdag/btang snyoms mi 'dor sna tshogs dor//bya ba grub pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag ston//rang
112b3(rgyud): dga'i skum pas g.ye mdzad de//phyogs bzhi byang chub dga' nas 'jug/kye ma'i 'gro rnams de bzhin nyid//byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul las//nyon mongs gzung 'dzin sgrub pa yis//
112b4(rgyud): rang gi mtha' lam 'gres par byed//'di dag thugs rje'i gan su rung //ye shes gsal ba'i thabs mang pos//thams cad dus gcig bsgral byas nas//rang gi bde chen don ston mchog/
112b5(rgyud): zhes gsungs pad ma'i rig pa 'dzin//sangs rgyas sras bcas dga' bar mdzad//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud
112b6(rgyud): las thugs rje sprul pa'i rol pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gtso//rdo rje 'chad bstan las langs//bde gshegs bsngags brjod byed cing //bskum pas de byings
112b7(rgyud): kyi gsol ba btab//kye ma ho mchog gsum dam tshig sku/ye shes bla na med pa'i bdag/byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid//rnam 'phrul thugs rje'i dus nyid pas//rigs kyi
113a1(rgyud): mnanyaH ma kha thacamasas mtsham sama.a nab can thas ma thathaHthasatsham caH tham ma thamamam thas yam gas can nga mabasamaH yaH kas gaNas kham byamamakham ya gal la
113a2(rgyud): /'khor lo dpag myed sku//de ring bkra shis kun sum tshogs//thugs rje chen po yal 'dor na//tsi phyir zhog chen mchog tu sngags//yang dag dus pa'i tshig gus na nas/
113a3(rgyud): thugs rjes dkyil 'khor gzigs par mdzad//mngon pa'i pad mi'i sku de nyid gzi ldan yum dang rol mdzad tsong //de med ye shes phyogs gzigs shing //gnyis med byang chub
113a4(rgyud): sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal//theg pa gsang chen cher 'byung ba'i//lam 'di dpal ldan rol mo'i mchog/sangs rgyas sras bcos bsdud mdzad de//gzhan 'phrul gnas
113a5(rgyud): tshogs g.yo mdzad cing //stong gsum 'di dag sbyong mdzad cing //ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 'jug ste//sku la 'od zer spro par mdzad//des khye'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal//
113a6(rgyud): ye shes 'od 'dangs sems dpa'i sku//gnas ldor gsang ba'i sngags kyis gzhug/phyag rgya chen po yongs rdzogs skye//zhal gsum phyag drug dga' ba'i mdangs//dmar gsal
113a7(rgyud): pad mar ga'i mdangs//g.yas g.yon zhal gnyis sngo dang ser//rigs rgyan mtshan mo kun gyis mdzes//phyag na pad sdang bum pa dang //rdo rje rtse lnga dpal be'u dang //mtha' mas
113a8(rgyud): mda' gsor gzhu 'dzin pa'o//rin chen sna tshogs ni bza' dang //phyag rgya'i yum bcas rol pa mjed//gzhal yas khang pasgo bzhi dang //rin chen sna tshogs rta babs
113b1(rgyud): /bcas//drang du phyed mu tig phreng //ban d+ha dril bu sogs kyis spras//dbus kyi dkyil 'khor char 'phags pa'i//pho brang ka ba gdung rnams la//pad mo rdo rje sogs pas spras//'dod pa'i
113b2(rgyud): yon tan phun sum tshigaso//gnas rnams kun tu rin chen khri//pad ma 'khor lo nyi zlas mtshan//phyi rol par khyams 'khor ba dang //snod rnams kun du pad ma la//thabs dang shes rab
113b3(rgyud): bye brag gis//nyo ma zla brkyang ba'o//de nas pad mo rnams drug kun//dbus kyi gdan lnga bzhugs mdzad de//dgyes pa'i gar dbyangs bskyod pa'i mthus//thabs dang shes rab rdzogs par
113b4(rgyud): mdzod//de tshe thugs mchog byang chub sems//mkha' glong rnam par dag pas na//rig po bde ba chen po'i sku//sna tshogs sna tshogs shar ba de//gsung nyis yi ge 'khor lo'i chags//
113b5(rgyud): 'bar ba 'od zer rtse lnga pa//cho ga'i yan lag rim bzhin du//thugs kyi mtshan ma dam tshig bya//sngags be ces 'phro zhing 'du ba'i tshul//rgyal po bder gshegs yab yum dang //byang
113b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems ma dang //las mdzad khro bo yab yum dang //phyag rgya chen po'i skur gyur nas//rigs kyi rgyal phreng mtshan mas mdzes//rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas
113b7(rgyud): bzhugs shing //rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod//de tshe mgon po bde chen po//rigs kun bdag 'gyur zhes bya bas//pad mo rnam par 'phrul pa yi//dkyil 'khor chen po 'byin
114a1(rgyud): par mdzad//byang sems kau lngas rnam 'phrul pa'i//bde shes 'od zer snang ba'i sku//zhal dang phyakla la sogs pa'i brgyan//gtso bo'i tshe lugs ci ltar bar//rang 'od yum/
114a2(rgyud): dang 'khril bar mdzod//bkra shis mtshan ldan bde ba la//rA ga pad+mo hUM zhes pas//sngags mchog yi ge 'bru brgyad de//las kun grub par mdzad pa yin//gang gi pad ma sha dang //b+h+ya
114a3(rgyud): hUM kis bsnan byas na//zhi rgyas dbang drag las kun dang //grub chen brgyad kyi tshogs sog rnams//sbyor ba tsam gyis grub 'gyur zhing //yun rings gnas pa gnas pa yin//'byin pa'o dus
114a4(rgyud): su gsang sngags la//yi ge dza yis gdags byas nas//rnam 'phro rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor//rigs bdag sku gnas dgyes pas bzhugs//thugs rje skul ba'i glu dang sngags//
114a5(rgyud): 'od zer tshogs kyis skul pa mdzod//dam chog gsum ston sngags kyi mthus//dgyes cha gos brtan pas gzi dang ldan//oM rnam dag pad mo bde ba'i dbyings//ye shes byin las
114a6(rgyud): gsal ba'i mchog/dkyil 'khor gsang gsum dam tshig che//mnyam nyid rigs bdag thub pa che//byin brlab 'dor bar mi mdzad pas//sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thu
114a7(rgyud): gsal mdzad gnyisu med pa'i sku//rang gi ngo bos gnas pa yin//gtso bo sngags kyis bskul byas te//'od zer rgyan bcas thugs kar bsdus//yi ge a nas a'i bar//bcu drug/
114b1(rgyud): 'od zer 'gro bas pas//'gro kun sangs rgyas skur bkod cing //ribus 'thun dkyil 'khor kun+da gsal 'gyur//sngags kyis 'od zer sbrul bcas pas//chos rnams bcu drug dag pa'i
114b2(rgyud): rang gi gan su bkod byas pas//mtshan mchog sim ban rtsa gnyis rdzogs//de bzhin ka nas k+She'i bar//sumau bcu rtsa ba 'i rim bzhin bsil//bar+d+hanA pa'i yi ge drug dang bcas//'od 'dres
114b3(rgyud): thams cad sangs rgyas sku//ye shes dkyil 'khor gsal byas na//sngags kyi 'od zer sgrar byas nas//chos meng ye shes zug pa med//slar nyid sku yi gnas bzhugs pas//dpe byad bzang
114b4(rgyud): po brgyad bcu rdzogs//gzhan yang rin chen sna bdun dang //bokra shis brgyad sogs kun gyis spras//kham las rnam 'phrul tshe mtha' yas//zhal gcig phyag bzhi dkar dmar mdongs//pang
114b5(rgyud): ma sogs dang ral gyi 'dzin//chos kyi snang ba'i dz+nyAn gyis bsgrubs//pad ma rgyun 'byung rang bzhin mchog/shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs//gau las sprul pa'i chos dbang phyug/
114b6(rgyud): dmar sngar zhal gcig byung banyis pa//pad+ma ma'i phreng ba dum pa 'dzin//dkyil 'khor gan su bzhugs pa'o//g+h+r-i la sprul pa'i chags med 'os//zhal gcig phyag gnyis byu ru'i 'od//
114b7(rgyud): gnas glegs bam me long 'dzin//nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa'o//de las spru ba bi'i spyan dag ma//zha la gcig phyag gnyis brtsod kyi mdog/rin chen phreng bas 'as
115a1(rgyud): yab 'dzin//bya gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa'o//tsaM las sprul pa'i mi bskyod pa//zhal gcig phyag bzhi chu shel mdog/rdo rje la 'dzin 'brel bar
115a2(rgyud): tshul//dpal be'u bum sogs 'od phreng rgyan//cha las sprul pa'i rta dbang phyug zhal gcig phyag bzhi bai DU ra ya//rin chen snye ma dung por 'dzin//lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs//
115a3(rgyud): dzi las sprul pa'i 'brug sgra ni//zhal gcig phyag gnyis gur gum mdog/rin chen chags shing 'gu d+hi 'dzin//nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs//nyaM las sprul pa'i dri med
115a4(rgyud): dpal//zhal gcig phyag bzhi mar gang mdog/rin chen pad srungs za me tog/byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs//taM las sprul pa'i rin chen dbyangs//zhal gcig phyag bzhi
115a5(rgyud): gser gyi mdog/rin chen dril bu yum dang 'khril//rin chen mdzod spungs 'khor lo sogs//thaM las sprul pa'i nam mkha' mdog/zhal gcig phyag bzhi sngo sgyu'i mdangs//rin chen
115a6(rgyud): gling bu pad mo 'dzin//shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs//de las sprul pa'i dra bcan//zhal gcig phyag bzhi mthing ka'i mdog/rin chen phreng dang pad mo 'dzin//lho yi dkyil
115a7(rgyud): 'khor gnas la bzhugs//d+hi las sprul pa'i dkon mchog rgyan//zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs//chos kyi rgyal mtshan rgyad mdangs 'dzin//nub kyi dkyil 'khor
115b1(rgyud): gnas la bzhugs//nu ma las sprul pa'i rin chen tog/zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma ra ta//dgos 'dod bum pa dpago da sam+ba shing //byung gi dkyil 'khor banas la bzhags//rdzu las sprul pa/
115b2(rgyud): kun du snang //zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog/'khor lo dril 'dzin yum dang bum pa 'dzin//gtsug tor dri med rdo rje 'dzin//thi las sprul pa'i 'od kyi dpal//zhal gcig phyag bzhi
115b3(rgyud): shel gyi mdog/'khor lo dA ba ral gri 'dzin//shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs//dam las sprul pa'i dga' dbang phyug/zhal ga cig phyag bzhi nyi ma'i madrangs//'khor lo rgyal
115b4(rgyud): mtshan dga' ba'i mdzod//lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas wa bzhugs//taM las sprul pa'i cho 'phrul bkod//zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdongs//nyi ma'i 'od phreng rdo rjes spras//nub
115b5(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs//nAM las sprul pa'i rnam par gzigs//zhal gcig phyag gnyis ljang skya'i mdangs//kun shi'i chun po'i a mra'i mdangs//byang gi dkyil 'khor
115b6(rgyud): gnas la bzhugs//paM las m+b+hal pa'i don yod pa//zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang sngo'i mdog/rgya gram dril bcas yum dang 'khril//rdo rje gdengs pos ral gyi 'dzin//pha la sprul pa'i
115b7(rgyud): brtson 'grus 'khrugs//zhal gcig phyag bzhi kar ti ka/rgya gri phreng ba rtse gsum 'dzin//shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs//baM las sprul pa'i las chen po//zhal gcis
116a1(rgyud): phyag bzhi ser skya'i mdog/pad ma'i phreng ba nor bu 'dzin//lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs//b+ho las sprul pa'i gnod sbyin bdul//zhal gcig phyag ba
116a2(rgyud): pad ma'i mdangaso//phyag na rdo rje mche ba 'dzin//nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs//mi las sprul pa'i sna tshogs dam//zhal gcig phyog bzhi ljang ser mdangs//zla ba
116a3(rgyud): rin chen dbyug pa 'dzin//byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs//bder gshegs rgyal ba de dag kyang //tsikra bsgyur rgyal ma lus dang //mtshan dang dpe byad sna tshogs rgyan//
116a4(rgyud): rigs btsun btsun mo mdzes par bya//yang sprul byams pa'i dbang phyug ni//zhal gcig phyag bzhi gangs ri mdog/rdo rje gdengs dbyug ral gri dang //dri shul thod bcas pad ma'i lcug
116a5(rgyud): rngam brjid 'khor bcas yum dang 'khrig/drag po'i rgyan cha shar gyi sgro//kha las sbrul po rtse ba'i dbang //zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog/ro ni chen dbyug pa pad mo dang /
116a6(rgyud): zothod lnga rdo rje myu gu'o//ram las sprul pa'i rnam grol dbang //zhal gcig phyag bzhi de myur mdangs gasngal//pad ma dang ni dril bu dang //thod sbrul ras sngon pa dan 'dzin//lam las
116a7(rgyud): sprul pa'i 'gre dbang phyug/zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang khu'i mdog/rdo rje rgya gram pad mo dang //gri gug gtun shing phreng ba can//rin chen phreng bas mdzes byas nas//'khor btsas rngam pa'i
116b1(rgyud): mdangs bcas pas//lho la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ru//gzhan 'jig dag pa'i las kyis 'khod//she las sprul pa'i byin dbang phyug/zhal gcig phyag bzhi dkar dmar 'dra//rtse gsum
116b2(rgyud): ban d+ha rin chen 'khril//me yi thod pa ri mos mtshan//Sha las smra ba'i dbang phyug ste//zhal gcig phyag bzhi ser skya'i mdangase//rin chen rtse dgu bgrang phreng dang //pad ma'i sgrag ma sdigs
116b3(rgyud): 'dzub mdzad//saM las sprul pa'i spyod dbang phyug/zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs//dbyug pa rtse gcig pad ma dang //dgra ste zhags pa phyag na 'dzin//ha las sprul pa'i dbang
116b4(rgyud): phyug ste//zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang khu'i sku//ral gri lcags kyu dag sta dang //mau yi phreng ba 'khor lo 'dzin//gzhan 'jom 'jigs pa'i khro bo'i mchog/rang 'od rigs 'thun yum dang
116b5(rgyud): rol//drag po'i rgyan tshogs ma lus 'gengs//pad ma'i 'dab ma bzhin du 'khod//ka las bde ba'i blo gros dang //zhal gcig phyag bzhin mkha'i mdangs//yum bcas rdo rje drili bu dang //
116b6(rgyud): spyan mkha'i mdzod kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang //kha las khang ba rgya mtsho'i sgra dbyangs can//zhal gcig phyag bzhi pu sha ra//rin tshon pi bang phreng ba dang //rnga yab rdo rje cod pan thigs//ga
116b7(rgyud): las gzi brjid bkod pa ni//zhal gcig phyag bzhi rgya skegs mdoge/pad+ma'i lcug ma zla ba dang //'khor lo yid bzhin bum pa dang //g+he las sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnod pa ni//zhal
117a1(rgyud): gcig phyag bzhi mar dang //'khor lo dbyug bam mo shing //rgyu bram rin chen lcug ma 'dzin//tsa las shes rab snang ba ni//zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang skya'i mdangs//rin
117a2(rgyud): chen phung po pad ma dang //rtse gsum dri la thabs 'od dkyil 'khor//tsha las rdo rje rgyal mtshan te//zhal gcig phyag bzhi ser gyi mdog/rin chen gdugs mdzes nyi mo dang //dpa' bo
117a3(rgyud): longs spyod pad ma'i spyan//dza las 'od zer 'phro ba dang //zhal gcig phyag bzhi mdangs mar gsal//pad+ma 'khor lo mchod sdong bu//mu tig chun po za ma tog/d+ha~M las sprul pa'i drag
117a4(rgyud): shul can//zhal gtso ge phyag bzhi ljang ser mdog/'od kyi me tog phungs 'od dang //ral gri 'bar ba g.yas dang g.yon//ta las sprul pa'i dri mi sel//zhal gcig phyag gnyis dmar/
117a5(rgyud): skye'o mdangs//nyi ma'i phreng ba gA Na T+Ti rdig/chos kyi tsakra rdzogs byed pa'o//thA las sgyu ma'i 'phral ba ni//zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa li shwa/sring ge rgya mtsho rin chen phreng //rin chen bus
117a6(rgyud): po de bcud bcas//las kyi rin chen rgyal po ni//zhal gtsog phyag bzhi rA ga'i mdangs//ri bo pad mchu dri dang //gser nya 'phyo ba'i rdzing bu yin//d+ha las 'phres pa'i dra ba tsA na///
117a7(rgyud): zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang khu'i mdog/rgya gram dril bu 'phro ba dang //ban d+he sbrang yab 'dzag pa'i rgyun//te las sprul pa'i lag bzangs na//zhal gcig phyag bzhi karare ta'i 'o
117b1(rgyud): pad pa'i rgyal mtshan dkar dmar mdangs//dri li zhong ba kun sha'i tshul//tha las ser 'od 'phro ba 'dzin//zhal gcig phyag bzhi mthong ka'i mdog/glegs bam mdzes pa'i sku gzugs dang //
117b2(rgyud): rin chen mdzod dang zla ba'i 'od//DA las rin chen snyem ni//zhal gcig phyag bzhi padar ga/pad ma'i sdong bu dpag bsnam shing //ban d+ha rtse gsum zla tshes gzugs//d+he las chos kyi
117b3(rgyud): mthong ba ni//zhal gcig phyag bzhi sna tshogs sku//go cha ye shes sgron ma dang //dpal be'u zur brgyad nor bu tog/sna tshogs sprin phur ser gra ba tsa se//mche ba dril bu ngang pa 'dzin//b+ha
117b4(rgyud): las gzhon nu rin chen ni//zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdog/rgya gra ma 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang //'od zer rtsi gsum sngags pa'i bum//sems dpa' chen po de dag rnams/
117b5(rgyud): rgyan phreng cha lugs 'od zer dang //yum gnas 'khril zhing rang gnas kyi//gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs//nya ma na la 'phrul pa yi//rdo rje rnam par gnon la sogs//rigs kyi
117b6(rgyud): mtshan ma ci bzhin du//pad ma rA ga ra ga ta mudangs//be'u gser mdog in dra bzhin//bad ma rdo rje rim sa sogs mtshan//zhal gcig phyag bzhi yum dang 'khril//'og ma'i phyag
117b7(rgyud): mtshan 'thun pa yi//rang rtags mtshan ma sna tshogs dang //pad ma'i lcug mas mtshan byas pa'i//me tog 'bras bu rnams kyis mdzes//shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhi ru//byang
118a1(rgyud): /chub sems dpa'i tshe lugs kyis//rang gi dkyil 'khor gnasu 'khad//mArbar las sprul pa yi//pad ma 'phro ba la sogs pazhi//zhal gcig phyag gnyis dkar dang
118a2(rgyud): dmar ljang ba de mo me long dang //rin chen phreng ba pi bang gar//mchod pa las mdzad nang gi 'tshams//Sha sha sa ha las 'phrul pa'i//pad ma tshim byed la sog pa'i//zhal gcig
118a3(rgyud): phyag gnyis rigs gnyis gzugs//gdug spos me togra dung dang dri//'ging tshul tri shul las kyi tshul//mcho bas phyi'i mtsham s+yan gnas//de dag gi gsang sngags ni//oMng+ga ha
118a4(rgyud): gr-I pad ma shi ri bu ta hI hU~M swAhA//oM pad ma mihA d+ha bar+yA bun si ti mahA d+hi ma hI da yA hU~M hU~M phred /tad ya dza swA hA//dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi'o//oM tsAkra a na ka na ma rak+Sha sa b+hi rad ni hr-i ti ba ya ba
118a5(rgyud): ti dza swA hA//nub phyogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro//oM badz+ra da ra ba kr-i ta ya ni shai ri ti bi sha ni dzu swAhA//shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la'o//oM rad na ku te du man te ban d+ha ban d+ha dun dun ji
118a6(rgyud): dza swAT+wA~M//lho phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor ba'o//oM pi sha tsin d+ha ma mai du ru h+ya ha ha ha sarba gurba ni hUM phaT swA hA//byang gi dkyil 'khor pa'o//oM ma ma a ba lo kai na ru ru yu ru si daM b+h+r-i dai sid+d+hi ma
118a7(rgyud): mahA dza swAhA//rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o//oM be lo ka na ma si te na ma ku ru ku ru bo d+hi sar+b+ba b+ha ra bu na dza hUM dza swA hA//rigs las sprul pa'i byang chub sems kyi'o//
118b1(rgyud): oMbin d+ha bene d+has rnagam si dade 'i kun zlags pacu b+h+ya/ang Ad+d+ha//lha mo rnams kyi'o//oM a byAm+b+ha kr-id+hab+h+rUM yag shA tu pa ka bAT s+yAt+ma// ba rnams kyang //gsang sngags kyu
118b2(rgyud): bo ma zad pas//rnam par sprul pa suM yis ni//snying gsum gnas nas g.yo mdzad de//rang gi lce lca gsil bar mdzod//de nas mgon pa rdo rje 'dzin//bde chen gar gyi dbang phyug gis//
118b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnam gsum gsal byed pa'i//ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas//dkyil 'khor byin brlabs dbang bskur zhing //rigs kyi bdag pos gsal bar mdzod//gnas kun
118b4(rgyud): mtshan ma yongs dag nas//rnam gsum snang ba gnyis med 'gyur//oM na ma sarba ta thA ga tak+Sha ya~M kA ga tsit+ta many+dzu bo d+d+hats+yai su~M tAM d+hi sha shud+d+he so na khyAts+tsha hUM hUM/oM rin chen dbu rgyan gyi sngags//
118b5(rgyud): sarba bu tA ku ru rad nA ma mr-i kut+ta/a oM bai r+yA sid ma mA ku a b+hi Shany+tsa A~M AHhUM swAhA//oM pad ma e mo ka sa maM ya shrI ha ha ha tshin d+ha ma no A smai shaM bi mr-i ma ya hUM hUM//sngags gsum gyis
118b6(rgyud): gsal ba'i byed pa'o//oM bau shi tsan d+ha mA ni a bA sa~M b+h+r-i da mA maM ku ru sI la la tI sa~M na ba bud pa paM da d+hi hU~M hU~M//rnam pa ri smra ba'i sngags//oM mi ta la nai bi sha ts+tshakr-i krA ma te pra ta na ma sil dut+tisi
118b7(rgyud): hUM phaT swAhA//dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i sngag so//oM aM a i mimen du she ma la shan dun d+h+ye te d+h+r-i ga te b+h+r-i ti pad ma~M ku ru eHhrIswA hA//rbad pa'i sngagaso//oM pad ma mu khaM pad ma thongs/
119a1(rgyud): ma du shas/ nag/na du mnas sa na /sa pa ma na sngags//ma dgan rba
119a2(rgyud): pad ma d+ha aM h+ya hI ma hA ka ru mad a ma d+hu ni dze dza//spyan drang ba'i sngag so//oM pad mo se ga gA su ra tA re gra sa ye stAM//gdan gyi sdig so//oM a mu ka si na sarba b+h+yo ga ga ta pu tsa me da na dahr-it+yaM
119a3(rgyud): swA hA//mchod pa'i sngag so//oM pad+ma bi la su ni tu tra~M swA hA//pa si hi hi//dgyes par bya ba'i sngagaso//de nas gsang ba'i bdag po mchog/rdo rje gsang ba rmad 'byung ba'i//sku dang /gsung
119a4(rgyud): thugs gsang sngags che//byin gyis brlabs pa doni bshad mdzad//bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes mchog/de dag dkyil 'khor rnam 'phrul mchog/dri ma med pa'i byang chub
119a5(rgyud): sems//de ni dkyil 'khor snying po mchog/rdo rje gsung ba'i gnas chen po//thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i tshul//rang bzhin byang chub sems nyid las//rang bzhin lhun grub rdzo/
119a6(rgyud): chen po//'gro ba'i snang ba dam pa'i mchog/rang bzhin dag pa dri med chos//dkyil 'khor gnas mchog gnyis med pa'o//phung po khams sogs rnam dag sku//e ma'o chos
119a7(rgyud): sku mya ngan 'das//e ma'o chos rnams ye shes sku//e mra'o//chos kun rnam par 'phrul//rgya che sngags kyi tshul ldan pa'i//dkyil 'khor gsang gsum ngo mtshar che//thabs/
119b1(rgyud): mdzad pa sna chags kyis//sngon dang da ltar 'brel dran 'byung //thab sa mkha par la phyin bcu chags//bsod nams ye shes dag pa'i shugs//sa dang sa 'das don chen po//ta thAd/
119b2(rgyud): ta'i byin brlabs dbyings//la la sku dang gsung dang thugs//zab pa de nyid rang gi mthus//gsang gsum gnas la phyag 'tsha lo//ya mtshan chos la phyag 'tshalo//rnam 'phrul sku la
119b3(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo//byang chub sems la phyag 'tshalo//zhes so//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor/
119b4(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o////de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams//dga' ba chen po ngo mtshar gyis//rgyud gsum rnam dag tshig gyur nas//dgyes pa'i dbyings
119b5(rgyud): kyis gsol ba btag/e mo'i ngo mtshar yi mtshan che//gnyis med rol pa ya mtshan che//dri med dang pa ya mtshan tshe//'od 'phro 'du ba ya mtshan che//byang chub sprin phung
119b6(rgyud): ya mtshan che//sangs rgyas 'byung ba ya mtshan che//'phrul pa 'byung ba ya mtshan che//khro bo 'byung bA ya mtshan tshwa//byin brlabs chu 'phrul ya mtshan tsho tha ba rlon mdzad la
119b7(rgyud): mtshan che//'gag pa rlung mdzad ya mtshan che//bdag cig 'khor chags 'dus pa rnams//dam tshig can du byin brlabs mdzad//ze 'og rim pa ci bzhin du//rdo rje gas
120a1(rgyud): du ga du 'ad//rlon sa bcomaldan pa chen poso//chags pa chen tha dza sa//sna dadrug sung gas gnyis mod pa'o//'byor rnams rab tu sbya du da/
120a2(rgyud): rgyun gyi te 'dzin gyis//gi dkyil 'kho gsal bar mdzad//do byung chub stems chen pa//rjod ci kun du khyab pa des//dga' brjen po'i mchod pa yis//
120a3(rgyud): mtshan ma gsal bar mdzod//du shes med dang 'gog gnas sog so//rang gi rtog pa'i mtha' zhes rnams//rlo ma myed pa'i byang chub sems//rin chen tshwa ngas dang
120a4(rgyud): sku nus//rang ga ye shes dang po //'gre don byed nas dang ldan//las lnga skrod pa'i gnas rnams dang//rang spyo pa myi sems dag gi ste//thugs na ni
120a5(rgyud): chub sems//sangs rgyas brtan pa 'dug nyir ro//byang rlob sems kyi mtshan ma yis//'dus pa'i gnas rig par bya//oM gu r+b+ha badz+ra sa ma s+t+wa~M/ la la hrI/
120a6(rgyud): longs bsdus pa yi//gsang ba'i dam tshi ga chen po rnams//rigs kyi dgongs pa ni lta bar//rdo rje gsang ba'i las la gonas//snrel bzangs dam tshigu chen po ste//de la
120a7(rgyud): 'das na brlig par 'gyur//ba// yi sgo ba'i don chen pos//'das pa'i 'khor tshogs pas ma yas pas//dam tshig thob pas gral 'khod do//de nas gsang ba'i
120b1(rgyud): bdag po nyid//dbang thob las mdzad chen po des//bcom ldan 'das la gtsugs gi phyag/rnal 'byor lugasu byas nas ni//phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod//mnyam 'gyur gsol ba rang //
120b2(rgyud): tu gtab//'di ltar ma byung ngo mtshar khyod//sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang phyug che//mngon spyong la mtshan ston par spyod//bka' yi 'khor lo dam pa nyid//smra bas ma yul las rab 'das
120b3(rgyud): kyang //dpes mtshon snang ba la brten nas//yi ge ming tshogs la sogs kyis//gsal por mtshon te go bar mdzod//ston pa dbang phyug dam pa des//gsol ba btab pa'i don dgongs nas/
120b4(rgyud): brjod bsam 'das pa'i ting 'dzin las//mnyam par bzhugs nas mi gsung bzhugs//de na 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis//stobs mchog seng ge chen po la//logasu btud de
120b5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal nas//rmad 'byung mchod pa sna tshogs byas//gsol btab blo mchog seng ge khyod//bdag cag zhu pa'i gnas skabs phye//stobs mchog seng ge gsang bdag gis//gsol/
120b6(rgyud): ba btab pa'i don dgongs nas//'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs khyod nyon cig/bdag la zhus cig spobs par byos//slar nyid gsol ba btab pa'i don//kun gyis 'thun pa'i tshig smras pa//mngon/
120b7(rgyud): po rgyal ba kun gyi mdzod//sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras kyi mchog/byang chub sems dpa' rje btsun la//chos rnams ston pa'i gnas lags na//bcom ldan gsang mchog dam pa
121a1(rgyud): des//gsang sngags lam rnams ma ston cing //dgongs mdzad 'brel bas mi mdzad pa//rgyu dang rkyen gyis gang lags pa//'khor ni tshogs la bstan du gsol//gsal//
121a2(rgyud): zhing dbye bar mdzad par rig/zhus pa'i don nyid slar gsungs pa//rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i mdzod//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dngos//sna tshogs snang zhing gsal bar mdzod//
121a3(rgyud): de nyid rdzogs pa'i gsang sngags can//bshad las 'das pa'i don de ni//dgongs don rgyal bas gsung mi mdzad//de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog gis//rnam par brjod pa mi
121a4(rgyud): mdzad pas//yang dag don gyi snying po nyid//rgya cher bka' ni gsal ba yin//'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams nyon cig/byang chub dam pa'i snying po ni//slu bsams las 'das brjod/
121a5(rgyud): med pas//tshig tu brjod pa legs ma yin//gnyis mtha'i rtog pa las gzhan dag/tshig gi snang bas the tsom skyed//grol ba nyid kyis 'ching 'gyur zhes//'das dang ma byon
121a6(rgyud): thams cad dang //da ltar byung bar dgongs pa'i don//ma gsung mi gsung gsung du med//de nas sems dpa'i snying po ni//spos dang bral ba'i byang chub sems//kun rdzob bden
121a7(rgyud): ba'i tshig dbang du//mtshan ma'i tshig gis rnal 'byor rnams//don dam rtogs dka' 'gro ba'i phyir//rgyal bas tshig skar bsten pa yis//'dus tshogs 'khor gyis
121b1(rgyud): yang zhus pa//stobs mchog song ge de ltar na//bdag sogs ma 'ongs rnal 'byor pas//tshig gi rjes 'brangs don dag tu//gsang ba'i las brjod gsal byed pa//ji lta bu yis mtshon par
121b2(rgyud): 'gyur//dpa' bo khyad ni rgyal ba'i sras//dbang bskur thob par zhu ba spobs//bcom ldan dbang mchog dam pa la//zhus shing stobs mchog seng ge khyod//des kyang 'khor gyis zhus pa bzhi
121b3(rgyud): rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin pa la//phyag 'tshal rmad 'byung mchod rdzas nas//rdo rje tshig tu 'di skad gsol//kye ma ston pa thugs chen po//phyogs bcu rgyal ba kun 'dus pa//byang chub sems kyi
121b4(rgyud): mtshan nyid de//tshig tu brjod pa ma mdzad na//ma 'ongs dag la rten pa dag/don la rag par i 'ugyur phyir//mtshon pa mtshon par byas nas ni//snying po byang chub don 'di la//dpes mtshon
121b5(rgyud): 'thad par grub byed pa//gsang ba de nyid stan du gsol//de nas mgon po rdo rje 'dzin//ye shes lnga dang rtags ldan pa'o//phyag gi mtshan ma gsor mdzad cing //rmad 'byung ya mtshan ston/
121b6(rgyud): bar mdzad//thoms cad pad mor 'gyur ba yi//rmad 'byung chos kyi sgra yang sgrogs//oM AHhUM swA hA//bo d+he tsit+ta gud+yau/sa ma ya as//a nu bo d+hi tsit+ta a nan/ta ge ra ba//ma hA saMH
121b7(rgyud): prata ya hUM//'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang //sangs rgyas grags chen thams cad dag/rab tu dreg cing brgya la 'gyur nas//gzhan lta ma lus smos ci dgos//bcom ldan 'das
122a1(rgyud): kyis yang drug bka'//bshad kyis rigs kyi bu rnams nyan//don dam kun rdong gnyis med par//yang dag bden pa 'don bstan pa//de ni dngos po mtshan nyid do//ma khar
122a2(rgyud): ldan chen po rnams kyi bzhengs//ji srid blo yi chos dag tu//gnyisu snang ba'i mtshan ma la//bsam brjod kun rdzob zhes bya ste//de las 'das padon ma yin//sku gsum gnyis su
122a3(rgyud): med pa yi//snang ba'i dngos po ma 'gags pa//dus gsum bstan po chen por gnas//yid bzhin pa yi don nyid do//thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul//thams cid rang bzhin stong
122a4(rgyud): pa nyid//zung du 'jug pa'i ye shes ni//de nyid bla med mchog dam pa//de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas//a la la yi sgra brjod do//stobs mchog sing ge dri ba dris//de ltar legs so
122a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das//sngags kyi lha la blo gnas gang //spyod pa gnas pa gang dag gis//phan tshun 'brel 'gyur ci lta bur//blo yi rim pa 'jug bya 'am//bcom ldan 'das kyis
122a6(rgyud): bka' stsal pa//gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa'i don//mtshan nyid rnam dge du lags pa//bgrang dang bgrang ba las 'das pa'i//dngos po mtshan
122a7(rgyud): nyid de bzhin no//legs spyod bden po'i lam 'jug cing //rnam gsum sngags kyi don spyad na//'brel pa shugs kyis sgrub byed ni//lha spyod gnyis ldan bden pa'i mchog/rnal
122b1(rgyud): 'byor sa la logs gnas shing //bden gnyis 'brel pa'i don bsgrubs nas//yang dag rtag pa'i don pas pa 'gyur//rnal 'byor sa spyod sa thob shog/ma skyes thabs kyi ye shes ldan//
122b2(rgyud): thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings//bden gnyis dbye ba med pa te yis//yang dag don mchog sgyu ma'i sku//kun rdzob sgyu ma thabs kyi gsung //phyag rgya sgyu ma'i tshung nyid de//med pa ma yin
122b3(rgyud): mtshan med de//rnal 'byor gnyis dang ldan phyir ro//slob pa'i rnal 'byor gnyis rten nas//lha na gyis grub pa'i sa go mas nas//bden 'gyur bden pa gnyis la gnas//tshe chung mthu
122b4(rgyud): yis grub pa yin//sgro yi rjes 'brangs rnal 'byor pas//don med spyod la gnas par 'gyur//yang dag kun rdzob bden gsal bas//gnyis med don dam bden par gnas//sna
122b5(rgyud): tshogs chos kyi g.yul ngo bzlog/rig pa'i skos bu rnam par grags//zhes pas dgyes par gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang
122b6(rgyud): ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las de kho na nyid ston pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o////de nas rig pa'i skyes bu mchog/bsang ba'i bdag pos yang zhus pa//bcom ldan snying po byang chub
122b7(rgyud): sems//dgongs pa'i don ni ci lta bu//las dang nyon mongs dag byed pa'i//ye shes sgrol matso ltar lags//rgyal bas dgongs pa'i byang chub sems//rje lta bur mo nyam
123a1(rgyud): gzhag nas//ma rtog ye shes gsal mdzad de//sna tshogs rnams kyang byang chub sems//bde ba che las gzhan med do//lus ngag yid gsum rnam pa'i tshogs//
123a2(rgyud): chos rnams kun gyi rgyu yin te//rnam gsum rdo rje lta bu nyid//sku gsum gsal ba rnam par snang //dngos po gsal ba'i chos med de//gcig las rnam 'phrul sna tshogs nyid//
123a3(rgyud): phyag rgya gar thabs dbang sgyur bas//'ching ba'i tshogs las rnam par grol//dngos po thams cad bral ba yi//phung khams skye mched rnam par dben//gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i
123a4(rgyud): yul bral bas//dpagra med pa yi ngo bo nyid//rnam gsum mchog gi don las byung //'od gsal chen po'i rang bzhin no//ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i don//rgyal ba kun gyi gsang
123a5(rgyud): ba'o thugs//skye dang skye med sna tshogs dngos//phyogs 'dzin mtha' yis bcing bar byed//de dag chos las rnam grol ba'o//bden pa chen po'i ting 'dzin rgyu//ngo mtshar ya
123a6(rgyud): mtshan rmad kyi chos//me long gsal ba'i rang bzhin can//rgyal ba rnams kyi gsang ba'i mdzod//'gag pa med pa'i chos rnams la//byang chub sems nyid skye bar 'gyur//
123a7(rgyud): mnyam nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku//ya mtshan rmad du 'byung ba'i chos//sna tshogs snang byed gnas grol ba//rang bzhin zhi ba'i byang chub sems//gnyis kyi mtha'
123b1(rgyud): las sgrol ba'o//de nas dang gnaso mong byang chub sems//yA mtshan rmad kyi don byung ba'o//rgya tshor sa sngor gsal ba 'ang //kun rtogs byang chub sems chen po//dmigs med gsang ba las/
123b2(rgyud): byung 'i//dmigs dang mi dmigs sna tshogs ni//bde ba'i ye shes gsal ba'o//ma 'gags pa yi chos nyid do/bya ba grub po'i tshul can du//spros med spros pa sna tshogs snang //spro bsdu
123b3(rgyud): 'dun dang spros bral ba'i//mdzad pa'i byang sems gartan pa las//ngo mtshar cho 'phrul bla na med//ye shes rgya mtsho rmad du byung //rang gi de nyid gsal bar 'gyur//rgyal bas bshad pa'i/
123b4(rgyud): /dgang don la//'khor rnams ya mtshon ngoms par 'gyur//mchod dang zhal dgi sgra'i 'byin cing //rang gi de nyid gsal 'gyur nas//byung sems de nyid bstod par bya//e ma'o stong nyid/
123b5(rgyud): byang chub sems//e ma'o dag pa dri ma med//e ma'o mi sgrib gsal ba che//e ma'i mnyo ma nyid dbyar med chos//e ma'i sau rang gI saM mas//e ma'o bya byed lhun gyis grub//de bzhin
123b6(rgyud): nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod//bcom ldan 'das nyid byang chub sems//byang chub sems nyid thugs kyi mchog/bdag cag rig 'dzin tshogs pa rnams//byang chub sems nyid smon pa//
123b7(rgyud): dang //'jug dang ldan dang gnyis med de//rang gi byang chub sems g.yo bar bgyis//reg par bgyi zhing nye bar bgyi//nyam su myong bar 'tshal lags ni//thugs rje che dgongs byin
124a1(rgyud): rgyas rlobs//bde bar gshegs pas byin gyis rmanas de skad tshig tu gsal byatab pas//bcom+ba ldan snying po 'di ska gsung//sku chags rnam dgang ba nyid//chos
124a2(rgyud): rnams 'phro ba'i tshogs rnams kun//rang bzhin brjod byal rtog pa med//rang gsang rtogs pa'i dka' ba'i don//srid gsum ye nas rnam dag tshe sa//bdag rtog 'khrul pa'i nyes dmi
124a3(rgyud): gyis//dus ring 'khyams 'gyur 'gro ba rnams//rang rtog dngos po'i las la spyod//log pa'i sems kyis kun brtags kyang //rang bzhin nyid la 'gyur ba med//ye nas don gyi
124a4(rgyud): spangs rgyas la//'khrul pa'i bde sdug 'khor lhos 'khyams//log rtog dngos med byang chub sems//'khrul rtog mi gnas rgyan gyis mchog/tha ba'i gnas nyid byang chub zhing //
124a5(rgyud): srid dngos sangs rgyas mngon rdzogs sku//'dzin rtog byang chub snying por gsal//brtan g.yo dngos po thams cad dang //bde chen sku las gzhan med do//de bzhin gshegs
124a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las de bzhin nyid kyi le'u ste lta ba'o//bcom ldan rgyal ba thams cad kyi//dkyil
124a7(rgyud): 'khor snying po bsdus pa'i don//de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis//dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phro ba'i don//mtshan nyid 'phro zhing rtogs pa dag/rgyal bas bshad phyir bskul
124b1(rgyud): 'debs mdzad//bcom ldan rgyal ba thams cad kyi//dkyil 'khor snying po bsdus pa'i don//rgya che mdzad pa'i mthu ldan pa//rdo rje gsang ba gsum gyi gnas//rab rgyas mtshan bzhin cho ga'o//
124b2(rgyud): yan lag dag la bstan du gsol//de nas mgon po gsang ba'i bdag/gnyes med ye shes la 'gro ba'i//ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs gnas//rgya cher sprul pa'i don bstan mdzad//
124b3(rgyud): stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i//ri bo rgyud 'dzin rigs mtshan can//dbyangs kyi yi ge'i tshul 'jug pa'i//rta bdun 'od sogs gsal byed ldan//skar me'i tshogs dang 'dra ba las//
124b4(rgyud): mnyam nyid 'od kyi go bu'i gzugs//steng ba'i 'od zer lnga yi tshul//phyag rgya mtshan ma sngags dang bcas//rnam 'phros rang rig zhing khams sbyang //de dag gong bu'i gzugs mtshung
124b5(rgyud): par//gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku//stong nyid snying rje chen po yis//ma las rgyud rnams gsel mdzad nas//nam mkha' drang ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin//thugs rje chen po skyon skyong mdzad//
124b6(rgyud): sa bon gsang ba'i las byung ba'i//mkha' snang gsal ba kun khyab las//sna tshogs kun nas so so nyid//'byung bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bkong //kun 'phrul sa bon las
124b7(rgyud): bskyed pa'i//ye shes rin chen sna chags gzugs//sha raraM du do shal phreng pa dang //gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rnga yab sogs//me long rol mo'i tshogs bas ma yas//'khor
125a1(rgyud): la rin chen rdo rje dang //tA ra na bzhi rgyan mdzes pa//sgra dbyangs sna tshogs nyi zla'i tshogs/tsakra bar khyams phreng ba dang //dam pa'i 'dod yon lha mo khrigs//rin chen ra
125a2(rgyud): pa'i rtsegs gnas//nye zla pad+ma'i rin chen rgyan//gnas rnams khyab par ci bzhin par//dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub pa'o//a a/I i/u y+YA/e au/o o i aHra daM/
125a3(rgyud): l-i l-I//ka kha ga g+ha nga /tsa tshi dza dz+hanya/Ta Ta Du D+ha Na/ta tha da d+han/ba pheM ba b+ha ma/ya ra la wa sha Sha swa ta k+Sha//de bzhin nyid dbyings rmad 'byung ba'i//bder gshegs kun gyi thugs gsal
125a4(rgyud): ba/byin brlabs ya mtshan sprul po'i sku//dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kun gyi gnas//sems can kun gyi sems chen po//rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med//phung 'i chos rnams
125a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas te/'byung lnga dbyings phyug yum gyi mkha'//khams dang skye mched sems dpa' dang //sems ma'i tshogs dang khro bo'i sku//phyi nang srid gsum dngos snang ba'i//
125a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rigs kyi bdag nyid tshe/gzugs phung rnam par snang mdzod che//tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan sku//'du shes snang ba mtha' yas sku//'du byed don yod grub pa yin
125a7(rgyud): rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste//thams cad bdir gshegs lnga yi sku//sa khams sangs rgyas sbyin yin te//chu khams lha mo mA mo kI//mi khams na bza' dkar/
125b1(rgyud): myomo ste//rlung khams dam tshig sgrol ma'o//num mkha' kun du bzang mo'i sku/'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa'o//dbang po'i spyod yul ma lus kun//thams cad bdor grwa sho Da
125b2(rgyud): rigs kyi skye//mig la rnam par snang mdzad de//rna ba rin tshen 'byung ldan che//sna la snang ba mtha' yas nyid//lce la don yod grub pa'i sku//lus nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yin//de ltar
125b3(rgyud): snang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid//ye nas lhan grub gnas pas na//rnal 'byor gsang ba don shes bya//phyi rol don shes yul drug 'di//yum tshan lnga yi phyag rgya'i dbyibs//gzugs
125b4(rgyud): khams sangs rgyas spya nA ma ste//sgra tshogaso lha mo mA ma kI//dri tshogs ni bza' dkar mo'i dbyings//ro drug lha mo sgrol ma yin//reg tshogs lha mo kun du bzang mo'i sgo//dus gsum
125b5(rgyud): mnyam sbyor 'du 'bral med//rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas//rang rigs dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzod//thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs//yon tan phrin las rol pa'i rkyen//
125b6(rgyud): nga nyid 'dre 'bral med pa'i dbyings//thibs dang shes rab rol pa'i mchog/sa yi khyad par ma lus pa'ang //rdo rje chos kyis sbyor mdzad dang //yon tan phrin las mtha' phyin pas//
125b7(rgyud): tshe 'di nyid kyi go 'phang mchog/rdo rje gsang gsum dam tshigs che//rang gi mthu yau sbyor byed pa//rtag tu mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yis/dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas bzhugs te//
126a1(rgyud): /dri med byang chub sems kyi tshul//'gro rnam mtshogs bcas dag par byas//rtag tu gsang sngags brjod byas shing //rdo rje mgon po'i sgogs la brtan/rtag tu gtor spyi
126a2(rgyud): btang byas ste//khams kyi 'dzin pa med par grol//rtag tu lha la mchod byas te//rang gi bdud rtsis mchod cing ro la//rtag tu mi gnyis bstod bya ba//rnam grol thams cad bgro
126a3(rgyud): cha'i sgro//pha rol phyin bcu dus cag tu//pad+ma chog rtogs par 'gyur//zag pa zad pas sku lnga dang //pad+ma'i rigs kun mnyam par sbyor//baung+ga'i dam tshigs la gnas pa//
126a4(rgyud): gnas kun dkyi mo 'khor gsal bar 'gyur//pad+ma rang gi gan su bsgom//'dod chags chos kun spyod pa yi//mgon po rang rang gnas lag sel//dri med dag pa'i thig
126a5(rgyud): le las//'od zer lnga yi snang ba bcas//rang gi gnas nas 'phro mdzad cing //de nyid mgon po'i sku 'dod gzugs//kun du pad+ma chags med pas//gnas kun dkyil 'khor
126a6(rgyud): gsal bar 'gyur//thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams dang //dpe byad rdzogs par gyur nas ni//yon tA nu ma lus 'byung ba'o gnas//kun du dregs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog
126a7(rgyud): rdorje'i dam tshig la gnas pas//rdo rje rang gi gan su bsgom//'od 'bros 'dus pa'i gnas phyag rgya yis//ye shes mnyam nyid kun don mdzod//thugs rjes rnam mang
126b1(rgyud): mamam ma mas sa ma.a mtshan thasams# #saca ma # am
126b2(rgyud): yul bral zhing //'joms par mdzad pa 'khro bo'i sku//rang gi dkyil 'khor dri bral ba//mngon gsum gsang ba'i ye shes sku//'khor lo'i dematshig la gnas pas//'khor lo rang gi
126b3(rgyud): gan su bsgom//rgyal ba kun gyi rin po che//'phro 'dra nyi shu rtsa lnga'i tshogs//phung po khams rnams rnam dag cing //phrin le sa ye shes bla na med//byang chub dag pa'i cha lugs gnas//
126b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i byin rlabs sku//dga' ba'i thabs dang shes rab sbyor//phyag rgya chen po'i rigs 'dzin gnas//rnal 'byor dad brtson ting 'dzin ldan//'grub 'gyur ring por tho//
126b5(rgyud): med spyod zhes gsungs pas 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnamos mnyes par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal
126b6(rgyud): rta mchog rol pa'i rgyad las ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste drug pa'o////de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te//dga' ba'i mchod pa dang gar thabs kyis dkyil
126b7(rgyud): 'khor thams cad mnyes par byas nas//bcom ldani 'das la phyag 'tshal te gsol ba bta bo//kye ma rgyal ba kun gyi gtso//srangs rgyas tshogs rnams bskyed pa'i yab//
126b8(rgyud): khyed kyis dkyil 'khor sbrul mdzad nas//gdul bya'i lam 'di grol byas na//phyi yi 'gro ba ci ltar gzung //gang dag dbang po ma smin pa'o//dkar po tshes rnams mthong mi 'gyur/
127a1(rgyud): dukun /rnarnams//na sa la gzug par sna bru mas da/ la lakhor ma rnams// dal nA/
127a2(rgyud): byad 'dug/nis ga sol ba dang //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i stsal pa//rigs kyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba theg pa gas sngags kyi lam du 'jug par 'dod padag gis na
127a3(rgyud): rdorje slob dpon la brten te gzugs brnyan myi dkyil 'khor du gzhugs par bya'o//rdo rje slob dpon blo gros mchog/da brtson shes rab stobs deng ljin//bdag chos ma lus
127a4(rgyud): shes 'gyur nas//skyob pa byung sems sdom pa blangs//byeng sems snying rje chen po dang //dga' ba bting snyoms bzhir bzhag nas//sems can thams cad 'gron du gnyir//
127a5(rgyud): sgrar nyid byang chub la mo la dgod//pha rol phyin pa drug rnams dang //bsdu ba bzhi la ldegs gnas pas//theg pa chen po'i lam gnyer zhing //nyan thos la sogs zlos pa
127a6(rgyud): med pa'i blos//gsang ba'i theg pa don gnye re zhing //dkyil 'khor dbang thob dam tshig ldan//gsang ba'i rgyud rnams don shes shing //de nyid bcu las goms gyur pas//
127a7(rgyud): rang gi ye shes rnam grol zhing //dngos po de nyid brtan par gnas//mu stegs la sogs ma spyod cing //theg dman la sogs 'gyur ba med//rtag tu 'gro ba bzung ba'i
127b1(rgyud): zlos//dkyil 'khor la sogs las la brtson//ma gnas mya ngan 'das pa yi//grong khyer chen por 'gro byed dpon//'jig rten drag brtson chos brgyad dag/btang snyoms spong lon mong
127b2(rgyud): ba nyid//dmus long tshogs kyi mig bu bas//bla ma'i gtso bor gzung bar bya/'jug pa'i gang zag puphun sum tshogs//zhi des gsong por smra ba dang //'jam zhing 'gro ba'i yid
127b3(rgyud): 'ong ba//rtse cig dad pa brtson 'gyur byed//blo gros yon tan kun la 'jug/lha dang bla ma la sogs gus//thegs pa chen po'i lam dag pas//ngan pa'i tsho gas spangs gzhan du
127b4(rgyud): gnas//de ni blo gros bzang ba yin ton ldan//theg chen gsang ba 'dzin pa'i snod//sa mchog shin du dben pa'i gnas//ri bo nags tshal 'bras bu dang //me tog chu rgyun pu na
127b5(rgyud): sum tshogs//gnod byed skye bo tshogs brel ba//rnal 'byor grogs bcas dga' 'gyur pa'i//bdag dbang bar chad med pa'i mchog/brnyan pa ci bzhin rdzogs pa yis//
127b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bri sogs las rnams bya//phun sum tsho gsau pa bdun ldan pas//bdag gnas sku gzhi'i grogs bcas dang //mchod rdzas yo byad ma lus pa//bsrung zhing byin
127b7(rgyud): gyis brlabs par bya//rdo rje sa gzhir po dang //gur dang bla re bcas pa yis//khro bo me 'od mtshon cha'i tshigs//bsrung zhing 'khor lo rimo bzhin bsgom//sems can
128a1(rgyud): thams cad bsgral ba'i blos//bsod nams tshogs kyis dag par bya//phyag 'tshal mchod pa dbul ba dang //sdig bshags bsod nams rjes yi rang //sangs rgyas mya
128a2(rgyud): ngan mi 'da' zhing //chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang //lus dbul byang sems bskyod pa dang //lam gnas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo//rgya cher yongasu bsngo byas shing //sems can don du ston
128a3(rgyud): lam gdab//dmigs med pa yi rang bzhin gyis//de dag brtson bral na mkha' bzhin//rnam thar gsum las 'das pa yi//de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes che//thams cad na mkha'o/
128a4(rgyud): mtshan nyid ste//na mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med//na mkha' 'dra ba rnal 'byor pas//don kun mnyam pa nyid la gsal//de la rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshogs//dkyil 'khor chen
128a5(rgyud): po sprul byas pas//rigs kyi zhing khams sbyong byed cing //rnal 'byor chen po las kun 'grub//sa phyogs dri med yid 'ong ba'i//grong ngam grong khyer dgon pa'am//ri phug nags
128a6(rgyud): tshal gang rung bar/nyams dga' yan lag rtog par bya//gang du bo bang ni 'bras bu bcas//ne'u sing chu 'gram me tog bcas//dpal rdzogs yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas//de ni rab
128a7(rgyud): gus brtag par bya//na mkha' 'khor lo dra ba dang //so gzhi pad+ma dra ba dang //bkra shis phun sum sna tshogs gzhi//bar chad med pa'i mtshan nyid yin//sa gzhi zhom rdib med pa
128b1(rgyud): yi//dbus su mtho ba phyag rgya che/shar dang byang du gzhol ba ni//phrin las rnam gzhi'i dngos grub 'gyur//lho dang nub du gzholalnga pas ni//'jig rten pa yi dngos grub 'gyur//nub dang byang //
128b2(rgyud): du gzhol ba ni//ting 'dzin phra mo'i las gzhan 'gyur//gang zhig sher phyogs mtho ba dang //dbus su dma' bar spang bar bya//sa de pus mo nub tsam du//brkos te slar yang dag par bya//maung
128b3(rgyud): 'phel gyur na dngos grub mchog/gang bar gyur pa shis pa yin//dma' zhing ma legs gyur pa yin//sol dub rus sogs byung na yang //yang na chu yis dag byas te//slob dpon rdo rje
128b4(rgyud): dril 'dzin pas//mnyam bzhag lha yi sngags brjod cing //shar du me drag gom pa brgyad//song ste slar log blta bar bya//'grib pa med na dngos grub 'gyur//snang dang mi snang sa'i
128b5(rgyud): bdag/mgu byas rin gyis nyo ba dang //blangs te bar chad med pa'i phyir//bgegs gzhan phra mo bskrad par bya/bar chad med pa'i sa dbus su//rigs kyi bdag po 'byor ldan pas//
128b6(rgyud): chos gos lo sogs rgyan thogs shing //pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor legs bzhugs te//'khor lo sgyur rgyal tsho lugs kyis//mchod sogs sbyang zhing byin brlabs te//rdo rje bsrung
128b7(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya yis//phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rig par bcas//sa yi lha mo srungs ma rnamasaso//spyan drangs mchod pa mnyes par bya//khyod par so yi bdag po dang //'gro drug
129a1(rgyud): bgegs rnams ma lus kun//dgug cing bu lo nA mchod sbyin gtang //dri zhim chu yis kun gtor zhing //sngags dang phyag rgya sbyar bar bya//gang shig dngos grub la sogs
129a2(rgyud): 'dod//rab 'bring tham grub don du//lto 'phye brtag pa'i cho ga bzhin//yan lag kun dbang rgya yA bya//de nas dkyil 'khor rgyar mnyam po'o//sa gzha khru la sogs tshad du//brgos te sa
129a3(rgyud): yi skyon bsal zhing //sa zhag mdog bzangs 'jam phyin pas//gang zhig dri zhim chur bcas po'i//sngags brtab gang zhig 'thas par bcag/bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor khru dor
129a4(rgyud): sto//rgyar ni khru drug pa yi tshad//tshogs bas ga khru gang 'phang du bstod//mtha' sgor khru gang ba yi tshad//dbang skur sor bzhi'i tshad bstod de//ji ltar gru bzhi rgyar bskyed cing //
129a5(rgyud): dbyibs legs me long bzhin du gnas//tshad mnyam grog sbur la sogs pa//rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang //snying po lnga dang 'bru lnga dag/dri chu sngags kyis btab byas nas//dkyil
129a6(rgyud): 'khor snying por bzhag par bya//phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs te//stong pa nyid kyi sngags kyis sbyang //dri zhimA sngags kyis byin brlabs pa'i//chu rgyan phyogs bcur gtor
129a7(rgyud): byas shing //sna tshogs gtor mos mnyes byas te//lha tshogs 'gron rnams tshim par bya//slob dpon rigs kyi gtsor gnas pa'i//rgyan dang cha lugs rdzogs byas nas//
129b1(rgyud): sgrub pa'i grogs mchog blo gros ldan//tshul bzhin du ni gsol ba btab//dbus kyi sa yi rgyar gnas pa//kun 'byung na mkha' dag pa'i sngags//brjod cing 'byung ba'i sa bon las//
129b2(rgyud): dkyil 'kho rtsegs bsgom par bya//rdo rje bsdams pa sar bzhag cing //byams pa'i rdo rje rnam dag cing //rdo rje dkyil 'khor thugs dang bcas//phyag mtshon dran pa thog mthar
129b3(rgyud): rgyun//rdo rje sa gzhi ra bA dang //gur sogs khro bo me 'od bcas//gtso bo gar gyi dbang phyug skus//bad bcas thal mo lan gsum brda ba//'od 'phro sa gnas kun g.yos pa la//lha
129b4(rgyud): mo gsar mdog rgyan gyis mdzes//me tog phreng ba bum thogs pa'i//lus phyed sa la 'thon byas te//'thun na bka' nyan tshul du gnas//mchod stong zhal bsal sogs 'bul
129b5(rgyud): zhing //dri zhing las rnams ma rdzogs par//de srid mi 'gyur brtan bzhugs nas//bdud sogs bsgo ba'i ngag bcas mdzad//skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//spyod pa'i
129b6(rgyud): tshul dang khyad par gyis//sa dang pha rol phyin pa las//lha mo khyod ni dbang du shog/ji ltar rgyal ba thams cad kyi//bdud kyi sde rnams 'joms mdzad pa//de bzhin bdag gis bud
129b7(rgyud): las kyang //rgyal bar byas pa'i dkyil 'khor brtsam//de nas slob dpon rgyan rdzogs pa'i//rdo rje dril 'gying bcas pa la//dam tshigs nye bar bskul ba yi//glu dag phyi
130a1(rgyud): bzhi'i gnas nas gdon//rgyal bas 'gro ba'i mgon gyur pa'i//chos kyi me longs gsal ba ston//bder gshugs rnams kyi gsang ba pa//rdo rje gas
130a2(rgyud): gsum dam tshig mchog/ye shes dri ma med pa'i tshul//sgrib sogs ma lus bral byed pa'i//rdo rje pad+mo mnyam pa'i dbyings//dkyil 'khor chen po dru'i nu'i bdag/theg chen
130a3(rgyud): ches kyi 'khor lo'i mdzod//gsang gsum pad+mo dag pa'i dbyings//so sor gsal ba'i don bstan pa//rdo rje lta bus gnas kun sbyor//zab cing rgya chen sgra sna tshogs//chos kyi
130a4(rgyud): 'khor lo bshad pa'i dus//rgyal po yon tan dpe dang bral//rin chen lhun po'i mdzod mnga' ba//nyams dga' thugs rje'i zhing rnams dgongs//bdag med mnyam pa'i ye shes
130a5(rgyud): can//phrin las dag pas zad par mdzod//gsang gsum sna tshogs rdo rje'i bdag/rigs mchog shes rab brtson byed cing /spyan bzang dag pu 'gro la gzigs//slar nyid khro
130a6(rgyud): bopo chen po'i sku//zhal lnga phyag cha sna tshogs 'dzin//'dzags byed 'bar ba'i skur gnas te//mgur nas hUM bsgoms sgra sgrogs shing //rdo rje pad+me lta ba yis//lha rnams
130a7(rgyud): bdag la bsdu byed cing //ma dang ti las byung ba yi//mi gnyis nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor brjid//'bar zhing thams cad dag byas nas//slar nyid rang gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs//
130b1(rgyud): shangs kyi rlung sgo 'bar ba nas//'jig rten thams cad 'bar byed pa//rdo rje'i 'gros las byung ba yi//sna tshogs sa gzhir brtan par byas//oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M/prih+Na grIh+na hU~M/gI h+Na pa ya gr-ih+Na
130b2(rgyud): ba ya hUM hUM/a na ya ho b+ha ga bAn bid+ya ra dza ya hUM hUM phaT//phyag gi mtshan ma kun 'khrol zhing //khro bo'i dkyil 'khor spro bar byed//hU~M lha dbang rlung lha'i tshogs//gnod sbyin dri za srin po dang //
130b3(rgyud): sha za ga shin rje ma mo'i tshogs//mkha' 'gro gnod sbyin ma lus rnams//gang dag sa gzhi 'dir gnas pa//srung byed sa yo bdag bor bas//thos pa tsam gyis myur bar drangs//nga yi bka
130b4(rgyud): las 'da' ma byed//gang zhig gnas pa'i mthu bo che//pad+ma rdo rje kha T+wAM kha//tha ba'i tshogs bzhin rlag par byed//ra ba~M 'bar khro bo'i gnas 'joms pa'o//pad+ma'i 'bar ba'i gzugs 'di
130b5(rgyud): yis//gal te gang gi dam tshig bcag/'dod gsum skye gnas gsel byas te//'jigs par 'gyur zhing gzhan 'di med//sa las yongasu bskor byas te//'gegs byed bya phyir phur
130b6(rgyud): par gdab//oM g+ha tA ya g+ha ta ya sarba duSh+TA na paT//hUM hU~M hUM badz+ra ki la ya ba~Mdz+ra d+ha rod adz+nyA pa ya ti k+Sha ya bAg tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT//lag pa bskyod cing rkang pa bskyod//ngo mtshor khro bo'i
130b7(rgyud): zur mig bzhin//smin ma khro gnyer g.yon mdzad cing //kha yi pad+ma 'dzum bcas pas//so so'i phyag rgya gan su sgyur//'gying bag bcas pas gzhal la bstod//rta mchog khro bo'i
131a1(rgyud): /dar thabs kyis//zho rgyas dbang dang drag pa'i tshu yi//ba yi rnam lnga dri sras chus//dkyil 'khor sna gzhi nyer byugs nas//lha rnams gan su dri yo rkus//thig log
131a2(rgyud): zlum por bya//rang gi sngags dang me tog rnams//so so'i gnasu bgram par bya//dbu rgyan rol mo mchod pa'i tshogs//lha mgon gnas kyi nye 'khor mdzes//dkyil 'khor lha rnam
131a3(rgyud): nye ba'i sa//mchod cing bstod pas mnyes par bya//cho ga'i yan lag rdzogs pa dang //bzod gsol bskang pa'i don chad du//rdo rje dril 'dzin dpa' bo yi sa//phyogs rnams kun tu
131a4(rgyud): skor ba bya//oM badz+ra satwA sa ma ya/maM nu pA la yau//badz+ra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha b+h+r-i D+ho me b+hA ba//su po Sh+yo me b+hA ba//an+d+ra rag to me b+hi ga/su tau Sh+yo me b+ha ba/sarba sid+d+hi mo pr-i yats+tsha//sarba karmaM su
131a5(rgyud): tsa me//tsit+taM shrI yang ku ru hU~M hUM/ha ha ha ha hai/b+ha ga bAn/sarba ta thA ga ta/badz+ra ma mo muny+dza/badz+ri b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya satwa a//gsang sngags rgyal po bla med pa'i//ldan gcig brjid
131a6(rgyud): pa tsam gyis kyang //sdig pa ma lus zang byed cing //las rnams thams cad 'grub par byed//pus mo sa la btsugs byas te//lag pa g.yas pa spos 'dzin cing //g.yon pas
131a7(rgyud): dril bu dkrol byas te//tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya//oM bder gshegs stobs bcu brtson ldan 'gro ba'i mgon//mi 'jigs la sogs yon tan rtsal med ldan//
131b1(rgyud): rigs gnyis thabs kyis brgyud pa'i dkyil 'khor cha//brnyings pa ma mnga' thugs rje shugs chun po//dga' mdzad dbang gi dkyil 'khor tshogs chen la//tshul khrims la sogs phung ba
131b2(rgyud): gnyis gyur cing //pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gtsor byas pa'i//dri bral thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid ni//mnyes pa'i tshogs rnams kun las rnams grol zhing /bde gshegs yon tan
131b3(rgyud): thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas//'dod yon 'bras bu phun sum tshogs bsgrub dang //'gro rnams ma lus thugs rjes bzung byed cing //byed rnams la yang mchod pa bya ba'i phyir//dkyil
131b4(rgyud): 'khor rnam dag rgyu chen rtson lags na//mgon po'i bka' drin rje su brtsi dgongs te//khyed kyis rab tu gnas par mdzad 'od lags//me tog dri bzang phreng sogs 'dri ba zhes la
131b5(rgyud): ji srid 'gro ba'i don rnams ma grub par//de srid thugs rjes bzung zhing bzhugs nas ni//bdag gi gnas sogs 'di dag byin gyis rlobs//de nas slob ma la bos te//kye rigs
131b6(rgyud): kyi bu khyod theg pa snod//rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung 'di nyin//dang gus dga' ba'i shugs byung shog/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis//cho ga bzang po 'di bstan bya//mngon
131b7(rgyud): po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams dang //ma byon de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs//de bzhin da lta'i sems can rnams//'gro la phan phyir gnas bzhugs te//gsang po zab mo zla
132a1(rgyud): na med//cho ga bzang po 'di spyod pas//skyes mchog rang gi gnas nyid du//kun mkhyen ye shes bde chen brnyes//gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med pAr//pad+ma gar dbang
132a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi//bdud tshogs shin tu mi zad pa'i//dpung rnams ma lus 'joms par mdzad//de pir kun mkhyen ye shes kyi/blo gros mchog 'di khyod kyis kyang //sangs rgyas
132a3(rgyud): chos dang dge 'dun la//kun tu skyabasu 'gro bar gyis//rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro gsang sngags can//rigs kyi dkyil 'khor so so yi//'khor lo bzhugs pa'i tshogs rnams
132a4(rgyud): le//kun nas skyab su 'gro bar gyis//dpa' bo dpa' mo 'khor dang bcas//byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid che//khyad par du yang slob dpon la//khyod kyis skyabasu 'go bar gyi//
132a5(rgyud): de nas legs spyod slob ma yis//bskyabs 'gro byang sems sdom pa gzung //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha lo//dokon mchog gsum po gzung bar bya//bdag gis
132a6(rgyud): sdig pa byas pa dang //bgyid pa N+ye su yi rong ba//mgon po'i spyan sngar mchis na su//de dag thams cad bshegs par bgyi//rgyal ba sras bcas 'khor rnams dang //rang
132a7(rgyud): rgyal dgra bcom 'gro rnams kyis//bsgom bzlas la sogs bsod nams la//dad pas rje su yi rang ngo //sems nyid mngon par sangs rgyas dang //chos kyi 'khor
132b1(rgyud): lo bskor byed pa'i//tshogs spyod byang chub sems dpa' la//bdag ni rab tu skyabasu mchi//sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ci lta bar//skal ldan byang chub sems dpa' yis//byang chub
132b2(rgyud): sems mochog dri med pas//'gro ba rgya che tshogs la dmigs//dus gsum bzhugs pa'i 'gro rnams kyis//thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gasrel mdzad pa//de bzhin nyi dro dbyings
132b3(rgyud): byang chub sems//dus gsum dag tu gtang mi bya//rdo rje slob dpon la gus shing //dus kun du ni yon tan bzung //rnal 'byor gsang ba smad mi bya//rdo rje spun la mig bzhin polha//
132b4(rgyud): gsang sngags phyag rgya'i rnam pa dag/brtson pos dus gsum dan par ba//de nas shis par bya ba'i phyir//rang dang mtshon ma'i yi ge sngagaso//byin brlabs ye shes bskyed par/
132b5(rgyud): bya//slar yang gdug pa me tog dang //mar me dri tshu ba la sogs pa'i//rang gi gan su 'dug cing dbul//bkra shis shing mchog 'o ma can//lo ma me tog 'bras bur bcas//
132b6(rgyud): rlon pa drang zhing 'bu rjes med//chag g+has med pa'i tshe mas shring ni//sor ni bcu gnyis dri bzangs byug/rtse mo me tog phreng btags pa//sngags zlos dri chus bsang bar bya//dri na
132b7(rgyud): kyi mtshon char byin brlabs pas//oM sarba pA pa da ha na badz+ra shi ta ni swA hA//yi ge sum bcos sngags brjod cing //shar du kha bltas slob ma la//bden pa bdar zhing sbyin bya zhing/
133a1(rgyud): /des kyang mi smra byung bar bya//bri rtse lta bus lce bzhar zhing //phra mo'i phyogs kyi so brus ste//sa gzhi dri yis byugs pa ru//phan tshun mi lta dor bar bya/shar las//
133a2(rgyud): pa'i phyogs kun gyis//zhi sogaso dngos grub mtshan ma brtag/kyen thur rab dong 'bring gis lta//'tshams kyis 'jig rten las rnams 'grub//las dag pa yi sngags bzlas//
133a3(rgyud): nas//sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs byas pa'o//chu gtsang dris sbyang khyor ba gsum//nye reg 'thor ba'i tshul du srung //oM tr-i bye shud d+ha sarba d+harma pA pa ni tsa sha bi sho d+ha ma sarba ki le
133a4(rgyud): pa a pa ni ye hU~M//gtsang ma'i raso la legs dkal ba'i//srung skud mdud pagasum ldan pa'i//yi ge gsum gyis sngags bzlas nas//de yi dpung pa g.yon par bcing //ku sha
133a5(rgyud): rtse mo ma 'khrugs pa'i//bam po gnyisu sbams pa yis//yab yum gnyisu byin brlabs pa'i//sngas dang stan du byin par bya//oM sarba dusti ku ru swA hA//dga' ba'i gtan
133a6(rgyud): gyis gzeng bstod cing //mchod pa gtor ma'i tshegs bcas pas//lha tshogs rnams la bsngo byas nas/bden po brjod cing ci bder nyal//mi smra dge ba'i sems bcas
133a7(rgyud): pas//ci lam mtshan ma brtag par bya//slar nyid slob dpon nang song ste//dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i ting 'dzin gyis//lha rnams mchod cing bstod bya ste//dge ba'i sems
133b1(rgyud): kyis nyal bar bya//de nas skya rengs shar dus su//slob dpon slob ma ma sngas 'ongs te//kye kye bzhin bzangs rnams longs cig/rmi lam mtshan ma tso mthong ba//badron pa 'dzad/
133b2(rgyud): ba'i dus yino//des kyang co bzhin smra bar bya//rab 'bring mtshan ma'i ltas bstan cing //ngan pa'i ltas rnams bzlog par bya//sbyin sreg gtor ma la sogs dang //nga yi rnam lngas
133b3(rgyud): byug par bya/dngos rnams mtshan ma lasau grol ba'i//stong pa chen po ye shes bsgom//rin tshe na rgyu las byung ba yi//bum po mgul ring lto ba zlum//kha khyer zhabs bteg
133b4(rgyud): phil ka tshe//dri zhim mtshon dkar legs byugs te//pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor legs gnas te//so so'i mtshan ma'i yi ge rgyan//rnam rgyal bum pa la sogos rnams//mchod
133b5(rgyud): nas stan la bkram par bya//rin chen sna lnga 'bru lnga dang //snying po lnga dang sman lnga dang //bkra shis rdzas lnga gzhug par bya//mgul chings gzungs thag kha rgyan sogs//dam
133b6(rgyud): tshig lha rnams gas la byas nas//ye shis sku dang gnyis med par/mchod bstod sngags kyi bzlas pa bya//sngags btsas chu dang gnyis med gnas//dkyil 'khor
