133b7(rgyud): grub pa'i dus dag tu//ring rang gnas kyi phyogasu dgra ma//dam tshig dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas/ye shes lha dang gnyis med pa'i//thabs dang shes rab 'brel byas
134a1(rgyud): /pas//dkyil 'khor sa la thig gdang bya//shes rab spyan mdzes bcu drug lon pa 'am//ji bzhin byin gyi brlabs nas kyang //dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa gnas
134a2(rgyud): bya'o//gtsang ma'i rgyu las byung ba'i ras//kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am//lnga las byung ba'i skud pa dag/byin gyis brlabs cing bsgril bar bya//stong pa nyid kyis sgying byas nas//
134a3(rgyud): rigs kyi lha ru gnas pa dge/mchod pastod sngags btsos bsgril bar bya//oM badz+ra sa ma~M yA ru tu mai ti kra mar+g+haM/oM AHhUM/dza gdags po'i sngags brjod cing //rdo rje slob dpan
134a4(rgyud): thugs kha nas//slob mas smin mtshams drang por then/de la gnas kyi nub dang shar//'od 'phros byang sems thugs rje che//na mkha'i dkyil 'khor mngon par lta//rdo
134a5(rgyud): rje lte bas phyogs dang mtshams//dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs par bstan//stobs mchog dpa' bo dgongasu gsol//rdo rje thig skud sgrar ldan pas//na mkha'i dkyil
134a6(rgyud): 'khor legs grub cing //'gro ba'i don la bskul bar mdzod//oM a nu n+yai a nu ga to sarba d+harma pA ra pa ra a nu ga ta sarba a nan tA/u pai ta ra sArbe d+harma hU~M//lha rnams
134a7(rgyud): mdun du bzhugs 'gyur nas//mchod bstod dbang po'i tshul du dgongs//rdo rje khu tshur sagr-i zhig cing //sha ba nas nub du brkyang ba yi//tshangs thig dang po gdab byas nas//
134b1(rgyud): bzhin sgo nas tshad kyisate//zur ba na shin tu logs par gnal//da ts+tsho byung gnyis padang//'tshams kyi zhig rnams gdas par bya//logs thig gru ba ni mnyam 'gyur nas//brgyad dang /
134b2(rgyud): bcu drug dag tu bgo/bar khyams byi khyams ma gtogs pa'i//gzhon dog cha dran bzhi bzhir bgro/thig gi ga rdzogs pa dang //ye shes skud pas mchod bstod cing //rdo rje bu tshu
134b3(rgyud): sngags bcas kyis//rang gi gan su gshegs gsol bya//oM badz+ra ga dzaHdkyil 'khor bdag po'i nga rgyal gyis//mig gnyis ma dang ta las byung bar bsam//dkyil 'khor
134b4(rgyud): rnams kun bltas te//sngags dang phyag rgya bcas pa yi//sgra dag pa ni bo dbye byas nas//cha bran dag kyang blo yis brtag/rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya yis//ri mo'i mkhar ni btegs byas te//
134b5(rgyud): 'byung 'jug gsang ba'i cho ga dag/rnal 'byor brtan pa yid kyis bya//oM bau ga kra ma hUM/pad+ma reng bzhin rnam dag pas//dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i gnas chen po//thugs rje ye shes
134b6(rgyud): rnam 'phrul tshogs//khyab mdzad byin rlobs ston pa'i gtso//rgyal ba rnams kyi sku gsung thugs/yon tan phrin las rmad du 'byung //ma lus sems can don gyi phyir//pho brang
134b7(rgyud): dag par byin gyis rlabs//phyogaso mtshams mi lus rnam dge pas//byang chub ye shes gnas gsal 'gyur//nyon mongs nyes tshogs kun bcom pa'o//thugs rje chen//
135a1(rgyud): padri med shugs//ye shes byin brlas las byung ba'i//dkyil 'khor gsang ba grub par mdzod//rin chen rnam lnga'i phyi ma dang //sa tshon la sogs gang 'byor pa//
135a2(rgyud): rin po che yi snod blugs te//dkyil 'khor gnas kyi phyogs lngar gzhug/snang zhing byin gyis brlabs byas na//rigs lnga'i skud tshogs yum bcas la//rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dbus
135a3(rgyud): sogs dang //mchod bstod sngags kyis mnyes por bya//oM badz+ra Ni ta ma ti sa ma yo hUM//dkar mthing ser po ljang khu dang //dmar po'i tshe ni rnams rim bzhin du/dbang ldan 'tshams
135a4(rgyud): gnas tsam byas te//pan tsa rA ge drang bar bya//g.yas pas pad+ma rdo rje bzung //g.yon pas 'dren pa'i las bya'o//de la mchod 'bul sngags brjod cing //bden pa bdar te dga' bar bya//
135a5(rgyud): 'drin chos dbyings rnam par dag/sems can khams ni rab sgrol byed//dpal ldan pad+ma gar dbang ni//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas//yang dag bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis/
135a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor las rnams shes par mdzad//dbus kyi lte ba nas brtsams te//dang pa slob dpon gyis bri zhing //phyis ni ci dgur shes par bri//mthong man me snyoms drang por bya//de nas
135a7(rgyud): mtshan ma brtags brtan te//chad cing smra bas mi 'grub ste//yon pas gdung ba'i las rnams skye//ched pas slob dpon slob ma dag/shi za ma ngan par 'gyur ba yin//lhag dang ba
135b1(rgyud): pasna gA yul 'khrugs shing //phyogs 'khrul pa yis smyo bar 'gyur//dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gnas dag tu//ri'u mig nyi shu rtsa lnga las//pad+mo gshogs gtso bo'i rigasu bcas//phyag
135b2(rgyud): rgya'i yi ge mtshan ma bri//phyi rol pad+ma'i 'dib gnas pa/nyi shu rtse ba'i tshogs rnams la//byung sems khyo da~M bcas pa dag/shar nes rim bzhin bri bar bya//phyi dang nang gi 'tshems rnams//
135b3(rgyud): mched pa'i lha mo brgyad rnams gzhag/bar khyams bskal bzangs sems dpa' rnams//sgo bzhir khro bo'i tshogs gzhag go//dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus song ste//bad gshegs 'od
135b4(rgyud): zer snang ba yi//pad mo rdo rje dril bcas pas//rang gi kha dog mchod bcos bzhag/de yi shar phyogs re'u mig la//tshe mtha' yas dang chos dbang phyug/chags med 'od dang spyan dga' ba'i//padad+ma
135b5(rgyud): rtsegs pad ma'i breng ma dang //pad gnas rin chen gleg pa ma rin chen phreng //rang mdog sngags kyis brgyan pa gzhag/shar gyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//bde bar gshegs pa me bskyod
135b6(rgyud): ba//rdo rje dril bu'i sngags bcas pas//rang gi 'od bcas gdan la bzhag/de yi shar phyogs re'u mig la//'brug sgra dri ma med pa'i rigs//mngon par snang mdzad bstan dbang phyug/chags
135b7(rgyud): shing rin chen pad spangs pa//rin po che yi dra ba ste//rim bzhin rang mdog sngags kyis rgyan//lho yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa//bde gshegs rin po che sbyangs kyis//rin chen brtse
136a1(rgyud): da m+b+hi phral//rang mdag sngags kyis mtshan byas pa'o//de yi shar phyogs mig la//nam mkha'i mdzod dngang ba can//dkon mchog rgyal mtshan rin chen gtog/rin chen/
136a2(rgyud): gleng bri rin chen phreng //rin chen rgyal mchen rin chen bu ma//rlung gi 'od brgyas rdzogs kyis ban+d+han//nub kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa//ded ga shegs kun du snang ba'i 'ang+ga//'a
136a3(rgyud): del bu mtshan pa la//rang 'od sngags kyis mtshan ma bri//pad ma rigs kyi 'khor lo'i ched//byung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa//bde gshegs don mod grub pa yi//rdo rje sna tshogs dril bu
136a4(rgyud): bsnams//rang gi sngags dang kha dog gsal/de yi shar phyogs ri'i mig la//brtson 'grus dang ni shugs chen po//gnod sbyin 'dul ba sna tshogs dbang //rgyu gram phreng dang pad ma phreng //
136a5(rgyud): rdo rje gdengs po zla kham can//'od 'phros sngags kyis mtshan byas pa'o//'tshams kyi re'u mig bzhi rnams la//'od 'phros pad+ma ma 'dzin pa dang //pad ma gnon dang bde skyong dang //me long
136a6(rgyud): rin chen phreng ba dang //pi bang gar gyi phyag rgya la//rang 'od sngags kyis mdzes par bya//phyi rol pad+ma'i sher bcums te//rigs kyi byang sems bzhi bzhir gnas//bde ba'i rgyu sa rgya
136a7(rgyud): mtsho'i blo//gzi mdangs dang ni 'khor lo yi//nam mkha'i mdzod kyi 'khor lo rin po che//pad lcug 'khor lo dbyug pa rnams//rang 'od sngags kyi mtshan mar gnas//shes rab snang
136b1(rgyud): ba rdo rje rgyal//'od zer 'phro ba drag shul gyi//rin chen phung po rin chen gdugs//pad ma'i sdong po 'od phung bri//dri ma'i tshogs dang sgyu ma 'khrul//rin chen rgyal po dra ba can//rin chen ri bo rgya bram bu/
136b2(rgyud): labra dazang gser 'od 'phro ba dang //rin chen snye ma chos mthong dang //pad ma'i rgya gram glegs bam dang //pad+ma'i sdong po'i go che khri//dri ma dmun pa sel ba dang //dga' ba dbyangs dang gzhon nu yi//
136b3(rgyud): chu shel nor bu'i phreng ba dang //sprin phung rdo rje rgya gram bri//de ni rigs lnga'i sems dpa' ste//rang 'od sngags kyis mtshon byas pa'i//de mthar khro bo'i bzhi rnams kyis//phyog rgya'i mtshan me bri byas
136b4(rgyud): to//sbyin bdag smra ba'i dbang phyug dang //rtse gsum rin chen rtse dgu dang //dbyig pa rtse gcig ral gre'o//gru chad mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi//gdug spos me tog mar me dri//phyi rol bar 'khyams
136b5(rgyud): gnas drag la//phyogs re sems dpa' bzhi bzhi ste//rdo rje rnam snang gur mkhan dang //blo yi rgya mtsho thigs med bkod//rdo rje mtshan ma gsang sngags bcas//rong 'ong gnas gdan
136b6(rgyud): dgral bri//pad mo dga' ba'i sa la dbang //rin chen spangs pa sprin gyi phreng //rin chen mtshan ma sngags dang bcas//rang 'od gdan la gnas pa bri//yid 'od me tog sgron ma dang //spos
136b7(rgyud): brtsegs kha lo bsgyur ba dang //pad ma'i mtshan ma sngags dang bcas//rang 'od gdan la gnas par bri//dran dbang pad ma'i blo bros dang //las byed snying po'i blo gros dang //rgya gram
137a1(rgyud): mtshan ma sngags dang bcas//rlung 'od gdan la gnas par bri//shar sogs pa yi sgo rnams//khra da'i 'jigs pa'i rgyal ba yi//rdo rje rgya gram rdo rje gdangs//rin chen chu/
137a2(rgyud): pa pad ma 'phreng //rang gi yi ge gdan gnas pa'i//phyag rgya'i mtshan ma bri bar bya//phyogs bzhi rgyun dang phreng ba dang //'dod yon lha mo la sog pa yi//rgyun rnams pad ma rdo rje dang //rin
137a3(rgyud): chen 'khor lo rgyu bram bri//'phre bas mtshan ma kha dog lnga//nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'od btsos pa'o//phyi rol rta babs dra ba sogs//ban d+ha dril bu nyi shu bzhi//gdugs dang bum pa bya yi phreng /
137a4(rgyud): dpag bsam rdzing bu dang pa dang //nyi zla me long rgyal mtshan lnga//chos kyi 'khor lo ri dgas rnams//mdzes byas phyi mtha' pad+ma dang //rdo rje mi 'od mtshoni gyos bskor//dbus mig
137a5(rgyud): kha dog nyi shu lnga//bad phreng dmar po ber khyams dkar//sgo bzhi'i rin chen sna bzhi//glu chad gser gyi kha dog can//mchod pa lnga dang bum dgram bzhi//bla rgyun na bza' phyogs rgyan
137a6(rgyud): bre/me ti tshom bu sngags bcas pa//so bo'i gan su dgram par bya//gtor ma tshogs mang sbyar byas nas//phyi rol phyogs dang 'tsham su dgod//lU yi ting 'dzin gas la byas/
137a7(rgyud): bas//dkyil la ba shes pa'i las 'grub 'gyur//de nas lha rnam so bskyod byas te//rdo rjes pad mdo mchi mgozhu ga/zugs kha'i sngags kyis dgug byas pa'i//mgron no
137b1(rgyud): tshim par 'gyur pa dang //dam tshig sngags kyis bskul byas shing //rang gi phrin las bcol bar bya zhes gsung so//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa bla na med pa'i da
137b2(rgyud): pa dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las gzugs brnyan rtsam pa'i le'u ste/bdun pa'o///de na sau byang chub sems dpa'i gtso//rdo rje 'chang sogs mgu 'gyur nas//rgyal ba sngar yang
137b3(rgyud): bskul ba mdzad//kun don thugs rje chen po'i shugs//ma 'ongs gsang sngagaso sbyong rnams kyis//dkyil 'khor chen por gang 'jug pa//dbang bskur tshul bzhin ji lta bur//de bzhin
137b4(rgyud): rab tu gnas pa gang //bdag gzhan don gyi yan lag bsrungs//sbyin sreg rim po ji ltar lags//gtso bo thugs rje cher ldan pas//ma lus gdul bya kun gyi phyir//dus 'di snang bang
137b5(rgyud): mdzad nas kyang //cho ga'i yan lag rgyas pa gsungs//de nas byang chub sems tshogs kyis//gus par gsang ste spyad par bgyi//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang //phyag rgya shes rab rab
137b6(rgyud): spyod cing //rab tu dga' ba'i bzhin rgyas pa//rigs rnams kun la gzigs mdzad de//mchog gsum sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i//don 'di rab tu gnas par mdzad//byang chub sems dpa'
137b7(rgyud): blo ldan pa'i//ma 'ongs gdul bya gang dag gis//gnyis med gsang ba'i theg pa 'dir//sman pa'i lam lo 'jug 'dod pas//gang gis nyes pa'i las rnams kyis//rdo rje
138a1(rgyud): mgu byas nas//yang dang yang du gsol btab te//dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i don du gnyer//ma lus sdug bsngal las bsgral phyir//byang chub sems mchog rgya chen
138a2(rgyud): blos//phyi nang 'byor pa'i yo byad dag/thams cad byang chub don du bsdus/'dod chags rnam dag pad mo'i dbyings//chos kun gyi ni de bzhin nyid//ye shes sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog//
138a3(rgyud): de ring yod 'ong don chen gnyer//oM u ta ga ta sa me ya s+t+waM//pad+ma dga' ba'i sku mchog mnyes//sna tshogs dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i gnas//mtshan dpe phun sum tshogs pa yi//bder/
138a4(rgyud): gshegs sku la phyag 'tshalo//rdo rje chen pos gzhan rnams 'joms//mi shes dri ma kun sel ba'i//thugs mchog gsang ba'i chos mthar phyir//rdo rje thugs la phyag 'tshalo//
138a5(rgyud): gsang sngags snying po gsang ba'i chos//rab snang pad ma'i dbyings nas 'khrul//byang chub na mkha'i mtshan nyid can//rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tsho lo//yon tan rin tshon char 'bebs/
138a6(rgyud): shing //de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal 'gyur ba//dpal mchog bkra shis phun sum tshogs//theg pa tshe la phyag 'tshalo//kun dog nas 'gyur khyab pa po//las mdzad rdo
138a7(rgyud): rje dam tshig mchog/mi mthun gnas rnams rab 'tshams mdzad//rdo rje 'joms la phyag 'tshalo//dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal//dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas
138b1(rgyud): mama.am la khams samama.a mnyam thas #sa#ma yam # sa #ya as#
138b2(rgyud): nyid du//dbang bskur gsang ba las byung ba//dam tshig yad shes rab grub mdzad//shes rab chas nyid las 'phrul pa'o//rjesu 'jugs pas snying rje'i tshogs//yang dag bden pa las byung
138b3(rgyud): ba'o//byin rlabs 'dod pa thams cad rdzogs//bde gshegs sprul pa'i tshig tshogs ni//dbang bskur rdzogs mdzad pa yi rigs//me tog phreng ba la sogs pas//slob pa rgyun par/
138b4(rgyud): byas nAn//phyir phyogs stegs bu la bzhag ste//gtor ma phyogs kun las byin nas//kun la gsol 'debs bsgo bya zhing //slob ma gzhug pa nyid du bya//ras gtsang dmar bye'i rgyu
138b5(rgyud): las byung //gnas gzhan ma spyad ma nyams pa ra//rang gi sngags kyi byin ba rlabs nas//legs par bdod na g.yog par bya//pad mo'i thel sbyar ri ni tshon phreng //sngags brjod gzung /
138b6(rgyud): 'dzin rtse gcig tu//brtan par byang chub don gnyer bas//dkyil 'khor ga na sumos pa bskyed//de nas slob dpon blo ldan pas//theg chen lo ma la zhugs pa'i phyir//slob ma dag
138b7(rgyud): la slar smras pa//gsang sngags la mi mchog zab pa 'di//shin tu bzung ba dka' ba yin//khyod kyis bzung bar 'dod pa rnams//mi snyems pa yi blo bskyed nas//lto spyod mchog la/
138b8(rgyud): gnas dgongaso//kye ma rdo rje gsang ba'i don//theg chen snying po bla na med//tshe 'dis byang chub 'grub byed kyang //rmongs rnams the tshom skye bar 'gyur//dang tshul bzang po'ang rtogs
139a1(rgyud): pas//dus sum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams//byin brlabs ngo mtshar mchog banyes te//sems can don phyir tshul dang ldan//khyod kyis sgro skur dang bral zhing //
139a2(rgyud): da brtson the tshom med par zung //de nas slob mas slar gsol po//yang dag thugs rje cher mnga' ba'i//mgron mchog rnams kyis bdag la gnong //'di dag bdag la rtol
139a3(rgyud): med pas//khyod kyis gsungs bzhin gsol bar 'tshal//slar yang rab gus dang ba'i yid//tshul chen mi nyan dam tshig mchog/slob dpon che la skyabasu mchi//sangs
139a4(rgyud): rgyas dkyil 'khor sras bcas tshogs//thugs mchog dri med bdag la dgongs//bdag gis byang chub don gnyer bas//dkyil 'khor gnasu mos po bskyed//gar gyi dbang
139a5(rgyud): phyag bde chen mchog/mgon 'gyur rnams la skyabasu mchi//mya ngan las 'das pho brang 'dir//bdag nyid zhugs par mdzad pa legs//de nas las kyo rdo rje yis//gas
139a6(rgyud): bye'i mthe bo nas bzung ste//yol pa'i nang du gzhug par bya//oM pad mo sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya yo ga tsa ti u pa ta ya mi hUM swAhA//de nas gsang ba'i gnas zhugs pas//ngas ni
139a7(rgyud): nacheng/rgyun gshegs la sogs kyis//snod du rung bar gyur pa dang //dam tshig gsum sgrogs chu blud cing //rdo rje gsang ba'i dam sgrogs shing //phyag rgyas sngags kyi
139b1(rgyud): gnas gsum sbyang //oM rgyal ba kun gyi khyod nyid ni//byin gyis brlab cing brtan mdzad pas//pad+ma gar dbang dkyil 'khor 'dir//bdag med dam tshig spangs pa dang //dang med brtson 'grus
139b2(rgyud): nyams pa dang //blo dman rtogs 'dzin la gnas lo//srog gi phyir yang brjod mi bya//bde che ni mgon po pad 'chang sku//khyod kyi snying la zhugs pa na//gsang ba'i ye shes gzhan brjod
139b3(rgyud): dus//snying khrag 'thung zhing gzhan du shes//bdag ni gor gyi dbang phyug sku//khyod la thugs rjes bzung byed pas//nga yis bsgo ba'i tshig 'di dang //'da' bar rung ba ma yi no//bdag
139b4(rgyud): la brnyes shing 'khu byed na//rab shom khro bo chen po'i sku//klad pa chel ba brgyar 'gas shing //lus sems ngal sogs rdul du byed//gnas gzhi 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la//
139b5(rgyud): rang sngags sa bon 'od zer bcas//dbab pa'i gsang sngags lan stong du//dri zhim bdug spros dril dkrol zhing //ye shes sems dpa' gzhug par bya//des ni mtshan ma'i rtags
139b6(rgyud): mthong 'gyur//sku yi ye shes phyogs bcur g.yos//gsung gi ye shes gsang ba brjod//thugs kyi ye shes mngon shes gsal//sngags gsum phyag rgyas brtan par//
139b7(rgyud): gnas//bden pa'i ye shes byin brlabs kyis//dkyil 'khor rigs kyi lha gang yin//bdag gis bskal pa ci lta bar//dus 'dir dbang par mdzad par rigs//nor bu drang
140a1(rgyud): gong //rigs dor ga ma tshogs nyid//sngags dang phreng ba ma lus pa//sgra nyid des sbyin par bya//gsor gyi gyur mabyin brlabs pas//nA ga rmongs pa'i ying rtogs pa
140a2(rgyud): rdorjes gdung g.yogs gsal byas nas//dkyil 'khor gos la ba bstan par bya//legs par ltos cig blo gros che//sngon gyi rgyal po la sogs rnams//gsang sngags snying po
140a3(rgyud): 'khor 'dir//legs par zhugs te grub pa bzhin//me tog gang la bi ba pa //lha de rigs kyi dam tshig yin//shAr k+Sh+mI sgo srungs nas brtsams te//gtso bo'i bar du dkyil 'kho
140a4(rgyud): bstan//zhal zas na bza' la sogs pas//bla ma blo ldan mnyes par bya//yid ma g+hi m+b+ha phyug rgya sogs//gsung ba'i ming dang bcas par bstan//de ring dus nas bzung byas te//
140a5(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas thob par//rab rib tha ma'i blo ldan pas//dus kun du ni bzung bar byo//kye ma ho blo gros rgya mtsho'i gnas//'gro la bskyab pa'i don brtso ne la//khyod zhabs pad+ma sa
140a6(rgyud): 'dud de//pho brang srong mchog nyams dga' 'dir//dbang bskur po yi ri na chen mdzod//sbrang mdzad lus la bab pa lags//rigs bzhin thugs rje rtse dgongs pas//dri ma'i skyon mal
140b1(rgyud): rkyen brlabs mdzod//gan shAr mdzad pa'i dus lags pas//skyob pa'i sku mchog thob par mdzod//shar gyi sgo phyogs khru de'i rgyab//dbang bsten dkyil 'khor dbus kyi chad//pad+ma bdapa brgyud pa dang /
140b2(rgyud): bcas//dmar po'i mtshon gyis legs byugs te//seng ge'i khri bshams pad mo ra bcas//'khor lo sgyur rgyal tshul gyis bzhag/spyi bor 'dugs mdzes rgyal mtshan g.yas//dud dang zang dung
140b3(rgyud): sil snyan rnams//rol cha mchod cha phyogs 'tshams dgod//rgyan phreng gos kyis legs klubs pa//dri chu sngags bcas yungs ko ra dang //ku sha'i chu yis dag par bya//oM me hI pin ta ta na
140b4(rgyud): ha na hUM phaT//de nas rigs kyi lhar bskyed de//bka shis dag pa'i klu blangs shing //rol mo rgyan phreng bkod byis te//bum pa'i chu yis dbang bskur bya//de yi phyir na sgrib tshogs dang //bag chags
140b5(rgyud): nyon mongs gnas dag nas//lha yi chu rgyan dag pa'i mthus//ye shes phung po dbang phyug mchog/oM lha yi chu ni dag pa'i chu//rdo rje gsang gsum nas las byung //byang sems chu yis tshogs
140b6(rgyud): rnams dag/dbang bskur ba yi don thob mdzod//yon tan rin chen rnam dag mchog/rigs lnga'i sku rgyan byas pa yi//dbu rgyan bzang po'i cod pan bcas//kun 'byung rin cheni phung po mchog/
140b7(rgyud): tri yon tan ma bcas pa'i rgyan//rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed//khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po che//mtshan dodang dpe byad kun rdzob kun//ye nas rdo rje rtsi lnga pa//'od phreng sngags kyis
141a1(rgyud): brgyan byas pa'o//rtogs bcas tshogs rnams kun las rgyal//bde gshegs thugs rje rje gcig pas//khams gsum gnas rnams dor mi mdzad/byung sems rdo rjertsa lnga
141a2(rgyud): rang rig ye shes gnas gsal byed//chos rnams skye ba med pa'i don//sgra brjod dngos po brag cha bzhin//stong pa'i dril bu gsung rang bzhin//de las skye tshogs rgya chen tshogs//haM chos kun rgyu
141a3(rgyud): las rnam grol zhing //de bzhin rkyo med 'bras bu'i tshogs//rang bzhin pad+ma dag pa'i dbyings//nges pa'i thigs pa b+h+yon byed gsung //k+She ho rdo rje che ge mo//rigs kyi mtshan gyis dbang bskur to//
141a4(rgyud): chos sku 'od gras la bde ba che//pad+ma'i sgra dbyangs ming dang bcas//oM phyag rgya chen po gsong ba'i gnas//rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis//mi mthun la sogs bcom byas te//rnam par snang marma/
141a5(rgyud): /de bzhin gshegs//oM badz+ra pad mo i pr-i shin+ta mi//oM rad na mu ku ha a bi shin+na hUM/oM a ti ba titA a bi shaur+d+ha he/oM na ma che ge mo a bi shaR+Sha mi//slob dpon lho la rab gus pas//tshogs
141a6(rgyud): bcas yon tan gzung byed cing //rdo rje dam tshigs pa yi spun//mig gi 'bras bu bzhin du brkyang //'di dag la gus glod byed pa//tshe srog rdo rje bdun pos 'phrog/sngags rnams dus su brjod bya zhib
141a7(rgyud): phyag rgya rgyun dubacing bar bya//gsang ba'i tshig dang mtshan pa'i tshogs//dus kun dag tu sba byas te//bdud rtsi lnga po shaM sogs rnams//mnyem par shes pas rgyun tu spyad//bro drug glu drug stabs pa'i/
141b1(rgyud): brtul shugs gnas skabs dag tu bya//nyon mongs chos lnga 'dod yon lnga//dam tshig nyams pas shes par spyad//rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya tshe//gnas gsum brtul zhugs la gnas shing //lung stan/
141b2(rgyud): rjes gnang dbugs 'don pa'i//cho ga bzang po spyad par bya//des ni rdo rje slob dpon mchog/yon tan bza' bo'i gnas thob 'gyur//rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgyu sku//yang dge sngags kyis byin brlabs te/
141b3(rgyud): 'ongs gzung ba'i blo gnas pas//gsang ba'i dam tshigs rje su zung //oM sarba ta thA ga ta swa ra pad+ma sa ma ya s+t+wa~M//oM da du shri pad ma~M g+hu na d+ha e//oM ma ho pad mau sr-i tA sarba ta thA ga ta k+Sha yag tsit+ta hU~M paT//mtshad
141b4(rgyud): pa bkra shis bzang la klags//brtul zhugs mchog tu gyur pa yin//bdag dang gzhan gyi don spyod pa'i//dngos grub thun mong cho ga'i las//zhi rgyas dbang dang dgug pa dang //dbye rmongs bskrad pa'i cho ga dang
141b5(rgyud): gsod pa la sogs las rnams kun /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di yi tshul//khyod kyis gang 'dod grub par gyis//de nas rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i//pa'i ma'i dkyil 'khor rab sbyor bas//'khor
141b6(rgyud): pa'i chos rnams zil gnon cing //phyogs bcur dam chos gsung sgrogs shing //pha rol phyin drug gnas 'phags te//sgro 'dogs the tshom gcod par byed//lung stan bde gshegs sras
141b7(rgyud): bcas kyis//rigs mchog mdzad pa bla na med//rgyal ba kun gyis lung bstan mdzad//kha mos gsum 'dzin bcas kun las grol//'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig/khams gsum
142a1(rgyud): kun na gzhan mod do//de nas 'dod la chags bral bar//khyod kyis nam yang ma byed cig/oM ma hA sa ma ya hU~M phaT//gsang sngags rgyun rnams 'dzin bya dang //lha dang slob dpon
142a2(rgyud): gzung bar bya//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//gsung gcig sgo nas gsungs pa yin//'gro rnams kun la phan pa'i blos//dkyil 'khor la sogs brtson par gyis//dad brtson shes
142a3(rgyud): rab blo ldan pas//gang 'dod 'bras bu'i tshul la sbyor//mchog tu gsang ba'i grong khyer 'dir//gang gis 'dod don gang gnyer ba//des ni sgrib sogs kun spangs shing //mchog gnas ye
142a4(rgyud): shes gsal bar sbyor//bde chen gsang ba'i theg pa che//tshe 'di byang chub 'grub par byed//nyon mongs dag sngags las grol ba'i//bde ba chen po'i gnas thob pa'o//de nas lha dang bzhun
142a5(rgyud): gnas pa'i//rnam dog de nyid bstan bya ste//mchod sprin gtor tshogs mgron gnyar cing //bkra shis 'gro ba'i tshogs bseg bya//slan yang slob ma blo ldan pas/yon mchog bla ma le
142a6(rgyud): phul te//maN+Dal mchod pa'i tshegs rnams kyis//menyes byas gsal ba gdab par bya//shes rab yan lag phun sum tshogs//bcu drug gang na nyi shu bzhi//rdo rje bla ma la phul ste/khyen
142a7(rgyud): gyis brlab pa'i cho ga bya//khrus byas dri zhim rgyan gyis glugs//sna tshogs sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang //rigs kyi lha dang ldan byas pas//dam tshigs bskul ba'i brdas mtshon ste//
142b1(rgyud): gnyis med ye shes snyoms 'jug bya//byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun gyis//rang gi dkyil 'khor mchod byas pas//slob dpon tshogs la dbang yang bskur//ji ltar rgyal ba sa sa mchog gis//
142b2(rgyud): 'jug pa po rnams tshim mdzad pa'o//gnyis med ye shes gsang ba'i don//dbab pa'i phyag rgya las byung ba'i//a la la ho//oM AHhUM//a ho su kA rang gi gnas//a ho re ti tshim par mdzad/
142b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun la rang bzhin gnas//shes rab mchog ldan byin brlabs pa//slob ma'i lag tu gtad par bya//rang bzhin bde ba'o ye shes nyid//zag pa med pa'i don gsal 'gyur/
142b4(rgyud): rnam par rtog pa'i sems kyis ni//rang gi dngo pa nyid mthong bar 'gyur//e ma ho 'gro ba'i gnas 'dri dag/de bzhin nyid lngas gzhan du 'khrul//de dgra bde chen ye shes pas//gzhan du
142b5(rgyud): 'gyur ba ci yang med//ye shes 'di ni shin tu 'phra//rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra zhing //rdul bral thar pa zhi pa'i chos//rang gi rang bzhin de nyid do//de ni byin sregs gsang ba'i don//khyed rnams
142b6(rgyud): kun la phyir bshad de//dkyil 'khor chen po phyogs bzhi 'am//gzhan yang gnas gzhan gang thang par//zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang //las kun pa yi thab khung brtsam//zlum po
142b7(rgyud): khru gang zla kham dang //gru gsum sna tshogs dbyibs can no//de dag dkar ser dmar dang nag/sna bzhi kun gyis mtshon pa'o//rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma'i rgyan//sna tshogs rdo rje tshon cha can//khru
143a1(rgyud): /gang bzhi dang gnyis med dang //khru gsum de yi zhubasu byed//bud shIng yam shings so yi//mtshan nyid lo 'bras kha dog rwa//rtse mo cha las sor bzhi dang //sar rgyad
143a2(rgyud): bcu drug nyi shu'i tshad//sbams pa'i so so'i mar gyis byug/rim bzhin rtsa ba bud khang ni//zlum dang gru bzhi zla gam dang //gru gsum tshul du rtsig par bya//lha rnams kun gyi khang pa nyid//
143a3(rgyud): me yi gan su gzhag byas te//so so'i las dang 'thun pa ste//ahA nai rA tsa bod par bya//g.yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgyas g.yab//g.yon pa bgrong breng bzung bar bya//oM a r+ya
143a4(rgyud): he a ga ne ye ma hA ba pau hi swA hA//khro bo'i rgyal pos gsung bya ste//me lha'i gdan mchod pad+ma dbul//de rjes mchod pa rnam lnga dang //sreg rdzas ma lus dbul byas nas//lha rnams
143a5(rgyud): mchod pa'i phyag brtsa du//bstod cing gsol ba gdab por bya//g.yas g.yon dgang gzar blugs gzar gyis//khu ba nung 'dzag pa'i rnam grangs dbul//oM ma hA a n+yA la ma
143a6(rgyud): hA b+hU tA badz+ra la~M basmi ku ru hU~M sarba duSh+ka Na hUM phaT//me lha mchod po'o//oM ma hA ku ru pan+ya hUM//dgang lugs dbul ba'i sngagaso//oM sarba ba d+ha ha na badz+ra swA hA//til gyi'o//oM badz+rA
143a7(rgyud): busma h+ni//mi rtog gi'o//oM sarba oMg+ne yi swA hA/ya ma shing ngo //oM badz+ra pu tsa maM ga ga l-i ka sha ra hUM/'jig rten dbang phyug bya ba'i mchod pa'o//oM d+hu pe rti pa pu sha g+han d+he sbyar ba'i//
143b1(rgyud): mchod ngarnamaso//ma a byA ti dzA ye swAhA//ku sha 'o//oM badz+ra s+thA yu she swAhA/dur ba'i'o//gzhan yang rdzas rnams dang chags pa//rang mid yi ge gsum sngags dayul//de nas dkyil lakhor kun
143b2(rgyud): mchod cing //'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab/sdig bshags bag tshig kun byas pas//lha yi dngos grub thob par 'gyur//tha ma me lha mchod byas nas//phrin las so so'i sngags brjod cing

143b4(rgyud): dga' mdzes pa ru//gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor legs byas te//mchod rdzas rdzas kyis mnyes byas nas//slob dpon chagasu gzhug par bya//dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgrub sa byas nas//

143b6(rgyud): mchog gnas 'dir bzhugs nas kyang //me tog la sogs mchong bzhes la//'di don bzung bar bya ba dang //byang chub sems mchog spel bar mdzad//nang par rab gnas bgyid par
143b7(rgyud): 'tshal//slob ma rnams la rtse ba dang //khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir//bcom ldan bdag ni grub pa la//bka' drin cho ga mdzad par 'os//de nas gnas rnams kun sbyangs nas//'gro
144a1(rgyud): drug gnas kun sgrol byed pa//thams cad dus 'dir dgongasasu gsol//byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang //gsang ba'i sngags ldan lha rnams kun//'jig rten mchod
144a2(rgyud): pa'i don phyir ro//rab gnas bzang por 'os pa lags//de nas gnas rnams kun sbyangs nas//byin gyis brlabs pa rdzogs byas te//rang gi dkyil 'khor ji lta bar//dbang bsku
144a3(rgyud): gardzogaso byas nas//sbyin sreg gtor ma la sogs gtang zhes gsung so//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/
144a4(rgyud): lam khyad por du 'phags pa'i le'u ste/brgyad pa'o///de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pa de'i tshe/bdud kyi rgyal po shin tu mya ngan skyes te/kye ma'o ha
144a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'dir ni bdag gi gnas la sogs pa bcom zhing brlag par byed na thabs ji lta bur gdul bar bya/'on kyang 'di nyid la ni bdag ci yang bya ba'i gnas med/shin tu dman par
144a6(rgyud): 'gyur ba dag dang mtshungs par 'gran nam/de bzhin du 'jig rten gsum pa 'di dag ni/srid pa mi bsreg brlag par bya ba'i phrin las yin pas/thams cad lnga dka' bsgo zhing /las
144a7(rgyud): ngan pa 'di dag la bzlog par bya'o zhes bsam mo//de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi gnas na mthu che ba dang /dbang dang gzi brjid thams cad 'dus nas/kye khyed rnams bdag la rton cig/
144b1(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag ni/rgyal po gcig gi dbang du ma gnas na/thams cad sred pa 'jig par 'gyur ro//des na phyogs thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa 'dus la/bdag gi bka' nyan par mad
144b2(rgyud): cig ces bsgrag so//de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi drag byed chen po'i tshogs kyis rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul bstan cing smras pa/khyed ji lta bu'i nga rgyal can cig yin/nged rnams re res kyang 'khor dpag tu med
144b3(rgyud): pa skyong ba'i rgyal po chen po yin pas/yul 'khor grangs med pa la dbang byed cing /gzhan gyi re gnas dam par gyur pa lags pas khyod rang bzhin gnas na legaso zhes 'thun par brjod par
144b4(rgyud): byasro bdud kyi rgyal po yang shin tu nyon mongs pas rgyas de gzhan dag la smras pa/lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di dag kun//nga yi bka' las gnas pa yin//skye 'gro ma lus gang dag kun//rgyal//
144b5(rgyud): po'i bka' gsang nyan par gyis//khams gsum bdag po lha'i lha//sa rnams kun gyis steng ba//bdag ni mthu dang rdzu 'phrul tshad//kun gyi 'dran par nus ma yin//nga yi bka' las 'da' byed na//
144b6(rgyud): srog srid brlag cing gnas kyang 'thor//zhes brjod do//de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal pos/rang gi 'khor dpag tu med pa bsdus te/de dag gi dbus nas srin po chen po'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i khri bar
144b7(rgyud): gnas nas//rang gi mthu las sprul pa'i khro bo dang //mtshon cha'i tshogs spro bar mdzad do//de bzhin du khyab 'jug dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /brgya byin dang /tshogs kyi bdag po dang /'bring /
145a1(rgyud): gi rI ti dang /gzhon nu dong drug pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang dpag tu med pa bsdus te/de dag gi dbus na 'gying zhing sprul pa bsam mi khyab par spros te/dbang dang rdzu
145a2(rgyud): 'phrul ston to//ri rab kyi kha khyer la gnas pa'i rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang rang rang gi 'khor gyis dbus na 'i gying zhing mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ston par mdzad do//gser gyi rI la gnas pa'i phyogs/
145a3(rgyud): skyong brgya byin dang /dbang ldan dang /gshin rje dang /bden bral dang /chu lha dang /gnod sbyin dpa/nyi ma dang /sa'i lha rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi gnas dang bcas par 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha/
145a4(rgyud): dong bcas par 'khod do//nyi ma dang /zla ba dang /mig dmar dang /phur bu dang /sba ba sangs dang /sbyin pa dang /gza' chen po rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas pas 'jigs pa'i
145a5(rgyud): khro bo'i tshogs dang /mtshon char bcas pas 'khod do//mtha' yas dang /'jog po dang /stobs kyi rgyu dang /rigs ldan dang /nor rgyas dang /dung skyong dang /pad+ma dang /chu la rnams kyis rang
145a6(rgyud): rang gi g.yog 'khor rnams dang /'jigs pa'i sprul pas 'khod do//de bzhin du khams gsum gyi dregs byed kyi tshogs gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /grul bum dang /'gro ba drug
145a7(rgyud): gtso bo dbang che zhing mthu yod pa rnams dang /ma mo rnams dang /gshin rje dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /'dab bzangs dang /srin po dang /na mkha' lding dang /rgyu skar gyi tshogasu bcas pa
145b1(rgyud): rnams kyis kyang rang dadagre'akhor gyi dathus na 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyi mtshan cha dang ngar dang bcas pas rnam par 'phrul zhing 'kho da //de nas bdud kyu rgyal pa yang nyon mongs pa skyes te/ra shel nga /
145b2(rgyud): rnams 'du bar mdzad cing rdzu 'phrul gyi nus pa ci yod pa dus 'di dgacig tu ston nas mtshon cha sna tshogs 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang nas drag po 'bar bar 'jigs pa'i skur ston to//khro mo
145b3(rgyud): tshogs dang rol pa mdzad pa lags/'khor ba'i tshogs mtshon cha me 'od bcas pa phyogs bcur spros tan mkha' thams cad gang bar byas nas thog ser na drang chubo ma thams cad skyeso//
145b4(rgyud): sa 'jig rten gyi lha kun myos shing rmongs par gyur pa dang /'jigs pa'i tshogs kyiso phyogs thams cadun sa/'khor ba'i me 'ad 'bar po'i mtshan chus bskyed cing gtub pa las//sa sa
145b5(rgyud): tshotshigs byed par gyur te/rang gi snying po phul zhing skyabasu gsol lo//de nas lha thams cod 'dra bar byed pa'i bdud kyi sde de dag la gnas dor zhing dam tshig byin te/so so'i snying po blangs te/
145b6(rgyud): 'khor tshogs thams cad rje dpon dang bral te/lho chen po brgyud ni rlung gi rtse la 'khod de//rgyal bro tshon b+ha bzhi ni shar gyi sgying la 'khod do//gnod sbyin dang phyogs skyong dag ni shar gyi gling 'phrin
145b7(rgyud): gnyi su 'khod do//'gro ba res drug gi sems can rnams ni lho ba skrod do//dri za dang ma mo rnams ni lho'i gling phrin la dgod do//lha ma yin rnams ni nub tu dag do//gshin rje dang 'ad ba
146a1(rgyud): dang blon po rnams ni nub kyi gling gi gling branA gnyis la dgod do//gza' dang rgyu star+ya rnams ni byang du dgod do//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa gsung ba blan mod
146a2(rgyud): pa las bdud kyi sprul pa bstan pa'o////de nas bdud kyi rgyal po de nyid shin tu dga' zhing 'khor thams cad la dka' bsgo//rgyal po gcig gi 'khor du gnas pas ni/yid dang 'thun par
146a3(rgyud): spyod pas gnas pa yin pas/khyed rnams kyis kyang ngas ci ltar bsgo ba'i bka' bzhin nyon la/thar pa'i lam 'di chod la ston pa gzhan la gus par mi byed cig/kho bo'i 'jig rten stongs
146a4(rgyud): por dong ngo //bsam pa rgya chen po med pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag ni/gti mug can gyi rang bzhin ste/byol song lta bu yin pas/bde legs kyi gnas thob pa'i don med pa yin no//yang tshigs su
146a5(rgyud): bcad de smras pa//kye 'du shes med pa'i 'gro ba dag/rang gi bde ba spong byed cing //thar pa'i lam gzhan sgrub byed pa//de dag 'khrul pas rang rgyud brlag/nyes 'dod bde legs spong byed pa//
146a6(rgyud): rmongs pas 'gro rnams snying re rje//re shig thugs rje skal ldan paso//bdag gi 'khor du 'dus pa yin//gnas gzhan gong ma thob 'dod pas//bdag la ngad sems gus par gyis shig
146a7(rgyud): ces bsgo'o//de dag gis kyang de ltar nyan ste/rang rang gi gnas shor zhing mya ngan gyi sems skyes kyang ci ltar bya ba'i thabs med de/de ltar 'khod cing gnaso//de nas bdud kyi rgyal po rang
146b1(rgyud): bi gan su song ste/'khor dang bcas pa rnams dga' ba'i long spyod 'dod pa'i yon tan la spyod cing /dgyes pa'i glu gar dang rol mo la spyod do//ji ltar khams gsum kun gyi bdag po ni bdag yin pas//
146b2(rgyud): 'di las lhag pa'i bsgrub bya ni gzhan dag yod par bdag gis ma mthong ngo //de sangs rgyas kyi tshogs dang byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang bdag gi dbang du bsdun thabs ci ltar brtsam zhing /rang gi 'khor
146b3(rgyud): dag la yang 'dri bar byed do//de nas bdud kyi grong khyer kun la bsgo ste/sangs rgyas kyi 'khor rnams la mi dge ba'i bltas dang mtshan ma ngon pa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyi bsgrub pa thams cad du
146b4(rgyud): rab tu 'chad cing /ci 'dod pa rnams la grub par bya na bdag cag la mos pa byed do//de'i rjes la de dag gi gtso bo rnams bdag gi 'khor du 'dus pa'i tshe thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas gdul bar
146b5(rgyud): bya'o//gal te 'ongs par ma nus pa dag ni kho rang gi gnas de nyid dang bcas pa gzhom par bya'o zhes brjod do//de'i steng gsum g.yo bar byed po'i tshogs kyi khro bo'i mtshon cha'i tshogs dang bcas
146b6(rgyud): po sprul nas/dkar po'i ris la dga' ba'i 'gro ba rnams ma lus bcom zhing /sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang brlog par bshams pa las/bden pa'i mthu gang la
146b7(rgyud): banod par ma gyur to//de nas rab tu khros te/bdag gi khams gsum 'di dus gcig tu gdul ba ro bya skyid pa la/ngan pa'i tshul can g.yo sgyu dang bcas pa 'di dag mi 'dul lam/di rang gi sde
147a1(rgyud): rdzun 'od ma la gnas pa kun bskul to/thar pa'i lam la gnas pa 'di dag rigs kyis 'dul bar bya khros brjod do//de nas tshangs pa la sngags pa bsgo bar mdzad
147a2(rgyud): pa dang /de dag gis kyang rang rang gi sprul pa dang /mtshon cha rnams phyogs kun tu spro zhing /rang gi gsang sngags drag po'i tshogs dag kyang brjod par byed do//des 'jig rten 'khrugs
147a3(rgyud): shing g.yos nas thams cad bred par gyur to//bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/bdud kyi sde dang bcas pa shugs 'byung ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o///de nas bcom ldan
147a4(rgyud): bde chen mchog/sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyis//stong gsum so sor 'dul mdzad phyir//rnam 'phrul ti 'dzin gnas la bzhugs//de bzhin nyid la si ma g.yos kyang //thugs rje
147a5(rgyud): che dang smon lam mthus//so so'i las rtog 'thun bzhin du//sna tshogs rtog pa'i tshul ma ston//'dod chags la zhen smon pa dag/chags pa chen pos 'dul bar mdzad//de bzhin zhe
147a6(rgyud): sdang gti mug dang //nga rgyal phrag dog 'dul don du//'thun byas snang ba sna tshogs dang //mi mthun sgo nas 'dul bar mdzad//pad mo bde gshegs rdo rje dro ni//rin chen rin chen las
147a7(rgyud): sna tshogs//phyag rgya che sogs 'khor lo sbyor//ji lta ba bzhin dag par mdzad//thabs chen rnam dag pad mo'i don//shes rab sprul pa'i mchog 'gyur bas//gar
147b1(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug bde ba che//rdo rje lha nyid sprul par mdzad//gzhan yang mdzad pa rgya chen po//sna tshogs mthu yis 'dul mdzad de//dag pa'i 'gro ba 'thun byas sku//gser 'od mtshan dang dpe byad
147b2(rgyud): ldan//go byed theg pa bla na med//zab mo gsang sngags ji bzhin par//rgyal ba bde gshegs phyag rgya'i sku//rab sprul dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa'i//la las byang sems rgya chen
147b3(rgyud): mchog/la lar lam ldi drug par sbyong //la la re pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs/la lar 'bras bu'i don la sbyor/la la ra dga' ldan lha yul 'phags//lhums su zhugs dang
147b4(rgyud): blta ma dar dang //'jig rten spyod 'thun rol rtsed sogs//gzhan gyi skur spangs bya ba bsnams//btsas kA'i can gyi bas ma 'phrul pa//'thun 'jug thabs kyi bye bye mchog/
147b5(rgyud): dka' thub mdzad dang dga' ba spyod//rdo rje gdan la yang sangs rgyas//bdud 'dul mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas shing //rtse gcig ting 'dzin bskul nas bzhugs//cho 'phrul mdzad
147b6(rgyud): pakun 'dul zhing //chos kyi 'khor lo rims bzhin bskor//mya ngan 'da'i tshul ring srel ston//zhi tshogs khro bor 'khyil ba dang //rang byung dud 'gro'i gzugs sna tshogs//
147b7(rgyud): snod kyi 'jig rten kun mthu sku//tshangs pa khyab 'jug 'jig rten skyong //bdud dang srin po gzugs sogs kyis//'gro ba'i las rtog dag mdzod cing //rang gi ye shes don bkod
148a1(rgyud): bya//de tshe 'gro ba'i gnas mtshan chags//las kyi stobs tshogs mthus brdabs rnams//de bzhin nyid mthus tshogs chen pos//yang dag la pa las rang grol zhing //
148a2(rgyud): nga rgyal chen po'i dregs tshogs skyes//rang gi mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ston//nyon mongs las kyi lam la zhe na//rang gi rigs tshogs bsdu bar byed//'jig rten gsum 'jig a la
148a3(rgyud): la/khams gsum gtso bo bdag cag rnams//su zhag sprul pa a la la//'jigs par mdzad pa'i 'os ma lags//rang gi bka' thub bde gnas pas//mya ngan 'das pa'i
148a4(rgyud): lam mchog ste//gzhan gyi bstan pa ci zhig bya//bde tshogs 'jigs pa'i yan lag go/su zhig rang gi bde spong zhing //gzhan nas sdug bsngal don gnyer bya//gzugs
148a5(rgyud): mang sprul pa bsam yas kyang //rang gi sku mdzesau bsgyur ba bka'//sgra mang sprul pa bsam yas pas//rang gi gsung nyan 'pho byed dam//sems rtog bya ba'i 'od bcas kyis//
148a6(rgyud): ting 'dzin rtse gcig 'gyur ba med//drag po'i stobs mchog gzi ldan rnams//rang gis rang spyod bde bar sdod//de nas ba dud dpung dang po dang //dbang phyog tshangs pa khyab 'jug
148a7(rgyud): che//rgya byed glu dang degs byed rnams//rab tu khros te rang gi mthus//ston zhing drag po'i gsang sngogs dang //gtum tshig nga re 'bod sgrogs byed//de tshe rgyal po'i byin brlabs/
148b1(rgyud): mthus//mdun 'jug thabs kyis 'dul mdzad de//theg pa gsang ba bla med mchog/khyad par sgo gsung gsang byed cing //yang dag ngan la bde bkod phyir//thugs rje chen pos 'thun mdzad de//'jug/
148b2(rgyud): pa'i lam ring bde bstan zhing //dga' ba'i sgo nas bde mdzad kyang //rang gi nyon mongs dregs pa'i mthus//don 'jug 'thun pa'i spyod sgo 'jig/gti mug chen po mun gtibs nas//nga rgyal
148b3(rgyud): ri bo kun du bkod//zhe sdang me lce 'bar sreg shing //phra dog srung gis bskyod byas nas//'dod tshegs chu bos 'byin par 'gyur//dregs pa'i mthu yis rab khros te//chags
148b4(rgyud): rnams gcig la gcig bsgo zhing //gsang sngags rdzu 'phrul stobs phyong nas//rab tu bsgrags pa'i mthu yis ni//'jig rten gsum dag 'khrug par byed//mi nad mu ge 'khrug
148b5(rgyud): pa dang //mtshon cha lo tog 'bras bu 'phrog/'byung ba'i 'jogs gzugs nyes tshogs rnams//rgyun mi 'chang du 'khor bar 'byung //sa gzhi mi 'bar chu ba dog byed//dug dang dbyig
148b6(rgyud): dug rlung bzhin g.yos//bde lam mtho ris phar lam gcod//mi dag sems kyis non 'gyur zhing //'gro rnams sdug bsngal bskyed byas pas//sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs
148b7(rgyud): khral bskyed//de nas byang chub sems bcas pa'i//'khor rnams dus gcig bstan pa bzhengs/gtso bo'i phyogasu 'dud byed cing //lan grangs bskor zhing phrag kyang 'tshal//
149a1(rgyud): /mgon po bde ba mnyes byed rnying //mchod nas gsal ba gdab par bya//thugs rje tsho mnga' lha yi lnga//byams sogs dga' ba'i bdud rtsi chus//gdas bcas thal bar/
149a2(rgyud): brlag mdzad pas//thim 'gyur rdo rje ye shes tshogs//cho 'phrul dkyil 'khor bstan du gsol//mdzad pa'i byin brlabs bstan du gsol//de de gnyen mongs rlabs 'khrugs pas//
149a3(rgyud): rang bzhin thar lam bde bar 'joms//byang chub sems nyid rlon bral lam//srid gsum yal bar dor byed no//thugs rje chen po gang la gdags//e ma ho 'bras bu mya ngan 'das//
149a4(rgyud): e ba he byud sems pad ma'i brjis//e mcho brjod bral k+Shas te//e ma ho ma tog 'bras bcas shing //'du ga dkyi wA 'khyor nam dag pas//rigs mchog ma tshan nyid yin
149a5(rgyud): tan gnaso//dus 'dir dge ba ga la mdzad//thugs rje chen po ga la sna dgas//'di dag la ldan gsung ba'i snod//de ji theg pa'i bstan pa 'dzin//du ltar nam rten rdzobs nan/
149a6(rgyud): thabs kyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur bas//shubs kyis bsgral bar bya ba'i byed//dkyil 'khor sna tshogs basbyin du gsol//zhes gsol to//de bzhin gshegs pa thams
149a7(rgyud): cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol po'i rgyud chen po las mdzad pa chen po'i le'u spyi bcu pa'o///de nas bcom

151a5(rgyud): gshin rjel shAng po che//mthing nagra becon rtse gsum 'breng //lci sgor stobs chen ser skya'i dngas//rdo rje zhags pa rin chen phreng //nub sgor rta mchog 'jigs byed rgyal//thod sbrul dril bu lu gu rlung

151b1(rgyud): pa/dzaM badz+ra kr-i ti shwa ri tr-I pradz+nyA ta kr-id paT/hU~M ra na kr-i ti shwa rI/hU~M phaT mna? ta kr-ing+ge phaT//bau pad ma kr-i ti shA ri hU~M big nan ta krid//hau karma kr-i ti shwA ra hUM phaT swAhA//phyi nang mod par dkyil 'khor chen po t+ta/
151b2(rgyud): rje ye shes tshe las sprul/phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas btab cing //dbu li rigs kyi bdag pos brgyan//'od dpung sprul pa'i lha 'khor gyis//'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing //tshangs pa la sogs lha
151b3(rgyud): chen brgyad rnams 'gugs//rdo rje brjid gnon sngags kyi mthus//de dag dran pa med par 'gyur//mtshon cha'i tshigs kyi sgrol byas te//dugasum phung po gsol bar mdzad//'phrin las khro bo brjid glu
151b4(rgyud): yis//lha chen 'khor rnams dbang du bsdud//dkyil 'khor chen por gzhag byas nas//sgyu ma'i sha rus gnas nas ston//rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting 'dzin gyis//lha chen rnams kyis slar lus
151b5(rgyud): gsol//'khor bcas pa yi dbang bsku zhing //rdo rje 'chang gi gral la dgod//dam tshig gsang ba'i brdas bsgos shing //phrin las bka' nyan gnyer gtad//gzhal yas khang gi brgyan du gzhag/kun
151b6(rgyud): kyang tshig dbyangs mthun pa sgros//dmi tshig mna' srog thal myong 'gyur//zhes brjod//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las
151b7(rgyud): rdo rje bkod po'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o////de nas pad+mo chags pa'i skus//gsung gi gzi mdangs rgyas mdzad//phyag rgya rdzu 'phrul gnas sbyor bas//gser mig 'dab
152a1(rgyud): bzangs grong khyer dang //lang ka'i gnas tshogs srin po'i ste//klu rgyal dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir//rdzu 'phrul kun stobs 'khor lho yis//lha chen lnga sogs gdul bar dgongs//ting
152a2(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te//pad+mo rta mchog sprul pa mdzad//de bzhin nyid dbyings snyoms 'jug yis//sems dpe' rgyal po kun gyi yab//rdo rje 'dzin thub dbang nyid dang //rigs nyid sprul pa'i lung lnga/
152a3(rgyud): grub//sku mdog dmar por ga'i mdog/zhal gsum rta mgo ljang khu can//phyag ni gri gug khA tAM kha//thod pa khrag me dpung sbrul lnga//gnas brgyad klu bdag thod phreng dang //glang che ni stag gi lpags/
152a4(rgyud): bi gyon/sgra skad drag po phyogs bcur sgrob/bgegs la sogs pa'i cha lugs can//drang srong khros pa'i cha lugs kyis//kle si 'gro ba rmongs mdzad pa//pad+ma'i gdan la brkyang bsnam gyis//
152a5(rgyud): yum chen dpal ldan ma dang sbyor//oM pad mo gu ru h+ye he ru lu hUM phaT//'khor lo 'bar ba phyogs mtshamasu//ye shes khro bo chen po brgyad//hri las grub pa'i 'jigs gzugs can//rta mgo ljang //
152a6(rgyud): khru brjid pa'i//shar du pad+ma'i dbang phyug ni//dkar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'o//rdo rje pad+ma klu zhag dang /rin chen dbyug pa ral gri mdung //seng+ge rgyal mo sku dang 'khril//sna tshogs mi
152a7(rgyud): mthun zhabs kyis gnon//nyi ma zla ba'i spyan chas brgyan//sbrul gyi phreng bas gnas kun brgyan//lho ru gzi chen drag po ni//mdog nag ral gri rtse gsum lnga//rdo rje rtse gsum mda' dang
152b1(rgyud): bzhu//drag po gnas kyi /dang mkhrel//mi re 'bar bas snyun du khyab//stag mo bcings pas gzhan gnas 'jig/sprul pa'i pho nya me 'brug/khro bo yin dkyil 'khor tshogs//nub du rdo rje dra ba mchog/dang/
152b2(rgyud): ser rdo rje dbyug pa bri//'khor lo sbrul zhags me long chu//lha mo 'jigs chen zhabs kyis gnon//'od 'bang glog gi phreng ba can//sbrel ba'i pho nya lce spyang gdong //'bum phrag dri dang thod khrag 'dzin//d+ya /
152b3(rgyud): du 'od byed 'jigs chen sku//ljang khu rtse gsum mda' bo che//nor bdud khrag lcug ma dung khrag 'chang //ra ro mig dam re zil gyis gnon//rgyal bdag kho bo'i sku dang 'khrol//cod pan klu mgo gdengs
152b4(rgyud): ka'i rgyan//dus mtshungs phud kyi sgra chen sgrogs//kun kyang thod ping ge yeng gzhi dang //dur khrod gnas 'byung tsang me byed//'tshams kyi khro bo chen po bzhi//rigs kyi phyed gzugs thig les
152b5(rgyud): mtshan//zhal gsume phyag drug 'di mdangs can//rdo rje thod dbyuge klu yi sgra//lce sbyang bya khyud gnam lcags sbyin//'od phreng thig le dbyug gu'i rgyan//rnam 'phrul klu thabs u ta ra//'dod yon
152b6(rgyud): lha mo'i tshogs kyis bskor//kun tu spyan mar rdo rje'i mtshan//gni su 'jigs pa'i hU~M sgra sgrog/klu yi rgyal po gnas na bzhugs/gzhan gyi rdzu 'phrul 'joms par byed//oM ma hA ha ya gri ba
152b7(rgyud): pad+ma d+ha ru naM bi d+ha ha rahUM phaT/rtsa ba'i sngagaso//oM na mo ad ti te ru lu ru ki ba mu kha//oM kir sha ya rak+Sha na gaM gu ru hUM phaT//snying po'i sngags//oM pad+ma raka ma ku r+ya ra gai ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/
153a1(rgyud): nye ba'i snying po'o//dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyogs bzhi ru//lcags kyu lcags sgrog zhugs pa dril bu rnams//dkar dmar ser ldeng 'od madrangs 'bar//seng+ge lce spyang stag
153a2(rgyud): 'brug dang //mgo brtsegs sprul pa'i 'khor dang bcas//rang gi las kyis 'khod pa dang //'jigs pa'i cha lugs rngam gzugs gnas//las mdzod klu yi dkyil 'khor 'dul//klu chen
153a3(rgyud): brgyad sogs bsdus byas na//mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par bya//rang gi dam tshig dran pa'i shugs//spyan rnams spyan ngar 'dod par byed//oM na ga drings meg na na gA ra tsa ya sa ma ya hUM//dkyil
153a4(rgyud): 'khor gsang bar dbang bskur nas//'od bzangs gzi mdangs me dpung 'bar//rigs kyi dbu rgyan gsol byed phye//ye shes 'od tshogs gnas bcas te//dkyil 'khor gsang bar go m+ba zhu
153a5(rgyud): kyis//tshul 'dzin dkon me chog mngon du dbye//tshogs rnams ma lus 'grin gcig tu//gar dbang sku la skyabs gsol zhing //'dod yon gsol 'debs dam bcas pa//bsod nams
153a6(rgyud): phung po'i gter la spyod//kye ma dkyil 'khor ya mtshan che//bdag cag 'khor rnams rab sgrol mdzad//rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor dpe bral bas//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du gnas/
153a7(rgyud): bde chen lam 'di sngon ma rtogs//de ltar thugs rje drin gyis rnyed//rnal 'byor gsang bar 'dzin byed kyi//ji ltar bsgom pa'i bka' bzhin bgyid//rdo rje gsang ba'i dam 'di las//gal te
153b1(rgyud): mtshan nyana.am bcaca sas mamacam sama.a.a mamacan thas ma camathamamamamatham tham la thamamacam ma yamasam can ya bathamam than yam kas khams pam thamams ma ya gang la
153b2(rgyud): nyams na 'das par shog/ces dam bcas//de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las rta 'gron dbang gis dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i le'u//
153b3(rgyud): ste bcu gnyis pa'o//de nas bcom ldan pad+ma'i skus//yul la phyags tshul 'dzum mdangs kyis//bka' yis bsgo bas dgyes mdzad//mi shigs ting 'dzin la gnas mdzod/phyog/
153b4(rgyud): skyod dri za rgyal chen po//rang gi chung ma tshogs bcas pas//gnas gzhan 'jig par mdzad pa dang //rang gi mthus bcus 'dul bar mdzad//sku ni bai dUr 'tsher ba'i mdangs//zhal gsum phyag rgya
153b5(rgyud): drug gis rel//rin chen mdzod bum sngags chen lcug/'khor lo phreng ba ma ga ta//rgyan dang chu lugs rin chen tshogs//dbyings kyi dbang phyug yum chen mo//dmar skya zab mo'i tshul du sbyor//'od
153b6(rgyud): 'phro sems dpa'i bdug pa'i 'phro//rigs lnga'i da bu brgyan rin chen phreng //phyag rgya bzhi yis brjid pa'i lha//rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yus khang //gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs brgyan//bar
153b7(rgyud): 'khyams 'khor gyi dbus nas 'gying //pad+ma'i lte bar skyil krung bzhugs//shar du 'joms byed rdo rje'i sku//dkar gsal rdo rje dril bu 'dzin//lho ru rin chen blo gros sku//dpal be'u gdugs
153b8(rgyud): mdzes 'od mang ser//nub kyi phyogs kyi rgyal pi rtag/dkar dmar pad+ma glegs bam 'dzin//byang du 'jig rten kun sgrol ba/ljang skya rdo rje rgya gram bri//shar lho dra ba'i dbang phyug ni//ser skya ran chen
154a1(rgyud): @'bring ka ra//lho nub chos kyi lhun po mchog/rtse gsum pad+ma'i lcug ma 'dzin//nub byang rgyal ba'i ye shes tog/sngo sku seng ge'i bum pa 'dzin//byang shar rgyu 'phrul du
154a2(rgyud): ba brtsegs//ljang ser geyung drung rdo rje mtshan//'di dag 'khor lo bsgyur rgyal byin//mtshan dang dpe byad 'od mdangs rgyan//skyes bu chen po'i long spyod 'phel//cha 'thun yum dang 'khril
154a3(rgyud): par bzhugs//oM bi ta dz+nyA na tA na saM bo ga ta hUM phaT/oM d+harma mu ni nu saM na so hUM/oM bi he ra phra mo tha na hUM phaT//oM dz+wA lo tra saM bo ga ya hUM phaT/oM rado na ma rudwa te sa grum hU~M phaT//oM ma
154a4(rgyud): hA shu ti mu sa mo ha hUM phaT/oM bud d+ha bud d+ha sar+ya na ku ma ra hU~M phaT/oM na ma ga gi nA si ta yo ge hUM phaT/oM ni sa hA he he hu mu ga ra ba ra hUM phaT/'khor lo'i gsang sngags rab brjod pas/
154a5(rgyud): lce rnams phyi yi gnasu sgo//drag po'i rgyu 'bras spong byas te//gnas kun dag pa'i ye shes che//rigs mchog ye shes 'od gsal bas//shar gyi dbang po dri za sogs//gnas mgo
154a6(rgyud): skyabs dang dbang du mdzad//nyon mongs lus kyis dregs pa'i tshogs//rang rgyu zhi nas byang sems bcas//bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod//snying po mdongs gsol phul bar
154a7(rgyud): 'gyur//oM trag sha ka sarba ma ma sa hUM hUM swA hA//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig pa 'di byin gyis brlab du gsol/bstan pa myur du spel cig/rgya chad pa'i sngags kyis thams
154b1(rgyud): cad bsrung bar gyur pa bde legasu bya ba'i gnas pa bdag cag dus tha~Md dkyil 'khor 'dir gnas shing de 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag bsrung bar bya ba dang /bran bzhin du gnas par bgyi'o//slar
154b2(rgyud): yang bdag cag rnams mgon pos bzhengs la byin gyis brlabs te dbang bslar ba dang grol bar mdzadadu gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis rig pa'i snying po 'di
154b3(rgyud): byin gyis brla so//oM u e mr-i ta big nA shu ta hU~M phaT swA hA//zhes gsungs pa dang /de dag deng po'i sang+yas bzhin du 'od zer dang bcas par gyur nas gzhal yas khang gi rgyun du 'khod//de bzhin
154b4(rgyud): gshegs pa tha~Md kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gas nga ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las thugs ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor 'phrul pa'i le'u ste bcu gsuM pa'o///
154b5(rgyud): de nas bde byed gar dbang phyug/pad+ma tshogs pa'i sku chen pos//yon tan rin chen sgyu ma'i chos//ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas//mkha' 'gro tshogs bcas go shin rje rnams//rgyal
154b6(rgyud): po rgyal chen rgyal mor gnas//'khos bcas 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir//na mkha' 'gro chen mo'i tshogs 'phrul mdzad//thabs dang shes rab gnyis med las//gzi ldan gar gyi dbang phyug
154b7(rgyud): me/pad+ma ra gi na mkha' mdog/zhal gcig pa la phyag bani ste//pad+ma'i sdong po bdud rtsi'i snod//rdo rje kha Ting zhags pa thogs//rin chen phreng ba'i rgyan gyis klubs//khyed bzhad 'jigs

155a3(rgyud): oM dang sbrul te phyogs dpe 'tshams//pad+ma'i gdan le zhing gis mtshan//brkyang bskum sku mdog sngon mo'i chags//phyag na gri gug thod pa khrag/'bar ba'i cha lugs sgra 'bar ma//phyi rol
155a4(rgyud): sprul pa'i tshogasau bcas pas//dur khrod chen po'i gan su rol//rdo rje rin tshon pade mo dang //las dang sgyu 'phrul mkho' la bzhed//sna tshogs sgyu ma bzhin rgyas spyan//kha dog phyogs
155a5(rgyud): mimatshams ji lta bu//gsal zhing mun pa'i rdul gyis gos//zhing gi dbyug pa rtse gsum dang //gser gyi mda' dang rdo rje dang //chu srin rgyal mtshan zhugs pa dang /zhing chen rdo rje rtse
155a6(rgyud): dgu gdes//gri gug rgyu ma'i zhags pa sdom//rdo rje gdengs pa rtse gsum khrag/zhing chen khog phyes snying 'dren cing //de bzhin rlung yang thod pa 'chang //oM badz+ra tA krid ma hA la ti ti ts+tshadz+dza
155a7(rgyud): phaT//oM badz+ra tA tra mi dA ra hUM phaT//oM TI ki mad kum pa ya hUM phaT/oM DA ki ni ti pre sha hUM phaT/oM badz+ra DA ki bi la sa hUM phaT/oM badz+ra ta kri bI ku Ta ma le hUM phaT/oM badz+ra
155a8(rgyud): ki dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM phaT/phyi rol pad+ma'i 'dab ma las//seng+ge rti dang lce sbyang wa//bye rgod keng ka bya rog 'bru//mgo brnyan mche gshog tshon mo brgyad//hU~M lis sprul te mdog dmar/
155b1(rgyud): bo//phyag nI gi gug thod pa khrag/rdo rje ral gri rtse gsum mdung//'khor lo dgra sta ba tsan mnga'//gtun shing zhing log g.yang gzhi sbrul//ne'u gzhong pa rin chen khyung //zhal gdang
155b2(rgyud): so so'i phyogs mdangs bzhin//kun kyang khro bcas khyams par gnas//zhing lpags g.yang gzhi thod phreng sbrul//khrag zhag thal bya'i tshom bus rgyan//mkhye 'gro rigs bdun ma
155b3(rgyud): srid sprul pa'i tshogs//mcheg shrag 'bar ba phyogs bcur 'khrugs/oM ser b+ha ra na hUM phaT//oM ni re te sha pa mu kha hUM phaT/oM kaM na ma du na hUM phaT/oM mu ku ra na ni hU~M phaT/
155b4(rgyud): oM suM r+yes mo ka hUM phaT/oM badz+ra sdig sha bruM hUM phaT/oM ni sha kur+ya ran hUM phaT/oM re l-i su bag sha hUM phaT//mkha' gro bcu drug 'di dag kyang //'di 'bar glog gi phreng ba can//'od
155b5(rgyud): kyis ru lu'i sgra 'byin cing //sbyar mur khro gnyer mche ba can//zhal gnyis phyag bzhi rol pa'i stabs//dbyings dang shes rab rab rtogs la//so'i phrin las mdzad pa'i phyag/zhal dang sku
155b6(rgyud): /ni so so'i mdog/oM ru khu saM ti gu na De ta sa mo ra ga hUM phaT//snying po'i sngagaso//oM badz+ra DA ki dz+r-i la shaM bau ra ku ma ra hUM phaT//nye ba'o//oM DA ki hU~M sa ma pa ra dza li mu kha~M ma me hUM phaT//N+ye bI/
155b7(rgyud): sngagaso//mkha 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor spro ba'i mthus//de dag dran pa med par brgyal//slar nyid rang gi 'khor du bsdus//dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen por bkod//de nas mkha'agro'i
156a1(rgyud): tshogs dang bcas//gdul bya rnams kyi gnas dor nas//rgyal ba'i bstan pa bzung byed cing //rdo rje theg pa sbyor bar mdzad//de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi dgongs pa bla na
156a2(rgyud): med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las mkha'agro ma sprul pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o////de nas bcom ldan dgyes pa'i gtso//gar gyi dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs//gzi
156a3(rgyud): ldan yum dang zhal sbyor zhing //phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'o//ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas//phyogs kyi bgegs 'dul byed pa'o//khams gsum gnon pa'i dkyil 'khor

156a5(rgyud): dang //dmar serari nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin//bgegs la sogs pa'i tshul dang ldan//pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo dri//thod pa rin chen dgra sta ras//yum chen dbang phyug sgeg mo dang //rgyan tshogs rin

156b1(rgyud): dr-it+ta hU~M phaT/oM pad+ma s+yAt+ta hU~M phaT/oM karma srad+d+ha hUM phaT//'khor lo pad+ma'i rtse mo la//yum dang 'khrilnga ba'i tshul gyis 'khod//phyi rol pad+ma'i rigs bdun la//bde gshegs yab yum nyis stong tshogs//

156b4(rgyud): bar mdzad//dang po rang rtags phyag rgya bsnams//oM badz+ra du kI paM sha ka dra kuM di ki maM hri saM ga tA smr-i swa mo ta phaT swA hA/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi'o//oM badz+ra sa mau yo ga hI sa ra lA su hUM
156b5(rgyud): /phaT/rin po chu rnams kyi'o//oM pad+ma bu mi si nyi hi he he mo bai hU~M phaT/pad+ma'i rigs rnams kyi'o//oM karma b+h+yo tri hU~M rakI mur+ya sa hUM phaT/las kyi rigs kyi'o//oM badz+ra tsakra bruM si ti yo gi shwa ri hUM phaT/

156b7(rgyud): dgra 'gugs shing //so so'i rigs dbyer 'khrug pa dag/rdo rje gsang ba'i sngags kyis gzer//rang gi dam tshig rje su dran//srogi snying po dbul bar bya//rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gis//dbang
157a1(rgyud): bskur byin brlabs rdzogs byas nas//dkyil 'khor gsang bu'i glan su 'khod//gsang ba 'dzin pa'i gnas 'dor gnas//rlung gi lus gnas byas te//gzhal yas khang
157a2(rgyud): gi brgyan du gzhag/de dag gi snying po ni// sa mu dar dzI na na ga su t+yA b+ha ba si tri s+t+ri shaM hUM bruM phaT zhes pa'o//bslar gasngo bA'i sngags ni/oM su mu gai De si nya go he he ru tu pa la si taM dza hUM
157a3(rgyud): phaT/lha rnams kyi snying po bsdus pa ni//oM sarba sa ka ra bruM bag sha saM mo praM mu rik+She hU~M zhes pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol bI rgyud waM/

157a5(rgyud): bar mdzad//gzhal yas gru gsum mthing nag la//dbusu 'khor lo nyi ma'i gdan//dpal chen pad+ma he ru ka/dur khrod chen po'i rkyen gyis brjid//zhol gsum pa la phyag drug ste//sku
157a6(rgyud): mdog pad+ma rA ga'i mdangs//rtse gsum gtun shing ral gri dang //pad+ma zhags pa thod lnga 'dzin//glang tshon kau ba thod rloni sbrul//yum dang zhal sbyor 'khril pa'i tshul//thabs dang shes rab sbyor
157a7(rgyud): ba las//yi ge las sbrul khro bo'i rgyan//shar du rnam rgyal mdog dkar sngo//zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje dung //'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang //ral gri me 'od kyis mtshan pa//lho ru gshin
157b1(rgyud): rdzog shed po ni//sngo nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa//thod dbyug rin+da tshan ne'u le dang //rtsegasu mo dpung thod lnga 'dzin//nub du rta mchog khro bo'i sku//zhal gsum phyag drug dmar skya'i mdog//'khor lo'i ba
