157b6(rgyud): stabs//oM badz+ra kro ta thi dza yo hU~M phaT/oM badz+ra kro ta ya ma na ta kA hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kro ta ha yi 'gri ba hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kro ta a mri ta kun DA li hU~M phaT/oM badz+ra kro ta ni la tran tra hUM phaT/oM/
157b7(rgyud): badz+ra kre ta ar+ya a tsa la hUM phaT/oM badz+ra ko ta ka ra tsa hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kro ta ma hA pa la hU~M phaT/phyogs skyong gi rgyal po gnod sbyin dang //grul dum tshogs rnams dbang bsdus te//gsang
158a1(rgyud): sngags drag pos bsgral byas na//slar gsal ye shes lhumasu gyur//dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i dbang bskur zhing //dam tshig la gzhon dkyil 'khor tshul//kun gyi sros
158a2(rgyud): snying phul ba ni//dam tshig chen pos byin brlabs mdzad//slar yang dam tshig 'dzin pa'i sngags//'khor rnams kun la sbyin par mdzad//oM badz+ra kra ka ra murdasi ni ba mu kaM hUM phaT//oM
158a3(rgyud): /hUM/badz+ra su ka ta b+ha mo traM a la la hUM phaT//lha rnams kun gyi dam tshig ni//rdo rje gsang ba gsum las byung //rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po sku//khams gsum dus kyi dbang bskur nas//'khor ba'i/
158a4(rgyud): chos las rgyal byed cing //byang chub sems kyis de nyid gsal//de bzhin gash+ye ba thas cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsong ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las khro bo phrin las rol pa'i
158a5(rgyud): le'u ste bcu drug pa'o////de nas bcom ldan gar dbang skus//gzi brjid dgod pa'i brgyan bkod cing //lha min grong khyer 'dul ba'i phyir//yum gyis kyil 'khor sprul par mdzad/
158a6(rgyud): chos dbyings sprul pa'i gnas gzang mchog/rgyal po'i rang bzhin rin chen spros//gru bzhi khang pa sgo dang bcas//rta babs ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes//dbus kyi pad+ma'i gdan bzhugs pa//
158a7(rgyud): gnyis mid rol pa'i yum gyi sku//mdog dmar rgyan du zangs chen gzugs//zhal ga rig phyag bzhi mdzes pa'i mdangs//'khor lo dung khrag pad+mo dang //rin chen 'bar ba rtse dgu 'dzin//
158b1(rgyud): rin chen pad+ma'i phreng ba can/stod bzangs na bza' dkyil bzungs bzhugs//oM pad+ma mu sha ra swa ma kra tA hU~M phaT/shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams//pad+ma dbyings phyag gasngal ba mo//rin chen
158b2(rgyud): /da dang lce mau /rje rnam pa ba dang //ni ky-i ni rdzu/dru ga kyis ma ng+gA 'i nam+b+hi 'i ngan /
158b3(rgyud): oM tsu ni sde shwa ri hU~M phaT/oMSh+NI sha badz+ri si b+h+r-i ga hUM phaT/oM byaM tsu sra te hU~M phaT//mtshams kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la//de bzhin bde ba bskyed byed yum chen bzhi/dri ba mo dang klog 'gyur rgyan//
158b4(rgyud): gshog pa can dang 'dod pa'o//dkur ser dwa mar skya stau sangs dang //ljang khu mdog legs la bzhugs nas//rdo rje rin pad+mo dang //u pal ljang khru legs mdzad pa'o//oM nu ta su no tsak+Shu hUM phaT/
158b5(rgyud): oM sa po ga ta su he bya hUM phaT/oM ma ma kri bruM hiM hi hrI phaT/oM ta re ge ga nA a ma la hUM phaT/phyogs rnams kun tu mkha'i khyab pa//til gang bzhin du gnas gyur pa//ma mo gshin rje'i tshogs
158b6(rgyud): rnams kun//'khrug rnga mo rod rod por gyur nas//thugs rje can la skyabasu mchi//srog gi snying po dbul bar byed//de nas dkyil 'khor bsdus byas te//rang gi gnas dbang bskur zhing //dam tshig
158b7(rgyud): dga' ba'i sdom pa rnyed//bde gshegs ye shes gsal bar 'gyur//kun gyis 'thun par khas blangs te//dam tshig bsrung zhing rnal 'byor skyong //oM ma ma rag ta sa pre taM i des bute phaT/
159a1(rgyud): #/oM drag shar la si bA n+na ta phaT//ma mo dang 'byung po rnams kyi snying po'o//oM mA yu ma si d+ha ru lu ru lu trU~M Ta//gnad sbyin rnams kyir//oM A ts+tsha yo ga bI nu rma/
159a2(rgyud): ha s+ya ha sa/ru su ru lu hU~M phaT//slar gso zhing byin gyis brlab pa'i sdad so//de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi dgongs pa bla na mang po'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las rin cheni bying
159a3(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor 'phrul pa'i le'u ste/bcu bdun pa'o////de nas gar gyi dbang phyug nyid//dus gsum spangs rgyas thams cad kyi//sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor la yis//sa 'ogs zla
159a4(rgyud): sastangs rnams//'joms byed gza' dang rgyu skar dang //bdud dang de yi rigs 'khor kun//'du bar bya ba'i ting 'dzin la//snyoms zhugs 'khor lo sprul pa mdzad//thabs dang shes
159a5(rgyud): bsgrub byas pa'i//'od zer gsal bas stong gsum yang //rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khung //sgo bzhi rta babs phreng bas brgyan//'khor la ri mi gsum gdan dang bcas//rdo rje
159a6(rgyud): pad+ma r-in chen gyis//khor yug seng+ge glang chen mchog/nyi mas mdzes pa'i pad+mo yi//dbus kyi dpa' bo yum dang bcas//zhal gcig phyag bzhi rdo rje rin//pad+ma ral gri 'dzin par
159a7(rgyud): mdzad//dmar ser kun tu rgyu ba ni//ljang ser pad+ma dril bus 'khyur//mtshan dang dpe byad rgyan phreng klubs//sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i dbu rgyan can//phyag rgya bzhi yis mdzes byas
159b1(rgyud): ma.a ya khams sa masa.amacan thas #sa# yam #@ya sa
159b2(rgyud): pa'o//rdo rje 'khor lo brtsibs rnams la//rigs kyi sems dpa' nyi shu bzhi//dkar dang dmar dang ser da'i mdangs//rdo rje dril bu pad+ma bsgom//'khor lo rin chen sde ma bsnams//drang po'i byar
159b3(rgyud): gnyis mtshan byas shing //lhag ma gri gug thod pa thogs//khra zhing sems dpa'i cha lugs kyis//rgyan phreng rigs kyi dbang po /sum//rin tshan 'bar ba'i brgyan gyis klubs oM badz+ra swa
159b4(rgyud): ta kro ta he ru lu hUM phaT//rdo rje rigs rnams kyi'o//pad+ma te sh+ma s+the da na ma ku ru ku ru hUM phaT/pad+ma rigs kyi sems dpa' rnams kyi'o//oM i ku ri tsa/sa na d+ha si d+ha phaT phaT/kro tI shwa ra hAM/
159b5(rgyud): phaT//de bzhin gshegs pa rigs kyi'o//sgo bzhi mdzes gzugs khro mo ni//'thun pa'i blo gres dpa' chen mo//ye shes mkha' dbyings bzhi rnam+ba te/kha do gang ma dang dri po bzhin//rdo lcagri/
159b6(rgyud): kyu zhag pa dang //lcags sgrog dril bu mtshan ma'i phyag/oM badz+ra aM gu shra dza a sha hUM/s+pho tA bau/g+han d+he hU~M phaT//dgug gzhugs btsong ba'i las dag dang /las dbab pi'i cho ga mnyes par/
159b7(rgyud): byed//dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kun//sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dus//rigs gsum sems dpa' khro bor bstan//'jigs byed cha lugs rngam pa'i stag/rdo rje bcod
159b8(rgyud): byed 'jigs pa che//rdo rje 'joms pa'i yid 'phrog byed//rdo rje rab bzang blo gros mchog/rdo rje'i bstan pa g.yul las rgyal//pad+ma'i sprin chen 'brug sgra'i dbyangs//pad+ma'i blo gsal
160a1(rgyud): mya ngan 'joms//pad+ma'i sdong po nga ro myos//pad+ma'i 'od zer bdud rtsi 'od//'khor bya brtsegs pa myur du bzlog//'khor lo dga' ba sbrang rtsi'i mchog/'khro ba sgrol dang /
160a2(rgyud): rtsa gsum 'ching //'khor lo rol pa dga' byed stobs//'di dag sprul pa 'khor tshogs skus//gnas gsum po dag 'dul bar mdzad//de nas gza' dang rgyu skar rnams//gdug pa'i/
160a3(rgyud): nga ro chu ma shums//sgra chen sgrogs shing sprul nas kyang //mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par 'gyur//dkyil 'khor chen po skyabs gsol zhing //bstan pa bzung bar dmi bcaso//de dag so so'i
160a4(rgyud): srog snod dpe//lus sems dad pas phul byas pas//dkyil 'khor chen po dbang bskur zhing //rab gnas gdan la gzhag par bya//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na
160a5(rgyud): med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/rang sangs rgyas thams cad khro bor byung ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o////de nas bcom ldan dbang gi lha//pad+ma bde chen
160a6(rgyud): yum bcas la//'gro drug rgyu 'bras bya ba'i phyir//bde chen byang sems dkyil 'khor sprul//dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas 'bar ba'i//rin chen phreng sogs 'jigs byed rgyad//
160a7(rgyud): dur khrod chen po'i gnas bzhin brgyan//dbus 'khor lo gdan bcas la//rigs lnga'i ho ru ka bzhugs mdzad//yum chen lnga dang 'khril bar sbyor//kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug
160b1(rgyud): pa//dmar nag dkar ser ljang bu'i mdangs//rdo rje kha Ti ral gri dang //tri shul zhing dbyug thob bsnams//g.yas par dung phor groyan thong khrag/bar mya gri gug pad+ma ste//tha ma yum dang 'dri
160b2(rgyud): pa'i tshul//spyan dgu sdang mi ga dmang po stong khro gnyer rel pa gyen du mdzes//bod sbrul khrag dang thul bas rgyan//g.yang gzhi ri sha'i rgyun gyis mdzes//oM badz+ra shI he ru kaM badz+ra kro ti shwa ri hUM phaT
160b3(rgyud): oM but+pa shrI he ru kaM b+hut+te kro ti shri ra hUM phaT/oM rad na shI he ru ka hUM phaT/rad ni kro ta shwa ri hU~M phaT/pad+ma shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/oM pad+ma ma kro tI shwa ri hUM phaT/oM karma shrI he ru kaM hUM phaT/
160b4(rgyud): kArma kr-i ti shwa ri hU~M phaT/bde chen byang chub sems kyi rgyun//ril pa kun tu khyab mdzad de//khams gsum ma 'dres rnam par dbyings//bde ba chen po gnyis med 'gyur//dbang bskur
160b5(rgyud): byin brlabs rigs kyis bskur//bskyed de dbul rang gi bdag pos rgyun//skyon 'jug g.yo ldang bskyod pa yi//lha mo bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgang//
160b6(rgyud): bo bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol ba'i rgyud lus bde ba chen po'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa nyid la bzhag ste bzhug so//
160b7(rgyud): de'i tshe de'i dus na bdud kyi brgyal po ma tra ru tras//ring gi rdzu 'phrul chen po snyan zhing /'khor dang bcas pas phyogs bcu rgyug cing rig pa 'dzin pa dang /rnal 'byor mtha' dag gi bar
161a1(rgyud): tir 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/rigs kyi 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i stong gsum gyi 'jig rten thams cad skad gcig gis gsal bar mdzadado//rgyal po'i dbang po stong
161a2(rgyud): gsum 'dir khang bzangs mdzes par byin brlabs te/rin chen ka ba gdon phreng dang //gzugs mdzes la stsogs kun gyis spras//nyi ma zla ba rin chen khri//pad+ma sing+ge la sogs mnan
161a3(rgyud): sgro bzangs khyam su bcas pa yis//rna mo dag gzhal yas khangs bzungs sprul//de nas bcom ldan pade chen pos//dang ldan gar gyi dbang phyug skus//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rigs
161a4(rgyud): tshogs rnamaso//dga' ba'i sprin gyis bskul bar mdzad/bde ba chen po gnyis med mthus//rigs kyi dkyil 'khor cig tu gyur//yongs rdzogs gsal ba rgya chen pos//dkyil 'khor
161a5(rgyud): rgya chen sprul par mdzad//dbusu pad+ma'i rigs rgyal po//gtso bo pad ma rdo rje'i mdangs//zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs byed sku//rdo rje dga' ba'i spyan 'dril zhing //shar la sogs
161a6(rgyud): pa'i phyogs kun du//bde gshegs rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog/rnam snang rin chen don grub rnams//rin chen phyogs kyi tshon mdangs gsal//rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang //ral gri pad+ma sa
161b1(rgyud): tshogs dang //gtso bo pad+ma'i drug mtshan can//stong pa'i sgra snyan dril bu g.yon//sangs rgyas spyan 'dzos ma ma kau/dkar myo mchog sgrol ma dag/mdog bzangs phyag mtshan gca ba bzhi//sang+yas/
161b2(rgyud): ting 'dzin rdzu 'phrul stobs//thabs dang shes rab nyis stong tshigs//'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mo la//rang gi mtshan ma so'i tshul//dmar mdangs dkar dang ser gyi mdog/nI la ka ta'i mdog
161b3(rgyud): 'tshar zhing //pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo rin//pad+ma ti shul bcas pa 'dzin//g.yas na 'khor lo go rims bzhin//rdo rje skyil kAng lags brgyan brjid//gzhan yang khro bo'i tshogs 'bar ba//
161b4(rgyud): phyi rol 'khor lo'i bar khyams dang //sgo la sogs pa'i 'jigs gzugs kyis//rngam pa'i mdangs bcas 'khod pa ni//khro tshigs yang sprul mtshon cha dang /rigs kyi sprul pa'i don
161b5(rgyud): byed pa'i//khams gsum 'jigs byed khro bo dang //mkha' 'gro'i dag pa'i tshogs bcas rnams//dur khrod rgyan gyis rab mdzes shing //rigs kyi kha dog mtshon cha dang //'od zer 'phro ba
161b6(rgyud): 'khregs pa'i tshul//gsang sngags drag po brjod mdzad pa'o//de ltar dkyil 'khor zhi yi tshogs//skad gcig gsal bar rdzogs byas nas//phyi yi gnasu spro zhing byas//gsang sngags
161b7(rgyud): rgyun gyi skal bar byed//hUM a la la ho//ma hA pad+ma hrid ya/a A oM AHhUM/ma hA pad+ma ku ru/ha la ha la b+hi sha na hUM hUM phaT/stong khams sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i gnas//rab 'khrug
162a1(rgyud): drang rgyas rmongs pa dag//bar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyis bder byas shing //rang gi spangs rgyas zhing lu bkod//dkyil 'khor gan su bsdus byas nas//nga gi ladzung
162a2(rgyud): mdzes byas te//dbang bskur byin brlabs rdzogs 'gyur nas//dbul rigs kyi bdag pos brgyan//oM pad+ma kun d+hA li hri da ya nA bi mu ku ru ha na d+hA hi hUM phaTi//gsang sngags kun gyis
162a3(rgyud): brjod byas na//'jig rten gsum po bsdud pa yi//po nye rdo rje ki la ya//drags byed gtso bo dag rangs bya//de nas bcom ldan pade chen skyes//sangs rgyas thaMd bskul ba'i phyir//rdo rjes gol
162a4(rgyud): lam gsum brdab/dam tshig chen po'i sngags chen brjod//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs tshogs rnams//ting 'dzin bsdu ba'i rdo rje las//gcig tu gnas nas 'gro ba gzigs//dgas byed
162a5(rgyud): gtso bo mi rungs rnams//rgyu dang 'bras bu log 'khrul zhing //sangs rgyas bstan pa log mi 'gyur//log pa'i lam la mdo ni zhen cing //mngon pa'i nga rgyal mthus bsgoms nas//'jig rten/
162a6(rgyud): gsum dag dung byed na//zhi bas 'dul bar mi 'gyur na//khro bo'i rol pa mdzad mod kyi//'dul bar gzigs nas bka' dros mdzad//kye ma 'dul ba'i tshogs chen dag/'das pa'i dus
162a7(rgyud): nasngon 'byung ltar//nga lta'i dus 'dir byung ba ste//de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las//log pa'i lam du 'khrul pa ste//khro bo'i tshul du byung gyur pa//de tshe sems can kun shis
162b1(rgyud): /kuklo zhing gtum par 'gyur//de ltar gyur pa'i mtshan nyid kyis//mnar med la sor gan ngan len//mi bzad sdug bsngal mtha' la brten//ji lta bu yi thabs kyis 'dul//shin tu gti mug mdong //
162b2(rgyud): po'i tshogs//de bzhin bag chags ngan pa yis//rig 'dzin bdun rgyud gcod byed cing //bstan pa'i gsung rab 'jig par 'gyur//las kyi mun pas 'gro bar 'khyams//dus ngani rigs ngan 'phra mon/
162b3(rgyud): ma//gnod byed gdon dang log 'dren dang //srid gsum 'jig cing dam tshig 'dul//'di lta bu yi thabs kyis ni//sangs rgyas thugs rje rnam 'phrul bstan//nga rgyal chen po mdongs pa yi//lte ba
162b4(rgyud): ri bo mthu snyes tshogs//da lta'i tshe ni 'di byung 'gyur//rgyal ba 'das dus sbyor byed cing //ji bzhin las la 'khrul par byed//sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mdzod//mngon spyod rol pa'i thabs
162b5(rgyud): chen gyis//'di dag bstan pa'i dus la bab//srid gsum gdug cing gtum po la//zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur ste//shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las//khro bo de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad//khro bo'i
162b6(rgyud): tshul can khros pa yi//'jig rten gsum dge sreg byed na//sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa yis//khams gsum mA lus smos ci dgos//rang bzhin dag pa'i ngo bo las//phrag dog 'khrul pa'i
162b7(rgyud): rlung dag gis//'jig rten phyin ci log tu 'khyams//ji bzhin gnas pa lam bral bas//khams gsum brlag pa'i lam li zhugs//'jig rten 'di dag snying rje zhing //mngon shes gdul da/
163a1(rgyud): rang ma tshogs rnams//khro ba'i tshogs kyis sbyor bar mdzad zhes bsgrag so//de bzhin gshegs pa tham pa cad kyi dgangs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol
163a2(rgyud): pa'i rgyud las/rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor pasgral bya'o le'u ste nyi shu pa'o////de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen pos//pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug smras//ma trang ru tra la sogs pa/
163a3(rgyud): bdud kyi tshigs bcas 'dul ba'i phyir//yum chen sku cig rol mdzad//byang chub sems sprin phyogs bcur ste//dkyil 'khor rnams sum dkyil 'khor gas la/dkyil 'phar 'dul chos
163a4(rgyud): ra te//dkyil 'khor chen po'i bdag nyid che//dgyes bcas gar bcas gdan la bzhugs//zhal gsum gangs rim mdangs ldan pa//pad+ma gtun shing rtse gsum thogs//rin chen rgyan
163a5(rgyud): sogs dbu rgyan bcas//dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i ting 'dzin gyis//snod gcig dus cig sprul pa mdzad//mtha' dang dbus med 'jig rten gnas rnams kun//drag po 'thing nag 'bor ba'i
163a6(rgyud): gzhal yas khang //'khor lo rtsibs drug por khyams nyi rims ldan//kun tu zla kham sgo khyod gru bzhin bcas//rin chen 'bar ba'i thod dbyug rgyan dang bcas//tshad med ya shas 'khor
163a7(rgyud): lo la brten cing //'jigs byed khro bo'i rgyan tshogs mang po klub pe//na mi kha'i mtha' mnya mi sbyin gyis grub pa'i gnas//smon lam dbang dang thugs rje'i byin brlabs kyis//'jig rten
163b1(rgyud): drug dang dus bzhi phyogs bcun/gzugs khams ma lus dbang du bsdu ba na//drag po lha brgyad nga rgyal gzhom pa'i phyir//lha chen phyogs skyong tshogs kyis rtsig pa byas//sku bzhi dpal brgyad tshang bar
163b2(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir//rgyal chen rigs bzhi bzung nas ka ba byas//theg pa gzhin las 'phags pa'i don//glang chen ka l-i ling gis kau rten byos//gling bzhi'i mi rnams dgos 'dod bskor ba'i phyir//gzul
163b3(rgyud): sbyar mig chags byas pas 'gyur ldog med//'jig rten zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir//sing+ge ka la sha yis ke zhu byas//'khor ba'i gcong rnying gratAn nas sbyang ba'i phyir//seng+ge'i kha nas bdud rtsi
163b4(rgyud): 'o ma 'jug/thod rus par khyams rdo rje'i gzer gyis brgyan//zhing chen rnga yAb bla re phan gdugs dang //thugs rje byang sems kun tu khyab pa'i phyir//nyi zla 'bar ba'i rgyun ches gsal bar ldan//
163b5(rgyud): sprul pa'i me rlung 'brug gisau dus bzhir phye//khro bo'i 'byung gnas thugs rje'i sgra dang bcas//rin chen khri dang pad+ma nyi zla gdan//gser gyi seng+ge skyon gsum pa//drug bzhi rtsal 'phags nyi shu bad+yad/
163b6(rgyud): br-i rnying brgyad kyis bar khyams ngag la gnas//thugs rje nyi ma nyi shu brgyad//'jigs pa spangs pa'i seng+ge nyi shu brgyad//spus sku thob pas dbang mo nyi shu brgyad//kun tu 'od kyi sa la rab gnas
163b7(rgyud): pa//rin chen khri rkang 'dogs pa'i stobs dang ldan//mgon nas dben par gzhan dag gis//mthong rkang sbas pa'i chos nyid lung //'phrin las rnam par rdzogs pa'i gnas//rigs bzhi khrag 'thu
164a1(rgyud): he ru ka/bzhugs gnas mi 'gyur chos kyi sku//de nyid kun tu 'od kyi lung //pud+ma leb rgan phyogs bcu'i 'od//sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i tshul//chags bun gyur par/
164a2(rgyud): pad+ma ste//che ba 'am yon tan lung du ston//mkha' dbyings rnam dag dri meng pos//mi chags pad+me na nI gyi lung //stong zhing gasrel bas gzhan gang 'phags//nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gtsigs pa
164a3(rgyud): yin//sing+ge 'khor lo tshogs chen pos//thabs dang shes rab ye bral bas//spros med ring gis brnams pa ni//ma skyes pa yi chos nyid lung //'od zer gsal bas 'tsher bas na//yang /
164a4(rgyud): gabasbas pa ye shes lung //'byor du khyab par gyur pa'i tshogs//shis rab rigs kyi gsang ba'i yum+b+ha//thabs dang shes rab dgyes pa'i ting 'dzin gyis//tshogs chen yongs rdzogs dkyi
164a5(rgyud): 'khor chen po ni//bdag po khro bo chen po'i spu nyid du//gsang sngags 'di yis yongs rdzogs bya//oM pad+ma shri he ru ka pad+ma kro ti shwa ri hUM/ma hA tsan d+hA sar+b+ba du stan phaT//dkyil 'khor bdag
164a6(rgyud): po rngom brjid chu lugs dang //'bar ba'i mi 'od dmar gsal 'phro ba'i mdangs/dbu lde phyogs bzhir lis bzhi'i tshul du bzhugs//dbu mi mnya ma nyid bde ba dbyingasu gzigs//ral
164a7(rgyud): pa'i sring rtse me 'od bzhin du 'bar//smin ma khro gnyer snang sogs myur ba//lus thung sku rkyen gyad kyi cha byad la//bco lnga'i spyan gyis rang gi yul rnams gzigs//rdo rje rin chen khyung gi/
164b1(rgyud): gshog pos gtams//bcu drug rol pa'i spyan dang phyag mtshan dang //sgeg po 'i nabs brgyad chas rlung 'chas par gnas//'jig rten gsum po zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir//khro bong tshogs bcas
164b2(rgyud): 'gying bag yum bcas gan ni//'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba'i rtse mo la//bde gshegs rigs lnga'i snang ba sna tshogs ston//rang gi zhing sbyong drag po'i gnas 'dul zhing //thaMd rigs kyi dkyil 'a
164b3(rgyud): che la dgod//phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kyis//yab yum gnyis kyi dga' ba bskyed par mjed//gnasu nyi zla pad dkyil zla ba la//sku gsung thugs kyi sa bon yongs rdzogs
164b4(rgyud): gsal//oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta k+ShA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba ang ma ko& hUM/oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA bag badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko&haM/'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mo drug rnams la//mkha'agro'i rgyal mo khams rgya chen
164b5(rgyud): mo drug/zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can//rigs dag mtshan me cha lugs tsi lta bu//d+had d+ha badz+ra ai/swata badz+ra hAM/rat+na 'adz+ra ta/pad+ma badz+ra hI/kaR+Ya badz+ra ha/g+hA na badz+ra phaT/phyi rol
164b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor khyab par spro byas te//'gro rnams dung sogs khams rnam sa dag byas nas//rdo rje 'khor lo rini tshun pad+ma dang //ral gri kho T+wAM rtsi gsum dril bu bcas//g.yon pa bdud rtsi thod pa dang
164b7(rgyud): ba thogs//mkha 'gro ci ga tu ma rigs kyi dbu rgyan can//rang gi phreng ba dung khrod rgyan gyis klubs//las kyi kham rgya sna tshogs gzugs kyis bzhugs//dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor
165a1(rgyud): nas//long ba rgyab 'brel rgyan rnams rdzogs//sku mdog mdog mtshan ma tshogs la//phyag sgro l+ya zangs kyi thod pa thogs//oM shri kha'i oM sh+tsa ri kha'i/ho/
165a2(rgyud): kha'i a//dmus long 'khor bu bcu drug dag byung ste//thong+ga rus bar khyams gnas su bgrod par bya//oM shri kha'i hUM/shri khA'i hUM/lcags kyi spyang mo brgyad rnams yang sprul
165a3(rgyud): bcas//ye shes sprul pa'i khyi cu rngam par 'khod//me ri sprin ltar bsgribs pa ril zhing 'khrugs//bar 'khyams phyi ma'i gnas la kun tu 'khrod//oM ti ba ta tsakra shrI ne
165a4(rgyud): mu mor khaM hUM phaT/ku ku r-i yug sha hUM phaT/dpal cheni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas//dza hUM baM ho phyag rgya las//mgo dgu brtsegs pa'i rkang gcig po//mgo
165a5(rgyud): brgyad lag brgyad rol pa dang //mgo drug lag drug rkang drug dang //mgo gsum rkang gsum lag gsum po//dkyil 'khor chen po sgo bzhi ru//tshad med sprul pa'i phyag rgyas rol//de
165a6(rgyud): dag rol pa'i byin brlabs las//steng 'og phyogs mtshams ma lus pa'i//thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems//me 'brug rlung 'brug phyag rgyas gsal//rab tu rdzogos pa'i tshul du byung
165a7(rgyud): aM dzi na lo tau tsa re yag sha ku ru ban ts+tsha hUM phaT/gzhan yang sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor tshogs//bsi yi byan lag dmar po dang /dung bya khrung khyung la sogs rnams//'jig rten tsam
165b1(rgyud): po'i tshogs kyis sbyor//au t+ta hA ru ru ma hAHn+de sha ri bi sha na ya hUM hU~M phaT//kun gyi rtsa ba'i sngag so//oM pad+ma bi ta si tau he ho tsak+Sha b+h+yo phaT/snying po'i sngagaso//oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/oM a ma ra la/
165b2(rgyud): hUMdz+dza/nye ba'i snying po'o//oM b+h+rUM e a rA li dz+rIM zhes brjod pas khro bo 'khor lo ma lus par dbyon zhing /rang gi dkyil 'khor gnyi su med par gyur nas/he rug chen po nyid kyi dkyil 'khor chen po/
165b3(rgyud): rgyu'i dkyil 'khor du gnas shing /rang gi dkyil 'khor rnams dam tshig bkod par mdzad//de nas sprul pa'i 'khor lo tshogs//ma lus ral par byin brlabs shing //bdud dang grags byed rmod/
165b4(rgyud): byed cing //rang gi gnasu 'du bar mdzad//yauh+Na lu hu lu raM dza la e A ra li dza hUM baM ho//a la la ho//oM ma tra ru tra ha la ha la hUM phaT//dug gsum dngos po sbeng ba'i phyir//rngam pa'i khro tshogs/
165b5(rgyud): phyogs bcur spro//khro 'dzum phyag rgya bstan mdzad cing /he ha ru ru'i gsang sngags brjod//ha la rdo rje'i gad rgyangs kyis//bdud dang srin po la sogs rgyal bar mdzod//oM sarba pa pa ka ra he ta pa
165b6(rgyud): b+h+yo sha ma tAng ru trA hU~M phaT/oM sarba pra pA he ta b+hi sha ma tang ru trA hU~M phaT/oM ser+b+ba pa pa ke ra hi ta ba byaM sha khA tong ru d+ha hUM phaT/dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor po nya'i tshogs//dpal tshon rdo
165b7(rgyud): thig ser chen 'bebs//hUM dang phaT kyis srid gsum 'khor ba 'jig/hUM dang phaT kyis byin brlabs pos ma mi khyab//rdo rje khrag thung khrag gi rgya mtsho skems//rdo rje mtshon cha gnam lcags thu lum
166a1(rgyud): mi 'bre yangs sumagyi drug rnamamam sus gsas kyi ma na can gi mi rgyu
166b1(rgyud): pad ma'i tshul//sgra skad thams cad mtha' las grol//zab dang rgyang rings chos kyi don rnams mtshan nyid las//shangs kyi rlung sgroms dugu gsum gcad nas rkyong //
166b2(rgyud): zhal gyi ho ma la 'brel bas rgyud lnga gcod//rno dbang mche ba skye shi rtsad nas gcod//leb rgan ljags kyi gsung sgra rgya mtshor 'tshod//rol pa'i phyag gis 'gro ba 'dul
166b3(rgyud): la mkhas//ga shog bzhi bskyod pas 'phrin las rnam bzhi mdzad//zhabs rol pas ni zil gnon mdzad pa'i tshul//sku che yan lag rags pa ri po bzhin//thugs
166b4(rgyud): mchog ye shes stong nyid nyi ma brda'o//ye shes lha mchog byin brlabs 'byung ba'i gnas//ngo mtshar rol pas khro bo kun gyi rje//dpa'u bo sku mchog mnga' la phyag 'tshal
166b5(rgyud): bstod//de nas bde chen dbang gi skus//'khor lo dam tshig sgrogs mdzad cing //rdo rje gsang ba'i sku gsung thugs//gsang ba'i byin brlabs bskyed par mdzad/
166b6(rgyud): IM AHhUM sarba banra a mr-i ta sa mi yo gi si ti tAM/pa ho ka ka ma la su ta sa hUM/oM badz+ra sa ma ye kro ta sa ma ya oM AHhUM/mahA yo gi tsi tau ma ba rag ta me lA khri
166b7(rgyud): kha'i hU~M/oM kha khaM le le ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/i d+ha na sa ma ya a la la ho zhes rdo rje'i glu blangs so//pad mo gar mdzad do//bde ba chen pos mchod pas tshim
167a1(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ du na dudu la sogs pa rnams bskul ba'i tshogs rnams byung chub sems da tshun pa'i yo sa kyis brnyan d+ha/
167a2(rgyud): dbang bsgyur bu'i thugs sogs kyis/bden pa rigs 'dzin rnams cad kyi bdage po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//dekyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol du 'khod cing gsang ba'i dkyil
167a3(rgyud): 'khor 'dzin par gyur to//de'i 'kho rnams kyang dam tshig gi snying po blangasta na blon du mdzad par khas blangs to//snying po brjod pa ni/mA ma jug shA ru dzA ma
167a4(rgyud): myab+h+yo/smrar bsgo ba'i sngags ni/ ru lA ru lu trAM b+h+yo bA mi ts+tshed d+ha hU~M/de bzhin gshegs pa tham sad kyi dgongs pa Sh+TA na med pa'i gasted bu dpal mtsha

167a6(rgyud): mdzad nas//bdag dang gnyis ming rol pa'i mthus//khro bo yi rgyal po sku chen dag/sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs//gsang gsum dam tshig phyag rgya che//dkyil
167a7(rgyud): 'khor rgyu yi dam tshig sku//bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'o//chos dbyings yon tan 'byung gnas gzhal yas khang //rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rigs kyi gcod pan
167b1(rgyud): n+dan//rigs kyi dbang phyug skye 'gro myu lus sgrol//rdo rje dkod pa rgyun gyi dkyil 'khor no//dbang po yul tshogs rigs kyi sku lngar ldan//shes rab thabs dang mi gnyis 'ang 'bral
167b2(rgyud): med//dus gsum gIts+tsha br-i tshar sgrol bas tsher gsum rgyan//khams gsum yongs sgrol mdzad kyi rgyan du che//mi gnas mya ngan gsung rab rgya mtsho bsgrogs//ma bsgribs me gsal
167b3(rgyud): go 'phang mdzes par mthong //me ldog g.yul sgrol stobs drug mdzes par mgyogs//grwar yang thog med byin brlabs shugs dang ldan//ma ra ba'i skad gdangs snyan ma sring
167b4(rgyud): spro ba 'gyed//khaM dmar ral pa'i dbus nas dbugs 'byung ba//dpral ba zhur po brjid pa'i khyad par dang //rta mgrin 'od 'bar gsal ba'i khyad par ni//don mchog khyad par
167b5(rgyud): yon tan rmad du 'byung //ljang khu'i me 'bar rta mgo'i rang bzhin ni//'gyur med ye shes ji bzhin gsal//byams pa'i mdangs kyis khams gsum khyad par gzigs//
167b6(rgyud): brdog ma le'u rgan 'bar de'i khyad par mchog/stug po bkod sogs zhing khams rab 'byam na//rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed khri kun//zhing khams gsum dag ma
167b7(rgyud): lus dbang du bsdud//shes rab thabs su 'brel ba'i rta skad ni//grub pa'i dpal tshogs tshangs pa'i rta dbyangs yin//dang po'i gdangs kyis rgyal ba'i zhing khams sgrogs
168a1(rgyud): /gdangs skad gnyis pa ri rab rtse nas tsher+ya//gsung snyan gdangasu gsum snyan pa'i khyad par ni//bcu drug slad ma'i ngan stogs thar la stonan
168a2(rgyud): spyan mig glog ltar 'gyur ba cher 'phags zhing //sha khrag rlon pa za ba'i srin po 'joms//mtsher can yid la gdung ba'i rta skad ni//mun mthu'i 'gro ba ma lus gsal
168a3(rgyud): bor mdzad//rgyu dbyings grangs dang gzigs thangs rtogs pa'i don//hUM las dpal chen khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bskyed//gnas ni sna'i dbugs rings gro ba lags//phyag rgya'i
168a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnam por 'phrul pa 'byung //shungs kyi rlung sgrom yangs pas ye shes srog/gsang ba'i tshub mas sdug bsngal stong nas 'byin//rgya chen sprul pas brag tshigs tshar gcod de//'khor/
168a5(rgyud): ba'i rgya che lugs las bzlog pa y-i//rigs kyi rlung gis dug lnga dbyingasu sgrol//zlum dkar bzang rims rno dpal tshims//zhal du bdar bu'i byang chub sems//ma skyes chos nyid kun
168a6(rgyud): la rol//zhi rgyus dbang bdud drag po yi//cir yang 'gyur ba'i ho khung ste//lus lnga 'brel pa'i zhal zhes bya//'khor ba yongs su smin po dang //las mangs nyon mongs dbang btson
168a7(rgyud): dang //skye ba mi skye lung ma bstan//des smin mdzad pa chen po yi//'jog ldog cir yang gyur pa dang //brjod byed gnyis ka'i bstan gyur nas//'byar zhing bskyod pas ljags nyid//yig
168b1(rgyud): 'dru'i rgyu nyid bu gshugs thugs//rdo rje myu gu ting 'dzin thugs//'od nyid nyon mongs rnam dag 'joms//rigs byed ye shes phyag rgya dang //yig 'bru sa bon phyag rgya dang //yon tan rdzogs
168b2(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya'o//srid pa gsum ste lta ba dang //rgyu dang las kyi rim pa'o//de phyir ye shes rol pa'i dbying //snying po phyag mtshan phye mo dang //bstan par gyur nas mkha' yi dbyings//chos sku
168b3(rgyud): chu'i zla ba bzhin//sna tshogs snad la rang bzhin med//dur khrod chen po'i gnas kun tu//gar gyi dbang phyug rnam par rolo//shar du rol pa'i phyag bzhi mtshan ma ni//khro chen snying 'byin la
168b4(rgyud): ta ma 'bar ba dang //rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhabs pas rol//de bzhin lho la sogs pa'i phyag kyang bzhi//thod pa khrag bkang rdo rje lu gu rgyud//rdo rje be con thod rlon 'dzin par ral//mi'o zhags pa
168b5(rgyud): dag dang khyung gi khwa//sdigs 'dzub rtso la ye shes 'bar//rdo rje khA Ta kha ni rab tu 'khro//rdo rje rtse dgu rtse lnga gdengs pa dang //rtsa gsum rtse gcig 'bar ba gsor zhing rdo teg/ye nas ma skyes dang /
168b6(rgyud): ba'i tshe'i khrul ston//ye shes lnga yi yon tan khyad par ni//rin chen dra ba sangs rgyas stong gis brgyan//klu rgyal nag po 'dre ba'i thabs shes kyis//rtse ba rnam thar sgo gsum
168b7(rgyud): sku gsung thugs//sprul pa'i don mdzad dkyil 'khor sna tshogs ston//gsang ba'i yum bzhis sku la 'khril byed cing //byang chub sems bzhi de nyid ston par byed//rdo rje dra bas
169a1(rgyud): rin chen klog 'gyug//lhung ga shog A mo thob ga shog ster ma can//sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis kyi grus rje shar//thabs kyis rnam par 'dul pas g.yas
169a2(rgyud): nas brkyang //srid gsum ma rig mun pa sel byed pa'i//shes rab zla stong rtsa gnyis g.yon nas khyab//thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i byin brlabs che//sprul pas 'phros pas/
169a3(rgyud): dug gsum rgyuni mi 'chad//sna tshogs rol po'i phyag rgya zhes pa yi//phrin las brgyad kyis bdag nyid sku che ba'i//dpa' bo stag gis steng phyogs 'dul zhabs brgyad//rgya bye'u/
169a4(rgyud): lcags kyi shar lho'i zhabs brgyad de//rdo rje 'chol bas lha'i phyogs na brjid//bse khrab smug pos lho nub rkang pa brkyang //sna tshogs brjid pas byang shar 'tshamasu gyon//shu ken
169a5(rgyud): dAr gyis byang shar zhabs mdzes shing //mche ba dmar pos nub byang brgyangs pa'i gdani//sbrul nag 'khril ba'i zhabs kyis 'og phyogs 'dul bar mdzad//khro brgyad gnan
169a6(rgyud): cing gzir byas zhabs brdebs shing //dug chen bcom zhing sgral rtsigs gnan//brang gnon ldan pa 'joms zhing 'jigs mdzad dang //'khor gyi sku la sbas pas ye shes gsal//
169a7(rgyud): sku nyid 'khor la sbas pas dbyings kyi brgyan//thugs rje'i rol pas gzhal yas khang du bstan//'phrin las rol pas hUM mdzad hUM gis brgyan//sa bcu zil gnon stobs
169b1(rgyud): bcu dbang dang ldan//de nas gar gyi dbang phyug tshe//dam chog gar gyi byin brlabs kyis//rgyun b+hi ti 'dzin la gnas nas//yum chen gza ldan dgyes par mdzad//dam tshig chen pa
169b2(rgyud): phyag rgya ni//gnyis mdzad gzi ldan dbang phyug ma//ji snyed bud med sna tshogs dang //gsung gri rdo rje mi smad do//gtso bo rab tu gdungs pa la//rab tu smra bar gang byed pa//bsgeg pa'i tshig
169b3(rgyud): gis brgyan na su//srid zhu'i sems kyis gdungs pa la//ye shes tshigs kyis rab bskor ba'i//lha mo'i tshogs rnams bskor byas te//rang gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du//gnyis med
169b4(rgyud): mnyam pa'i rgya gzhi gdab//byang chub sems tshogs gsal ba'i rgyun//thim pa'i dkyil 'khor don chen gsal//dbyings phyug sbrul tshogs bsam yas dge/nges pa'i ye shes

169b6(rgyud): dam tshig chen po de nyid mangs//phyi nang gsang ba'i mthar phyin pa//thams cad pad+mo rnam dag pas//cho 'phrul rnam kun de bzhin nyid//thugs rje chags pa'i phrin las kyis//dbang
169b7(rgyud): drag phrin las gnod sbyin gnas//gnyis med 'bar bas thams cad sreg/las dang bag chags sgrib sogs kun//gnas nA gshegs mdzad ye shes tshogs//lhun gyis dang bas kun tu
170a1(rgyud): /'jams//smr-i ma ny+dzan dus rgyu mnar//srid gsum sems can 'dul pa/'a ba//'dri 'dul la bar 'ang mdo sa mdzad//'dzag d+hAn ma t+yAd du mya ngan 'dra//
170a2(rgyud): gnyis med thugs kyis sA le mkhyen//de ltar dgongs pa'i khyad par dri //'gro ba mtha' dag 'dul don du//rnam par thar pa dbu gsum bstan//g.yas dkar g.yon
170a3(rgyud): dmar dbus 'thing ka/ye shes drug gi phyug mtshan ni//g.yas pa'i rdo rje rde'u chung dang //mdu rtse gsum pas 'dzin pas rol//dril bu r+g+haM zhags thod rlon g.yon/bskal
170a4(rgyud): pa'i mo ri sbrul zhabs dang //thod rlon dang ba rgyan du byas//sgeg po dpa' bo 'jig su rung //dgod dang kr-i she dang 'jigs par byed//snying r+d+he rngam dre zhi ba'i sku//sku gsung thugs kyi gang thabs
170a5(rgyud): can//'jigs byed khro bo rnam par rgyal//skye ba med pa'i chos dbyingasu//mtshan ma med pa'i chos bshad pas//chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rgyal//long sku mtshan dang dpe

170a7(rgyud): lta bu'i ye shes dang //sprul pa 'gro mang don gyi phyir//phal mod bkod pa'i sa rnams//dngos po mtshon ma rnam 'phrul gyis//bya ba grub pa'i ye shes tshogs//thams cad
170b1(rgyud): /rgyun ma rnas 'das/ ts+tsha btags chos da gras//n+da mAn rnams pams khon//nga bzhin dag pa dri ma da///yo ba chen sa/sa rnams can gyi rgyu na/

170b3(rgyud): don phyung ba'i lang+ga s+ye shu gnyis pa'o///de nas bcom ldan dpal gyi smras//gu b+hi da phyug rgyun grub mchog/thugs rje brjid pa'i stobs ldan pas//

171a1(rgyud): ba'i rtul zhugs mchog/sku gsung thugs mchog yon tan ni//rngom brjid sum cu rtsa drug mnga'//rgyu chen yan lag rlugs pas brjid//grangs ma rkyen
171a2(rgyud): dang mtshams pas brjid//bkur gi shos gtso bo mthong bas brjid//byang zhugs bla ma yin pas brjod//gdangs chen stong gsum gang bas brjid//don la nyi tshe bston pas
171a3(rgyud): brjid//gsal bas mtha' gnyis yangs pas brjid//thugs rje thugs dam mthar phyin brjid//ma rmongs thabs kyis 'dul bas brjid//ma 'gags sa l-i mkhyen pa
171a4(rgyud): brjid//med la zad mi shes pas brjid//gcig la 'dod dgur bsgyur bas brjid//glo nod sbyin phaT par mdzad pas brjid//thabs mkhas skyon gyis mgos brjid//rims
171a5(rgyud): bral nyam thag rol par brjid//'khor ba yun rings mgon mdzad rdo rjid//cig char zil gyis mAnan pas brjid//bya ba'i ye shes rdzogs pas brjid//sku gsung yon
171a6(rgyud): twen 'phrin las thugs//zil gnan nga rgyal bcag par bya//desu ro yi nang nas ni//glog 'gyur lce ni lan gsum 'byung //sgo 'am sen mo gcad par bya//de nyid ral gri bzang
171a7(rgyud): por 'gyur//rnal 'byor pa yi grangs bzhin dbyung //de thogs na mkhA la song nas//rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags brjod bye//oM b+hu ru na ra sa ma ta ya hUM phaT//gar gyi dbang phyug
171b1(rgyud): rgyal gyis//gang 'dod gnasu 'gro bya zhing //dregs byed tshogs rnams zil gnanA te/brtul zhugs spyod pas glu blang spring //brtul zhugs spyod pa sna tshogs pas//yud tsam gcig la
171b2(rgyud): gnas su dag par byed//bcom ldan pad+ma he ru ka'i//sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni//ji ltar sprul zhing cir yang snang //mtshan nyid cig tu ma nges pas//sku gsung
171b3(rgyud): thugs sbrul bus mo yas che//rang bzhin las dang yon tan gyi//byin brlabs ya mtshan sgrib med gi sal//khams gsum kun las rtsal 'phags shing //rang
171b4(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor rnam gsal las//byin brlabs 'gro la rgya chen ston//chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang //sbrul sku sna tshogs 'dul ba'o//tshig gi gsung rab rig
171b5(rgyud): pa'i gsung //bzhi la gsum bcu drug gos brjid//dug gsum sku gsung thugs kyis sbyangs//dug lnga bde ba chen pos sgyid//dbyings las ye shes rol pa'i mthus//skye dro//
171b6(rgyud): ma lus rgyas btab nas//rang bzhin dag pa'i dbyingasu sbyong //rgyal ba gang gis thugs rjes kyang //'di la skyabasu yod ma yin//srid pa gsum du dag byas nas//srid pa'i phyag rgyas

172a2(rgyud): yang dang yang du phyag 'tshalo//mched pa rgya chen phul byas te//'gro brtse ba'i sems can las//bsgrub pa'i rim pa zhu bar mdzad//bcom ldan dngos grub kun gyi bdag/'dul/
172a3(rgyud): bya kun gyi don gyi phyir//thun mong dngos grub ji lta bur//de bzhin mchog gi dngos grub dag/sgrub par bya ba'i thabs ni gang //las kyi cho ga ji lta bur//yan lag tshogs
172a4(rgyud): po'i ldan byas nas//tshe 'di mchog tu gyur rem ci//thabs mang cho ga bshad par bya//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang //rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs te/
172a5(rgyud): ma 'ongs 'gro la phan pa'i phyir//sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba las//ngo mtshar 'phrul pa 'di gsungaso//rgyal ba kun gyi dam tshig che//rnam gsum phyag rgya la gnas nas//

179a3(rgyud): la sogs la//gsung sngags rgyal po brjod par bya//oM na mo ku ru sarba byi dar ni mo sa de ni ra sha ni re sha kra ra kra ta hUM phaT//rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas//stong du brjod ci
179a4(rgyud): phyogs bcur gtor//gang bsrung ba dag shis 'gyur cing //'byung po'i tshogs kyis mi tshugs 'gyur//gzhan yang ri'u cha dgu pa'i//'khor lo shing shun tshogs pa bri/
179a5(rgyud): mu khyud dag gis mtha' bskor nas//gsang sngags rgyal po dgod par bya//dbus dgod pa'i gsang sngags ni//yi ge bcu bzhi gsang sngags bsam//de'i mtha' mar
179a6(rgyud): oM mthar he he dang //hu ru kaM pa bag sha ha ha ma mra bri hUM phaT swA hA//de mthar dbyangs dang gsal byed gang //bsrung ba'i sngags dang bcas pa ni//phur gum bzang pos byuH
179a7(rgyud): byas te//rdo rje rgya bram dbusu gzhug/gang gi ming bcis 'bum bzlas shing //btags pa'i srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur//gzhan yang bum pa bzang pa ru//bdud rtsi'o//
179b1(rgyud): masbyar ba da//rang gi gsang sngags srungs kA ba sa//gang dang rdzogs pa'i sngar ba sgoms shing //sngags pang bsgyung byu /zlang bar da//de bzhon ga phyogs pa 'ams
179b2(rgyud): b+h+yo//gsang pa 'du byed bshad par bya//phyogs bcu byung chub sems bcas pas//de la thams cad dga' mdzod cing //lha rnams kun la skar bsgo mdzad//de dag
179b3(rgyud): dang pa'i shugs kyis ni//rgyud kyi rgyal ba 'di bzung zhing //de 'drin gzhan la'adu byams par 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa thams pade kyi gsung ba dpal hUM ma
179b4(rgyud): 'i rgyu rkyen pa zhes ba / srung ba'i'i sa rgyab//de bzhin gshegs pa byams pad kyi gangs pa//blan med pa'i gsang ba da la d+ha
179b5(rgyud): bI'i rgyud rkyen po rtsa brdzog go////rgya gar spyad du/hU~M puk+Sh+ma s+'u e+e Dit+tatAn+da dzagu d+ha gab+hIr Ad ta ma n+t+ra ma//bad skad du/dang
179b6(rgyud): /rnam pa'i rgyud gis zab mo margyogaces bya ba/de sa rdo rje snyoms pa la phyag ste//'di srid bdag gis sa pyu du ste ga cig na/bai nim
179b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dang /rdo rje dang /rin pa che dang /'du dang /las kyi tshigs thams cad kyim chag tu gsang brgyan po dam rgyag gi sdom pa gnasu ma dro
180a1(rgyud): ba chen po dbang po gnyis pa/thabs dang shes rab kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po//khams gsum thams cad kyi bdag po chen po//de bzhin gash+loDa
180a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po na mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa/pha rol tu phyin pa'i skabs dang ldan pa/che mchog he ru ka'i shes rab dang ye shes kyi
180a3(rgyud): dbang bskur ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rin po che gsang ba rdo rje mchog tu gsang ba'i bcom ldan 'das bud med kyi dkyil na gsung brjod
180a4(rgyud): pa med par bzhugaso//sangs rgyas kyi zhing na mkha'i dbyings kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa/rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang /rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ba dang /na mkha' la
180a5(rgyud): 'gro ba chen po dang /skal ba dang ldan pa dang /'jib par byed pa'i gsang ba chen mo'i g.yog dang /'byung ba chen po lnga dang /'byung ba las gyur pa'i lha'i tshogs 'bum phrag
180a6(rgyud): brgya stong gis khyab pa'i di lta ste/snying po ye shes rdo rje dang /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rdo rje dang /me long ye shes rdo rje dang /so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang /
180a7(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid ye shes rdo rje dang /bya ba nan tan ye shes rdo rje dang /na mkha' ye shes rdo rje dang /rlung ye shes rdo rje dang /me ye shes rdo rje dang /chu ye shes rdo rje dang /
180b1(rgyud): sa ye shes rdo rje dang /thabs dang shes rab ye shes rdo rje dang /gzugs ye shes rdo rje dang /sgra ye shes rdo rje dang /dri ye shes rdo rje dang /ro ye shes rdo rje dang /reg ye shes
180b2(rgyud): rdo rje dang /sku ye shes rdo rje dang /gsung ye shes rdo rje dang /thugs ye shes rdo rje dang /bde ba chen po ye shes rdo rje dang /kun tu bzang po ye shes rdo rje dang /gsung gi
180b3(rgyud): dbang po ye shes rdo rje dang /gnyisu med pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang /zhi ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang /gdul dka' 'dul ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang /rgyal ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang /
180b4(rgyud): me tog gi ye shes rdo rje dang /rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang /dbang gi ye shes rdo rje dang /nyi ma'i khro bo ye shes rdo rje dang /rgyal mtshan ye shwas rdo rje dang /rdo rje sgra yis
180b5(rgyud): /rdo rje dang /'gro ba 'du ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang /gzhon nu ye shes rdo rje dang /rgyu ye shes rdo rje dang /gsung med pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang /sna tshogs kyi ye shes rdo rje dang /go
180b6(rgyud): cha ye shes rdo rje dang /yang dag par zab par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang /'dus pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang /bde ba chen po'i ye shes rdo rje dang /byang chub sems ye shes rdo rje/
180b7(rgyud): dang /rin chen dbang bskur ba ye shes rdo rje dang /pad+mo dmar po ye shes rdo rje dang /dam tshig ye shes rdo rje dang /mchod pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang /rnal 'byor ma chen mo g+ha
181a1(rgyud): dang bcas pa rnams la 'di lta ste/shin tu dga' blo'i dbang mo zhes bya ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang /rmongs par byed pa'i dbang mo ye shes rdo rje dang /gsod ces
181a2(rgyud): bya ba'i dbang mo ye shes rdo rje dang /rdo rje dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang /ye shes dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang /rin chen dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang /pad+ma
181a3(rgyud): dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang /las kyi dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang /gnon par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang /'dzums par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang /rmongs
181a4(rgyud): par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang /rgyas 'debs par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang /'dren par byed mo ye shes rdo rje dang /gsod par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang /'bebs par
181a5(rgyud): byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang /gcod par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang /sdigs byed ces bya ba ye shes rdo rje dang /tshig byed ces bya ba ye shes rdo rje dang /yan lag thams
181a6(rgyud): cad 'phrog byed ye shes rdo rje dang /'jib byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang /khrag la dga' mA ye shes rdo rje dang /gcod byed ma yis rdo dang /pham byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang /na mkha' la 'gro ma yis
181a7(rgyud): rdo rje dang /ngag 'phrog ma ye shes rdo rje dang /zas sha rlon za ba ye shes rdo rje dang /srin mo ye shes rdo rje dang /gnod sbyin ma ye shes rdo rje dang /gnod byed ces
181b1(rgyud): bya ba ye shes rdo rje dang /sbrul ye shes rdo rje dang /seng ge ye shes rdo rje dang /stag ye shes rdo rje dang /ri dgas ye shes rdo rje dang /phag ye shes rdo rje dang /spre'u ye shes rdo rje dang /
181b2(rgyud): khyi ye shes rdo rje dang /byi la ye shes rdo rje dang /ra ye shes rdo rje dang /bya rog ye shes rdo rje dang /wa ye shes rdo rje dang /bya rgod ye shes rdo rje dang /sre maM ye shes rdo rje dang /
181b3(rgyud): mi'i keng rus dang /'bu chen po'i ro dang /yi dgas dang /sha za dang /gzig dang /bong bu dang /rta dang /ma he dang /ba lang dang /'ug pa dang /rdo rje 'phrog par byed pa chen mo dang /
181b4(rgyud): rdo rje zas 'dren ma chen mo dang /de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog mi mnyam pa dang /mnyam pa dang bcas pa/chos kyi dbyings rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs g.yog dang
181b5(rgyud): bcas pa/rdo rje'i rigs ye shes rdo rje dang /ye shes kyi khro bo ye shes rdo rje dang /ye shes kyi khro mo ye shes rdo rje dang /sprul pa'i ye shes dang /sprul pa'i phra men ma ye shre/
181b6(rgyud): rdo rje dang /yang sprul ma chen mo ye shes rdo rje dang /bdud rtsi lha mo ye shes rdo rje dang /de dag la sogs te bye ba phrag brgya stong po rnams sgra ca co'i byin cing na mkha' dbyings//
181b7(rgyud): rab 'byam chen po'i tshogs rnams kyis mchod par byed cing /bud med kyi dkyil na gsung brjod pa med par bzhugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal che mchog he ru ka/
182a1(rgyud): kun tu bzang po dang rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa gdon mi za ba'i tshogs rdo rje gtong ba dadang mo zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin la snyoms par bzla
182a2(rgyud): so//rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rol pa chen pos rnam par rol pa/sprul pa chen po'i gar dang gru dang /sil snyen dang /gzugs dang /sgra dang /d+hi dang /ro dang /reg pa'i ba
182a3(rgyud): bachen po dang 'phags par 'gyur ba dang /rol pa la sogs po'i reg pa bde ba la spyod pa'i gar nye bar ston cing /rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshogs kyi tshul chen po 'phags
182a4(rgyud): par 'gyur ba dang /rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnon pa dang /rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spyod po dang /gar byed pa dang /za bar byed pa dang /sprad par byed pa dang /zlog par byed pa
182a5(rgyud): dang /myong bar byed pa dang /'gyur bar byed pa dang /'phrog par byed pa dang /rtsom par byed pa dang /kun tu 'bebs par byed pa dang /bde ba nye bar stobs shing reg pa rol
182a6(rgyud): bye phrag mang po bye ba phrag brgya stong tshad mong pa nam pa'i dbyings rdul phran las 'das par mnyam par 'jog pas nye bar gnos shing mtsho skyong ste/'das pa dang /ma 'ongs
182a7(rgyud): pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mi gzigs/dgongs pa nye bar mi 'jog/thabs dang shes rab ston bu mo mdzad//shin tu 'gal phyin ci/
182b1(rgyud): log pa la 'jog par mi mdzad/nye bar 'jog par mi mdzad ma dad pa rnams dad par yang mi mdzad//ma dul ba rnams dul bar yang mi mdzad/nye bar gtses pa rnams 'tshe
182b2(rgyud): bzhi bar yang mi mdzad/ma 'gags pa rnams 'gog par yang mi mdzad/ma bskul ba rnams bskul bar yang mi mdzad/ma rgyas pa rnams rgyas par yang mi mdzad/
182b3(rgyud): rnam par rmongs pa rnams sel bar yang mi mdzad/dga' bar 'gyur ba rnams mi dga' bar yang mi mdzad/dga' bar ma gyur pa rnams dga' bar yang mi mdzad/ma
182b4(rgyud): khros pa rnams khros par yang mi mdzad/mi gdug pa rnams gdug par yang mi mdzad/'jigs byed chen po dang /drag po ma rungs pa chen po dang /gdum po chen
182b5(rgyud): po dang /lha dang lha ma yin dang /log 'dren dang /gdug pa chen po dang /yi dgas dang /sha za dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /shin tu gdug pa'i gdug pa
182b6(rgyud): chen po dang /tsha ba'i dron dang /nad dang /sbrul dang /sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar byed pa rnams nye bA ro zhi bar yang mi mdzad/rnam par dul bar yang mi
182b7(rgyud): mdzad/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas dgongs pa nye bar bzhag ste/spyan gnyis mi 'dzums par gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
183a1(rgyud): da chen pad+ma bzhin gshegs bya thams cad r+dz+dza dag zlos bad+mo shing zla gsung thugs da rje'i phyug gos phyug byas nas du btsun gshog sa
183a2(rgyud): mas cad kyi chen po'i dbyungs skyes la zhing gsol ba btab bo//rdo rje sems dpa' sangs sa kun+ta//ni spos dag sus brgyas byang chub rnams//yun ra
183a3(rgyud): bsgoms nas shin tu gdung so//dga' bo'i yid kyis dgyes par mdzod//kye 'dod chags dri med kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa ste//'dod chags dam tshig lnga ni phye mdzad
183a4(rgyud): nu//dga' ba drug rgyu shin tu gsungs pa yis//'dod pa bde ba nyid kyis 'jig par mdzod//ni mI dag rdo rje las byung ya sta rba//rin chen 'brar ba'i byang chu
183a5(rgyud): sems ni rab byung na sa//rgyal ba thams cad rnams kyi dbu ni skams pa la//dri med rin chen tshar gyis spyi bor dbang bskur mdzod//mnyam dang mi mnyam 'dod rtags
183a6(rgyud): tshul dag pa//pad+ma'i gan suM rdo rje mdzod gtod pas//sna tshogs sems dpa' sems brlan brlag gyur pos//sbyor ba gzhan min ma rtogs bshad du gsol//rdo rje
183a7(rgyud): sems khyod dbang mchog bde ba byid pa'i mchog/rdo rje pad+mo dbye ba'i tshul gyis sbyor mdzod de//rgyal ba kun gyi gzugs kyi sku ni rab tud nas//thams cad bde ba'i sgrub
183b1(rgyud): pa nyid kyis mnyes par mdzad//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyangs kyis nges
183b2(rgyud): par bskul ba thugasu chud nas bzhengs te/brjid dang bcas pas gar mdzad cing /zhal 'dzum pa dang 'dor ba dang /bskum pa dang /'gying ba dang /spyan mdzes pas smin rings
183b3(rgyud): bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang /pad+mo phyag gis g.yas g.yon gar gyi phreng ba'i tshul gyis sa'i ngos la zhabs 'phen cing bsgyur ba dang /'dor zhing bskum pa dang /'jog cing 'dedi/
183b4(rgyud): pi'i rnam par gnon pas na mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab par mdzad/rlung gi khams dang /me'i khams dang /chu'i khams dang /sa'i khams kun khyab par mdzadade/
183b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems la kun tu khyab par mdzad de/sna tshogs dang /phra ba dang /sbom pa dang /bud med dang /gzhon nu dang rgan pa dang /skyes pa dang //
183b6(rgyud): skyes pa ma yin pa dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /skar ma dang /gshin rje dang /chu bdag dang /brgya byin dang /'byung ba dang /'byung ba las gyur pa thams cad
183b7(rgyud): lo bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos rgyas par byas te yang dag par gnaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/yang 'dus
184a1(rgyud): nas phyag gur dang bcus nas thal mo sbyar ba nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la skye bos 'atud nas gsol ba btab pa/bcom ldan la
184a2(rgyud): kun gyi gsang ba'i he ru chen po rol ba'i thig le 'di/gnyos med ye shes yang dag 'byung //bcom ldan khyod kyis bo shad du gsol//sems can kun gyi mu skyes pa
184a3(rgyud): skyes drang ma skyes rnam spangs pa'i//'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rab sbyor ba'i//mchog tu rtag pa'i sbyor ba'o//thams cad rin chen 'byung gnas dag/na mkha'i dri med
184a4(rgyud): 'dra ba yi//rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng bya ste/rdo rje chen pos dbang bskur ba'o//longs spyod chos ni yang dag 'byung /pad+mo'i mchog ni dmar po mdog/'dod chags
184a5(rgyud): de nyid gsang ba tshe//bde byed thams cad bdud rtsi'i mchog/la la ar ni don dang ldan//yang dag mdzes pa 'gying ba'i 'gros//sa phyogs ye shes bde ba che//byang
184a6(rgyud): chub sems thig mchog nyid do//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol
184a7(rgyud): ba btab pa mkhyen nas 'gog pa chen po ye shes rdo rje zhes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugaso//de bzhin gshe
184b1(rgyud): pa de dag ngo mnar du gyur te/yang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po kun tu bzang ba chen po la de kho na nyid kyi dbyangs kyis bskul to bzhengs par mdzad//
184b2(rgyud): oM iHhUM/mi skye ye shes bde mchog ro la mnams/sems dpa'i mchog nyid 'gog pa rnams la bslang //chags meng kun tu mya ngan 'das mdzad bzhengs shing
184b3(rgyud): mnams//mchog tu grasang ba'i dam bcas 'jig rten sgrol//byang chub skye gnas dbyings las gar mdzod cig/sngon gyi nyon mongs rdo skams gzir ba ye//bde
184b4(rgyud): mchog rgyan dang ldan pa'i thabs kyis bskul te go bar mdzad//de nas ba tsamo ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po
184b5(rgyud): chen po he ru ka rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin lnga snyoms par zhugs nas/rang gi gsang ba'i thig le shin tu dgyes pa chen po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs phyung nas/de bzhin
184b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i thig le'i dbus su rgyas par byas te/na mkha'i dbyings thams cad du snang bar byas te/steng dang 'og tu yang bzhu
184b7(rgyud): te/ma lus lus pa med pa'i ril dang /sems can thams cad la gsal bar byas nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro bde ma mnyes par byas nas slar de nyid du slar
185a1(rgyud): log nas/bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i snying po glasang ba mchog gi thig le'i dbus na bzhug sngo//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
185a2(rgyud): cad 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi phreng ba mchog tu bde bar gyur pa snying po des bskul ba ni gar mdzad cing rang rang gi ting 'dzin du dmigs nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang
185a3(rgyud): po chen po'i thugs kyi dbu su mchog tu gsang ba shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i badre bar bsgrubs te/sku rang gi bud med kyi tshul du bskyed nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi thur
185a4(rgyud): ka nas mngon par 'byung bar gyur to//de lnga la la ni spyan pad+ma//lta bur bsgyur cing smin kyus rings//sangs rgyas tshul gyi gar mdzad pa'i//sangs rgyas rnal 'byor
185a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du//rab dgyes rdo rje gdon mi za//rdo rje sems la dgyes mji da cing //bde ba'i sangs rgyas bde ba yis//bcom ldan sangs rgyas bzhugs par
185a6(rgyud): 'gyur//zhal bsgyur smin ma bsgyur ba yis//spyan yang bsgyur zhing shin tu gnon//sor mo rnams kyang rab bsgyur dang //rdo rje tshul gyis gaR+Sha mdzad cing //sems
185a7(rgyud): dpa' che la mnyes so par mdzad//rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dkyil gyi du//sku ni skad cig bskul ba yi//bcom ldan rdo rje gnas par 'gyur//zhal ni brjid cing rin chen
185b1(rgyud): drwa// med skyo bor glar mdzad nang //dkyil 'khor zhal gyis rnam bsgyur ba//byang chub sems ni med par mdzad//dur khrod son tan chags dag gis//pad+ma'i sman
185b2(rgyud): gyis gzigs mdzad cing //bde ba'i bdag po chen po la//rin chen tshul ba gyis mnyes par mdzad//rab tu dgyes gsal badre ba yi//pad+ma dmar la che mdzad de//
185b3(rgyud): chags bral zhing rab tu bsgyur//pad+ma'i dra bas 'bral ba yis//pad+ma'i rnal 'byor ma dkyil du//brjid pa'i spyan gyis kun gzigs pa'i//bde ba rje la mnyes par mdzad//
185b4(rgyud): bcom ldan pad+mo gnas pa 'gyur/phyag gi sor mo rtse mo mtha'//rnam par bsgyur bar gar mdzad cing //phyag sbyar khong stong pad+ma yis//glog bzhi phral nas spyi
185b5(rgyud): gcig tu//mchod pa'i sprin gyis longs spyod pas//sna tshogs bde byed rgartsa nyid la//las kyi tshul gyis mnyes mdzad cing //bco mu ldan sna tshogs gnas par
185b6(rgyud): 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba byang chub sems kyi ting 'dzini la snyoms par zhugs
185b7(rgyud): nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba thig le byang chub kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thu
186a1(rgyud): rdo rje las phyung ngo //dkyil 'khor nyid kyi tshul gyi su//cho ga sbyor bas spros byas te//de dang 'thun pa'i dkyil 'khor gdon//sbyor ba'i gar gyis gar
186a2(rgyud): byas shing //ci ltar yang dag brtag par byas//ci ltar dkyil 'khor de kho na//he ru ka dpal dkyil 'khor ni/rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bos kyang //brtag par nus
186a3(rgyud): pa ma yin no//dkyil 'khor ye shes kyis brtag pas//snying po phyag rgya sngags rig gis//lha'i sbyor ba rgyas btab pas//cho ga shes pas bri bar bya//gru bzhi pa la
186a4(rgyud): sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan//theg gis yongasu 'khor lo rtsibs bzhir ldan//kun tu yongasu mu khyud bcas//phyi rol rdo rje ra bas bskor//de'i dbus
186a5(rgyud): su bcom ldan 'das che mchog he ru ka rigs bzhi he ru kas ni bskor/grwa bzhi shwa ri yum dang bcas de'i phyir rim 'khor lo rtsibos ni bcu drug la ye shes khro mo bcu
186a6(rgyud): drug/de'i phyi rim pad+ma bcu drug la sprul pa'i phra men ma bcu drug/de'i phyi rim pad+ma bcu drug la/sprul pa'i phra man ma bcu drug/de'i phyi rim snam bu gcig la yang sprul bcu
186a7(rgyud): drung//de'i phyi rim snam bu cig la zhe sprul bcu drug/de'i phyi rim snam bu cig la sman gyi lha mo sum cu rtsa gnyis//de'i phyi rim snam bu la bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid kyi
186b1(rgyud): sku bsil dpag bsam gyi shi bzhin//de'i rtsa ba na sman bdud rtsi lhag ma re re/gsen+da gyi me tog gzhon nu re ro/bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing bdud rtsi bum pa thogs nas/
186b2(rgyud): sku khrus mdzad pa re re/de'i phyi rim snam bu la dbang phyug ma les las grub pa/mgo brnyan ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad dgrod/yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dgod
186b3(rgyud): pa'i don bzung zhing bka' stsal pa/dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nyid du//bcom ldan 'das tshe mchog he ru ka/dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig la//phyag ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis//zhabs
186b4(rgyud): brkyang lha chen po mo mnan//glang chen ko rlon gosu gyon//zhing chen g.yang gzhi ye bskor//sbrul nag chun pos dbu la brgyan//thod pa rlon pasA se ral kha/stag
186b5(rgyud): lpags mgo chen sham thabs can//khrag dang zhag gi tshom bur bcas//bde gshegs rig so bzhi he ru ka/khyung mchog ma he gzigs dang stag/mi 'jigs sems can
186b6(rgyud): bzhi yi khri//smug nag sngo nag srer nag dang //dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs//dbu gsum phyag drug skabs bzhir bgrad//cha lugs mgo bo yab dang 'thun//
186b7(rgyud): dbus kyi dbu gyen du lta ba'i zhal gyi nang du rdo rje bdug nas gnyi su med pa'i sbyor ba tshul bzhin du mdzad cing bzhug so//rigs kyi yum kun gtso yab dang 'thun/ye shes las
187a1(rgyud): grub pa'i rdo rje thogs med dang /khro bo rdo rje mdung dang khro bo rdo rje mo dpal dang /khro bo rdo rje mdo' bstug dang /khro bo rdo rje phur bu dang / bo rdo rje tho ba dang /
187a2(rgyud): rnon po dang / badz+ra NA~M ma kr-i nga/ bar rje zhegs da /zla badz+re dza~M ga d+has 'dzin pa dang /hU~M ba rdo rjeg su 'a ni da/
187a3(rgyud): rdo rje ral pa gcig dang /khro bo rdo rje ye shes dang /khro bo rdo rje lcags sgrog dang /khro bo rdo rje rgya grAm 'dzin dang /khro mo rdo rje pad+ma b+h+ri ku Ti dang /khro mo rdo rje ral gcig ma dang /
187a4(rgyud): khro mo rdo rje rtse mo dang //khro mo 'jig su rung ma dang /khro mo mi thub rdo rjes 'dul ba dang /khro mo bkra shis ma dang /khro mo dpal ldan mi dang /khro mo pad+ma'i phreng thogs ma dang /khro/
187a5(rgyud): mo nor bdag ma dang /khro mo grags ma dang /khro mo grags chen mo dang /khro mo rin 'od ldan ma dang /khro mo pad+ma'i spyan mnga' ma dang /khro mo zas sbyin ma dang /khro mo bdud rtsi
187a6(rgyud): 'khyim ma dang /khro mo rdo rje dur khrod ma dang /sku mdog gcig tu ma nges te/sna tshogs cir yang 'gyur ba'o//sprul pa'i khro bo 'di dag kyang sku mdog sna tshogasu 'gyur
187a7(rgyud): ba'o//khro bo hUM ka ra dang /khro bo rnam par rgyal ba dang /bro bo nI la tan tra dang /khro bo ya man ta ka dang /khro bo mi g.yo mgon po dang /khro bo ha ya 'bri ba dang //khro
187b1(rgyud): po To ka rA dza dang /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang /khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang /khro bo ma hA ba la dang /khro bo bsdud kyi rgyal po dang /khro bo zla ba'i gtso bo dang /khru dza/
187b2(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur dang /khro bo gom po 'dor ba dang /khro bo gnod sbyin rdo rje dang /khro bo las thams cad dang /khro mo sprul pa'i 'phra rmen ma dang /rdo rje ke'u ri dang /rdo rje rtse'u ri dang /
187b3(rgyud): rdo rje pre ma haM dang /rdo rje pe tA li dang /rdo rje puk+ka si dang /rdo rje gasmr-i ri dang /rdo rje sma sha nI dang /rdo rje tsan d+ha li dang /rdo rje sing ha mu kA dang /rdo rje b+he kri mu ka dang /rdo rje sr-i mu kA dang /
187b4(rgyud): rdo rje prA nA mu ka dang /rdo rje k+Shi ta mu ka dang /rdo rje kaM ka mu ka dang //rdo rje khA kA mu ka dang /rdo NAM u lu kA mu ka dang /'di rnams sku mdog cig tu ma nges//'di kun zhing snrel mo'i khri li/
187b5(rgyud): bzhug so//bdud rtsi lha mo de rnams kyang /phyag mtshan rdo rje bum pa 'dzin/sku mdog dmar po pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs so//bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri nyi zla brtsegs
187b6(rgyud): pa'i gdan la sku lus glang po che'i cha byad du sprul nas mdzad/yang sprul chen mo song ge lham dral dang /stag l+h+wam dral dang /wa l+h+wam dril dang /spyang mo lcam dral dang
187b7(rgyud): bya rgod lham dral dang /kang ka lcam bral dang /bya rog lcam dral dang /'ug pa lcam dral dang /'di dag kun gyi ye shes sprul pa'o//pha bang lcam drol dang /zer mo lcam
188a1(rgyud): dral dang /bo rog lham dral dang /sgra ka l+h+wam dral dang /khA tra lcam dral dang /byi la lcam dral dang /spre'u lham dral dang /khyi lcam dral dang /sprul pa
188a2(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad do//las grub pa dbang phyug ma/byo mi'i srin mo dmar ser shing chen tri shu g.yag mgo ma/tshangs pa'i dmar skye ba na dmar rtsi lnga
188a3(rgyud): sprul mgo ma/khro bo khyab 'jug 'byung sdig snying 'dren gzig gi mgo/khyab 'jug dkar dmar du dmar byo nag sre mi mgo/gzhon nu ser mo rdo rje pha bang mgo/dbang mo dmar
188a4(rgyud): skye bam chen khro chen dred kyi mgo/dmar po dung dmar rgyu zhags dmar mo dem gyi mgo/bdud rtsi sngon mo rin chen chu srin mgo/zhi ba sngo skye bam chen snying 'byen stag gi
188a5(rgyud): mgo/be con nag mo bam chen thong rlon khra yi mgo/sring mo nag mo bam chen rgyu zhags wa yi mgo/za byed nag mo bam chen bsnying 'byin stag gi mgo/dga' byed nag
188a6(rgyud): mo khong chen bgegs rgyal bya rgod mgo/khrag 'thung dmar pa rdo rje dbyug dung dmar rta'i mgo/gcig pu dkar dmar na mkha' lding gi mgo/yid 'phrog dmar ser bzhis
188a7(rgyud): bsdus byi za khyi yi mgo/grub ma dkar dmar sad ma byi za pu shud mgo/rlung mo dmar ser ro za dz+ra sha bI mgo/gsod byed skyel ljang bam chen rde'u chung skye ka'i mgo/
188b1(rgyud): me mo dmar ser mo sreg rgyu 'dren sbyin gyi mgo/phag mo ljang nag rtse sbyin rlon dmar phag gi mgo/dmar mo ljang sngon bdud rtsi'i khrag thu /pra yi mgo/sna tshon ljang nag pa mtshon
188b2(rgyud): longs spyod pa lang mgo/grub mo ljang sar 'dud rtsi bane da mar sgrol gyi mgo/phag mo lcags kyu phu tra rdo rje khu byug mgo/re ni ser mo rgyu zhags ri yi mgo/bum sna dam
188b3(rgyud): mo lcags sgro ga kun 'joms seng ge'i mgo/gsus 'dzin ser mi bdud rtsi dril chen gzig gi mgo/sems can thams cad mchog dge dang //dgyes pa thams cad rab
188b4(rgyud): bsgrub phyir//nga yi de nyid gsung gis ni//dkyil 'khor de nyid bstan pa yin//sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po//gang gis chud pas rdzogs sangs rgyas//sems can
188b5(rgyud): mchog gi ston byed na//de nyid sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub//de nas bcom ldan gcig 'dus nas//rab tu spro ba'i spyan gdengs nas//zhabs dang zhabs kyis gnon//
188b6(rgyud): pa yis//sdud cing 'dor ba 'jug par mdzad//g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyi//brjed pa'i rtse mo mtha' nas dgrol//cung zad zur gyis gnon pa yis//madz+dza/
188b7(rgyud): pa'i spyi gtsug rnam sbyar ba'i//spyan gyi phyag rgyas phyag mdzad pa'i//'gro la phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur//dpa' bo rdo rje sems dpa' la//bskul ba'i dbyangs kyis
189a1(rgyud): rab tu bskul//gsang ba dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor du//shin tu da/sa cha dang dag/sangs rgyas kun gyi bde can go//mchog tu dkyus na
189a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du//bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol//rnam pa kun tu skye med rol cing chud mdzad pa//bdag cig gzugs dang bcas te rnam spyod 'gyur
189a3(rgyud): mod pa'i//bde mchog byang chub sems dpa' ni//rnam pa kun tu sdug bsngal yongs bral te//che ba'i ye shes lhun grub mchog drung ldan//bdi spyod de se mo pa
189a4(rgyud): tshul bzhin mdzad//rdo rje glu ni blangs pa yis//shin tu srid pa de myi ngan 'das//dge chen de bzhin gshegs pa rnams//dkyil le bIr 'di la byin gyis brla/
189a5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa dang bcas pas spyan ud pa la kha bye ba bzhin tri mang+ga sku rnam par bsgyur ba/glog dang chu rlabasu gyur pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
189a6(rgyud): rdo rje las de kho na nyid 'di gsung so zhes dkyil 'khor zhes ni rab tu bya//ye shes rdo rje thugs la ga nas//dkyil 'khor rdo rje mchog nyid do//nyid kyi sbyar ba btags
189a7(rgyud): pa yin//rdo rje dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor du//'od zer dkar po phreng bab mdzes//byang chub sems dpa' 'dra ba'o//rdo rje dpa' bo dkyis 'khor du//zla ba kau ma mdzes
189b1(rgyud): pa yi//'thing kA 'bar ba kun rgyas pa//me la rlung gis bus pa bzhin//dgyes pa'i mchag ni rab bsgrubs pa'i//rin chen rdo rje dkyil 'khor ni//dga' bar byed pa'i

189b4(rgyud): sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i//dkyil 'khor rnams ni brtag bya ste//rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yi saso//ci ltar de nyid sprul pa yin//de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi
189b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas rdo rje brjid pa'i gang mdzad cing glu dang /sil snyen dang /gling bu dang /pi wang dang /rdza rnga dang /du na wa dang /pa na wa dang /pa la ki dang /
189b6(rgyud): zhi ba'i thal mos sogs pa kun tu gdungs pa dang /sil snyan la sogs pa rol pas lcing ro dang /ro'i zas dang /bza' ba dang bca' ba dang /btung ba dang /theg
189b7(rgyud): pa dang /snyan pa dang /gos dang /bldag pa dang /'jib paM dang /'jam pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bstabs nas gus pa dang bcas
190a1(rgyud): pas 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan gdangs te/dbyangs 'dis bstod pa mdzad//byams pas kun tu gzigs pas thugs rje'i spyan//grol bar

190a4(rgyud): dgyes pa drongs la man bas shing rol mo mdzad//bde ba mnubs shing dbyings nas bslad pa'i phyir//skye 'gag med pa'i tshul du rnam par ldan//snying rjes rgyun bcwa
190a5(rgyud): bde ba chen po ston//chos nyid bde ba chen pos na mkha' bzhin//bde ba mchog gi ngang las sprul pa'i lha mo kye//rol pas gdul ba'i tshogs la stsal bar mdzod
190a6(rgyud): bde la bsnams shing bde la mnos hUM//bde mchog char pa rab tu dbab par gsol//dbyings las bde gshegs slob ma gzung du gsol//ci ltar bzhugs pa'i
190a7(rgyud): gan su bzhug su gsol//ngo mtshar byang chub tshe 'di bde ba thob//pha rol phyin drug gang la mi brten par//mi skye mya ngan 'das pa'i gzugs dang rnam par ldan//
190b1(rgyud): bde ba chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa yis//rmongs pa'i bde bas 'gro la snying rje che//byang chub sems kyi dgyes mchog mi chags pa'i//glu 'dri dag ni blangs pa yis/yid dang /
190b2(rgyud): 'thad pa'i bde chen po//dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i dbyangs kyis
190b3(rgyud): bstod pa/pad+ma dang 'dra ba'i spyan gi nyes kyis kun tu gzigs shing /'dzum pa dang /bcas pas zhal rgyas par gyur nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul 'phran gyis cho ga 'jig
190b4(rgyud): rten gyi khams mang po bskal par rgyas pa'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho chen po snyed ma lus lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /rdo rje dang /nor bu dang /rin po che dang /pad+mo dang /
190b5(rgyud): las kyi rigs las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /rdo rje 'dzin dang /rin chen 'dzin dang /chos 'dzin dang sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang /rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs
190b6(rgyud): dang /thugs las byung ba dang /mtshon dang /dga' ba dang /sgeg mo la sogs pa rnal 'byor g.yog gi tshogs tshad med par byed par 'dren pa dang /'gug par byed pa
190b7(rgyud): dang /'jig par byed pa la sogs pa'i na mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang /grags pa med pa'i tshogs dang /rdo rje 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs dang /gzhan yang phyi rol gyi
191a1(rgyud): rdo rje dang /rin tshon pad+ma dang /las k+Shi rigs las byung ba'i rnal 'byor pa dang /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang /na mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams
191a2(rgyud): la rnam par gyur pa dang /bcas pa kun tu gzigs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad mA dang /kun tu gnon pa dang /chags kyi sa 'debs pa dang /phyag na gAr mdzad ma dang /'gyid/
191a3(rgyud): pa dang /kun tu rnam par 'dor ba'i gnon pas/'khoraro gyi dkyil 'khor la byin gyis brlabs nas dgyes pa'i gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po
191a4(rgyud): nyikyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las gsungs pa de nyid bdag nyid mnyam gzhag dang /de bzhin lha'i de bzhin nyid dang /sngags dang phyag rgya de bzhin nyid//dkyil
191a5(rgyud): 'khor gyi ni mchog tu 'gyur//yan lag thams cad pas ma las 'das//yod med gnyis las mi gnas pa//'dren dang tshig las yang drag 'das//'di
191a6(rgyud): ni dkyil 'khor mchog ces bya'o//chos min chos ni rnam dpyod pas//chos rnams thams cad brtags par bya//rnam dag na mkha' 'dra ba yi//dkyil 'khor
191a7(rgyud): 'di ni bstan pa yin//'dod chags mi chags 'dod chags mnyam//chu yi pad+mo dmar ba 'dra//rang sems 'dod chags shin tu chags//'di ni dkyil 'khor
191b1(rgyud): nun pa na//gzugs med gzugs ni dri med pa'o//khams gsum las ni 'jug byed du'o//sems ni chu nyid dang ba bzhin//dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o//de/sa de danan
191b2(rgyud): bshegs pa thams cad g.yog dang bcas/pho nya dang /pho nya mo dang /na mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang /yang bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po bzhed sran sra 'di
191b3(rgyud): skad ces gsol to//kye ma rab dgyes dpa' ba mchog/kye ma rab bgegs phyogs bsgyur ba//rnal 'byor chen po tshogs mchog ni//gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsung

191b5(rgyud): kyis sbyor ba gang mdzad pa//rnam grangs sems kyi 'jig rten du//bde chen dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs//de nas bcom ldan 'das la//thams cad gar dang bcas
191b6(rgyud): pa'i phyog/sor mo 'dab ma kun tu 'brel//rdo rje thul mo gar rnams bsgyur//brjid dpag dag tu rab tu bcas//grol zhing ma chu tshems kyis mnan//chu skyes 'dab ma bzhin//
191b7(rgyud): du gzigs pas bshad//dbyangs len pa dang gcig le gcig bsku rol dang //snang zhing kun tu ma chags par//chags med bde ba mchog gis ni//bde ba'i rnal
192a1(rgyud): gzungs kyis rnams//stobs shing bde ba sbyin mdzad pa//na mkha'o rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab ste//stobs shing zhongs te grub par mdzad//
192a2(rgyud): pas rab tu mi gos pa'i//bde ba rig cing dgongasu gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po dgyes pa chen pos bskul bas thugs sred par gyur te//
192a3(rgyud): shin tu dgyes nas rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du shin tu dgyes pa'i
192a4(rgyud): rdo rje dbyangs kyis mgur len cing /rdo rje rnam par rol pa yis bcom ldan 'das dgyes bzhad pas bzhad cing /nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gsang ba'i thugs
192a5(rgyud): ka nas mA hA su ka hUM zhes brjod/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag mo ye shes kyi dbyings dbang phyug ma 'di phyung ngo //zla gam steng du ldan pa yi//yi
192a6(rgyud): shes gnyis po me lta bu//thig lde mtshan du ldan byas nas//gsal ba ye shes rnal 'byor ma//A li kA li 'dren byas ma//ri mo dbusu brtag byas te//de yi
192a7(rgyud): mgo dang mjug nyid du//khro bo gnyis po mchoge bos bya//'di ni btsun mo rab gsang ba'o//rdo rje dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor ma'i//dran pa tsam gyis 'di dag kyang //
192b1(rgyud): bsod nams kun gyi byin brlabs 'gyur//A lI gnyis dbus ri mo bri//'dren pa yang dag ldan pa ste//steng du zla gama? thig ler dga'//mgon mjug tu yang gzhan
192b2(rgyud): yang dri//'di ni gsal ba'i don dam ste//rnal 'byor rin chen dbang bskur sbyin//bstan pas bsod nams tho ba 'gyur te//sdig pa rnams kyang 'jig par byed//A li gnyis
192b3(rgyud): dang ldan bya ste//tsheg drag yi ge gnyisu bshad//'di ni rab 'gal kun tu chags//chu srin ma zhes bstan pa yin//dang po bskal pa chen po yi//tsheg drag po dang bcas par
192b4(rgyud): bzhag/sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed//bdag nyid la ma bzhag yang rung //phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste//bsgrub bya dkyil 'khor sgrub byed na//dngos grub myur du thob
192b5(rgyud): par 'gyur//dkyil 'khor dam po rnams kyi mchog/ye shes phyag rgya mngon gnas pa'i//'jim pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba'i//bris pa yis kyang khyab par 'gyur//e
192b6(rgyud): ma'o bde ba ye shes che//'di ni ye shes tshig cig 'di la//gnod byed pa ni bsten byed cing //'di yi tshul gyis thob par 'gyur//khams gsum mchog gi dkyil 'khor
192b7(rgyud): 'dir //'di las rgya chen gzhan med do//sgrub pa po dang sems can kun//tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grug//che mchog he ru ka gsang ba 'di bcom ldan 'das dam tshig gi
193a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyi gsang ba chen mo rnal 'byor ma dbang phyugs
193a2(rgyud): chen mo rnams kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste dang po'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngo mtshar du gyur te/dgyes pa'i
193a3(rgyud): yid ches pa dang /mgu ba dang /yid dga' ba skyes nas shin tu rgyas pa chen po rdo rje bzhud pas mdzad cing /yang he ru ka'i sku mdog ni sna tshogs pa'o//bcom ldan 'dra
193a4(rgyud): che mchog he ru ka zhags brgyad phyag mtshan sna tshogs pa'o//de las spros nas phyag stong spyan stong gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsam
193a5(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa na/shin tu mi srun pas gdung ba nga rgyal che zhing dregs phye can thams cad la badz+ra dza l-i'i sgra sna tshogs 'odra zer du gyur te/de las spros pas rigs
193a6(rgyud): bzhi he ru ka dregs pa can thams cad tshar gcod pa'i phyir rak+Sha he ru ka nyon mongs pa'i dug gsum dbang du sdud cing 'joms pa'i phyir rak+Sha he ru ka/ye shes don dang ldan
193a7(rgyud): pa'i phyir byi sha he ru ka/dam tshig las mi 'da' ba'i phyir se ma ya he ru ka/de las 'phrogs pas he ru ka stong rtsa brgyad/sgo mdog dang phyag mtshan cir yang spre

199b6(rgyud): zhes brjod pas bdud gshin d+d+he'i lhag nas che 'phrogs te/gshin rje yang rgyal zhing bsdangs nas bsgral zhing rdo rje khrag 'dzud chen pos snying khraga'athungs te//

200a2(rgyud): da nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas tshe'i las gsungaso//dbang phyug gtso dang rigs kyi yum//yang dag gsong ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/bde ba chen
200a3(rgyud): pos yongs brgyan te/dkyil 'khor rdzogs par phun sum ldan//rdo rje sems gtso mnyes mdzad pa//gnas 'dir brtse phyir gshegasu gsol//AM e h+ye hi
