200a5(rgyud): mnyam sbyar ba'i//phyag rgya chun por bdag sbyor cig/oM badz+ra sA ma ya oM//oM badz+ra sa ma ya iM/hU~M badz+ri sa ma ya hUM/swA badz+ra sa ma ya sA/haM badz+ra sa ma ya
200a6(rgyud): haM/la so la bzhugs pa/oM shar gyi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni//rdo rje lha mo dkur mo lcags kyu rje//tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/dkar mo zhi
200a7(rgyud): byed mgyogs ma 'ad 'bro can//tshe la gnod cing 'gal byad kun bsgral nas//tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du bsdu//bruM badz+ra A yu badz+ra aM gu sha dza dza dza/lho//
200b1(rgyud): phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni//sor mu yod bzhin glog phrong 'dzin//phyug na rin chen sbrul gyi zhags pa snams//tshul gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas//tshe dang ya
200b2(rgyud): shis ma lus dbang du sdud//nub kyi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma//dmor mo bkra gsal dbang sdud ma//phyag na chu srin rgyal mtshan bsnams//chel gnod cing 'gal
200b3(rgyud): byed kun bsgral nas//tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud//byang gi phyogs na 'gugs pa ni//nag mo mig gcig ral pa can//dung gi tshe mas la lcags kyi spu//
200b4(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje rgya gram bsnams//tshel gnod cing 'gral byed kun bsgral nas//tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyings kyi dbang phyug
200b5(rgyud): mo rnams bskul ba/dbyings phyug mkha' lding pad+ma'i dbyings//phyag rgya bde mchog dbyings kyi yum//ye shes sprul pa'i phyag rgya ma//dbyingasu mkha' la tshe dang gzi
200b6(rgyud): brjid drongs//badz+ra aM gu shu hUM dzaM/stong gsum dbyings la tshe yi mnga' rnyes pa//khams gsum ma lus dbang sdud ma//zhing la rngam zhing brkam stobs can//stong
200b7(rgyud): gsum dbyings nas tshe dragazi brjo dang//dbyings mo dkar dang rkun mo gnyis med tshogs//bde chen rmongs byed thal byed ma//gtu mo dbyingasu sbrel mdzad snying
201a1(rgyud): /'byin dpal chen rgyal po dgyes pa'i khor//dung phreng chen mang 'khor dang btsos//tshul gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas//dbyingasu mkha' la tshe dang gzu
201a2(rgyud): brjod drongs//log par lta byed bdud dpung 'dul mdzad ma//'dod khams ma dang gnyis medadra rol pa'i sras//dbang phyug phra med 'bar ba'i tshogs//tshe la gnod
201a3(rgyud): cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas//ga shIni rje lag nas tshe dang gzi brjid drongs//shar gyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni//tshe'i lha mo lcags kyu ma//phyag na
201a4(rgyud): shel gyi bum pa bsnams//tshe la gnod cing 'grel byed kun bsgrol bar byed//lho yi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni//tshe yi lha mo zhags pa ma//phyag na 'a
201a5(rgyud): shing bum pa bsnamis//tshwa la gnod cing 'gal byed 'tshong bar byed//nub kyi phyogs nas 'gug pa ni//tshe yi lha mo lcags sgrog ma//phyag na zangs kyi bum
201a6(rgyud): pa bsnams//tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed sdom par byed//byang gi phyogs nAs 'gugs pa ni//tshe yi lha mo dril bu ma//phyag ne ga yu yi bum pa bsnams//
201a7(rgyud): tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed dbang du sdud//steng gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni//tshe yi lha mo dbyings phyug ma//phyag na dngul gyi bum pa bsnams//tshal
201b1(rgyud): gnod pang 'gal byed dbang du snad//'og go phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni//NA yi lA mau brtan ldan ma//phyug na gsor gyi bum pa bsnams/tshalnga gnod cing 'gal
201b2(rgyud): byed ma lus dbang du sdud //oM b+h+rUM badz+ra A yu~M yud te rAd ni mr-i taM/d+ham yu ti/kara~M m+b+ha yu tI/bruM dwedz+haiM U mu ne b+h+rUM a/de nas dngos grub zung ba ni//dpal ldan sas
201b3(rgyud): rgyus kun 'chang ba/rdo rje mi phyed gsum dang ldan//dang bdag sangs rgyas sku 'dzin po'i//byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas mdzod cig/oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya
201b4(rgyud): bong+ga sta~M b+hA ba skad mako&haM/dpal ldan rdo rje gsung 'chang ba//rdo rje mi phyed gisum dang ldan//dang bdag sangs rgyas kun 'chang ba//byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad
201b5(rgyud): du gsolnga//oM sarba ta thA ga ta thAg badz+rI sa b+hA ba Ad mako&haM/dpal sngon rdo rje thugs 'tsheng ba//rdo rje ma phyed gsum dang ldan//ding bdag sangs rgyas thugs kyi
201b6(rgyud): pu//byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsal//oM sarba ta thA ga tartsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad+ya mako&tsaM//de ma tshig nyams pa thams cad spangs par gyur cog/lta ba
201b7(rgyud): yon pa thams cad srings par gyur cig/cho ga nyams pa thams cad rdzogs par gyur cin/tshe sku gsungs thugs kyi skye shi med pa'i dngos grub thob par gyur cig/
202a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sku gsung thugs sprul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting ngo 'dzin du bzhug so//dkyi
202a2(rgyud): 'khor 'dom gang gu bzhi la/ma hA re ga ti'i mgo la yon gyis byugs la//dbus su badz+ra hi ru ka/yu ma kI ti shwa ri/'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/shir du badz+ra
202a3(rgyud): he ru ka/lhor rad na he ru ka/nub tu pad+ma he ru ka/byang du karma he ru kA/sku mdog phyag mtshan rgyud gzhan dang 'thun//de'i phyi ri ma snam bu cig la phra me na ma bcu
202a4(rgyud): drug/de'i phyi rim sgo bzhi las dkyil 'khor 'dom gang bruM bzhi la dri chen gyis mon Dal byug sa la dbus su yak+Sha he ru ka/dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad/zhabs brgyad/
202a5(rgyud): gsheg pa rdo rjes bsnams pa/de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la//shar du badz+ra he ru ka/lhor yak+Sha he ru ka/nub tu byi sha he ru kau/byang du sa ma ya he ru kA/
202a6(rgyud): mtshams bzhir khro mo dbang phyug ma yum bzhi bzhugs//gdan zhing bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugaso//de'i phyi rumI snam bu la phra men dang khro bo pheM bcu ma bcu dgod cing
202a7(rgyud): bzhug so//sgo bzhir lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhi dgod do//khro bo chen po nI la tan tra dbus su bri/de'i phyi rim pad+ma mdab ma brgyad la sprul pa'i khro bo shugs
202b1(rgyud): na dang /'jig su rung ba dang /rdo rje grags pa dang /rdo rje rgyu 'phrul dang /rdo rje gsus pa che dang /rdo rje gad mo dang /glang rkyongs can dang /'di rnams go rims bzhin
202b2(rgyud): bri/sgo bzhi gzhan dang 'thun/dkyil 'khor 'dom gang grub ni la/rnam par rgyal ba dbus su zla//pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la/shar du rdo rje brags chen/lhor khro bo gang
202b3(rgyud): mi can/nub tu khro bo he he/grags chen dang /byang du rdo rje bgegs gnon pa'i rgyal po bri/de'i phyir ma sgo rnams bri/dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/dbusu gshin
202b4(rgyud): rje gshed pa bri/phye rim pad+ma med pa ma brgyad la phra min me seng ha la sogs pa brgyad bri/sgo bzhi dgod dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi lnga/khro bo mi g.yo mgon pa dbus
202b5(rgyud): su bri/de'i phyir ma 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi lo khro bo 'gyings pa dang /khro bo glang po rje dang /khro bo ko brlon pa dang /khro bo mig mi bzung ba bzhi rims bzhin du bri'o//phyi
202b6(rgyud): sgo rnams dgod do//dkyil 'khor mdom gang gru bzhi la dbus su ha ya 'gri ba bri/pad+ma 'deb ma brgyad pa la/ke'u ri ma brgyad bri//phyi rim sgro snum dgod/dkyil la
202b7(rgyud): mdom gang gru bzhi la Ta kI ra ta dbusu dgod/phyir ma man Dal brgyad pa la khro bo bde ba dang /so'i phreng ba dang /dung chen dang /khu tshung dang /ga yab mo dang /dga' ba/
203a1(rgyud): dang /'degs pa dang /hU~M chen dang ni 'di rnams bre/sgo snum dgad/dkyil 'khor mdom gang gru bzhi la dbus su bdud rtsi 'khyil pa/'khod na
203a2(rgyud): rtsibs bzhi la/shar du rdo rje spu can dang /zings kyi grwa sh+log pa can dang /lcags kyi mche ba can dang /spu gri so can dgod//dkyil 'khor mdom gang gru bzhi la/
203a3(rgyud): khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dbus su dgod/de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la stag gi mgo can dang /g.yag gi mgo can dang /sha bA'i mgo can dang /byi la'i
203a4(rgyud): mgo can rnams//sgo bzhi rims bzhin du dgad do//dkyil 'khor mdom gang gru bzhi la khro bo hU~M ka ra dbusu dgod do//'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la spyang khu'i mgo can//
203a5(rgyud): wa'i mug can+da dang /dom gyi mgo can dang /dred kyi mgo can rnams dgod do//sgo bzhi dgod/dkyil 'khor mad ma gang gru bzhi la stobs po che dbu suM dgad/'khor
203a6(rgyud): lo rtsibs bzhi la//shar du rdo rje gdengs mo//lhor ni rdo rje sder mo/nub tu dur khrod bdag ma/byung du rdo rje gtum khung rnams rims bzhin du dgod do//de nas bcom
203a7(rgyud): ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems pa khro ba de rnams kyi las kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs//dbus kyi khrag 'thung chen po ni/dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad te
203b1(rgyud): gshog pa rdo rje gtams pa dengs/zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad du bstan//de'i 'khor gyi khro mo ni/phyag kyang srin po ltar mthun to//zhabs kyang de dang 'dra bar bstan//shad
203b2(rgyud): gyi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni//khro bo rnam par rgyal ba s+ho//skye mdag dkar la 'od zer 'phro//dbu gsum phyag drug gi shig pa can//zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na//
203b3(rgyud): dri za bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs//'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshu lo//shar lho mtshams na bzhugs pa ni//khro bo dbyug pa sngon po can//sku mdog sngo la 'od zer 'phro//
203b4(rgyud): dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can//zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na//me lha bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs//'jig rten skong pa 'dul tshul lo//lho yi phyogs na bzhan
203b5(rgyud): pa ni//ya mno ta ka gshin rje gshed//sku mdog sngo la 'od zer 'phro//dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can//zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na//ma te bsnol ba'i khri la
203b6(rgyud): bzhugs//'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo//lho nub mtshams na bzhugs pa ni//khro bo me g.yo mgon po ni//sku mdog sngo la 'od zer 'phro//dbu gsum phyag drug
203b7(rgyud): gsheg pa can//zhabos drug rdo rje brag stengs ni//bden bral bsnol ba'i khre la bzhugs//'jig rten skyong ba 'du la chu'o//nub kyi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni//ha ya 'dra
204a1(rgyud): brta mchog dbang //sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'dro//dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa n+dan//zhabs drug rdo rje brag sbyongs na//klu bdag
204a2(rgyud): bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs//'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshu lo//nub byang mtsham sngan bzhugs pa ni/khro bo Ta k+Shi ra dzA ste//sku mdog dud ka 'od zer 'phro//dbu gsuM
204a3(rgyud): phyag drug gA sh+lo ga pA tsa na//zhabs drug rdo rje brag stongs na//rlung lho bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs//'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshwalo//byang gi phyogs ni bzhugs
204a4(rgyud): doni//khro blo bdud rtsi 'khyil bA ste//sku mdog ljang khu 'od zer 'phro//dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa tsan//zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na//gnod sbyin
204a5(rgyud): bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs//'jig rten skyong ba 'dul chu'o//byang shar mchims na bzhug snga pa ni//khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal//sku mdog ltung
204a6(rgyud): skya 'od zer 'phro//dbu gsum phyag drug gau shog pa can//zhabs drug rdo rje brag skyengs ni//byi na ya ka yi khri la bzhugs//'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul//
204a7(rgyud): stong gi phyogs ni bzhugs po ni//khro be hUM mdzad hUM ka ra//sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'phro//dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can//zhabs drug rdo rje drag stong
204b1(rgyud): na//nyi zla gza' skar khri la bzhugs//'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshu la//'og gi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni//ma hA ba lA stobs po chu//sku mdog gnag la 'od zer 'dro//
204b2(rgyud): dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can//zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na//sa bodag bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs//'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshulo//de nas bcom
204b3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi ba~M ya mAn ta ka'i ting 'dzin du bzhugs nas 'di skad ces bsku'o//bdud mu tra nag po 'dul bar mdzad//hUM gtum chen rab 'jam 'jig rten
204b4(rgyud): 'joms mdzad la//nyi ma 'bum pas lhag pa'i 'di ldan khyod//phyag cha mang po bskal pa'i me bzhin 'bar//rab 'bar gashrIn rjegashed la phyag 'tshal lo//
204b5(rgyud): rdo rje su la klu dbang rab brgyun cing //gtsan+da zan gdug pa'i rdzogs rlon mU la brgyan//rgyung bskum tshul gyis ra 'jigs glu shrIn rje gnon//zhing chen lhag 'jag
204b6(rgyud): thod rgyun sku lnga brgyan//mi zad rgyal po gdong drug hU~M sgyu can+da//phaT kyi sgra khams gsum sngogs mdzad zhabs drug po//sha za'i mgu bcad dbu yi rgyun du thogs//spyan
204b7(rgyud): bzlog tsam gyis thog 'bebs me ltar 'phro//ljags 'dril tshems kyi gseb nas thog 'bebs shing //ma mo rnams kyang sgren mor 'dar zhing 'bros//stong gsum
205a1(rgyud): med par mdzad pa'i zhal gdangs la//tshangs pa'i 'khor bcas khrags gi thigs 'jog cing //nad gtong srin mo'i tshogs rnams 'dar zhing 'dros
205a2(rgyud): na sgra gtogs pa lha chen khyab 'jug kyang //'bum 'gyel bcas par khrag skyug nyid la 'dud//phyag na me thod rlon pa bsnams pa ni//dngos grub phyag gris
205a3(rgyud): klad khrag zhal du stob//tshangs pa'i mgo bcad dgu yi rgyan du byas//zheng chen mgo nas che mche ma za bar byed//rgyu phreng khrag dang bcas par thogs na swa ni//
205a4(rgyud): khyod mthong tsam gyis rab 'jigs nyid la 'dud//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang //sbrel pa'i khye'u bzangs dbu gsum phyag drug
205a5(rgyud): pa brgya rtsa brgyad byung nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis me tog gter bka' nod pa'i tshul du gong de bzhugs pa de la/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
205a6(rgyud): sems dpas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dgung la thig thog mi zad pa//khye'u chung sngon mo mkha' la ldeng //ya man ta ka khro bo ste//sku yang che la bam lI
205a7(rgyud): bzang //sku mdog stangs zil btsag pa 'dra//phyag gnyis dang po kha T+wAM ga/bar na rdo rje dril bu bsnams//tha ma mda' dang gzhu bsnams te//'khor ni phra men
205b1(rgyud): brgyad kyis bskor//du nyid yon te bsdum pa bzang //skus bzangs pa yi dam tshig gis//dag la tshem tshem mi bzad pa//bsngags pa ral pa gcig ma yin//dam dzad/
205b2(rgyud): dus las mu 'di nig ces smra'o//rje bka' stsal pa bzhin du//las thams cad kyang grub par mdzad//de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa lnga kun tu bzang pos ma dang phra
205b3(rgyud): min ma'i ting 'dzin du zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsa lto//las bcol bar mdzad//k+Sho d+hI shwa ri dpal 'bar ma//khams gsum sri sa myanga' mdzad ma//mi
205b4(rgyud): gsod la drug la ba mai/ shan bya ste brI n+dan bA sa//ros rnam pa'i kha T+wAM ka/zung po ci mchog la ro lo//mthing kA ma rtog ston dpas kyi sum//rdo rje thugs kyi dbang phyug
205b5(rgyud): ma//ke'u ri mra yi mchod pas rol//gser gyi 'od 'phro mdang gzhu 'gings//rin chen sku yi dbang phyug ma//tsa'u ri ma yi mchod pas rol//phra mo chu sprin rgyal mtshan
205b6(rgyud): 'dzin//pad+ma'i gsung gi dbang phyug me//pra mo hA yi mchod pas ros//nag mo ral pa thaMd pus 'gyings//dkar ma lus kyi dbang phyug ma//pi tA li yi mchod pas rlom/
205b7(rgyud): gtum zhe sdang cu ni shin sdang mam po drug me/go sgra ri yi mchod pas rom//pad+ma 'joms pa'i char chen 'bebs//'dod chags 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma//phugs mi
206a1(rgyud): mchod pas rol//rin chen me lce glog phreng 'dzin//gti mugo 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma//smra sha nA yi mchod pas rol//las su dgra sta 'byar
206a2(rgyud): ba 'dzin//nga rgyal 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma//tsan d+ha li yaM mchod pas rol//sing nga gsod byed seng ge mgo/ro mchog za ba'i phra men ma//byi kri mgro gcod
206a3(rgyud): stag gi mgo/thod rlon za zla'i phra men ma//sri ka dur kun wa yi mgo/dung sbyi ma yi 'phra men ma//she na sha 'drad spyang mo mgo/sha chen ze ba'i phra min ma//kr-i ta khrag
206a4(rgyud): 'thung bya rgod mgo/khrag tshil ze ba'i phra men mA//kang ka ma ka dur byi'i mgo/dug gsum 'joms pa'i phra menA mo//kha kha rgyu 'dren pho rogra mgo/dgra bgegs
206a5(rgyud): 'dul ba'i phra men ma//hu lu tshe 'phrog 'ug pa'i mgo/glo snying za bo'i 'phra men ma//stag g.yag sha ba seng ge'i mgo/byi la spyang khu wa yi mgo/dom dred phrag
206a6(rgyud): gi mgo can rnams//thugs dam bzhin du las byos shig/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /chags pa med pa'i sbyor bas sku las 'khril cing las mthar phyin
206a7(rgyud): mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo ba rnams la bka' stsal pa/dza dza lcags kyu glo snying 'dren a mo sngon mo thod sprul zhags//e lo dmar mo lha gso sgrag
206b1(rgyud): snom byas ni ljad ku dri lA 'khrol dgyes//bka' stsal pa bzhin du nyan par mdzad do//bcom ldan 'das dngu lA kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las yas/
206b2(rgyud): kyi khro bo dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal lha mo sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te sU dang gsung dang thug
206b3(rgyud): rdo rje las phyung //rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor 'di phyung //gru ban pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs rnam po bac+doMs ni brgyan//dar drang dril bu chun po dang //nyi ma zla bas rnam
206b4(rgyud): per brgya ni//rin chen mu tig 'bras bus smras//de shal rkang gdung rnams tu phreng ba gos kyi brgyan//s+yAd bu bzhi dang ldan po ste//ka ba mchog brgyad
206b5(rgyud): yang dag ldan//dbusu dga' byed stenA la ni//dngul la sogs pas rnam par brgyan//sna tshogs pad+ma'i dar gyis g.yog sa//thams cad stan la de dag ces//dbus
206b6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' ni//stan do la ni bzhag par bya//tshad med pad+mo dmar 'dra ba//sna tshogs rgyun gyis rnam par klubs//yid bzhin nor bu dbu rgyun ldan//rin cheni
206b7(rgyud): gtsug ni rnam par mdzes//tshad med dang ni spyad pa yi//dbul chun pos mdzes par byas//sna tshogs ye shes rab tu gnas//chu skyes spyan ni rab tu rgyas//dga'
207a1(rgyud): yid tsam g.yon du 'dud//g.yas kyi phyag gos rdo rje tshe//snying kar gsor la rab tu brtsom//bede la sogs pa yon tAn ldan//thog ma nyid du rnam
207a2(rgyud): par gzhag/slob ma 'am yang na gzhan yang rung //mtshon kun gyis ni rnam brgyan la//tshul bzhin gyis brlabs bya ste//dbus kyi dkyil du bzhag par bya//bdag
207a3(rgyud): nyid kyang ni mnyam bzhag ste//de la sogs pa yon tan gtso//dbus kyi stan la 'dug pa ni//bdag ni rab dgyes rjesu smra//der ni slob ma byin brlabs te//thams
207a4(rgyud): cad las byed pun sum tshogs rdo rje pad+ma las byung ba'o//gsang ba yis kyang dbang bskur ro//rab dbyes la sogs yon tan ldan//yid 'ong bu mo btsal bya ste//snying ka
207a5(rgyud): mchogs ma mgrin spyi bor//lha rnams la sogs 'bru bsgoms te//mtshan ma phyag rgyar rab 'bar ba'i//rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba'i//rang la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis//
207a6(rgyud): tshul bzhin thams cad bzhag par bya//mdun du lha mo myos byed ma//ma mchu 'dzin pa'i rol dgyes//dkar dmar kha dog 'dres pa yi//thams cad rgyan dang yang dag
207a7(rgyud): ldan//lo ni bcu drug lon pa mchod//shes rab can gyi mdun du bzhag/ga ya su lha mo bsod byed ma//mtshon cha'i mda' ni 'dren par brtson//do shal rkang gdub dag
207b1(rgyud): gos brgyan//lo grangs nyi shu lon pa ste//gser sbyor go nu ba 'dra//chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam sngo//sems dpa' tshal mnyes mdzad cing //de yi tshul bzhin banag par
207b2(rgyud): bya//rgyud tu lha mo rmongs byed ma//pad+ma dmar po mdog gi 'di//chu srin rgyu la mtshan mdzes pa'o//sku yi tshad ni nyi shu gcig/dga' byed 'dod pa'i ro la dgyes//sna tsho/
207b3(rgyud): ni bza' yang dag gsol//sna chags rgyun gyis rnam par klubs//sna tshogs pad+mo sbyor lnga sogs//gar gyi bya ba rlab rlag bzhag/g.yon du sna tshogs chen po ste//sna
207b4(rgyud): tshogs dgos pa rjes brlabs pa//sku yi tshad ni bcu gnyis ldan//rnal 'byor lo ni shin tu brtson//lha dang lha min mi yi rnams//'gro ba thams cad myos mdzad
207b5(rgyud): ma//sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klu bAs//sna tshogs dra rA ni na bza' gsol//grwa rnams dag ni thams cad du//gzugs sgra dri re reg rnams dang //bdug pa me
207b6(rgyud): tog gsung ldang po//gzi brjid chen po'i 'od dang ldan//ci rigs par ni bzhag par bya//sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//rang gi las kyi phyag rgyar ldan//skal ldan
207b7(rgyud): 'ga' la rnam mos pa//sgo srungs bzhi ni bzhag par bya//gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs rnams//pi wang gleng bu brdab pa dang //rdza rnga rnga chen ku mu to//mu ra tsa dab
208a1(rgyud): dadang //grwar dang dbyangs dang bzhad pa tsho//ros mo byad sna tshogs rnams//dka' byed da U 'khor bzhag par bya//b+h+ya y-i dkyil 'khor bams cad
208a2(rgyud): de/dkyil 'khor b+hi ni phyi ral du//rdo rje rnam par 'gro ma bzhag/yi dgas phyag rgya yang dag zhan//dpa' bo 'jigs byed gzugs 'dzin te//skal ldan dang gI lag
208a3(rgyud): char ldan//gdug pa'i sems kyis bsdigs byed cing //sha khrag dang ni rgyu ma dang //rkang dang tshil du za spyod pa//dkyil 'khor byas te bdug pa ni//tshogs kyi dkyil
208a4(rgyud): lakhri re ga zhag par bya//dga' bar byed dang 'dron par byed//gsong bar b+h+r-i dang 'phrog par byed//rdo rje mkha 'gre tshogs ni rnams//shir gyi phyog su bzhag par bya//
208a5(rgyud): gzi brjid che dang 'bar byed ma//'joms byed bong bu m+b+hi ru ste//gtsug lag mthon pa'i rgyu mas ni//mkhas pas tshul bzhin gzhag par bya//tshigs chen po
208a6(rgyud): chags bral dang //'khor lo ma dang rgyas 'debs ma//rab tu 'byor pas 'byor byas te//ci rigs nub du bzhag par bya//sna tshogs lus dang srung ba dang //gnod
208a7(rgyud): sbyin mo dang yang dag 'phrog/sngags dang phyag rgya byin brlabs nas//sngags mkhan ci rigs byang du bzhag/shar gyi grwa ru bzhag pa ni//bya rog gi dang ni mig 'bru ste/
208b1(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i mig dang 'jigs pa'i gdong //ci ltar rjesu 'thun byas te//yi dgas stan la yang dag 'dug/sna tshogs mchog gi gadrong 'dzin to//lag par gri dang khar
208b2(rgyud): gzheng thogs//mchog tu sha dang khrag za ba'o//ru ba dang lho'i mtshams bzhag pa//bzhad dang 'ug pa'i gAdang ring ma//khros pa'i khri dang phag gi gdong //gsus po
208b3(rgyud): che la lto 'phyangs rnams//nub dang byang gi mtshams dag tu/rnga mo bong bu gdong 'dzin ma//khros par dang khyi yi gdong //rgyu me'i mgo nas sha bar byed//shar dang byang
208b4(rgyud): gi mtshams dag tu//keng rus dkor po 'dzin pa ste//khros pa rus pa'i phreng bas klubs//lto 'phyangs po la bum pa 'dzin//phan tshun 'thob par brtson pa yI//tso spyang
208b5(rgyud): gi ni 'khor gyi rnams//'jigs byad gdong ni mche ba 'dzin//rnam par bsgyur ba'i gzugs 'dzin ma//sgo rnams kun ni phyogs rnams kun//sgo bzhi rnams ni bzhi
208b6(rgyud): par bya//byang phyogasu ni 'bod 'grogs te//bum pa rnams ni shar nyid du//nub tu rnam par 'jig pa'o//lho ru ga shrin rje rgyalnga po bzhag/de dang gzhan yang rgyal po
208b7(rgyud): mchog/na mkhor 'gro bas kun tu bskor//de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' yum gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs//dgyes shing
209a1(rgyud): spyan no rgyas pa smos//thanongs nas das pa chen pa s+ho//brjod pa'i byug gis gar mdzad stong //gal sbyar rabs gtsug dang //banan /
209a2(rgyud): yis ni 'dud par byed //bskul ba yis ni dbyangs 'di yis//de dag gtsol mnyes par byed//kye ma spyod pa ngo mtshar rje//kau ma skyes pa mtshar /ma 'di byed
209a3(rgyud): yang dag 'byung //kye ma kun tu bzang po don//kye ma rab dgyes yang dag 'grogs//kye mo bde ba dga' ba che//kye ma bde ba bde mchog ste//kye ma sngags kyi yang de
209a4(rgyud): sbyor//sgyu ma snying po yang dge sbyor//kye ma phyag rgya yang dag bzhugs//kye ma bsgrub pa rmad 'byung ba'o//kye ma pha rol phyin pa yi sa//k+She ma ji ltar mther rigs pa//
209a5(rgyud): kyi ma dgos pa sna tshogs tshe//kye ma dag po gsum sbyar ba//kye mo rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba'i//kye mo pad+ma rnam phye ba//kye mo dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'i//kye mi mchog dang /
209a6(rgyud): mnyam sbyor ba'i//kye ma gar ni dgra' ba che//kye moM k+Sha rab dri ma med//kye mi stsol spyan rnam par 'khrol//kye ma gda' dang mun sel ba//kye ma dga' byed me tog
209a7(rgyud): kye ma mar me mun pa sil//kye madri ni shin tu bsil//kye ma rnal 'byor mnyam skyor bri/kye me skye ma na mkha' 'dra//kye ma sangs rgyas na mkha' 'dra//kye ma rin chen
209b1(rgyud): bode mchog spyod//ts+tsho ma sna tshogs sgyu ma mdzod//kye ma dro mtshar sangs rgyas dang //kye ma ngo mtshar dbang po rnams//kye ma dro mtshar sems dpa' che//kye ma ngo mtshar lha ma/
209b2(rgyud): rnams//shin tu dgyes tshe rdo rje lo//rgyal ba kun gyis bstod byas te//rdo rje sems dpa' 'gying ba yis//dga' dang bde byed skyes par 'gyur//chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum
209b3(rgyud): bcas pa//yangs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad de//spyan dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis//rab tu dgyes ldan smin mA bsgyur//yangs par spyan gyis gar mdzad de//spyan dang
209b4(rgyud): zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis//yid tsam mdzes pa'i spyan zur gzigs//sha rgyas bArla ni nu mar 'dud//rkang pa'i dro byas ni rnam par yongs//rnams kyi gos kyang che la
209b5(rgyud): mdzes//tshogs pa cung zad tshems kyis gnon//tshems kyi phreng ba kun da zla//mI drig zlos pa'i dbugs 'byin cing //rab tu dga' chen dgyes pas bstod//bud med
209b6(rgyud): gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba//lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la//byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas gsum gyis//dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam//de bzhin gshegs
209b7(rgyud): pa'i btsun mo mchog/spyan la sogs pa bsgom par bya//dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas//sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur//'od zer sna lngas khyab pa yis
210a1(rgyud): pad+mo rdo rje bsgom par bya//'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin du skar//yid du 'ong ba bsgom par bya//bzhin bzungs phan par 'dod pa yis//bud med rnyed na
210a2(rgyud): cho ga bzhin//bde bar mchod par brtsam par bya//ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis//dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya//sngags shes pas ni gnas
210a3(rgyud): bzhin du//bud med rtag tu bzhag par bya//rgyan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs//bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa//dben pa'i
210a4(rgyud): gnas su khyad par du//sgrub pa pos ni rtog tu bsgrub//mtshan nyid dag ni yongasu dag/rab tu bzang la bzhin yang mdzes//rgyan rnams thams cad yongasudz+reH/
210a5(rgyud): bang par bzhag nas rnam par bsgom//rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis//bu mo ud dpal 'thing ka'i mdog/'dra ba dag ni rtag tu bsgrub//sbyor ba'i cho ga de nyid ni//
210a6(rgyud): byas na las rnams brtsam par bya//bud med sems ni rab brtan pa//lo grangs bcu gnyis len pa la//rigs kyi sbyor ba rab po sgoms te//bdag gi khu bas
210a7(rgyud): mchod par bya//'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku//na chung gzhon nu mig bzangs btsal//gzugs bzangs zho na pas brgyan pa yi//lo grangs nyi shu lnga
210b1(rgyud): lon pa'i//gzung nas byol song skye gnas brtag/bzhin bzangs shin tu mdzes pa yi//na chung mtshan ldan bskal ba mchog/mig bzangs brtan pa'i blo ldan pas//khu
210b2(rgyud): ba blangs nas bzla' bar bya//dben zhing rab tu nyams dga' bar//sbyor ba mchod pa kun brtsams na//rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs//zla ba phyed kyis nges par grub//
210b3(rgyud): smin dkyus ring zhing skra lho 'jam//lus ldem dbyibs sku blo drag cing //bstan pa chags shing bcos su btug/lus nyan ci la thogs pa med//rked pa pra la re smad
210b4(rgyud): zlu ma//spyod ni drang la shin tu rgyas//tshe mes dkar mgul rings phyag sor ring //dkar la dmar chags nor bu'i mdog/gzungs ma mtshan ldan spyad par bya//gnyen
210b5(rgyud): lcu ga 'khril ldem rab tu mdzes//yid 'ong 'dzum phran spyan zur gzegs//khur chos dkar pos gdab par bya//dkar 'dzin phyir ni mnye bya ste//pad+ma'i ze ba chen pos
210b6(rgyud): gdab//pad+ma len gsum mnyes bya ste//mtshan khung mngon sum rna ba gnyis//zangs kyi mdog gis gzung bar bya//de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi btsun mo dang bcwa
210b7(rgyud): bar gyur to//de nas 'di brjod par mdzad do//zhi ba kha dog dkar la 'tsher//btang snyoms kyi spro bsdu yis//gsum pa rdzogs par ldan pa dang //phyag rgya tshogs kyis
211a1(rgyud): rbod du //rgyal mo dag dang san+tamA du m+b+ha sa//phyug r+b+ha rdo rje rjel bla 'dzim//bcu gsum dA yI na la grus 'dzin//me chung med par gastsal pa/
211a2(rgyud): pa//dbu lnga gnyis pa je yi ga ldan//gsam pa nyid kyis sa dag tu/rjo pa ni hUM si na ldan las//rkyen gyi rigs ni gsal ba yin//de bzhin gshegs
211a3(rgyud): bya thams cad kyi//mchog tu gsang de'i byug+sa rgyu'o//tha~M kha 'bru ba hU~M s+t+wa~M g+ne //rigs kyi rin chen skyob stsol sa//byug rgyu gsal ba'i skur gas la bya'o//rgyam
211a4(rgyud): na dang many+dzu mang so//sgri pakun skang sdig byed sgrubs//gnyis pa yi nI yaM las//thams cad byu ba sa yig gaut+ta8//mUnyas pU 'khrul 'dzi
211a5(rgyud): 'dzin pa//rin nan rigs kye phug rgyugs so//las 'di thams cad kun gyi mchog/rgyal po rnam par rlom pa'o//bad+ma drug 'dra ba'i mdog/chos sku zla chis
211a6(rgyud): ldan pa//gsal ba'i kha dog mdzes po na//thams cad ma lus dbang du mdzad//sbyor dang skye dang bsdu bA yis//phyag rgyagasal bar dbang gis bskur//btsun
211a7(rgyud): me dag dang mnyam du skyes//gnyi su med par 'khril pa yin//dgu yi ge gnyis por ldan//rin gyi ni rigs kyi spro bsu las//cod pa ni rigs snga'i/kha dag s+ho//
211b1(rgyud): ci bzhin pa yi ting 'dzin gyis//phyag rgya bzhugs tshul pad+mo'i tshul//mnyam par gsal bas dkyil 'khor yin//mi phyed pa yi ting 'dzin gyis//rdzogs pa'i dkyil
211b2(rgyud): 'khor kun 'dus mchog/pad+mo rigs kyi phyag rgyas gsal//rigs kun gyi ni phyag rgyar gsal//mun pa sel ba'i mar me bzhin//gsal dag yid gnyis med par
211b3(rgyud): bsgom//chu skyes 'jam pa 'og tu ldan//steng dang sprod pa'i rol mo yis//dgyes shing mnyam pa'i mchod pa bsham//'di ltar gsal ba dbang yang rdzogs//thams
211b4(rgyud): cad bsdu ba zhes bya ba//de bzhin dbang ste las thams cad//dus gsum pa yi mdzad pa che//rigs kun 'dus par bde bar gshegs//mnyam pa ci bzhin ting 'dzin
211b5(rgyud): te//yi ge 'bru tsog kun gyi mchog/bshad par khyad par las kun rdzogs//chu skyes gsal bar 'dra ba mA'i steng //gnyi su med par
211b6(rgyud): gsal bas na//rnam pa gnyis kyi bye brag gis//'dus par gsal bar skur gyur pa//'dod cing chags pa ma yin zhing //blo lA yid gnyis med pas na//phyag rgya
211b7(rgyud): gsal bar rgyal ba'i sku//rgyal mo dang ni mnyam du skyes//dbu la gnyis pa'i yi ger ldan//sbyin pa rgya chen khebs pas na//rang gi 'dod pa'i gnasu bsdu//bo ngo chod lo//
212a1(rgyud): grangs khyad par mod//gnyis su mod par 'khril b.rAgs pa//dus kun tu ni mAn+tam ldan pa//gsang blo mchod pa rab tu rdzogs//zla rgyas lta bur
212a2(rgyud): gtso bo sgom//chags pa med par 'dod bsdu yi//yum dang lhan cig sgom pa ni/A lI kA li byed pa'i don//phyag rgya las kyi bye brag gis//bde ba chen por tshul gnas
212a3(rgyud): pa/rgyal ba kun kyang de dang mthun//phyag rgya bsnolnga bar gnas pa yis//kun kyang sems dpe'i dkyil 'khor ro//phyag rgya rdo rje thal mo ni//kun kyang yum gyi rgya ba du ba
212a4(rgyud): zhal gnyis mdzes par rab sbyar ba//zla grom pi yi ljags gnyis mdzes//dung gi phur bus mkhur bcos la//'debs shing rdeg pa'i tshul du bzhugs//bsnye nr-i
212a5(rgyud): pa nye bsnyen dbang rdzogs pa//rgyal ba kun gyi sku yi mchog/gzhan yang 'dzum pa'i gtso gzugs sgom//rnal 'byor dka' thub chen po'i don//gsang ba spyod pa shin
212a6(rgyud): tu dbyes//gsang ba nyid du sems can 'dren//thams cad kun gyi rmongs po sel//yum gyi las kyis khyad par ni//sa yi rim pa kun sbyor zhing //zas dang mgo
212a7(rgyud): dbang med pa yi//nyan thos 'gog pa la sogs pa//byang chub sems kyi char chen gyis//pad+mor bcings pa tshar gcod mdzad//dam tshig chen po sdom pa ste//rgyu
212b1(rgyud): bkun gyi dkyil 'khor yin//phyag rgya chen mo mtshogs mchog ste//dga' ba don du rigs mchog yin//myur bar rtag tu ma yongs na//gdon mi za bar grub pa ni//
212b2(rgyud): 'dod khams lha yi nyin phyed kyisgo//gsang ba kun dang mnyam par 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i don dang mnyam pa'i phyag rgya'o//kun tu bzang mo rnal
212b3(rgyud): 'byor mchog/gsang ba yid kyis mkha' dbyingaso//yi ge oM ldan tshig drag bcas//rnal 'byor bde chen nyid kyis sras//gzugs khams lha tshogs byin brlabs
212b4(rgyud): te//phyag mtshan 'khor lo gsal ba dang //bde ba rnal 'byor de bzhin gshegs//gtso bo gser gyi khwa dog gsal//nyi ma gser gyi 'od bzhin du//gsal ba
212b5(rgyud): 'tsher ba bcom ldan 'das//dbu ru yi ge gnyis pa la//rin chen myu gu khang pa 'bar//sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan gyis//legs par brgyan pa mtshon rnams rdzogs//
212b6(rgyud): rdzogs pa chen po bzhugs tshul dang //ting 'dzin 'thun par 'gro la gzigs//pad+ma ge sar dbu se gnas pa'i//thig le gsang ba bzhon dang ldan//mdun du lha
212b7(rgyud): mo chags pa mo//lo grangs nyi shu mdzes dang ldan//ma ha su khe gnas la dgyes//mdzes pa'i lag pa gar dang bcas//gnyisu med pa'i bzhugs tshul ni//gi tsi la
213a1(rgyud): rten pa'i tshul du bzhugs//rgyab tu lha myo dgyes chen mo//sangs rgyas bsnyen par mdzes tshul gyis//thal sbyar 'dzin pa sku brten pa//sku che bcu
213a2(rgyud): drug brtsan dmar sku//sangs rgyas gdung 'dzin tshangs par sbyor//'dod chags can la mthun par mdzad//g.ya su zhe sdang 'dul po mo//rdo rje pad+mo sbyor la dgyis//
213a3(rgyud): ma dad pa rnams dbang med par//drag po sbyor mdzad zhe sdang sol//chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das//gnyisu med pa sbyor ba yi//stong pa med par bstan pa'i tshul//
213a4(rgyud): sngo bsangs mdog ldan khyad par che//sku tshod bco lnga chags pa can//dus mtha' med par sbyar la dgyes//steg dang sgego pa'i cha lugs kyis//sems can kun gyi
213a5(rgyud): sdug bsngal 'khru//rab tu smras pa'i 'gog pa rnams//bslangs nas rgyal ba'i sra su mdzad//arta mA li phrin las kyis//thams cad byang chub chen po mdzad//
213a6(rgyud): mig gnyis 'dzum dang sbom po yis//dbang mor ldan par byas pa na//gnyi su med paru sbyor 'dongad yin//sna'i rtse mor mthe'u chung 'dzin//ma ta bzhugs par
213a7(rgyud): brtson byas pa'o//so so rnams bsdams kha phye ba//dus la bab ces bya ba ste//ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa na//dus la bab ces bya ba yin//'di ltar
213b1(rgyud): dz+nyAn tu 'dzin la//dam+b+han+dan bud me rnams mi 'ad//rlungs grus mo thab dumachog nyams//tshar bas kun tu bdug par 'gyur//da ltar brtson par byed pa na/
213b2(rgyud): g.yen pa skyed pa rnams pa ni yis//sa pa na rlung d+hI ts+tshin du//de rje bad+mo mtshams du//shings phyogs su yi sbyor ba yis//rjes sus ngas tshu
213b3(rgyud): padang //del dus dus sus rab basmra //rdeg pa'i tshig gi spyi dang //byung chub sems kyis bad+ma dgang//ma pa de da ngos lha rnams kyis/ yu ma sa la
213b4(rgyud): gas nga/ gas smras/bskrun rdzogs pan g+sa mA~M//byung chub skyes sa sa//s+yAts+tshed pa k+Sha t+yA sa ma da phyi skye/
213b5(rgyud): de ltar longs spyod rdzogs bye da //gnyi sa med par sngags bzhin du//mnyam par 'khrul ba'i tshul duHn+tu//swA swA gsum thun gyi gdung 'dzin lo//gsan
213b6(rgyud): di //kyi sa sbyi g+h+ri // ba su /gzhan na sbyin rjes zlus/ sbyin
213b7(rgyud): hU~M stegs byed me//sangs rgyas pa yi brgyan cani//mngon du byas rab ban pa//brje'i dang ba thos par gar rgyas ni//ngas rgyas phrin la skang med ng+ge
214a1(rgyud): chub sems kyi sbyin chen gyis//mchod pa chen+da po rab mchod mnyes//sprul pa bas ma yab mtha' klas pa//dus gsum 'khor lo bskor bar
214a2(rgyud): bskul//so so chags pa'i mdangs kyis ni//mnyes dang bcas pa'i gar gyis mchod//de ni sa gsang ba chen po dang gnyisu med par 'khril ba chen por gyur te
214a3(rgyud): ge yin pa skyed pa mang pos mnyes pa dang /pad+ma spang ba la sogs pa 'byung ba mnyes par mdzad nas rab tu dgyes te glu 'di blangaso//chos kun dngos po med par rab
214a4(rgyud): gsal ba/'byung gnas chen po ya mtshan 'byung bar mkhyen//e mra'o ngo mtshar che'o zhes grang so//de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' gsungs
214a5(rgyud): pas mdangs bzang mig gi dkyus kyang ring //sku ni ldem lo tsA na dan dri//yan lagra lcug ma'i bzhin du mnyen//tshems dkar sum cu rnga rngo med//'gul pa
214a6(rgyud): zlu ma rings rab tu legs//gser la ga yu spras ga ya su la byil/gzungs ma 'di dag sten par bya//skad gdangs mi snyan ra ro po//yang na rmongs bag sub suM ba
214a7(rgyud): po//sbrang bus gartsag pa'i sna sgra bzhin//sems can dag la khro zhing 'tshog/dam can dag la g.yol bar mdzod//phyi nang sra zhing 'bras bu can//de bsnyen nA ni
214b1(rgyud): dngos grub nyams//de bzhin gshogs pa thams cad kyi//bud med kun gyi sgyu ma la//rab tu 'khrul te 'char ba yin//bden gnyis so sor snang ba yis//yum gyi/
214b2(rgyud): mkha' zhes rgyal bas gsungs//ma nor lam chen kun bsgoms nas//kun tu bzang mo bsgoms pas grub//bud med la ni mchod bsten na//ye shes chen po grub
214b3(rgyud): par gsungs//dpal kun tu bzang po thams cad shes rab kyi longs spyod 'di gsungaso//sngon spyod las kyi 'jug pa 'di//phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na//rnal 'byor
214b4(rgyud): bsdom pa gnas pa yin//de la mchod pa dam pa ni//sbyor ba rab tu sbyor ba ste//kun tu khyab par kun tu sbyor//rjesu chags pa dam tshig mchog/de byi dkar shams
214b5(rgyud): mdog dang ldan//bcu drug pong tshod ring ba dang //lug suM blugs pa lto bu ste//lus logs mdzes dang ldan pa dang //dpral bar byes che kos sko phra//nu ma chung zhing
214b6(rgyud): sor mo ring //yad tsam mig dkyus rnying ba dang //sngo dkar thogs bzang mtshams thung zhing //skal bzang mdangs dang ldan pa ni//rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas mchog ste//
214b7(rgyud): 'di la btson par byed pa ni//rigs kyi rdo rje gdon mi za//tshe 'di nyid la grub par 'gyur//gnas rab bden par rab rtags te//sha dkar mdangs bzang mdog dang
215a1(rgyud): ldan//lus 'brod zlum pa cha byad can//sau dkar thags bzang mog dkyus ring //skad phra mdog dgrod spyi ring ba//dpral dbyes lnga sogs bzung gnas
215a2(rgyud): pa//rma nA ga la sogs gnas pa ni//rtag tu chos la 'dud pa yin//tshangs pa dbyangs kyi rin chen las//'di las brtson byas bsgrubs pa yi//de bzhin rigs
215a3(rgyud): kyi ting 'dzin las//phan tshun du ni dga' spyod na//tshangs pa'i snga dro gcig tsam gyis//gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur//rnal 'byor spyod pa dga' ba ni//sbyar ba
215a4(rgyud): brtson pas 'grub par gsungs//bud me do cha lugs legs pa ni//bong tshod mi ring lus phra zhing //rkang lag chung zhing skad gsal-i ba//mig legs ngo zlu mo
215a5(rgyud): rtsan dmar che//blun du chags pa mi shis med//lus la mtshan gyi rmad 'dras brgyan//tshig gsal rmi lam nyung ba dang //so dkar mchu legs dad par ldan//
215a6(rgyud): cho ga shes pa yi ting 'dzin gyis//gsang ba'i mkha' la nyi zla'i 'od//rdo rje pad+mor ldan byas te//phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na//'dod pa'i khams lha'i skad cig
215a7(rgyud): gis//'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za//lus zlum gtum pa nga rgyal can//khong na sems rnog sems la 'dzin//bya ba 'dra ba mi gtong ldan//bslab pa'i
215b1(rgyud): blo rtul sha rus che//mdangs bkrag brtags na bye phyir gsal//sbyin la dga' zhing chos la dang //rin chen rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis//bgra chags yo go char gcad
215b2(rgyud): cing //ting 'dzin blo la gsal ba na//bsgrub pa'i dus la bab pa ste//de tshe rab tu brtson pa yis//yum gyi pad+ma kha phye zhing //bde ba thugs kyi 'phro 'du yis//phan tshun du
215b3(rgyud): ni dga' spyad ni//rigs kyi rin chen grub pa ni//tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur//thugs rje mdzad spyad bye brag giso//'jug rten dag na dman pa'i rigs//rab tu bkug/

216a1(rgyud): gyi don gyi phyir//phyin ci log tu gang spyod rnams//'dul bar mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis//mi mdzad pa ni ci yang med//shin tu gtum pa'i cha/

216a3(rgyud): chags pa'i yid rnams dbang du mdzad//e ma'o shin tu ngo mtshar che//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen pos rab tu brtson par mdzad pa/yid kyis 'gro
216a4(rgyud): dang /zla gam med pa dang /gyad 'gyed pa dang /khur ba bla na med pas phan tshun du dga' ba spyod do//sha mdog dkar la nu ma 'bur//stod smad phyed la smin kyus ring ///

222b6(rgyud): sarbakro d+ha ma sha ma sha/prA sha m+bA pra sha ma/sarba kro d+hA u sa?/kro d+ha u s+sa/kro d+ha ba ba sa me ya/sa hA ma dr-i le s+yA ma ya/sarba dustA pra dustA pra dru ste/kr-i d+hA mA ba ba
222b7(rgyud): ya/dza la ya sha kra pa dam/bi sha ra ma ye/shar ma hU~M/b+ha ga ban/su ra ti/sarba ta thA ga trA sad na/sa ma yon tsa ho/su ra te/sa maM i to//de nas bcom ldan
223a1(rgyud): 'das khro bo chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //oM dza sgrub ho/taka r+m+ma dzA h+yA takr-i hUM ta ki hUM/oM ga tA she hU dzA/A ga

223b1(rgyud): bsnams pa/zham gsum pa/mu dag oMn rngan pa'i 'od 'dra ba/rdo rje dang /thog pa gcig khang pa dang /blud pa dang /mdud dang /dgra sta dang /zhags pa dang /rtse gsum

223b4(rgyud): d+hi ra/ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri/mAr+thas+sa sha nau/bi shi ni mai dzi la ya/maMr+d+ha sa prA b+hA dza ya twe/mu di da ra~M/ka pa la ma ma/bu shi da/ma ku te/ma ra ru t+ti/ra d+har pA/tsI bu ri tA/ka ba
223b5(rgyud): haM satwa/She deng+ku/Sh+Ta baH/hrI shU l+ya gan d+hA/ma k+Shod+h+we/ hU~M d+hI trAM/hU~M d+her+yA t+tA mU t+yA pra ye d+hu phaT//de nas bcom ldan 'das wa b+h+yo chen po gzi brjid mchog dang
223b6(rgyud): ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs//rdo rjets+tsho mo ny-i kyi khro ba nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //oM hUM trAM a/sur+ya badz+nyA kro d+hi shwa ri/

224a1(rgyud): bzhon 'byung //dbyu bu rda dz+nyAn rAHhA//dang rgyun nad+ha pargyags pa byas//spyan na rab dmar snga gsangs mdad//chan cha sna tshugs bsnams pa
224a2(rgyud): badz+ran/gdug pa thams cad chu byed cing /yi dgas chen po stegau la zhon//rang gi g.yog gis mdun du bskor//de nas bcom ldan 'das pid+ma'i 'od zer 'phro ba
224a3(rgyud): 'od zer phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/pad+ma'i khro mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //oM hUM badz+ra pad+ma ba mu kre

224a6(rgyud): mi lto stan la yang dag zhon khrag mang po la 'thung byed pa//mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste//khros pa'i dbu brgyan thod pa brtsams//'od zer rnon po gtong byed

224b7(rgyud): dpung bzhi mo//gdog pa'i khro mo rnam bskor bcas//de la sogs pa rim par ldan//mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i sdug

225b1(rgyud): dz+dza/ swA b+hA \u0f7fd+hamA d+hU bad+hA ba na daM ni sa d+d+ha/ts+tsha gan d+hA yA bAn+d+han+ta /b+h+yormA.Ad+g+ha/a s+yA bad+har+m+mA t+na daH/rmAd+hA dz+nyA na ts+tshad+d+ha /oM sas d+hA

227a4(rgyud): brgyal bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa ma dang /mkha'agro ma rnams kyi ting 'dzin du zhugs te/ma dang mkhre 'gro ma 'bum chos kyi dbyings

227a6(rgyud): zhing lpags rlon pas sa gzhi 'gengs mdzad ma//zhing chen rlon pas g.yang gzhi ral pa can//gzing lpags rlon pa stong gi sku smad klubs//sbrul nag 'bum
227b1(rgyud): gyis yun lag rgyun du spyil//thod rlon thod skra ma tshal mgur chu dpung pung rgyan se ral kha//khyod kyi rdo rje the'u ba shog g.yas pa las//ye shes lha mtshogs ni bad+ma

227b5(rgyud): rang yang za zhing grogs la bdang bar byed//mA dang mkha' 'gro dbyings nas bskul bskyod la//las la 'khril zhing chos kyi dbyingasu bstan//mkha' gro za byed mgyogs
227b6(rgyud): mu gshog pa can//mkha'agro 'jug byed yid 'phrog nu ma tsan/mkha' bri rngam po'i zhal gdangs mche ba can//mkha' gro 'byung ba 'dzin pa'i sder mo can//mkhyen
227b7(rgyud): 'gro khams gsum rngub pa'i mchu rengs ma//mkha' 'gro dug gsum za byed 'bar ba'i sku//las kyi mkhara' la 'gro ba'i shugs can ma//don gyis mkha' la 'gro
228a1(rgyud): ba'i yo shos sum//do nas mkha 'gro ma brgyad dpal chen po'i ting 'dzin gyi las spyod par gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das h+ye daklu'i rol pad+ma
228a2(rgyud): dang mkha'agro ma de rnams dang gnyi su med pa'i sbyor ba rtse gcig ma'i ting 'dzin du mdzad do//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum la skyes pa'i bdud bag chags
228a3(rgyud): mtshams sbyar te/bdud ru tra nag po sems can dang rnal 'byor pa la 'tsho zhing gnod par byed pa za bar byed pa de la bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i rol pas pho nya'i ting
228a4(rgyud): 'dzin du zhugos te/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //til mar sna tshogs kyis lus bslus pa'i rdo rje mche ba can dang /nag mo mi zod thogs pa'i
228a5(rgyud): rdo rje phreng ba can dang /rnal 'byor ye shes rdo rje dam tshig ma dang mgo bo gcod pan legs sbas rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang /lag na mtshon thogs pa'i rdo rje phreng ma dang /
228a6(rgyud): dgra bgeg dbang du bdud pa'i rdo rje g.yul zlog ma dang /sbrul gyi ska rag 'ching zhing lag na mdung thung ral gri thigs ma dang /zhing lpags rked pas dkris shing khrag
228a7(rgyud): gis myos ma dang /mig rtsa dmar po gyur pa'i rdo rje la brug ma dang /mtshan mo dur khrod bu rgyu ba'i 'byung mo sgrol ma dang /kau rlo na smad dkris thod pa se ral khar
228b1(rgyud): phyogs ma dang /mo ro rgyu mtshams kyis 'dren pa'i rdo rje zab mo dang /khrag gri thig les brgyan pa'i rdo rje dri tshor ma dang /zhing chung 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'khrug ma dang /rdo rje zhag gi/
228b2(rgyud): tshom bu can chen mo dang /rdo rje mi ro sha la chem che ma za ba'i rdo rje mche ba 'dzin ma dang /drag po 'dul ba'i rdo rje drag mo chen mo dang /ma mo skrag par byed pa'i khams gsum
228b3(rgyud): dbang du sdud ma dang /zhing la skem par byed pa'i rdo rje kha nAM ga dang /nag mo lus mdog gnag pa'i rdo rje me stag 'phro ba mo dang /za su khrag tshil za ba'o rdo rje srin mo dang /
228b4(rgyud): kun la dbang mdzad rdo rje pad+ma 'dzin pa dang /za su shwa rloni zla ba'i rdo rje rnga mo dang /e ma ma tshogs rdo rje za byed ma dang /dpal ldan chen po rdo rje lcang lo can mu dang /kha nas
228b5(rgyud): rdo rje me 'bar rgya mtsho skams ma dang /lag na bdud rtsi rdo rje 'dzin ma dang /nag mo mig gcig rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin ma dang /sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs pa'i rdo rje gshog
228b6(rgyud): pa can dang /phyugs kyi bya khra khyung gi g.yu mig ma can dang /thul ba'i mtshan mas rdo rje 'brug ma dang /rdo rje ral gcig chen mo zi byed ma dang /rdo rje tre shul thigs pa'i
228b7(rgyud): zhag gi cham bu can dang /'tshem ngam drag shul spyod pa'i rdo rje sgrol ma dang /'jigs pa'i gzugs can rdo rje bdud 'dul mo dang /rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje gzugs
229a1(rgyud): can ma dang tsor yang 'gyur ba'i rdo rje rdzu 'phrul can dang / gnyer spyan bgrad rnal 'byor nag rgyun mo dang /mche ba gtsigs pa'i ral pa 'khyil
229a2(rgyud): ma dang /thod pa rlon pa'i rdo rje mun tsal dang /dbu ga sum phyag drug rdo rje mI lpags g.yang gzhi gsol ba dang /stir chung ngu mang po brgyus nas brgyan te rdo rje brjid
229a3(rgyud): ma dang /'tsham dam brkyang bskum rdo rje'i 'jig rten skrag mA dang /bdud bzhi gnon pa'i rdo rje ban drar ldan pa dang /stir chen glo snying 'dren pa'i rdo rje khrag 'thung
229a4(rgyud): ma dang /'jig su rung ba'i rngubs pa'i rnge'u chung thogs pa'i rdo rje rkan sgra can dang /log par lta ba'i rdo rje bdud rnams 'dul ba dang /ro la rngam pa'i rdo rje za ba mo
229a5(rgyud): dang /gsod cing sbyong pa'i rnal 'byor sngo nag ma dang /khro gnyer spyan dgrad rdo rje mche gtsigs ma dang /'chang ngam chen mo mdzad pa'i tri shUl mda' 'phen rdo
229a6(rgyud): rje 'gengs ma dang /dgyes par byed pa'i rdo rje se gol rde bas ma dang /'gugs par byed pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor dmar nag 'jigs pa'i sku dang /sangs rgyas kun
229a7(rgyud): gyi rdo rje yum chen mo dang /rnal 'byor chen mo dur khrod bdag mo dang /'chang ngam gar mkhan chen mo rdo rje stabs tshul can ma dang /rnal 'byor 'thing nag rdo rje
229b1(rgyud): ster chen zab mo dang /bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i rdo rje gdug pa glad 'grengs ma dang /gsod pa'i las la dgyes pa'i khro mo rdo rje ljang ma dang /khro gany+dzar 'jigs pa'i
229b2(rgyud): dbu gcig phyag drug ma dang /rdo rje tri shul rde'u 'dzin pa'i rdo rje rkan sgra rdebs mu dang /'ching zhing sdom pa'i rnal 'byor ser nag dang /gtu mo zhe sdang stir chen za ba me
229b3(rgyud): dang zhing chen nang gril 'byin cing rdo rje 'tsham ngamA can dang /sgrol par byed pa'i rdo rje 'thing nag dang /spyan bgrad mtsho gtsigs rdo rje chen mo dang /ster 'dren pa'i rdo rje khrag
229b4(rgyud): 'thung zhal du stobs ma dang /spu gris 'debs pa'i rdo rje ban dar ldan mo dang /zangs gres 'debs shing /ba ShAM ga 'phen pa'i rdo rje sha za mo dang /rol skam pa'i rdo rje za stang
229b5(rgyud): chen mo dang /rdo rje ser nag seng ge mgro can dang /mche ba gtsigs spyan gsum 'jig pa'i rdo rje sdang mig can dang /mche tshogs mang pos bskor ba'i rdo rje zhe sdang
229b6(rgyud): 'joms mA dang /'thing nag rdo rje seng ge ral pa can dang /rdo rje ye sheso sku'i cha lugs 'chang ma dang /mi 'jigs sti ra'i g.yang gzhi gsol ma drang /srog chags
229b7(rgyud): mang ba'i snying 'byin rdo rje glud 'gems ma dang /dmar me chen mo ste ra mgo can dang /ye shes lnga'i rdo rje cha lugs 'chang ma dang /mi 'jigs bzhi'i g.yang gzhes
230a1(rgyud): ral khar thogs ma dang /bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong zhing las mdzad ma dang /ban da drug tas bkang nas gtsol stobs shing dag snang
230a2(rgyud): blud 'gems ma dang /gsod byed sngo nag dur bya'i mgo can dang /mtsha tshegs 'khor du bskor zhing 'dod chags 'joms pa'i rdo rje zab mo dang /thal chen rag tres
230a3(rgyud): rdo rje sku la brgyan ma dang /spu gri mgo ge cad ban da 'thung zhing gsod la dga' ba mo dang /rdo rje zhugs pa 'ching zhing khrag 'thung zhal du stob pa dang /'bring nag 'gying
230a4(rgyud): stabs rdo rje sh+tsa nA khyi mgo can dang /blo snying 'dren pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin ma dang /phra dag 'joms par byed pa'i rdo rje za ba dang /dmar nag 'gying pa'i bya rgod mgo
230a5(rgyud): tsan dang /zhing chen rgyu 'dren gti mug 'joms par byed ma dang /gshog tshogs mang pos bskor ba'i thang rlan 'dzin ma dang /ser nAg 'gying ba'i pho rog mgo can
230a6(rgyud): dang /klu rnams 'dum par byed pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'ichang ma dang /mthing nag 'gying ba bya rog mgo can dang /ser nag gsod par byed pa'i mgo ga dang sha khrag za ba'i
230a7(rgyud): mkha' gro dbu gsum ma dang /lcags kyu 'dren pa'i mi 'jigs sbyor ba dang /rdo rje bka'i pho nya spyan gsum mche ba can dang /rdo rje bran mo gtum bag can dang /
230b1(rgyud): 'dzegs pa'i gzugs can rdo rje khrug 'thung ma dang snying rje phyag gi mgo can dang /rdo rje sbrul gyi mgo can dang /rdo rje gzig gi myug can dang / rdo b+h+rU~M b+h+rUM mgo can dang /
230b2(rgyud): rdo rje pa bang mgo can dang /rdo rje dred kyi mgo can dang /rdo rje dom gyi mgo can dang rdo rje sdig pa'i mgo can dang /rdo rje wa'i mgo can dang /rdo rje stag gi mgo can dang
230b3(rgyud): rje d+h+rU'i mgo can dang /rdo rje spyang ku'i mgo can dang /rdo rje phub shud kyi mgo can dang /rdo rje shi ba'i mgo can dang /rdo rje sbyin gyi mgo can dang /rdo rje phag gi mgo can dang /rdo rje
230b4(rgyud): mo'i mgo can dang /rdo rje bya rog mgo can dang /rdo rje spang ti'i mgo can dang /rdo rje ske ka' mgo can dang /rdo rje khra'i mgo tsan dang /rdo rje spre'u mgo can dang /rdo rje khu byug mgo can
230b5(rgyud): dang /rdo rje seng ge'i mgo can dang /rdo rje pa bang gi mgo can dang /rdo rje sha pa'i mgo can dang /rdo rje srin byi'i mgo can dang /rdo rje sri mo'i mgo can dang /rdo rje zer mo mgo can dang /
230b6(rgyud): rdo rje dmag pa thang gog gi mgo can dang /rdo rje nyi ma'i zhags pa can dang /rdo rje me lce klog phreng 'dzin dang /rdo rje srin mo mdung 'phen pa dang /rdo rje ral gri sgra 'byin ma dang /rdo rje kla
230b7(rgyud): mo thogs 'bebs mo dang /rdo rje 'jigs byed pa lang gi sna dang /rdo rje gnod sbyin khyung gdong ma dang /rdo rje lag na khrag thogs ma dang /rdo rje zla ba skar mda' ltar gtong ba dang
231a1(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig bsrungs ma dpal phreng ma dang /rdo rje lag na phur bu 'dril ma dang /rdo rje ri rab bskyil ba'i rngam stangs can dang /rdo rje dmar mo spyan gsum
231a2(rgyud): shin tu mi srun ma dang /rdo rje cir yang 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul can chen me dang /rdo rje mkha' gro ma'i mgyogs ma dang /rdo rje smug nag gtibs pa'i me dpal can dang /rdo rje keng rus
231a3(rgyud): 'cha' ba'i tshems rnon ma dang /rdo rje gzhad ma'i shin tu grad rgyangs chen me dang /rdo rje nang grol 'dren ma kang kai'i mgo can ma dang /rdo rje sgra 'byin 'brug sgrogs ma
231a4(rgyud): dang /rdo rje bdud rtsi rin chen char 'bebasam dang /rdo rje shugs 'chang rdo rje sgrol ma dang /rdo rje dbang mo rdo rje sder mo'i tshogs dang /rdo rje shan pa spu gro'i rnon po'i so can dang /
231a5(rgyud): rdo rje go cha skye bar byed pa dang /rdo rje sprin tshogs mang po sdud par byed pa dang /rdo rje'ur 'ur shig shig g.yo bar byed pa dang /rdo rje tan sgra rdebs pa'i drag shul can chen
231a6(rgyud): mo dang /rdo rje za bor byed pa'i phaT phaT sgyogs ma dang /rdo rje brkyang bskum gshin rje gnon ma dang /rdo rje zhing chen khrig 'dzag thod rlan sku la brgyan pa dang /rdo rje drag po'i
231a7(rgyud): nga ro 'byin pa'i gdong gsum ma dang /rdo rje yud tsam 'dul phyogs bcur 'phro ma dang /rdo rje seng ge stabasu mchod pa'i nga rgyal can dang /rdo rje sprul pa mang po dgyed pa'i bya'o/
231b1(rgyud): skyigs can dang /rdo rje spyir+ya gnas nyul byA khyA khI skrigs can dang /rdo rje dam tshig gi tshogs nyul m+b+ha byA khyA khyi skyigs can dang /rdo rje phyi nang mtsham+buswA rtul ma bya khra khyi skyugs
231b2(rgyud): tsan dang /rdo rje dam tshig gi rjes gcod ma bye khri khye skyugs can dang /rdo rje de bya'i sbyor nyul ma bya khra khyi sgyogs can dang /rdo rje 'dod chags pa bya khra khyi skyigs can dang /
231b3(rgyud): dur khrod ro za 'dul ba'i bya khra khyi sgregs can dang /rdo rje dmar mo bkragasal dbang sdud ma dang /rdo rje ser lo sbrul gyi ska rags can dang /rdo rje gnam lcagase 'ur mo thog 'ab
231b4(rgyud): ma dang /rdo rje rgyal byed sngags par byed ma dang /rdo rje bsdams pas srin mo brgyal bar byed ma dang /rdo rje kha nas mi khrug rta khrag 'dzag ma dang /rdo rje dbu stong phyag stong bdud
231b5(rgyud): kyi dpung rnams 'dul bar byed ma dang /rdo rje 'bum phyag yangs pa'i mkha 'gro chen mo dang /rdo rje ral pa spyi gtsug 'khyil mo dang /rdo rje sku yis rol pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bar ma dang /
231b6(rgyud): rdo rje gsung gi sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed me dang /rdo rje thugs kyi sgyu 'phrul mnga' ba chen mo dang //rdo rje thun gyi sgyu 'phrul dbang phyug mo dang /rdo rje rin chen sku'i dbang phyug ma dang /
231b7(rgyud): pad+ma dbang phyug mi dang /rdo rje dbyings la sbyor zhing stan byed ma dang /rdo rje mgyogs ma dbu dgu mi dang /rdo rje sgra 'byin ma dang /rdo rje cher ma dang /rdo rje myong ma dang /rdo rje reg
232a1(rgyud): byud kun la 'khyams dang /rdorje dmar nag dbu gsum ma da d+hArnga lda nag ral btsun rgyun mo dang /rdo rnga ljang nag dbu brgyu ma dang // mnas
232a2(rgyud): ba la du gi mgo can mo dang /rdo rje ser nag dbu bco lnga me dang /rdo rje smug nag dbye brgya me dang /rdo rje ljang ser khro gtum dbu dgu me dang /rdo rje sor ma dbu gcig ma dang /rdo rje
232a3(rgyud): dkar mo dbu lnga ma dang /rdo rje nag mo dbu gsum ma dang /rdo rje bsnyems ma bya khri khyi skyigs can dang /rdo rje ser mo bya khwa khyi skyugs can dang /rdo rje dur khrod kyi bdag mo bya khA
232a4(rgyud): khyi skyigs n+dan dang /rdo rje gtun khung ma bya khra khyi skyigs can dang /rdo rje mda' bstag ma bya khra khyi skyigs can dang /rdo rje skul byed ma bya khra khyi skyigs can dang /rdo rje rlung 'byi
232a5(rgyud): ma bya khra khyi sbyig can dang /rdo rje rjod byed ma bya khri khyau smyig can dang /dz+re N+DI 'jigs byed ma bya khA khyi smyig can dang /rdo rje bdud rtsi sbyor ma bya khra khye smyig can dang /rdo rje'i 'phrog
232a6(rgyud): ma brlag byed me bya khru khyi s+thig rnge cen drang /rdo rje rmongs byed ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang /rdo rje yid 'phrog ma bya khu khyi sbyig can dang /rdo rje khrag 'joms me byA khra khyi skyug
232a7(rgyud): can dang /rdo rje tsho 'joms ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang /rdo rje rlungs byed mi bya khra khyi smyig can dang /rdo rje srin ma stong zon ma bya khre khyi smrig can dang /rdo rje sbrul mo bye dro
232b1(rgyud): sgrog can dang /rdo rje 'bobs ma bya khru khI smyig can dang /rdo rje dpal bdag ma bya khra khyi skyeg can dang /rdo rje rkan 'jig ma bya khru khyi smyig can dang /rdo rje gnas ma mgyogs byed ma
232b2(rgyud): b+h+yo khri khye smyig can dang /rdo rje sgrub pa tshe 'dzin ma bya khre khyA smyig can dang /rdo rje thod R+Yon dang sbrul nag 'khyil pa can dang /rdo rje zhing tshon stod g.yogs chu sbyin smad g.yogs can dang //
232b3(rgyud): rjezla byed kha 'bar ma dang /rdo rje na mkha' lding dang /rdo rje khwa dang drug pa dang /rje b+hir+m+ma de rkyen ma dang /rdo rje rgyun lag dang // lus la chu srin gyi mgo can dang /
232b4(rgyud): ge shog pa gtams pa dang /rdo rje sder mo lcags kyu ma dang /rdo rje mchu rtse gcig ma'i gdong can dang /rdo rje saM gre can dang /rdo rje kha gadrangs ma dang /rdo rje kang ma mud kar dang /
232b5(rgyud): rdo rje 'jigs par byed par byed pa'i gzugs can dang /rdo rje smigs bu'i mgo can dang /rdo rje khwa'i mgo can+d+ra dang /rdo rje yid las byung ba'i mdun pa mo dang /rdo rje myus pa mod
232b6(rgyud): rdo rje rdib mo dang /rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang /rdo rje byed pa dang /rdo rje dang ba mo dang /rdo rje kha spu can dang /rdo rje ral gri spu can dang /rdo rje lcags kyi lpags pa can dang /rdo rje zangs kyi kha spu
232b7(rgyud): chen dang /rdo rje ka la~M bi ka'i dbyings can dang /rdo rje dbang sbyin ma'i tshogs dang /rdo rje dgyes pa chen mo'i tshogs dang /rdo rje sgyu 'phrul gyi tshogs dang /rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gyi cho gas
233a1(rgyud): dang /rdo rje snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs dang /rdo rje rgyud du 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang /rdo dz+nyAn gyis brlabs pa'i tshogs dang /rdo rje rab tu gtugs par
233a2(rgyud): dang /rdo rje gsang pa'i chags dang /rdo rje gzugs kyi tshogs dang /rdo rje sgra'i tshogs dang /rdo rje dri'i tshogs dang /rdo rje rje'i tshogs dang /rdo rje reg gi tshogs dang /rdo rje khro ma chog
233a3(rgyud): dang /rdo rjegs gyon pa'i tshogs dang /rdo rje bza' btung gi tshogs dang /rdo rje bro gar gyi tshogs dang /rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi tshogs dang /rdo rje lha 'chags dngardo rjeg+hu myo'i tshigs
233a4(rgyud): dang /rdo rje dbye bar byed ma'i tshogs dang /rdo rje pad+mo phre ba ma'i tshogs dang /rdo rje bde bu mo'i tshogs dang /rdo rje sprin sdud ma'i tshogs dang /rdo rje dgyes pa mo'i tshogs
233a5(rgyud): dang /rdo rje mnyam po'i tshogs dang /rdo rje nyi zla'i 'od kyi tshogs dang /rdo rje mkha' gro ma'i tshogs dang /rdo rje yid bzhin gyi tshogs dang /rdo rje mchog phran 'dzin pa'i tshogs
233a6(rgyud): dang rdo rje zhing 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang /rdo rje nga rgyal can gyi tshogs dang /rdo rje thim par byed pa'i chags dang /rdo rje mchur chen de'i tshogs dang /rdo rje 'khor lo myi tshogs
233a7(rgyud): dang /rdo rje pad+mo'i tshogs dang /rdo rje khro bo'i cho gas dang /rdo rje mnyam par rdzogs pa'i tshogs dang /rdo rje dga' nyan sprul pa'i tshogs dang /rdo rje dngos grub las kyi tshogs dang /
233b1(rgyud): rdorje spyod pas ci la'ang thogs pa med pa'i tshogs dang /rdo rje rigasu thabs mkhas pa'i tshogs dang /rdo rje 'od 'phro ba 'bar ba'i tshogs dang /rdo rje chags pa med pa'i tshul du gnas
233b2(rgyud): pa'i tshogs dang /rdo rje sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa'i tshogs dang /rdo rje rigasu skyes pa'i tshogs dang /rdo rje me stag phra mo'i tshogs dang /rdo rje sems ma ye shesu snang ba'i
233b3(rgyud): dang /rdo rje med pa'i tshogs dang /rdo rje snyoms las med pa'i tshogs dang /rdo rje spyod lug med pa'i tshogs dang /rdo rje the tsom med par bsgrub pa'i tshogs dang /rdo rje gsang ba
233b4(rgyud): ma'i tshogs dang /rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa mo'i tshogs dang /rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs dang /rdo rje rnams par spras pa'i tsho gas dang /rdo rje rgyan bkod pa mo'i tshogs dang /rdo rje bstan pa
233b5(rgyud): mo'i tshogs dang /rdo rje na mkha' la rgyu ba mo'i tshogs dang /rdo rje skyon dag pa mo'i chags dang /rdo rje phyogs 'dzin pa ma'i tshogs dang /rdo rje gdul ba mo'i dgongs pa'i tshogs dang /
233b6(rgyud): rdo rje rten pa mo'i tshogs dang /rdo rje tshigs mtshon pa mo'i tshogs dang /rdo rje gab pa mo'i tshogs dang /rdo rje spras pa me'i tshogs dang /rdo rje thugs 'dzin pa mo'i tshogs dang /rdo rje 'byung
233b7(rgyud): ba mo'i chags dang /rdo rje shes rab 'dzin pa mo'i tshogs dang /rdo rje bde ba'i tshogs dang /rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs dang /rdo rje thugs kyi ye shes 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang /rje rje
234a1(rgyud): /snang ma'i tshogs dang /rdo rje rang 'byung mo'i tsho gas dang /rdo rje kun tu mang ba'i tshogs dang /rdo rje shes rab kyi mig dang ldan pa'i tshogs dang /rdo rje kun bzang
234a2(rgyud): longs spyod gnas pa'i tshogs dang /rdo rje rmongs par byed pa mo'i tshogs dang /rdo rje srog za bar byed pa mo'i tshogs dang /rdo rje za mo'i tshigs dang /rdo rje khrag za ba'i tshogs
234a3(rgyud): dang /rdo rje tshil za ba'i tshogs dang /rdo rje rkang za ba'i tshigs dang /rdo rje bsod nams gtar 'tshong ba'i tshogs dang /rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i tshogs dang //
234a4(rgyud): rdo rje sgra mtha' yas pa'i tshogs dang /rdo rje yon tan 'phrin las kyi tshogs dang /rdo rje lhun gyis 'grub pa'i tshogs dang /rdo rje sprul pa 'byung ba mo'i tshogs dang /rdo rje sgyu las 'byu
234a5(rgyud): ba mo'i tshogs dang /rdo rje gtum bag can dang /rdo rje gdug pa gtong ba sbrul g+ha chun po can dang /rdo rje 'jigs pa'i mgo brgyad pa dang /rdo rje mgo sna tshogs par sprul pa'i
234a6(rgyud): tshogs dang /rdo rje lus stong la mgo bcu pa dang /rdo rje lus brgya la me go cig pa'i tshogs dang /rdo rje lus sna tshogs dang /rdo rje yan lag 'bum yod pa dang /rdo rje gdug
234a7(rgyud): pa'i lag cha sna tshogs thogs pa dang /rdo rje lus brgya la mgo stong yod pa dang /rdo rje lus brgya la mgo brgya pa dang /rdo rje lus bcu la mgo gcig pa dang /mgo brgyad pa la
234b1(rgyud): rkang pa brgyad pa dang /mgo dgu pa la rkang pa gcig pa dang /de'i 'khor gyi yang sprul gyi po nya' ni lcags kyu khyi ste rkang gsum po dang /long ba rgyu basbrel ba dang /nag blo mgo dgu pa'o//
234b2(rgyud): shar gyi dka/ mo smyung dung gi khyi mo chen mo dang /lho'i sbrul gyi zhags pa can dang /nub kyi dmar mi zangs kyi mche ba can dang /byang gi ser mo dril bu can dang /'di rnams kyi po
234b3(rgyud): ni shar gyi rdo rje sdi me dang/rgyu'i nag mo dung gdu ma dang /nub kyi dmad ma sa d+mo'i mgro can dang /byung gi sang mo las kyi bdag mo dang /rdorjedus chen phreng ba can dang /rdo
234b4(rgyud): kyi phred btsun+da dang /rdo rje lcags kyi byeng brtan dang /rdo rje s+ya bri sa can dang / na mkha'i gra gcod mI dang / nyi ma'i ze bzhin ma dang /rdorjechu ba'i gzhung 'dul ma dang /rdo rje
234b5(rgyud): rgya mtsho'i gting dkrug ma dang /'di rnams kyi sku mdog ni sna tshogs pa'o//phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs pa'o//drag byed bdag pos sgrol bar byed pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das
234b6(rgyud): dpal he ru bas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las po nya'i las 'di gsungaso//oM hUM po nya sum brgya drug cu rnams//yud tsam gyis ni kun 'dul zhing /yud tsam gyis ni phyogs
234b7(rgyud): bcur 'phro//hUM dang phan gyi sgra sgrogs shing //bskal pa'i 'brug sgra chen po ldir//migo gsum po la lcags sder can//mi sha za po'i bdud dpung 'joms//bstas pas bdud//
235a1(rgyud): rnams tshig spyod cing //rgyu ma khyim rnams rab tu 'joms//rab tu mi spyan 'di dag //di yang dngas kyi bo \u0f85ste//las rnams rnams cad gdu rgya/
235a2(rgyud): mtshan dang dpe byung gnyis las 'phros//mgyogs pa mo phyogs ma'i de nyung ldan//klog 'gyu mi dang 'dra bar grags//chos nyid khyab pas mtshan ma dbyingasu sdung //ye shes
235a3(rgyud): thugs rjes 'brel bas kun la khyab//'phrin las dra bas 'gro ba brlabs kyis grel//de phyir lha mo rin chen dra ba ma//oM dz+wA la badz+ra hU~M//ye shes glog 'gyus mtshan ma dbyingasu
235a4(rgyud): gcod//skad cig thugs rjes bar ba dmyi gsal byed//phrin las glog 'gyus 'grobi yod kyis smras//dra bas spyad la glog 'argyu ma yis 'dren//badz+ra a ma ka trUM//'di
235a5(rgyud): dud/ ba ni//hU~M dang phaT gyi sgra sgrogs shing //bskol pa'i 'brug sna chen po bzhin//kun kyang mgyigs ma rlung dang mtshungs//mig gsum ye la lcags sde//man
235a6(rgyud): gsum po la rkang gsum po//mang du za zhing bdud khyim 'joms//bltas pas bdud rnams tshim byed cing //klu yi gnas kyang nges par 'joms//'di rnams khro bo'i pho nya ste//
235a7(rgyud): ha ta du lu'i sgra sgrogs shing //gang gis rlung phyogs song ba yi//khro bo thams cad nges par 'jig/na mo byi tsi ri b+h+re//ha ha ru lu ru lu b+h+yo//mgo brgyad po la rkang brgyad po//
235b1(rgyud): pa brgyad la mog kyang brgyad//lag pa brgyad ni rdo rje 'dzin//rtswa 'grin gnas kyang nges par 'joms//mag drug po la rkang drug po//ldog pa drug re rgyu drug gcod//rkang pa gsum ni bur ba/
235b2(rgyud): 'dril//g.yon pa gsum ni gtor ma sbyin//gang nas gang du 'gro ba'i tshe//rkang pa lcags phur rab tu drag/'od zer dud kas reg pa ni//chongs pa'i gnas kyang rab tu 'jig/laka pa
235b3(rgyud): g.yan pas bskyod pa ni//'phra men 'khor bcas ral pa 'bar//lcags kyus dgra sta rab thogs shing //zhing chen yan lag 'dzin pa 'phro//byang gi phyogs nas 'byung ba ni//lcags kyi
235b4(rgyud): khyi ste rkang gsum po//lcags kyi lus la nyi ma'i mig/spu ni lcags kyu bsregs pa 'dra//bang ni glog pas nges par mgyogs//skad ni 'brug pas shin tu tshe//rab tu mi srun 'di dag ni//
235b5(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang 'phrog/mgo dgu po la rkang gcig po//lus kyang gnag la 'od phung gnA ga/yan lag gnag la sbrul gyis brgyan//ral pa gnag cing mche ba gnag
235b6(rgyud): mig kyang gnag la lag nag po//mgyogs kyang rlung gis bskyod du med//'di dag pho nya'i mchog yin pas//las rnams thams cad grub par gyis//long ba rgyab sbrel phyi ma nang //
235b7(rgyud): mangs za zhing ri lu sgrol//mig kyang med la cang mi ste//yang ni lag pa sbrel te 'gro//'di yang khro bo'i pho nya ste//las rnams thams cad grub par byed//shar gyi phyogs nas
236a1(rgyud): 'gugs pa dri//dung gi khyu mo chen mo la//dud gi ba lang sku khrid can//dung gi me mo chen mo zhon//lag na lcags kyu 'bar ba thogs//lho yi phyogs nas
236a2(rgyud): 'gugs pa ni//lcags kyi khrid spyi rkang gsum pa//lcags kyi spyad mo mgo dbu la//lcug s+yAk+Sh+mI mi mo chen mo zhen//lhag na zhags pa skyil ma thogs//rlud kyi phyogs na 'du
236a3(rgyud): /Sha~M ga kyi khyim ma la zas kyi ma mo chen mo zhon//lag na lcags sgrog sgrib ma thogs//byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni//gser gyi khyi mo chen mo la//gser gyi mi mo
236a4(rgyud): chen mnan//lag na rdo rje phur bu 'dril//'di yang dpal gyi pauny+dzas+t+wa~M//las rnams thams cad grub par gyis///de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka b+h+yo nya bsgru
236a5(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungaso//dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi pa//bu su 'khor mo rtsings shis//du su dz+raM he ru ka'i ro lnga pa//sku mdog 'thing nag dbu gsum phyag drug pa zhig da de
236a6(rgyud): shar du rdo rje til mar dgod//lhor stag gi mgo can dgod//nub tu ga rAg gi mgo can dgod //byung du sbrul gyi mgo can dgod//de'i phyi rim pad+ma laM brgya rtsa brgyad rim pa
236a7(rgyud): gsume le 'o nya sum brgya ba du dgod de//de'i phyir ma rnam du la yang sbrul gyi pho nya dgod do//de'i phyir ma sgo ba bo na//pho nya las byed bzhi dgod do//ci bo gya dang /bka' nyan pa
236b1(rgyud): kwa bo nya dang /sprul pa dang /'di yang sprul pa dang /'di rnams yang dgra pa'i bdon du nges par rig par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa shin tu gsang ba te
236b2(rgyud): rol pa las rdo rje pho ny+tsi'i le'u ste lnga pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las he ru ka'i lus kyi bzlas pa 'di gsungs shi
236b3(rgyud): phyung //bdag med gnyis rtogs sgrib pa gnyis spangs pa//thugs rje sprul pas 'gro ba ma lus sgrol//yul med ma skyes byams pa'i chos dbyings las//'dzin pa mi rnyog snying
236b4(rgyud): na chags khro//gnyis med dag las phrin las snying rje snrums//dpal chen khrag 'thung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//rtog 'joms spyod pa 'thun pas 'tsho 'dul zhing /
236b5(rgyud): brda can yan lag len pa'i ngan go la//lha rgyud brjod pas dngos grub kun dang 'brel//bka' don gtan tshogs rigs pas brjod par 'os zhes bya ba'i don to//yung gsum man
236b6(rgyud): dge gsum dang spyi don gsum//sung br-I smr-i gtsa man drug gad du kye//spyi khog bcu pa ni sde don gyi khog phub la//bzhi com drug ldan gyig mgos so gcad//khro ba
236b7(rgyud): pa mtshan ma'o mnyor gyis bshad//'di ni khrig 'thung rngom brjid rgyal po'i lung //zhes tshig nyung zhing mdor 'dus la don mang por 'byung bas mdo sde zhes bya'o//bcom ldan 'das/
237a1(rgyud): dpal rdo rje snoms dngas bka' stsal pa/lung gsum gyis sna grangs te rde'u bya'o//man ngag gsum gyis 'jug bsdus te blo la bzhag pa'i don to//smra
237a2(rgyud): don gsum gyis lung thams cad kyi spyi gcad//spyi khog bcu bzhi sa don gyi khog dbub po//bdud bzhi bcom pas yon tan kun la snang ba'i che ba bcomo//rtsis mgo drug/
237a3(rgyud): gis sa bcadado//khro bo rtog pa mtshan ma'i gnyer gyis bshad pas nI gaM la sa dang ni sgrub pa spang //yon tAn kun rngom pas brjod gzhan la snang phyir rngom brjid chen po sum
237a4(rgyud): bcu rtsa drug bstan to//rgyal po yin pa'i rtags ni rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal por gsol lo//lung gis spyi dril de ba sha //de ltar rnam pa bcur nges nas//da ni phye byang bstan//
237a5(rgyud): te gses nas bshad pa de la lung gsum ni zhi gnas mi rtog dngos po mkha' khyab 'dra//lhag mthong mo rmongs gza' skar mkha' la bkram//gdod bcas don dang bstun
237a6(rgyud): de 'tsham par bshad//ting 'dzin shes rab bka' lung gsum du des//de la man ngag gsum ni bdag tu mi rtog sprul pa mdzod nas thang //yul du ma grub gzhan med
237a7(rgyud): mdzad du gshegs//yul sems gnyis med ma skyes dbyingasu gcig/nyan thos rang rgyal sems tsam spong man ngag/de la spyi don gsum ni//med rgyu btag char
237b1(rgyud): sgrub 'grub pa smras par snang //snod mthun khro dbu gangag pa 'odangul sos 'dul//rtog 'joms spyan rdzas dngos lon dngos grub tu//'dun khro bo spyi yi don du bshad//de la sku
237b2(rgyud): 'du bzhi ni//gang lkog sa ci phyir gang gis/oM//gang khro rnam pa bzhir ni shes bya ste//dang lho shugs khro bar brtas dang bcos//rtogs pa thug ste rang bzhin 'dul
237b3(rgyud): ba'i dbang //gang la snying rjes khros te yul dang gnas//las dang 'bras bu sems can sgrub pa'o//las pa ni sgrol mdzad 'bras bu sku gsung thugs//ci phyir rgyu dang 'bras
237b4(rgyud): gnyis la ni//dus gsum mi myong sha rus khrag la rol//gang gi ro ni trA~M d+hang hu hU~M phaT//gnas na lha 'og mkha' skyong pe shes thugs//bskyed thabs tshe 'phrul gsum po khye ba'i/

237b6(rgyud): brtul zhugs rol pas gdos bcas phung po po shig/dug gsum bdag phyir sha rus khrag la ze//rnam shes 'a snyed rgyal ba'i gan su sgrubs//rje saM mgo drug ni dbang dang dwa
237b7(rgyud): ldan pa dang //dpal dang gzugs dang grags pa dang //ye shes dang ni non tan dang //drug dang yang dag ldan phyir//de la dbang ni tshogs sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dag ni//
238a1(rgyud): sa stobasna sus dang 'jigs rdul smra sprul//don med bod pa khyam par ga yang gzhi ni/Sh+Tha dang rgyal mtshan ni rlung lhacan ldan/ la //byung da
238a2(rgyud): khyab pa thugs dam dmigs kyis bsgral//thugs rjes 'gro bI thams cad bu ltar dgongs//snron ldam dbang gis 'khor bar ji srid bye'ugs//gzhan don mdzad pas
238a3(rgyud): bdag dron lhun gyis grub//yongasu rdzogs pa bde ba chen po'i dpal//khro rgyal khrag 'thung dpal te rnam drug yin//de la dpal yongasu rdzogs pa badri ba chen po'i

238a5(rgyud): bsam yas po dris thogs pa de//bsam yas bsam khyab mkhas la gza' skur gsal//klu mthu gdul byir klu lngas sgo brgyan pa//mang chen gsung sgra dbying sa dang pho nyid

238b1(rgyud): dbang yi dwags srin po drang srong 'dra//de lnga grag pa ni bud d+ha To d+has bsnyed dam sras sngun dgengs//gti mug gzengs bstod nga rgyal gnon par grags//de la ye shes ni//rnam dag dbyings
238b2(rgyud): mkhyen 'khor ba'i skyon dang brel//'gro ba'i rgyud mkhyen 'khor ba'i mtha' las 'das//gnyisu med par mkhyen pas dbu mo'i ngang //mdor na thams cad pa yi ye shes yin//de la
238b3(rgyud): nan tan ni//na na tan snying po zag med zag bcos 'du//nan tan phrin las 'gro bA gnas nas 'don//bsam yas nan tan 'gro ba chud mi gson//nan tan mchog gi mchog tu shes/

239a1(rgyud): chags pa'i rgyan zhes pa//mi rtog dbyings nas thugs rje spyan//gzi chen don dam bcud kyi rgyan zhes pa//bcud kyi thig le don dam kun tu 'od//

239b1(rgyud): dang /mdzad brtags kyi phyag dang gnyiso//du la grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya ni dbu gsum dug gsum sku gsung thugs lhun grub//lta spyod rnam gsum grub pa'i rtags//sman
239b2(rgyud): dku sa gsum bu gsum ye shes gsum ste dgu//bgrong med thog mdo dmigs pa las 'das pa//rtag rgyud spyan gnyis mtha' yangs dbu ma'i spyan//shangs gsum srog
239b3(rgyud): la mnga' mdzad ting 'dzin gsum//de bzhin nyid du kun tu snang zhes bya//sgra chen tha dad sgra chen chos sku ting 'dzin ston//bral gsum rnam thar sgo gsum lhun gyis grub//

239b7(rgyud): mgon mdzad sku ga lung thugs//zhal gsum dbyingasu dug gsumi zad par rngub//ljags gsum theg gsum bstan pa'i gdangs dang sgrogs//khams gsum nyug byung
240a1(rgyud): rdo rje sbyin mo lce//mche bzhi skya shi rtsa nas garjod par mdzad phyag drug rgyud drug 'o khar ba gting nas 'don//phyag mtshan pha rol phyin drug 'gro don mdzad//zhabs

240a3(rgyud): shing 'joms//chos sku rdo rje tog dang bag chags bsregs//ye shes yin phyir de la de skad bya//ban d+ha bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa ni//chos dbyings spros med ye shes bzhi
240a4(rgyud): dang ldan//ye shes dbyings rtogs zhe na khrag thugs rje skye//mtha' gnyis skyon la mi bsngags bzod pa'i mchog/kha T+wAM stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa ni//dug gsum dga'
240a5(rgyud): byed dregs pa'i lha bdud 'joms//snod gsum srid pa yo 'dul rgyal po'i rtags//kun la mnga' mdzad 'khor rnams dbang du sdud//zhing chen smon lam pha rol phyin pa ni///
240a6(rgyud): 'bod pa'i g.yab mos 'khor rnams dbang du sdud//sbyin pa'i za bas mkha' gro tshim par byed//rdegs pa'i dbyig pas gdon bcas phung po ba shig/rtog pa chos nyid dran
240a7(rgyud): med shes lnga bzung //ci ltar smon cing grub pas de skad bya//thong gshol thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa ni//nyon mongs za ba thugs rjes zlog mdzad cing //ye shes chos
240b1(rgyud): dpyid snga mtha' dang bral ba'i rtags thabs kyis sku gsum lhun grub sprul pa 'phro//brda ni shes rab pha rol phyin bstan pa//yul med ma skyes mos sku rngak+ko la//'dzin pa bdag med
240b2(rgyud): rig pa'i dbyu gus brdungs//gsung rab rnga sgras 'gro ba shes rab skyed//'khor lo bsam gtan lhag pa gsum gyi mtshan//tshul khri mos ting 'dzin shes rab gsum dang ldan
240b3(rgyud): pad+ma ma 'dam skyes mtshogs thugs rjes spyod//tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa'i ngang du bstan//mi bzad par ldan sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin//ral gri ye shes thugs rje mtha'
