240b5(rgyud): de la 'di man chad che mchog yon tan gyi lung gis spyir dral de bshad pa ni/yon tan gyi brjid la phrin las kyi rngom sum cu rtsa drug bstan pa ni de la sku'i rngom pa bzhi la na mkha'i
240b6(rgyud): ri mo phyag rgyar rngom//cir yang 'gyur bzhi bzhugs tshul rngom/zil gyis gnon pa'i gdan rngom/cham dam chen po'i stobs rnam pa dang bzhi'o//dri yang kun rdzob rang bzhin
240b7(rgyud): med pa la na mkha' la sprin da pa'i tshul dang /lha dang 'phags pa tshangs pa dang //smon lam cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs thabs kyi tshul dang /srid pa'i 'khor lo zol gyis
241a1(rgyud): gnon pa med pa d+ma Ta da yon tan rtags de gdan khri'i tshul dang /stobs chen bcu'i rdul dang /rnam pa ni 'og nas 'chad//gsung gi rdum bzhi la tsa/
241a2(rgyud): lnga 'brel bar 'byung ba'i zhal rngom/TI gam cir yang 'gyur ba'i ljags dzam/skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshems rngom/gsung sgra 'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i dbyangs rngom pa'o//de
241a3(rgyud): yang zhal ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnam pa lnga'i bsreg khang du ra rnam pa lngas tshim zhing mchod pa 'brel pa rnam lnga'i tshul dang /gsung dbyangs tshul 'dus byas dang /rang bzhin zung
241a4(rgyud): ma 'dres par ston pa'i tshul dang /mche ba bzhi ye shes pa'i'i 'phro 'dus dug bzhi ye shes bzhis gcod pa'i tshul dang /'brug ltar sgrags pa'i yan lag drug cu'i dbyangs
241a5(rgyud): kyis snyan pa'i mdo sdes gro bAr sgrogs shing zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang rnam par bshad//thugs kyi rngom pa bzhi la ti dri 'dzin phyag rgya'i rgyan gyi skar chags ltar rje ma//
241a6(rgyud): yon tan sa gzhi rgyan gyi rtsi shing ltar rdo ba/mdzad pa rol mo rgyan gyi gar thabs ltar rngom pa'o//de yang rgya chen po bzhi ni rang bzhin dang rgyan du dbye'o//lhag mthong gi rang bzhin las lhag
241a7(rgyud): mthong gi rgyan ma gasro bar snang ba'i tshul dang /zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin la zhi gnas kyi rgyan khyad par du 'byung ba'i tshul dang /zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin bzod po las lhag mthong gi rgyan gyis/
241a8(rgyud): 'phrin las rgya mtsho rgyun gyi dba' rlabs lngar rngom/
241b1(rgyud): phan 'dogs pa'i tshul dang /zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin mi zad ma gol bu las lhag mthong gi rgyan gyis cir yang 'gyur ba'i dga' ba skyed pa'i tshulo//mthu'i rngom pa bzhi la ru tra bac+doMs pa'i/
241b2(rgyud): gnas rngo ma/lha chen gnon pa'i gdon rngom//khams gsum sgrol ba'i zhing rngo ma//rtogs 'joms spyod pa'i brtul zhugs rngom/dri yang gnas khyad par can bkris shing rjes kyang myi chu
241b3(rgyud): ba'i tshul dang /gnas khyad par can thams cad zil gyis glanon pa'i tshul dang /zhing khyad par can khams gsum yo sgrol ba'i zhing tshul dang /spyod pa khyad par can srid pa'i rtog pa
241b4(rgyud): dus gcig tu bcom pa'i chu lo//rngom tshul sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad//de la brjid chen po lnga/sku che yan lag rags pas brjid tshe/grangs myong rkyen dang 'tsham pas brjid
241b5(rgyud): bkur 'os gtso bor mthong bas brjid che/khyad zhugs yid dang 'thad pas brjid che ba ste bzhi'o//de yang chos sku dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas sru rje/thugs rje dang ma
241b6(rgyud): bar 'byung ba'i sgro nas sprul rags sems 'du byed dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas sprul pa grangs mang /smon lam gyi sgo nas ri gas dang 'thun pa'i rkyen du 'tsham/
241b7(rgyud): spyod lam gyi sgro nas bkur bar 'os/rigs btsun pa'i sgo nas gtso bor mthong /rang bzhin grub pa'i sgo nis khyad zhugs/phrin las kyi sgo nas yid dang 'thad/gsung gi
242a1(rgyud): brjid bzhi la gdangs che stong gsum gang+ga byas brjid che/tshig myur the tsom gcod pas brjod che/bdag la cher ston snyam pas brjid tshe/khyad zhugs//
242a2(rgyud): yon tan mthong bas brjid che de yang chos skus khyab pa'i sgo nas sgre che/sgra thA de dpu'i sgo nas stong gsum+bu greng /sgyu dbyangs sgo nas kun gyis gro byas myur/nye bar bsgyur
242a3(rgyud): pa'i sgo nas the tsom+ba gcod/byams pa'i sgo nas bdag la gzigs/thugs rje'i sgo nasnga nyi tsher ston/shes pa'i bye brag gi sgo nas khyad zhugs/tshig gi yon tan gyi sgo nas 'dul
242a4(rgyud): thugs kyi brjid bzhi la yangs pa re dogs med pas brjid che/gsal ba mtha' gnyis spangs pas brjid che/thugs rje thugs dam mthar 'byin pas brjid che/mu rmongs thabs
242a5(rgyud): kyis 'dul bsdu brjid che'o//de yang gnyis med pa'i sgo nas yangs/spang blang med pa'i sgro nas re drogs med/lhag mthong gi sgo nas dbu mar gsal/zhi gnas kyi sgo nas mi
242a6(rgyud): 'gyur ba/gnyis mtha' spangs/mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sgo nas thugs rje che/'khor ba ji srid bzhugs pa'i sgo nus thugs dam mthar 'byin/shes rab kyi sgo nas rmongs
242a7(rgyud): bsel/ting 'dzin gyi sgo nas thabs kyisa'i 'dul yon tan gyi brjed bzhi la/med pa zad mi shes pas brjid che/gcig la 'dod dgur ston pos brjid che/gnod sbyor phan
242b1(rgyud): ba dad pas brjid che/bzlas mkhas skyon gyis mye gos brjid rgya'o//de yang bdag tu mi 'dzin pa'i sgro nas med/med pa'i sgo nas zad ma shes/ye shes kyi sgo nus gcig/sam+bas rgyan
242b2(rgyud): nA 'drod dgur ston/sems kyi sgo nas gnodra par sbyor/grub pa rgyu'i sgo nas phan par mdzad/shes bya'i sgo nas thabs mkhas spyod pa'i sgo nas skyon gyis ma gos/phrin las kyi brjid
242b3(rgyud): bzhi la/mi mnyel nyam phag rol bas brjed tshe//'khor ba yu nI rings mi mnyel bar brjid che/mgon skyabs rgyun du mdzad pos brjid che/dgongs pa'i don rnams mdzad pas
242b4(rgyud): brjid che'o//de yang sgyu mar gyur pa'i sgo nas mi mnyel//rang bzhin gcig pa'i sgo nas phag tu rol//spyod pa'i sgra nas 'khor bar yun ring por bzhugs//bya ba med pa'i sgo nas
242b5(rgyud): mi gnyelnga//mthu yi sgro na sde mgon skyabs che//dam bcas pa'i sgro nas 'gro don rgyun tu mdzad//rtse gcig gi sgo nas mtha' gnyis kyi skyon dgongs//nun tAn gyis sgo nus bya ba
242b6(rgyud): grub//brjid nyi shu dang sgo bzhi bcu ste spyi dru ga cu pa'o//de la rin po che sna bdun ne 'khor lo rin po che'i dbang bcus skye ba bzhi la dbang bskur//btsun mo rin po ches ni yul
242b7(rgyud): kyi rgyal po la mnyes par dbu bo//de mgo mi rin po che'i tshul dgus pha rol gyi dpung 'jom so//khyim bdag rin po che'i tshad med pa bde'i rgyal po'i chab sred 'dzin to//
242b8(rgyud): glang po na pa che'i sbubs bzlas pa rab tu bdag dang gzhan gyi ngan byed//d+ha rin poche myur mgyogs rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bkris bgrod pa'i gnas sgrib par byed//yang bzhin gyi nor bu rin po cheni rna ba bzhi'i sgonas sems can byer bdang mang ngo //
243a1(rgyud): lung rnam pa gsum ni mi 'da' ba rgyan gyi lung la sogs bla gong+ga duN+Di sa mgo spyir sbyar bar bzang //de nasnga 'khor lo rin po che'i dbang cu ni/skye bzhi skur
243a2(rgyud): ston skye bzhi sgrol mdzad pa//lha mi sdig sprul mche ba bzhi ru ston//yo byad brid pa'i 'dod yon sngo dang no//rtog pa gzhom phyir sman lnga dang len rol//ci ltar mos bzhin
243a3(rgyud): 'dod dogu gzugs ston pa//gar da bde 'thi nga draga'i tshul du ral pa mdzod//rdzu 'phrul ba spu'i dbyibs nas phra men 'phro//lus ni ci rdzu sems ni cho 'phrul ston//rmad rgyangs
243a4(rgyud): gdangs ngar sgrog pa sna tshogs kyis//mche ba zil gnon tha dad chos rnams ston//shes rab thabs ldan spyan gnyis dbu ma'i ngang //dbyings las maM g.yos cir yongs
243a5(rgyud): le mkhyen//sems kyi bye brag ting 'dzin tha dad 'phro//bsam gyis mi khyab bzhi lnga rol pa mdzad//rdo rje ro sder mo lpags pa spu phreng rgyan//'khor ba ci srid bzhugs pa'i
243a6(rgyud): tshu la dbang //lta ba rnam bzhi spyan zur gyis bskur bste//phra men bzhi 'phro phyogs bzhir las bzhi mdzad//smon+de lam dbad+ma gi sa dag bo pUr ston pa//dus mthe'i bskal pa
243a7(rgyud): bzhin du bshol du med//de lo btsun mo rin po che'i dbang ni//ma chags rdo rje gzugs kyi yum gyis 'khyud//zhi gnas ting 'dzin mi g.yo yum gyis sbyor//thogs med
243b1(rgyud): shugs 'chang don grub yum gyis skyon//lhag mthong ye shes yum gyis mnyes byed 'bebs//'byung ba bzhi po rdo rje lha myo ste//bde ba chen po'i sgyu lnga mnyes par dbul//dmug mi na
243b2(rgyud): po che'i tshul dgu ni//bsgrags pas 'gro ba shes rab bskyed tshul byed//nyam nga mod pa'i dpa' bo'i tshul//gdug rtsu ba gdos bcas brgyan pa sde 'jigs pa'i tshul//log par ste//
243b3(rgyud): bzhe gcod gshe ba'i tshul//rmad du byung ba'i chos sgrogs bzhad pa'i tshul//shin tu gdul dka' la khro snying rje'i tshul//smon+da lAm dbang gis mi shom rngam pa'i tshul//nyon mongs
243b4(rgyud): grub pa'i gyur mdzad ngo mtshor tshul//khro drag dbyings nus mi g.yo zhi ba'i tshul//de la khyim bdag rin po che'i tshad med pa bzhi ni//khro ga tu ma tshad med byams par snang //bsod nam
243b5(rgyud): snying rje bdag nyid che//bsgral zhing bstabs pa draga' ba'i mchog/yal bar mi 'dor btang snyomaso//de la glang po rin po che'i stobs bcu ni//thugs rje chen po'i stobs ni dregs
243b6(rgyud): tshan bskyengs phyir gnon//chos nyid stobs ni mi dmyigs na mkha'i mdog/mi 'byed stobs ni dngos grub bdud rtsi'i rgyun//ma spangs stobs ni gdod bcas sku la rgyan//ma g.yo
243b7(rgyud): stobs ni don mthun grol ba'i brgyan//smon lam stobs ni bskal par yongs grol mdzad//sprul pa'i stobs ni mgo brnyan 'phra mon 'phro//phrag dog log lta 'khor bar gci
244a1(rgyud): /mi gtong //'dod chags yud tsam 'phrul 'dod spyan mdog dumarU//de lar+N+Na rin po che'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni//chos dbyings med bzhin
244a2(rgyud): cir snang ba//mkha' la 'ja' tshon bzhin du rnam par dkram//ye shes rdzu 'phrul chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa//mkha' la nyi shwar bzhin du gsal la stong //tshogs gnyis rdzogs
244a3(rgyud): ba'i rdzu 'phrul bye brag ni//mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sprin phung bzhin du gdal//sprul pa'i bye brag 'phro ba'i rdzu 'phrul ni//rol gcig char 'babs snod bye brag phye/de la nor bu rin
244a4(rgyud): po che'i rang bzhin ni//'gro rnams ci ltar 'dod pa'i ri 'dod skyong //mi zad bdag nyid gtor chen na mkha'i mdog srid gsum mun nag spel ba'i ye shes sgron//dus gsum rgyun
244a5(rgyud): mi 'chad pa'i rin chen 'phreng //lung gsum ni rtsi snga mgo spyir sbyar ba yi no/da ni lha rgyud kyi rtog pa so sngor bshad pa bya ste//'gro rnams ci ltar 'dul zhing gshegs mdzad pa'i
244a6(rgyud): shes rang na mkha'i bskal pa dga' rgyud ston/gaN+DI mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms mdzad pa//gti mug rdo rje bud d+ha hUM ru ka/ye shes rdo rjes nyon mongs rdo rje 'joms//thabs
244a7(rgyud): 'dzin 'tshod pa'i dngos po bshig/zhe sdang rdul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad pa//zhe sdang rdo rje badz+ra he ru ka/rin chen dbyig ltar kun skong zhing //bdag med zhi gnas chu yi
244b1(rgyud): bskul bas 'khyu/dra rgyal tshul gyis nga rgyal 'joms mdzad pa//nga rgyal rdo rje rang nu he ru ka/'khor ba'i 'dam du pad+ma ltar sku 'khrungs shing //lhag mthong me chen 'bar bas thams cad sreg
244b2(rgyud): 'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms mdzad pa//'dod chags rdo rje pad+ma hUM ru ka/phrin las rgya mtshos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i/shes bya thogs med bskal pa'i rlung gis daskyed//
244b3(rgyud): p+laphrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms mdzad pa//phrag dog rdo rje karmA he ru ke/sku'i longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing //shes rab mthar cing gti mug rnam par dag/phyag rgya
244b4(rgyud): gzugs kyi mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing /chos dbyings na mkha'i dbang sgyur khro mo rgyu lo//thugs kyi sangs spyod sku tshogs mi dmigs shing //brtson 'grus mapar byed no
244b5(rgyud): rnam par dag/rtogs pa reg bya'i mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing //sra bar+t+ta rdo rje dbang bskur khro ma rgyul//gsung gi lings spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing //tshul khrims ma
244b6(rgyud): byiphyin 'dod chags rnam par dag/gsung rab sgra yi mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing //lhag mthong ye shes dbang bskur khro mo rgyal//yon tan longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs
244b7(rgyud): shong //sbyin pas mthar phyin nga rgyal rnam par dag/ngar 'dzin bro mchog mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing //bdag med ni gnas dbang bskur khro mo rgyal//phrin las longs spyod
245a1(rgyud): sna tshogs mi dmigs shong //bzod pas mthar phyin phrag dog rnam par dag/tshul khrims dri med mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing //thogs med lus la drang /
245a2(rgyud): bskur khro mo rgyal//thugs mchog rnam dag ye shes dkar mo'i tshogs//'gugs mdzad ye shes lnga yi dbyug to can//dran pas rgyud lnga sgrol mdzad zhi bar gzigs//srid
245a3(rgyud): gsum 'joms byed dbyug thogs gr-i ri ma//sku yi yon tan tshogs sdud rkun mo'i tshogs//mthu 'phrog zhi gnas lkog mthong zung du 'brel//bden gnyis lta bas khro
245a4(rgyud): tshul 'gro la gzigs//dam tshig dbyings mchog skul byed tso'u ri ma//gsung gis thams cad zil gnon rmongs pa'i tshogs//dbang mdzad mtha' gnyis mi yang chu srin
245a5(rgyud): g+hi/mi gnas rgyal mtshan 'dzin cing myos par lta//stong gsum dbang mdzad rgyal byed bra mo hA//thal ba byed pas thal byed ma yi tshogs//kun gyi dngos grub rdo rje rtse dgu
245a6(rgyud): 'dzin//sa dgu rtog 'joms shi ba glong bAr gzigs//'jig rten thal byed rde'u thegs pi ta li//'byed mod shes rab mI rtog lbos mo'i tshogs//'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin
245a7(rgyud): 'ching zhing dbang 'dren las//khre gar gzigs tshul rgyun gyis thugs rjes sgrol//bde mchog dbyingasu 'dren mdzad du k+ka yi//zhe sdang tshul gyis don mdzad gtum ma'i
245b1(rgyud): tshogs//myos mdzad dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pa'i//thugs rjes dkrug cing ro za'i tshul du gzigs//snod bcud dkrugs nas skongs mdzad g+ha sma ri//chags pa'o//
245b2(rgyud): tshul gyis dron mdzad sme sha can//ma ni rgyud 'phel bzung 'dzin bral ba'i rtags//mtha' gnyis sbyangs pas rnam par g.yengs tshul bzhugs//'bar ba stong gsum stobs
245b3(rgyud): byed tsaN Da li//thams cad 'byung ba'i lhun 'gyur ma tshogs ma//kun gyi las mdzad chos kun snying po 'dzin//kun+da la rol pas gzigs tshul kun dang ldan//thugs rje 'jig
245b4(rgyud): rten sgrol mdzad sma sha ni//'joms byed rtsal mchog rdo rje thugs kyi yum//mnyen po stobs kyis thams cad zil gyis glanon//shes rab thabs ldan sku gsum bdag
245b5(rgyud): gzhan don//sdug bsngal zhe sdang bsod byed sing ha ma//dpa'i brtun za byed ye shes thugs rje'i las//brtson 'grus myur ba'i shugs 'chang 'gro don du//thugs rje ye shes
245b6(rgyud): rtse gcig so sor gzigs//nga rgyal 'chi bdag 'joms mdzad bya khro ma//mdzes byed dmI tshig rnam drag gsung gi yum//thabs mkhas spyod pas bdag dang gzhan don
245b7(rgyud): mdzad//don gyi chos sku ting 'dzin ljags la gtad//'dod chags dur khrod 'joms mdzad sri ka ma//mi ma byed spyod pas mchog rigs kyi yumo//g.yer ba'i phrin las/
246a1(rgyud): 'gro la thugs rjes srung /chos nyid sku la ye shes spyan gyis gzigs//phrag dog las grub za byed shA na ma//yid kyi ye shes so so kun la rtog/
246a2(rgyud): rnam shes kyis bas god 'brang tshul khrims srung //'khor ba'i rgyun gcod rgyud 'dzin rgyu gri 'dzin//mgyogase mas snyags byed khrag 'thung gyi gya ma//rnam shes mnyam
246a3(rgyud): nyid yid 'grogs mtshan ma 'joms//gresad pa'i gong rnams sbyin pas pha rol phyin//mthu' 'das chos sku gzugs 'dzin spangs tshul bzung //'gro ba'i sdug bsngal tshe 'phrog
246a4(rgyud): kA ka ma//snyad pas mi 'gyur bkrus pas mi 'dag cing //mi mthun gnyen pos mau shig bzod pa'i mchog/chos sku thugasu chud phyir zhal na thogs//yon tan yid bzhin bdag
246a5(rgyud): nyid kang ka maM//dbyings la mi rtog 'gro la thugs rjes gzigs//gnyis la mi gnas shes rab pha rol phyin//dbyings kyi thugs rjes phrin las 'dus ma byas//mtha'
246a6(rgyud): gnyis spangs pa'i rngam tshul ka/bcu drug zhag gisgra zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs//dpal chen bcu drug sa lo lhun gyis grub//bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs
246a7(rgyud): pa'i sku//thog ma med cing yon tan zla ba med//sbyin pas rigs pa'i klung du mtsho drang ltar//'khor bas 'jigs nas thugs rjes lcags kyus 'dren//dpa' bar 'gro ba'i
246b1(rgyud): ting 'dzin don mdzad pa//thugs rje shar mdzad rta gdong lcags kyu ma/don dang 'thun pas kun kyang dga' bar mdzad//byams pa'i zhags pa 'khor ba'i rgyun 'dzin cing //rin chen
246b2(rgyud): phyag rgyas sems can+da re 'dod skong //yon tan tshegs rdzogs phag gidong zhags pa ma//gzhan gyi don du spyad pas bdag gi don//shes rab sgron mas mun pa'i sdug bsngal
246b3(rgyud): sel//don gnyis mi 'da' dga' ba'i mchog/kun gnyen ma rig nub mdzad nyi zla'i spyan//snyan par spo bas kun kyang bkra' bzhin byed//btang snyoms thabs mkhas thu
246b4(rgyud): rjes 'gro don du//phab nus rnam shes thal ba'i gzugs kyang 'tsho//chos ston bag chags byung mdzad dril 'khrol ma//da ni srin po'i lha rgyud bshad de//bco brgyad spyan gyis
246b5(rgyud): bco brgyad khams la gzigs//bcwo brgyad shangs nas bco brgyad sprul par 'byung //bco brgyad khams la bco brgyad skyer ston cing //bco brgyad thugs kyis bco brgyad
246b6(rgyud): 'dul thabs mnga'//bco brgyad snyan gyis bco brgyad khams gsun cing //bco brgyud ljags kyis gsung rabs bco brgyad 'chad//brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dgongs pa bsdam mi
246b7(rgyud): khyab//sa dgur thugs rjes don mdzad dbu dgur ldan//brjod gnon zhabs brgyad phyogs brgyad lha brgyad gnon//ci ltar rol yang spyan dgu dbyings mi ga'o//
247a1(rgyud): 'dul ba'i dbang du bskal pa'i tshul ston cing //rdo rje srin pos ci 'dul yid bzhin rdzogs//rnam thar gsum las sku gsum phrin lngas 'byung //spyod pa
247a2(rgyud): rnam dag smon lam stobs kyis gshegs//ral bsogs sprul pas 'gro don rtse gcig rol//bco brgyad stong pas mnyes mdzad rtsa ti ma//brjed pa'i stobs kyis klunams
247a3(rgyud): zil gnon cing //phra ma'i skyon spangs ngag gi dbang phyug che//'bod pa med pa'i brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan//chos la dbang mdzad ha yaM 'gri ba dpal//'dzin tshul stabs kyis
247a4(rgyud): drang srong char gcod cing //log lta'i nyes spangs yang dag lha dang ldan//tshul khrims mthar phyin drang srong spyod pas che//skye la dbang mdzad bran tshul mi g.yo mgon//shugs
247a5(rgyud): 'chang stabs kyis rlung lha tshar gcod cing //'byal pa'i spyod spangs ngag gi dbang phyug tsho//'dod pa kun la sbyin mdzad rgyal po'i tshul/sems la dbang mdzad 'dod pa'i
247a6(rgyud): khro bo rgyal//'chir ba'i stabs kyis gnod sbyin zhabs kyi so mnan//ngag tsub skyon rje spangs ngag gi dbang phyug che//smon lAm mthar phyin bdud 'dul thugs rje'i rtse//lus
247a7(rgyud): le dbang mdzad bdud rtsi kuN Da li//gnon po'i stabs kyis 'byung po tshar gcod cing //gnod sems nyes spangs thugs kyi dbang phyug che//mnyan pa'i stobs kyis mi mthun
247b1(rgyud): gnon mdzad cing //rdzu 'phrul dbang mdzad 'jigs byed stobs po che//rdeg pa'i stobs kyis srin po tshar gcod cing //bden dang bral ba'i brdzun spangs skyon sel bya//mtshan ma'i thabs
247b2(rgyud): kyis mtshan ma 'dul mdzod pa//ye shes da dang mdzad dbyug pa sngon po can//'debs pa'i stabs kyis sA bdag tshar gcod cing //brnab sems skyon spangs thugs kyi dbang phyug che//bzod
247b3(rgyud): pas gzhi lta bu gzhir 'gyur ba//smon lam dbang mdzad 'dam skyes kuN Da li//zlog pa'i stobs kyis bdud rnams tshar gcod cang //'dod chags skyon spangs sku yi dbang phyug che//
247b4(rgyud): ye shes mthar phyin nyi zla'i 'di bzhin gsal//skye bzhi mos pas dbang mdzad hUM ka re//rol po'i stobs kyis lha rnams tshur gcod cing //ma byin len po'i skyon spangs bdag nyid te//
247b5(rgyud): rab tu shes pa'i shes rab mthar 'byin pa//yo byad dbang mdzad gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal//'jigs byed stabs kyis 'chi bdag zil gnon cing //srog gcod nyes spangs sku yi dbang
247b6(rgyud): phyug che//gzung 'dzin skyon spangs bsam gtan ngang la gnas//tshe la dbang mjed 'jigs byed gshin rje gshed//ye shes thugs rjes zin pa sa mthar mi 'ching //thugs rjes
247b7(rgyud): zin pa'i srid las grol//gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar ba sems//'dod pa'i rgyal po mnyes mdzad la se ke/rig pa'i sder chen chos kyi dbyings nyid 'dzin//thugs rje lca
248a1(rgyud): kyus 'khor ba mo gtong zhing //shos rab zabs kyis lcags kyus mtha' gnyis 'dzin//gtso ba dbyug sngon mnyis mdzad dra to rA//yo shrIs mtshan sprad thugs//
248a2(rgyud): rje grod 'byung zhing //sprul pas 'gro bsgras sku dang ye shes 'phro//shes snying ma skyes dbu ma'i rig pa skye//sta na ba te se khro rgyal gshin rje mnyes//dbyingasu mtshani ma shes//
248a3(rgyud): rab tho bas brdungs//thugs rjes sems can phrin las mtshan ma 'joms//dbu ma ra yAM shes snying rje me tog dang //mi ga yoM mgon po mnyes mdzad mr-i ha lo//rdo rje gtum
248a4(rgyud): mo mtshan ma'i dngos po bcom//thugs rje rnga ma tshul srid pa thal bar brlag/gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar bsdigs//ha ya 'gri ba mnyes mdzad tsaN Da li/
248a5(rgyud): phra mor 'bigs pa'i ye shes dbyingasu 'phen//'bigs pa'i ye shes gnad du thugs rjes rdeg/ma khyogs dbu ma chen po'i don ton pa/gzhan gyis mi thub mnyes byed
248a6(rgyud): sha ya ti//mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings zos rig pa'i sgra//dbyings nyid rig shes dbyings la nyan pa'i sgra//de la snyan pa gsung gi sgra 'byin pa//bdud rtsir 'khyil ba sha ya ya
248a7(rgyud): tis mnyes//bdag rtog log lha'i mtshan ma btsam zhing //za byed mche bas skye bzhi rtsad bcad de//sku dang ye shes ma skyes mi dmigs pa//pad+mo 'khyil pa mnyes byed ma
248b1(rgyud): ran//thugs dam dbang gis rnam dag dbyings nas bskul//thugs ngas shugs kyis 'gro ba gnas nas 'dren//gnyis med mchod bskul dbu ma'i dgyes pa stobs//mA hA h+ya la
248b2(rgyud): mnyes mdzad tsun dam//bskyod pa'i ye shos sa rnams dus gcig gcod//thugs rje shugs kyis 'gro ba gnasnga nas spor//thabs dang shes rab bskyod pas mtha' gnyis spong /
248b3(rgyud): ba ya pa tis khams gsumo hUM mdzad mnyes//sdug bsngal thugs rjes mi bzod phrin las dpa'//yal bar mi 'dor brtson 'grus shugs kyis brten//gdong nas don mdzad 'ja
248b4(rgyud): ba mthar thug sgrol//de phyir dpa' brtul za byed phye khra ma//sdang mig mi 'gyur thugs rje zhe la gnon//mthu rtsal rngo ma brjid 'gyur med bdud dpung bzlog/tsham ngam ral pa si Di
248b5(rgyud): gdangs ngar 'jog rten 'gengs//de phyir 'gyur med 'phra med tsa sa ra//rtogs pa'i/daHspangs dran pa'i dgon par gnas//'khrul skyon dri med shes bzhin rdzi mtshor spong //
248b6(rgyud): 'gro don dus la bab na thugs rjes 'jug de phyir 'jug par byed pa'i ha ri na//chos dbyings gnas mal rtog pa'i skyon seli zhing //thugs rje spu ris sprul pa bsam ma khyab
248b7(rgyud): dug gsum 'joms mdzad sha ru khrag la rol//sel byed sprul pas don mdzad d+ha ma//yang dag zon chags 'gro don thabs mkhas ldan//me 'dul zide thu ba btang snyoms
249a1(rgyud): rnon por bzhugs//dus su bab nas brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan//phyir ma khwa btsun mdzod pa n+ya lA rmA/nA shos das mya 'jug dra
249a2(rgyud): shes bya za//dbyings nyid shes la 'jug pa nyon mongs za//gnyis med ye shes phrin las 'khor ba za//de phyir za byed pu ka muk+Sha pa//rigs btsun gaunyis pora'i gyur
249a3(rgyud): bar thams cad 'dul//phrin las rtsal gyis bdud dpung thams cad 'joms//stong nyid sgra bsgrags mu stegs wa tshogs 'jig/de phyir 'joms byed rtsa mchog sing
249a4(rgyud): hA ma//dbyings la ye shes nyal zhing thugs rje rmi//lding nag nag po drag po sku ston pa//thugs mchog rnam dag chos nyid dbyingasu mkhyen//de phyir rmi byed 'phra men rak+Sha
249a5(rgyud): maM//ye shes thugs rje stobs kyis mtha' gnyis gnon//tsham ngam ral ba sngags sprul pas bdud dpung 'joms//lus su tsi mjed brtson 'grus skyobs kyis rol
249a6(rgyud): dephyir stobs ldan 'phra men ha k+Sha ma//lhag mthong chos dbyings zhi gnas brlan gyis rgyal//thugs rje 'khor bar smon lam skyobs kyis myos//rtog 'joms rdzus la
249a7(rgyud): gtsang sme med par rol//de phyir 'phra mon myos byed u ka ra//yid g.yo las can sems dpar gyur pa ni//ye shes dbang gis thugs rjes 'gro la g.yo//don mdzad
249b1(rgyud): god 'brang ye shes dbyingasu mkhyen//de phyir tshul khrims chen po kyi kye ma/bsam pa'i dngos po 'dod la 'dun pa ni//dbyings nyid mnyam nyid ye shes mkhyen pas zla//zug pa/
249b2(rgyud): rje 'dun pas 'khor ba bag chags sbyong //de phyir 'phra men za byed don ka ma//dbyings lnga sems 'dzin yid la byed par 'gyur//ye shes dbyings rtogs drangs pa nyid mo
249b3(rgyud): nyal//'phro 'dongs rmongs la thugs rjes mtshan mo ldan//ye shis thugs rjes drongs pa'i u lu ka/brtags pa'i dngos la rtse gcig ting 'dzin 'gyur//mnyam nyid maH
249b4(rgyud): bral dbyings las mi g.yo ba//rtog ge spyod yul byas pas mi mthong ba//de phyir sle ba byed 'phro men ba ya ta//las 'bras bden la yid chos dang gyur te//mnyam nyid dbyingasu
249b5(rgyud): ye shes thugs kyis mgyogs//zhi gnas spyan rdzi lkog mthong bgrod tshags chung //de phyir 'phra men 'gyogs byed b+ha ga shri ta//nges pa'i dngos la 'dzin pa'i mos pa 'gyur/
249b6(rgyud): lhag mthong ye shes dbyings nyid mnyam 'gyur 'dzin//TI gnas gces par 'dzin pa mi 'phrogs pa//de phyir 'phro med 'dzin mA tsa ta mu//'dris pa'i dngos po ma brjed dran
249b7(rgyud): par gyur//dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med mo brjed dran//ting 'dzin 'bum phrag lhag mthong so sor bas la//gnyis lam rmongs zin ma ti ti la//chos rnams 'byed pa'i byed
250a1(rgyud): par gyur pa no//mnyam+b+ha nyid drung du log+nak+ShA somya byed cing //rig pa bskyod pas somany+dzitshom gcod//dro b+hir 'bru men gsod bye na ku la//'jug pa
250a2(rgyud): dbang med pa'i gnyid byur pa//bstan pa'i tshos sgrogs log lta myos byed cing //mnyam dang mi mthun log lta myos byed phyiraro//thams cad myas byed phra menA ru shi ka/
250a3(rgyud): gsum 'dus gcod pa'i reg pa gyur pa ni//phrin las bye brag mang po ci mdzad cing //phyag rgya bzhi po ma skyes dbyingasu bros//de phyir 'phra men 'bros byid ka si kA/'khor
250a4(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje brjod pas mya ngan 'das//chos sku rdo rje brjod pas mtha' gnyis spangs//rjod byed brjod bral don gyi tshig dang bral//de phyir rjod byed badz+ra pa shA ma//chos nyid rdo rjes
250a5(rgyud): mtshan ma'i dngos po bshig/ye shes rdo rjes bzung 'dzin rtog pa bsregs//phyag mtshan rdo rjes dregs pa'i lha bdud bcom//de phyir 'joms byed badz+ra bai ra baM//'chi med bdud
250a6(rgyud): rtsi yul sems skye 'gag med//grub pa'i bdud rtsi bsam pa'i 'bras bu thob//thugs rjes 'gro bdud rtsi gtong bla med bsgrub//rtsi mchog ye shes badz+ra oM mr-i ta//
250a7(rgyud): shes 'phro byed yon tan rgya mtsho bsgrag/thugs rjes 'phrog byed 'jig rten dbang du bdud//ye shes thugs rjes gnyis med dbang du 'ub//de phyir brlag byed badz+ra ma
250b1(rgyud): rA/na d+hA na dang //nga phyugs kyu rgyud smad pa shA/hA d+hA su ma nud+harmA//gas ga sa drus mkhyen//bstanan nas so /
250b2(rgyud): mAM gas na//shings ldanas byung rigs lnga'i sprul 'bras pas//rgyud m+b+hi'i yo zhi ni mdzad rtson ldan d+ha dbus//dug snga rdul du shi mdzad cing //lcags 9/
250b3(rgyud): chomi gcod phyir byeg 'chad//skye shi la sa gis d+mo la mngade shog ni brjod//bcu drug dmyal khams bani drug phyag gis 'dres//phyogs brgyad yub phy-ir na sa
250b4(rgyud): bAn+d+hang+ga b+h+yo bskyod pas//rigs sbyin snod dusu zla 'di dang brjig ga yang ches mnan//tshe yang chen med//bcu drug zhog gis blo
250b5(rgyud): gnyis spyong //non drugs la jug phyogs pa ni dbu ltar 'bar ltar rigaso lnga'i dgra//mkhyen pa'i yo nas thugs rjes gzugs//tshogs chen yongasu rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang //
250b6(rgyud): rkyen+da yang dus pa'i dkrol 'khor dang //tshigs chen du nyis ga n+d+he ye shepa sbyin sgrub bla//dkyil 'kho gsum gyis brjid pa'i ts+tsha 'o//thugs rje 'dam skyes
250b7(rgyud): skyon migs//me ba'i gnyis dbang mdzad pad+me te ru//rngam pa'i tshul gyis srin mo gzugs 'dzin cing //bod rus gdug pa 'bum ma zasu za//sring pa'i sems can chags pa'i hU~M/
251a1(rgyud): khrag gastsol//dbang drug lus mdzad mA bu rak+ShA s+t+wa~M//sdug+sa bsngal mya ngan 'dus rtog tshangs pa'i gzugs//tshad med pa ni rdzogs rtags kyi dbu pan
251a2(rgyud): ldan//zhabs bzhir sgra 'don gling bzhir bkra shis brjod//gti mug yid bzhin rin tshon pra ma ti//thams cad many+dzam pa ny-i de rtogs rigs mchog ma//ma rig dug gsum
251a3(rgyud): 'jams mdzad dpa mi rtsa bsnams//bud med chags tshul dbang mdzad bka' zlog mo//chags pa'i skyon bral te chen re'u tri ma//thams cad sgyu ma bzhin tu rtogs mkhyen
251a4(rgyud): mA//'brel ba'i thugs rjes sems can kun la gtogs//phrin las rgya mtsho sgrol ba'i bzhed chen can//'khor ba'i rgyud gcod drag mo bo sna be//'du byed mA rtag tre/
251a5(rgyud): bu'i sgra ltar mkhyen//rtag par bzhin tshul 'khor ba ji srid bzhugs//nyon mongs thu ba 'bebs pa'i mdung thung 'phel//gzhon tshul chags pas dbang mdzad go'u ri//rdo rje/
251a6(rgyud): las mdzad kun gyi bla na med//lha yi rgyal srid chos la dbang bsgyur zhing //mtshon sbyin brgya mdzad mi dmigs sku dkar mdag/gsad byed rdo rje 'bebs byed in tra ma/bya
251a7(rgyud): dang thugs rjes dbang mdzad sku mdog dmar//band snod yangs po cud kyi khrag mtshol//rngam pa'i zhal du dug gsum za byed ma//sdug bsngal dbyingasu skyongs mdzad pag le//
251b1(rgyud): sems can gdul thabs khro bo mchog tu mkhyen//mun sel sgrol bar bdud kyi nad gsos mdzad//'dam skyes pad ltar 'khor bar sku 'khrungs kyang //chags pa'i skyon bral
251b2(rgyud): dbang mdzad a mr-i ta//zhi ba'i las ni gsod pa'i mchog tu mkhyen//zla ltar yon tan cha shas mthar phyin sku//gdung ba'i nad sel 'jig rten sgrol mdzad cing //gtan mchog thad
251b3(rgyud): stobs byed sre'u mya la//dbyug pa 'tshog pa 'dra ba gzhan med mkhyen//thabs kyis ma rmongs phrin las ljang gu'i mdog/nAn dbang drag shul 'tshog pa'i dbyug to bsnams//
251b4(rgyud): drogs byed sbyin 'joms mdzad da na hA ma//log par lta ba 'jigs byed spyan gyi mchog/skye ba 'phrog byed skye rgyun khrag mcho gsol//las mdzad chags pa gser gyi rked chings
251b5(rgyud): can//drag mo rnga ma tshul klog 'gyu rak+Sha si//phreng ba rgyan gyi nang na mchog tu mdzad//snying rje rgyun skad pa su zhags pa yis chags med bzhing du khams gsum kun 'dren ma//rgyan
251b6(rgyud): gyis thugs rjes sbrel mdzad bag k+Sha sai//'tshogs pa dbyug pas 'chang ba'i mchog tu mkhyen//gtun bus gdug pa ma lus 'joms mdzad ma//yon tan mi zad nor gyi ga tI ra
251b7(rgyud): 'dzin ma//stong gsum nor gyis rgyas mdzad ral gri ma//ro re 'dra bar dpa' bo gzhan med mkhyen//chos rnams gnyis med don rtog rtag tu myos//nyon mongs tha ba bzlog pa'i
252a1(rgyud): gla shol bsnams shing //dge ba'i lho tog spyod mdzad du t+ta ma//brtan btsam gyis gzhan pham dpa' bo mchog/ma lus gsod byed las la 'jug mdzad
252a2(rgyud): cing //bskyengs pa mi mnga' 'gro don gcig spu spyod//gsod byed 'dri mdzad a~M ka ra tsa ma//bud med chags pas 'gro ba dbang du byed//thams cad ma lus mgu byed dge ba'i las
252a3(rgyud): 'dod lha'i mda' 'phen srid gsum yid 'phrog mo//thugs rjes zhen pa'i mno he rA ma//khrag lus zas gzhan med par rtogs mkhyen cing //gdun rnams bsgyur ba'i las
252a4(rgyud): mdzang sgo bra tong can//mi zad nor gyi gter ldan bum pa 'dzin//sdug bsngal re sgong thag thug sa ti ga/reg bya'i sems ni rlung gi khams te mchog/srid gau sum dbugs
252a5(rgyud): kyi srog sbyin tshe 'phel ma//bder gshegs ras rgyas sems can sgrol mdzad cing //khams gsum gnas nas skyon mdzad pa ya be//snyigs ma lnga ldan lnga brgya'i tha ma/
252a6(rgyud): lha//srid gsum 'khor ba'i sems can gdul dka' ba//bsad pa nyid la las kyis 'dul bar mdzad//sdug bsngalo dbyingasu gsol mdzad ma ra na//gzi brjid can de me
252a7(rgyud): yi khams te mchog/'bar ba mchog gis gdug pa ma lus gsogs//za byed bskal pa dus mtha'i chu'i ston pa//lkog mthong ye shes 'bar 'phro a ga ne ye//mchog
252b1(rgyud): dag pas skye ban rtsod gcod bzhugs//nyan thos za ba bzlog mdzad phag gi dbu//'og gi phyogs nas sred gsum stobs kyis sbyor//skyo bani rjud gcad zla byed par ti//'chi bdang /
252b2(rgyud): thams cad gnas nas ma 'phos mkhyen//thams cad gsod byed dam nyams 'chi bdag mdzad//dam tshig bsrung ba'i 'chi bdag zlog mdzad cing //lung gi dur khrod dbang mdzad
252b3(rgyud): mun te//'jigs lngas lhags pa'i grags ni gzhan med mkhyen//stong phrag brgyad cu brags la mnga' mdzad cing //sna chen glang sna bdud rtsi 'ge'u ljang mthong //sdug bsngal
252b4(rgyud): nad gsos mdzad padI pu tA ma//chu las lhag pa'i nor ni gzhan med mkhyen//nor gyi tshogs rnams ma lus 'phrog mdzad cing //gdug pa 'dul phya ri dug gtong sbrul zhe
252b5(rgyud): bsnams//zhe gnas ting 'dzin dbang sdud ba ru na//'gro ba'i don mdzad mi 'gyur sku mdog granag/srid gsum 'joms mdzad tri shUl gdengs po bsnams//thugs rje du
252b6(rgyud): kyis 'dren mdzad lcags kyu bsnams//'khor bar thugs rjes shar ba'i ka ma la//tshogs pa'i thugs rjes don mdzad ra mgo can//byams pa'i zhags pa 'khor ba'i rgyud mdzin
252b7(rgyud): de//gang la cis 'dul de la des ston pa//yon tan tshogs rdzogs re skong tsa ka la ma//ston pa'i bka' dang rang gi dam bcas gnyis//mi 'da' ma grub rab tu brtan par bzhugs//dam tshig sgo
253a1(rgyud): gis sems can 'dul mdzad cing //ma rig nub mdzad kun pa kA rnam//sku gsum yon tan phrin las mtha' klas pa//stong pa'i sgras bskul 'gro ba'i rgyud 'a 'bebs//sa//
253a2(rgyud): so'i skad du chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa//ma chags byed mdzad lam pi d+ha ra ma//dpal rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las bzlas pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal
253a3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las thabs dang shes rab kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi dbang 'di bka' stsal to//dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus pad+ma 'dab ma
253a4(rgyud): brgyad pad+ma'i lte ba la rag ta'i man Da byas te dbusu badz+ra he ru ka/shar du bud d+ha he ru kaM/lhor rad na he ru ka/nub tu pad+ma he ru ka/byang du karma he ru ka/mtshams bi zhar khro mo dbang phyug ma bzhi/
253a5(rgyud): de'i phyi rim snam bu la go'u ri ma brgyad/de'i phyi ram la si ha ma brgyad/sgo bzhi dang sgo khyud dang bcas pa/zhing gi rgyan mtshan/ras chen gyi 'phan gdugs/tsi tA'i thog mang sa'i bla re//
253a6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das thabs dang shes rab gnyisu med pa'i byang chub kyi sems yum gyi sku la bstims te/yum kun tu bzang mos rang gi mtha' la byang chub kyi sems blangs te/nyid las
253a7(rgyud): mi gzhan pa'i 'khor rnams dbang bskuro//de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //byang chub sems nyid bsgom pa'i dbang //dbyings dang dbyings kyi dkyil
253b1(rgyud): 'khor 'dir//sems nyid rtogs pa'i thig btab ste//de ru slob ma bskur bar bya//chos rnams thams cad brtag par dka'//brjod pa'i tha snyad kun las 'das//da ltar sa gsum gnon pa ni//sem/
253b2(rgyud): can nang na mi yin to//sangs rgyas mis ni bsgrub thag nye//byang chub sems de'i don rtogs nas//'bras bu yang dag mngon du 'char//de las kyang ni ma gtogs pa//de las sangs rgyas gzhan na/
253b3(rgyud): mI kos nyid dngos po de las med//bstan cing yang mi rtogs par dka'//bsgom pa'i dngos gzhi 'ang de las med//sems kyis brtag par dka' na yang //tshig gis 'di yin bstan dka' zhes//
253b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid 'di//de ring khyod la bskur bar bya//bo d+hi tsi ta hUM/phyi yi tshul du rtogs 'gyur na//sems la srid pa thams cad chub par 'gyur//nang gi tshul du rtogs 'gyur na//
253b5(rgyud): sems la sku gsung thugs kyang 'phrug par granas//gsang ba'i tshul du snang ba thams ca da ni//yum chen kun tu bzang mo zhes kyang bya//sems ni snang ba shar ba'i ye shes yi ni//gnyisu med par rto /
253b6(rgyud): na chos kyi sku//byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bsku ro//badz+ra tsi te hUM//mngon pa'i sangs rgyas che ba yum chen kun tu bzang //bdag nyid chen po sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po ni//
253b7(rgyud): yab yum gonyi su med par gyur pa las//byang chub sems nyid bde ba chen po yin//chos kyi dbyings su sangs rgyas bde ba chen po ni//yum dang sems nyid gnyisu med pa yin//rjes
254a1(rgyud): na na /sbyinan chum nan rgyu rgyun du// du na tu gad du na/na du sgrub tu da// da/
254a2(rgyud): sman ni thams dang //ngas ni sbyo 'i ma ba ga sa/sbyini rdzo rje 'jig rten rtogs gyu na//b+h+ring ba wA las sangs kyi myi gzha na med//da ni bang gyi
254a3(rgyud): //sems las mtshugs su m+b+har+m+ma m+b+ha gzhan nu /khyong chu ma pa kyis dbang byas s+ho//bam+bu bI ba skyod u / byung 'i na /
254a4(rgyud): 'das//mas mag seM nga ga //ga na //rnam nyid stor bye ga// mas pa
254a5(rgyud): // ba rnyed pa dug la sh-in gas / sa hU~M swA hA//sa~M d+ham gzhan
254a6(rgyud): /m-i gaN+DI 'i ltung pa'i 'gyur ba'i sems nyid yin/ 'dang ba'i dum chog 'phrul pa'i gzus/m-i gi ma bu'i ches nyid ngas drug pas//rlung rdzu
254a7(rgyud): dpa ni dbang bgyur//minyam pa ri shes pa sangs kyis pan gyi ng+ge/ sa srin mon ga dmyal pabyen//mnyam pa'i don dang rin po gnyis me pas//ded phy-i
254b1(rgyud): don du bsgom par bya//byang chub sems kyis dang 'dir dbang bskuraro//mdzod gsum rtan pas sangs rgyas kun gyi rje//phyi ma'i don du srid pa'i gnas 'gro bas//nang gi tshul du gnas na
254b2(rgyud): rtogs 'gyur na//sgo gsum lus ngag yid gsum gnas 'i gyur ni//de yang gsang ba'i gan su rtogs par bya//kun gzhi yid dang rnam shes yid dang gsum//gsang ba'i mdzod
254b3(rgyud): gsum yin pas bskor bar bya//de la sems kyi gzugs ni ci 'dra ba//tsi ti'i dbyings nas 'od ni mtshon gang 'phro//dkar ser snum la 'dril ba gcig tu gnas//las 'phro len las
254b4(rgyud): gzhan ni len pa'i tshe//sems ni rta dgugs nyid rgyu ba yi 'dul//mi chags mi 'khar ba yi don de ni//'od dang bcas pa tshon gang gsal bas bsgom//byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir
254b5(rgyud): dbang bsku ro//rtag pa chen po rnam snang mdzad//me skyod pa ni sems kyi mchog/bdag gi lus ni rtag pa ste//bdag gi gsung ni 'gyur ba yin//bdag gi sems ni mi bskyod pa//sems
254b6(rgyud): tid du sa gsum 'gyur ba med par gsung //byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bsku ro//thig le chen po dgu yi lung bstan pa//man ngag gnyer chen rnam shos tshogs dgu ste/
254b7(rgyud): yid kyi rnam shes las 'phro lan pa'i don//rnam par shes pa'i byang chub sems nyid 'di//byang chub sems kyis dang 'dir dbang bskur//med pa'i byal ba dang ni gcig pu lhun
255a1(rgyud): gyis rdzogs//sangs rgyas kun gyi rje btsan bskal par mi nyams rdul tsam med//rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rang dbang las//gzhan na sangs rgyas btsal gyur kyang //
255a2(rgyud): brtsal kyang rgyal ba mi rnyed do//thams cad 'gyur med byang chub sems dpa' las//ma gtogs gzhan na med ces bya bar gsungs//byang chub sems nyid mnyam par khyab gdal
255a3(rgyud): te//bdag dang gzhan du med par rtogs pa la//de ltar sus rtogs skyes bu gcig pu yin//lhun gyis rdzogs pa zhes kyang de la bya//byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur//
255a4(rgyud): dran pa'i sems can sems kyi rang bzhin ni//dkar tsher snum la 'brel bas byang chub sems//'jengs pa zin po sems shes de la bya//blun po byol song sems ni na bun dung pas
255a5(rgyud): 'dras//sems gnas phung po tsi tA'i dbyings dkyil na//'od kyi thig le dkar tsher gnas pa ni//nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa'i sems de ni//tI dang ra dang nas gtags zhabs 'khyud rnams
255a6(rgyud): gu gu zla chos dag tu gnas gyur te//mi las sangs rgyas dag tu gnas bsgyur nas//dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi sa bon 'di//bdag gi ma yengs brjed bral med par
255a7(rgyud): 'di bsgoms nas//sangs rgyas 'bras bu yang dag byang chub sems//byang chukha sems kyis dang 'dir dbang bskur//nyams pa 'chad pa byung ba la//mgon chun da las gzhan medo//
255b1(rgyud): rdol 'byor dam nyams gzhan gyis mi stongs kyis//bdag gi sems nyid kun tu bzang po'i ngang gyur na//bya rtsa dang ni bral zhing 'das pa yin//'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das pa yin//nga dang bdag tu 'dzin
255b2(rgyud): pa dbyer med mnyam pa chen po dang //de la sangs rgyas gang nas btsal kyang rgyal bas mnyes par ma gsung so//byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskuro//glang po dpal gyi thugs kha nas//lcags kyi
255b3(rgyud): zizang tshin ba zhes 'phros te//glang po dpal chen he ru ka'i//lus drag yid gsum sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las//'od zer dgu 'phros gdug pa me lus bcom//'gro ba mtha' dag rnams kyi don byas
255b4(rgyud): te//bdag gi rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad kyang //kun gzhi snying la 'dus pa'i he ru ka/do ltar lags pas rtags nas byang chub sems//gang nas btsal kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur te//byang chub sems kyis dang //
255b5(rgyud): 'dir dbang bskuro//bdag med khams kyi snod gung du//rgya che gsal ba'i khams bkang ste//r-i dogs med par phung 'gro yang //nyam nga med par lam gyi mchog/gza' gtad med pas don du bde//de gra
255b6(rgyud): rang sems bgrod pa'i sa//byang chub sems ni yang shing rgya che ste//de bas bdag gis lus rgyags ni//snod bcud la sogs rtogs pa'i skyes mchog rnams//shes gsal blo ldan rnams la
255b7(rgyud): ye nas rnyed pa gsal//bla ma'i rgyud mchog de la yid ces gsungs te rdzogs//rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bsku'o//bsgoms pas rnyed par me 'gyur ma bsgoms stong bral med
256a1(rgyud): thugs nas zhal du byung ba 'gro ba'i don du gsungs//rna rgyud ston pas thugs brtul te//lus dang sems las ma ga togs bskum du med//bsgoms nas sam/
256a2(rgyud): nyid gzhan nas btsal yang rnyed par ma gsung so//dus gsum rgyal bas yi nas ma bcos te//rang sems gdod nas ma skyes chos kyi sku//chos nyid bsgom par bya ba gang yang
256a3(rgyud): med//man dag shes rab sbyin chen des gsungs pas//lus dang sems las ma gtogs na//bdag gi sku gsung thugs la tshang bar gnas//gal te brjod pa'i mtha' bzhi
256a4(rgyud): yod na ni//don rdzogs sbom po po yang yod par 'gyur//lus sems skye ba med bden pas//bsgom du med par 'jog pa gang //don kun rdzogs shing chub par der gnaso//byang/
256a5(rgyud): chub sems kyis dang 'diri dbang bsku ro//zla gsung dkar dmar rlung ka lci//zla ba shes rab gsal ba thabs chen te//thig le byang chub sems nyid dka' la 'tshor ba yi//dmar ba yu gi
256a6(rgyud): rag tu byang chub sems//rlung la shor du mi rtsal thig le sgrom bu ste//de las ma gtogs sangs rgyas gzhan nA med//mAn ngag tshul du zla ba'i gzun yin te//gsang ba'i tshul du yid kyi rnam
256a7(rgyud): shes nyid kyang zla ba yin//thig le sems kyi rang bzhin snum la 'drel//man ngag len par byed pas sems kyi thig le yin//sems las ma gtogs sangs rgyas gzhan na med//byang chub
256b1(rgyud): sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskuro//rang byung che ba'i ye shes mi 'gyur la//chos nyid rang gis gnas pa'i rang bzhin la//dmigs bral ting 'dzin rgya mtshor rab sprul te//yid ni 'phags pa'i
256b2(rgyud): lam ni gnas pa ni//phra zhing zab pa bstan dka' rgyal ba'i sku//dran pa byed pa'i rtsol dang srog chags gsum//kun gzhi pad+ma'i yog 'bru gsol bar byed//byang chub sems kyis deng 'drir/
256b3(rgyud): dbang bskuro//rgyu ni skye ba med pas rnam par dag/'bras bu 'gogs pa med pas byang chub sems//byang chub sems de skye med ye shes dbyings//skye mad mi 'gyur me shigs rdo rje'i
256b4(rgyud): don//sems la rdo rje sngams dpa' rab tu bsgom//byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro//'byung ba chen po bcom ldan 'das//nom mkha' rdo rje snang ba ston pa'i sangs
256b5(rgyud): rgyas so//sa rdo rje chos nyid ye nas gnas pa'i sangs rgyas so//me rdo rje chos nyid rin po che'i sangs rgyaso//chu rdo rje snying rje chen pos brlan pa'i sangs rgyas so//rlung rdo rje
256b6(rgyud): 'dod pa sgrol ba'i sangs rgya so//'byung ba bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang bskuraro//dngos grub stsol ba rnam gnyis te//nges pa'i lung dang rang bzhi no//chos kyi dbyings las mnga'
256b7(rgyud): skyes nas/gang ltar bsgrubs kyang dbyings kyi don//chos kyi dbyings la 'char ba dang //dbang chen dbang bsgyur 'chi ba med//sprul pa kun tu bzang po nyid/sgrib lnga 'chi ba mi 'gyur/byang chu seM kyi dang su'o//lhun mi rmug/
257a1(rgyud): pa'i dbang chen ni//de yang sa gser zla ba me//gser dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems//byang chub sems ni sa zhes bya//zla ba mo dang 'dra ba yi//byang chub sem//
257a2(rgyud): nyid kun tu bzang //gsal zhing dro la nyon mongs sreg/byang chub sems kyi dbang bsku ro//don ni dbyings dang ye shes yin//yab yum gnyis med rol pa yi//rag ta byang chub sems
257a3(rgyud): dkyil na//ma skyes rdzogs pa'i he ru ka/sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud//ston phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa//gsang ba'i don gyi dbang bsku ro//gsang ba yum chen kun tu bzung /
257a4(rgyud): rag tu byang chub sems dkyil no//ma hA su kha'i dkyil 'khor dbyings//sems kyi thig les thig btab ste//dkyil 'khor zlum po 'khyil ba la//chos kyi dbyings las smos pa'i sku/
257a5(rgyud): don gyi dbyings nas lha dang lha mo dgod//nges pa'i don gyis dbang bskur te//nga dang rang bzhin bdag nyid chen po ste//lhun gyis rdzogs dang spros pa med pa yi//thugs kyi dkyil nas
257a6(rgyud): 'byung byi rigs kyi sras//kun tu bzang po yum dang dron gyi thabs chen lngas//man ngag dang bcas pa yi ye shes snying po'i don//bcom ldan gsang ba'i mchog gi dkyil 'khor na//
257a7(rgyud): dpal tshon kun tu bzang po ye shes te//gsang ba'i byang chub sems kyi dbang bsku ro//dkyil 'khor ma hA su kha'i gnas//ma hA su kha'i dbyings nyid na//byang chub sems nyid kho na/
257b1(rgyud): shesu chen po lhun gyis rdzogs nas glanas//mahA su kha gsang ba chen po 'di//don dang ldan te kun tu bzang po yin//dang las ma g.yos kun tu bzang po ni//gnyi su med par dzang dag
257b2(rgyud): pa'i phyir//gsang ba'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskuro//yum gyi nags tshal chen po 'dul me du//rtag tu mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang du bzhugs//nga ni dus gsum bzhugs shing rang bzhin
257b3(rgyud): 'gyur ba med pa yin//bdag nyid 'dus ma byas pas skye ba med par lhun gyis grub//gsang ba'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bsku ro//srid pa byang chub semasu ma bcos thig ler zlum//sngar
257b4(rgyud): 'das dang ldan bzhugs dang phyis 'byung bya'o//sems nyid rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams//nyon mongs dri ma ye nas med pa'o//ye nas sangs rgyas ma skyes lhun gyis grub
257b5(rgyud): byang chub sems nyid gsang ba'i dbang bsku ro//dpal chen kun tu bzang po dbye ba med pa'i don//sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las sprul pa mang po 'phro//lhag pa'i ye shes bye brag gcig 'du'o//
257b6(rgyud): phyag rgya 'gyur ba myed pa rgyan gyi phyag rgya'o//sku ni thams cad chos kyi sku ru 'dus//lam ni tha~Md rol pas chub pa'o//yum gyi dbyings chen rang bzhin rnam par dag/zas ni thams cad bdud
257b7(rgyud): rtsi lnga yi da na//spyod pa bya ba med po chen po'o//thugs ni rtog pa mi mnga' sa li ba'o//ldem dgongs don dam byang chub sems kyi dono//byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bsku ro//rnar brgyud
258a1(rgyud): ston pas thugs brtol te//nges pa'i lung dang dron yang sangs rgyas yin//sangs rgyas mnyam dang dbyingasu 'gro ba zhes//byang chub sems ni kun tu rtag
258a2(rgyud): pa'i don//rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde ba chen po nyid//dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bsku ro//sku rgyan 'khor lo lung chen zab mo nang nas gsal//lnga bzhin nang du 'khor ba yang //ye
258a3(rgyud): shes sangs rgyas de la med//lta ba 'di la gnas shing rnal 'byor skal ba bzang //bder gshegs kun gyi thugs dam byang chub sems kyi don//dan dam dbang mchog 'das ni
258a4(rgyud): dbang bskuro//dbyings nas gsal shar badral ba la//thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'byam ri yas//rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yid la thim//'greng ldog spre'u tshugs gar 'gyur yang //
258a5(rgyud): gang ltar byas pa byang chub sems kyi don//thig le chen po'i dkyil 'khor du//mun nag langs kyang khams gsum gsal//ye shes khrus kyi rdzing bu ru//dri la dag pas rdul mi
258a6(rgyud): 'gro/dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bsku ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid las gzhan pa'i 'khor rigs bzhis 'khor ba'i 'phra men ma dang /khro bo rdo rje bka'i pho nya rnams la bka'
258a7(rgyud): stsal to//sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje dbang //de ring khyod la bskur bar bya//sangs rgyas rnamasu grub bya'i phyag/rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya 'dzin//rnam grol
258b1(rgyud): dag pus grasung skad sgrogs//dril bu 'di ni sgra spyan gyis//phyogs bcu kun tu skyugs par byed//dang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskuraro//de nas dkyil 'khor khru gang chud du bya//rag tu'i mdo//
258b2(rgyud): ma yin gyis byugs lnga//de ru dpal chen dgod par bya//phra man 'kho dang po nyas bskoro//de ru slob ma gzhug par bya//de nas rags kyi bu mchog des//rgyal srid dong nr-i rang gi lus//
258b3(rgyud): bu dang chung mnor gyi dbyig//rab tu gces drang yid 'thad dbul//dbang phyug long spyod lngas mchod na/dkyil 'khor zad mchod pa yin//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyi dang nang dang
258b4(rgyud): grasang ba gsum gyis bkar stsal to//phyi yi dbang rin po che sna bdun la sogs te dbang d+hAswa lnga bcu rtsa lngas dbang bsku ro//nang dbang dpal chen po yab yum dang khro bo dang phra men rnam
258b5(rgyud): kyis phyag mtshan gyis dbang bskuro//gsang dbang thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems kyis dbang bsku ro//bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol bya gsang ba zab mo las dbang gi le'u ste
258b6(rgyud): bdun pa'o///de nis bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'dri phyung //chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas kyi
258b7(rgyud): kyang mkhyen pa'i ye shes la sku gsung thugs mengar ra'i rtag su dang po phyag rgya chen po drug dang ldan par bsgo mo//de nas kun mkhyen ye shes kyis thabs mkhas pa'i thugs rjes
259a1(rgyud): ge shag gis phye la kun tu snang gi ting 'dzin du bsgomo//de nas rgyu'i ting 'dzin du yi ge hUM 'thing nag las su smug nag 'jigs pa'i sku/gsung gi drag shul
259a2(rgyud): spyod pa'i sngags/thugs tingange 'dzin hUM 'thing nag las 'phags pa'i skur bsgo mo//de nas he ru ka rol pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung //chos tha da stong pa
259a3(rgyud): nyid kyi ting 'dzin dang gnyis med pa'i ti 'dzin dang /'khyil ba'i ting 'dzin dang /mnyes pa chen po'i ting 'dzin dang /grub pa rdzas kyi ting 'dzin dang /rdo rje tshogs kyi ting 'dzin dang /
259a4(rgyud): rdo rje bza' ba'i ting 'dzin dang /bdud rtsi btung ba'i ting 'dzin dang /lha'i rnal 'byor gyi tIng 'dzin dang /phyag rgya chen po'i ting 'dzin dang /rdzogs pa chen po'i ting 'dzin dang /rdo rje
259a5(rgyud): gsal ba'i ting 'dzin dang /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tinge 'dzin dang /bla na med pa'i ting 'dzin dang /rdo rje gsang ba'i ting 'dzin dang /dgyes pa chen po'i ti nge 'dzin dang /don
259a6(rgyud): yod pa'i ting 'dzin dang /nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i ting 'dzinA dang /kun tu 'dus pa'i ting 'dzin dang /rtog pa 'joms pa chen po'i ti 'dzin dang /tshul khrims chen po'i
259a7(rgyud): ting 'dzin dang /dbu ma chen po'i ting 'dzin dang /bden pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin dang /sgra sgrogs pa'i ting 'dzin dang /dam tshig gi ting 'dzin dang /lhun gyis grub pa'i ting
259b1(rgyud): dzin dang /kun tu bzang du'i Sh+Tha 'dzin dang /'ab ba chen po'i tid 'dzin dang //gutum+b+ha po rnam pa'i ting 'dzin dang /man+dan+d+ra mu med pa'i ting 'dzin dang /rdo rdu wA glu d+hA tang
259b2(rgyud): dang rdo rje 'aglegs pa'i ting 'dzin dang /rdo rje lus kyi ting 'dzin dang /khrag 'thung chen po'i ting 'dzin dang /rdo rje skyes pa'i ti nge 'dzin dang /seng gdod chen po'i ting 'dzin dang /gan/
259b3(rgyud): gdong chen po'i ting 'dzin dang /rdo rje mtshan che'i ting 'dzin dang /rdo rje'i dur khrod kyi ting 'dzin dang /dregs pa chen po'i ti 'dzin dang /rdo rje ngo mtshar g+ho ti 'dzin dang /bsnyen pa'i
259b4(rgyud): 'dzin dang /rdo rje gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin dang /'thor ba'i nga 'dzin dang /brgyal ba'i ting 'dzin dang /rnam pa'i byed pa'i ting 'dzin dang /glo snying nung khrol 'dren cing ni ti 'dzin dang /sgra
259b5(rgyud): pa'i ting 'dzin dang /chu 'phrul gyi ti 'dzin dang /byin gyi rlabs kyi ting 'dzin dang /mchod pa'i ting 'dzin dong /yongasu rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin to//bcom ldan 'das he ru ka
259b6(rgyud): pa'i rgyud bsang ba zab mo las ting 'dzin gyi le'u skye ba rgyud pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rAl pa'i mnyes pa chen po'i mchod pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung
259b7(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //de la mchod pa dam pa ni//thog mar rtog bsgoms bdag nyid bsgral//de nas gnyis mod blo yis ni//blo ngan 'jig rten snying re rje//gnyisu med par bsgri ma
260a1(rgyud): par bya//'khril ba'i 'jig rten mnyam sbyor bas//bdag nyid mnyes pas mchod par bya//mnyam pa'i grub rgyas chen po dag/bdag dang mnyam pa'i
260a2(rgyud): tshochogs pa 'bul//bza' dang bdud dang bca' dang bgo//long spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni//dkyil 'khor la ni dbul bar bya//mnyes pa'i mchod pa chen pos rab tu mchod//
260a3(rgyud): che ni dang ni dri chen dang //ga buR+Sha rag tA'i dri chu dang //ma hi rta dang khyi shwa dang //na ge ge rgya gshog pa can//'di dag 'phags pa'i tshogs la dbul//pad+ma can dang gdung can
260a4(rgyud): ba lang can dang ri mo can+da//'di dag mnyes pa'i mchod par dngul//zhing gi rgyal mtshan sha chen tog/ras chen dag gi bla re dang //zhing gi dbyug pA tsi ti'i tog/til mar dag
260a5(rgyud): tu bcas pa rnams//'di dag mchod par dbul bar bya//mnyes pa'i mchod pas rab mchod na//thams cad ma lus mngon sangs rgyas//phyi yi mchod pa dang nang gi mchod
260a6(rgyud): pa'o//8bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las mched pa gsang ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung
260a7(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //bla med mi spang ba dang /bla ma bskur ba dang /sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mo 'chad pa dang /yang dag pa'i lam la zhugs pa dang /gsang ba'i don tu
260b1(rgyud): mi smra ba dang /rtsa ba lnga dang sgrub pa dang /bsrung ba dang /gti mug dang /'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /nga rgyal dang /phrag dog dag mi spa //dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri chen sha/dag pa'i snod bcud mi/
260b2(rgyud): 'dod//yan lag bcu yi dam tshig ste//ye nas ma nyams rtogs pas spyad//bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig ni//rtsa ba yin te rags med 'gyur//mi spong mi 'dor gnyis po ni//
260b3(rgyud): yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka' ba'o//mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba ni//mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na//mnyam rdzogs chen po bo gyur nas//'das na sangs rgyas ma yin//rtsa nyam
260b4(rgyud): pa yi phyal ba dag/gsol nye bar mi brtson dang //skad cig yud tsam smra mi byed//nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang //rtse ba'i dam tshig nyams 'gyur na//bsgrub pa thaMd nyams par 'gyur//
260b5(rgyud): yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i//'bras bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'du//yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na//'bras bu med cing ngan 'gror ltung //dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje ste//sangs rgyas rnams/
260b6(rgyud): kyis bdag nyid yin//rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la ni//gcig ya gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum//yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la//gcig la bcu phrag gnyis med//bsrung bar bya ba dang
260b7(rgyud): mi spang ba brgya nyi shu/dang du blang ba brgya nyi shu/spyad par bya ba brgya nyi shu/spyir sum brgya drug nu'o//dam tshig 'di rnams ma nyams sangs rgyaso//nyams na dmyal ba yin par shes
261a1(rgyud): par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las dam chog le'u ste bcu pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' he ru 'arlol
261a2(rgyud): pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugros rdo rje las 'di phyung //blang bar bya ba'i snod ni gang //spang bar bya ba ci lta bu//mtshan nyid rnam pa du zhig mchis//spyad par bya ba du zhig mchis//
261a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis he ru ka rol pa'i don bka' stsal pa/dum bu gcig dang /dum bu gnyis gsum dang bzhi dang lnga pa dang /drug pa dang ni bdun pa dang //dum bu
261a4(rgyud): brgyad pa rab tu grags//bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang //dmangs rigs bud med rigs ma nges//dkar dang dmar dang dkar sngo dang //sngo dang de bzhin ser skya ste//thal ba'i
261a5(rgyud): mdog dang mdog mi sdug/kha dog bdun du rab tu grags//nyi rim dang ni glang po'i rgyab//'khor ba de bzhin bya rog rjes//dung sngo gcig dang dung gnyis dang //chag pa dang ni mchis/
261a6(rgyud): gyes pa//'di dag tha~Md rab brtags te//rab tu brtags de spyad par bya//shin tu mnyam pa'i sa phyogs sam//snyi ba 'am yang na dul ba'i sar//sngags kyis btab ste gnam
261a7(rgyud): du bsgyur//ltung ba'i mtshan nyid 'di rig bya//lha phyogs kha bltos bram ze med//srin po'i phyogs bltas glang po stsol//nub kyi phyogs bltas rigs ngan te//rlung gi phyogs
261b1(rgyud): b+haltas gsang ma thug//byung gi phyogs bltas phyug por 'gyur//bang ldan phyogs bla ltas sngags grub skyed//shar du bzlas na bdag nyid gsod//me yi phyogs bslus she'u shing med/
261b2(rgyud): 'og tu daltas na rkun por spyod//steng du bltas na bud med ge song //glo re bltos de ni rigs ngan te//snod kyi mtshan nyid 'di rnams//de nas gzhan yang bai shad bya ste//dge ba sprul
261b3(rgyud): snod dag ni//dumi bu gcig pa sa la dbang //gnyis pa de ni rgyal phran 'gyur//gsum pa de yang nor la dbang //bzhi pa de yang sngags sgrub 'gyur//lnga pa de yang chos kyang sgrub/drug/
261b4(rgyud): pa de ni slong ba yin//bdun pa de ni brtul shug so//brgyad pa yongasu spang bar bya//dum bu gcig pa bram ze'i rigs//gnyis pa de ni rgyal po'i rigs//gsum pa rje'u rogs yin pa ste/
261b5(rgyud): bzhi pa de ni dmangs rig so//bu gu med dang mang ba ni//mkhas pa shin tu spong bar bya//bong chung ba dang srab pa dang //gang dag ser bar 'gyur ba ni//bud med yin par shes par bya/
261b6(rgyud): bud med rab tu smad pas na//de dag rab tu sbyang bar bya//ser skya dang ni dkar bya dang //kha dog sna tshogs spang bar bya//dung med pa dang dung gnyis dag/lha mo sprul pas mi blang //dung sngob
261b7(rgyud): dag sdug bsngal te//bya rog rjes ni 'thab rtsod 'gyur//nyi rim gyis ni gsod par 'gyur//gling po rgyab ni nang du 'gyur//'di las gzhan yang bshad bya ste//gsang ba sgrub thob mtshan
262a1(rgyud): nyid ni//yan lag che phra mang ba'i bdag/dpag bsam shing ni yod gyur na//'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob 'gyur te//sngags pa de la the tshom med//dbus na
262a2(rgyud): gshong bu bzhi yod na//'di ni 'dod 'jo ba zhes bya//mdun na gshong bu gnyis yod na//yod bzhin nor bu zhes bya'o//de yi mtshan nyid ldan pa'i snod//su dag rtag tu 'chang ba/
262a3(rgyud): nilongs spyod thar pa thob 'gyur te//de la lha mo the tshom med//de nas rigs ni rnam bsha//snod rnams kyi ni bye brag dang //dung dang kun zla 'dra ba'i mdog/snum la na/nyam
262a4(rgyud): du sdug pa ni//sngags rnams thams cad 'grub ster yin//dbang phyug chen por shes par bya//thil ba'i mdog la pong yang che//pad+ma'i dbyingasu 'dab mar brgyan//tshangs pa'i
262a5(rgyud): skud pa gsol ba yod//'di dang tshangs par rig par bya//sbrang rtsi ser skya'i mdog 'dra ba'i//zhi ba'i thig les rnam par rgyan/khyab 'jug pa yi snod yin te//zug rngu dgra
262a6(rgyud): rnams 'joms par byed/kha dog dmar zhing lnga pa lnga//pad+mo dmor bas brgyan pa dang //zlum pa shin tu rnam pa ste//snod 'di gzho nu ma zhes bya//cung zad ser zhing zlum la zag
262a7(rgyud): gang dag rdo rje mtshan yod pa//de yi mtshan ldan gang yin pa//dbang phyug chen mo rigs chen yin//phag mo'i gdong dbyibs 'dra ba la//rab tu mkhregs shing mu tig 'phro//sha
262b1(rgyud): dag mnam pa yi//snod ni phag gdong ma zhes bya//thal ba'i mdog la bong yang che//thig le chen pos rnam par brgyan//khrag 'dzag pa yI dri mnam pa//'jigs byed ma yi snod ces bya//snod
262b2(rgyud): kyi khyad par shes byas nas//sngags pas 'di dag rtag 'chang na//bdag bka' byed na bzhin bzangs ma//de la bgegs kyis tshugs mi 'gyur//de nas gzhan yong bshad par bya//snod
262b3(rgyud): kyi dngos po khyad par ni//tshangs pa bram ze bcang bar ba//rtag tu dngos grub sbyin par byed//sgrub pa chen po'i dus dag tu//khyab 'jug dang ni 'byor kun la//rtag tu las rnams 'grub par
262b4(rgyud): byed rgyal rigs kyis ni gzhon nu ma//pha rol yul ni rnam par 'joms//rje'u rigs kyi ni dam chen mo//blo dang ldan pas bzlog phyir bshad//gsang dang bsgral dang bstabs pa'i phyir//

263a1(rgyud): mchod rten dang ni rin po che//pad+ma dang ni ljon shing dang //dbus na bu ga gnyis yod pa//mdun na gshong bu gsum dang gnyis//gang dag rdo rje mtshan yod pa//

263b4(rgyud): thams cad sbyang bar mdzad//'gro ba'i bdag po che dang sog/gson po bde ba'i bar gcod pa//bdud dang gshin rje 'khor bcas kun//bcom zhing gsod pa'i gnyen po ni//'jam dpal

263b6(rgyud): khrod kyi//bdag po gdol pa drag po yis//ro yi nyal thabs gan rgyal te//mgo ni lho nub mtshamasu bstan//rkang pa byang shar mtsham su bstan//de yang cung zed bsnol ba'o//lag pa

269a3(rgyud): dang /dpal chen po shrI he ru ka/badz+ra DA ki nI 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa dang /gzhan yang rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo mched lcam dral 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa thaMd
269a4(rgyud): dgongasu gsolo//dring gnas mchog dam pa 'drir 'phags pa thams cad mchod pa dang /rdo rje mchong lcam dral phyogs bcu rwa bzhugs pa dang /da ltar bzhugs pa'i thugs
269a5(rgyud): dam bskang ba dang /seMn thams cad bla na med pa'i gnasu bsgral ba'i phyir rgyud mchog rkang bzhi pa zhig yon du 'bul zhing mchis na/thugs rjes bzung zhing bsgral du gsol//
269a6(rgyud): rgya mchog 'di thugs rjes bzung nas ma bsgral na/'di la spyod pa zhig mchis te/rnal 'byor theg par gzhung las kyang tshul bzhin du ma babyis te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
269a7(rgyud): tshad ma khyad du bsad pa dang /rdo rje slob dpon dang /mched dang lcam dral la ngan sems dang dpyad sems bskyed pa dang /mched la 'khus pa dang /dam las 'das pa dang //
269b1(rgyud): spyi lo dang sgyu gsog/brdzun dang kha gsag/phyi tshul dang rgyab nyan bgyis nas rdo rje slob dpon snying nas smod cing bla ma la dbang zos pa dang mnyam pa'i spyod yul sun phung ste/sbyor sgrol
269b2(rgyud): sgo bkag po drung /dad pa can gyi tshogs bcag ste/gdung sems kyi rgyun bcad pas phrag dog dbang gis sku gsung thubs kyi gdung 'tsho ba pa'i bar chod kyis da ltar ngan song gi gnas
269b3(rgyud): nas 'khyam zhing rtog pa'i dra bas ni bcings/'khor ba'i snyis ni zin nas dmyal khams kyi gting brgyud par nges te/zhing bcu dang ldan pa 'di dam tshig tshul bzhin du bsgral
269b4(rgyud): bas 'di'i rnam par shes pa bla na med pa'i gan su bsgral ba yang gnas stobs par byin gyis brlab tu bsol/lnga phung gi yan lag ni kun tu bzang po mchod pa'i sprin
269b5(rgyud): phung du gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi ye shes dgyes pa'i dang du thim par smon to//smon lam brjo de bsgral bar bya'o//spri gtsug tu aM lag pa g.yas par s+t+waM/
269b6(rgyud): g.yon pa la hA/snying kar+ya hUM/lusA la oM/oM mahA su ra ta s+t+waM/dzaHhUM bi hoHsa ma yi s+t+waM/oM badz+ra kro d+ha shrI he ru k+Sha a oM hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kr-i d+hA badz+ra hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kro d+hi
269b7(rgyud): yak+Sha h+ya na ha na hUM phaT/oM badz+ri kro d+ha ni la tan tra da ha daM he hUM phaT/oM badz+ri kro d+ha ya man ta kaM pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la bi d+ha ba~M d+ha hU~M phaT/oM badz+ra kro d+ha ta ya/
270a1(rgyud): b+h+rU~M bar+b+ha su d+ha lud+d+ha phaT/oMHdz+haiHd+hA a pa ratsit+na T+Ta/oM bad+h+ri k+Shod+hamr-i ta ku d+hA pIts+tshin dr-its+tshin dan+tu phaT/oM bar+d+hats+tshad+hAd+hi laH
270a2(rgyud): b+hin dab+hen da hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kr-i d+ha ma hA paM la s+pho ta s+pho ta hUM phaT/ma mo ma me/blo za tho be/dza dz+ha dz+r-i dzi/mi 'gyur na mkha'i rang bzhin las//gzugs snang rtog pa rnam par bsku
270a3(rgyud): dgra chags ma lus skyong ba'i phyir//khams gsum ma lus bsgral bar bya//nga ni za byed chen po ste//sems can tha~Md gsad par bya//ma skyes phyir yang gsad par bya//rnam shes
270a4(rgyud): hUM gis bsdus nas kyang //sha rus la sogs bza' bar bya//da nA khrag 'thung chen po ste//'khor ba'i dra bas chags pa yi//dam ro chen dag gi rgya mtsho la//'khor gyi mkha 'gro
270a5(rgyud): tshogs deng ro la//ma rungs gdug pasam chugs shing //dam tshig la sdang dgra chen rnams//thugs rje byams sems ldan pa yis//ngo mthon stobs kyis bskal bar bya//
270a6(rgyud): pra be shA ya baT/tsi ta ts+tsha/su ma d+ha nI su~M b+hAHd+hi gr-ih+NA ba y+ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/e nA ye hU~M b+h+rUM grI ba ni bad+yA rmA dzA ye hU~M/A na s+yA ho//badz+ra nA kInI/a ya s+yu ra na phyan/badz+rA mr-i ti rmA d+haH
270a7(rgyud): po las kyis bsgral po'i rnams//'khor po'i lom ldi sgo yang gcad//rnam shes hU~M gis bsdus brngubs nas//'og min gnas mchog bla med 'dir//gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lda
270b1(rgyud): sems pa dang ni sems ma dang //khro bo dang ni khro mo yi//sbyor ba'i lhum su phaT kyis 'phang //zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor bcas pas//'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun//skad cig yud la
270b2(rgyud): brlag mdzad//brlag par ma gyur gang yang med//'dod tshogs rdo rje 'khor bcas rnams//'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun//yud tsam gyis ni dbang mdzad//dbang du ma gyur
270b3(rgyud): gang yang med//nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor bcas rnams//'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun//dpal ldan gzi brjid chen po rnams//yud tsam gyis ni rgyas par mdzod//gti mug
270b4(rgyud): rdo rje 'khor bcas rnams//'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam rdzun//yud tsam gyis ni zha mdzad//zhi bar gyur pas dbyings pha rol//bdag cag mched lham dral rnams kyis rdo
270b5(rgyud): slob dpon dbang zos pa dang /phrag dog gi dbang gis mchod lcam dral mang na sems dang dbye sems bgyis pa dang /gnyid dbang gis le lor gyur pa dang /sems g.yengs
270b6(rgyud): pas sngags dang phyag rgya zur chag pa dang /dam tshig dang du lan rngo ma thog pas smad pa'i nga mo tshig nyamaso 'tshal thams cad mthol zhing bshag so//rgya mchog rkang bzhi pa 'di
270b7(rgyud): phrin las rnam ba zhes bsgral ba'i yang gnas stobs par smon to//bdag cag mched lcam dral 'di tshogs pa rnams kyis yid la rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par gyur cig
271a1(rgyud): shrI he ru kA bya shAn/badz+ra be ra ba na shan/ka ra dza le ta/oM badz+ra kro d+ha ru lu ru lu hU~M phaT/ur ta ke sha pra lA ban/sha ta sha prA dra/sha ma ba ra na/
271a2(rgyud): shra mu la ha h+ya hA hUM/ka ra baM badz+ri ka ra bai/badz+ra ka ra na ta tri shu laM a gu dza/pa ra shwa ra na su sho ma ma/pra yaM ma hA tsir+N+Na/su rI pa ru na/ku be ran/ning bA dr-i tsa ti ma hA ku ru nan/
271a3(rgyud): shrI he ru ko to na ti/l+ya lA gan du sa ta ma had ya kur ka ta/ku shel dzi mau ha/ba ra mo/gan ta gan ta/ka ra tA ka/ga bo dza la ni kha pur ti ba ta/ko sha bi shro la/i san pad+ma tsan
271a4(rgyud): dri na ka/mang gu na da ro//tsi ri ka ta/tsi ta sti/dza bai swa/ban d+ha he ru ka/badz+ra ma rang sa na sa rang /ba mun kA na/tig sha na/traM stang ga yo dzaM ya ba ke dong /bi ka ra bI ra/ma ra ma hA/
271a5(rgyud): ri tsa yang yang s+ya ra/ma hA ru na/dA la pa ni/ho ha hA/ro na ro hUM hUM/re na ro de na/he he ra na ro/bzhi la bstod/tha med ta dra ba ting /ba ba ti ka ba rA many+dzu/gri na dza la pa ra
271a6(rgyud): ho hwe dwe ro na ro/oM phur bu sra sti sra ho//oM phur bu shai tAM shaM ka/phur bu ba ta ba ti ho/phur bu ba sA sa ra hUM/byin gyis brlabs pa/oM ai shu hUM sA ma la
271a7(rgyud): hUM bi she hUM sa ma ya badz+re smr-i/ru l+r-i ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/kha pra ti dza ho//mchod pa 'phrul ba shags pa bye/smon lam gi go phyogs bcu mthas klas ma med pa'i sangs
271b1(rgyud): rgyas bajo ma ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho dang bracas pa dang //dpal chen pa nri he ru ka badz+ra nA ba nI tshogs kyi dam tshi gi sa la gzhes pa'i nang ga rdal 'byor
271b2(rgyud): dong phyi'i grub pa la sogs te/phra min gyi 'khor bsam byis mi khyab pa la stsogs pa rdo rje thog pa bsrung bar zhil 'ches pa'i 'phags pa thams cad dang /rigs
271b3(rgyud): 'dzin rtsal 'chang du gyur pa'i mi la sogs te/sgrub pa sna tshog su sku bzhengs nas slob dpon gyis lnga bzhengs shing sems can gyi don mdzad pa la/bdag cag
271b4(rgyud): mched lham dral 'dor tshogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa'i zhal zas 'di dag tshul bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas 'bul bas mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams

271b7(rgyud): bdag gis snga slad dam rdzas bsrel ba dang /sems can gyi srog bkum mo//'tshal thams cad kyang ye shes dang gis sla
272a1(rgyud): shing rnal 'byor gyi skal ba can du gyur cig/brlag cag rnams kyi tshe snga ma nas da ltar gyi slob dpon du gyur pa dang /rgyud gcig cing yo dam gcog pa'i thun
272a2(rgyud): dam la mnyes par phog pa dang /bdug gi snying rje tshungs pa'i rkyen gyis 'phags pa thugs dam bskul ba'i rtsal 'phang dmas pa dang /gnang ba'i dbang las pham par gyur pa/
272a3(rgyud): dang /gti mug ma tshor ba'i rkyen gyis bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi rkyen mi bzod de/lus ngag yid gsum gyis sems dkrugs nas ma yin pa'i chos smra ba dang /spyod
272a4(rgyud): lam mi mkhas pa'i rkyen gyis dam tshig gi lha dang /slob dpon dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /rdo rje mched lcam dral thugs dam gyi lha yal bar bzhag nas dngos grub thams cad
272a5(rgyud): 'phyang bar gyur pa dang /mkhyen gsal gong ma rnams dang bral ba'i rkyen gyis mchod pa'i yo byad rgyun mi gcig pa dang /mchod pa ma yin pa'i grogs po la brten nas rgyun mi gcig pa dang /
272a6(rgyud): bsod nams 'dres pas tsal tshad mar gyur te/le lo dang btang snyoms kyi dbang du gyur nas/thugs rje'i gnasu ma gyur te/ye shes lha dang srungs ma rnams 'phang bar gyur pa dang /rgyang
272a7(rgyud): phan gyi chos kyis gdungs nas bdag pa'i yo byed dang bral te/nyes pa bsags pa'i cha shas dang /mchod sbyin mi chud pa'i sgring pa dang /bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems
272b1(rgyud): bskyod pa las the tshom gcod pa'i bsam pa ma yin pa byung ba dang /shin tu sdug bsngal dur gyur pa rnams rjes su dran zhing gnod ba'i sems kyis mthol zhing bshegs
272b2(rgyud): so//bshags bya 'di ni brjod pa tsam gyis tshor ba dang mtshor dang bag chags byang bar smon to//gnas thob pa dang rgyud byang bas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob pa
272b3(rgyud): gyur cig/lha dang slob dpon gyi dbang dang sngon ci ltar dkyil 'khor gnang ba dang /mi skyil zhing dngos grub rnam bzhi yang thob par gyur cig/skyon brjod pa thams
272b4(rgyud): cad dang bral zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa rnams yon tan tshad ma bzhin thob par gyur cig/de nas tshogs kyi gtor mA btang /oM shrI he ru ko ma hA badz+ra DA ki ni nAM
272b5(rgyud): badz+ra go'u raM ha/badz+ra tse'u ri ha/badz+ra pre mo ha/badz+ra pe ta li/badz+ra pU ka si/badz+ra g+ha ma ri/badz+ra tsan+d+ha li/badz+ra sma shai nI badz+ra he ru ka sa mA ya
272b6(rgyud): yo gi shwa rI/sarba DA ki nan/ru lu re lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/dbyug pa'i brda'i yas mtshon nas kyang /mtshogs dbang phyug spyan 'dren gyis//dam tshig
272b7(rgyud): tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol/thal mo brda' yis mtshon nas kyang //ma tshegs dbang phyug sprin 'dren gyis//
273a1(rgyud): dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegasu gsol//glu'i brda' yis mtshon nas kyang //mtshogs dbang phyug spyan 'dren gyis//dam tshig tshul bzhin
273a2(rgyud): gshegasu gsol//bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba yi//'od zer 'du 'phro klong dkyile na//sku ni dud kha chen po la//zhal gsum po la phyag drug ste//gnag dang mthing ka
273a3(rgyud): dmar ba'i dgu/g.yas kyi gsum na thogs pa ni//rdo rjes bkug cing zhal du gsol//khyung gi khra chen 'bar ba'o//g.yon pa gsum na thogs pa ni//sti ra'i rgyu
273a4(rgyud): ma'i zhags pa dang //thong rlon dmar gyis brkang pa dang //sti ra phra mo gsus pa nas/glo rnying nang khrol 'byin cing za//glang chen ko rlon go su gyon//zhing lpags
273a5(rgyud): g.yang gzhi sham thabs can//thod rlon phreng bas rgyan du byas//ma lus pa dag gsan du gsol//rgya las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs//ston ni ma nor ngon mjed
273a6(rgyud): pa/mngag pa'i gan su yud tsam gyis//thams cad kho nar dbang mdzad mdzad//srungs shig myur du rnam rgyal dpal//thal ba bzhon du rab tu lhogs
273a7(rgyud): rol cig dgongs cig de bzhin gshegs//mA ra na ta tha/'byung po'i sha ni zin pas zhim/'byung po'i khrag ni chang bas zhim//'byung po'i rus po zhim pa
273b1(rgyud): ste/thams cad gsol te dgyes par mdzod//dpal chen he ru ka/mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs chen po//shin tu mi bzad 'jigs pa'i gzugs//na mkha'i
273b2(rgyud): kun khyab par sprul//lcid nag gcer bu ral pa can//mi lpags rlon pA gosu gyon/thal ba'i mtshan mas byugs pa ste//khrag dang zhag gi thig las brgyan//phreng
273b3(rgyud): bu mang pos rgyan du byas//lag na dri shul thod pa thogs//dug gsum be shig par dam brla pa'i//rdo rje me dung 'khrug pa'i tshul//re ba thams cad skongs mdzad pa'i//khyod
273b4(rgyud): kyi thugs dam dus la bab//theg chan rnal 'byor spyod pa la//gnod pa'i dgra byegags gtan nus phyung //thags cad ge cig tu bsdus nas kyang //rdul phran bzhin du
273b5(rgyud): brlag pa dang //sems nyid theg pa chen po yi//rnam thar la ni dgod par mdzod//rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mas sprul//dam tshig dag la 'jug du gsol//
273b6(rgyud): nyon mongs kun la rgyal bar mdzod//ma lus pa dag bsnam su gsol//rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod chags rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/
273b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro de mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sbrul rnam par sprul//den ti thai hU~M/rnam pa sna tshogs dag bla rgyud kyis sems can ma lus
274a1(rgyud): lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bdo mchog thams cad rab sprul rnam par smra

274a3(rgyud): tsid rab sprul rnam par sprul//ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/rnam pa sna tshogs thabs kyi rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa//de bzhin
274a4(rgyud): gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu mU thams cad rab sbrul rnam par sprul//hUM e sha hUM be shra hUM//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma sh+tsaN Da d+ha badz+ra pA Na ye/ma
274a5(rgyud): hA yak+Sha si na bA ta ye/ta d+ya thA/e he h+ya sa ma ya/a na ya badz+ra shran ting /badz+ra tsi kro d+hi ni/badz+ra tsa kro badz+ri gan/badz+ra mu sti /badz+ra ti ba tI/badz+ra
274a6(rgyud): gan ti/badz+ra gan pA/badz+ra e kri /badz+ra rAk+Sha/badz+ra dang Sh+TaM/badz+ra shan ting /badz+ra e ka ra tsa ma/badz+ra ma no ha ra ma/badz+ra dun ting /badz+ra nI lam
274a7(rgyud): badz+ra na la ma/badz+ra gI ta/badz+ra mu kring badz+ra ki l-i/badz+ra us smai/badz+ra ma ka rad lA/badz+ra bi d+ya tsa ra tsa ni ka/kha na kha/tu ta kha/sarba a
274b1(rgyud): sha sa kha/sarba ma a ka ra Sha ya/pra be sha ya/ban+d+ha ya/ban+d+ha ya/sarba Ta ki nI nan/e a ra li ma nu sma ra ya phaT/mi yi srin mo tshangs ma dang khro
274b2(rgyud): bo dang ni 'jug sred mo//gzhon nu mo dang dbang po dang //rdo rje dmar mo bdud rtsi mo//zhi ba ma dang be con mo//zon mo dang ni zab mo//rdo rje dga' ba mo
274b3(rgyud): dang ni//shin tu khrag 'thung mo//gcig pu sprod dang yi 'phrog mo//grub mo dang na rlung mo dang //rdo rje yang ni gsod chen mo//me ma phrag mo rgan byang
274b4(rgyud): mo/sna chen mo dang chu lha mo//rdo rje nag mo chen mo dang //rdo rje ra ste dra mir ser mo dang /rdo rje sngon gri bum rna mo//rdo rje dmar ser dril 'khrol
274b5(rgyud): ma//me mo chen mo khyed rnams kyis//ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa'i//'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i//ye shes thob par bya ba dang //
274b6(rgyud): bsgrub pa rnams kyi las bya zhes//rdo rje byin nas ming btags te//dam bcas bzhin du hA ru ka/da ltar khyod kyis gzugs mchog rnams//mngon par ston la grub pa
274b7(rgyud): 'phrul//ci snyed grub mchog ma bral zhing //khyed rnams mngon du ma gyur na//rab tu sbya ne'i dkyil 'khor 'dir//gdug la las rnams kun gyi shi oM badrab mu mu ka~M /a kA Sha ya/ma
275a1(rgyud): b+h+re shA ya/pra be sha ya/byAr+N+Na ya byAn+d+ha ya/tau sha ya tau sha ya/// yan/ma oMn+tu/gautau ma dkris 'khor bya phyi rol du bsgyu la kho ba du dngas rkyen gyis pa
275a2(rgyud): la rta mgrin dbang gi phyag rgya bcas la mchod//bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las khro bo bskyed rdzogs las kyi bzlas pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o////de nas bac+doMs dpal kun
275a3(rgyud): bzang po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung //zhi ba'i mchog gtan phreng ba'i phrin las rab bsdus pa/tshad med snying rje skyid pa dong //byang chub sems dpa' dge la ni//sngon
275a4(rgyud): du 'gro ba'i lam mchog ste//sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya//khrag 'thung thug su gnas pa ni//ye shes gtso mo mchog nyid//gsum pa las ni 'das pa'i phyir//rtse mo med pa'i lasu bstan//de/
275a5(rgyud): ni gzugs dang byin rlabs dang //bzlas brjod dang ni phrin las dang //dus dang gnas dang bdag nyid dag/phun sum tshogs pa bdun po ste//btab na ci 'dod sbyin zhes//dam tshig bdag pos rab
275a6(rgyud): tu gsungs//'odas ni lha yang brlag pa'i phyir//rang gi bka' las rang mi 'da'//gzugs ni thugs kyi phyag rgya dbyings la ste//lcags dang lcags lnga seng ldeng lasogs pa tsher ma can gyi shing /
275a7(rgyud): las sor brgyad dam bcu gnyis par byas pa mgo mjug ma nor bar shing rtsa ba phyogasu mgo byas la/sor brgyad lo sor gicig la rgya mdung rked par sir gcig la rgya mdung stod zur brgyad/smad
275b1(rgyud): zung gasrodu byas la//rorab ba lta brjod pa 'dug pa ni gzugaso//byin rlangs na thog pa nyid sgra gsum du byin gyis brlab par bya ste/dri'i 'og tu rgyun dud gzhal med khang du dmigs te/phyogs pani
275b2(rgyud): dang lnga pa hU~M skyil ma lnga bzhag ste/dbu su he ruka/shar du khamaso gsum rnam par rgyal po/lhor gshin rje gshed/nub tu dz+nyA ma sbyin/byang tu stobs po che/'di rnams so so'i snying po dAn pa tsam gyis/
275b3(rgyud): bskul te/phyi nang gi mchod pa ci 'byor pa phul te/dam tshig rjesu bkug nas gnyi su med pa'i rgyan rdzogs par mdzad pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur byin gyis brla'o//de nas sbas phur bu'i khro bo bskyod
275b4(rgyud): po ni/oM badz+ro kro d+ha kI li kI la ya ma na phaT ces brjod pa'i lte ba yan chad mthing nag la dbu skra kham pa zur gsum pa'i thab su bskyed la/brang gis 'gro chen po dang /thod rlon gyis bcings shing
275b5(rgyud): bshams la/spyan gsum sdang mig tu bgra de/phyag g.yon pa'i phur bu la gzigs/mchi ba gtsigs pa/rab tu rngam pa/dur khrod kyi me phung gi nang du lte ba man chad lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum pa/
275b6(rgyud): e'i nang du sum tsho tsam nub pa la phyag bzhi la goyas kyi gong ma sta re khaM yar bstan te brdeg par bya ste/g.yon pa ri rab kyis gnon pa'i stobasu 'dzin pa/g.yon dang pos dzaM kha T+wAM ga 'khrol zhing bdud kyi kham
275b7(rgyud): 'jigs pa/'og ma phur bu zung gsum 'debs pa'i sta ngasu gzas shing /ngan song gsum du 'jigs pa/stobs dang mthu la sogs pa khro bo thang 'dus pas kyang che ba gcini byung ste/rtag pa chen po zhung

282a4(rgyud): dbusu bya kri mu kha/pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la/ka ka'i lus la stag gi mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/sgo bzhi dgod/dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/dbusu sri la mu la/pad+ma 'dab
