282a6(rgyud): la khyi'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/sgo bzhi dgod/dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/dbusu kri kya mu kha/pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la kang kI'i lus la bya rgod kyi mgo can brgyad
282a7(rgyud): kyis bskor/sgo bzhi dgod/dkyil 'khor 'dam gang gru bzhi la dbus su kang ka mu kha/pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la/spyang ku'i lus laka ka'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/sgo bzhi
282b1(rgyud): dgod/dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su kang ka mu kha/pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la 'ug pa'i lus la pho rog gi mgo btags pa brgyad kyis bskor/sgo bzhi dgod/dkyil 'khor
282b2(rgyud): 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su u lu mu kha/pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la be rog gi lus la 'ug pa'i mgo btags pa rgyad kyis bskor/sgo bzhi dgod/de nas bcom ldan 'das phra men ma'i
282b3(rgyud): tinge 'dzin du zhugs nas 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad//bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las phru men ma bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//
282b4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku dang gsung dang thugs dngos grub kyi ting 'dzin du zhugs te/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo las 'di phyung //sku dang gsung dang thugs la sprul pa'i
282b5(rgyud): he ru ka/chos dbyis don dam rig pa'i dbyings na bzhugs//phyag rgya yum gyi mkha' la bzhugs nas kyang //sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bdag la stsol//ye shes khro rgyal
282b6(rgyud): sprul pa mang po 'phro//phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'gro don mang por mdzad//las byed mkha' 'gro chos dbyings sku la 'khrol//ye shes khro rgyal dngos grub bdag la stsol//phra men
282b7(rgyud): za byed mche gshog 'bar ba'i tshogs//dbang phyug 'jug byed yid 'phrog nu ma can//rdo rje mchu can sngor chen gshog pa can/phra men ze byed chen po dngos grub bdag la stsal//
283a1(rgyud): /rdo rje yang sprul chen po chos dbyings mkha' la shar//mtshon rdzogs sprul pa sna tshogs 'gro don mdzad//rtag tu don mdzad thugs rje shugs las byung //phra man
283a2(rgyud): yang sAl chen po dngos grub stsol//skyon lam grub po 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can//'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa/sems can rnams la dngos grub mchog
283a3(rgyud): rnams nges par stsol//ye shes chos dbyings skad tshogs zla nya'i zhal//las mdzad ye shes nan tan don la zhugs//rgyu 'bras gnyis kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa//smra ba
283a4(rgyud): yab yum dngos grub stsal du gsol//rdo rje mkha' gro dbyings kyi ye shes yum//las byed ma mo kun la dbang mdzad ma//phyag brnyan sprul pa sna tshogs 'gro don mdzad//rdo rje mkha 'gros
283a5(rgyud): dngos grub bdag la stsol//rdo rje gshog pa thogs pa yid 'phrog ma//rdo rje sder mo phyogs bcur sprul pa 'phro//rdo rje las byed ma mo brgya yang 'gyed//dbang phyug pho nya'i dngos
283a6(rgyud): grub bdag la stsol//mi mnyam pa yi lha khyod rtag tu ni//thugs rje sman gyis gzigs shing 'gro ba'i dpal//bla med byang chub bsgrub par dam bcas pa//bdag cag las kyi 'bras
283a7(rgyud): bu mchis par mdzod//de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khor rnams 'dus nas gsol pa/sngon tshe ye shes brnyes pa'i lha//de yi 'khor du gtogs pa ma dang mkha' gram//rtse gcig
283b1(rgyud): bston kya po shos su dang phra yon khyod//bston bskyon pa'i dus na rgyang ma ring //bsgrub pa'i dus na ma thu ma chung //rang bskyen ni yang yang bstan na//dpal chen phra mon da ltar ma lags kyu
283b2(rgyud): ming ga tshogs kyi srin mo yang //phebs byams shing khu bsuM gdung //yang bsnu gyi pa ni ying bsgrubs no//sang ka'i chags kyi srin mo yad //mabs byams shing sring bas gdung //ga
283b3(rgyud): ba'i mchi ma'i tshul du dku//ye shes lha yi thugs kyis bzod lags sam//dngos grub skal dang ldan par mi dmigs kyang //sngon gyi thugs dam dbang gis dngos grub stsol//de skad
283b4(rgyud): ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa'i dngos grub 'khor rnams la stsal to//'khor rnams kyis kyang rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa po dngos grub stsal to//bac+doMs ste
283b5(rgyud): rol pa las sde gsung thugs kyi dngos grub dbyig bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pa/'i dam pa'i don gyi gsang ba zub mo 'ang nyid kyi sgra dang
283b6(rgyud): gsung dang thug sa rdo rje las byung nas sprul po lnga po dras 'di mgo 'jugag deni rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyisargyam dang ye shes gnyis/skabs dang shes rabye gnyis/kun rdzob dang don du mi gau sa/
283b7(rgyud): medo bsdus na don dam la sbyin gyis grub pa'i byang chub sems bsdun//rgyud 'di mgo 'jug gi don dpol kun du bzang bar 'du sa//kun du bzang po sgra ma zad/rkyen gyi 'khor lo dang
284a1(rgyud): gsung mi zad rgyun gyi 'khor lo dang /thugs mi zad rgyun gyi 'khor lho dang /sku gsung thugs bde ba chen po ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor nyid kyang byang chub kyi sems kyi
284a2(rgyud): 'duso//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang por 'dus pa'i don ni bac+doMs kyis sdud pa pa rdo rje chos la gtad//sku gsung thugs kyi don gsang ba zab mo 'di rdo rje chos kyi sdud
284a3(rgyud): pa paM la gtod//de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa pos lus ngag yid gsum rje su yid rang skyes te/bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/kun gzhi rnal 'byor rdzogs pa'i dkyil
284a4(rgyud): 'khor na//zab cing gting dpag bka' ba rgyal ba'i sku bzhug so//sprul pa meng pos 'gro don rdzogs par mdzod//dpal chen kun bzang khyed la phyag 'tsha lo//ye shes khro bo chos nyid dbyings
284a5(rgyud): na bzhugs//sprul pa'i khro bos las rnams rdzogs par mdzad//phra men yang sbrul ye shes dbyings 'khyil//khro bo 'khor mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshalo//sku gsung dngos grub ya mtshan
284a6(rgyud): 'phrul can//sku gsung thugs la sprul pa mang po 'phro//mkha' gro za byed phra men pho nya mo//mgyogs pa'o tshogs la phyag 'tshalo//las rnams dreg shul mdzad pa'i khro rgyal sku
284a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i man ngag gsing chen rnams//klung nas grol bar mdzad pa ye shes yum//sgo ba sgo ma'i tshogs la phyag 'tshalo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
284b1(rgyud): rnams rjes su yid rang ste/leg so leg so zhes bya ba byin to//bka' dam pa gsang ba zab mo'i tan tu 'di sdud pa po rdo rje chos la btang ngo //de nas sdud pa po rdo rje chos kyis bcom ldan 'das
284b2(rgyud): dpal kun du bzung po he ru ka 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la sku gsung thugs kyi bshags pa phul lo//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang du gyur pas na//lus ngag sems kyis sdig
284b3(rgyud): bgyis mthol zhing bshags//theg pa dman pa'i dbang du gyur pas na//thabs chen spyad dang ma spyad mthol zhing bshags//ma rig log pa'i dbang du gyur pas na//yang dag don mi rtogs
284b4(rgyud): pa mthol zhing bshags//snying rje chungs shing zhe sdang dbang du gyur pas na//'gro ba'i don ma bgyis pa mthol zhing bshags//le lo gnyid kyi dbang du gyur pas na//sgom dang bsgrub la g.yel
284b5(rgyud): ba mthol zhing bshags//ser sna 'jur bgegs dbang du gyur pas na//mchod pa lo zla 'das pa mthol zhing bshags//nga rgyal khengs sems dbang du bsdus pa na//slob dpon sku ma
284b6(rgyud): mnyes pa mthol zhing bshags//rtse gdung chung ba'i dbang du gyur pas na//grogs mchid thugs dang 'gal ba mthol zhing bshags//za rags ngan pa'i dbang du gyur pas na//phud dang
284b7(rgyud): lhag mar gyur pa mthol zhing bshags//bud dang lhag ma nyams pa'i skyon dbang gis//phud nyul thugs dang 'gal ba mthol zhing bshags//phud nyul thugs dang 'gal ba'i skyon dbang
285a1(rgyud): gos//mkha' 'gro bka' chung gnas su gyur pa mthol zhing bshugs//sgrol bu'i dus susnying rje chungs pa yas//sems can gnas

285a3(rgyud): gzungs ma thugs dang 'gal ba'i skyon dbang gis//chags shing 'khor ba'i gnasu mthol zhing bshags//bshags nas sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol//de skad ces bzod

285b1(rgyud): pabalnga po shr-i kIr tis gtan la phab ste/skad gsar pas/bsgyur nas sog po mchog gi snying po dang /an bkra shis dang /bal mo bzang bkro shis rgya mtshos yon bdag bgyis nas mang yul

285b3(rgyud): iSh+Ta/bod skad du/thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin/dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po mchog//bam po chen po brgyad pa//dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshalo//bcom
285b4(rgyud): ldan gsang ba mtshig gi dkyil 'khor nA//shin tu rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs//rgyal ba rgya mtsho 'khor dang bcas//skal ldan rnams dang thabs gcig bzhugs//gnas
285b5(rgyud): mchig yum gyi dkyil 'khor na//gnyis med lhun gyis gnas pa'i tshe//de tshe nyan thos dge 'dun dang //rang rgyal theg chen med sde dang //byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
285b6(rgyud): dang /nyan thos dge 'dun chen po dang //dge bcom ming yang med nang du//kun bzang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas//dgongs ste 'di skad bstan pa'i lung //bsha
285b7(rgyud): 'grol ba'i dus gcig dang //'di skad bstan pa'i dus gcig na/bsrid gsum ye nas bdud rtsi lnga//ma bcos ye nas rdzogs sangs rgyas//kun tu bzang po'i thugs dkyil
286a1(rgyud): nas//dus gsum srid gsum sku gsung thugs//ye nas bdud rtsi yin pa'i phyir//nges pa'i klong nas bka' stsal pa//zab mo'i stong nas phyung ste
286a2(rgyud): bstan//de nas bder gshegs thams cad dang //thabs gcig bzhugs te dgongs pa ni//bla na med pa'i byang chub ngu//ye shes mnyam nyid nyams snyed nas//rdo rje gsang ba'i
286a3(rgyud): gral bkod//kun gyi dam par 'di gsungaso//bka' yi dam pa mchog gi lung //nges par phyung ste gsungs pa 'di'o//sgrub dang bsgrub par bya ba dang //'bras bu thob par
286a4(rgyud): bye ba'i phyir//gsang sngags gsang ba'i man ngag 'di//bdud rtsi dam pa mchog gi lung //snying por bsdus pa'i nges par 'di//byang chub 'byung ba snying po mchog/lta ba dang ni

286a6(rgyud): snying rnam grangs kyang //theg pa'i sgo ni gsum du gsungs//gseng nyid theg por bsngos dang bzhi//ldem por dgongs dang don dam yang //bkri ba'i don du sangs rgyas yin//rna brgyud
286a7(rgyud): bstan pas thugs brtol te//thig le ches skyes khyab pa'i phyir//nges pa'i lu'i yang sangs rgyaso//sangs rgyas mnyam dang dbyingasu 'gro//nges pa'i lung yang rnam gcig tu/
286b1(rgyud): gsang sngags gsang bas sangs rgyas te//byang chub sems 'di kun du dag/rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde chen nyid//mA lus mtha' dag nyid kyi rgya//ye nas bya med bla ma dgos//rgya dang 'bras bu
286b2(rgyud): 'khrul pa'i sgra//mi rtog sbyong ba'i yul mino//de lha'i yul du rtog 'dzin gyis//'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gyur pa yin//nges 'byung chos sku chen po la//b+ha ga ra ji bzhin bzhag pas na//byang
286b3(rgyud): chubo nyid ltang gnas med//bu gcig ma rtsol bde bar gnos//rgyud dang lung dang man ngag kyang //rmangs dang rje'u dang rgyal po'i tshul//khyad par rtsal 'phang thag ring yang //gcig la
286b4(rgyud): gcig rten gcig gi dang //dbyer med tshul gcig rang bzhin pas//cig ste rnam grangs yongs kyis med//dbyer med dang du rtogs pa la//bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya'o//de bas sku gsung
286b5(rgyud): thugs kyi bdag/sku dang rgyan dang 'khor lo yang //lung chen zab mo'i nang na gsal//lnga bzhi nang du 'khor ba yang //ye shes sangs rgyas de las med//dbyings gyur pas mnye gnas pas//ye
286b6(rgyud): nas sangs rgyas bde chen nyid//bdud rtsi zhes ni de la brjod//skye shi med pa'i dbyingasu gyur//dbyings 'gyur dag mnyam lhun grub pas//lta ba 'di la gnas pa yi//rnal 'byor 'di ni skul ba

287a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas pade chen nyid las byung //thams cad ma lus bdud rtsi 'di//spros med thig ler gnas pa las//mtha' yas sems can don gyi phyir//rang la
287a2(rgyud): mchod cing rang gis bza'//bsgrub pa pos ni nan tan byos//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos//ye shes chen po'i thugs nas dgongs te bka' stsal pa'o//bdud rtsi

287a6(rgyud): ba kun grol chen po dang //drang srong chen po lding sngon dang //tsa ra ka dang nom so skyes//tha skar bu dang lha skabs dang //rgyun shes pa dang g.yon phyogs lha//thang la
287a7(rgyud): gnas dang ma bzhin 'jug/dkar gnyis spyod dang ke ma yan//shing khyer dang ni ljang sngon du//nyi ma zla ba klu ru bcas//shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang ma//sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyun//
287b1(rgyud): 'di kun 'khor dang bcas pa yis//kun bzang lha la phyag 'tshal nas//sman gyi dpung dang dam tshig mnos//drang srong rnams la rjesu gnang //de nas kun bzang bder gshegs kyis//sman gyi

287b3(rgyud): thams cad sman chen ra sa yan//skye ba med las thams cad skyes//de ltar smin par byed pa yang //thugs rje rgya mtsho chen po las//thugs rje sprin

287b6(rgyud): kun gyis gsos//ri rab r+Ni dang ri sul dang /sman ljongs dang ni nug 'tshal dang /lcang lo tson kyi 'khor kun du//sman tshonu bdud rtsi char gyis rlan//rlung thaMd ro gi cig ste//chu
287b7(rgyud): yi bcud la skyes pa ni/dpag bsi shing dang gel ba'i shing //ljon shing dang ni tsai ti'i shing //sa stengs khengs par skyes pa ste//bdud rtsir gyur te thing rgyas//sdong po dang ni sdong chen dang //\u0f7fba sdong bu shan lnga/
288a1(rgyud): /dang /snying po 'alags mdang 'dab ma me tog 'bras bur bcas//de bzhin 'bru yi rnam grangs kun//thams cad bdas shing smin par mdzad//'thungs na ngoms te rgyas
288a2(rgyud): par gyur//so so'i yul dang gnas ngag dang /mngag dang ra dang dri dang mthu//gang gis sa bon de nyid las/de dag rang rang 'byin par byed//de bzhin srogs chags thams cad

288b1(rgyud): sdong pu yu la ga dang //lo ma 'dab ma me tog dang //shun lpags 'bras bu snying por bcas//ro dang mthu dang mdog dang las//rtsa ba gcig lasna yan lag brgyad//yan lag brgya

288b7(rgyud): da lig swAhA//dngos grub blang pa'i sngags 'di'o//a mri te sid+d+hi byi tsu rna ya swA hA//bu tsi g+ha ha ka no/byin gyis brlabs cing bza' ba yang //nyi ma'i gung la
289a1(rgyud): /bza' byur b+hA/don dam thog yo bdun pa las//spyong po med las stong blo byung//rnam smin 'bras bu rigs 'dzin 'grub//nad med la brgya
289a2(rgyud): 'tsho bar byed//de nas drang srong nyi shu gcig/grub pa'i rigs 'dzin mchog tu gyur//de yi 'og tu drang srong mchog/bco lnga yis ni bdud rtsi smar//ru sa ya na
289a3(rgyud): dam pa 'di//tshe'i rigs 'dzin 'dod pa'i phyir//gzhon nu sred ces bya ba dang //'dron skyob ces bya ba dang /rtsibs kyi mu khyud la sogs pas//chu bo gang+gA

295a1(rgyud): ma tang gi ni rnam shes de//nges par gzugs la bab nas ni//Ta ki zhal ni nub tu bstan//dbang du bsdu ba'i las mdzad kyis//sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis rlob//khams gsum//
295a2(rgyud): ma lus bsgral ba'i zhing //stan chen po bya ba'i phyir//bder gshegs mang po kun 'dus shing //byams dang snying rje ldan pa yis//nyon mongs 'khor ba'i rgya dral to//gnas kyi sgo 'di su yis
295a3(rgyud): bcad/sems kyi bdag pos bcad dam ci//gzung 'dzin rkang pa bsnol ba yis//yul las 'das pa'i sgo phye shig zhes brjod/sgo dbye bo ka tA ri ka na pra be sha g.yon pa'i zhabs kyis ru tra'i gzug
295a4(rgyud): gnas kyi sgo 'dri bcad bzhin du/bde bar gshegs pa'i skyabasu gsol//shi bu'i sdug bsngal 'dring byung //zhes lha chen po brgyad kyis dus cig tu tshig de smraso//Ta ki brgyad kyis bka' stsal pa//dra
295a5(rgyud): pam rungs lha chen khyod//sems kyi sgro kun de dbye yis//rdo rje 'bang ba'i spu gri yis//gnas kyi sgo kun de phye nas/sems kyis bdag pos gzung bar bya//ston pas gsungasA pa//skye ba'i rkyen gyi
295a6(rgyud): 'chi ba yin//sdig po'i rkyen gyis bcom pas 'chi//bdag kyang dngos por lta bas 'jig/nga ye bstan pa 'di la gzung //'on kyang 'chi ba'i sdug brtul bral/gzugs 'dzin rka log yul
295a7(rgyud): las bzlas//pha mo bsnol te mnan pa yang //mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bsnan//rkang pa byang shar mtshams rkyang //Ta ki'i zhabs ni g.yas pa yis//ru tra ling ga'i steng du gnan//de
295b1(rgyud): ltang ling gamanan byas na//thar byed chen po'i 'gying skyabs kyis//rngom brjod chen pos 'di skadado//sa ma yA ke sha tsi Tadz+wA la hUM phaT//zhes man no//mata de ba ru tra dza zhes pa dang //khams gsum nas
295b2(rgyud): 'byung sems can rnams//rdo rje sku yi khyad par gyis//'od zer tshul du bsdus nas ni//de dag bdag gis gzugs la gzung //spro ba rdo rje thams cad kyis//sku dang ye shes mchogs bya'o//thar
295b3(rgyud): ba'i lam 'byed dkyil 'khor 'dire//brod pa can rnams 'ong ba ltar//skal dang ldan pa rigs kyi bu//bde bar 'ongs pa legs te 'ongs//rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yis/rtse rgyal
295b4(rgyud): bstan pa'i gnas chen 'dir//b+ho de rtsi ti'i dbyings nyid du//khams gsum 'khor ba kun bsdu'o//chos nyid skye 'gag med pa la//bde bar go shegs dang 'gro ba zhes//dbyings
295b5(rgyud): su gcig pas gnyis su med//kun kyang ngo bo mnyam nyid de//thams cad snying po byang chub sems//ma skyes pa sngo na 'gag pa 'jig/bdag nyid med na mnyam pa'i sku/thugs rdza
295b6(rgyud): chen po cir mi mdzad//ye gnas de ltar de bzhin du//sems can ma rig rmongs pa'i zlos//bdag dang bdag gir so sor 'dzin//rtag chad mtha' gnyis ma spongs te//nor pas
295b7(rgyud): btags pa'i phung po lnga//log rtog phyin ci log pa nis bcings//nyon mongs sdug bsngal rgyu bsags te/'khor ba'i rgyud lnga kha brims pas/mya ngan mi 'da' yun rings te/
296a1(rgyud): phung po khams dang skye mched la//'khrul pa'i bag chags bag la nyal//bde 'gro'i lam la bsgribs pa'i rnams//'khor ba'i lam lnga rgyun bcad phyir//ngan song rnam
296a2(rgyud): skyong ba'o//ma tA ma ta sarba pe ta ga tI he tuM hUM phaT/pa tsa pa tsa sarba ti ra ya tet+ti phaT/da ha da ha sarba na ra ga te he huM hUM phaT//de ltar ngan song rnams sbyangs te/sdug bsngal gsum gyi sgo bcad
296a3(rgyud): phyi ra dA raM yaM khaM zhes brjod la//ye shes 'bar ba'i mes bsregs ste//mtshan nyid med par stong par 'gyur//dus la bab pa'i sems can de//laso la bab pa'i rnal 'byor pas//rdo rje dpyid//
296a4(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir//thugs rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni//skal dang ldan pa'i rnam shes des//thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis//sku yi sprul pa phyogs bcur bkye//gsung gis son
296a5(rgyud): mtha' dag grol//thugs ni tshad med bzhi dang ldan//nyi zla gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du//tshe dpag med par dbang bskur nas//yang dag nyid la yang dag sgrol//yang dgu bsgral na bde chen the
296a6(rgyud): mi rdzogs la nges par sbyin//byin pa tsam gyis de dz+ra banas//rgyal ba'i ning khams dbyings nyid mthong //rgyu drug gan sa mi skye phyir//dpa' 'bru lngas lam lnga dgag/'og min
296a7(rgyud): dag ldan lha yul du//ye shes rlung gis brtenas ni//sbyor ba'i ldum su phaT gyis 'phang //an+di su tro pr-i dugang yang rung ba'i rnam shes de//gsang ba'i dbying su hUM gis bsngo//skur skyed
296b1(rgyud): ye shes skur spros te//dbyangs dang ye shes lhun grub pas//sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byam dang //bde gshegs po brang dkyil 'khor du//rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ldan pa yis//'phags pa'i la
296b2(rgyud): du rlung zhugs nas//chos kyi 'khor lo skar zhing gshegs//'jig rten lha yi gtso bo dang //nyan thos dgra bcom rang rgyal dang //sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' yis//'jig rten 'das pa'i tshad
296b3(rgyud): pas mchod//stug pos brgyan pa'i sa 'das nas/pad+ma spyan gyi sa la bzhag/'chi ba med pa'i chos sku theb//stong gsum ma lus bton pa bas//'bum gyi char yang mi phod//rang sems ma bcos
296b4(rgyud): ye nas chub//skyes bu chen po rnal 'byor gyis//bsgral ba 'ba' zhig snying rje'i mchog/de nas ma trang ru tra de bsgral te//sngon 'byung ba yi gleng bzhi dang //gtan tshig su dgongs nas/phyi rabs kyi
296b5(rgyud): sngags 'chang rnams yid ches par bya ba dang //dad pa can gyi rnal 'byor pa rnams drang ba'i phyir/dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad dang /ma mo chen po brgyad dang rung 'byung gi mchod rten chen po
296b6(rgyud): brgyad/'di man chad gtan tshigs dang bcas te bstan to//gong du bsgril ba'i bsam rgyud ni 'og nas zhib tu bstan//'di yabo bsnor te lung bcus na so bstan no//bdud drung dbang phyug
296b7(rgyud): gshin rje de//thugs rje tshad med pa'i bsgral nas//ro yi nyal thabs gan brgyal te//dzamU gling lo'i gleng khamasu//bor nas sa gan gyur pa ni//dur khrod chen po brgya du gyur//
297a1(rgyud): mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan//rkang pa byang shar mtsham su bstan//lag pa gnyis ni g.yas g.yon brkyang //mgo dang lus snying yan lag kun//gnas
297a2(rgyud): gyi dur khrod chen po brgyad//de ni dpal chen bzhugs gnas yin//thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis//ro yi srungs ma chen mo ni//ma mo chen mo brgyad bzhag/do yi gnas rten
297a3(rgyud): chen por yang //mchod rten chen po gzi byin can//rang 'byung rer bzhag pa yin//de ltar sa gzhi 'dri kun yang //bkra shis ya mtshan thugs rje can//chos dang dngos grub
297a4(rgyud): 'byung ba'i gnas//cho 'phrul 'byung bar bauka' stsal to//de yi lus snying ma ga ta//dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal//ma mo chen mo ki'u ri gnas//mkhas shing snying stobs che ba'i//
297a5(rgyud): so'o//mchod rten ming ni bde byed rten//de yi mgo bo lho phyogs kyi//dur khrod chen po bzhag pa ni//sing ga yul gyi gling phran yin//ma mo chen mo tse'u ri gnas//mthong thos rnam
297a6(rgyud): ba'i 'phrul bag can//mchod rten raM bo ta la la//lag po g.yas pa shar lho'i mtshams//dur khrod chen po bal yul yin//ma mo chen mo pu ka si//lhag par zas kyi longs smod che/
297a7(rgyud): mchod rten kha sho byi gra kha'o//lag pa g.yoni lho nub mtshams//dur khrod chen po sa la'i yul//ma mo chen mo pi ta li//phyag na rdo rje dbang gi gnas//de ni mthu dang dbang yang che/6
297b1(rgyud): rul chen po'i sa las ni//mchod rten ma las gan da//rkang pa g.yas pa byang shar mtshams//dur khyod chen po li yi yul//ma mo chen mo tsaN+Da li//lha mo shang ki ni zhes grags//chu dang me
297b2(rgyud): brub rdzu 'phrul can//mchod rten yang mi ge'u to shan//nang pa g.yon pa nub byang mtshams//dur khyod chen po kha che'i yul//ma mo chen mo phra mo hA//bde skyed ldan pa phun sum tshogs mchod//
297b3(rgyud): mang ni skan ske//pho mtshan stang gi byang phyogs na//dur khrod chen po u rgyan yul//ma ma tshan mo kasma ri//'byor pa'i long spyod lnga dang ldan//dngos grubo can yang de na mang //gzi'i mchod
297b4(rgyud): rten chen po ste//ming yang d+harma tsakra'o//de yi nang khrol thams cad kun//dur khrod chen po za hor yul//rgya mtsho'i sgo gling ma ho do//lang ga pu rangs srin po'i gnas//ma mo chen mo sma sha ni
297b5(rgyud): shes rdzu 'phrul pas mi khyab/srin po srin mo sha za rnams//de dag kun la dbang sgyur zhing //rin tshon nor bu dpag bsdam shing //'byor pa'i yo byad kun dang ldan//mchod rten ba
297b6(rgyud): kun nu'o//'jig rten kun tu bstan pa yi//dur khrod chen po gnas brgyad//de ltar sta ni'i dkyil 'khor 'drir//'das pa'i dus na sngon 'byung ba'i//sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis ba
297b7(rgyud): de ltar gyur pa'i 'dzom gling du//skye shi gnas pa'i yul yin pas//phyi rabs sngags kyi sgrub pa pos//'jigs byed chen po khrag mthung gi/dus gsum rgyal ba'i bka' bzhin du/
298a1(rgyud): //nas byin gyis brlabs pa ni//sngags mchog bdud rtsir bsgrub pa'i phyir//rgyu dang dam rdzas thams cad ni//sangs rgyas grub pa'i rgyu dang bzhi//dam tshig dam par spang du rlu /
298a2(rgyud): byin gyis brlangs par bya ba'o//de na sa 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor bskyed de//des don gcig tu lam rgyud lnga ni 'bras bu chen po lnga yin te//de dag thams cad 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil la
298a3(rgyud): dus gcig tu bsgral ba'i phyir//bdud yag sha ma hA ru tra zhes bya ba zhig/dus de gang sprul zhing gnas sba ro//de la bdag nyid sku ni smug nag 'bar//phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs brtsams/
298a4(rgyud): pUd+yA ke shA tsi Ta dz+wa la hUM phaT/ma nu d+ha ra ma two sha phyung um dar ma badz+ra ma hA mangs/tra mkha'i zhes bsgral te//e ta te ma hA ru dzA/shar+b+hu ma kar/badz+ra ni hU~M phaT/mahA di ba ru tra hUM dzi T+Ta
298a5(rgyud): nis brjod/sten dang b+hin+da chen por byas ste/rnam par shes pa byang chub semasu dbang skur ro//de ni stanI'i dkyil 'khor 'dir//dur khrod bdag po brtul nas ni//'khor bcas
298a6(rgyud): lus dbang du bsdus//'jig rten gtso bo lha brgyad dang //srin mo brgyad dang bu mo brgyad//dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis//'di skad ces ni khas blangs te//mgrin gcig tu ni rab
298a7(rgyud): smras pa//rdo rje'i bar ba'i me dadung gis//bskal pa bas kyang sreg mdzod pa//'jigs chu ba rngam pas khyod per can//dbu mang rtsub pa'i tshig sgrogs shing //phyag mangs 'jigs pa'i
298b1(rgyud): tshan ma rnams// ba'i ga spyan yang //'di na lams can ga nga//khyod da / na sbyo sh+log/ba drug da ga/drug//rlu ga/shwe dang 'a rnam sa
298b2(rgyud): bye d+hA rjem da zhi bar hU~M// ro'i'i tshigs chen tshogs can//khams ga sum ts+tshin thams cad dang //bajig rten thal bar rlig mdzad pa//oM maho ma mchog rtse//
298b3(rgyud): spyod pa skye ma la//rgyas nan tan ga nga / ni mi/ma 'thu da
298b4(rgyud): danas gyu/sa khams gsum thams cad sbrul ba // rgyug gnas pa'i tham pa sbyinI rnams//bsdu ba'i skyer dus kun bstas nas//oM b+h+yo/
298b5(rgyud): pad+ma m+bu yang / na pasad dang skur te//thegs da man rgyung chub sems rje sa ba rgyusamamam nyi med/dzin pa nga ga ni khri bzhin/'du/
298b6(rgyud): waM yis pan ste//rnam par dri chen snang bar mdzad/ chen po lnga dga'o//nang gi rgya brab yin pa du//mi baspyad byang chub sems nyid//dmig su med pas dag pa yin
298b7(rgyud): sa rin chen 'byur ldan pa/mnyes da nyam bye mdo//sdug pa ma tsun ts+tsha ni na 'di tshulas rgyug//dri ming nas rnam par dag/dun
299a1(rgyud): kyang gtsang zhing dri med pas//thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas lnga//lus pa med pas ye shes dang //ma bcos ye nas de nyid//de phyir sman chen bcud/mchog
299a2(rgyud): bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya'o//rtog pa'i klong du su 'dris pa//mi zhes bya ba sangs rgyas yin//bcom ldan 'das ni gud na med//'byung ba lnga las gyur pa'i rgyu//sprul pas rigs lnga'i ngo ga//
299a3(rgyud): yin//rang gi lus la bsdu ba'i phyir//sku gsum rdo rje dbang thob 'gyur//de phyir bsgrub pa'i rdza su gsungs//de skad ces sman spyod pa'i lung du bka' stsal to//bdud rtsi chen po mchog
299a4(rgyud): lung //'bum sder bzhugs po'i nang nas/lung a nu yo ge'i spyod pa bla na med bstan pa ste///bam po chen po bzhi'o//rgya glor ska du/ta thA ga ta pany+tsa b+hu d+hA nA ma/bod skadadu/riHA
299a5(rgyud): bde bar de shigs pa la phyag 'tshalo//ma hA yo ge'i don du bsgrub pa'i thabs 'di bstan to//ri ni nyams dga' mdangs bzang po'i//yid 'ong gan su 'dug nas ni//byin brlabs mtshams
299a6(rgyud): bcad brtan byas nas//dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi pa//dri sna lnga yis maN+Dal bya'o//theg bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad//maN+Dal brkyang pa'i gzhung bzhin bri//de yi
299a7(rgyud): rtse mo brkyang la yang //yid bzhi nor bu 'bar ba bri//de yi dbusu bsam pa yang //srid gsum ban d+ha bzang kong yug/ye nas ma bcos rang 'byung snod//dpal dang ldan pa'i snod
299b1(rgyud): bzhag la//de yi nang du glugs pa'i sman//ye nas rang byung bdud rtsi lnga//sha chen bshang gci khu ba khrag/dag ba'i rgyu ste bdud rtsi'i dngos//stong las sbyar bas ye nas dag/btag dang btsan/
299b2(rgyud): dang ba gzhal b+hi/nyi zla gsal ba'i gyi /khru lnga ye shes 'phro 'du las//stong khams khyab par don byas ste//bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas//dus gsum sangs rgyas mchod pa'i phyir//ba
299b3(rgyud): bzhin brtsan pa'i dngos grub blang //mu tig dkar po dri med ltar//bsgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya'o//mgu ya lag pa'i phyag rgya yis//gzhung bzhin brtan sgyu 'phro 'du bya/de dbus klu bdag sa
299b4(rgyud): bon gyis//dngos grub dam pa blang bar bya//dgu pa'i sngags kyis btab nas ni//le lo med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis//bar chad med pa'i 'phro 'du bya'o//oM g+he ye shes 'od phyung zhing //A yis
299b5(rgyud): mes bsregs thal bar 'gyur//hUM gis bdud rtsi rnam par dag/gsal la 'byung 'jug lhan pos//rtags dang mtshan ma bdun gyis 'byung //'od dang du ba dri dang sgra//lha mo'i gzugs kyang
299b6(rgyud): ston par 'gyur//mang du 'phel na bsgrub rdzas yin//de la ya mtshan bskyed mi bya//mtshan mo'i rtags dag ma byung na//bskang so'i cho ga rgya bskyed cig/spogs thags bsgyur la rtsal shugs dbyung //
299b7(rgyud): dam tshig chen po bskang ba'i phyir//bsgrub rdzas rnams kyang bstar nas gzhag/de na sa mchod cing dngos grub blang //slob ma la yang dbang bskuro//bla mo lung ldan des kyang ni//che gosu bcad pa'adi dag brjod//
300a1(rgyud): gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag chos kyi dbyings//dag dang ma dag mi rtog rtog las 'das//sgyu ma 'das dang da ltar phyis 'byung ba//dus gsum gcig la sku bstan phyi ba shol med//
300a2(rgyud): grub sna tshogs brlabs chen 'bor ba can//su 'dod sbyin gyis da lta 'di la long //skal par sbrebs dang gti mug mun nAg la//sprin mthongs nyi shur khud par dro ba bzhini//bdud rtsi rgyal po dbang /
300a3(rgyud): chen 'di byin pas//rig 'dzin rgyal po gtso bo'i go 'phong thob//tshe dang skongs dang yi du'o//bgegs rnams zhi ba la sogs te//nad dang bral nas ci 'dod pa'i//yon tan rtsa brgyad 'di yis thob//tre
300a4(rgyud): bka' stsal nas/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal to//bcom ldan 'das kyi lung 'di las//dbang bskur gnang ba gang yin pa//'khor rnams
300a5(rgyud): kun gyis thob par shog/zhes bka' stsal to//yang 'khor nye ba'i sras mchog dam pa 'jam dpal la sogs pas dbang mnos nas//yang rig lnga dang rigs rgya mtsho'i gtso bo la lung
300a6(rgyud): gi don zhus pa/rtog pa dang mi rtog pa'i don ji ltar blta//don gyi 'bras bu gang lags zhes gsol pa las//kun tu bzang po dang rig lnga bde bar gshegs pas bka' sprul pa//tshad
300a7(rgyud): dang drang srong gtsang ma za//de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad//klu dang bram ze gtsang ma za//de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad//byol song rtsa mchog za ba yang //ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du za//de
300b1(rgyud): ngang krol ba dngasam pa sha //yang dag don gyi klung ng+gA nyon//rnal 'byor thabs dang ldan pas n-i//chos sku gcig lnga tha dad dAl//rigs lnga'i kha dog 'di bshad do//'di ltar d+h+r-ig na la zhes bshag/
300b2(rgyud): rang bzhin ye nas dag pa'i rdzas//mnyam pa'i dbyingasu ra rtogs na//gnyis med don gyis zin pa yin//ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub//dngos dang dang /maud rtogs pa'i mtshan//gtsang /
300b3(rgyud): me gtsang rtog pa'i mtshan//mkhas pas dbus la gnas mi 'gyur//ye shes lha bstan pa'i phyir//byang chub sems ni dkar bas na//dri med dkar bas ye shes sku'o//rak+Sha chags med dam/
300b4(rgyud): bas na//chags med rnam dag chos kyi sku//mangs yid bzhi ni rin chen sngo//sna tshogs 'byung gonas mnyam nyid sku'o//rin chen gser mdog snang mdzad//mngon 'byung sprul pa chos kyi sku'o// chu
300b5(rgyud): dag byed ljang khu'i mdog/kun tu don grub las rab sku'o//sku lnga sun grub bdud rtsi 'di//sa'i lus la gnas pa yin//dri chen dri chu dak+ta dang //mings sems chu 'di rnams kun//sems can rtog
300b6(rgyud): pa zlog pa'i phyir//gtso ru dang du blang bar bya'o//gtsang sbra med par kun gyis spyod//'di dag grol bar ngas pa shad//ji tshom med pas dngos grub thob//spyod pa'i skyes bu rnal 'byor pas//tshe 'ang
300b7(rgyud): la grub par 'gyur//ces bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pos bka' stsal to//'di yan chad ma hA yo ga'i don gyi lung dang bsgrub thab so bdu rtsi chen po 'bumo sde las 'dus
301a1(rgyud): bam po chen po lnga'o///rgya gar ska du/A mr-i ta kun d+ha la lin ma khod skadu/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa la phyag 'tsha lo//bdud rtsi rgyal la phyag 'tshal nas//bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i/
301a2(rgyud): thabs bstan te/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i dgongs pa la zhugs te//de nas bdud rtsi rgyal po yis//bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i thabs 'di bstan te bka' stsal to//dang par phun sum
301a3(rgyud): tshogs pa'i yul//dga' zhing bar chad med pa'i gnas//btsal nas nyid kyi dbang du bya'o//de nas rang lus bsrung ba'i phyir//lag cha phun sum tshogs pa yis//bar chad byed pa'i dgra bge
301a4(rgyud): bzlog/de nas bsgrub pa'i yo byad rnams//'tsho ba zas kyi yo byad rnams//bsgrub pa dam rdzas yo byad dang //rkyen zlog sman gyi yo byad dang //de ltar phun su//
301a5(rgyud): tshogs ldan nas//ji bzhin bde bar 'dug nas ni//sa gzhi rab tu sbyang byas te//tshes grangs yar gyi brgyad la brtsam//snga dro'i dus nas dkyil 'khor bya//maN+Dal 'dam gang po lnga bri//bsgrub pa chen po//
301a6(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir//dri chen dri chu'i bskyang nul bya'o//dur khrod thod pa lnga nang du//tshil chen me mar re re yang //me mar sdong bu lnga brgya bya'o//me mar lnga brgya bltam nas ni//de nas bsgrub pa brtsam byA
301a7(rgyud): zhing //rdzogs pa'i las ni rnamo bzhi bya//zhi ba'i tshe na byad du blta'o//gA na'i tshe na nub tu blta'o//sta na chen po lho ru blta'o//rgyas pa'i tshe na shar du blta'o//yang na phrin las rnam pa bzhi//so//
301b1(rgyud): so'i phyogs phyogs dag nas blta'o//de ltar 'dug stangs bstanas ni//shar gyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni//bsgrub rdzas thams cad bzhag par bya'o//lho yi dkyil 'khor steng du ni//me mar lnga brgya smos pa gzhag/
301b2(rgyud): nub kyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni//bsgrub ba yab yum gnas par bya//byang gi dkyil 'khor steng du ni/rgyu mchog chen po gzhag par bya//dbus kyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni//bram ze bkra shis gtsang ma'i ri ga
301b3(rgyud): bkra shis thod pa gzhag par bya'o//yang na ban+da dpal ldan rdzogs//zlum zhing 'khyil pa pad+ma 'dra//dbus na bu ga gcig yod pa//de yi nang du tri zhes bri'o//de yi nang du blugs pa ni//snying po chem byed bcur/
301b4(rgyud): kyi mchog/gtso bo lnga dang 'bras bu lnga/dri zhim bcud ldan thams cad kun//'di dag rab tu bskyab pa'i phyir//mang po 'dus pa mthu byin che//yang na rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar//go tsi hA dang long leng hA//'ga'i drang
301b5(rgyud): ce'u hrad ra sa yan//ga pur mu tig lan tshe rnams//'di rnams rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar//yang na gtso bo lngar sbyar ba//a 'bras rgun 'brum pa na se//grer rgya a ru ra dang lnga//'di ni nang gi 'bras bu lnga'o//sha lnga
301b6(rgyud): drag dang sbyar ba yang //dbang po lnga yi gzugs dang sbyar//de yi phra du dgos pa yang //mig dang rna ba sna dang lce/gtso bo tsi ta nyid dang lnga'o//shir tog rgun 'brum ka ko la//a 'bras pa na bum sha lnga'o//
301b7(rgyud): drini chen po sna lnga dang //cha'i grangs dang mnyam ste sbyar//na ga ge sar shing cha dang //sug smel 'gan de pa tra dang //kun du ra dang dri sna lnga'o//yang na dri yi rgyal po lnga//rgya spos 'dza' ti pa la dang //ga bur cen
302a1(rgyud): li shi lnga'o//de bzhin spos lnga'i dam pa yang //a ka ru dang du ru sa//dog dang sbrang rtsi lce dog dang //gser dngul zangs lcags g.yungang lba//'dar ram sgrib tu btags te blugs//'di dag rab tu bsta/
302a2(rgyud): zhing bsdog/'di dag sbyar zhing btags pa'i sngags//oM a mr-i ta mu sa la//gA he ha na hA na hUM phaT/'di rnam sbyar ba'i bdud rtsi mchog/dngos grub 'bras bu nges thob//'bras bu rnam lnga bsgral ba'i phyir//byang ga/
302a3(rgyud): phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du//mo lceg gri snying la sogs//gsang ba'i brda' tshig dag gis ni//de dag rab tu sngo zhing bsgrug/phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru bzhag/rgyu mchog chen po khrus byas nas//mdun
302a4(rgyud): mngon spyod ya mtshan gyi//'jigs byed 'jigs byed chen po yi//e yi dkyil 'khor sum rtse gi/steng du bzhag nas dbang sku ro//de nas dpal chen he ru ka/dur khrod bdag po chen po ni//che mchog shin
302a5(rgyud): du mi bzod pa//dbu mangs phyag cha rtsu b+hA pa bsnabs//smug nag sku ni 'bar ba can//zhal ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ste//phyag kyang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis//oM badz+ra mA hA shri he ru ka/raM dza la hUM/gsang ba'i yum yang
302a6(rgyud): ya dang mthun//ma hA kro d+h+r-i shwa ri//oM sarba tita thA ga ta mr-i tra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrI/zhes yum dbang bskur nas//gzhan yang rigs dang mthun pa ru//phyogs bzhi dag tu dgod par bya'o//de yang tshul bzhin byin gyi//
302a7(rgyud): rlo da ye hi ha ma hA ru tre hUM phaT/sa rbed a ya zhes brjod pas tsi ta drang //yang nas yang du spar byas te//dug gsum rtsa ba der bcad//rgyu 'bras mthun zhing sbyar ba yang //yangs shing rgyud la goms pa
302b1(rgyud): dang cho sku zhi ba'i ting 'dzin yod//ston brgyad dang ldan pa la//nges pa'i don dbang pos par bya'o//'byung ba bzhi las skyed pa'i yum//tshul bzhi dag dang ldan pa'am//yang na mtshan bzangs sum cu ni//lus la
302b2(rgyud): rdzogs par yod pa la//zla gsang dkar dmar rlung dkar lce//de bzhin sring mo rnal 'byor ma//btsal nas bsgrub pa chen po bya'o//'o ma spos chus mgo lus bkru//dkyil 'khor nang du bzhag par bya//'jam
302b3(rgyud): pa'i dusu sbyar ba yi//khrag chen po ni sems dang bcas//ra sa ya na'i gtso bor bya'o//bdud rtsi dam pa'i snod bstan pa//kun byed thams cad za ba yin//slob ma dpa' brtul gceng sgra can//skyon drug
302b4(rgyud): rnam par spangs pa yi//mi phyed pa ni dgu dang ldan//dam tshig thams cad ma nyams shing //srog lus bu dang chung ma dang //rin chen sna tshogs 'bul byed pa//sring mo shin tu brgyan pa yang //slob dpon
302b5(rgyud): bla ma de la dbul//de ltar 'bul ba'i slob ma'i mchog/yung yang pan rtsa yan chad kyis//rab tu 'bru ni gdams pas bya'o//thugs kyi dngos grub dam pa 'di//rang byung nga yis bstan pa'i phyir//ra ba med pa
302b6(rgyud): blang bar bya//ma dag pa ni mtshams gcad//las kyi gtsor ni bslad pa dang //sbyang dang mtshams dang gsal bar bya'o//nyi zla pad+ma yang dag granas//bdag nyid dpe'o 'bru lnga yi//gnas lnga dag tu bsam par
302b7(rgyud): bya'o//dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma gsum//ma thob par du mi gtang zhing //gtang no bar chad chen por 'gyur//gsang sngags bdud rtsi yon 'di//sad pa'i phyir yang bsgrub dgos na//mkhas pas bden pa'i
303a1(rgyud): dan shes nas//don la tha cham ci ste tha//zhes the tshom bcad la//dngos grub blang ba'i sngags 'di'o//ya ho mu ka d+harmA ka ya ni//a mr-i ha sa ti hri zhes dngos grub blang ngo //banas lnga dag tu bsam pa/
303a2(rgyud): yang //spyi gtsug dbus zla ba ste//der ni oM dkar 'od ldan pa//'od zer lnga ni 'phros pa las//slar 'dus snang mdzad gtso bo ste//rtag pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa'o//lce la hri dmar 'od 'phros pas//slar 'dus mtha' yu
303a3(rgyud): chos kyi gsung //mnyam pa'i phyag rgyar gnas pa'o//snying dkar yi ge hUM mthing ka/'od zer lnga ni 'phro ba'o//slar 'dus mi 'khrugs sems pa ste//phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams//yang na bdud bdul sa gnon//
303a4(rgyud): /lte bar yi ge swa ser po//'od zer lnga ni 'phro ba las//slar 'dus rin chen bem pa'i gtso//phyag rgya yid bzhin sbyin pa'o//gsang bar yi ge ha ljang ku/'od zer sna lnga 'phros pa las//slar 'dus don yod grub pa//
303a5(rgyud): ste//zhi ba'i phyag rgyar mnyam rdzogs pa'o//rigs lnga gtogs pa 'di kun yang //rang 'byung gi ni dkyil 'khor yin//de ltar 'od zer lnga lnga yis/nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'phro 'du las//khams gsum 'gro b+hi
303a6(rgyud): don byas nas//slar 'das sman lnga nyid la bsdu//sman nyid phyag rgyar gsal 'bar nas//'od zer sna lnga slar 'dus nas//phyag mtshan sor gsal 'gyur te//gser gyi 'khor le zur brgyad las//dri chen bdud rtsi
303a7(rgyud): zhu ba'o//hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa//'bar nas byang chub semasu zhu/sa las rin chen 'od 'bar ste//ma hA mang sa bdud rtsir zhu'o//hri las 'od zer sna tshogs pa'o//pad+ma rag+ha thig ler zhu'o//ha ljang 'od 'phro sna tsha/
303b1(rgyud): bas/dag pa'i dri chu bdud rtsi bzhu'o//de ltar 'phro 'dra bya ba yang //goms pas yang nas yang du bya'o//de nas bdud rtsi rnam lnga la//sam pa'i yi ge dam pa lnga//oM hUM swa hri ma//rtsa ba'i yi ge lnga po yang //'od zer 'phro ba snga ma bzhin/
303b2(rgyud): de nas 'dzab bsgom bzlas pa'i slar//dgu pa 'di ni badzab tu drang //oM badz+ra tsi ta sa ya hUM hUM tha/de la bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya ni//lag pa g.yon pa'i dpung pa brgyad //mthe bong srin lag mthil du dgug//rdo mtshon gang bcas pa dang //dzug
303b3(rgyud): mo glang mo mthe'u chung brkyang //sbyar te lag pa'i mthil gyis ni//bdud rtsi snod kyi steng du mnan//de nas bdud rtsi byin gyis brlag/rting 'dzin me dang 'dra ba las//bzlas brjod rlung dang 'dra ba yis//gla la dang lus pas bar mi gcad//de nas/
303b4(rgyud): bdud byin gri brlag/badz+ra a mr-i ta oM A hUM hri thA//'di ni rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga'o//dzaHhUM baM hoHma hA a mri ta a be sha ho zhes bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi rgyal bas bka' stsal to//bdud rtsi dam pa mcho gi lung las//'bras bu chen/
303b5(rgyud): po lnga bsgral bar lung nges pa dang //de pasgril nas de sman du sbyar ba'i thabastan pa'i bdud rtsi chen po sa ma ya 'bum sde las////bam po chen po drug/rgya gar skad du/A mi taM ka la sha sid+d+hi bong skadadu/bdud rtsi bum pa'i lung //
303b6(rgyud): dpal bdud rtsi bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshalo//phyan byed mgon po phyag 'tshal nas//bsgrub pa'i yul dang gnas bstan te//shar lho nub byang phyogs bzhi'i ri//drang srong chen po'i bsgrub lugs dang //'phra med mI sbyar lug dang / sman
303b7(rgyud): 'drungs pa'i yul khams dang //shing dang nag kyi lha mo'i gnas//de bor smad ljongs tsan+dan gnas//bzhun pa'i gnasu bsgrub par bya'o//dug rnams bdud rtsir slang ba'i thabs/rtsa ba dang ni yan lag bcas//ra sa yan la sogs//
304a1(rgyud): /rdzas tshang bar bsogs nas bsgrub par bya'o//ri bor nags 'dab chu ngog sam//drag dung stong pa things po'am//bsgrub pa'i gnas mchog der bya'i phyir/sa gzhi rab tu brtag par bya//mnyam zhing snum
304a2(rgyud): sasnag can//zug rdo srin brag med pa dang //tsha rmos sa dang ba cha med//ma drum ma gas mnyam po la//bsgrub pa'i gnas mchog dor bya'o//rang 'byung khro bo chen po bcus//phyogs mtshams phur pa btab nA ni//gnas dngas
304a3(rgyud): gzhi dag par sbyang //oM badz+ra kI la ya ma hA kro d+ha hUM hUM phaT phaT/gardza gardza hUM phaT/ha na ha na hUM phaT/da hA da ha hUM phaT/pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/tshin+d+ra tshin+d+ra hUM phaT/b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha hUM/
304a4(rgyud): phaT/s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT/phyogs bcu dag tu mtshams bcad//sa gzhi rab tu sbyangs nas ni//dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi bya//dI sna lnga dang rak+ta yis//byugs pa'i maN+Dal bzang du bya'o//ba suM haM yoM rgyu da/
304a5(rgyud): gis//thig ni bcu drug char yang gdab//de la thig le bcu drug gam//yang na phyag mtshon bcu drug dgod//de'i dbusu bzhag pa'i snod ni//thod pa ma gas ma chag pa//yang na ru sbal mgo yang rung /dkyil 'khor de
304a6(rgyud): yi dbusu bzhag/bdud rtsi sna grangs brgya rtsa brgyad//btags te thod pa'i nang du dgang //'khor lo lte ba'i dbus bzhag/phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad rnamasu yang //snod ni bzhi 'am brgyad bzhag la//ri ra dang 'don
304a7(rgyud): 'thun pa'i dar//bcwa lnga yi khe nas dgag//yang ni bum pa'i 'bul chings bya'o//ra sa ya na la sogs rdzas//ji snyed 'byor pas ma lus kun//kyil 'khor de la skor te bzhan/de bzhin dang dkar mthong yol gyis
304b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'khor bAr rab bskor nas//dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi mda' bzhi gzugs//me long bzhi dang rat+na bzhi//ral gri bzhi dang phur pa brgyad//dkyil 'khor 'khor bar bskor te bzhag ting 'dzin rnam gsum rigs
304b2(rgyud): bzhin bsgom//rgyu yi ting 'dzin 'brasdu las//de nyid byang chub semasu 'gyur//'byung lnga yum gyi dkyil 'khor dag byang chub sems las rims bzhin bskyed/raM yaM khaM su bruM/na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa yi//gzha
304b3(rgyud): yas gsal bar 'gyur ba rwa bsgom//dbus byang chub sems chen po//shar du rdo rje dri chen tshe//lho ru mang swa sha sna tshogs//nub tu pad+ma rak+ta'i tshogs//byang du dri chu sna tshog ste//'di rnams rims bzhin bkod pa la//ga6/
304b4(rgyud): bos sbyor ba tshul bzhin bgyis nas//me ling yu ba can gyi steng du/byang chub kyi sems blangs te//dbus kyi snod blangs la kha shar phyogasu bltas te/byang chub sems kyis g.yab cing /dbyangs 'dri brjod//byang chub/
304b5(rgyud): sems 'di'i ye shes rang bzhin te//dri med rnam dag char bzhin bab pa las//'gro ba kun skyed yid bzhinor bu'i tshul//gdod nas dag pas bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin la//gnyis med sbyor bas rdo rje'i rigs tshon 'gro/
304b6(rgyud): me long ye shes de nyid yin par bA shad//zhes brjod//dbus kyi ban da'i nang du/shelo por bzhag la/byang chub sems thams cad dang /gdung dang go ro tsa na la sogs pa kun bsdus lte blugs so//
304b7(rgyud): mgu ya lag gi phyag rgya yis//de yi steng du bzhag nas ni//sgrub pa pa kun kha shar phyogasu bltas te/byang chub kyi sems kyis g.yab cing sdigs 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so//oM AHhUM/
305a1(rgyud): 'dun 'ams m+b+ha ya mr-iHsukam hA la gar+m+ma/n+naHas m+b+ha aH sho d+ha shA sna ma yar+d+ham zhes ba dus/ u zhugs pa banan//byug+sa su la bltas //marnamangs da
305a2(rgyud): la'ang skad brjod//sems can rnams ni gnas la chags//nor bas bdag nyid gtsang mar dzin//don gyis sun nI ma phyung na//bas nams thams cad dang dral ba li//oM dgas skam thag chad pa yid//bangag
305a3(rgyud): lus gtong bar mi phod na//lha la sogs pa'i bsod nams kyis//lus can rnams la smos ci dgos//de bas 'di kun sum dbyung zhing //rang 'byung bdud rtsi bstan pa'i phyir/lhas kyang lha yi bdag nyid bza'
305a4(rgyud): mi la sogs pa de bzhin du//rnal 'byor pas kyang spyad cing bzal//'di ltar bdag gzhan mi 'byed pas//blang dor med par grol ba yis//mnyam pa nyid kyi don mthong na thams cad mnyam nyid ye shes sku khadi
305a5(rgyud): gshegs rin chen rigs mchog 'grug/oM AHng+ku ma dA mangs/sa ma ya ra to tam/rang na re ti sa ma ya s+thAm zhes brjod/rin po che'i rigs yab yum spyan drang zhing brgya rtsa brgyad brjod do//ma hA mang sa dang /
305a6(rgyud): sha sna tshogs bstabs shing /lhor bzha go//kha nub phyogasu bltas ste/rag tu sna tshogs kyi snod blangs la/'di skad brjod do//ra ga rag ta pad+ma 'byung //smad pa mi gtsang rdzas 'di dag/chags yul bde ba'i
305a7(rgyud): gnas yin te//pad+ma rigs kyi dam tshig 'grub//so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes yin//zhes brjod cing //nub phyogs kyi snod kyi nang du blugs la bzhin/oM AHhUM ma hA pad+ma rag ta mu la/a mi thab dzag riti/sa
305b1(rgyud): mi ya~M hU~M su ka hri zhes brjod do//nub phyogasu bzhago'o//kha byang phyogasu bltas te/dri chu'i snod blangs nas 'di skad brjod do//kun 'byung zag pa gu ra ku chu//rdo rje de yi chu yin te//chu las ma byung gang yang med/las kyi rigs kyi dam tshig
305b2(rgyud): dang //nen tan ye shes mchog kyong 'grub//oM AHhU~M a mi kaM si ti/badz+ri re ti sa ma ya s+t+wam zhes brjod de/drang phyogasu gzhago/shar gyi snod dang dri chen blangs te 'di skad brjod//smad pa mi gtsang snyigs ma 'di//rtag par
305b3(rgyud): nyid snyigs ma yin//tshe mchog 'dzin pa'i bdud rtsi ste//gdong nas dag pa'i rang bzhin bas//bde gshogs kun gyi thugs dam nyid//gnyis med sku ru sbyor bas na//chos dbyings ye shes dam tshig 'grub//oM baM/
305b4(rgyud): /ro can mo ha ra ti sa ma ya sta ma ma ha yo ga a ti s+phar na ba lin te/oM maM thA u tsi tha a ti tiste aM zhes brjod do//de nas sgrub pa po kun gyis thal mo sbyar te/dbus kyi snod yum gyis blangs te 'di skad brjod do//ye shes snying po
305b5(rgyud): can rnams kyi//sangs rgyas kun gyi chos nyid 'dri//snying po chos kyi don las 'byung //byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin//smad par bya ba'i rdzas lnga po//gcig la yon tan lnga lnga 'am//gcig la'ang yon tan gsum
305b6(rgyud): du dbye//dam tshig rtsa ba bco lnga yin//yan lag nyi shu rtsa brgya do//snod bcus dbus 'dus nas ni//bcu drug por yang bstan par bya'o//thabs dang shes rab ldan pa las//sems dpa' sems ma'i tshogasu blta'o//
305b7(rgyud): rtsa ba brgyad dang yan lag brgyad//rdzas ni sems dpa' bcu drug ste//snod dbyings sems ma bcu drug yon//'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu drug kyang //rang bzhin mi gnyis dbyings cig pas//phyag rgya thig le ldan par
306a1(rgyud): /bsgom//sum nu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan pa//dpe byung bzang po brgya cus brgyan//rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs//rgyu yang gsang la 'bras bu'ang gsang //rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la//mdzad/
306a2(rgyud): ldan dpal gyi phyag rgya dang //kha 'byed rdo rje phyag rgya ni//'khor lo rtsibs kyi dbus bzhag/bdud rtsi lnga dang rtsa ba brgyad//mig dang rna ba sna dang lce//mtshan deng rnam shes yul dang bcas//'dus la ma byas rdo rje ste/
306a3(rgyud): dgongs pa 'dus pas rdo rjer bshad//rdo rje sems dpar rab sbyar nas//rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur//oM AHhUM sarba ban tsa a mr-i ti badz+rA swa ta hUM zhes brjod de//bdud rtsi rnam lnga byin gyis brlabacing
306a4(rgyud): bsku'o//de nas yang rtsa ba brgyad dang yan lag stong du 'dus shing sbyar ba dang /bskul ba'i tshig 'di brjed do//de nas yang snod stong par dgun chang dang /sbrang chang dang /rgya chang dang /bu ram chang dang /'bras chang
306a5(rgyud): dang /chang sna tshogs sbreng zhing 'di skad brjod do//'bru rnams la yang chang med de//chu la chang gi rang bzhin med//mkhas pas 'bru dang tshur sbyar na//mnyam pa nyid kyi chang du 'gyur//chang byin gyis brlab
306a6(rgyud): pa'i sngags/oM a mri the dza gad pA ba swA hA/oM dzi ba swA hA/sman chad du blugs la//skyug pa'i sngags/mu sa la mu sa la/ro mchog 'phang thob por 'gyur//mi gtsang ba la 'ang gtsang ba med//man ngag can
306a7(rgyud): gyi brub pa pos//mkhas pas gnyis med sbyar bas na//mnyam pa nyid kyi don thob 'gyur//kro ti shwa ri sho ta ya sang shod ta ya/yang 'o ma sna tshogs sbreng zhing 'di skad brjod do//rta dang mi la sogs pa yi//ji
306b1(rgyud): lta ngo mar gyur pa las//mkhas ldan chen pos rab sbyar na//yon tan zho dang mar ltar snang //de bzhin rdzus rnams bsgyur bas na//mnyam nyid yon+tan mar ltar 'grub zhes brjod do//byang chub sems kyi gnad
306b2(rgyud): du skyeng ngo //de nas rin po che sna tshogs bdar zhing 'di skad brjod do//dper na gser dang rin chen ltar//gcig tu bsres de nga so sor gnas//so sor gnas kyang rang rang gi/kha dog mtshan nyi de so sor gsal//rin chen
306b3(rgyud): yaun+tan de 'dra yang //bsdus nas yon+tan rmad du 'gyur//de bas gnyis sgras mdzes par snang //de bzhin rdzas kyi yon tan yang //rang gi yan+tan rin chen snang /gnyis med mnyam par sbyar bas na/bla med yon+ta na rmad du 'gyur//
306b4(rgyud): thams cad gcig tu bsdu ba'o//de nas bdud rtso rA sa yAn sna tshogs bsdus te/snod stong par chu sna tshogs sbreng zhing /'di brjod do//chu rnams sna tshogs tha dad pa//rgya mtshar phyin no ldan tshur ro//de dag thams cad brdzu
306b5(rgyud): pa'i dpal//rgya mtsho tsam du rlabs che la//chos kyi dbyingasu ro gcigo//'byung ba lnga yi thugs rje las//sman dang bdud rtsi rnam lnga po//'gro ba yongs kyi gsos mdzad pa//thugs rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'o//dngos po med
306b6(rgyud): las dngos grub blang //byang chub sems kyi sprin yin pos//ji ltar dmi gos pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur//deska/ ces brjod de/smon lag tu blangs nas/ngos ngos nas sman che ba'i yon+tan brjod do//rang 'byung gdod nas
306b7(rgyud): dag pa yi//rtsa brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i smin//ra sa ya na la sogs rdzas//rtsa ba 'bum phrag yangs pa'i bcud//gnyis med bde chen las 'byung ba'i//byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste//sha chen mchod pa rin po che/
307a1(rgyud): zas mchog cha'i dri chen po//pad+ma me tog yang dag ldan//rdo rje chu ste bdud rtsi mchog/gzung shel gyi spos por bri//rin chen mo ltar 'bar ba'i tshogs//yon tan 'bum phrag yang pa'i bcu pa
307a2(rgyud): rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos//ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas//rgyud lnga sems can kun sgral ba'i//dug lnga sel ba'i thabs mchog ste//thams cad rnal 'byor bdud rtsi che//ma lus 'dus pa'i thib la
307a3(rgyud): ste/sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor phyir//gcig tu dpa' bo ro rnams dang //gnyisu med par mnyam sbyar nas//dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang //rgyal brgya mtsho rnams la mcho zhes brjod de/
307a4(rgyud): de nas shes rab yum rnams kyis//smon lag tu gzhag la yang /bkra shis pa don la dam pa 'di brjod do//ngo mchir rmad du byung ba'i chos//na mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas//rnam par mi rtog snang ba
307a5(rgyud): las//kun rdzob tsam du bstan pa mtshar zhes brjod do//sman snod bcud chas par lag tu blangs la//yum gyi gtso bo la bdud rtsi phul te/gtso bos blangs te phyag rgya chen po rab sgyur zhing bsgom mo//
307a6(rgyud): de nas bsgrub pa po'i gtso bos dpal cha su zhugs te/ba yang nyo ba ta dang /baM yang shang gir dang /na ri si ra dang /thal chen gyi thig les brgyan te/so tsha an dza na dang /dgug cing g.yab po 'di ma rdzas mchog
307a7(rgyud): gi ha s+ya dang /parta sha ril dang /shun chen gyi 'breng ba 'dre brdab pa'i lcag dang /rkang gi gling bu bud cing ku sha'i glu blang /mchog gi tshar ma dang /shun chen gyi g.yang bzhi bting la/gu gul gyi 'go ma yengs
307b1(rgyud): gis bskus la/rag ta'i thig le dgu byas ste/mtshon re re'i steng dutakrid brgyad gzhag go khye kra char ma'i g.yang gAzhi tags gyon la/mdung labang na phyar nas thogs te/dkyil 'khor yang 'khor lo rtsibs ba
307b2(rgyud): dbusu zla gam dmar po gcig bris nas/de'i steng du sman spungs la/bsgrub pa po yab yum yang sbyor nga tshul bzhin du bgyi/lha mo bcu drug gi bsnyen pa brgya rtsa brgyad yan chad gdon no//de nas byin dbab cing /
307b3(rgyud): dbab pa'i phyag rgya yang bya'o//g.yab mo'i bairda la sogs te/rda sna tshogs dang /thabs kyi rdo rje badz+ra sha ri ri ma~M la sogs pa dang /yang na mchog gi lag pa g.yon gyis/sman dgug cing g.yang cing /ma ba
307b4(rgyud): gzhong gi nang du bsreso te btsagasol/sman ban da'i nang du blugs la//rdo rjes dkrug cing gla dang gar drang rnga dang /dam pa'i tshig gis bston no//spos kyis bdug cing gar gyi bro thags dang /rdo rje 'gros kyi dkyil
307b5(rgyud): 'khor bu bdud dbu su bzhag la sbrer ro//de nas ngos nges nas kyang che ba re yon+tin brjod do//yang zhi ba'i lha'i dkyil 'khor yang rigs so so'i yig 'bru kun sman la gtim zhing 'di brjod do//oM a mr-i tA
307b6(rgyud): sarbam hUM la gi hUM/oM badz+ra sarba ma ya hUM/oM ma hA sarba a mra ta ma trA nu ka hi/oM sarba e shud de/k+Sho te shwa ri/sarba do da la/oM AHhUM badz+rA a mr-i ta hUM hrIwi zhes rab tu yang bzla'o//de nas te ma dang sbyin sgo
307b7(rgyud): dang /me'i phud kying nad du brug so//de nas sems sbyang ba'i sman/ling ling tra dang /shel ga bur dang /snying zhe sha dang /kha zho sha dang /sma ga re zhi sha dang /shu dag ku be ra dang /shu dag pra me dang /shu dag nob sa

308a5(rgyud): na mi seMn chen po la sa/dgas sdu gshegs 'arnam sa kyig se sus bzhi kyi bar byu kyi sems 'i rgyags sa
308b1(rgyud): mi rnams kun lalnga dpal kun tu bzang po'i bka' stsal pa/nan tan gyis ni brtson 'grus bskyed//chom myong na nges par 'grug /bdud rtsi chen po rnam lnga 'di//spyad cing bcar pa'i yon tan dang //rang bzhin dang nang ba
308b2(rgyud): dang //mthu dang byin gyis brlabs kyis 'brub//ma brjed rgyun gyi ting 'dzin//nges par bsgribs pa'i yon tan ni//nges po'i min ngag gsum du bstan//zhes bka' stsal nas/sdud pa po chos kyi don/'jam dpa'
308b3(rgyud): nan po la gtad do//de nas 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis/rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha 'khor tshogs rgya mtsho dang bcas pa rnams la 'di skad brjod do//e ma ho sangs rgyas kun tu bzang //gsang chen thig la
308b4(rgyud): nyid la rdzogs//ma rig mun sel ye shes sgron//dpa' bo khyod la skyabasu mchi'o//rang 'byung dri med bdud rtsi 'di//sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa'i mchog/mi shes dri ma kun bcom nas//nges pa'i dbyings
308b5(rgyud): la mgrod mdzad pa//gnyis med gus pas phyag 'tshalo//snang mdzad rdo rje rgyal can dang //mi bskyod nyi mi snang mtha' yas//don yod bdud rtsi 'khyil ba la//dgyes shing gus pas phyag 'tshalo//dbyings byug
308b6(rgyud): yum gyi chags rnams la//dga' ba'i yid kyis 'dud phyug 'tshal//lag ni rdo rje rgyal po dang //kun bzang blo gos chen po dang //don rab sa snying la sogs la//rab tu gus pas phyag 'tsha'o//namakha'i 'jig
308b7(rgyud): rten dbang po dang //'gro ba 'dzin mchog dam pa la//gnyis med dgus pas phyag 'tsha'o//dgal rang bzhin dri med sku//tshul bzhin phreng ba dbyangs dang ga ra//spyod mchog dga' sdug phyag 'tsha'o//dru
309a1(rgyud): bam ga ma sa //gzugs mchog mnyis mdzad sa mo la//ros ngos 'dud cid pa 'jog//dgas rnyed chags kyi bdu/ chog/ngaHspyan 'dul badza ga//d+hAN+Dal yang du
309a2(rgyud): 'khor bcas la//gus pas bstod de phyag 'tsha'o//de nas 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang bcas pa rnams kyis legs legs//ma la la to zhes brjod nas gnang //de nas dbang byin te/'phags btsud
309a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis/thams cad bdad ci'i rang bzhin la/mkhyen rabs dang spos kyi mchod pa chen po mdzad//de yang nyid kyis nyid la mcho dang/'od man chad ye shes kyi
309a4(rgyud): lce rnams kyis ti nge 'dzin byang chub kyi sems bdud rje chen por thim nas/mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings la mi snang bar byas nas/ma hA su ka la sbas te bzhugs pa las de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa la kun
309a5(rgyud): tu ba nga dang /rigs lnga 'dro bar gshegs pa rnams kyis 'phags pa 'jam dang la la bka' stsol pa byang chub sems dpa' mkhyen rabs kyi dang po khyod la daded kyi chos 'di bsdus te bshad do/
309a6(rgyud): dI la na rgyas 'dra lta ste e ma togasang ba las byung ba'i//ma rig mun sel snyen pa'i mchog dpa' bo khyod la skyebasu mdzu'o//nan tan gyis ni brtson 'grus byas//zhes pa dang /'jam dpal 'dud kyi
309a7(rgyud): 'di'i chos kyi don ni/dper na me dang 'dra ste/chu ste rdul tsam nas kyi ste srid pa'i ri ba yang sreg go//de bzhin du 'dud ci 'di ni dper na nyi ma dang 'dra ste/nyi ma'i 'od zer chen po ni 'dzam pa gling du zag me nyi nga
309b1(rgyud): rgyal po chen po brgyad la snang bar byed do//de'i 'og tu khor khor yug tu snang bar byed do//de'i 'og tu bo che rnams la spyad bar byed do//de'i 'og tu ridagu po rnams la snang bar byed do//de'i 'og tu gangs
309b2(rgyud): mthong po rnams la snang bar byed do//de'i 'og tu 'jam bu gling 'dings phyo gas dam ba rnams la snang bar byed de/nyi ma'i 'od zer tshon 'de la/blang dor med dom rton mi sem so//rnam par yang mi rtapra mi sem+b+ha/
309b3(rgyud): so//rdo rje chos dang 'jam dpal nyi ma'i 'od rnams ni/dbro bskol med do//de bzhin du sems can gyi rnam par shes pa la yang de dang dra ste dbri bskol med do//phye ba dang bskyed pa dang /bskyangs pa yang med do//de//
309b4(rgyud): bzhin du chos bdud ni 'di yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyingasu bstan pa yin pa'i phyir/bdud rtsi chen po 'di dbu las bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan zhes smos pa yino//de bzhin du chos bdud rtsi chen
309b5(rgyud): po'i lung 'di yang maM skyes mi 'gag mi rtog pas//mtshan mo dang mtshan ma med pa dang /mi gnas pa la rnam par khyab ste gan so//de bzhin du chos bdud rtsi chen po 'di yang nyi ma'i 'od zer deng 'dra ba
309b6(rgyud): kun la khyab par gnas te/skal lhun rigs lngas 'byung ba lnga la khyab cing //'byung ba lha nyid rigs kyi yum lnga'i tshal chen po ste/yum lnga dang yab lnga yang gdong nas dag ste/nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du sha
309b7(rgyud): donas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams le bo shad do//de nis bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams la bya'o//de nas srid pa'i 'jig rten du mi mjed kyi bdage pa
310a1(rgyud): /tshangs pa'i lha rnams dang k+Sha rnams la khyab bo//de nas mo'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang rim pas na mkha'i nyi ma bzhin khyab cing shar ba ste//thugs rje'i bdud N+DI 'di yang srid pa gsum
310a2(rgyud): du nyi ma bzhin du shar bar bya ste/'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing phra rab snyed la/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus phul bas ni/bdud rtsi chen po 'di
310a3(rgyud): lus la bcangs pa bsod nams che'o//'jam dpal dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyang ba bas ni//bdud rtsi 'di lus kyi 'gul du btags pa 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do//'jam dpal bskal
310a4(rgyud): pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams la spyi bos bkur zhing phyag bya ba'i don ni/bdud rtsi chen po 'di spyi bo la bkur ba'i yon tan ni/sangs rgyas thams cad bkur ba yin//'jam dpal bskal pa
310a5(rgyud): stong gi bar du sems can gyi don bya ba bas ni/bdud rtsi chen po 'dis lan cig gis 'gro ba'i don byas pas dmyal khams brgyad kyi 'jig rten yang thar pa'i lam du 'dren pa yi no zhes gsungs pa dang /de
310a6(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/bdud rtsi chen po'i rang bzhin ni//kha dog dbyibs dang mtshan ma med//'gog pa med cing dbye ba'ang med//rgyu ba med cing rten pa'ang med/bdud
310a7(rgyud): che la brjod pa'ang med//nyon mongs dug dang bdud ba ni bcom//dri med dag pa'i byang chub sems//nges don de la sdud par byos//de nas bcom ldan 'das dang dam pa'i chos bdud rtsi'i lung 'di la 'phags
310b1(rgyud): pa'ajam dpal gyis sbyor sa lan gsum du bstod gan mdza' mtshan nyid sangs rgyas te//mtshan nyid med pas na mkha' 'a'o//bya ba med pas grong ba ste//bdud rtsi mchog la phyag 'ama'o//chu zla bzhin du
310b2(rgyud): bral bas//thams cad rtog pa yongasu springs//dag tu 'dzin med rnam par dag bad ci rgyal la phyag 'tsho'o//dus gsum chos kyi dbyings drang mnyam//bdud dang dran song gsum los thA ra//len po med cingag
310b3(rgyud): ba'ang med//dri med dag pa'i byang chub sems//bdud rtsi mchog la phyag 'tshalo//dus gsum sangs rgyas skyid pa'i rgyu//khams gsum sems can 'dren pa'i dpal//'gro ba drug gi sgrib sbyong ba//bdud
310b4(rgyud): rgyal la phyag 'tsha'o//de skad ces gsol nas/phyi nang gi snod dril smon ras ya dang /bdud rtsir gnas zhes lung dang mun ngag du bsdus te bka' stsal pa'o//bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung //lung gi rgyal po
310b5(rgyud): chen po rtog pa'i mchog las/'khor lo bskor ba'i nang nas/lung gi bam po chen po brgyad pa'i 'grel pa chen po'i don/bam po chen po brgyad pa rdzogaso////spyir bdud rtsi 'bum sde las nyung shas
310b6(rgyud): tsam cig/bi ma la mi tras bshad cing /lots+tsha ba dz+nyA na ku mA ras bsgyur ba'o//rdo rje yang dbang gter gyi lags/rdzog so//rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod//mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba'i ngang //na mkha'i dkyi

312a2(rgyud): dang bar dgacod pa rnams//khro bo chen po'i byin brlabs kyis//yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas//mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral pa dang //lus drug rdul du bshig nas kyang //sdug bsngal nyams

312a7(rgyud): pi nya ka'i nyan tshigs//khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bag/sngan chad ji bzhin dam bcas pa'o//mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod//ha na ha na badz+ra da ha da ha badz+re/pa tsa pa tsa badz+ra/ma tha me za badz+ra/dzA ma
312b1(rgyud): dAsh+tsa/ m+b+ha sh+tsaH/sur+b+bas+sa du rmA//ka g+ha te yA/rdul yi stan du 5/mar sa na pra ma na yat+pa mad rtogasang pa'i bka' ltas no//sdig can gang zhig 'ang byed pa//stobs chen
312b2(rgyud): khro blo chen po yos//skad pa tshol sde brgya ru khos//nyon cig bge byas dang log 'dren tshogs//nga yi bka' las 'di ma byed//hU~M ma ma pA shi ku ru/ma tha ma/ny+tsa ka pa oM na na da staM/ma makam/
312b3(rgyud): shre ke ka ra ya/gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa yi//lha'am 'on te bdud kyang rung //nga la bar chad byed pa rnams//mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par byas//sarba a na ya d+hu Ta/tad Tha ya tadaH
312b4(rgyud): hUM waM/brdungs shig rdo rje 'ber ba'i gdun//bka' las 'da' byed sdig can rnams//rdo rje me dpal snying sregs nas//suMs ngag rdul phran bzhin du lhags//khro mo 'aper ba'i gtun khung du/
312b5(rgyud): de rje thobs brdungs byas nas//sta yang ru m+b+hi ba sgral bar bya//la tho ma kha tham//ba tha ma/hUM hUM hUM/phaT phaT phaT/badz+ra yak+Sha kr-i ta kha hi/khe ti/ShA hi/khi hrI/hi he hi/hA ha ha/hUM hUM hUM/phaT phaT paT/
312b6(rgyud): chos nyid kyi bden pa'o//gsang sngags kyi byin gyi rlab so//sangs rgyas kyi mthul//a bi tsits+tshi dris la khyab pa'i brnag pa kho na la'o// oM ka la ya nyi shun gcig bzlas/ba co brgyad/d+ha/
312b7(rgyud): nag go 'tshams su'o//hU~Mts+tsha/barbe phregu tsom bzlas//thogs so///rgya ga skad du//bi ni mas+t+rai dza~M badz+wal tan rjetshod skad du/mkha' 'gro mo lci bar bya rgyu ni//glid gsur 'jigs
313a1(rgyud): /byed drag po rdo rje'i sku//bdug dang gzhan gyi dpal gyur snying rje can//bdud las rnam rgyal ye shes lnga dang ldan//phyag na rdo rje che la phyag 'tshal bstod//'di skad bdag gis bas
313a2(rgyud): pa dus gcig ni/ri rab ra'i rtse mig shin rje 'bar ba'i pho brang //gnod sbyin ut+pal yi gedong gnas pa'i dur khrod/srin po ma thing ka ru tra ka'i 'chags/bdud gtsug pud nag po'i khang pa bcu
313a3(rgyud): 'gyur gyi tshal chen po/lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa'i gnas/'byung po dge ba kha T+wAM kha'i shing nag po te sha ka skye sa/srin mo kang ka la zangs kyi gshog pa me ltar 'bar ba'i zhing
313a4(rgyud): khams mi ro sar snying mang po yod pa/na mkha' las tri shu la dang /'khor lo dang lce 'bab pa/sa gzhi las ral gro dang /spu gri dang mdung rtse lnga pa skyes pa/ri bo thams cad keng rus snang
313a5(rgyud): ba/chu klung thams cad rnag khrag tu 'bab pa/sa phyogs thams cad ni me ro ut+pa la sngon po yi dri mnam pa/nye 'khor na/rngam pa dang /du ba'i ngo raro rab tu 'jigs pa drag ste/shin tu 'jigs pa
