319a1(rgyud): 'di'i sku ni gzhan na dkon//lha'i longs spyod mdzad pas mi brel yang //zhabs kyi cha su lcags sgrogs 'di 'bul zhes//ci mdzad ci sdug ci yang gsung bstan//khams gsum dag
319a2(rgyud): na khyod 'dra shin tu dkon//sa ni kun gyis lta bas mi ngoms khyod//bdag gis dbul 'di bzhes par gnang bar mdzod//ces phul ba la/lha mos lcags sgrog blang so//de nas rang gi rkang pa g.yas pa//
319a3(rgyud): la dkris te rgyan byaso//de nas khol mo des//jo mo dung skyong ma la zhus pa/kye jo mo bde mchog dung skyong ma/bdag zhu ba gcig mchis na gnang ngam byas pa la/ji mo na re khyod glo ba nye bas ci zhus pa gnod zer//
319a4(rgyud): de nas lho ni ngag bden pa'i sdom pa yod pas/ji skad smos pa ltar byed pa yi no//de nas khol mos gsol pa/kye bdag gi yum gyi rjer gyur dung skyong ma/khyod 'dra 'jig rten gzhan na med//'grogs pas
319a5(rgyud): zla med skor ma gcig shar 'dra//deng 'dir mchis pas lcag sgrog 'bul mkhan de//gtan gyi grogs zlar mdzad par zhu ba 'bul//bdag kyang rtag tu khyod kyi bran mo byed//zhes zhus pa la/lha mo des sngar
319a6(rgyud): khas blangs pa des mi bya ba'i dbang med nas/lha mo na re khyor bye'i mi de gang na 'dug/su yin byas pa la/khol mos smras pa/de ni bdag gi zhang po srin po da sha gr-I ba yin/yul lam kha bu rangs ni
319a7(rgyud): 'dug ces smras pa dang /de nas dung skyong ma dbang med du srin po'i chung mar song //de nas lha mau u mas bu mo dung skyong ma la dmod pa bor ba/di'i bu mo rab tu gcis par byas te/lha'i longs spyod
319b1(rgyud): mdzes pas mi brol yang //ngal ga sangs la srin po'i chung mar song //phyin chad bu mo khyod kyang srin dang 'grogs//mi sha za yi mi lpags gyon par gyur//srog gcod byed cing mi yi thod khrag thogs//bong du zhon
319b2(rgyud): la lha yi kha dog nyams//srin gyi kha dog nag la 'jigs par shog/de yi khol mo re ma ti khyod kyang //nga yi bu mo bslus te srin la byin//khyod kyang mi sdug 'jigs pa'i gdong du gyur//tshe rabs kun tu khyo dang
319b3(rgyud): prad cig/ces dmod pa bcu gnyis pa bor ro//de nas bu mo la ma'i dmod pa sdig nas//lha'i kha dog dkar po nyams te//mtheng nag tu gyur/mi sha za mi khrag 'thung /mi lpags gyon/bong bu zhan/gcer bud
319b4(rgyud): bung nas 'dugo/bu ni srin po phru gu seng+ge zla dang /me togacod pan dang /gangs can dang /mche ba bdun pa la sogs pa lnga brgya skyes tsam na/khyo srin po da shwa gr-I ba shi'o//de nas bu mo dung skyong ma yang yugs sI/
319b5(rgyud): cha lugs byas te/skra mdun skya lan bu gcig la bla so//bran mo phur pa'i lha yang dmod pas sdig pas/srin gyi phag rdzi byed tsam na/phag rje dun bu srin bya bas mo la dbang med du tshogs pa smad //de nas
319b6(rgyud): phur pa lha yang na bu sbru mo//de nas dpon g.yogs gnyis kyis/srin po'i bong bu bskus pa zhen nas/da sha grI ba'i ral gri sdig pa can brkus pa g.yas na thogs/srin po'i nor bu rin po che brkus nas/
319b7(rgyud): ne'u la'i rgyal bur sbas nas/lag pa g.yon du thogs nas bros//phyi nas srin por dmag ges bsad kyis dogs nas/bong bu skyon nas kha phyir bstan te/phyi na srin po byar byed cing phyin tha mar du dur
320a1(rgyud): khrod gcig tu phyin na/skyes pa g.yul du bsad pa'i ro gcig dang phra do//de nas khong gnyis sha de bsregs nas za 'dod pa la/gnub shing phyid nas/rgya mtsho'i 'gram na rdo sol gyi ril
320a2(rgyud): char bab nas me 'bar ba mthong nas/rdo sol me blangs nas sha bsregs nas zoso//phyin khyi dkar po gcig 'brangs pa yang bsad nas zoso//pags pa la rgyal mtshon byaso//de nas khal mo re ma til/
320a3(rgyud): nal phrug skyeso//khong gnyis kyis nal phrug gi sha yang zos//de nas jo mo bong bu la zhon khol mos kha khrid byas nas rgya mtsho'i khar phyin nas/gshin rje rlung gi 'khor lo can zhag bdun bsgoms pas
320a4(rgyud): rlung nag chu bo ma nag po gcig drung der grub//de nas lha mo dpon g.yog gnyis kyis/snang srid kyi lha 'dre mthu bo che bos nas/smon la mi btab pa/nga yang tshe 'di 'phos ma thag tu gsang sngags kyi grub pa thos
320a5(rgyud): nas rgyal ba'i zhal mthong ste/'dod pa'i khams kyi dang du phyug mar shog shig/nga'i bram ze phu re pA'i lha 'di yang dus thaMd tu nga'i 'bangs ka ma lar shog shig/nor du mi mgo la longs spyod par shog shig/
320a6(rgyud): nyan pa bong bu la byed la lag cha ral gri la byed par shig shig ces smraso//brgya mtsho skor zhing rlung tshub ma la ba yu be ba yu be zhes bos tsam na/chub ma byung bas dpon g.yog gnyis ka rgya mtsho'i nang
320a7(rgyud): du bsgyur te btang //de nas lha mo dung skyong ma de mi sha zos pa'i mthu dang /rang gi smon lam gyi dbang gos/rgya mtsho'i 'gram du dur khrod chen po ro'i tshal zhes bya bar/gshin rje'i lha mthu can gyi bu mor
320b1(rgyud): skyes te/gnod sbyin ma chen mo la kha dog mthing nag la rab tu 'jigs pa na/mig rtsa dmar ba mche bzang yug la ral pa ting za bad du 'dug pa cig tu gyur te/gshin rje ma du rtse dang sbyor ba byas pa la bu bdud
320b2(rgyud): khrom nag po bya bo byung /bong bu yang dmar gA la g.yu'i rna ba can rlung gi gshog pa can mig 'jug ma la yod pa cig tu byung nas nor skal byed//de nas khol mo re ma ti ro langs ma 'di ni skye ba gang blangs zhe na/rgya
320b3(rgyud): mtsho'i nang du bud med lus po phyed skams le chu sen gyi mgo can gcig tu skyes te/ming yang klu mo gzhogs skams chu srin mgo klu mo ro ma ta zhes bya bar gtags nas/zhag dgu btsun tshe 'phos nas/skye ba
320b4(rgyud): blangs pa ni yul dri za'i grong khyer gser sdings mos tshal zhes bya ba na/dug shing nag po 'gyur med kyi rtsub na bdud ri ti 'gang nyag dang /dran pa dbang byed gnyis bye byas pa la/zhag drug cu rtsa gcig na bu mo gcig
320b5(rgyud): skyes te/phas ni sred pa gsum gyi blo 'phrog mar btags/mas ming btags pa ni ya mtshan 'phrul gyi gshog pa can du btags/bdud pha ma gnyis kyis rang gi bu mo la/sgra nyag ral gser dang /bai DUr+ya'i chu na
320b6(rgyud): 'phyang dang /rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang /nyi zla'i thod rjed dang /thod pa'i mgur chu dang /sbrul gyi gdu bus rgyan te/byi byas pa'i nal phrug yin pas/bdud kyis rin po che sna lnga'i khang pa'i dbus su thod pa'i gzhal
320b7(rgyud): las khang byas/thod pa'i nang du yang thod 'phrul gyi lding khang grug de'i nang du khang pa bdun rtsegs kyi bdun chags kyi nang du/mi ro 'bum gyi khri steng su bu mo de sus mi mthong sus kyang ma tshor bar sbas te/
321a1(rgyud): /sa spyan mak+Sha rgyum stonas ba s+ho//du khyon mag ma dang /sgra da rgyum mo dang /sa bdag go// ma dang /nas kyis khang sa do dus shi 'a/
321a2(rgyud): byin nyon cig/de che na lha mo dung skyong ma ni/sngon gyi khol mo re ma ti ro langs ma bdud kyi bu mor skyes pa bkug nas//khol 'dod pa las/phyag na rdo rje nga'i gsang sngags bye ba phrag bcwo brgyad bzlas pas//
321a3(rgyud): gsang sngags de'i byin gyi rlab laso//mkha'agro'i ting 'dzin grub pa mo//lag na pad+ma he ru ka thogs pa gcig rang byung bas/ma bdud kyi yul dang pho brang kun byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshe na/bdud kyi rgyal
321a4(rgyud): mo dang /blon po dang /'khor rnams dran pa med par myos par gyur to//bdud kyi bu mo re ma tI des sngon gyi jo mo lha mo dung skyong ma dran pas/yid phyogs te dung skyod ma'i spyan sngar 'gro 'dod pa'i bsam pa
321a5(rgyud): drag pa byung nas/bdud ri sti 'gong nyig gi mtshon bdud kyi khram pa ma nag pa des/bu mo re ma tis brkus nas/lag pa g.yo su thogs/ma'i mtshon gyis gri gu sngon dmar de brkus nas lag pa g.yon na
321a6(rgyud): thogs nas/nam par phyed tshur phyed na dza mo dung skyong ma'i gan du bros te byin nas/lus gcer bur 'dug pa la/khyim bdag rab sbyin gsal gyi brdzi mo dmaras rigs mo bya ta mu zhes bya ba de re lde nag po gyon
321a7(rgyud): nas 'dug pa dang phrad/mos dmangs rigs mo bsod nas sha zos/pags po rked la dkris/de'i gos re lde pa shus nas bdud mo nyid gyon nas phyin tsam na/la mkhar srin mo bum rna shi ba'i gsur khrag/nad kyi
321b1(rgyud): bu gcig yod pa'i khar phyin pa las/bdud mor ma tis skom nas thog cig 'thungs tsam na//kha rlas las na du song bas/mo'i kha rlangs gar phog pas rims nang byu //der mo rang yang ngo tshe skyes nas/sngar gyi dmangs rigs mo/
321b2(rgyud): bsad pa'i rlung bu rked las bkrol te/nang nad kyi rdzing dbus bkang nas/kha sbrul gyis bcings te/mtshan khung du sbas nas/seMn la gdug par bya bar bsams te/phyin tsa min bcan skya rdo rje zla bo dang phrad pa na re mdud mo chen mo
321b3(rgyud): chags pa spyad dgos/rngan pa yang sbyin zer nas/mo bzung nas chags pa spyad pa'i khu ba thigs pa gcig 'dzam+bu'i gling du bo ba ni dzod ji dkar por song /der btson skya rdo rje zla ba'i lag na shod rde'u dkar nag gang la bor ba phung
321b4(rgyud): bar byed pa bdun yod pa la/mo la byi rngan du byin pa de blangs te/lag pa g.yon du bzung nas/grong khyer brang ldan zhes bye bar phyin tsam na/rgyal po seng+ge rtsal la bsod snyoms byas te/sbrang rtsi lhung bzed gang phul nas/sbrang rtsi
321b5(rgyud): lag tu len kar phyag tshang bas tu bo byas nas mo la byin/mos blangs tsam na/bar snang gi lha rnams kyis bdud mo/rgyal po'i khol po'i lhag ma dang kha 'phro 'thung ngam/tsha ba nyam so zhes zer tsa mo na/bdud mo ra ma ti khros pas yid
321b6(rgyud): 'khrugs te/rgyal rigs la der rims nad btangango //der rgyal po'i dkor zangs kyi dra ba dgu phul nas rims bcang //de nas nag mo ro ma ti des/rgya mtsho'i 'gram du dur khrod chen po ro'i tshil du sngon gyi jo mo dung skyong ma'i spyan
321b7(rgyud): sngar byin to//de nas dpon g.yog gnyis 'grogs nas/srid pa gsum gyis na zad cing stongs par byed pa'i dus de tsam ra/jo mo dung skyong ma'o zhon pa srin gyi bde bu dmar gA dang /srin mo rnal dun rtse'i rgod ma zangs kyi
322a1(rgyud): byas rgyags paspyad pa las sa can ma ga shog pa can gcog zung bapo rgyu 'o byu ras rkyen ltang nas lta mdung skyong mal la ma ngam tal nan par byen /dung ngaman pang 'dus/
322a2(rgyud): sbrul go//khol mos drin sngon mo la zhon/rje mos ma lpags gon/dzad pa dang ma gri lag na thogs khal mos re lda nag po rtson/lagan khram pam dang /shod rje'u phyogs/de nas shin tu mthu tshul che ste/skye ba rnam pana'i
322a3(rgyud): sen+de mazang cing stos pa ci ma du sa//'jig rten gyi mang grom dkar mo'i tshogs dang /sngon mo dang dmar mo ge/ser mo'i tshogs dang /lha mo dang /bdud mo dang /srin mo dang /bsam gyis mi khyab po mang po yang /
322a4(rgyud): lhamo rje khol gyis 'bangs pa gyi zer zhing bran du 'ong so//brgya byin nyon cig dus de tsam na lha mo dpon g.yog gnyis bud med kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa nyid kyis rtag par 'dod pa'i 'khrid pa spyad pa'i che du//khyo dgu dang
322a5(rgyud): sbyor ba byed//jo ma la khyo lnga khol mo la khyi bani yod de/rdo rdo'i m+b+ha mi/gza'ar d+hal/sbyin po sgra ldan/ga shon d+ha ma rU \u0f7f/bdud char gnig ga k+Sha kun dA la dang //rol ma khyi bzhin 'byung po dge bo dang /
322a6(rgyud): bin ya ko dang /gnod sbyin yig sha ka pa l-I dang /rlung ba yu be dang bzhi'o//de ltar dpon g.yog gnyis kyi khyung bu ni/nyin par ni mtshan/dung g.yoni du bsrungs shing sred la/mtshan mo dur khrid du bsru
322a7(rgyud): sbyang ba byod/brgya byin nyin cig de nas lha'i bu mo'i sngon gyilas 'dres 'drel zhing dge baspyang pa'i shugs kyis bya chub kyi shing dru na/bcom ldan 'dis bdud pa pa'i sman sngar phyin nos/lha ma de'i bya chub
322b1(rgyud): mchog tu sems bskyed/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/rang gi snying po 'di ru'o//tad+ya thA/oM du bi ti ste ba dos/du ru ro ru bis+t+rI sta ba dag/tsa pa la a shug mod+hu b+h+yaH/zhes du'o//bal mos rang
322b2(rgyud): porul ba tad+ya thA/ma ru ru bai ro ru d+hIHs+yA to si/rAg mo tsi to kha rag mdun g+ho/ma ma trag rag sha kha mun tre batra dag shi tsi ta kha rag mdu n+d+ra g+h+r-i ru lus ma ya pra ma mahA ste pra b+h+yo zhes bu'o//de nas byang chub mchog tu/
322b3(rgyud): sems bskyed nas//lhamo dpon g.yog gnyis kyis A su ra'i brag phug du phyin pa las/bram ze mchag sred bsgrub pa dang //lha mas khyod 'don ci byed byas pa las/bram ze mchog sred kyis smos pa/sngon kham
322b4(rgyud): 'di nyid na/dge slong brtan pa'i sde dang /dge slong ma ngar ri sngo gnyis khrims nyams te/rgyal po'i chang pas bsado//de skye ba 'phos pa ni/bdud ying 'gre'u dang /ro sha kha 'dir gnyi su gyur ti yul mi ci yod zad par
322b5(rgyud): /zos nas/de nas nga la za res bab pas/nga ni bdud 'dul ba'i phyir yum e ka tse ti ral gcig ma bsgru bo zhes zer//dung skyong ma na re 'o na nged dpon g.yog kyang bsgrub par bya na/ston de lta bu yod dam byas na/bram ze
322b6(rgyud): na re khyed gnyis dngos grub ci 'dod pa yin/lha min ri nged ginyis 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang mtshar gyur nas/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'i grub pa 'dod byis pa la 'on grub par bya'o zhes zer nos/bram ze dang /
322b7(rgyud): lha mo dpon g.yogs bsgrub pa byas pas yum e ka tsa ti zhal mthong nas grub pa thog//yum e ka tsi tis/lha mo dung skyong ma'i ming ni/pal lha mo nag mo ma hA ka li zhes btag so//khol mo'i ming ni yag sha ra ma ti we
323a1(rgyud): / ba tus sa rdul ba ma da stsu /ma /AH rgyas byung zhing bstan pa sgrung ba pangs smras//nga ga stong da la// /d-i
323a2(rgyud): bo tista ba do si/tsaM ba la a shug me b+h+yo dza/re ma tis kyang /oM ru ru ro ru ba ti sta ba des/rag mo tsi ti kha rag ma hU~M b+h+yo/ma ma drag rag shaM kha mun tra ba tra trag rag shaM tsita kha rag mar ma ti sa ma ya phra ma ya phram
323a3(rgyud): mahA ti pra du na b+h+yo/dza dza ru lu b+h+yAM zhes phu'o//bdud laM nga 'ge'u ri dang ro sha kho d+hA ra bsgra'o//de nas sa'i lha mo brten mas kyang nam gru mched brgyad kyang 'bang su phul//srin yul du dmag drangs pas/srin po
323a4(rgyud): yag shaM ka ra bsgra'o//brgya byin nyon cig/de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyis/dpal rta mgrin du sprul ba'i bsgrub pa byas te/rta mgrin zhal mthong zhing gsang ba'i gzungs ma byas te/rje mo'i ming
323a5(rgyud): dpal lha mo nag mor btag sa//khol mo'i ming ni rdo rje glog mo srin du ming btag so//des phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskuro//las kyi lhararo byin gyis brlab so//de'i tshe na dpal lha mo nag mos dpal rta mgrin
323a6(rgyud): la snying po mdang sol du phu'o//bstan pa bsrung bar khas blang po//de nas sngon gyi u ma de ba dang rnal rtse gnyis kya /sngon gyi bu mo gnyis la sprin lag rtsal nu zho blugs pas bros nas/drad mo'i ral pos g.yang
323a7(rgyud): mos 'dod/bu mo gnyis mi'i drung du phyin ci man/dbang bskur zhing dam bsgrags/bstan pa bsrung bar dbang byin to//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos kyang /rang gi rtse dang khrag dang khu bo'i mchod pa byas nas/
323b1(rgyud): lha dang mi'i rgyal srid phul nas/rmya bya rin po che'i gshog pa can spyi bon nor bu rin po che yod pa/jo mo la nor bsgral du byino//bya de mo nag mo spyi bo nu nor bu rin po che yod pa cig/khol mo la nor skal du byin nas/lha mo
323b2(rgyud): rdza khol gnyis/'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal pos byin pa'i rma bya dang /do mo nag mo gnyis gtan gyi nor skal byed cing chags/de nas dpal lha mi ni gsang ba'i gnas dur khrod ro khang nag po'i dbus ma ru tso'i sgra 'gram/
323b3(rgyud): dud dpal phyag na rdo rje'i ha ru ki'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i tshe/dpal phyag na rdo rje'i dngos grub grub ste/dpal phyag na rdo rjes lhamo dpon g.yog la spyi bo gtsug tu dpal rta mgrin gsang ba'i dbang bskur/lus ngag yod/
323b4(rgyud): gsum la khrag 'thung to ruk+ta'i dbang bskur/thugs kyi dpal be'u rigs lnga sangs rgyas kyi dbang bsgyur/sku snod kyi rgyun du 'phra men ma ban+d+ha drug gi dbang bskur/ljags kyi dkar dmar la lcags kyu gsang
323b5(rgyud): ba'i dbang bsku ro//gnad mad chen drug tu tshom bu gsang ba'i dbang bskuro//gsang po pad+ma la thig le ye shes shar ba'i dbade bskur//rdo rje pho nya mo drug cu rtsa zin 'khor du dbang bskur/pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug
323b6(rgyud): ni sprul pa dang yang sbrul du dbang bskur/de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos//de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes jo mo'i ming ni dpal ma hA ka li zhes btag so//khol mo'i ming ni gnod sbyin
323b7(rgyud): shishan pi nag mo ram ti zhes btag so//sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung bar gnyer gtad de//de nas dpal phyag ni rdo rje nyid la/dpal lha mos rang gi snying po phul te/sangs rgyas kyi bstan padus rtag tu bsrungs par
324a1(rgyud): /khas blang so//de nas dpal lha mo mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur to//'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug mar gyur pa'itshe/lha tshangs pas nyi ma'i rgyan du la//khyarab 'jug gi/
324a2(rgyud): zla 'i rgyun da//rnam thos sras kyis sang+g+ha rnaMmadu /ne mi pa'i lta bran rnams kyis drim bu'i rgyun rdul/srin po dang sha za rnams kyis tha~Md phred dang ga dang dag gi thig la du'o//klu dga'abros spya gyi/
324a3(rgyud): gdengs ka dul/lha mo de srid pa gsum na 'gran po zla med par gyur to//de nas brgya byin gyis gsol pa/kye bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag de/'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma 'di//dadzan
324a4(rgyud): lha'i bu mor gyur pa dang /bar du srin po'i chung mar gyur pa dang /da ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug mar gyur pa 'di/sngon gyi rkyen ci las grub lags zhes gsol pa dang /gsang ba'i bdag pos/
324a5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/brgya byin nyon cig/da ltar lha mo nag mo 'di sngon sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi bstan pa la/lha mo 'od zer can du gyur te/dge ba bcu sha stags //de nas sangs rgyas gsar
324a6(rgyud): thub kyi bstan pa la//lha ma dpal bstan ma zhes bya bar gyur te/zhe sdang kha mar spyad//de nas sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la/lha mo man drugs bya bar gyur te/dus de tsam nu shAkya thub pa ni/
324a7(rgyud): dge slong dbang phyug dpa' bo zhes bya bar grags//dge slong de la lha mo man 'jus mchod gnas byas shing /smin lam gcig tu bta'o//brgya byin nyon cig/dang ldan ni lha mo 'di la sangs rgyas
324b1(rgyud): gsum gyi ring gi rnam par smyon pa zab pa'i bstan pa la dus gcigatu sde// mo 'dri dang por man de ba'i bumar skyes pa me dang por dge bslong pa'i mthu'o//khar du smin pa'i chung mar gyur nas rang slob pan nas
324b2(rgyud): spyad pa'o/tha mar de ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi darda phyug par gyur pa ni sangs rgyas tha~Md kyis dbang bsgyur nas/shAkya ts+tshab pa'i bstan pa srung ba ni/sngon shAkya thub pa la sdig bshegs byis kyi smon lam gdag
324b3(rgyud): ram ti sdigs kyi bsod nams las grub pa'o//ma pa gram me lte 'bar ma'i rgyud las gleng gzhi le'u sti dang po'o///ngan mi lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/gsang ba'i bdag po dang mi phyag na rdo rje la nga
324b4(rgyud): skad ces gsol to//kye bcom ldan mgoni po gsang ba'i bdag/ma 'das phyi ma'i son rnams//myal dgron la 'byor rab bsgrub pa'i//slong dponi slob ma'i mtshon ma'i rgyud//gang yin bdag gis nyan par 'irnam/
324b5(rgyud): zhes nus pa'i tshe//gsang ba'i bdage pos bka' stsal pa/dpal ldan lha mo rdo rje mkha 'gro me//thun mong ma yin kun gyi byA ba mi nI//de yang slob dpon mtshan nyid bshad//slob dpon chos la rab 'dung pa//tshad med
324b6(rgyud): bzhir ldan stong rje can//phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang thob nasadam tshig sreg bzhin 'dzin byed cing //bden pa gnyis rtogs lta ba can//sngags dang phyag rgya mi spong zhing //
324b7(rgyud): rgyam gas/sa cin nga byung na gsus mung namachen nga skye la ba pa mi dang shes par rung cig/ du tong sung ga'adu 'dri sa ma
325a1(rgyud): 'dzin/lha dang slob dpon rtag tu bcang //gsang sngags 'dzin pa'i snod ldan la//slob mar bya ba nga yis bshad//dpal mkha' 'gro ma me lha 'bar ba'i rgyud las/slob dpon dang slob ma'i tshad
325a2(rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis//dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to//rdo rje se di'i dpa' bo che//dus mtha'i rnal 'byor bskyab kladu//rdo rje gsang ba'i
325a3(rgyud): mkha' gro ma'i//lta ba dam pa bdag nyan 'tshal//zhes zhus pa'i tshe/dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/bdag dang rdo rje mkha' gro ma'i//gdod nas ma skyes gzung 'dzin yul dang bra'o//nga dang bdag 'dzin mtshan
325a4(rgyud): ma'i rtog pa bcom//don dam kun rdzob skye ba med pa'i gzhi//gnyis med chos kyi dbyingasu dbyer med cing //stong nyid chos sku na mkha' yis lnga//sprul pa'i phyag rgya lha dang lha mo'i mtshan mar snang //mkha' la
325a5(rgyud): 'ja' 'dra rang bzhin ga la yod//snying rje'i dbang gis 'gro don byed pa na//mdor na sangs rgyas sprul pa yin pa ste//khol mo byang chub se de'i sprul pa'o//mtshan ma'i srin mo bdud mor blta mi bya//mkha 'gro ma me lce
325a6(rgyud): 'bar ba'i rgyud las/lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o////de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//gsang ba'i bdag po ye nas thugs rje can//rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i dngos grub
325a7(rgyud): bsgrub pa'i phyir/dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum gyi rgyud bshad 'tshal zhes zhus pa'i tshe/phyag ni rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/brgya byin la sogs 'khor rnams rab tu nyon//dkyil 'khor rnam gsum mtshan
325b1(rgyud): ma'i phyag rgya ni//rang bzhin dkyil 'khor byang shar ri rab rtse//ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor sems kyi yul//gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor gnas bzhi'i sa la bya//chen rtsi ma rus ldong ro snga rams dang skegs/
325b2(rgyud): mthing nag gru bzhi'i dbus ni e gru gsu so//dbusu gtso ba phyag na rdo rje ste//dri yi ga ye su lho mo nag mo ste//g.yon du ma mo'i ting 'dzin grub pa mo//gtso mo'i mdun du khol mo re ma ta//de'i phyir rims sprid pa
325b3(rgyud): ma mo dang //stag spyad bya rgod meng+ge khyung gis bskor//phyi rims thod phreng mi ri keng rus dri//tsaM ka li 'amo yig 'bru phyag mtshan bri//mkha 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las/dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste
325b4(rgyud): bzhi pa'o///de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis//dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to//kyi 'jigs byed tshe mchog 'gro kun 'dul ba'i gtso//rdo rje mkha' gro nag mo dam pa yin//dngos
325b5(rgyud): grub bsgrub pa'i rdzas rnams gang lags pa'o//gsong ba'i bdag po bdag la bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa dang /phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/rdo rje mkha' gro'i dngos grub 'dod pa'i mis//rdzas rnams med
325b6(rgyud): na dngos grub mi thob ste//rmongs pas snga bon gtsugs shing gcugs bstan 'dra//kun ka tshung na ngongs grub mtshan ma ster//mkha 'gro ma la rdzas ni rnam pa bdun//'bod pa'i rdzas dang ma mo bsten rjes dang //
325b7(rgyud): mchod pa'i rdzas dang dam tshig bsre ba'i rdzas//bskul ba'i rdzas dang mtshan mi dbab pa'i rdzas//tha mar gnad la 'bebs shing bzlog pa'i rdzas//bdun po 'di tshang grub pa'i mtshan ma'i byung //gtsog
326a1(rgyud): phyag na rnga rje'i drim rdzas na//gor can gan po byed pa'i rdzas//gtso zar rten ni seng ldeng mi rus phur//gsal balnga dang bdud rtsis gtso ba mchod//dam chag bcu yis rdo rjes ni mchod//
326a2(rgyud): gu gul nag po yungs dag til gyis bsku//spos dang lce pog mi tshil mtshan ma 'bebs//gtso bo gnad la 'bebs pa a mri ta//dang ldan lha mo bod rdzas ni//g.yab dar dang ni hasta mi tshil dang //cong zhun
326a3(rgyud): spos lngas bsregs la bang //lha mo'i rten ni bu mo gtsang ma dang //rgya mtshor shi ba'i bud med thod pa gnyis//mkhar du brtsigs pa dkyil 'khor dbu su kha sprad la//mi bsad mtshon gyi ral gi sor brgyad pa//yu
326a4(rgyud): ba ma bIs dkyil lakhar dbu su gzugs//rma bya sed g.yang bzhi ga zung nag pa'o//rjem lha mo nag mo'i dam rdzus ni//dge slong sha dang mi ro sem+b+hiSh+Ti snying //d+he nod sha dang dbang po rnam pa lA//ru tra nag po'i snying dang //
326a5(rgyud): bdud rtsi lnga//sman ma'i khrag dang sha khrag sna tshogs dang //phye ma lnga yis gtor bas gur gum partsi//pad+ma'i rag tas byugs la rgyun gtor bya//lha mo nag mo 'di dad dam tshig bsre ba'i trAs//ru ti rdo rje pad+ma
326a6(rgyud): mi de sngags//bskul rdzas mi yi tshil dang gu gul bskye//mtshan ma 'bebs pa bu mo gtsang ma'o//gnad la 'bebs shing bzlog pa yugs sa'i rkang ///khol mo re ma ti'i 'dod rjes ni//dreng mo'i
326a7(rgyud): ral pas g.yab cing srin lag bstan//ku gu la dang ni mtshal gsur gyis bod//ro me ti mo rten du lug nag gam//de mo nag mo dri mo yi thod pa'o//khol mo re ma ti'i mchod rdzas ni//bum pa gang bi'i khrag dang
326b1(rgyud): a mr-ita//nal bu'i sha dang mi sha chang ngu do//dam tshig bsre zhing rtag tu mchod pa'i rdzas//ru hing rje pad+ma dag gi shing //bskul rdzas gu gul nag dang lcong zi//mtshan ma 'bebs pa bu mo gtsang ma'o//gnad la
326b2(rgyud): shing bzlog rdzas dre'u yi rkang //'di rnams gcong zhing mnyems tshogs gyur na//rdo rje mkha'agro ma'i tshogs rnams ni//bus pas u dum 'bar ba mthong ba ltar//dga' ba skyes nas mi la dngos grub ster//
326b3(rgyud): bas nan tAn bskyed la brtson par bya//mkha' grom me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las dpon g.yogs gi dam rdzas bstan pa'i le'u sna lnga pa'o///de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi dang lo phyag na rdol 'dis ceso b+h+yo kyigasang bdag
326b4(rgyud): nardo dul ba'i gtso//bsgrub pa'i rten gyi rdo rje mkha' gro sku//thang ka bri ba'i nan tan 'bri bar 'tshal//zhes zhus pa'i che/gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/mkha'agro'i rten gyi sku gzugs ni//mis ma 'phrigs//
326b5(rgyud): par dur khrod 'gro//dang po phyag na rdo rje dang //lha po'i bsnyen pa 'bum 'bum bzlas//de la sbyin sreg gtor ma 'bul//ri mo mkhan la dbang bskuro//dam tshig rab tu sbyin par bya//de nas bud mod zhabs mi gang //
326b6(rgyud): ro dkris dag gi ras dgu ni//ro bsregs 'gal ba'i shing gis kyang //zlo ba'i mtshan rtsi rnam pa lnga//dpa' bo 'bru lha'i 'phro 'du las//rgyal ba rigs lngar byin brlabs la//dbus su phyag na rdo rje 'di//mdun
326b7(rgyud): dulha mo nag mo ni//bong zhon ral gri thogs par bri//g.yon du khol mo ra ma ti//dre'u la zhon khram bam thogs pa'o//g.yasu bram ze mchog sred ni//mgrin pa slar dkar la ring //khre stan stan la long phreng
327a1(rgyud): 'dzin//rma bya ne ru le thogs pa'o//de'i g.yon du bdag nyid ni//khri snyi'i stan la long drang 'dzin//rmya bya'i spu dang ne'u la thogs//de nas rang gi srin khrag gis//sku gzugs rnams kyi spyan phye la//
327a2(rgyud): mdun du gtor ma'i sbyin sreg 'bul//zhabs la btud phyag byas la//dngos grub gang 'dod gsol ba gdab//dkyil 'khor dbusu bzhugasu gsol//lha yi sku yi thugs khar ni//srin lag khrag gis zla/
327a3(rgyud): kham de//de yi dbus snying po bri//de'i dbus rgyus tshan sum sgrol gdags//rtse mo bdag bzung bzlas pa bya//yang na lugs me dag la bya//de ltar byas na dngos grub rgyu//ma ba 'gro mi me lce 'bar ba'i
327a4(rgyud): rgyud las/sgyu gzugs bstan po'i le'u skye drug pa'i///de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/gsang ba'i bdag po dang la phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to//kyai gsang mdzad
327a5(rgyud): drig bo hUM mdzad tshe//dpal ljin rdo rje mkha'i 'gro ma'i//ting 'dzin sgom thabs bdag la shod//ces gsol po dang /phyug na rdo rjes bka' stsal po/lha'i dbang po brgya byin nyon cig/skye ba med pa'i ngang
327a6(rgyud): las sprul pa'i cho 'phrul ni//hUM las rdo rje rtse ni lnga pa ste//de nas bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje yin//mdog lhung sto la khro bo'i cha byad//lus 'gying bag can/dbus sgra ral pa gyen la rjes pa lo//rigs lnga'i
327a7(rgyud): dbu rgyan can/phyag ni ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa bar ga lus la glang chen gyi ko ba de mchog gi g.yeng gzhi dang /stag gi sham thabs dang /thong pa'i phreng ba dang /sbrul gyi chun pos lus brgyan pa//
327b1(rgyud): dun na na na rdzun du nan na na na tu du chun du du chu ju na /
328a1(rgyud): ma ti hU~M zhes pa las/bdud kyi bu mo ra ma ti de nag mo ral ba kham pa la/me stag dang rin po che brgyan pa'o//mig dmar ba mche ba gtsigs pa/re lde nag po dang mi lpags
328a2(rgyud): gyon pa/lag na khram pom dang /shod rje'u thogs pa'i sbrul gyi gdangs ka dang /nyi zla'i thong rjengasaM dang /nad kyi kha rlangs can//stug gi sham bu dang /zangs kyi dra ba dang /mtshon gyi gru gu
328a3(rgyud): dang ldan pa rnams bskyed do//b+h+rUM b+hU b+h+yo b+h+yo zhes brjod pa las/'khor nag mo 'bum bskyed//dpal me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las/tinge 'dzin bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o////de nas lho'i dbang
328a4(rgyud): po brgya byin gyis/dpol phyag ni rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to//mnyam nyid rdo rje'i sku bsnyams gsang ba'i lha//mtshon ma 'joms pa'i dpa' bstan drag shul can/rdo rje mkha' 'gro me lce phreng ba'i/
328a5(rgyud): srog stong bsgrubs pa'i sngags rnams bshad par zhu zhes gsol pa dang /dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/sngags zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro'i srog rtse yi nAM/grangs kyang mngal zur yang ma chag
328a6(rgyud): ste/gug sbyong cha ga dag dge kyang me nor na//lha mo nig mo sngon du 'gugs pa yin//zhes bka' stsal pa dang /dpal phyag na rdo rje de/rdo rje lte bu'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/dngal phyag na rdo rjes
328a7(rgyud): rang gi snying po 'di thugs kho nas phyung //a badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA do Sha dza dz+haiM/gtso bo phyag na rdo rje'i bsnyen pa 'di//sngon du 'brom che bdun du bzlas pa byas la/gtor ma dang ni sbyin sreg gis mchod de/
328b1(rgyud): des ni phyag na rdo rje'i grub pa thob//lha mo bkug cing dbang du byed par nus//de nas sdod cig lha mo'i sngags la 'jug/sngags 'di ni dpon mo'i snying dang g.yog mo'i srog/mngon du 'gugs pa srog gi snying po'i sngags
328b2(rgyud): gtso bo'i sman 'dren g.yog mo 'gugs pa'i sngags//mi g.yo brtan pa rdo rje gdan gyi sngags//mnyes par bya phyir gtor ma 'bul ba'i sngags//ging du dbang bskur dam la gdags pa'i sngags//mnga' zhugs
328b3(rgyud): phan gnad las la bskul ba'i sngags//mi bye dpa' med gnad la 'bebs pa'i sngags//sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub blang ba'i sngags//zhabs la bdud pa'i slob ma dbang bskur sngags//lha dang bgegs kyi
328b4(rgyud): nyams len brtags pa'i sngags//brda' dang mchod pa rdo rje gsang ba'i sngag/bar chod mtshan ma ngan pa zlog pa'i sngags//bcu gnyis rdo rje'i gsang sngags bstan par bya//dpal lha mo nag mo'i srog
328b5(rgyud): snying la//oM ru ru be tit+te ba de si//ru ru ro ru be tiSh+Tha ba de si//tsa pI laM a shug me hUM b+h+r-i dza//kho la mo re ma ti'i srog snying laM//oM ru ru ro ru/hUM tiSh+Tha ba to sI/rag mo tsi ta/kha rag mad+h+ye b+h+yA
328b6(rgyud): mam trag rak+Sha/kha mun tra ba tra ba trag rak+Sha tsi ta kha rag ma/re ma ti sa ma ya/pra me mau hA sta pra dun b+h+yo ru lu ru lu b+h+yo dz+nyA dz+nyAM//de ni srog las 'dran po'i sngags yin te//sra ya bzlas na ma mo
328b7(rgyud): mngon du yod//bye ba bzlas na phyag rgya ston par byed//'bum phrag gis kyang dngos grub mtshon me gtor//bal modze snying po bzlas mthog nas 'ong //sa me ya du ling rak+Sha si//he rak+Sha/b+h+yo rak+Sha/
329a1(rgyud): Uny+dzA/ma so//sa / m+b+ha/sa/b+h+yaHSh+T+r-i/ru n+tu d+ha/de m+bu stong pas man m+b+ha la ts+tshaSh+Ta
329a2(rgyud): gda? dza ya a da dzA ya/br-i pre sha ya pra bI shwa ya/tISh+ma Sh+TaM/oM ba lo ka/ya bra la ka yAM hU~M dza~M/de ni spyan dang ba'i sngags so//oM ma hA kA li ma pa sa ma ya/shI ti t+tiSh+Thas+t+waM/
329a3(rgyud): ka li a be sha ya/ra ma ti sa ma ya b+hes/de ni gdan gding ba'i sngags so//a maSh+Ta bi ma hA ka li ro ma ti b+hA li kha~M kha lA~M tA rAt+ti/mahA mu tsa ho/a mr-i ta kha kha le le/de ni gtor ma 'tshul ba
329a4(rgyud): sngags so//ma ma sA ma ya mA d+hu ka sa ma ya/mung+ku ka li kA ye sa ma ya/ma hA ka l-i wA gswaM ma ya/maN+Da kA li tsit+ta sa ma ya/mahA muHkA ba lat+ta//de ni
329a5(rgyud): dpa tshig brtan pa'i sngags so//oM badz+ra dza gi ni te ma hAka la sa ma yA/badz+ra ko d+hakarma d+hak+Sha n+tu/da ni lam la bskul ba'i sngags so//oMr+yA r+ya dz+dzanA~M/ shugs b+hAd+d+haR+Ya klu ba shas
329a6(rgyud): nag mo n+tu/ri gu shA tsit+ta mahA sa ma ti/ma ru kha tsi ta na na/rAgra mo tI ki mdze/ma ma ti tits+tsha b+h+yo/de ni dpon ge yog gnad nas bskul ba'i sngogasas//oM br-idz+re Da gi nI de bi mahA ka la
329a7(rgyud): ma ti/kA Sha bA ga tsit+ta sa ti sa ma ya phal mo bai sha ya ya/de ni dngos grub blang ba'i sngags so//oM ma hA ka li ye hU~M phaT/ru ruts+tsha pa la a shu ge mi hUM ma hA ka li a d+hi shan+d+ha/ka pa la

329b3(rgyud): /b+h+rUM gas byug mthun ma jug ma thu zhem hU~M ga ma thug mthug sa/d+hu dr-i r+b+hu dun+du dud+d+hA du trU~M duM ts+tshe /phaT tak+ShaphaT ta ka paT ta ka paT ta ka paT tA kA g+hA ta ka pan+na ta ka
329b4(rgyud): /do ni rnam nyim pa 'i sgra'o//ma 'i' 'brum ma gyi'i ba de'i rgyud mas//stegs kyi sbyin pa'i 'a ste babyung bgyi//de nas lce'i dbang pa

329b6(rgyud): ma pa dang /phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/rnal 'byor gsang paSh+Ti b+hag rgyud ma pa ni//sprang por mi b+ha d+hag tu bcang bar bya'o//dang pogaca bo rdo rje rgya grol gnas//rlung gis me smra
329b7(rgyud): zhon dbang phyug so/grogs kyus brjing nas gi shog pas zil gyis gnon//mang bus gdan 'dings thod pas dbang bskur te//zeng rlon dam brtan gnyis med dngas
330a1(rgyud): @grub blang //rtag tu mtshan ma ngan pa phyag rgyas bzlog/dang po gtso bo rdo rje rtse lnga ni//lag gnyis sor mo rgyab du pasnol bcangs la//mthe bong gung mothe'u chung ba shibs la sgreng //
330a2(rgyud): rdo rje rtse lnga phyag na rdo rje'i rgya'o//dang po rlung nag tshub ma'i phyag rgya ni//lag na thal sbyar gung sprad bsgreng pa dang //mthe chung srin log tshigs bsnol bskrad pa dang /de brkyang mthe bong gung gtad 'dzub mo gany+dzi/
330a3(rgyud): bsgreng rjong //rtse mo bkug pa rlung gi rgya'o//me ri smug nag 'bor ba'i phyag rgya ni//'dzub mi gnyis ni sor mo dgug byas te//mthe bong bkug ste de la gtad byas la//gung mo the'u chung bsgreng ste phyar/
330a4(rgyud): ba'o//lha mo nag mo'i ral gri yi phyag rgya ni//lag g.yas mthe'u chung bkug ste mthe bos gnan//gung 'dzub srin log bshabs te bsgreng ba'o//khol mo re ma ti'i phyag rgya ni/lag pa g.yas po ku
330a5(rgyud): mthe bos gnan byas te//lhag mo gsum brkyang bas ni khram bam phyag rgya yin//ma mo dgug pa lcags kyu phyag rgya ni//lag gnyis rgyab spad mthe'u chung bsgrang nas ni//'dzub mo gnyis bkug/
330a6(rgyud): gung srin theb mos bsdu//brkyang ste phral nas snying khar lcags kyu gnyis/zil gyis gnon pa khyung gshog phyog rgya ni/mthe'u bo gnyis gshibs sor me gshog ltar brkyang //gdan
330a7(rgyud): mchog bong bu dag go phyag rgya ni//mthe'u chung bsnol bas srin lag gnan byas te//srin lag thor te the bos gnas pa'o//de bzhin gung mo gnyis ni nang du bstan//byin brlabs dbang
330b1(rgyud): spyod thong steng phyog/ rgyun//sdug pa gsas g.yan/ chur bcangs pa la//tha 'jug bzhi pa lcags smug snru rnal/lag gas zad dran dam tshig phyagan+d+ha ro//mthe bong 'jub ma bcug nas
330b2(rgyud): bzlum byas te/bkug nas srin lag gnyis bcug mig 'bras 'dra//gung mo the'u chung gnyis ni tha~Md rlan kha//dngos grub blang ba'i bdud rtsi bum pa ni//log gnyis sor bcu rtsa bsdus bkug
330b3(rgyud): la zlu mo//mtshan ngan bzlog pa tri shul phyag rgya ni/lag giyas theb 'dzub srin lag mthil du bkug/mthe bo gung mo the'u chung phyar la bsgreng //mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud
330b4(rgyud): las/phyag rgya bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o///de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol/kye stobs po che la gnod sbyin grags pa can//
330b5(rgyud): rig sngags gsang sngags tshogs kyi mnga' bdag gis//rdo rje mkha' 'gro mnyes par bya ba'i phyir//mchod pa'i rim pa bdag lnga bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa la/gsang po'i bdag pos bka'
330b6(rgyud): stsal pe/rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub myur bya'i phyir//mnyes par byas te mchod pa rtog tu dbul//dang por mchod pa'i rdzas kyi gtor ma 'bul//gnyis pa la ni sbyin sreg 'bul ba'o//de
330b7(rgyud): bzhin gsum pa gsang ba'i mchod pa 'dulo//dang por gtor ma sho lnga bdud rtsi lnga//mchod pa'i rdzas dang 'dza gad rag te rnams//pad+ma mdzes pa'i snod du bkang byas nas//rlung gis me
331a1(rgyud): s+phar a yi thod pa bkol//hU~M gis rdo rjes rab tu dkrugs nas kyang //a dkar 'bar bas kha zas dug bcom la//dpa' bo 'bru lngas bdud rtsir byin gyis brlag/
331a2(rgyud): dang pos gtso bo phyag na rdo rje mchod//gnyis pas lha mo 'thungs par bsam//tha mA re mA ti sa yis brngubs par bsgom//oM badz+ra pA Ni hUM/DA ki ni ma hA ka li/yog sha re mA ti/ma
331a3(rgyud): ma sha d+hA ma a mu ka/ma tsa me ta bsam ma sa/ru ti dzi bi/pri ya bag shi ni/i daM b+ha li b+hir+b+ha g+hih+na/kha khA khA kha/khA hi khA hi/gsang sngags des ni rtag tu gtor ma 'bul po'o//
331a4(rgyud): de nas sbyin sreg 'bul ba bstab par bya//sku gzugs mdun du me thab bskor byas te//'o ma tsher mi yod pa'i shing brtsigs lo//bram ze khyim nas me blangs me sbar la//bsreg rdzas
331a5(rgyud): mi sha mor nag sbrang rtsi chang //khrag la sbyar la khri phrag gcig tu dbul//bsgom thabs me nyid me lhar skyes zhon pa la//phyag bzhi g.yos na dbyug pa dang ni mchod sbyin//g.yon na
331a6(rgyud): mgu De dang ni bgrang phreng rab tu 'dzin//de yi snying khor phyag na rdo rje dang //lha mo nyid dang khol mo ra ma ti//gsal bar skyed la sbyin sreg dbul bar bya'o//gnyis pa gtso bo phyag na rdo rje/
331a7(rgyud): mchod//gsum pas lha mo nag mo de la 'bul//de bzhon tha mas re ma ti la mchod//so so'i snying po bzlas shing dbul bar bya'o//oM badz+ra tsaN Do ma hA ro Sha Na na hUM/ma hA d+hi bi ka/
331b1(rgyud): dgu rgyu na na sa/ / su sasusu spyo/ smra sasu smra gyu/
331b2(rgyud): na la//ga y-i nas da mo gnyis //rdza sto tu sdigs nas // so gru sag gas dag gi na da/
331b3(rgyud): /mnang po ya ka ye+e shA mA yA bo ci ta mahA ba tsa gu nam+b+ha 'o//mad+huka sbyis/ma ga ta ma gu ya s+t+wa~M/a be sha sa bsdu ba'o//mi nga zlum ma lnga'abang ba'i rgyud las/mchod pa sa skye bdung/
331b4(rgyud): de nas rtswa dbang po bskye byin deng/dpal phyug na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to//ye shes lngar ldan dang 'aM bAn+na drub ni//dang na mi bskyed du sems da smr-its+tshahUM//rdo rje ma 'gro ma'i dos grub
331b5(rgyud): ga nas gas pa dang / sa 'al /myes ma ma phyug di sa langs dang smra
331b6(rgyud): na /na stsom 'i sa rdzu dus sargyu/ da na /sdugs smra
331b7(rgyud): ng+ge mchogs//sku yi phyeg rgya ma spong na //spyang dang sri dedon ma sa par bya//rdorje kun la gdung po med//gtso ba ri gsung gi dam tshig ni//zlas brji snying po rgyun mig cod//ma yangs rdzun
332a1(rgyud): /spangs gsang sngags 'dzin//gats+tsha ba'i thugs kyi dam chog ni//gsang ba gzhan la mo sgrol zhing //stan 'gran 'bras bum+b+ha la spyad//de nas gtsa ma'i dam tshig bshad//lha ma'i sku /
332a2(rgyud): dam tshig ni//bong bu lan byams par bya//khal gyis mi gnad dbyug mi brdog/rma bya'i mdongs ni rtag tu bcang //me yi dkyil 'khor mthong ba ni//me tog skyes ltar dga' bar bya//rtag tu yi dam mi
332a3(rgyud): 'da' ba'i//zhag re phyag rgya gnyis bstan//lha mo gsung gi dam tshig ni//rgyun tu bzlas pa byed pa dang //ne'u la mthong na bstod pa bya//phyag rgya bstan zhing dga' bor bya//zhing lpags rjes kyi snad bya//chub ma
332a4(rgyud): dag dang phrad gyur na//rked par mi gcod rgyab mi bstan//chos grangs shis dang nam gung la//phyag rgya bya zhing bstod par bya//lha mo'i thugs kyi dam tshig ni//'jig rten gang dang gang dag na/bud med lugs
332a5(rgyud): yod pa la byams par bya zhing chags pa spyad//rtag tu bu mo gtsang ma bsten//lha mi zla mtshan rgyu dus//gsang ba'i mchod pas dam bsgo'o//lha mo'i khol mo ra ma ti'i//de yi sku yi dam tshig no//byis
332a6(rgyud): pa dag gi nong phyug la//gos dang kha zas mgron du sbyin//rtag par de la byams par bya//shing lo sor bzhi rkang par gcad//phyed le ma mo'i sku bris te//phyed la dngos grub gsol bar bri//de ni rtag
332a7(rgyud): tu bcang ba'o//khol mo gsung gi dam tshig ni//ma phebs bar du srog snying drang //nub re gtor ma 'dar mi rung //kha 'phro dag kyang bsre ba man//phreng ba la yang reg pa bsrung //bdag gis ngag
332b1(rgyud): byams byas te/byas ni bcas par ma bshad//khas bla sa yol dug la rung //dud kyang nyams par bya ba man//rdos la chung ni bsgyur ma bya//khal ma thugs kyi dmachog ni//nal bu yod du'i sgyu
332b2(rgyud): lo me tog gtor zhing byams par bya//kha zas spyan zhing rngan mi bgrang //sna khrag zla mchen blang bar bya//dom tshig yang rung med rung ste//bdog ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor la//rang gi lha dang snying pa dang //
332b3(rgyud): rdzas dang phyag rgya mi bsta no//mtshan ma rdo sol zhu bas bsku//bya nag lug nag rtag tu bcang //the tsom zar ni mi rung //dpon g.yog spyi yi dam tshig ni//ru ti rdo rje pad+ma yi//rtag tu bcings la brtan
332b4(rgyud): cing mchod//de dang bral du mi rung //rnal 'byor dngos grub thob bya'i phyir//sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig bstan//brgya byin dag gis rab zhus pa//dam tshig nyams pa'i skyon ni gang //dam tshig
332b5(rgyud): bsrung ba'i yon tan gang //'byung ba'i gtso bos bshad du gsol//phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa//rab tu bshad kyis brgya byin nyon//gtso bo phyag na rdo rje yi//sku yi dmachog nyams pa na//mtho ris
332b6(rgyud): go 'phang rgyud lam 'chad//gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa na//bsgrungs kyang dngos grub mi 'thob cing //bsngags la nus mthu med paro//thugs kyi dam tshige nyams pa na//mkha'agro'i chad pas rab
332b7(rgyud): bcad nas//nges par rdo rje dmyal bar skya//dngos grub med par bar chod 'byung //dang ldan lha mo nag me yi//sku yi dam tshig nyams pa na//rgyal po tshad dang sbrul gdug dang //me dang chu yi bar du/
333a1(rgyud): chod//gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa na//bsgrub la g.yel zhing nus mthu med//bsgrub pa rtsom ras bar chad 'ong //thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa na//nyams len 'ong zhing rims nang ngo
333a2(rgyud): khol mo bdud mo re ma ti'i//sku yi dam tshig nyams gyur na//'khor la rims nad smyo 'bog 'ong //dgra rnams tshe dang bsod nams 'phel//gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa na//bu dang chung ma 'chi ba dang //
333a3(rgyud): snying mi dga' zhing kha yang yi//nor dang longs spyod zad par 'gyur//thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa na//rang gi tshol bar chod 'ong //mdze dang rgyu gzer na zhing 'bog/spyi yi dam tshig nyams pa na///
333a4(rgyud): rtag par bsgrubs kyang 'grub dus med//rtag pa ro dgra dang mi 'dra'o//yang ni lha dbang brgya byin nyon//dam tshig bsrung ba'i ston la//gtso bo phyag ni rdo rje yi//sku yi dam tshig ma nyams na//bla med byang/
333a5(rgyud): chub go 'phang 'thob//gsung gi dam tshig ma nyams na//phyag na rdo rje'i zhal mthong nas//rdo rje'i ngag la dbang thob 'gyur//thugs kyi dam tshig ma nyams na//drin las rnam bzhi'i mngon du 'grug/
333a6(rgyud): mkha'agro ma rnams mngon du 'khol//mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsams pas 'grub//dang ldan lha mo nag mo yi//sku yi dam tshig ma nyams na//lha srin pho mos phyag byed te//'dod pa'i khams kyi rgyal srid
333a7(rgyud): /'thob//gsung gi dam tshig ma nyams na//sngags bzlas mkha 'gro mngon du'ong //bar chad med par dngos grub ster//thugs kyi dam tshig me nyams ni//bdud dang dgra yis mi tshugs shing //
333b1(rgyud): rtag tu rims nang mi 'byung zhing //dag rnams tha tsham med par 'tshe//sgyu ma yangs kyis bzung bar 'gyur//tsha ring nor dang ldan par 'gyur//de nas nag mar ma ti'i//sku yi dam tshig ma nyams na//'a'adzin
333b2(rgyud): kra shis dar cing rgyas//dgra dang bgegs rnams phung bar byed//gsung gi dam tshig ma nyams na//bu dang chung mdar ba dang //nor dang ling spyod rgyas par 'gyur//mig rnon nang 'gyogs ri 'angs 'grus
333b3(rgyud): thugs kyi dam tshig ma nyams na//tshe ring grags pa thob po dang //lub la chad kyis mi thabs shing //sems la sdug bsngal med par 'gyur//mthu rgyal chen po thob par 'gyur//spyi yi dam tshigs
333b4(rgyud): nyams na//gla ca ba phyag na rdo rje dang //lha ma nag mo dpon gsog kun//rtag tu bdag dang mi 'bral//ji ltar 'dod pa'i dran de 'grub//gang ltar mengag pa'i las de byed//mkha ga ma lci 'bar ba'i rgyu
333b5(rgyud): las/dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o////de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to//hUM mdzad hU~M gi rgyal po rdo rje che//rdo rje mkha 'gro'i drod cho
333b6(rgyud): mtshan ma shod//ces zhus pa dang /dpal phyag na rdo rje bka' stsal pa/skyes bu blo ljon man ngag rtsang can gyis//gsang sngags ting 'dzin phyag rgyar rab ldan no//rdo rje mkhe 'dra'i grub rtags 'di ltar
333b7(rgyud): /'byung //grub rtags phyi nang gsang ba gsum du bshid//nang gi grub rtogs mig dang rna ba dang //sna dang lce dang lus dang snying la 'byung //gal te mig gos srid po gsum mthong na//gtsa bo phyag
334a1(rgyud): na rdo rje'i mtshan ma yin//mig gis lha mo mthong na sgyu ma yin//mig ni 'drar shing 'gul na ra ma ti//rna bas srid pa gsum pa zos na rdo rje 'dzin//mkha' 'gros glata ma ther thos//
334a2(rgyud): na lha mos bstan//bud med 'brug sgra sgrogs na re ma ti//sna la ga bur dri ni rdo rje 'dzin//ku mu ta yi dri ni lha mo nyid//spros sam gur kum pro ne re ma ti//lce la dam chos 'chad na rdo rje 'dzin//lce la
334a3(rgyud): gsang sngags zlog na lha mo yin//legs nyes mtshan ma sma na re ma ti//lus ni 'phro na phyag na rdo rje yin//lus la 'od 'byung ba ni lha mo'i rtags//lus po 'dar ram sbyi sha bung ba dang //sha rtsa
334a4(rgyud): 'gul ni rem ti yi gtogs//glal lam skyug cing mchi mi 'ad ba na//lhamo dpon g.yog yo ge phebs pa yin//gal te sgying gi skye ba dran pa na//phyag na rdo rje'i dngos grub mtshan ma'o//snying ni
334a5(rgyud): dga' la tshig na rje mo yin//snying 'di khri lo 'jig na khol mo yin//da ni gsang ba grub rtags bstan par bya//sngags dang ting 'dzin nus pa skyes tsam na//rdo rje dbus kyi rtsa yi na mkha' laM//
334a6(rgyud): byang chub sems kyi dga' bde skye ba na//mkha' gro rtsa la rang la shar bar bshad//da ni phyo yi grub rtags bstan par bya//phyi yi rtags ni raba'o bring tha ma gsum//rab ni lha mo nyid kyi sku mthang
334a7(rgyud): stes+ho//na mkha'i dbus phyag na rdo rje mthong //bud med dkar mo gzhad cing byung ba na//gsang ba'i ye shes dngos grub gtir ba'o//nag ma rel pa can du byung ba na//'dod khams 'dul dri
334b1(rgyud): mthu rtsal dngos grub bdag la ster//dmar mo bas yi ral pa can du byung ba na//'jig rten dbang du sdud pa'i dngos grub ster//ser ma thod pa'i phreng ba can du byung ba na//tshe dang long spyod rgyas pa'i grub pa
334b2(rgyud): sbyar//mkha' gro grub rtags 'bring po ni//rdo rje na mkha' las dpa'i gtso bo yin//rje moM lha mo dung skying grub rtags la//rdzas lud pa ni mun pa shin tu nag//me tog char 'bab 'brog dang rlung dmar dang //
334b3(rgyud): bud med gzugs dang gzha 'tshon ston pa'o//khol mo ri ma ti'i grub rtags ni//'brug dang rlung dam ro sgo rdung khang thog 'tshog/thibs thibs gnan dang thal thol smra ba'o//grub rtags tha ma rmi lam da//
334b4(rgyud): dustan//byang chub sems dpa' rmis na gtso bo yin//ma dang sring mo rmis na jo mo yin//chung ma khal mo rmis na g.yog mo yin//bong bu sha ba rmis na rnga mo yin//dri'u dang bya nag rmis na khrel mo yI//
334b5(rgyud): ma mo grub nas dbang du 'dus pa na//bud med dag gis bdag la phyag 'tshal na//'dzum zhi dri 'khri go byed pa spyod pa yin//ma mo grub nas dbang du ma 'dus na//mi sdug gzugasu ston zhing rje mar
334b6(rgyud): rdzu//gcan gzan zar 'angamu maM phyag skugaso//dam tshig nyams nas ma me 'khrugs gyur na//mo mo nang 'thab mtshan gyi char pa 'bab//bya nag nang 'thabs khrig ni na bun 'khrigs//lhas
334b7(rgyud): de mthong na bka' chad 'ong ba'i rtags//gal te lte phur nag mo la sogs pa'i//dma~M sri rnams kyis bsgrub pa bar gcod ni//grang la 'khreg so shing khyim du 'gro snying 'dod//kha br-i sgra skye
335a1(rgyud): 'dod la khro zhing 'tshig/bud med rkub dang mo mtshan ston pa rmi//gal te gtor ma dus las yol ba na//mo mtshan dang ni sngon gyi dbang rtags ston//du ba 'khrigs nas bud mad
335a2(rgyud): glal ba mthong //bud med du ba mthong na nyams pa gdong //mig ni btsums pa ting 'dzin lel ba'i rtags//thal modzob na dam tshig mchang zed//sI b+h+rUM ston na stong pa chod pa yin//so sgra 'ahrI//
335a3(rgyud): na gzhan dang 'thab mo 'ong //rgod pa thos na dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i rtags//khro na bar chad 'ong ba smon pa yin//sbyor bar byed na dngos grub gter ba yin//rgyang glu len pa mthong na grub thag
335a4(rgyud): ring //mchi ris ngo la yod na rims nang 'ong //gang thob byed cing byung na ci bsam 'grub//gling bu 'bud pa mthong na gtor ma 'dod pa yin//phreng ba bgrang ba mthong na sbyin sreg 'dod pa yin//
335a5(rgyud): kha la 'o byed sbyor pa 'dod pa yin//bong bu zhon pa rmis na rje ma yin//dre'u zhon pa rmis na khol mo yin//sti sbams thogs pa mthong na rang la chags//g.yab dang thogs pa mthong na rang la
335a6(rgyud): chags pa'o//me long thogs pa mthong na chung ma'i lus la chags//stang bstabs byed pa slob ma'i lus la chags//bya dang gcan gzan gtor ma za ba bzang //kha rog 'dug na snying po
335a7(rgyud): phyag rgya nor//'dzum pa mthong na bdag nyid tshe ring brtags//gos la me rag yod na sleb ma nyams//sha ba zhon na nor rnams 'phel ba'i rtags//ma mo grub pa'i brtags rnams gang
335b1(rgyud): /rlung yang //do nas grub rtags bzang po mthong ba na//bdud rtsi bum pa'i phyag rgya bcas la ni//dngos grub blangs pa'i sngags ni bzlas byas la//snying la ci 'dod pa yi dngos grub blang //ma dang sring mo/khol mo//
335b2(rgyud): dmyal gdags//mtshan ma ngan pa dag ni mthong ba na//mtshan ma ngan pa bzlog pa'i tri shul phyag rgya bca'//mtshan ma ngan pa bzlog pa sngags kyis bzlog/gal te bdag ni gzhan du den gnyer/
335b3(rgyud): na//bud med lag na rdzas ni gang ba thogs//bya dang gcan gzan sngon du 'gro na bzang //de tshe gtor ma 'bul la don la 'gro/spyad stong thogs pa mthong na don me gnyer//grub pa'i dod tshad rnal 'byor/
335b4(rgyud): spyil ces//mkha' dro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las/drod tshad bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o///de nas dpal phyag na rdo rje la//lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad
335b5(rgyud): cechos gsol to//thabs dang shes rab mnga' mdzad rdo rje 'dzin//rdo rje mkha' 'gro bsgrubs kyang ma grub na//spobs shing gnad la dbab par zhu ces gsol ba dang /dpal ldan phyag na rdo rjes bkul
335b6(rgyud): stsal pa//skyes bu ting 'dzin blo ldan rtsal can gyis//rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang sngags gtsor blangs te//gang 'dod dngos grub mi thob mi srid//'on kyang bsgrub thag ring ba na//de la nyes dmigs
335b7(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi//sngon gyi las 'phros ma 'brel dang //bsnyen pa zhag grangs nyungs pa dang //bgegs kyis bar du gcod pa dang //rnal 'byor dam tshig nyams pa bzhi//bsgrub thag ring ba'i rgyu
336a1(rgyud): bzhi yin//de bzhin mtshan ma ngas gzung ste//sngon gyi las 'phros ma 'bral na//bsgrubs kyang dngos sgyu mtshan ma med//bzlas brjod bsnyen pa grangs nyung sa nA//grub rtags
336a2(rgyud): 'ong zhing las mi nyan//bgegs kyis bar du gcod pa na//snying mi dga' la khro zhing 'jigs//rnal 'byor dam tshig nyams pa na//bar chod rkyen dbang drag po 'byung //'on kyang mi gzhag bskyar
336a3(rgyud): zhing bsgrub//sngon gyis las 'phros ma 'brel na//dang por bsnyen pa yun ring sa la//de nas gnad la dbab pa ni//bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor byang shar du//dur khrod sa la grub gsum dkyil/
336a4(rgyud): 'phang du khru gang yod pa brtsig/mi ye khrog gis chag chag gdab//de nas zhing sogs g.yas pa la//lha mo nyid kyi sku bris la//rgyus pa'i gzungs thag snying khar gdags//gru gsum
336a5(rgyud): steng du gan rgyal gnan//gzungs thag rtsi mo sos gzungs la//hUM mdzad chen por gsal bsgoms la//ma mo gsod pa'i snying po bzlas//rag mo tsi tA rak+ta sti ra ti ti mA ra ya hUM dza/de skad
336a6(rgyud): gsang sngags bzlas nas ni//ma mo'i snying khrag rngub par bsgom//ma mo bong bur bcas pa rnams//me thang bzhin du 'gyel bar bsam//de nas snying khar rdog pas gnan//tsi ta dz+wa la
336a7(rgyud): raM zhes pas/bdag gi zhal nas me byung bas//ma mo thul gyis bgegs par bsam//ma mo'i sa bon maM nag mo//bdag gi zhabs 'og rgyud pa las//ma ma ru lu zhes brjod pa wa//
336b1(rgyud): bdag nyid dpal gyi zhabs 'og nas//lha mo nus pa'i tha~Md phreng can//thul mo sbyar nas 'dug par bsgom//rta mgrin phyag rgyas dbang du badz+ra//khyung gshog phyag rgyas zil gan nas//gnad la dpa
336b2(rgyud): pa'i dam rdzas bsreg/de ltar lan cig bsad pa des//gzugs ni rdog pa'o 'og nas dbyung //byang shang mtsham su bzhugasu gsel//spros bshagaso bya zhing gdung glu blangs//bdud rtsi rnam pa
336b3(rgyud): lnga yis gso//mtshang nas 'bru zhing gnang nas bskul//de nas bsgrub pa bskyal la brtsam//the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur//bsnyen pa zhag grangs nyungs pa na//mi rus sam ni ru dag
336b4(rgyud): sha lung thang dag gi phreng ba la//ma yengs grangs kyi bsnyen pa ni//'bu mo 'tsho bdun du bzlas kyang rung //yang na mtshan ma'i bzlas pa shig/bgegs kyis bar du gcod pa na//gru gsu
336b5(rgyud): aM dong nag po brko//mi khyi phag gi chag chag gdab//kham saM NA yi ling ga la//snying khar dam sri'i ming bris la//rabs chad nag pa'i thod par gzhug/thod pa dong gi nang du gzhug/'bar
336b6(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgoms//dam sra bkug cing bstim byas la//mi rus sor brgyad phreng ba yis//mi g.yo mgon por gsal bsgom gdab//mtshan ma ngan pa bzlog sngags
336b7(rgyud): bzlas//de brtad rdo ba nag po la//ri rab rdo rje rgya grem bri//'brub khung de yi kha bcad la//de gtong sku gdung nag pa rtsig/de ni dam sri gnan par bshad//rnal 'byor dam tshig nyams pa la//mkha
337a1(rgyud): 'gro ma yi chod pa 'byung//nyams tshad chen bskang tshong tshe//bsgrub pa grub rtags mod pa dang //rang nyid srog la 'bab pa'o//nyams pa 'bring gi bka' chad ni//'khor la rgyan
337a2(rgyud): dang rims nad 'byung //nyams pa tha ma'i bka' chad ni//ngagra dang nor la god ka 'byung //de nas nyams pa bskang ba ni//gtor ma khri dang sbyin sreg khri//de bzhin ra tsa gsum gyis bskang //des kyang
337a3(rgyud): skostongs par mi 'gyur na//dang po mkha' lding gsum gyis bsgreng //de nas shel nag gsum gyis bskang //bka' chad 'bring po byung ba na//gtor me stong dang sbyin sreg stong //mkha' lding /
337a4(rgyud): gnyis dang sbyinag gnyis//de bzhin ra tsa gnyis kyis bskang //mdangs kyi mar me bco brgyad dbul//bka' chad tha ma byung ba na//gtor ma brgya dang sbyin sreg brgya//mkha' lding gcig dang shel
337a5(rgyud): nag gcig/ra tsa gcig gis bskongs par bshad//mkha'agro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las/spogs shing thugs dam bskong ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum po'o////de nas lha'i dbang po brgya
337a6(rgyud): byin gyis/dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to//drag po dpal 'bar gnod sbyin khros pa'i gtso/rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub bsgrub 'dod pas/rtag tu bsten pa rdo rje 'dzin pas bshod/
337a7(rgyud): ces gsol pa dang /dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa//nyon cig mkha' gro rtag tu bstan pa ni//dang po grub cing mtshan ma thob pa ces//de nas phyi nang gsang ba gsum du bsten//dpon
337b1(rgyud): 'i phyi'i rten no rma bya //rma bya'i skyed khar b+hu las mo bskyed//khom mo'i phyi yi rten ni bya nag mo//snying khur r+g+ho las re ya ti bskyed la//rma dre mnag gam shol nag la//rtswa mam ngangon gatshig la dang
337b2(rgyud): par ga//de nas phyin gsang ba'i dbang bskur la//dusuM gto mas mchod rten nang du gzung //nang gi rten ni sna dang gsang mtshon//rang gi gzugs dang gsang mtshan kha spyad la//bar du ru ti rdo rje
337b3(rgyud): mi//gsang ba ga bur stsal te lus la bsrel//gsang ba'i rten ni lhan cig grub pa'i lha//gsang ba ye shes thig le ma mor blta'o//de nas rtag tu sngags dang phyag rgya dang //ting 'dzin rdzas dang dam
337b4(rgyud): tshig mi snang //rtag tu zas kyi phud kyis bsten par bshad//mkha 'gro ma mo lce 'brar ba'i rgyud las/ma mo rtag tu brten pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o///de nas dpal phyag na rdo rje la/
337b5(rgyud): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//kye dpal 'bar chen po nyi ma stong gi gzi//rdo rje lha mo mkha 'gro ma dpal gyi lha mo yaM//pra rtags dbab dang slob ma dbang bskur ba'i//ma mo dbab pa'i
337b6(rgyud): gsang sngags bdag la shod ces gsol pa dang /dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/lha mo 'bebs shing sleb ma dbang bskur ba'o//slob dpon nyid kyis ma mo grub pa ces//de nas ma mo grub pa'i
337b7(rgyud): slob dpon des//dur khrod chen por zhag bdun bsnyen pa bya//sngags dang man ngag rdza su ldan par bya//dpa la rang la ma mo phobs par dbab//de nas slob ma dkyil 'khor 'jug pa dang //me tog
338a1(rgyud): k+Sha dor dang lha ngo bstan b+ha dang //dpal phyag na rdo rje'i dbang bzhi bskur//dang ba rdo rje rje lnga 'bar ba'i dad+ma/gnyis pa tha~Mng 'dril bu dag gi dbang //de bzhin gsum pa la ni dbu rgyan te//bzhi
338a2(rgyud): pa rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi dbang //de nas lha mo nogo mo'i dbang bzhi bskur//dang po la ni thod pa'i dbang //gnyis pas shes rab ral gris dbang bskur te//gsum pa la ni ne'u le'i rgyal bu'o//

338a4(rgyud): bzhi pa chu khri gdod pa'i dbang //dbang ni bskur ba'i sngags kyang bzlas par bya//bcu gnyis rim pa sngon du rjes pa dang //sku dang gsung gi dam tshig 'bog par bya'o//de nas gsang ba'i dbang la

338a6(rgyud): gser gyi sa brgyan//dbang po lnga la bdud rtsi dag gis gdab/dpral bar phyag na rdo rje'i gsang sngags bri/de yi snying khar lha mo'i snying po lnga//lte bur re ma ti yi snying po bri//sman lnga bdud rtsi lnga yi zas//

338b1(rgyud): tshal dang byung ba srog/stong 'og kun tu dong gi tha~Mng gdan//mdun dang rgyab tu gaN+Di ma sbyis//de nas mamo'i stong po 'jam dug dan//don sa rdu slob dpon bu ru yos//mA ru d+ha sha

338b3(rgyud): Na hU~M sa ma ya pra thA ru ru ro ru tsa pa la a shug me sa ma ya pra b+hA/khu mun+ta pra ma ya ma tiSh+Tha pra yau ga sid+d+hi sa ma ya pre thA s+t+ya bai shA A/drag dum mo bskul zhing dbab par bya'o//phebs par dka ran

338b6(rgyud): le des//dang pos gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa mchod//gnyis pas lha mo dpon g.yog mchod par bya//gsum pas khu ba bdag btung dngos grub blang //gzungs ma mkha'agro yin par nges bskyed lnga//
338b7(rgyud): gzungs ma'i lce la gzhag la dam tshig bsre//de nas thig le slob ma'i lce la gzhag/de nas ma ma thugs kyi dbang sbyin//de nas bu mo der mdun du ni//dbang gi rtag su zla kham dmar po brtsig/
339a1(rgyud): de nas slob ma stegs bu'i kha la gzhag/mkha' gro kun la sbyin sreg gtor ma dbul//de nas bu mo shes rab ma de yis//ma mo 'dod kyi slob ma de la gdang //ma mo bskul pa'i//

339a4(rgyud): dbang bskur gnang ba thob la sbyin par bshad//mkha' gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las/dbang bskur ba'i le'u sde bco lnga pa'o///de nas lha'i dbang po brgya bya na des/
339a5(rgyud): dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to//kye ma phyag na rdo rje che//ngo mched byin gyi brlabs kyi mchog/lha mo grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i//las kyi rim pa bsha du gsol/ces gsol po dang /
339a6(rgyud): dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/nyon rig lha'i dbang po brgya byin nyon//lha mo'i grub pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas//so so'i las la ched du ma brtsams kyang //yid la ci 'dod bsams pa
339a7(rgyud): rnam gyis 'grub//'on kyang tshod du sgrub pa rtsom pa na//las kyi bye brog dam pa ngas gshod//ma mo grub pa rnams kyis bya ba yin//dang po'i las can rnams kyis mi brtsa mo//brgya byin nyon gyi
339b1(rgyud): zhi ba'i las kyi khyad par ni//bu ram sbrang rtsi 'gro wang dang //gu gul spos dang 'o ma dang //mar khu til dang 'bras chan dang //a ga ru dang du ru skra//gang la bya ba'i ming dang bcas//ri lu khri tsho gcig
339b2(rgyud): byas la//zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po dang //'o ma yod pa'i shing brtsigs la//mkha 'gro ma rnams dkar po la//bdud rtsi'i bum pa thogs nas kyang //gang lo bya ba'i spyi bo nas//dbang bskur lus pa
339b3(rgyud): shi bang bsgom//me sbang ri lu rim gyis bsreg/gong ma'i srog snying bzlas shing 'bul//sr-i gi snying po'i gzhug rgyan du//shan ting ku ru swAhA bzlas//'bumo che bzho ru bzlas byas la//bdud dang

339b5(rgyud): la bya ba'i ming dang bcas//khri tshe gnyis kyi ri lu bya//rgyas pa'i thab khung gru bzhi pa//'bras bu yod pa'i shing brtsegs lha//gtso bo phyag na rdo rje dang //mkha 'gro ma kun ser po la//rin chen mdzod
339b6(rgyud): dang bum pa thogs//gang la bye ba'i snying kha ru//dbang bskur phung po rgyas par shog/me sbang re lu rim gyis 'bul//oM tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM/kha mun tra ba tra ba tra trag rag mo puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/

340a1(rgyud): pra/#/pa dang ni//yung dang gla rtsi lcong zhun dang //nya sha mar khu rgya skyegs ni//ri lu khro tsho gsum byas la//dbang gi thab khung zla gam la//tshor ma can gyi shing brtsegs la/gtso dang
340a2(rgyud): 'khor gyi ma mo kun//mdog dmar lcags kyu thogs pa yis//gang la bya bo bkug par bsgom//me sba ra r-i lu rims kyis bsreg/oM tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M/pa tsa la a shug me pra ma ma hA sti pra

340a4(rgyud): dang gnod sbyin bu mo dang //kun kyang bdag gi dbang du 'gyur//bsreg pa'i l-i su bstan pa ni//drag po'i me thab gru gsum du//dug shing tsher ma'i me bus la//rta dang mgrin ring sha dang tshil//

340b1(rgyud): mdza' bo gnyis kyi ming bcas la//tsher ma'i shing la me bus la//'dum tshe gcig tu bstabs pa bya//srog gi snying po'i mtha' bar ni//ma ma trag rag sha ru tra ma ra ya hUM phaT/ga tsa phaT zhes ni bzlas

341a1(rgyud): pra nag po'i 'bras bu dang //dmangs rigs khyim gyi dud pa dang //byi la'i sha dang btsan dug dang //phabs dang bug pa gu gul nag po dang //phye ma dag tu rab sbyang la//sngags
341a2(rgyud): ni 'bum du bzlas pa bya//oM pa Ni badz+ra mahA ka li tsa pa la hUM/s+pho ta grum sngo sreng hUM hUM hU~M/de rnams kyi ni phye ma de//gang le gtor bas rengs par nus//rang lus spo ba'i sbyor ba ni//khwa te nag po'i//

341a4(rgyud): dril la bzhag/lham dpon g.yog snying po bzlas//srin bal thum po shing la gdags//mi ma mthong bar lus la btsa'o//bdag ni sus kyang mi mthong //nyon cig lha dbang brgya byin nyon//

343b1(rgyud): dz+nyA la shal mu/chog ma a mu kar g+ha tsAr nan/ma ra ya mar yA ru tI ra/u kaR+Sha ya a hU~M phaT//de skad khrag la sngags bzlas la//mu mo lus lnga bsul sngags gdag/de nas khrag gi zong mad dra//

343b5(rgyud): he'i dra 'om pa men du//mnga' dug btsan dug lo dug dang //rims nad khrag dang chang blugs lo//rA ru nang nyid khar bcug la//dung la mkha' 'gro'i snying po dang //las la bskul sngags
343b6(rgyud): ming dang bcas//de nas dug gi dpal sngags bzlas//hUM re ma ti ma ma ru lu rag Sha b+h+yo/re ma ti byi shi ma ya sta yag sha k+Sho ta che ge mo ma ra ya phaT/rI rtse phra mo bcad par ni//dug gi khwa
343b7(rgyud): ba mi mgos gting //mi mgo dug gis khengs tsam na//ma mo bskul ba'i rdzas bsregs la//khram pam phyag rgya bcas la ni//nam phyed khros te dgra la 'phang //the tsom med par dgra brla//
344a1(rgyud): tsi ta nag mo'i snying thun na//sbyang ki stag dang sro mong snying //khyi dang 'ug pa wa yi snying //pho ra khrag dang sbrul gyi snying //thod pa'i nang du stsal la ni//dang po'i ma mo dpan
344a2(rgyud): g.yog gi/gnad la bskul ba'i sngags bzlas shing //ma mo bskul ba'i dam rdzas bsregs//de nas snying gi thun sngags ni//trag rag sha tsi ta dung ro ta ma ti sma ra ra ta b+h+yo/de skad bzlas pa'i snying/
344a3(rgyud): thun des//grong la brgyab kyang phung bar byed//nag mo 'bar ba'i thun drug 'dis//mkhar la brgyab kyang 'jig pa la//g.yul ngo chen por brgyab kyang zlogs//gzhan gyi byad dang sngags kyang
344a4(rgyud): zlogs//dgra dang bgegs la the tshom med//yang ni bshad kyis brgya byin nyon//bstan pa gnyen po'i sku dgra la//ltas ngan bya nag dbab pa ste//dang po bya nag bzung byas la//bcu gnyis dbang
344a5(rgyud): gi rim pa bskur//de nas bya la ma mo dbab//bya de mig rtsa rgod pa dang //skad 'byin gshog pa gdeng ba na//ma mo phobs pa'i rtags yin pas//phyi dang nang gi mchod par bya//phyag rgya dgu ni rab

344a7(rgyud): dza sha sa ta tid+d+ho/re ma ta rig Sha si ru lu ru lu pra ma ma hA sti pra dung b+h+r-i/karma sa ma ya b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo zhes gtong //des ni bya nag gang du smos par 'gro'o//mkha 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i las kyi rgyud las/so som
344b1(rgyud): mi'i bye brag bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o////de nas lhang dbang ba brgya byinI des//dang la phyag ni rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to//kye rigs sngags gsang sngags bdag po gsang dbang po//phyag na rdorje/
344b2(rgyud): thig le bstan pa srung ba yi don du//bdud rtsi 'chang bzhin mar me gsod pa yi//skyes bu chen po mnga' bdag bshadu gsol//zhes zhus pa la/dpal phyeg na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/lnga brgya tham
344b3(rgyud): me ltar 'bar ba'i tshe//nyams pa gsod pa'i sbyor ba bshad kyis nyon//dang po mkha' gro mi lci bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas/skabasu gsad pa'i las la 'jug pa ni//dang la mtshan ma phebs pa'i bsnyen pa bya//

344b5(rgyud): skul ba gond la gdab pa'i dam rdzas bsreg/gnad la dbab cing las la bskul sngags bzlas//ting 'dzin khrag 'thung bdud mo'i bar du ni//snying gi 'od zer dag gis drangs byas te//bdud rtsi

345a1(rgyud): rdud pa'i rlung gos mar mo khad myos bsad//'dun pa'i rlung gis thog pa b+h+yo mong dang //dang thos 'akrug shod gas pas sumargya nyams//gsum pas pyod pa/
